The sausage pizza was okay, but for the price I would expect higher-quality sausage.  We also shared a short rib for an entree, and it was overcooked and uninspired.  We wanted a bottle of wine to wash down our disappointment, and the waiter kindly brought us tastes of three reds also served by the glass.  None was quaffable.  Do yourself a favor and choose another restaurant.

oogknG2Kx6BVo6GrXsnQiA.text: Tracee is the best waitress! Extremely attentive and knowledgeable about the area! Could not have asked for a better waitress, never felt like we needed to get her attention and our glasses were always full.

fWjSKMXuZUte5Im0oLeBtw.text: Had an awesome time for brunch at Hexx! Food selection was great - highly recommend the protein omelet. So.much.food. But so worth it! My partner in crime had the ham and cheese croissant, and he literally smiled the whole time he ate it. Our waitress, Tracee, was amazing! She kept our drinks filled and had us laughing like crazy. Keep up the great work! We'll definitely be back.

T2TFHjk6fSCAw8Vb_16sFQ.text: Amazing food and amazing drinks! We come here every year on our group trip- We had Sean as our Server 2 years in a row- he is the best! So friendly and attentive  Get the Hexx Benedict

Hv4d7C4EDTQYZlNzfIbyFA.text: We were very impressed with this place! We went to breakfast here based on recommendations.  The staff was attentive and friendly.  The wait was not long at all. (Maybe 10 minutes)  Their tables were clean despite being outside and they were very busy. (No dust or bird mess on them)  I ordered the Hexx Benedict and my husband had the Corned Beef Hash. Both dishes were prepared very very well. The eggs were not over cooked, and my husband's beef was not dry. We were served promptly and our waitress was friendly and knowledgeable.  We would highly recommend this place for a nice breakfast with a great view on the strip.

Ldv6_h8upBej5D-TZ4fFFg.text: Terrible service. I watched the waitress look at me for a few minutes before she even decided to come over to my table. Maybe she was debating if she wanted to wait on my table or not. The food is average at best. The host recommended the jambalaya so that's what I ordered. It was filled with nothing but pepper spice and no real flavor. I'm going to have to pass on this place moving forward.

V84RuNb1ehKvVvAP2SSMrw.text: Not a long wait. Good very delicious. Had the corn beef hash and brioche French toast with bottom less mimosas. Alec was great. Very attentive.

6-mAZ5DFhzaqjoW9Q4d-jg.text: Hello fellow yelpers! We came as a group of 11  without a reservation, a 23 minute wait on a Thursday morning. We had bottomless mimosas with mixtures of chilaquiles and chicken and waffles. Steven was a great hostess and server, making sure we never reached the bottom of our mimosas. Definitely coming back here for a Vegas getaway!

2ybLPqqOx0Cw7qb_Pf2ezA.text: We went for Mother's day brunch and it was great service, great food, and great drinks. I had the steak and eggs and it was perfect. We also got the bottomless mimosas and they are definitely bottomless. My drink was never empty and we tried, every time we got 3/4 down, our server was there to fill us up.

AA3o44JO9d4Y0lpdW-bqIQ.text: Came for some sangrias and the service was horrendous. We waited SO LONG to even get menus! You can go somewhere else for good drinks and BETTER SERVICE.

l-QqSkgwqc6Us-ET0a4vKw.text: Great area! People watching was on point. View of the bellagio fountains was second to none. Food was me.   We just came from dinner so we came for a nice dessert.   Service was incredible. Waitress was amazing.   We opted for the cookie Sundae. It was piled high with whipped cream, strawberry sauce and a cherry of course.   It was more of a cookie cake than an actual cookie. Consistency was fluffy.   The cookies and cream ice cream was good.   I'd probably pick something else off the menu next time but I'd definitely come back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cookie Sundae. Not terrible. Not great. Actually I want one now....

-sMTdU6LYB7FknvpBzlU5Q.text: The food here is absolutely delicious but it does take awhile to actually get the food to the table after ordering? Not sure why tables that were seated after us got food before us ?  We ordered a meat omelette and an extra order of potatoes not a lot of food to take 25 minutes?  Anyway besides the wait everything was great- food -service and atmosphere.

yS7V9ugFal61RGIhzmRfIA.text: Came here at the last minute to buy some treats and they had everything chocolate possible. However, the prices are a bit high, given you can buy the same things at local grocery stores.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fxbswexZDM_5x7REWU0p9w.text: We actually went here on a whim. It was there, we were hungry... However, I was pleasantly surprised at this place. Service was great, the wait  for a table was fairly short even though the place was packed. We got a great table and the waiter was attentive and friendly. The food was delicious! I ordered eggs, bacon, English muffin and potatoes.m; my husband ordered pancakes, bacon and potatoes. Everything was well cooked and the English muffin was the biggest, fluffiest one ever. We would definitely go back to this restaurant!

lNmZ8WvQmpUU3eZwl06UQw.text: Service here sucks. They took too long for every thing! The food wasn't great either. Honestly, what you see in the pictures is not what you get. Don't be coming here again.

QNB4AzQ5JnMLnpGI_tyynw.text: Tracee! Wth shes amazing! This place was my best experience in Vegas dining. Brunch. So fun!  I trust this company hiring and letting employees express and be who they are. We are multi-cultural,  and felt so comfortable and ready for a fun day after eating here. Thanks Hexx !

UH2r1-TRUsWPSZkrpLnNOA.text: The place is beautiful and the food very good. Good music, and the service is efficient

BFLeF3WuytZxX9glq0iPuQ.text: Um, seriously?  This is the 24 hour choice for Paris?  What happened to the all night steak and egg diners of Vegas past?   Woke up hungry after midnight and this or pizza were the only choices.  I had wanted to try this place anyway, so why not -- but no, never again.  Pulled pork French fries sounded great.  Well, if you like a big nasty lump of goo all glued together with cheese curds and swamped in some kind of nasty almost barbecue almost mayo/gravy.  Repulsive.  Literally tasted like something a small child would make by mixing every leftover in the refrigerator.   Clam chowder that came with the dry nasty salmon tasted like a dirty fish tank.  The salmon tasted old and way too fishy.  Gross.    The burger turned out to be almost decent, hence the 2 stars instead of negative 5 stars I would have given it for EVERYTHING else.  If you're starving to death in the middle of the night and have ABSOLUTELY no other choice than this place, at least don't waste your time on the other swill --have the $20 burger that is almost as good as Wendy's or Burger King. Almost.    Way overpriced for this crap. -- There actually is not a price low enough for this place. I would pass it up if they were giving away food actually -- Even though one expects overpriced on the strip.  Next time we will uber to the all night taco place or the Peppermill.

ejiE-MbunQMAHOVzTlRIsA.text: We had an amazing meal and our server Sean was absolutely fantastic! Very attentive and kept the mimosas going all morning!! Thanks for starting out our wedding weekend with a bang! Ivan was great too!!  Thank you

CVYaSNUzZEIR2leqqbwcPg.text: The food was plentiful and high quality, every single one of the staff was friendly. Definitely a strong recommendation, just watch out for that Saturday brunch rush.

0xLrp46Nun2J7Vg77y2JXQ.text: I made a spontaneous trip with a friend to Vegas for 48 hours, and I am so glad we were able to squeeze in brunch at Hexx during our short visit! The price is a little high for normal breakfast/brunch cost but nothing unexpected for the location and atmosphere. I highly recommend sitting outside as you have a great view of the strip and attractions, plus it's just a great vibe!   I ordered a coffee (black) and a bellini. Both were delightful but don't come close to how AMAZING the food was! I ordered the banana bread French toast and oh my gosh, I could eat it again right this second. Without a doubt, it was the best meal I had on the trip  A small warning: They casually suggest add ons such as fruit for many of their breakfast meals, these are an extra cost. Our server didn't mention the additional fee.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Black coffee and Bellini, no complaints! So delish!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Banana Bread French Toast and Buttermilk Pancakes

8FNpjDKcKy6s0aggPCMThg.text: Sean 007 really bumped my experience at Hexx from a 4 to a 5 star experience. The endless mimosas and poutine fries were worth the visit, but Sean really went above and beyond to make us comfortable and happy in our 7-person group! Thanks to Hexx and Sean!

kDdSm-pOoIP7Tb3nZKrbvQ.text: apollo is amazing. best service ive ever had. such a sweet kind gentleman. made sure our mimosas were full and our food was amazing i love this place and hin

FKQiC79ZenlXdg_IihaAsA.text: I have been to Hexx three times--twice with a group and once solo.  This past weekend, four of us met to try a number of brunch/dinner plates and all eight desserts on their menu.  There wasn't one dish that disappointed.  Outstanding ones were--carrot pancakes, Korean BBQ ribs with fried rice, the fruit platter was excellent ands beautifully served, and finally, I really could have continued eating the Banh Mi loaded fries until I couldn't walk anymore but I decided to draw the line somewhere.  Desserts were coming.  Then  came a parade of beautifully plated and very tasty desserts.  The Cookies N Cream was outstanding!!  The other two desserts that were super were the ginger panna cotta and the blueberry corn cobbler.  Service was excellent which is a hallmark of Hexx.  It was still warm enough to have the patio doors open and we could hear and watch Bellagio fountain shows until the colder weather set in and the doors were shut!  Excellent meal!  Thanks Ari and staff!

ytYizze6SmplThqr4Y2lXg.text: A little dinner after a day of walking the strip, we settled on stopping in here because of the view from the patio of the Bellagio fountains.    My husband and I like to share dishes so we get a little of both and the decisions we made were great.  We ordered a hamburger and a wedge salad chopped and they were both delicious and just enough food for us both to be satisfied with the meal.  Great place to rest your feet and watch the show on the streets and across the street

ZcXa2cCw1oDziTRQS4s78A.text: I came here for a Monday brunch. I got the eggs benedict, which was absolutely delicious. The egg was cooked perfectly. Someone in my group got the steak and eggs. I sampled the steak and it was tough, chewy, and had little flavor - I'd pass on this. I also sampled another friend's chicken and waffles, and it was fine.  The service was particularly and noticeably good here. They do charge a 4.7% "concession fee," however.

H7jC2TcYfDqpVFpFly7gag.text: I wish I would have discovered HEXX earlier in our trip so that we could have made another trip here before  going home. This place was amazing. From the food to the service, everything was perfect. It's right on the strip, connected to the Paris. They have a lot of different seating options. High table, low table... and these super cool little private booths with curtains for privacy. Next time, I'm sitting in one of those- would be perfect for a date night. Highly, highly recommend!!!

FZwaMLxKpfl2QSAFIFqLLA.text: We stopped here for our last brunch in LV based on the great Yelp reviews. Needless to say the reviews did not lie! The food is delicious and the service is great! We ordered the chicken and waffles and the Hexx eggs Benedict, with a side of buttermilk pancake. It was plenty of food for 2 and we packed up a big piece of chicken to go! Everything tasted fresh and delicious and we enjoyed the bottomless mimosa as well. Overall, great brunch ambiance and excellent food! Highly recommend!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict, Chicken &amp; Waffles, buttermilk pancake

Bx2xY5DiXeTydo8dd8LGLw.text: A MUST when you are in Vegas! Perfect for brunch or the best time is dinner when the sun is going down and you sit on the patio! We got to watch the fountains in the light and then lit up at night throughout our dinner and it was pure perfection. The filet here is amazing and the roasted chicken plate is to die for as well! Amazing wine sauce on the chicken plate. You HAVE to experience their fun drinks!!! I suggest this one in the disco ball, but make sure to share with 2-4! The potions are fun too but not as much alcohol for the price. Thank you Hexx for such a fun night!

eFOiNJJ5G9oySs29HdKXjQ.text: Super cute restaurant located.  They have a variety of options Even bottomless mimosas for 2 hours for 25 bucks.  Total bargain! Staff is super friendly.  They quickly sit u down and take ur order the food is delicious.  Would recommend

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie Burger

cWb9arKdHH3Lf3EHoJxagg.text: Came here for dinner on a Wednesday. Made reservations just in case, but the restaurant was not too packed. The patio seating was gone by the time we arrived (around 6), but the rest of the restaurant was still open.   We were seated immediately, but they took a while to actually take our order. The food also took a while to come out. I ordered the Gnocchi and my boyfriend ordered the burger.   I was really excited to try out their Gnocchi, but I was pretty disappointed. I have had gnocchi from so many places and this one just did not hold its ground. It was overall very mushy and the sauce was nothing spectacular. The burger was similar in the sense that it was good, but nothing special. Portion wise the burger was pretty big and came with a side of fries.  Since the food didn't wow me and the service wasn't the best I give this place a solid three star. I may be back to try their brunch since most 5 star reviews seem to be about brunch. They do have a beautiful seating area, so if you are looking for a nice view of vegas while you dine this is the place for you! It's right across the street from the Bellagio fountains.

NzqWORRgjw2_Gtpbm6FyXQ.text: Went her for dinner with my coworkers. We chose this place simply because that had patio seating, overlooking the stop, so we could people watch, while enjoying a good meal and a bottle....or two of wine. I had some rotisserie chicken dish over mashed potatoes and root veggies--I can't remember the exact name to save my life. But holy crap was it good!! I literally ate every bit of it..even the root veggie and I had no idea what the hell type of vegetables I was eating. It was so good, I didn't care. The service was also good. A little slow, but if your sitting out side, people watching and enjoying the water show across the way at the Bellagio, you don't even notice how slow the service is. They have a very nice wine menu with a lot of options. If/when I come back to Vegas, I'll definitely consider coming back to this restaurant, for a "sure-thing" meal!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dNh9O84O4_EidC8tH2o91g.text: Delicious food and drinks and located on the strip in the Paris hotel. I would definitely recommend the chicken and waffles. The chicken had the best flavor and was so juicy. I also ordered the Hexx Benedict, which following the chicken and waffles (which had such rich flavor) was underwhelming.  For drinks, I ordered the bottomless mimosa, which only comes in the orange flavor. If you wanted other types of mimosas then it'll be an extra fee on top of the $24. I ended up drinking 3.5 glasses of mimosas. They're very good at refilling your drink so no need to worry about having to flag the server down. My fiance ordered the bloody Mary with bourbon; he said it was "pretty good."  I would come back again next time I'm in town!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast Croissant

gGNyje0Vds03zhMsIOt-1w.text: Extremely excellent service, they go above and beyond.  I had in error made reservations for the wrong day and I thought off the bat it was going to be a bad experience because the girl made me look for my reservation instead of trusting I made one when there was open seats everywhere but it was a wrong date so once I told her she said "it's ok we'll sit you today. After that everything was amazing. Food and service

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

79Rz8AxeFa5IgVq4gEX8YQ.text: Came here for Christmas brunch. We were walking The Strip to find something light to eat since we had dinner plans later. My mother couldn't remember the name of the restaurant she was a actually looking for in Paris so we settled for Hexx Kitchen & Bar.  Since we had been walking around Paris for my mom to jog her memory, we entered from the casino side. Like other casino restaurants, we were led to the Strip entrance. On the way, I noticed some cozy looking 2-seater indoor cabana-like tables (best way I could describe it!). Just past the hostess table is what appeared to be a fairly large and comfortable waiting area. Luckily, we didn't need to try it out as there was no wait time for us. It was a nice day out, not too chilly - I was comfortable in just a sweater. For that reason, I let the hostess know we wouldn't mind sitting outside.  My mistake. There are plenty of heaters on the patio so I actually got a bit too warm!  Our server was absolutely adorable! I wish I could have taken him home as a souvenir! I wish I could remember his name though... Anyway, he was extremely friendly and attentive. He got our drinks in a timely manner and correct! Side note: their pitchers of beer are fairly small and are the equivalent to about 2.5 beers.  Since we were trying to eat light, my parents shared the Veggie Omelet while I tried out the Surf n Turf Sliders. I didn't try anything on their plate, but it looked delicious. The sliders, however, left something to be desired. The lobster meat was tasty, but the short rib was dry even with plenty of sauce. The French fries were cold and salty. I'm sure they have the potential to be very tasty. I think the best part of my meal was the passion iced tea. Wonderful taste! Reminded me of plantation iced tea from home (Hawaii).  All the servers were very nice and polite. The female hostesses need to take some lessons from the servers. That's all I'll say about that.  I try to visit Vegas about twice a year and usually stay at Bellagio. I don't think I'll be craving Hexx anytime soon...except to maybe see my server again!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie omelet
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Surf n Turf sliders
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. View from patio seating

fc3bjab5P6ny_29urgfGkg.text: Nice establishment. Located inside the Paris Hotel, where parking is also available at a cost. The staff is great and the interior is beautiful. They offer a great range of items from vegetarian friendly and seafood to steak. There are starters, entrees, brunch items, sandwiches, and pizzas. A great selection of items for everyone.  We came for breakfast/brunch. Food came out quick, and our server was fantastic. However, food was pretty average for the price but it was good enough to where everyone left satisfied. The waffles are a must from everything we tried. The frosting is fantastic since my tastebuds are telling me that it's a cream cheese base. It's a place that's great for the photo op.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PTNSI0_8l4pSWpHjq4BuIg.text: Came on a July Wednesday at noon and made a reservation. I don't think it was even needed since there was a decent amount of seating anyway. We asked for the strip view outside patio and were seated right away with no problem! KASEN greeted us and took our drink orders and got that started right away. My girlfriend and I opted for the bottomless mimosas! The mimosas were delicious and strong (but not too strong). OLIVIA was our server and had great service. Our mimosas really never went bottomless! She filled them to the top Even when halfway full! KASEN did the same with our water!   Our chicken and waffles took no more than 10 minutes and it was delicious! Lots of food too!   All in all, overall great experience here with great service and great food! A lot of the credit goes to the KITCHEN, OLIVIA, and KASEN. Thank you HEXX!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

KExMJaxezWZjyhgPv_QjNw.text: Ordered the Hexx burger, it came out in a timely manner, it tasted great.  I was only drinking water, I can see in my view at least 8 employees, including managers, my water glass went empty, I waited quite a while and finally got up and refilled it my self, finally a waiter came over and topped it off again. It's 110 here and a person needs to stay hydrated. The staff were nice but need to be a little more attentive

Px2pxb4p9IYTnLO0PzAf3A.text: had brunch here, it was somewhere between meh and OK. Service was great, we liked our high top seating, but the quality of the food coming out at brunch was so basic.  It was on the level of a Fridays or a Chilis when we really expected much more.  the location is great, so that was a plus as well.

C8eie9cj6VgTOy0rV6WRyw.text: It's in the Paris Hotel, a part of the Caesar's Entertainment chain. Great if you are a Total Rewards member or have the Total Rewards Visa. The food is pretty good. I had the prime rib. They have a patio dining area parallel to the Strip (kind of like Mon Ami Gabi), and a nice modern decor bar area. I didn't find the indoor dining area particularly well decorated or romantic but my prime rib was pretty good :)  Interestingly, Fakespot reveals only a "B" rating for legitimacy of reviews, suggesting some of the reviews may be machinations.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime rib with Brussel sprouts

qnEZO2mgXhilFGDQuXXVRw.text: I love coming here the service is amazing and the food is great!! Vanessa was the best waitress ever she was so attentive and fast she always came to refill our mimosas without us having to ask !! I would recommend her to anyone coming to this place .

ZIWUzFCyJKdPPQOtBYivJA.text: Awesome food had the New York steak was amazing, killer drinks and Jasmine was an amazing server, recommended great entree and new exactly what side dishes to complement the dish, will always come back when I visit Las Vegas!

pm2M-nAKUvz-OQUDXSQmBw.text: Wishing they had Hexx in LA! Such a cute feminine lunch spot in Paris to take the girls or even colleagues. Bright comfortable ambience. Came here around noon and ordered the hash, carrot cake pancakes, and a blue fizzy dry ice humongously sweet alcoholic beverage thing.   Definitely coming back :)

KBwNJ7LOhxI0mikZqccjPg.text: After seeing O we wanted dessert before heading to Fremont Street for a fun night at Don't Tell Mama piano bar. We walked across to Hexx following the scent of the yelp reviews.   The people watching outside is fantastic! But I only give 2 stars because I was expecting a much better dessert experience. The presentation was lovely but the taste was lacking. Too much almond in the tiramisu and it was dry. The fancy s'mores wasn't crunchy and lacked a smooth warm chocolate sauce. Overall I was disappointed. I would try another option if I were you. But enjoy Vegas!!!

bQFjjKf4x1iieY-L5-M3PA.text: Willie and Ryan rock this joint! Most creative and innovated cocktails on the strip! Was most impressed with their knowledgeable of unique cocktails. Would definitely recommend for early or late night drinks.   Pros: service was amazing!! Highly recommend

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

c8FWKBCDVxqfOJOresuzHw.text: We went to Hexx for the first time with our party of two on Friday, November 30th with a 8pm reservation.  We arrived, and they could not find our reservation anywhere in the system; however, luckily it was a pretty slow night.  We were seated outside under the heat lamps (we preferred outside), with a great view of the strip.     We had the following items during our meal: Jumbo Lump Crab Cake - Shared it and it was large and delicious  Braised Short Rib Entree - I had this and the Braised Short Rib was tender and just fell apart, which was awesome; however, it was lacking some flavor and seasoning.  The accompanied mashed potatoes and brussel sprouts were amazing.    New York Steak - Absolutely delicious (I tasted this, as the other person in my party had this).  It was cooked exactly as ordered.  Peanut Butter Cheesecake - Simple yet elegantly delightful.  Delicious!  Overall, our food was great.  Our server was "tolerable".  She wasn't bad in any way; however, she definitely showed off the vibe that she wasn't exactly pleased to be at work that evening.

qX6U_Z7B0g3e24Fj3OeKOA.text: I was really excited to try out this place, but NOW I'm even more excited to never revisit again.  We decided to sit at the bar area because we wanted to eat quickly. Welp, that was a joke because our dining experience was ridiculously long. Firstly, the blonde bartender who "assisted" us was beyond rude. We sat at a table for 15 minutes before she even gave us the time of day. The best part is the bar wasn't even busy. She was extremely unhelpful when elaborating on the menu and barely even came to check on us. Even when I tried to get her attention, she ignored us. Anyways...   We ordered mimosas, two basic salads and and the artichoke dip. It took over an hour just for us to get those items. The salad was a joke. It was costly and not worth it. If you want a salad, just go buy some from the grocery store and prepare it at home because it will probably have more flavor.  The spinach and artichoke dip was okay. I'm saying that it was okay because we were starving...so anything at that point was going to suffice.  The mimosas were eh. They didn't taste like they had any orange juice in them at all.   I feel like this place is overhyped for no reason. It left a bad taste in my mouth, literally. I won't revisit again.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

b3FDpE1h3hvFgzqzzsqYAg.text: On our last day in town, we decided to hit up this place for brunch. They are a short walk from Planet Hollywood and located on the strip just outside of Paris. We didn't get the chance to make reservations, but we had good fortune and they had a table available for our party (which was 11 people!) when we arrived.   I forgot the exact name of it, but we ordered a jug of berry mimosa (~36) for the table and was able to split a cup for everyone. It was a perfect refreshment to go with our brunch meal! After glancing at the menu for a few minutes, I decided to try the Chilaquiles ($17), which includes: chicken, roasted salsa tortilla chips, two eggs, avocado sour cream, asadero. This was a perfect just yum, it was a perfect brunch item that hit the spots with breakfast essentials such as eggs, protein, and some delicious sauce for flavor. The portion size was filling, my appetite left the restaurant quite content with the meal. I also tried some of my friend's Carrot Cake Pancakes, which was surprisingly pretty damn delicious. If I wasn't so full, I would have eaten more! The pancakes were super filling, so you should probably share it with someone or expect to take home leftovers.  HEXX was one of our food highlights this trip. Minus the minor mishap with the bill, everything was excellent. Everyone enjoyed their meal and the service was friendly. The restaurant's ambience was also high-class, very open, and nicely decorated with light colors. The restaurant overlooks the Bellagio fountain as well, so the restaurant is located in a neat spot. HEXX is definitely one of my recommendations for food on the strip, especially if you are around this part of Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brunch menu (June &#39;18)
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mimosas!

1MwJQc3MauryOEXfCuqbqw.text: It was my third time at Hexx. The previous times were on business trips, so it was fun to go with my wife this time, on vacation. We booked through Open Table and got a seat on "the rail" right on Las Vegas Blvd., which is a great people-watching spot. It took a bit to get a waiter, but once established, it was fine. The food, however, was terrific.  We started with the calamari, and apparently weren't paying attention to the menu. It was a wonderfully (and suprisingly) spicy dish with a good amount of sriracha. I had the prime rib. While restaurants seem unable to agree on what "medium rare" and "medium" are, the waiter was spot-on in his description. I ended up ordering medium, and it was exactly correct. The meat was so good, with something a little special about the creamed horseradish. It just seemed better than most, although I couldn't tell you why. My wife had the Hexx chopped salad, and says it is one of the best salads she's had. Ever. I tasted it and agree it was fantastic.

2aWMdP9y--xfNPStqN8jaw.text: This place is amazing for brunch! I suggest making reservations prior to visiting because it is a hot spot in Las Vegas. So happy to have found this spot! My boyfriend and I sat outside to enjoy the view of the strip. We ordered mimosas, breakfast croissant sandwich with Black Forest ham and aged cheddar, and waffles. The portions were a bit small but food was very tasty! The service and food was excellent! Will be coming back again soon!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dJu0Jf3V3N7YjvMTP_M6BQ.text: Soooooo disappointed.   Definitely won't be recommending this spot to anyone else at work. The food is good, but it's hard to enjoy good food when you're missing a menu, searching for a fork, and have no one to order from. Yup, all good... why don't we just sit and enjoy air.  I'd be so embarrassed if my table stood up to get a menu because they were given the wrong one, grab forks because they were never given any, and ask where the server is. 'Twas a nightmare. By this time, the food was cold. We exchanged our pancakes out with the manager and that was pretty much it. No apology. No, "How can we make this right?"   We used to always come here. Don't know when we'll be back. Food shouldn't be stressful - especially when you're paying for it.

4SnAPWg1woe_rGPGVqXTzQ.text: Come early on a beautiful evening and sit by The Bellagio Fountains. This is the one of the best views that you're going to get. Also a great deal on Groupon. The fish selections are always fresh and fantastic. The wine is also delicious and there is a sommelier. Pictured is the branzino which was fantastic.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_efJDB3kcDzvitopQcfokw.text: Sometimes the strip has good finds that also include amazing views and food!   Ambiance: Hexx / Alexxas has a great modern contemporary vibe. There are tables to choose from and also comfy couches to lounge on. In the bar area you can sit in quaint nooks for privacy. The natural lighting from the strip is perfect on a sunny day.  Food: Alexxas has a small bites and tapas menu and the Hexx menu has delicious entree and brunch options depending on the time of day and day of the week. We tried the ceviche, chicken sausage flatbread, and calamari. The calamari was my favorite! It had a light drizzle of buffalo and ranch and was like having buffalo wings but in the form of light and fresh calamari. We decided to try desert with the churro bites - oh man! The caramel dipping sauce has an alcoholic surprise we weren't ready for! The Hexx chocolate dip was Rich and dark and a perfect Compliment.   Drinks: We tried cocktails including the key lime martini and the pinky swear sangria. Everything was fresh and light and crafted perfectly.   Service: our server was prompt and friendly. The churro bites took a very long time but were worth the wait.   Overall: I am excited to come back and enjoy more of what Hexx has to offer! There's tons of items on the menu to come back for and it's great having a local hangout on the strip that's not too far from Home!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Churro bites
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tapas for days
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The intimate bar serves up a mean cocktail!

KBaPSfpvIfdqoeIKfuNEgA.text: Excellent brunch spot! The bottomless mimosas and the sidewalk views of The Strip were fabulous. So was the food!

RkCqCkpyibg-25jkFlp7dw.text: Loved and enjoyed our brunch here. Had the carrot pancakes (very good), eggs Benedict (the best) and meat omelette (good). Also had the peach sangria which was also good too! Would come here for brunch when I visit Vegas again.

xSjHSrQg7OAnDJEki_TXeA.text: Great location! There's indoor seating and outdoor seating with great views of the bellagio fountains. The easiest way to enter is from the outside on the strip.   Food was honestly pretty average compared to the price but if you're looking for a place with great vibes, service, and location I recommend hitting this spot.

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Benedict and chicken and waffles.

4WpuJBQb7a9ihgS6MHYtNg.text: We went with a group of 7 for a bachelorette party. The brunch we had was delicious. Our servers name was tracee and our the lovely person who was refilling our bottomless mimosas was named Edgar. Tracee really pumped out group up and we all had a great time. I was really impressed with the experience we had. Hard to find a good environment that also has great food. I'll for sure be back.

caPdrlImbo2DVC8s-OvQ-g.text: We came here for brunch to celebrate my daughter's birthday. The food was very good and the service was excellent. We were disappointed we didn't get to sit on the patio, but we were a party of 7 & the place was packed. They have a really nice menu and everyone loved their meals and bottomless mimosas.

NlGaqqlSDfcH0PYavEHcPA.text: This place was disappointing and a disgrace to be honest.  Location is great for watching the water/light show across the street but they made us wait 10 minutes to be seated despite that the place was not at all busy with plenty of tables unoccupied.  And the waiter is pushy despite the entrees being 2x what anyone would call fair.  We had short rib and prime rib and a drink each and check was $150.  The food taste was inferior to anything else we ate--including the amer express airport lounge at mccarran airport.  Too many great restaurants In town to waste on this.  You live u learn!

Jo1gOLD2NJEZ-4tXmM7Uew.text: Huge disappointment....we waited even with a reservation and were looking forward to the food and atmosphere but unfortunately this place is over-hyped. It's mainly to just sit somewhere nice outside and people watch. There staffing is not good as our appetizers came in after waiting 30 mins. Entrees another 45 mins or so. Staff was nice but I would not come back on the food alone as this is why I had decided to dine. For those touring the city, don't feel like you have to stop here or missing out if you can't. Plenty of other good places as the food scene in Las Vegas is huge.   Baked Spinach Dip - Luke warm, tasted like it was store bought, and you could tell as the cheese got hard and dry very quick. I could harshly taste any spinach.   Chicken & Waffles - lacked flavor and seasoning. The chicken was really moist but just a little bland for what the dish is. Basic southern chicken and waffles is full of flavor in any recipe. I had to add tons of salt and pepper, which I wasn't used to doing. Maybe I got a bad batch?   House Fries - also lacked seasoning and not sure how as they had Parmesan cheese, spices, and looked delicious in pictures.   Protein Omelette - didn't even finish this as also lacked flavor.

ZPQEZn_J9gIL2U5aY6GWDw.text: The atmosphere of the restaurant is very cool. Right next to the Paris hotel (it's connected) and the patio was great to people watch. We had French toast (nothing special) and the eggs Benedict. The EB was placed on a bed of au gratin potatoes which was so so and the sauce was a bit bland. We rated it overall a 3 as the coffee was good and most would say the French toast was better than I am rating it cause I have had some amazing FT over the years. :)

4bYJYftXa5VWgWWREN3pMg.text: When in Vegas, you just don't get up early enough for breakfast but this particular day I was craving breakfast. I came upon this place through yelp and it's opened 24/7! They had breakfast menu at noon! Score! I had the veggie omelet and it was descent. Nothing really exciting but the potatoes were good! I also got the carrot cake pancake to share with the table. It was a little dry but still good. So if you're up for breakfast food late in the afternoon then you can always be sure to find it here. Thank you for serving breakfast for this late sleeper!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Vz-ghoIsbKDSlPS44IIZVw.text: Hexx is always a Great place to eat! The service is Good and the view is Amazing! We always like to try new things and our dinner did not disappoint!! It was Orgasmic.... we definitely recommend trying this place!!!  Laurren and Pam

gM8TARhFqnoXgwcEalOU7A.text: By far the best breakfast place ive ever been to in my whole entire life I was able to try about 6 different dishes from them and they were so good this will be the go to on a regular basis and I live in Maryland. That says alot.

nZPmY7yQkL2hmfNfwnbmhA.text: Sugarfactory is closed and this place is the new sugar factory. The candy store and everything else looks exactly the same except some changes to the menu.   The drinks which were previously made of candy are now made of fruit, which is always a great thing. They still smoke and make both kids and adults smile and snap.   Im in b/w a 3-3.5 for this place and kind of wish yelp had a half point system so i can increase my rating by half a point.  We came here for dinner and lunch. Dinner was definetly a better experience than lunch. The dinner and lunch menu are similar except some slight differences.   For dinner, we got the spinach and artichoke dip as appetizer and shared the shrimp scampi for entree. The dip was quite tasty and came with chips and pita chips. The dip tasted much better with chips to we stuck to them but if you are extra hungry, the appetizer is quite filling.  The shrimp scampi was delish and we cleaned the plate away.  For lunch, me and a friend ordered the chicken and waffles (hugee dish btw) and another friend ordered the cheeseburger. Both entrees were ok. The chicken was definetly the star of our dish and was a huge portion. Easily shareable between two people and a third could also take some bites. Only thing i didnt like was that i dont tend to like a huge portion of fried chicken just being dumped on my waffle - thus making it soggy. I also like plain maple syrup and theirs had a strong cinnamony kick to it so if you are like me, order the plain one.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Really big portion for one person

bEQQhTwA2ra4jsGvOcSmCg.text: Hexx is open 24 hours! My group used a groupon  Tasty menu offerings,  definitely pricey.  The  $50 Groupon will have you reaching in your pocket for more  money. Waitstaff were like zombies,  almost every request had to be made twice.  Request a patio seat and reservations are a must! If you enter from inside the Paris Hotel,  it's confusing where the hostess stand is located a sign or two hostesses are necessary

VhifcDep9q_8Qkbo9ITo5Q.text: Ok so the bottomless mimosas were cute a little weak but cute and the French toast was pretty good but let's get into why this place gets a 5 Star......  It was my friends bday and our waitress Tracee was the isssssshhhhhhhhh. I think she was the best server I have ever experienced! YES! EVER!!! She danced with us, kept the mimosas with the help of Ginger and Bobby who was super cool too.   We need more servers like Tracee in every restaurant thank you for making my friends bday brunch forever memorable. They played great hip-hop music too!

XoNeP9XQaguLCpXVls6-FA.text: Food was okay. Over priced but it's on the strip so i get it.   Docking a star for the rude front desk women.   I set a reservation on open table via yelp.   Went to find out they cancelled the reservation. Um, why? Idk. I set the reservation at 11:30 AM when I was in the hotel at around 9:30 AM.   Upon arrive to the restaurant, the women were saying that after 15 minutes from making the reservation, they cancel it.   I don't get it and asked them to explain to me twice. Still didn't make any sense to me.   I got the chicken and waffle.  Was pretty good. Server was not attentive. Had to flag down for coffee/water refill.   Oh, and they add a cnf fee to the receipt. Which I am docking another star for.   I googled it and read an article saying to think of it as a 'resort fee' but you don't get anything for it.   So they add a charge for just eating their over priced food.   Oooookkkaaaay.  Good to know but won't be back.

9OXQgpNmle2HGac1B4k6-w.text: The food was AMAZING! Our server Kevin and Justin were great! The drinks, food, and dessert tasted great. Will definitely return!

okk0XdA-yueR7uBU5vDu4Q.text: Chicken and waffles are to die for. Had the French toast with blue berries and bananas, this place is to be remembered and on my breakfast/brunch list every time I come to Vegas. 5 stars. Plus the servers cater you rite away. Jesus and tolu are wesome with really good service.

nuUtQVUu-qQQDCixYD2VMw.text: Love this place! It's center strip, great atmosphere and interior decor and the prices aren't insane.

oS8Zby4Kb_rdiuaeTe-zjA.text: Love the ambience, nice breeze coming in from open windows throughout the restaurant. I ordered chicken n waffles which chicken was perfectly cooked crispy outside and juicy meat inside. Mmm Nyam Nyam. One of us got unlimited mimosa n was buzzing by the time we walk out the door. Ask waiter for any kind of Vegas inside info. If you're lucky, you'll get the same waiter like we did

VAEJBjQcCOOIVJrN8l7jMA.text: This place was amazing! I really enjoyed the twist on the Eggs Benedict with using potatoes instead of bread. Expect to spend at least 100! For 2 we spent 130 and we shared the crab cake appetizer... which really wasn't worth it portion size but was still delicious and full of crab meat!   My boyfriend enjoyed the waffle and chicken! Great portion and flavors. We also dod the bottomless mimosas. In all a great experience and the place was super busy but the staff was all very attentive, and friendly. I would definitely, try this place again.

7iHv75WcZYz8OS2Q0Qmh2g.text: Check out their happy hour and go see Master Bartender Eric Smith! That man makes the experience so great and makes customized unique drinks! We'll definitely be back!

DPKwZRkc8Z7rxSmUmem3Og.text: Another one of my faves to hit while I'm in Vegas. Our late nite munchies spot. The perfect finger food or if u want a full dinner steak they'll have it. Please don't ever get rid of the fried chix bao or ceviche. My husband and I love to people watch on there outside patio... it's right across from the Bellagios fountains. We still need to make it for there brunch. I'm sure it's amazing

QVc4hZd1nksZngUa55N1LQ.text: We sat outside at a great table for two. We enjoyed the fountain show at the Bellagio and people watching while eating brunch.  Food was very good. Service was good as well. The only reason why a 4 star not a 5 star is portion size...very small. The BF had to order another hash brown and eggs because he was still hungry.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious but tiny portion

YuDLdYcwXhUyWrvnYy2U4w.text: Food and atmosphere were both good! Great place to sit on the patio and people watch.

_X2nJVwuvu4iVmRdWJk-sA.text: Wow!! What an experience... This restaurant really has no competition!! I thoroughly enjoyed my dining experience with my honey. A very reasonably priced menu with a variety of tasty food options, great ambiance and energy; all while being catered to by an attentive busser Isaiah. This young man was so very conscientious and meticulous in his role. Honestly, he set the tone from the moment we sat down. His energy was incredibly positive and polite. He represented his company very well! The  food... Un-be-lievable!!! The presentation was that of a Top Chef episode. Lastly, there's no question I'm choosing to dine in here whenever I'm in Las Vegas again. We had 2 strikes against us going into tonight's meal, but we hit a grand slam!! Thank you soooo much Hexx Kitchen Bar & Isaiah!! We shall meet again real soon.   - Eric

pHp3kydLyzM2nZ9bGyIC2Q.text: Rachel and Tai were amazing. Our mimosas were never even half full they r on it!!! Love the food

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hPt4Ko6mEbPpYaIsVwTEjg.text: Great food and atmosphere! I had the meat omelette, which had a amazing taste. The potato's had so much flavor. Try the crab cakes for a special treat. The service was phenomenal!

wf9TlUvDTh3Fy9FByOR4Qg.text: Outstanding service! Food is expensive and that's the only reason for 4 stars not 5. Great location on the strip, view of Bellagio. Bottomless mimosa/sparkling... we never saw the bottom! Fresh grapefruit made a nice mixer. Chicken & waffles delicious. Servers were superb, checked on us so much. We will definitely be back and we will recommend.

tE0Do8VHycZot_Uz_xfpCA.text: Came here again very late on a Friday night. We were ready to try one of their beautiful potion drinks, and snack a little!  We got a margarita pizza to share and the Voodoo potion drink. It reminded me of a Tokyo Tea with a little more midori than usual. It was good! And such amazing presentation! Huge apple in the middle, haha. Hopefully they let me post my video!  It was also super strong, haha. Perfect! Our server was very nice and kept encouraging us to have more drinks, lol.  On the downside, it was really slow to get anything we ordered here. Kind of annoying, but it happens.  BTW the potion drinks average $38 or so! So be prepared to pay for the novelty! I was.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita pizza

PEBz8AunvOaIirZVVLZdzg.text: I give HEXX 5-Stars because of TRACEE!  Tracee is simply amazing. As an avid bruncher, I am confident in saying that she provided one of the best brunch experiences I've ever had. She was fun, charismatic, and would be the reason I would want to visit HEXX over and over again.  I also want to sprinkle a little shine on Bobby and Ginger Lisa too!  Overall, my friends and I had a splendid time at HEXX.   And shout out to the Cinnaroll Waffle.

qn1r6KtHotR4aA9TNqNo2g.text: Our server Rafael was very nice, attentive and accommodating.    My daughter had the veggie omelette and and I had the eggs Benedict and we both had bottomless Mimosa's.  He never let our drinks get below half and was very kind.  The food was good.  We sat on the patio so the view was pretty and relaxing.  The music was just right.  Will definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

XSqKALWcM_W5Pa-sr3rMyg.text: YUM! Very good breakfast. I had an egg white omelette with potatoes. It gets very busy in the mornings so I would highly recommend making a reservation! I was dining alone so I just went to the bar and found a seat right away. The bartenders were great - cocktails were delicious and service was great even at the bar. I would highly recommend this place!

ew2idGQxLeyvlcJkQCjP6g.text: HEXX is conveniently located in the Paris hotel with additional access to the strip.   Went in for brunch and was not impressed by the food. I got the HEXX Benedict, without bacon, and I would not recommend it for those looking for a traditional Benedict fan. Instead of poached eggs on top of an English muffin, they are served over scalloped potatoes; making the overall texture of the dish soft. I ordered an extra side of toast to add some crunch to the texture and was happy I did. The rest of my party was content with their food, but not impressed with their dishes.   Aside from the average food, the attentiveness if the servers is great. Also, it was my friend's birthday and they brought out complimentary cake pops which was very thoughtful of them.   Overall, wouldn't return for brunch, but would give the restaurant another chance for dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

UQzzIV2UWVi4GpPomfmi2w.text: The service was just really bad, felt unwanted, rushed, discriminated. That's unfortunate because I've been here in big groups before so hopefully it was just the server. However, you can't enjoy your meal when your server purposely makes you feel like trash. Incident was 12/30/18 around 4:30pm party of 10.

GacTryjFwldIp9rYaB3Qmg.text: Hexx located In the Paris .. Overpriced , little portions that couldn't fill up my pinky toe , service is slow as molasses and they expect to be well tipped regardless , this restaurant would make a better fit inside Circus Circus!  when you come to Vegas keep walking by these clowns

SAYNoIIG7tJ_xt7RywglTg.text: My corporate office was in town from New Jersey and staying at Paris. One of the girls was dying to try this place because of the confections and sweets. From the outside it doesn't look like much. There's was a real nice girl holding up a menu but she didn't really know that much about the menu items.   They tried to give us an amazing table on the patio but we wanted to sit inside so they found us a table. Our server was Lisa and she was awesome from start to finish. She was very knowledgeable about the menu and gave us a lot of great suggestions. I ordered the beef short rib with horseradish mashed potatoes and Brussel sprouts. It was amazing. The meat was very tender and melt in your mouth. Horseradish mash - delicious and the BR were flavorful and crunchy. We ordered the broccolini and it was definitely a hit at the table. My boss ordered the salmon. It came out over the top of a red clam chowder soup with actual clams. He said it was very good.   For drinks I ordered a bubbles champagne drink to start and a glass of Malbec with dinner and I would recommend both. Great restaurant, excellent service - can't wait to come back.  After our desserts they also brought out little chocolates with fortunes. Very cute!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Luck Fortune
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salmon served over red clam chowder soup
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Beef Short Rib with Horseradish mashed potato and Brussel Sprouts

nh0dvxJxghCrLvUIUbDnww.text: Tai and quinn were the most amazing service hosts we could ever ask for. They were both extremely personable and they were more than welcoming from the moment they greeted us. We will 100% come back, not only for the incredible food but just for their service!!!

Fy5YU0p4BWgwBuRWoX_ddA.text: Tai and Quinn! Woohoo! Thanks for the friendly and welcoming experience at Hexx. A lot of silly jokes, and amazing smiles from everyone at the table and our servers

oIgY2671khEBQcBLUgjRIA.text: We came in for brunch with 6 people and the service was amazing right away. I work in the restaurant industry as well, so i know how difficult it can be to sit a 6-top especially on a busy day. Our server, Quinn, was so nice and funny and I highly recommend her! Tai was also amazing! He was constantly refilling our bottomless mimosas with a smile on his face! They were both so nice and the next time we're in Vegas we will definitely be asking for them! Thanks guys for the amazing service and thank you for making my birthday feel special!!

lu2hfikAJHH4lxCY-dlxRg.text: Highly recommended!! Patio seating in December, heated and felt great. Food was fantastic and service was even better. We got bottomless mimosas and I never saw the bottom of my glass. Apollo and Patrick were amaxing. All around great service. Very friendly and accommodating!

lRUQ_JYCtq_wNDLkTDX0Vg.text: Cherry at the bar was amazing. Made it in for happy hour and the portion size of the food was larger than I expected. Best part the food was amazing!!!

8fhkHBbhbeVL0I72au_X9A.text: Las Vegas does food very well, also it is expensive! One tip that we have is that we eat a huge breakfast.  Hexx  didn't disappoint. We got an Eggs Bennedict and a breakfast pizza. The breakfast pizza was great! Far better than lousy midwestern version made to taste like something you get at a gas station. Nice crust, cheese sauce and I believe that they pour on liquid scrambled eggs then bake added with Sausage and more cheese. Bomb! The Eggs Benedict was wierd.... not wierd bad but wierd good! No English muffin, on a bed of scalloped potatoes (I know)  came out delicious! Really rich! My wife and I switched plates half way through! Still brought back to the room half of the pizza! Friendly honest wait staff!

zcl5jenTCD_r__jobR-w1w.text: I went to this place for my birthday dinner! My boyfriend and I sat outdoors and our server was very nice. It is a very romantic ambiance. We ordered a spinach artichoke dip (5/5) best I've ever had, but we had to ask pita bread along with it, because the toasted bagel bites were hard and stale (1/5). Broccolini was pretty good and we loved the flavor (4/5). White bean hummus dip (5/5) so goooood! I also ordered lobster tail (3/5), but was disappointed in the small size and it wasn't the best I've had. I've had better at Red Lobster. They brought out a carefully decorated birthday cake for me with flowers on it! It looked much better than it tasted. But it was free! Prices were expensive, but well worth it.  Overall, I would recommend this place and would come back again next time!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Birthday cake with real flowers!

ndh6SR7aS1luaTyvOTwLgw.text: Beyond amazing food, views and service. Bottomless mimosas were constantly filled. Our server was so helpful on things to do off the strip.

to4sglqjN9HCWZ7O_CUC8w.text: Went in today for brunch at 8:30 AM, and unfortunately did not have the greatest service. It wasn't busy at all when we arrived. I was with my entire family and we were served by Tracee(?). I am usually pretty understanding because I use to work in restaurants and it's tough when the kitchen gets slammed with orders all at once. However, my dad asked for ketchup, and she never brought it. Understandable, because there maybe was a lot going on. But, I asked for a to-go box twice. It took us about 30 minutes just for us to get the check, pay, receive the to-go box, and leave. And it wasn't busy at all. I was just disappointed based on all the great reviews from this place. It seemed like every body else was getting great service, as they were enjoying their bottomless mimosas. I'm not sure if it's because we didn't order drinks that we weren't as well taken care of, but I was extremely disappointed. We never were rude about anything, and I just hope that this isn't how service usually is for families that aren't buying drinks. Idk what the case was, but I just didn't feel as if my family was as respected as guests as other people. Just because we aren't ones to complain doesn't mean we are okay with the lack of urgency with service. I don't plan on ever coming back, not that it's a big deal to their restaurant. But just be cautious if you notice you aren't being as well taken care of. I should've said something and put my foot down because I was extremely disappointed with our server even if I really tried giving her the benefit of the doubt.

yckZ48ixw3E4ZduL0qpeQw.text: Tracey was our waitress for brunch and it was fantastic.  From the bottomless mimosas (which is brilliant) to the food, it was wonderful. We had the cheesy garlic bread, Hexx Benedict and Steak and Eggs. It was by far our best breakfast here in Vegas. The doors were open to the outside, giving a great view of the strip the food was AMAZING and Tracey took exceptional care of us. We will definitely be back.

WuKuDhz1M68lFE2CiIK0WQ.text: We stopped in around 2:30 pm for Sangrias. Pitchers were on special so we ordered one and an appetizer of Spinach Dip. All was delicious! We sat at the bar and Jeff took great care of us. He was kind, quick and full of useful information. The dinner menu looked great!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MPSQX6z_LG1jPgwdzG0lYA.text: Went here today the have breakfast and the food was amazing! If your a carrot cake lover, you'll love their carrot cake pancakes! My husband and I can't wait to go back to try some other dishes.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

O9eK8WdEVViHfFXw5Uv6gQ.text: Short story: great food, but miserable service.  My rating is expressly based off of the terrible service. It was awful! I was able to finish half my meal and my boyfriend couldn't even eat because he had no knife for his chicken and waffles. I had to get up and ask the bartender for a knife. Our table wasn't checked up on until I was completely done with my meal. Long waits, terrible service, but great food and cocktails.

mzcKBgw8HOK6qBB_Ntohcg.text: Let me first say that back in the day The Sugar Factory was my favorite restaurant of all time, and this is a pleasant substitute.   The vibe is casual, and the wait staff was extremely friendly and accommodating. The weird thing we noticed was we had a wait to be seated, and upon being seated we walked through a whole empty dining area. I dunno, but it worked out because we sat on the patio and the weather was beautiful.   We ordered the garlic bread appetizer and I got The Hexx specialty drink. I'm a bit weeny when it comes to alcohol and asked if the bartender could make it so I wouldn't really taste the alcohol. They accommodated me very nicely and The Hexx tasted amazing. They offer many different drinks and wines, and like The Sugar Factory they had "Potions", which takes place of the Goblets.   I ordered the chicken and it was delicious, the eggplant was also cooked perfectly and tasted sweet. I did order the French fries, and this is where they lost a star for me. We paid $10 for a basket of fries and they were stale and cold. I only ate about 5 of them, that was a disappointment but the other items we ordered were perfect. I'll let this slide, and who knows what the circumstance was.   I definitely recommend this place, it is quite expensive but we had a pretty view and had a great dining experience.

68GjJLPJ7I0rb1wMdln4lg.text: With all of the options in Las Vegas to have a meal we rarely ever do 're-runs'...HEXX is an exception to the rule.  Love, love , LOVE their breakfast menu...and with the bottomless Mimosas one cannot go wrong. Their prime rib steak and eggs breakfast is to die for as well as their corned beef hash with sweet potato and eggs..ask for the hollandaise sauce on the side...it's that good where the sauce would take away from this dish.   If breakfast is that good, Dinner must be outstanding...we'll have to try it the next time we are in Sin City.

CmXzptdE6VTuAe_HbUpf1A.text: This was an unexpected surprise. The vegetarian food here was pretty good! They had broccolini which had a sweet glaze on its tips, and it had a very unique and fresh taste for a vegetable. The cheese fries and hummus were also really delicious. The veggie pizza was unexpectedly really good. Generally, a lot of places offer a bland version of veggie pizza, but this place definitely rocked the veggie pizza. It was even good the next day I took it back home to Houston. If you sit outside, you can catch a good view of the Bellagio waterfalls.

i71c0sy4JSJ3fiZw6iu6-w.text: Went to HEXX for breakfast on a Tuesday morning with my boyfriend. The wait was only about 10 minutes long for a seat inside, which we preferred anyway. The staff was welcoming and very nice!   My boyfriend and I ordered coffee, which was only $2.75 each with free refills. The service for drinks was quick and they frequently came around with the coffee pot refilling our drinks.   I ordered the eggs benedict. It was absolutely DELICIOUS. I definitely recommend ordering the eggs benedict. PLUS its served over scallop potatoes. It was also filling! My boyfriend ordered the steak and eggs. The portion was nicely sized for the price. It came with steak, home fries, two eggs, and a piece of toast. We really enjoyed everything

Ah8-KdsNMFtxyvrTXbc-Zg.text: I came to Vegas for my 21st birthday with a few friends of mine and right when we landed we came to Hexx for food. We ended up coming back the next day for him and the bottomless mimosas but he was too busy in his section :(  The food was incredible and the service even better. TqUSe5gCqc2m-hlYWXVx6w.text: I am ABSOLUTELY disgusted. My arm looks like this because of the security guards at Paris hotel. Me and my two best friends went to Hexx for bottomless mimosas. Yes we drank as much as we could and had fun. Yep we got drunk. BUT I swear to GOD we did not get crazy. We asked for a shot after bottomless mimosas were over they told us no. All we did was ask "why?" What did we do? We asked why are we being cut off we're not doing anything crazy and they wouldn't give us reasoning. So we got upset and we're like ???? What did we do to upset everyone? We paid, we tipped VERY well, we weren't being crazy or wild or eccentric. So the cops took Us into holding. I begged to have my handcuffs loosened because it hurt so bad. I tried to tell my friends don't yell at the security guard she's just doing her job, she completely ignored us. So I'm fucking livid. I'm pissed. This is the ABSOLUTE worst restaurant I have ever been to. I called the hotel, called the restaurant -- everyone hangs up. Call police, anyone at all, all hanging up on us. Asking "how do we get her out" no answer. We weren't driving, took an Uber but STILL arrested AFTER paying 130+$ for everything. Held in the holding cell, BEGGED and CRIED to use the bathroom but "could not" until paper work was done. Almost peed my pants for what????????? Because we wanted one more shot?????? Because what???? Who gave them the right????? Yes, we drank. Yes, we got a bit drink and so what??? Opportunity to send us to jail???? We did NOTHING. Swear, we went to the bathroom, remained calm and when we FINISHED paying we were attacked???? We even treated the whole staff amazing, complimented them I just can't believe it. Held our phones, our purses, our belongings. Locked us in the room with seat belts once they found out we were recording. Please don't go here. This place is disgusting.

7zvTVk4OY867pvInCJPSlg.text: Tracee and Victor were amazing. Everything i needed they were so on top of it. We were a party of 3 and we got eggs Benedict, corn beef hash, and meat lovers omelet. Every dish was delicious. She checked on us periodically and was very nice. They are great assets to the restaurant. We will be back next time we are in town.

E0WySzyq9qNQZJJNMuY0UA.text: Day 1. Loving the vibe and ambiance of Alexxa's bar. Get seated and watch 3-5 servers swarm busily around everyone but us for 20 minutes. Water re-fill guy takes our order finally and relays info to non-existant server. Three people get drunk on delicious punch bowls. Pros: baked cheese and heirloom tomato salad.  Day 2. Dinner service at Hexx. Immediately off-put by server unsure about getting us prior delicious punch bowl. It arrives. She hates us. We watch everyone around us get food and dranks. No food for us. 20-30 minutes go by. Appetizers come out with some food. Uhhhkay. Boyfriend still without entree. Friend gets food, throws up 3 times in bathroom, comes back. Still no entree for Bae. Other table gets punch bowl. Bae gets salad he hates and never ordered in lieu of entree. Manager insures us that salmon is coming. Server doesn't want to show her face. Salmon comes and we still pay full price for everything except unwanted salad. Takeaways: water re-fill guys are the real heros. Service is abysmal. Food is flavorful. Drinks are above par.

uO0UOavPq0LiwhdL6FY8ig.text: My niece recommended Hexx to have breakfast. Loved this place and JJ was a great waiter, very attentive and pleasant. The Chilaquiles were fabulous I would definitely come back and have them again.

T5Bb_CJo35Mcv_jGmWxjsA.text: Start off service is whatever. Our waitress didn't seem to care or she just doesn't like her job. Either or whatever. We had to ask for lemon for our waters 3 times. We finally placed our orders and I was so excited to try to carrot cake pancake which was the ONLY reason why I came here. And I had to order it without walnut since I'm highly allergic. After we placed our order our waitress let us sit for about 10 mins before coming to tell us that they can not omit walnuts. She didn't seem to care. She was more like so yea we can't do that so sucks to be you. What you want to order then?   Ok first off. It's 2018 A LOT of people are allergic to peanuts and walnuts what restaurant makes their batter PRE MIXED with nuts? Now I am sitting here with nothing because the ONLY reason I came here was for the "so call amazing service" and these amazing carrot cake pancakes. Sucks for a majority of American who suffer from a nut allergy cause this restaurant ain't for you. Don't bother coming by cause the servers don't care and won't even try to see if they can make a batch with no nuts. Or head chef you need to think about peoples allergic needs........  UPDATE. So apparently the servers here like to peep at your phone. And she saw me leaving the review and got the manager. Which he saved the day. And he was more then happy to get the pancakes made without walnuts. And I must say the pancakes were AMAZING. I am SO GLAD. They are so delicious and the cream cheese frosting was so light and fluffy. DEFINITELY A MUST TRY  And I'm sorry but I feel bad for all those people who don't use yelp. I hate that in order for a restaurant to understand that people have allergies that you have to do a review on Yelp. That's not the purpose of Yelp. It should never be a means of "blackmailing" the restaurant in order for them to provide great customer service. It should be given. Overall after a very rocky start. And the beginning of a 1 star review it sky rocketed to a full 5 star review. I hope this comes as a lesson to the restaurant that customer service should be given. And I hope you can give any other customer even without the power of Yelp to be accommodating.

fLyF0z80UL4r3A3xsxNN5Q.text: This place always gets me because the location is so good - a prime location for people watching and the Bellagio fountains. However, since this is my second experience I feel obligated to write an honest review. The food is average at best (today had the hex burger and prime rib dip) and the service leaves much to be desired, especially our server Tracee who served us both times we visited (we almost moved the second time but decided not too make a big deal). She took our order and then we never saw her again until we hunted her down to ask for the check which took forever. I'd like to mention that we are during off peak hours.

i0a5DidXXGWmLV0-RlRn5A.text: We had read other positive reviews of this restaurant so we were ready to enjoy the varied and innovative menu. We arrived to find a small line and were quickly seated. The Carrot Cake pancakes were moist and flavorful with a nice texture. The coffee was very good and the friendly, capable server kept it topped off for the entire meal. My wife and children all raved about their meals. The price was reasonable for the Vegas Strip and if I were to return to Vegas in the summer I would make it a point to visit this clean , friendly well presented establishment.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

twky8TQ4MUFlf9KCLOkV4w.text: Okay, there are so many choices for food in Vegas, so I asked Yelp for help, as usual, and it gave me Hexx. I made a reservation 45 minutes ahead for 3pm, mostly because unlike most places, they serve brunch until 4pm. It was fairly busy, but the atmosphere has quite a bit of class, which I really appreciated after being so disappointed by Tony Roma's the night before. The choice of indoor or outdoor seating was nice, but if you can't do heat, know that it's all open air, so there is no A/C to save you if it is too warm out for you. They servers were all well-dressed, and always moving. My server was friendly, attentive and thoughtful. I also had a really good view of the fountain at the Bellagio as it danced to the music a few times - a nice perk of sitting here. And now, the food! Two words: Hexx Benedict - the best Benedict I have ever had. Au gratin potatoes replace what would classically be the position for an English muffin, topped with Canadian bacon, perfectly poached eggs, and just enough hollandaise to cover the two eggs - fantastic! My raspberry mimosa was very good, though I wonder what I would have done if I showed up early enough for their bottomless mimosa, Haha! Anyway, I still had room for dessert, and the waiter recommended Hexx's version of a s'more - torched marshmallows on a homemade Graham cracker, atop a vanilla ice cream square which sits on a chocolate-covered Graham cracker...what? Yes, amazing, and with perfect portions, they nailed what I was looking for - all the flavor, decadence and satisfaction, with none of the bloat. I recommend a visit here for brunch if you find yourself in Vegas.

gJK3jBMVGFPZUg9dHOBbGQ.text: Had a great experience. It was my parents first time in Vegas and Hexx food was good. My mom enjoyed the mimosa and Sean kept her glass full!! Sean was an excellent server and very attentive. Will certainly come back & ask for him..

J0yfLA6Y6GrRaTZUda7Luw.text: Amazing restaurant! Our waitress Tracy was the best! I had the hash and Tracy made sure my poached eggs were extra hard, 10 years of trying to get this in a restaurant and this was the first time it ever came out correct. Will definitely return to HEXX the next time we are in Vegas and will be telling all my friends about it.

SIe0CYGRSE1gl5N0aqcP-w.text: JJ was the most attentive server. On point with refilling our bottomless mimosas. Friendly. Fast. Thank you!

DDxvlJ5FDR-MezxTA3poQA.text: Bought a groupon and used it for a late dinner. The best thing about this place is the location. If u get seated in the patio you'll have a fantastic front seat view of the Bellagio water show. We ordered white bean hummus ($10), chopped salad ($13), carbonara ($26) and Pepsi ($4.95). Not really price friendly but you're basically paying for the location and people-watching. The hummus and salad were both so-so and carbonara was equally blah. Service was great surprisingly - it had a lot to do with it being 11pm and the servers were bored and not having to serve multiple tables. I'm glad I used a Groupon otherwise I'd really cry for the overpriced items on the menu... I mean, skip it.

CydNQQku8OKJfwbgplpBUA.text: Great food, and excellent service + great view of the strip if you chose to sit outside. Will be returning when I'm back in town.

eS_d7w4OQZVfAIBMCe9nJw.text: Tracy is the best server, she is so friendly, fun and social. Best server I have had in awhile! Food was amazing too. Make sure you get the twisted bun, I suggest as an appetizer to share. I got an omelet and it was delicious. Highly recommend d this place.

xZ8rUiGLUh2F2lni7L1DiQ.text: Stopped in for a light lunch yesterday. Menu is fairly simple but has plenty of choices to please a group with a variety of tastes/dietary requirements.   We started with bloody mary's - one was "bacon infused" and the other was spicy. Both of them were tasty but seemingly light on the alcohol (which was fine...we weren't looking to get loaded). They have several special bloody mary choices - one of which looks like a meal (and it's $38...)!  We ordered one of the appetizers: candied bacon - which was just OK. Tasted like bacon; was expecting maybe a bit more sweet based on the description (maple glazed and cacao nibs). Also, a piece of wax paper got cooked up and delivered with the bacon...so that was a little weird. Kitchen dropped the ball on that one.  I had shrimp cocktail for my lunch and it was 6 pieces of very nice, jumbo shrimp. My companion had a burger and enjoyed it.   Service was very good - efficient and friendly.  After reading some of the reviews, it seems that this might be a better choice for a decadent breakfast/brunch.

Be aware, it's there, and it's a significant tax. Unfortunate and deceptive business practice.

kMTqskaPEIQZmZL-MwXz0g.text: Come here. Food good. Tracee is 15/10 best waitress I've ever had in my whole life. Coming back every day!!!

pd2s0rwvvwU9UjH_7aODuA.text: Wow! First morning in Vegas and we pick Hexx. Natalie was fabulous. She steered us toward bottomless mimosa, chicken and waffles and cinnamon swirl waffle with fruit. Very pleasant watching the parade of people while eating good food. The chicken and waffles were very moist and the added pickles were perfect. They were thin shaved and perfect for the dish.

vH1A0uwAGuXWE_C_cI_SUQ.text: DON'T BELIEVE THE HYPE. Not related to any of the other reviewers here... didn't come with them and I don't know them lol but the experience was the same so that should tell you something...  Came here on Saturday at 11am for brunch. Portions are small, prices are high, wait is long (30-40 minutes, even with a pointless reservation), service is mediocre, food is absolutely nothing special.   I had the chilaquiles, which was a mistake. Egg was fried hard (like, what?), no chicken, and the red sauce tasted more like pasta sauce.   My husband had the eggs Benedict. It was ONE egg on ONE half of an English muffin, basically a half portion. For almost $30. It tasted ok.   However, it was nice sitting on the patio in the beautiful weather watching people walk the strip and the Bellagio fountains do their thing...None of which is by this restaurant's own doing.  If you're trying to actually eat a tasty meal, don't come here. The prices are laughable for the food, wait, and service. If you wanna pay at least $100 for a cool place to sit, by all means...enjoy!

yRKFk6ybt2y3byM1_zaEIw.text: I'm very on the fence about this place and have to give it a 3.5/5 for now. The view is amazing and the service was good. But we tried two dishes and while one was awesome, the other was not.   Loaded Fries - Start with great Fries (nice crunch on the outside, flavorful and soft on the inside) and topped with cheese curds, gravy and "BBQ pork". While the pork was tender and had been pulled, there was nothing BBQ about it - no sauce, seasoning or smoke that I could taste. But that's ok, because the gravy was nicely done. Also, the cheese curds had completely melted and turned into gooey goodness! All in all, we loved this dish!  Blondie Sundae - This was the major fail for me. To start with, as far as I know, a Blondie is meant to have the same thick and chewy texture that a brownie has. This did not. This tasted spongy and fake as if it came from one of those awful just add water box mixes. Second, the menu said that it would be topped with Oreo ice cream. But what arrived was boring vanilla. When I asked about it, the waiter seemed to not know and guessed they must have run out. Fail!   At this point I am willing to give this place another shot. But I would probably stick to the appetizers and avoid the desserts.

US6YBL98iRoin4E32XVsmw.text: Made a 9pm reservation for party 7 on December 24th for my birthday with my family . We check in and are walked to our table , (outside seating is first come first serve ) . I told the lady we would like to wait for another table since this table was around a corner and didn't really have a view. Then some guy  I think he was a manger and a short female with black hair came out yelling at us for being late , we were not late !!!! I told him our reservation was at 9 it was 9:05 at that time . I said we would wait for another table and he went on to say that even if we wait we wouldn't get another table . There were like 8 open tables "first come " My ass . The staff here is VERY RUDE !!!!!!!!!!! Stay away . Waste of time

AoE6yaZO-xHzpUFRFCfG6Q.text: Been to HEXX for dinner and brunch and both times were great experiences. I love the high tables and tall windows with all the natural light shining in and the overall modern/upscale feel. Wouldn't expect it to be as reasonably priced as it is compared to other Vegas restaurants.   Food: When I came for dinner there was a little hiccup where the server never put in my order and then when my steak finally came out it was overcooked, so I had to send it back and wait some more. The key manager on duty was a little off putting when I was explaining the situation, but the server was very apologetic and everything was fixed right away and the steak was delicious I would definitely order it again. Mac and cheese wasn't that great so I'd probably get a different side. For brunch I got the Carbonara Pizza, with the crispy bacon and cheesy fontina, I almost ate the whole thing it was so yummy!  Drinks: HEXX's bubbling potions are fun to share and get you where you need to be, if ya know what I mean. They are pretty pricey but hey you're in Vegas enjoy yourself! If you come for brunch opt in for the bottomless mimosas, loosen up and enjoy your fave jams courtesy of the live dj!
