bxe5zVVUu3nBNC67LkdwJQ.text: Came here with my kids thought we could have great experience here. Boy was I wrong. my food was so salty. I ordered the prime rib and asked medium it came out well done. I was not going to wait for another 20 mins. The chicken entree was also salty. I asked for a side of mash potato and it never came. Bad service and bad food was my experience.  I paid for a lot and food was not that great.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

8BeKK1nFeCaOEq2JUYG05g.text: My husband and I visited Hexx for a lighter, earlier dinner and we're happy to have ventured in! We had a later reservation and they accommodated us when we got to the area much earlier than expected but it wasn't too busy at 5pm. Our server Teddy was awesome! He made personal menu suggestions that didn't sound forced and was quick with refills and removing empty dishes. We ordered the hummus with pita chips and a margherita pizza and both were really delicious and didn't feel heavy- everything tasted fresh. Husband had a beer and I had the Hypnotizing Strawberry specialty drink, which was blended well. The server even acknowledged our anniversary, which was mentioned when we made our reservation weeks prior so that was a nice touch. Some of the best food and drinks we had in Vegas on this trip for sure. We will return again!   **i did post this review on other sites as well

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tiramisu dessert (partially eaten at this point)

ytoZ6ctMX6Bp8dWEfjc3Tg.text: Came here for my bachelorette brunch.  Food and drinks  were delicious but most importantly, we had the best time with Tracee. She took care of us, made sure we always had a drink and was so much fun! She is the life of the party! I'll be coming back. Thanks, Tracee!

qgEfvYCcX5w9aBW-9YIUIw.text: Definitely adding this place to my favorite places to eat when you're in Vegas! Really good food, good size portions and I absolutely loved the view we had of the fountains at Bellagio.   I went for breakfast and had the Veggie Omelette with crispy potatoes and English muffin. My friend had the Eggs Benedict. We shared an oversized Cinnamon Bun. Everything was so yummy! And our waitress was delightful and helpful with menu selections.   I'm going back soon. I want to try the crab cakes and some of the fun drinks on their menu!

LzB1SJ06uyRbgItHGpVd-g.text: Fun scene, beautiful surroundings across from Bellagio fountains, we had the carrot cake pancake (great), sticky bun (similar and maybe even better), Meat omelette, which has awesome home fries, and some really good traits. And then you won't break the budget either.

BURfeGNzo_yq8Fsq9Eq88g.text: I came here for dinner from a Groupon deal and now that I'm looking at reviews , I think coming for breakfast/brunch is a better option. The setting is nice and open. Perfect for summer. They keep it cool or if you want to sit outside they have a good amount of misters. Service is excellent. They're very attentive. Every time you use a utensil they immediately bring a new one. I thought this was interesting because I haven't seen that anywhere else! I always have to ask lol For an appetizer we had spinach dip, a meat and cheese deli type plate, and shrimp cocktail. The only one worth mentioning is the spinach dip. Very delicious and I loved that it was served with bread AND chips. For the main dish I had short rib which is one of their signature items. It is served with mash potatoes and brussel sprouts. The short rib itself was delicious, however the dish was ruined by the horse radish mashed potatoes. The other member of my family who ordered the same dish had a similar hate for those. The horseradish completely ruined the taste of perfectly good mashed potatoes and it was inedible for everyone at the table. If only they put garlic or something else, because the taste was so overbearing . Other members of the group ordered different steaks which were all cooked to their liking . The only complaint was that you had to pay for a side dish. Otherwise you just get a steak with a tiny topping of peppers or some other small assortment. But definitely two bites at most. Not enough for a side dish and not enough to fill anybody up. For dessert we had a brownie sundae, cookie sundae, and some sort of flan. The flan was overly soft and couldn't be picked up by a fork. It was pretty liquidy. The brownie was very rich but not very good. The only good part was the ice cream with toffee in it. The cookie sundae was hug but I was disappointed to find that the taste and texture were more like a muffin than a cookie. I kept retasting it to see what was so weird about it,you but I didn't enjoy it. None of the desserts we tried were worth it. Overall it was a good deal for what we paid but I definitely wouldn't come back.

00pYis0PF4jH0bx8EAerWg.text: Service & ambiance is friendly and super cute. Food taste is not what we expected for the star rating. There was a 20min wait. I believe this place is more for mimosas & drinks.

9z91kTqEX18yTJWCU8n7gw.text: Redeemed our Groupon for the Wine & Cheese deal before dinner. It comes with a bottle of wine instead of glasses... totally unexpected and appreciated. Our server Kevin (aka "Chocolate Thunder") was great and fun to chat with. We sat out on the patio next to the railing and people watched (and got a little contact high--J/K---you will occasionally smell it though). Overall great experience!

WlUldnvBovq5B7izSMhjOQ.text: Wouldn't come back. Mimosas are great otherwise never again... food was over priced and bland. Go to Margaritaville and you'll spend half the money get more food and have much better food and service

cL24x-j7Zpgwm1n2ONGCtA.text: I had the protein omelet and the fruit smoothie. Nothing was bad, but it was all ehh and the omelet was too oily and pretty overpriced for what it was. It wasn't bad but I wouldn't come back.

Z9g2lrOI325G9iPAhffruw.text: Just had a fantastic breakfast! Food was fresh and tasty.  Started with a fresh bowl of berries and some OJ. Followed that up with the vegetable omelette.   We did see amazing stacks of pancakes and waffles go by us as well as the breakfast parfait.. so we'll be back to try some of the other treats!  The wait staff was attentive but not too much. Sean is the person to ask for, sit in his station you will not be disappointed!

DK4K_YhhjGk6uj0cZ1XmoQ.text: We stopped in for a late lunch/ snack. The food was very good and our waiter team of Sean and Mike were outstanding, very personable, attentive and helpful. The location is great too right on the strip with all the sights and people watching you might expect. We will definitely be back.

Ex0lRfRAZ1rbPZaO1wIRjw.text: Andrew, tracee was amazing!!! Best server in vegas!! Loved the bottomless mimosas! & best service!! My girl!!!

nTEmiu8YO-CxXaFj_2VD3g.text: While in town we were looking for a fun but delicious brunch spot (preferably with mimosas). We were not disappointed by our choice Hexx! First the food was top notch and the mimosas were great. But what really stood out was the service! Sean and his assistant Myrna were TOP NOTCH, sweet, accommodating and genuinely fun to be around! I cannot rave enough about these two rockstars!

rSgezr3oZlfafVg3nP8c4g.text: This place was so amazing! We had a large bachelorette party and the staff and our waitress were so cordial to take care of us and make our experience worth while.   Out of all the places we ate over the weekend HYXX was the winner of over all service, accommodations, and great food!   Our waitress, I wish I remember her name, mentioned that she is 6 months new to Vegas... she was so full of energy and personality and we were so happy to have her part of this memorable weekend!   Thank you HYXX and staff. I will be back!   Also, be sure and make a reservation ahead of time and you'll have no trouble getting in quick.

Yh5mShlQtMntoOW8ROzG6w.text: My favorite restaurant in Vegas. Prices are great and the food is delicious and the location is prime. We asked to sit right in the front of the patio area so we were able to enjoy the water show at bellagio while having a nice steak dinner.  The best part of our dinner was the burrata toast, so good. I also had the filet mignon and citrus Brussel sprouts. All was very delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Filet mignon with citrus brussel sprouts, super yummy!

aZ3KmnaG9M5Dp3GizCyT7A.text: I'm a local and happened to be down on the strip when a friend was visiting one morning so I stopped here for breakfast before heading home. Sat on the patio which has a great view for people watching and also the bellagio fountains. I got the veggie omelet which was delicious!! It didn't come with cheese (which I didn't notice) but the waitress suggested it so I was glad she did ($2 extra)The portions were very generous - my omelet was huge and there were a ton of potatoes along with an English muffin so I had leftovers as well! I love breakfast leftovers so definitely a win for me!

rulwOPL0TJod8oIXyQVBPw.text: Came here with my bestie and we shared a margherita pizza because we weren't that hungry. The pizza was so yummy and the service was good as well. The restaurant is really nice too, and perfect for groups!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. margherita

5cIaENX7bgD4ebx2iRoqVA.text: This has got to be my favorite place on the strip to go and have dinner at. Today was my 4th time visiting this restaurant, and they never disappoint. Every time I've gone, the service has been excellent. We are usually greeted quickly & with smiles. The staff is great & their food/drink recommendations are always on point. The food amazing! The flavors are so well combined, and so flavorful.   Tonight my friend and I had the Working Husband & the El Nino drinks. Both were highly recommended, and they did not disappoint. The Working Husband was a perfect balance of sweet & spicy, which was just right for me. The El Nino was delicious. If you like Moscow mules then you would enjoy this drink. I was a little skeptical about the ginger beer they use for the mix, but when I actually gave it a taste, it was amazing.   As far as the inside space, they have plenty of seating. The indoor seating is beautiful. Big open space, with lots of lighting, and looks quite fancy. The outdoor seating also has enough seating. You have the front view of the bellagio fountains. It could get a bit loud when you're seating outdoors, because of all the pedestrian activity and traffic on the strip. I don't mi d it at all though. It's actually quite entertaining, watching all the people passing by.   As far as food, my friend had the Halibut which was sooooooo delicious. It comes served on top of this amazing risotto. Such a beautiful fusion of flavors. In this risotto you can taste hints of curry, and coconut, and different spices. So well paired, balanced & made to perfection. I had the butter lettuce and I loved it. The Cocoa Nibs took that salad to a whole other level. It was delicious. We also had the spinach dip which was also amazing. The spinach dip comes with these toasted flattened bagel chips for the dip which were so good. And the dip itself full of flavor. We also had the spicy roasted cauliflower, which was super tasty. It was cooked just right, and extra crunch from the toasted almonds kicked it up a knoch. I also had a mushroom risotto which was also very delicious. I'm obsessed with garlic, so the fact that I could actually taste the garlic in this dish, made my night. Now for dessert we had the passion fruit mouse cake which was to die for. This is a must have item on the dessert menu. It's so light and airy yet full of flavor.   Overall, all I can say is that this place is truly amazing. The chef really knows his stuff. And the staff is excellent. I will continue coming here and referring all my friends to this place!

thurAl_btdLdUW37wXHyAA.text: Food and service are great! The only thing i didn't like was that if you order steak it doesn't come with a side. You have to pay extra for that. Which is not good specially if you are paying $39 for it.

kxkZXheSfJId9VkiCMSuEw.text: Came here for brunch the food was delicious and so were the bottomless mimosas. They're are not stingy with the champagne and your waiter keeps them coming well worth the $23. The waiter we had was very friendly and the location is perfect we sat on the outside part and it was wonderful. The only part that sucked was it was busy so we had a 30 minute wait for we were seated.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Y4qE8HNluyKAWdOWZFUrdQ.text: Very cool atmosphere with the restaurant sitting right on the Strip at Paris. The fancy goblet type drinks are tasty but pricey. Even for the Strip. Our server was friendly and attentive as well. For an appetizer we got the Meats and Cheeses plate which was nice. The grilled country bread was fresh and very tasty.   The Pan Seared Salmon was very nice. It was cooked expertly and the nice lemon vinaigrette complimented it nicely. The mushrooms and peas in it were good, I wasn't wild about black quinoa though.   We also tried the pizza which was just meh. Nothing to write home about. I wouldn't order that again but I wouldn't definitely try Hexx again.

qNnPA1PMDwZwXNCuibpQRg.text: Nice new place for Wifey & I, which we found after a concert in town! I ordered Ribeye Ave Wifey got a Carbonara Pasta dish! We left full, waddling to our hotel! Would definitely try again when we come back to Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

qVlqUsK8qdm2RLfaZu9uDQ.text: Food here was DELICIOUS, however the management and host staff is horrendous. If you're OK waiting for double the quoted time to deal with wherever they seat you, then you will certainly enjoy what the kitchen prepares for you. The food is great, but it's hard to endorse a place that clearly takes advantage of a transient crowd who won't be around the complain the following weekend about how they were treated.

Q0VUA4-jG2QikuNKnCPPng.text: Our server JP was awesomeness!!!  Catered to our needs and went above and beyond.  Jalapeno pancakes are to die for.  Buttermilk pancakes are the best I've ever had.   Pear naked lady drink was perfect!  Would have more of them if I could but one was enough to get me tipsy.

JGBLJWWSMIiyG374mFUezA.text: Recently went to Vegas and needed a place to have good brunch. I have to say, This place is a must! We got the bottomless mimosas that happen to be real mimosas (aka champagne w/ a splash of OJ), the carrot cake pancakes which I 100% recommend if you like carrot cake, and I got a made to order omelets. I got a spinach, mushroom, bacon, and light cheese omelette that came with a side of garlic country potatoes and a biscuit. The garlic potatoes tasted like the garlic fries at AT&T park in SF.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carrot cake pancakes. A must!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Picked to make omelette w/ mushroom, bacon, spinach, tomatoes, &amp; avocado on top. Side of biscuit and garlic country potatoes. Bomb.

3dArqZZsma5712QuL_0-1g.text: Outside seating great for watching Strip at night. Music loud but not overly so.   Candied bacon a great appetizer. Service really decent.

NosdY9UbDYmOPeKSepxtvg.text: Great breakfast.  I had the eggs Benedict and it was amazing.   Very hip crowd and very open and bright.   Steven our server was especially nice and accommodating.   Chatted with us without rushing us like most servers too.  Super good energy Steven has.  My friends had the eggs and bacon and loved his English Muffin too.

7LcNXr4GwTD2ljYwmbRElw.text: I gave this place 4 stars and had the food not been delicious I would of given less. When we got there there was a wait but the hostess said we could eat at the bar no wait. Ok as soon as we sat down a server was over to give menus and get drink orders. Than the wait started. When he came back to take our order he didn't bring drinks and acknowledged that.   I'm ok waiting for food to come because I want it fresh. It water and soda shouldn't be a long wait.  The food was filling and delicious.

aondClvUMANpf31KcRls7Q.text: Our party of 4 were there this past weekend (May 2017). We had made a reservation and were seated immediately, even though we had requested a table in its busiest area, the patio. Our waiter greeted us with a friendly, warm smile, and got to filling our water glasses and drink orders on the spot.  We enjoyed the Traditional Caesar and Simple Salads to start. The Caesar was large enough for two of us to share, while the Simple Salad was just about the prettiest salad that I'd ever seen! Time and care from the kitchen was obviously present.   One of us ordered the Cheese and Charcuterie appetizer as a meal, and was not disappointed! Again, the presentation was inspired! Two of us shared the Pappardelle, and were still unable to finish everything! If you love mushrooms, these wild mushrooms will not disappoint! However, the person who ordered the Hexx burger went back and forth between bites of the burger and oohs and aahs! After having a burger the other day at Gordon Ramsay's Burger, he stated that the two were incomparable!   Finally, watching the Bellagio Fountains as we people-watched, our experience couldn't be matched! Next time we'll have to save room for that Butterscotch Creme Brulee!

oWtUeXH3dVk3_GB7klRtQA.text: The server we had gets 5 stars. However, we had a reservation for 12 at 11:45am and didn't get seated until 30 minutes later. What's the point of a reservation if our table isn't ready? The food was okay. The mocha coffee tasted more like chocolate milk. Service was kind of slow in terms of the time it took to order our drinks, order food, and getting our food. The food didn't all come out at once, either. They did do a good job of refilling water and mimosa!

UJ1KWmydO-ayTEabWOQX0Q.text: Stayed at Paris Hotel which is connected to HEXX.  Ate dinner one night and had a couple of their Dry Ice drinks. Those were awesome, cool, and tasted great. Had the Jambalaya for dinner. Tasted awesome, lots of spices.  Ate breakfast the next morning there and had the best French toast ever. Wife got the turkey club and she loved it.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. So spooky.

1y0BrwG6GWGQG9bEH-bqVg.text: The brunch here was excellent! Server was a little weird but non the less I do recommend you checking it out!

aTvILq_brmrYCtOPWX6emw.text: Great food, not so great waiter, really great other waiter who helped us!  We went here for brunch on Friday and it was packed. We had a reservation but still had to wait about 20 minutes after our scheduled time. No big deal though because its a restaurant and we know they cant kick people out to give us a table, especially not when there are bottomless mimosas. Speaking of $23 for bottomless mimosas is not bad. Especially when we had about 7 each. Our waiter was less than helpful but there was another waiter near by who helped us several times and he even refilled our drinks for us!  The food was delicious and portions were more than generous!

5Jpn7UjRyig9E0Lgis2OjQ.text: What a great way to start your day in Vegas!  Go for the Collosal Bloody Mary.  Just looking at it on your table is worth the price...and they're great!  Ask for Rachel for your waitress she's a blast.  We've heard her bottomless Mimosas are the best but we're still trying to finish the Collosal.

roLs6qqgTDIUUDoAPIXqVQ.text: The food was great with great service the staff at the tropicana recommended this place. The food was great and the service was awesome just as it should be. They have a chocolate shop right next door that's a must stop at also.

KZTre5RbwYIvzCOXwC6lew.text: Horrible establishment! Couldn't get service. I had seen an interesting advertisement outside by their doors showcasing what looked like sangria pitchers with what looked like dry ice making fog rise from the pitchers. I thought it would be interesting to try so I came back with my wife to experience that. Since we were not going to eat the hostess sent us to the bar. We sat there for literally no joke about ten minutes and no one acknowledged us at all. We weren't complaining because we aren't jerks or assholes we understand that the staff might be busy with other guests but it was about 3pm and there was five people scattered throughout the bar and there was three bartenders. It wasn't until one of them needed to use the register that was next to where we were sitting that I had the opportunity to ask for service asm he replied that he needed to take care of the two ladies sitting three stools away. Horrible service. Horrible service. Maybe he was being racist? Maybe he was being discriminate? Maybe he doesn't belong in the service industry? The reason I bring up the race card? My wife and I are Hispanic. The rest of the patrons were anglos. That was my observation. Why bring up the discrimination? Maybe because he saw that we were Hispanic, he assumed we were going to be rude or maybe even be bad tippers? I work in services as well, my bonuses are directly from client feedback through what my company calls net promotor score. If I meet my metrics I get a bonus. If a server or bartender gives good service or even great service they should assume a great tip. I tip 20% regardless because I understand the service industry. This person, with grayish short hair wearing a blue striped long sleeve shirt didn't even give us the opportunity to pay for a good from this establishment much Lee's tip him. He seemed like he had more authority than the bartenders so he might be a manager or whatever maybe he felt like he can choose his patrons. Been in Vegas before to many establishments and this was the worst ever. Couldn't even comment on their product or food cause I couldn't even try it...

DexO9rn7fBzQZKuOb-Sa6A.text: Great food, quantitative menu options and perfect view of the bellagio fountains. I like that this place is opened late. There is so much to see even when you're sitting down having dinner here.

hGKpnc_qWzmN62ngS2S2SA.text: We stumbled upon this place when a neighboring restaurant has a ridicilous wait. There was no wait for our party of 13. The enviroment is great, clean and nicely decorated. Our waitress, Angela, flawlessly handled our large party and had a wonderful demeanor to boot. Even the gentleman filling our water glasses was pleasant and attentive!   Food was great. I had the jambalaya. I was warned it was spicy, which it was. However it was delicious and would highly recommend if you enjoy spicy food.  We ate during the evening so it was a great view of the Bellagio fountain show. Enjoy!

J9mrhUs6b1R2xCEzoFfYgQ.text: Bedt appy i ever had BACON. Great atmosphere... SupEr good service. Back to the appy... OMG.. Tasty as... Crispy bacon ... Who thinks of this stuff.. Very original

l7W25eKmgdaijjeMuaqheA.text: We were served by Tracee who is the absolute best. She kept the drinks coming and the food was delivered so quickly! She also gave us extremely helpful tips on where to go for our stay. I would come back just for her service.

v9-BXO7LoQuifm6C9HfxWw.text: Good food, very noisy so if you're looking for an escape from the constant Las Vegas noise it's not here. Extremely expensive beer and it's not like it was a rare beer find. Service was very good.  I think the food was over priced but good. I wouldn't make it a point to go back.

noQZJaTLohH-7Z9xUAXa7A.text: The food was super yummy. We had a lovely brunch with bottomless mimosas. The atmosphere was great. And our server Tracee was THE best!

4HhblbmJF-6vJRdBIxacrQ.text: I expect restaurants on the strip to be overpriced, but to generally have excellent food.  Hexx unfortunately did not have excellent food.   I ordered "Grilled King Salmon.  manhattan clam chowder, arugula salad."  The 'clam chowder' consisted of several clams in open shells, and a little bit of liquid in the bottom of the plate, with small pieces of vegetable.  At first I thought it was just liquid from the salmon, which was in the middle of the plate.  The 'arugula salad' was really more of a garnish on top of the salmon.  The most disappointing part was that the salmon wasn't cooked through. The half that was cooked was good, the rest was orange/pink jello.  I declined the offer of another piece of salmon, since I was ready to leave by that point.    My dinner companion ordered the New York steak, 10oz, which looked small for 10oz.  The blue cheese butter was specifically asked to be left off the steak, but it arrived with it anyway.  The second steak that came out, this time without the butter and about whenI finished the cooked part of my meal, apparently was good.  Cost, without tip, for both meals, one soda, and two glasses of water, was just over $80.  The service was OK, with several apologies, and the view of the fountain was nice, but I would not go back again.

2D4ZeF5rS1vFyMNCDk5Q6Q.text: Let me start by saying the only reason i gave it 2 stars  was because of the outside view! First they said it would be 20 min to seat us. After 30 min i went to the front and they said they had no record of me.  Then they sat us, nice view of the foutains at the belagio!  The bloody marys were 13.00 each and tasted like there was no alcohol!  Me and my wife ordered the carnitas hash, HORRIBLE!!! IT WAS LIKE A STEW!  my wife didn't even eat hers. Service was poor and food horrible. For the price i expected MUCH MORE.  skip this place!

5lvOgpL3ZuOzmTxsFizC2Q.text: Dined here for dessert with the Lip Smacking Food Tour. Sat outside on a warm night and watched all the hustle and bustle of The Strip. The cake was unlike any cake we have had before. (even had candles to celebrate our anniversary...aww...) Service was prompt and informative.  Will return for full menu dining.

PeF2fnjeimLxOedSxSma1A.text: I had a great time at Hexx!! Tracee was an outstanding waitress. She had the perfect balance of attentiveness while still allowing my buddy and me to enjoy our meal. I would and will gladly come back because of the service we received.

_3dgJvJENJj7pjDlL0bmLw.text: Claire was amazingly awesome!!!! Very very good customer service and super friendly! Will be back to eat every time we are in Vegas!!! And to top it off food was bomb !!!! A++

6qmKzvP6_Q1Wjo45SFHFeA.text: 2.5 review, If it wasnt for the groupon to lessen the blow of our disappointment I would have rounded down to a 2 star review. Our experienced started with being "greeted" by an unfriendly front desk host.  She wasnt rude but definitely did not put off a welcoming or friendly vibe....  as the host its your job to atleast crack a smile. I ordered the chicken and waffles... The chicken was a big disappointment.  It had an odd texture and taste and dry in the inside.  It tasted like it was either some pre-breaded cafeteria style chicken or maybe even some generic shake and bake chicken. I didnt mind the cheddar waffle, i think that worked except some of the bites with the apple gave off an odd apple taste.  I think it was from the apple skin that they may have left on. I think the chicken and waffles from Grand Lux destroys this and they cost nearly half as much. My wife had a steak and it lacked the rich beef flavor of what a quality steak would have.  She said she would prefer a cheapy sirloin steak from Sizzler over what she ate.

d2s_5McSWjimuv-SLzuF3w.text: So on 10/8/16 I was the best man for my friends bachelor party and we decided to have a nice dinner at Hexx. I made reservations and when we showed up, they said they had no record of it. Okay fine maybe something fell through. We waited an hour to sit then ordered. The 6 of us all ordered various steaks and thought all was good. 45 minutes later and still no food I called the manager over. He assured me they would be out soon, but took an additional 15-20 minutes until 5 of the 6 meals came out, all cold. One of the steaks was never put in! After talking AGAIN to the manager, he offered to reheat our food and comp the one which was not put in. We declined since we had obligations already set up for about 20 minutes from then. Finally the last steak came out and by that time we had to eat in a rush and get out of there. During that whole time parties around us came, sat, ordered, ate, and left before we ever got our food. The whole dinner took about 1 hour 45 min, not including the unexpected hour wait. I would NOT recommend this place to anyone looking for a night out dinner with friends. The terrible customer service mixed with the cold food served to us gives me the rational for the 1 star rating.

8pzmro23oszBenVPE0KX2g.text: We dined at Hexx last night and were blown away! Great staff from Parish, the host, who was so accommodating and polite  (and adorable with his bow tie) to our server Maria (knowledgeable, engaging, attentive) to the chefs who have outdone themselves with the menu....we tried a little bit of a LOT OF stuff and while everything was tasty and beautifully presented, a few things stood out: the broccolini. Really. It's an appetizer and we all thought, "huh?" because who wants to eat a plate of that stuff before a nice meal?! But it's delicious! I can't even describe it---some kind of marinade happened and then I think it's fried. ....what you get is the lightest, most delicious thing you never expected! Other standouts: the meatballs, the artichoke dip, the BACON! For entrees, the New York strip was melt in your mouth even better than the Filet. Chicken and waffles? An unlikely dinner option that turned out to be a great choice. The jumbalaya was generous with the shrimp and chicken and not too spicy, the burgers were excellent. We also had a sampling of desserts and my favorite was the French silk tart. Hexx seems to pride themselves on high quality local foods and it shows.  Because of the size of our party (9), we were seated at a long table with upholstered booth on one side and chairs on the other. I was so pleasantly surprised by the throw pillows which were decorative and great back support!  Get the right spot and you can see the Bellagio fountains while you dine. Though the restaurant was busy, we never felt rushed AND we were lucky enough to get a tour of the chocolate making facility (bean to bar) after we finished our meal. Fascinating and I highly recommend if you get the chance. We have eaten our way through a lot of Vegas and Hexx is the place that stood out as best quality and most memorable. Thanks for the tremendous experience.

Oxyu0tbf_IqzGDjTlQ8a8g.text: At first I was sad to see sugar factory left, but now I don't mind that it's gone now that hexx took its place. My man and I went here for dinner on the Fourth of July and were not disappointed. The prices are a bit steep but it is Vegas and you're at a fancy restaurant on the strip so it is expected. Our waitress was Sheri. If you can request her, do it! She is the best waitress we've had in Vegas so far and this is our 4th trip here together. She is very polite, knowledgable, and intelligent about the menu, the ingredients used, and the Vegas strip in general. We asked her a good place to get sushi and she was knowledgable about locations on the strip as well! We shared the chips and dip to start. It was delicious! I love onion dip. You could tell the chips and the dip were homemade and not from a package! We then shared the pepperoni pizza. Also delicious! It's not your boring old pizza, it is thin crust with a sauce that has a slight kick. Onion, garlic and cheese. Mmmm. The pepperoni on it were huge. We at first were just looking for something small to split since we wanted sushi later but the food and service was so good we decided to get dessert too. Sheri recommended to Aztec cake so we tried that! We had it with some coffees. It was very good. The boyfriend liked it even though he isn't big on chocolate stuff. It's a light and soft cake that has an excellent chocolate flavor. We devoured the whole thing. The other desserts looked great too. Next time I'd probably go for the espresso torte, just because it sounds so good! I'd definitely order the Aztec cake again too though! The coffee was very strong so I had to doctor it up a little with sugar and cream. It's definitely a dark roast but the flavor is still good. If you like a strong, dark cup of coffee, I definitely recommend to get one here for breakfast or dessert!  Hexx is a must try if you are someone who loves to try different restaurants in Vegas! If you can get Sheri for a waitress, it'll make your experience even better! I love sparkling water, I ordered that and every time I even thought about pouring more into my glass from the bottle at the table, she was already there pouring it for me! With dessert she brought us 2 complimentary pieces of chocolate that paired nicely with our cake and coffee. She was very knowledgable about the chocolate as well!!

KTHFzHgg1tq21gL9uEafmA.text: absolute garbage food.....good service but the food is ridiculously overpriced for what you get....steaks are dry and not cooked properly....the management makes the customer feel bad for complaining about the food not being good....no apologies, no refunds.....the worst on the strip......DO NOT EAT HERE

14b2xYZmI70IS7qeAT7M3g.text: we came here because a co-worker recommended this place, so we thought we would try it out, and wow!!! amazing!!! from the front desk to the server all the way to the manager matt we had an amazing time! thank u mikhail for taking good care of us!!!

ePuiqQFu9G_80ZtG44PpCA.text: Well, we had a chance to eat 3 meals on a short weekend in Vegas, 2 of them as ate at Hexx. Teddy was our waiter for dinner and I let him choose all our food. So impressed at the level of service and the attention to detail and presentation with the food! Unbeatable for the cost, truly blew us away so we came back the next morning for brunch.... Tracee was our server and she recommended the chicken and waffles so my husband got that and I ordered a omelette. My food was so so good until I tried the chicken and waffles and then pushed my plate aside to eat half my husbands breakfast! We have already made brunch reservations for mother's day, there is no where else I would rather eat!

Qo548Hy_RWuW2tdHmfmi3Q.text: This place took over the sugar factory so I was quite confused when I got there. My group wanted to get the fish bowls from sugar factory. We weren't going to go in until one of the hostesses outside explained that they just opened and that they also had a fishbowl type drink that uses fresh fruit instead of candy. We decided to give it a try and if you don't want to eat you can go directly to the bar. There were some long tables in that area too so we didn't have anywhere to stand or sit when we first went in. There were some tables alongside the glass wall when you first turn in but we didn't know if we could sit there. No one asked or assisted us so we just sat there. Those two tables were not really in the bar's line of sight so no one came to give us a menu or anything. I ended up walking up to the bar to order drinks. I stood there for a good 5 minutes waiting to be helped while the bartenders just passed me by. I finally flagged one of them down (Apparently they won't come to you unless you actually wave at them). I ordered two big fruit martinis (peach raspberry and mango orange). When they were brought to the table we asked for 2 more straws ( we had 4 people). They never brought them so one of my friends had to go back to the bar to get some.  The mango orange one was really sweet but I enjoyed the peach raspberry. It had a peach sake/soju cocktail flavor. They had a good amount of alcohol in them too.  Our bartender came to tell us how much it was and didn't give us a check...just an amount.  This place just opened so hopefully they'll make some changes.

tDUFlB2QmzMgT7I8BLhncw.text: My girls and I went here for the first time and I was really impressed with how lovely it looked and how friendly everyone was our server was great and busser was on point with refilling our water, the music was pretty fun also my friends and I enjoyed our breakfast and time there

cpS2iGn6F9sQCqoRHNWWGg.text: Basically a chocolate flight. Dine here then get a free mini tour and chocolate! So yummy! Stephanie and Gianni were amazing tour guides  and very helpful!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chocolate flight

s-HH03s2zbFKRB6NRObkTw.text: Service was wonderful as usually, I'll give it 5 stars, It was the good that I giving this place 3 stars... 1. Steak and eggs- steak was beyond well done, we asked for med rare. 2. Lobster roll- lobster was fresh and flavorful, the roll was terrible. I LOVE bread, any and all kinds, but this roll was old, dried and stale tasting. I ask all the lobster and left the roll.  3- The chicken and waffles- waffle was tasty, the chicken was well marinated, but there were some "black spots" of burnt coating.  4-The pasta- pasta was cool perfectly and the sauce was delicious.  5- Farmers Bloody Mary- was good and had a kick

MtGcDVL53w4gZ_j6DXiWRw.text: Sean was our server, and we had a great experience! He's attentive and friendly and the food was amazing. I highly recommend Hexx and Sean!

Xt0tbnCCzBtj7X5N_KGCIA.text: We got a pre fixe diner because we went to the illusionist show. No vegetarian options for that though and the fine print adds some extra prices. The normal menu is in the high price range. The presentation is absolutely beautiful and the staff is so nice! It was so pretty in there and you get a lovely view of the fountain show.  I think it's worth the price. And it's a good amount of food you shouldn't have too many left overs and it's although really healthy options!

eNUwr2NBuQNWkPVeuIGJwA.text: 10 out of 5 stars!!! We had a reservation but they lost it and we had to wait 40 minutes... SO WORTH IT. They pour your bottomless mimosas higher than your glass. The place is a party. The server Rafael and Tracee dance and sing like nobody is watching. It makes the atmosphere so amazing- best brunch ever. Food was phenomenal. Wow.

BRfvYumLd_BswiH8KSsllQ.text: Food was amazing. I also had the bottomless Mimosas and I will tell you my drink was NEVER empty. Shawn and Shannon gave the BEST service. I was so impressed. We were sitting in the bar area and I was expecting to having to have to hunt someone down but not at all. Shawn and Shannon was on it. They both was taking turns seeing about us. I'm so impressed. My hubby and I will definitely be back. Thank you Shawn and Shannon!!

IODDno8vrZ3wNglaxRQnIg.text: My family of 6 went to celebrate my daughter's 21st Birthday. It was awesome!!!!!!! The atmosphere, the staff, the food, the drinks... Everything was A+++ Together we ordered a speciality drink, which was huge! Definitely enough for 2-4 people! We ordered 4 appetizers, the hummus, meatballs, pretzels and smothered fries (loved those). For dinner, we ordered the salmon, filet mignon, New York steak, chicken & waffles and the lamb. There wasn't a bite left on anyone's plate. For dessert we went with milkshakes. Vanilla, chocolate and espresso (loved it)!! Everything was great! The staff was so friendly and made our night unforgettable!!! Thank you Angie & everyone else who served our table!!!!

pWhYrgLBUffNknK2kq8isA.text: Tracy was making thick thighs save lives  amazing she was love this place will always come back if she working here

sKAj2sLwLKz_t_hLihUBxw.text: Tracee is by far the best waiter I've ever had! We were here for a bachelorette brunch & she's so much fun & kept us laughing the entire time. Tracee along with the rest of the waiters kept all of our orders (18 of us in total) all straight, had the food & drinks out FAST! Thank you Tracee for such a fun morning!

Aa1gLnpyx5zbeDH4QCdABg.text: Tracee is the best server I've ever had I've never met a person I liked more shout-out Ivan I want my kid to look like him. 10/10 or more like 5 stars on yelp

-E4PH3xqjaO8VIZS3Gb5hg.text: We wanted to celebrate a special occasion with my daughter and her family. And we wanted to try a place that none of us had eaten previously. Hexx Kitchen for brunch on a pleasant June morning seemed to fit the bill. Ambiance: We got a table on the patio with a good view of the Bellagio fountains and for people watching. A good start for the meal. They did have misters going to help with the heat but they were spraying out so it did little to cool down those of us sitting on the patio. Service: Our server came by a few minutes after we sat down. She was very warm and welcoming. She then disappeared for about 10 minutes. No problem - we needed time to work out menu options. When she returned, she took our order and disappeared again. No problem - family time and we liked the chance to talk. The food runners eventually did bring our food, but getting water or coffee refills required tripping a busboy for another table to get attention. Yes, the servers are spread thin. And working hard. But that shouldn't be my problem. And not an excuse for poor service. They should have more servers working Sunday brunch.  Food: My wife and I shared the brioche French toast and the meat omelet. Each was brought out room temperature. The French toast was about the same quality you can get at IHOP or Denny's. That's not a serious criticism about the flavor - eat on the Strip and you pay Strip prices for a meal. The omelet was tasty, not great but good. It came with potatoes that probably were good when they were hot. Being generous, I could see giving the food a 3 star rating. Value: Eating on a patio on the Strip should be worth something, even if the food and service are disappointing. But the final "straw" for me was on the bill. They added a 4% surcharge item labeled "cnf." When I asked about it, I was told it is an added fee because the restaurant has to pay the hotel for the location attached to the Paris. GIVE ME A BREAK! Charge more for the food on the menu if you need to cover your overhead. But don't slip it in on the bill and hope that no one notices.  I won't be back.

GmOASN7Az2wzXhSz1FN8Wg.text: I ordered a takeout and waited for over 40 min to get my food. The waitress is not helpful at all and the management is confusing...

9P1w2bHB6jxz4leCSKSYXg.text: One of the best bloody Mary's in Vegas. I got the Farmers Market Bloody Mary & my husband go the Diablo. Both were to die for!! As far as food, it was just ok. Brunch menu wasn't great, but wasn't terrible either. We also came back for a late night happy hour and we got smothered fries and fried calamari, both were delicious. Would definitely come back for lunch and dinner.

fSgPZtx1o2Nfn52AiXVi6w.text: We eat at the Hexx kitchen bar every time we come to Vegas. The food is always good but I always forget the drinks suck and finally remember it once I get my drink. I had the prime rib French dip. Was amazing the meat melted in my mouth. However I usually judge a place on the alcoholic beverages my drink was 16 bucks Long Island ice tea. Obviously the bar tender didn't get an A in class making this drink!! Probably the worst one I've ever had. Couldn't taste the alcohol at all,what a waste of money. Didn't even resemble the drink. Needless to say don't buy drinks on the strip. They haven't figured out yet that people won't put up with it.

FMGwkkj-9hUTlKN_h7HaFg.text: Great experience eating at the bar. Two amazing cocktails, seafood platter, and great service. I highly recommend visiting Hexx before a show at Bally's. It's a short walk to a better dining experience!

zvuM0xifsqKwqPHpwxxJZQ.text: Juan and Moon we're awesome thanks for helping us out guys making a bad situation right. There's a reason you're managing at a hip spot like this in Vegas you guys are on top of everything and know that mistakes will happen and when they do you more than fulfill expectations. Food was amazing drinks were awesome not much more I can say good work well played.

CddGVsC1d84KCC2o8NRgxw.text: Fantastic place for brunch. The food was fantastic (I definitely recommend the carrot cake pancakes) and the bottomless mimosas were actually bottomless mimosas. Our server, Enrique, was awesome and such a great server. We will definitely be coming back to try lunch and dinner here.

U37WBW4NuiOToUsX_MrnFw.text: My family and I decided to come to Las Vegas for the long weekend. We all came with our family. I found Hexx on yelp and I thought it would be a good restaurant for kids and adults. I called 3 days prior to make the reservation. We were a party of 22. Our reservation was at 11:15am and we were seated at about 11:45am because they were trying to get a table to accommodate our party. They were unable to get us a table so our party was split in half. We had four infants in our party that needed a highchair. We were told that all of their highchairs were being used, but as soon as they became available they would bring them to our table. Everybody loved the food but it was very uncomfortable to eat with the infants on our laps. While we were eating another party was seated next to us. They had an infant and they were given a highchair as soon as they got seated. My husband and I were very disappointed. How can another party get priority? The guys got a round of Schonramer gold beer and they wanted a second round but were told that they ran out of that beer. Seriously?! How can that be possible? I really wanted to try the carrot cake pancakes but I am allergic to walnuts so I opted for the cinnaroll waffle. It was okay. My sister in law had the chilaquiles, they were delicious. The girls an I had the bottomless mimosas for $25. Bottomless for a period of two hours. We had a great time but it could have been better. This is why I give them three stars.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Dealing with the babies because the restaurant did not have enough highchairs.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My other brother in law with his baby girl on his lap because they didn&#39;t have a highchair available.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. My brother in law with his baby on his lap because they did not have highchair available.

QwncYLMLUO5NkMswxfwPmw.text: My wife and I are back in Vegas for one night, and we couldn't leave without stoping by our favorite place in Vegas Hexx kitchen + bar. We both ordered our favorite dishes and of course it tasted like haven. Our waiter Rafael was very gracious and kind, and they were nice enough to give us a complementary gifts when they found out we drove from Orange County CA. I recommend this place to everyone to try.

rv9szGVBybo6FyiWRhCT3g.text: Review long overdue!!!!  I rarely give any place a 5 star, but I would admit this place has earned it.  We were in LV for my wife's B-day and wanted a nice parting dinner.  we bought a Travelzoo special; dinner for 2 includes 2 cocktails, it was an excellent value.  My wife ordered the scallops and they were perfect, not overly seasoned.  I had the braised ribs, it was absolutely delicious; I devoured it despite not being hungry. To say the least, the food was outstanding.  But the reason why the 5th star:  1) We were seated outside along the strip along side the strip to people watch, the Bellagio water show, and perfect weather. 2) Marie, our server; she was absolutely wonderful and took great care of our experience.  She took the time to make sure our couple photo captured our special meal and timing it with the water show to ensure an amazing back drop...big thanks Marie.  And she deserve a huge bonus...hint..hint. 3) Timing - it was my wife's birthday; this last meal and experience just made it so much more special.  Note: Many restaurant has a tendency to treat their guess negatively different when they are using a Travelzoo/Groupon special.   HEXX was professional and courteous throughout our experience.  I will add this restaurant to our list to return and to entertain at.  Thanks HEXX

l4YNoclULcHfGGRGYtT_4w.text: We're locals and frequent this place. This is a tourist spot that makes you feel like a local.  The view,  the service,  the atmosphere, and the food all keeps me coming back.  There are many places to spend your money, but this is one of the favorites and I look forward to coming back here and enjoying new items on the menu. It's hard to bet the view that is overlooking the Bellagio Fountains.  The cauliflower is amazing, the charcuterie  board is a favorite, and the deserts are delicious.  Ask for Brad to serve you. He's top notch!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The view of the bellagio fountains wins my heart

owYbu_i5Ui6ZFzxD_Afmdg.text: Our waitress tracee was the best. We came here for our friends 21st and she made it so fun. She's the best. 12/10. Food was great...Tracee was greater. You gotta come here just for her.

5m8R0WXX-mKVYremmbZzGQ.text: No pics but that's because the food was demolished.  Great service (shout out to Sean, amazing waiter, super knowledgeable and gave spot -on recommendations to a party of very picky eaters).  Visited during a recent spring break trip to Vegas with family and friends.  Party of three, we were seated and served in a timely fashion.    We ordered the carrot cake pancakes (please believe the hype and get them.  Amazing recipe, not sickeningly sweet, spiced appropriately, shredded carrots in the batter), the cinaroll waffle (which was also great but my party preferred the pancakes) and the turkey club.  Go if only for the carrot cake pancakes.  But if you go, I don't think you'll regret it.

qYWv6wx3OKm4AktoKuLh4w.text: I loved the vibe here. Service was great. We had brunch and all 3 of our orders where delicious. I would definitely recommend and will be back.

qEk_3UgYKCKX5xyffpAMZw.text: Love this place, so much space from indoor to outdoor, the bar is beautiful, the decor is elegant and very fancy like but not too fancy where you feel out of place. The food is great tasting especially brunch with good portion sizes. Service is always great and it's a fun restaurant!

I7qK1AsnoQG3fC0pMRHXKQ.text: I came here for a friends birthday and we were about a party of 6. The restaurant was pretty busy when we came in, but we were seated immediately and were treated  wonderfully. Our server Quinn was very personable and she was very friendly off the bat.   We had ordered the bottomless mimosas and Tai was EXCELLENT at keeping our glasses full. They were willing to answer any questions we had and were overall very pleasurable to speak with.   I highly recommend this spot for not only their food but also for their service.   Request Quinn and Tai if you can!

XKmFgIldj37jqkVuXH2WKA.text: A few of us came here for brunch for our best friends birthday. We had our reservation for 10:30am and were sat down around 11:00 due to how busy it was. The bottomless mimosas were a hit along with the food selections. The sticky bun was my favorite and the rest loved the garlic bread! This is a place I would definitely visit again because of the delicious food and great service!

g6pq1zZWMwYK3u7ZyzGr_Q.text: The server was sweet but the food was terrible to say the least! The manager Adrian, was not empathetic but did end up complementing half of our bill. All of the food came out cold, and the order were incorrect 3 times. How do you mess up breakfast? This chef definitely found a way to mess up 6 identical orders of cheese eggs and toast lol God bless America but not this place of business lol

-QypRELTZUCyRtsbZ6Lp8Q.text: This is probably the best breakfast I experienced in Vegas. Apollo was our server and he was Phenomenal. He is passionate about his customers and the food. We went there for the bottomless mimosas... I thought with how busy they were we would not get our food fast or the mimosas would be empty always but boy was I wrong. The mimosas were always full... even if it was half full they rip you off as they walk by. The food was fast and so delicious too! I will definitely be making this a regular stop when I visit Vegas!

3sQhGMC4kxmJUk8EsrdaYg.text: Had breakfast here, it was very good. We just had a simple breakfast, the three eggs. Substituted the potatoes for a fruit cup ( no upcharge!). There was no wait, that was a huge plus. The carrot cake pancakes looked amazing.

39MFmrK2VdBDWp-nVHYICg.text: ALEX AND ELAINA ARE THE BEST!!!  So grateful for the amazing service. Not to mention the incredible food. But they are what made it over the top exceptional service.  When you work in the restaurant industry you are unable to enjoy yourself sitting down for a brunch because you pay attention to everything behind the scenes. But Elaina and Alex made me forget I ever worked in a restaurant before. And that is the highest compliment I could ever give.  Thank you Hexx// bar side Alexxa (where we went) for giving us the best birthday celebration we could imagine

56cCN7wQNBlzPOvCz8-Arw.text: Food was pretty good & so was the service. Nothing super special about the place but I would go back.

2roZgtNELsAvaZM7HKLd5Q.text: This is such a quaint location with the bellagio view! The food is decent and the drinks are pretty good! I've come here on several different occasions and have not been disappointed. The chicken and waffles isn't the best I've ever had but our waiter (Sean) was super nice and informative this time around. I'm a waitress also so i give him 5 stars for his great service!

wQcLlqXo-MI0TKWGA5eKkQ.text: I haven't been to Hexx in like 4 months and I come back and I forgot how amazing the food is and how amazing the service is! Sean made sure we were always happy and had everything we needed! He was my server once before and I've always had a great experience with him! I will definitely be going back soon!

7DxtwiqWL98rxbDRtEhtcA.text: Really good food and great service from Sean and Alex, keep it up! From your strong black coffee guests from Sweden

XCKgAfCQ9k3uuHras2BoPQ.text: I came back because I really do love it.  This time I got the bisque soup with garlic bread (which I had to request, they really need to remember to offer it when people order it) and the salad with the turkey.  It was a HUGE salad but not worth $18.....  I'll stick to the Simple Salad.

j2DL2mCZYyEJhzevwjSeZw.text: We were accommodated right away because we explained we needed to catch a flight back home and couldn't wait the current wait time of 30 minutes. We had a very nice brunch. The veggie omlettes was good with fresh ingredients and the coffee hit the spot. Although they originally brought out the wrong omlettes they quickly rectified it.

uPujf6FTfo8Bbhsi7jgXGw.text: Tracee is the bomb. She kept our mimosas comin and like Oprah one for you, one for you, one for you.  All 6 of us got the bottomless mimosas! Also, the food was sooooo good. French toast has a magic ingredient and the potatoes..... mmmmmm!

rp42zWaYTcqb5SZpfzyPUg.text: They have bottomless mimosas which was the draw! They are amazing! Super friendly and great atmosphere....breakfast was amazing. Our servers Sean and Mike were the best! We had a great experience.

xjHMPvJfw65av9wvgUARIg.text: Average Bloody Mary. The whole menu is very overpriced. The chilaquilies were almost inedible. We didn't get the regular red chilaquilies sauce, instead it we had mushy chips rolled in a "green chili" that had an after bite that was very tart. Mona mi agabi is 15 feet away and 10x better

TWpTQmP8UiVpUJOvEJzz-g.text: We just went for brunch for the first time here. It was highly rated and I can totally see why. Food and drinks were amazing, but even better was our server Tracee!! She has SUCH amazing energy that she spreads all throughout he restaurant. She's extremely attentive and super engaging and creates an atmosphere that makes everyone want to have a great time together! She's extremely kind and makes each guest feel so welcome and ensures everyone has a great experience. If you come here, ask to be sat in Tracee's section!

jbDziGEkBlZFt2wVzFEhCg.text: Been here twice, this place is THE BEST. food never disappoints. Tracee is the MIMOSA NINJA. She is the reason we never want to go home!!! Try the Apple Pancakes, it's like a melt-in-your-mouth, flavor explosion.

70y48Nh5eskDPpthb4iJcw.text: Great food and an awesome place to people watch.  Be sure to grab a seat outside where you are right on the strip.  Late night menu hits the spot when you've been out drinking.  I highly recommend the crispy broccolini, it was so yummy!

g8TULkLdF59PlsKzuzJVsw.text: I send people in hexx to dine in and experince the view over looking bellagio   Lets begin with food, we order salmon, bolo pasta, newyork, and prime rib   All all of the proteins were overcook their interpretation of midrare is well done the meat was so tough we had to send it back   Then our server had the audacity to come back on our table to tells us one of the protien was properly.cook   Pasta was ok! Needs more seasoning   Service   I ask for water it took them 4 times me asking nicley to get 4 glasses of water   My sister in law and my wife already finished their meal before a medium newyork, and midrare prime rib came out, my sides dish are already cold before we get to enjoy a ok meal   Will i go back? No Will i recommend? No Will i send clients to have meals at hexx? No   Dispointment!

Lxk7IHgSPyeAx2AiltTgdg.text: We have been going there for breakfast!  Their breakfast is excellent.  The service fantastic.  We were recently there on Saturday and Enrique took care of us.  His attention to detail was great!  A very personable courteous guy who cares about his customers.  He asked us not once but three times if our order was ok and if we needed anything.  We are locals so lucky for us we get to go back!  Try Hexx!  You won't be disappointed

AgGRrADPzVlQBphxvSf9BQ.text: Worst service in Vegas. Ordered the steak and eggs, medium rare, it took 45 minutes to get to us and it was so well done I could barley cut into it. I sent it back and asked for medium rare again. Another 30 minutes goes by and the whole table was finished eating by then, the steak comes out again, it is so rare it's comical. The waiter had the audacity to call ME out and say "so you wanted it medium?" I said "No I want it medium rare just like my friends ordered it and got it". Another 45 minuets go by and I still don't have my steak, I told the manager I didn't want it any more. For the first time in about 2+ hours were our bottomless mimosas filled without us asking. They are called bottomless so we don't have to see the bottom of the glass. They blamed their lack of attention to your table on being busy, when there was clearly 20 Empty tables around us. If I could give it a -5 stars I would. Never going back!!!!

Ir4Mnhwv8NpS6AFBTz5GFg.text: Stopped here for dinner and drinks one night. Our meals weren't spectacular and the drinks were of course, overpriced. Not bad but not great. Great location in the middle of the strip.

0siiCpKnDmyOeAhuG_UiRQ.text: The food here is amazing!  May be a tad overpriced by a few dollars, but otherwise reasonable. The food quality is above average and the restaurant's decor and staff are fantastic. I came here for breakfast with my girls after partying the night before. Hexx's food was supposed to be my hangover-relief. And they definitely delivered.  I had the meat omelet and substituted the pork for tomatoes. It came out nice and toasty, and was accompanied by hot and crispy hash browns and an English muffin.  It was a much needed breakfast pick me up and our server was kind and very attentive. When I am in Vegas again, I would definitely come back and have a meal here! Come and check this place out if you are visiting Vegas.

o6LSBwj5kYdtD4unxtPDsQ.text: What a great stop for brunch in an already fantastic weekend in Vegas for a concert! My friend and I were happily greeted by our waitress, Tracee, and waited upon by Jordan as well. Besides enjoying their wonderful company and personalities, we ate our fill of a veggie omelet with fruit and meat omelet with excellent potatoes. The bottomless mimosas were great as well and worth the $23. Don't be surprised if it takes a little time to get your food and drinks: they're busy for a reason! If you're in Vegas for brunch HIGHLY recommend Hexx and ask for Tracee and Jordan!

sPvCjcV2aNWjTz-M04nU5Q.text: I'm in Vegas for a night, business trip. This place has great food, great service, and a great view of the Bellagio (it's on open concept). I requested an outside table which could frustrate a server since I am a party of 1 and taking up prime real estate.  The severs made me feel welcome and even brought out a complimentary dessert. I am definitely coming back here next time I'm in town!

OvU3z2JcKSwGFJA9AKZFlw.text: Sean was very attentive ! He came back often to be sure we were good and well served ! Amazing service and food !! Ask for Sean !

u1kpNijHOixmd6TPsmFsIg.text: came here very late and it was busy and loud and had a very happy atmosphere! I got the hummus and it was phenomenal, I especially liked the blue oil on top, perhaps I may have questioned it more if I had been sober. the people who were working there were very very sweet. our waitress was nice and efficient and the boy I stopped for coffee was super sweet tea but I think he may have had a crush on me, I was looking pretty cute that night. the coffee was very strong so I recommend it for those of you who love that.

CfhEgRzANUd3iCZ6YH_FYg.text: Food and atmosphere was great! Only thing I wished was that they went lighter on the salad dressing. Overpowered the dish. Otherwise great and speedy service.

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I come here every time in Vegas! Good food for being 24/7!

BMiU0QbKBl7n9zbXMeJPcQ.text: This is our second time this week to come to hexx because it's so dang good; again we love tracee but didn't have her as a waitress (heart broke a little) but she still made sure to come by and see us as well as made sure we are okay! Hexx should be named tracee's but it's all good. Best food, best drinks, best everything #tracee

iQyU9Mybq9cRCubUM7XFwA.text: Ate here for the first time for a friends birthday today 11/4/16. I was really disappointed with the dining experience. First off my friend was previously here for his girlfriends birthday and it happened to be when the Paris hotel had a complete loss of power. So due to that situation the manager informed him that the next time he made a reservation at the restaurant it would be taken care of. So for his birthday he made a reservation and informed the person on the phone that he would be bringing a small group for a dinner and that the manager should be informed since it was going to be taken care of due to the previous incident. The person on the phone confirmed it with the manager and the reservation was set. We came for the reservation and ate our dinner but when the bill came we were all shocked that suddenly the dinner would not be taken care of. They claimed that they never said they would be taking care of the dinner and even went as far as calling security to watch all of us to ensure the bill would be paid. Horrible customer service and very hostile manager. Lied to us about a wonderful dinner to make up for their wrongs. Very disrespectful calling security on us when we were not hostile towards the staff. I would highly recommended you not eat at this establishment. Not worth your time or money. They ruined our night.

afyAIWEiJdYVluNnhN_FrA.text: The service at HEXX was amazing!! Cece was a great server and kept the food and mimosas coming. This is a must for any visit/brunch in Vegas. Request Cece if you can!

Jk-vMg5n7tk1D561UpRw7A.text: Lovely times had at the HEXX.  Our server Sean with assistant Josh were amazing!  Personable, outgoing and a joy to be around.  Will come back for the service and of course the bloody mary's - especially the one with the cheese on top.

5AjAfbEn9zmvUj82tHLsAQ.text: Adorable patio with a great view and delicious food! Went with my family and was very well taken care of by Alex and Sean. Will definitely go back next time I'm in Vegas.

mnJFIb3hd1lB0LiGBh90Mw.text: This place was very nice but the food taste freezer food, you can taste and smells the refrigerator form the food specially hamburgers. I recommend do not order foods, there are many more restaurants in vegas to go.

PpAUt11gOyC6FcmAAJyNrA.text: Alright. Real late on my review. But I had a GroupOn. Went here on a Saturday night. Thought I would be underdressed as I had on a pair of basketball shirts at 930pm at night. But the ladies at the door said no worries. I grabbed a seat at the quiet bar, and had a great meal!

aN90NdoKKUW8fHcRRwxgDQ.text: Loved it! Our server was so nice even though her manager was super annoying :)  The food was good, and we actually had a nice meal despite that it was 1:00 am

HeOhoH2zn1N1ej2DzmHV3g.text: ..nice interior..very chill and nice for lunch..our server maria is really cool and nice..my sister uber loves their tomato bisque..i like the maryland crabcakes...chicken waffles and the ribeye is good too...servings are huge..good for sharing..

bYZbe1xcO7dXliKcXT4O-Q.text: Hexx is a great new restaurant situated in front of the Paris Hotel & Casino, directly on the Las Vegas Strip. It's a beautiful space with an even better patio. I highly recommend enjoying the outdoor seating as it provides for some amazing people watching and a beautiful view of the Bellagio fountains.   The menu is delicious, approachable, while still being creative. Everyone from the hostess to the management was great too. The General Manager stopped by our table; he was extremely nice and hospitable. Our server was super knowledgeable and attentive without being intrusive. She was eager to answer all of our questions and recommended some tasty cocktails. The Potions are fantastic and the wine list is extensive.   We can't wait to return for more cocktails and to try their "bean to bar"chocolate. Thanks again to Michael and the Hexx staff!

a1bqSKtRolDi1i1brvI8iQ.text: Poor star for the front desk staff, they are lazy n a bit racist. They made us wait n not text us until we finally had to go back check with them. Good thing the staff at the table was really good and 3stars for food.

B7im6pTpkL7WUaq81xqrLQ.text: Came all the way from LA for my birthday in September and this place was a MUST again... Ya'll need that apple pie back though. Still bomb.

gQLNrlZR7MBT6Q7WA3WwTA.text: I had an awesome experience at Hexx. The customer service was excellent!!!!!  Our waitress Tracee was amazing.....the mimosas were amazing!!!!.. Patrick was awesome too! I came here for brunch and the food was delicious. You should consider to dine here if you visit the Vegas strip..

Vo_i_4SOsMZ4zPh9H_vN9A.text: HEXX was a solid spot to have some great Bloody Marys and awesome breakfast. Great views and great service. Sean and Bobby were a dynamic duo and were super friendly and helpful. Also the price wasn't outrageous (for the strip). Totally recommend this place for brunch and starting your day.

UKmujhYtXSZtenFfncaynw.text: Such a great brunch spot! Sean was our server and made our experience exceptional. Very attentive and great personality. Would ask for him again! The food was amazing and the bottomless mimosas did not disappoint. Will be returning next trip.

vrjE9hsZksKHmFbLw3UYTA.text: AMAZING BREAKFAST MENU!!!! It was an awesome experience and we had a great server named Sean. Very quick service and Sean was on top of it! Got our meal quick and had a great time. The food tasted great and we will definitely be back because of the service!

2v6Qr_ZD1ig09IKvx3LS4Q.text: My wife and I were in the mood for a delicious brunch and discovers Hexx Kitchen while walking down the strip. We asked to be seated outside the 3-4 waiters outside failed to notice us and we didn't even get asked for a glass of water for 10 Minutes. This lead to us to change our seating arrangement and we moved inside WHERE WE HAD THE BEST WAITRESS EVER MISS MAGGIE!!!!!!! She made our experience wonderful after an unpleasant start. GREATEST WAITRESS IN VEGAS. Now about the food it was AMAZING! We had the chicken and waffles and steak and eggs they both were cooked to perfection and the Bottomless Mimosas were spot on. Definitely the best brunch spot in Las Vegas. If you get the chance stop by, ask for Maggie she will make your brunch even better with her amazing personality and great conversation.

dQ-A_r1Kq1hYRJW3RUuEEA.text: I came here with family to get alcohol. We were told that we couldn't sit in the outdoor tables and only get drinks. This is a bar, we were paying customers. Meanwhile, three were almost no tables with people seated.

DbLbvOGJLG4U8aye0w1saQ.text: Had the most sweetest and engaging server named Steven , he was so Awesome and such a pleasure to sit with !!! The food was delicious the drinks were awesome and the server was on top of it!! Can't wait to come back and ask for Steven

WFsZAESbnbBvqjy0_R0pvw.text: Our food was delicious and Teddy was fabulous !! Our water glasses were never empty and we had a great experience !  We will definitely be back :) thank you Teddy and Hermes!

YmKtTz0I-AXC4Dp4vlw9mQ.text: The food and service here are excellent.  Denise G. went above and beyond the call of duty by getting us a steak before 4 pm (the time they begin serving steak).

IQabxnhUSvu1f2Gq0witYA.text: In Vegas there are so many great places to eat, but this place was a True stand out. Really awesome setting, great views to the Bellagio fountain, great food, and service.  Everything here is just gorgeous. It was so hard to pick out a food item as everything on the menu, and everything that went past, looked awesome. Our service was prompt and attentive without being pushy or rushing us, as well as being helpful with the menu for some dietary concerns. I think this is an absolute go-to in Vegas.

mypMGsYxeeXowFJXushfvQ.text: This is not my first but second time eating here and ugh i cannot tell you how delicious this place is. Everything is prepared so fresh polite staff. And great cooks!  They haven't failed me yet. Thanks for such great experience and meals!

JEF7O51-Ay5dFq4DGvYOGA.text: If you go to this place this please get the chicken and waffles! Wow it was amazing !!! But not as good as the service giving by Apolo! Please ask for him !!! I will absolutely come back because of the service!!

0Axw3VABUbrsxJD75p0-Fw.text: Amazing food & great service! Even tho it was busy and my table was outside, I never felt the hustle & bustle. It was a comfortable setting. I never had to ask for anything, that's how great the service was. Our server was very attentive ( even tho it was a full house) . I had the prime rib, it like melted in my mouth. That's how juicy and fine the texture was. Huge serving, so be prepared to take it to go. I also ordered the HEXX Cauldron which was delicious! I'm so glad my sister & I were warned to take our time drinking it, you can't taste the alcohol so it definitely creeps up on you. Plus it's served in this cool champagne colored disco ball. Plenty to share!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime Rib 16 oz

smFSBpYG9FN3shxFmeH55Q.text: Wow what a huge space they have!! The hostess desk is actually on the Las Vegas Blvd. side, we came in from Paris hotel and were sent back there. We were seated within 10 minutes but got to sit at the bar and order some drinks. Yes it was breakfast. Their special bloody Mary with the crab and shrimp looked amazing! Our server was very attentive, the view and people watching added to the ambience.   I ordered the Benedict, we also tried the chilaquiles and an omelet. All very delicious!  I would come back again, we normally go to Mon Ami Gabi but didn't feel like waiting!

04E0HcZ3FXKhxCTIjrzQZA.text: Reservations: I made reservations here weeks or months in advance for my anniversary weekend trip to Las Vegas with my husband. I even updated my reservation on the day of to be pushed back half an hour to accommodate our schedule, and there was no problem via the OpenTable app.   Getting there: It's inside the Paris Hotel and Casino. There are some signs pointing to the various establishments inside, but we were still a bit confused/lost for the first five minutes. We checked in at the front desk and were instructed to walk down the hallway to the other side of the restaurant to be seated. We simply followed the party in front of us, toward where the crowd of people and the noise seemed to be originating. Some signs leading the way would have been helpful. The restaurant is actually Alexxa's, since we got a menu for Alexxa's when we sat down. The entrance to Alexxa's is accessible from the main strip boulevard.  Seating: As we arrived at the entrance area to Alexxa's from the front desk of Hexx, a hostess was calling my name from the reservation. Fortunately, I heard her and saw her looking for me, so I quickly walked up to her and identified myself. There were A LOT of other parties waiting to be seated, most likely without reservations. So, to reiterate, make a reservation to avoid the wait. We were seated in the patio area, but not right next to the railing, so this was nice for people watching without the people watching us back as they passed. There was easy access to take unobstructed photos of the Bellagio and the Strip.   Food: I ordered the chilaquiles and my husband ordered the meat omelet. He also ordered the blueberry mule. The blueberry mule was delicious! I should get into mules more.  I liked the chilaquiles, but as other reviewers have noted, the tortilla chips were indeed soft or soggy. Perhaps it's meant to be that way. My husband loved his meat omelet, and raved about the potatoes so much that I stole half of them. My chilaquiles were a bit spicy, so he let me have half his biscuit, which came with soft butter and strawberry jam.    Service: Our waiter was good and checked in on us twice after our food was delivered. It took a while after our plates were cleared to get our check, and that was only because he was preparing our complimentary chocolate ice cream cupcake to celebrate our anniversary. I was actually a bit annoyed with how slow the service seemed to be until he arrived with our dessert. We were very thankful for this kind gesture.   Payment: Quick and easy.   Overall: I recommend this place for brunch. Make reservations and make sure you have plenty of time to enjoy your meal, as service can be slow.

mklg6NVKm4BKom5KL8ICgg.text: This is a very nice place. The food is good and the location is awesome. This was our second visit and the quality of food stood out again. Our waitress Jasmine was knowledgeable and very attentive. We will be back!

R1xhUL9aw17DZMpvDeXC1w.text: They have a groupon for this place.   Pretty good for brunch on the strip, I got the eggs benedict. It was ok, I think I would pick something else next time. Everyone's meals looked bomb.  I really like the ambiance of this place. It's very open, and you can see the bellagio fountain across the street.  Service was great.

-ofJlPhaC5Z2pUjKzQTpkw.text: Great place to hang out for brunch and people watch! The service was amazing. Definitely sit in Apolo's section. He will absolutely take care if you.  Such a great way to send our last two hours in Vegas. We will definitely be back!!!   Thank you Apolo for sending us home with a bang!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

c1SI5P4N4NBEdG7cQQWZ2g.text: If you're in Vegas, awake, and able to go to happy hour, I'd definitely recommend Hexx! They have a great Happy hour drink menu from 2-6pm. It was perfect because we had just arrived in Vegas and checked into our hotel and wanted something to drink and eat.   The drink prices were great and there were still a lot of choices! You just have to sit at the bar for happy hours, so you can't sit outside. You also only can order food from the starters and pizzas, but food is 20% off! I loved the two drinks I got: the blueberry cocktail and the bartender's infusion. Both were extremely fancy cocktails I wouldn't usually expect at happy hour!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

A7dQwUfVvlLygR3qb6_-qw.text: Had a great brunch at Hexx with great food and outside patio! Server Apollo was great made you feel like his best friend! Great service great outside patio and great food !

0nMss3lvncJFZKVBir_9Og.text: We loved it here sooooo much our waiter JJ was AMAZINGGGGG WE LOVE HIM PLEASE UNDERSTAND THIS. The entire wait staff was amazing they were all great every single one of them, from the bus boy to the guy refilling our mimosas. I saw the reviews we took a risk and wow. The food portion sizes are good too filling I didn't even finish my food.   I'm Vegetarian and I was able to eat the veggie burger with the black bean and quinoa is AMAZING.   The only reason why I gave a 4 instead of five stars is honestly became the hostesses weren't very warm Or welcoming. Everything else was great.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

4aYVqovdCJW1KC-ilgSC0Q.text: Three stars for CNF FEE which is a unnecessary fee by the hotel of 4.9%. The menu is more like $$$. We came early so there was no wait to get seated. The service was good. The wait between getting our drink orders then our food orders then getting our food took longer than I would hope.   Food wise: their grilled chicken from the kids menu was good! Needed some salt but the texture was perfect.  Chicken and waffles was great! The chicken was moist. It was a just a bit too expensive - $24. I had the steak and eggs. It was just that. Nothing worth mentioning besides it was $25. We had two other people on our party and they loved their food. One got Hexx benedict and another got the farm fresh eggs. Everyone said they would come back. I would love to come back to try something else.

3V7FhHCPO4q-AEa-UCwPhQ.text: I have had excellent food here three times.  Service is always very good.  I love sitting outside to people watch, but inside is cozy.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

i4D3lactxp7nLzkYPgVTXQ.text: Great atmosphere, food, and service with nice views of the strip if you sit outside. We sat outside for brunch and Bellagio was across the street. I didn't have bottomless mimosas, but I hear lots of people come for that. My friend came for dinner and said their crab cakes were amazing. Definitely would come back again!

Gv0POPlShmO6x9_dzcWTrg.text: Really good and lots of food!! My husband got Mussels and scallops and we couldn't believe how much seafood it was for the price! The vegetable pizza was also amazing! It had a butternut squash sauce instead of red sauce, which made it unique and delicious.
