4NQvcbcMaO8kFx8cZwiCWw.text: I came here during my Presidents' Day weekend stay. I wanted to originally try burgr, which was located near by but only because the wait was over an hour, I decided to walk next door and try something with less of a wait so my son did not have to wait any longer for dinner.  Well I read reviews on Yelp, and I originally only saw two stars. I was worried but I gave it a shot. Unfortunately, to my dismay , the Yelp reviews were rather accurate. I ordered the margarita pizza, and it was just horrible! I had to return it to get a plain Cesar salad, only because I was scared to try anything else.   My boyfriend ordered the short rib dish. You would think that this would be amazing. We have tried this dish on various occasions at different restaurants, being that it's on of my boyfriends favorites! Unfortunately this location did not nail the dish.  it was possibly the horse radish that was included in the Brussels sprouts that turned him away from giving this dish any good review.   My son probably ordered the most normal and decent dish. The hamburger. Plain and simple and you cannot mess it up right ? Yet , my 6 year old didn't really pick on the fries . What 6year old doesn't like French fries? Well mine does on a regular basis , although this place had the coldest and grossest French fries I ever had .   Last disappointment ? CNF fee added at the end of your receipt. Other yelpers have discussed this in their review. And it's True folks ! It exists and it's annoying !  never again will I come back here.

-v0W_KNaiTTKD5oOPpnC8A.text: Food was seriously the most flavorless food I've ever eaten. I had to check to make sure I was even eating and i was eating eggs Benedict. FV0RPQ5VkjMAnof47bc9oQ.text: Had an awesome lunch!   The hostess immediately made it great by winning over my older son...he wanted to eat inside when the rest wanted to eat out.  She suggested a table outside, right next to the inside where he could feel the air conditioning by his specially chosen seat.  By the time we sat down he was smiling and feeling very cool.  Not easy to win over a 9-year old! The food?  Excellent!!  I had the salmon, my husband had the jambalaya  (spicy, but tasty), and the boys shared a pepperoni pizza.  Everyone was impressed with their lunches. Our waiter was friendly and helpful with suggestions. All around a great lunch!  Highly recommend!

Y95LsD1verGJJx8nHCj7vg.text: We stopped for breakfast. Food was great! Perfect location for people watching. Nice selection on menu for either breakfast or lunch items. We both had omelets and left satisfied. Didn't disappoint considering it's a bit touristy.

-EMoCS9edrX4KsXNO881xw.text: For the prices this is one of the best values for steak I've had in Vegas. Ribeye with the blue cheese crust was cooked to perfection.  Had awesome spinach dip starter. Wife had salad and waiter suggested adding a protein which worked out great! Hazelnut pudding was amazing. Service outstanding.  I will return. Want to go back to try breakfast.

7QqoH9_-tooYt0tHNN-62A.text: Came here based on my friends recommendation since she said it was so amazing. We sat outside which was great since we had a great view of the Bellagio fountains :) Food took a bit to come out. We got the cheesy bread which was pretty buttery and delish. My friend and I both got the surf and turf sliders which came with fries.  When it came out I was pretty disappointed by the portion size and the look of the sliders. The menu boasted that it had lobster and short rib meat in the sliders. All I got was two sliders with lots of short rib meat and small bit of lobster meat. It was good but a bit dry. The fries were good at least. Overall not wowing for me at all :/. The sliders were pretty expensive too which I thought it wasn't worth it. Perhaps if I ordered something else it would have been better food experience.

4Qk_o1C3-z8rw5jvd87J6Q.text: Had the breakfast croissant.  It was fresh and light. Perfect place for brunch with a view of the fountains directly across the street. Service was great.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast croissant and chicken and waffles

ZGbv_a3WAwZmu_zs2hJwvA.text: Did not have a great experience our first time at HEXX this last weekend.  We were celebrating a friend's birthday and went there for brunch with bottomless mimosas etc.  We were seated in huge square room that was very densely packed with tables, and the noise in there was deafening.  A room like that would have been crazy loud as is with so many tables, but they pump in ultra loud club music over the top.  I might sound like a grumpy old timer complaining about the noise, but I measured it with the NIOSH app on my phone and got sustained readings above 90 decibels!  That is loud enough to cause permanent hearing damage in as little as an hour.  I feel bad for the poor employees, although some of them will likely have winning lawsuits against HEXX for not providing the required hearing protection for employees in an industrial noise level environment.  Aside from the noise, the food was solid but the service was not great.  It took forever (20+ minutes sitting on empty) to get refills on coffee / mimosas, which should be easy for them to top off regularly.    Also be advised that they tack on a 4.875% "concession" fee to every bill.  I (and everyone else on the planet) hates this practice that is becoming more common all the time in Vegas.  Just put the real price on the menu instead of being deceptive about it.  I won't be back to HEXX unless I hear they have made some real improvements to the experience.

fWEJU3aw0b1USwXWVxI0Ow.text: I always make sure I come here when I am in Las Vegas! Their indoor seating area is really nice and clean, and big enough for parties. They also have outdoor seating with a nice view of the Las Vegas Strip! Their brunch menu has a lot to offer and almost everything is delicious. + they have bottomless mimosa which they constantly refill! You won't be disappointed!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottomless Mimosa with a view of the Strip

iNVLTEEvOLw37PtteCdiWA.text: If I could give it more than 5 stars I absolutely would!  Where to start?  Patio seating with a perfect on the strip view.  Bottomless mimosas. (So freaking good)  Their breakfast potatoes are clutch. Cooked to perfection. Right amount of crisp and moisture.  Pancakes were wonderful.  The bacon was fried just right.  Atmosphere is diverse and the service is fantastic.   Highly recommend.

cypea1iQuQoIJiDYCickYg.text: Had a really great experience here. We came from brunch and were able to get a great seat on the railing perfect for taking in the view of the Bellagio and people watching on the street. We did the unless mimosa's with our food and the server was very on top of it! Never had to ask for a refill she was coming and topping them off before we had even finished! Best of all was the breakfast pizza, I had never seen or heard of such a thing so I was very hesitant. I LOVED it, had great flavor and they didnt skimp on the toppings at all. Overall very pleased with the whole experince

lthDfWHkgNRq7t5nte4q6Q.text: My first visit to Hexx was for brunch and bottomless mimosas...hexx is a-ok with me...  Hexx Service & ambiance: Booked a 12 PM reso on open table for Sunday brunch, party of 3.  I walked in at 11:45 AM and Hexx was packed af with tourists and locals as well.  The hostess table had our reservation and we were seated immediately.  Our server was fantastic as she always kept our waters and mimosas fresh during our day drinking at Hexx.  Other servers had no issues with filling up the mimosas as well.  Considering how packed Hexx was, I was really impressed with how fast our dishes made it to the table.  Contemporary decor, an attractive full service bar and outdoor seating make for a very nice dining area.  There's plenty of tables and booths to seats hundred(s?) of diners.  Hexx brunch cuisine:  We started with the cheesey bread as a shared appetizer and it was delish.  Cheesey greatness with warmed carbs was a hit with us.  My meat omelette came out a little dry and there was minimal cheese but packed with bacon, chicken, sausage and pork as promised on the menu.  If I were to guess, the omelette was waiting too long on the counter to be served.  The rest of the crew mentioned their dishes were ok:  Croissant sandwich and the po boy sandwich.  We are so spoiled with Vegas being a foodie city, it creates tremendous pressure for Strip restos.  Well, the service was amazing and  but the brunch dishes were just mediocre at premium strip prices.  The wonderful staff and service will bring me back and hopefully I'll run into better luck with the cuisine.  Cheers!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mwY3nZ0GX63E6KSu8zaTlw.text: We ate here as soon as we landed. We were seated immediately and our waitress was incredibly sweet. She asked us if we were just getting here and gave us a whole list of recommendations to go to.  We came here about 10:30 and the restaurant was about 25% at capacity and when we left it was at 60%.   The restaurant is open air so it was a little cold inside but otherwise the atmosphere is nice. They have a variety of items for brunch and I got one of their most popular the chicken and waffles.   The chicken was crispy and the waffle was fluffy like cake. It was a good contrast of savory and sweet. It was a big portion as well so if your really hungry this would fill you up.   It can get busier during the day, but they offer reservations on open table. I would recommend get one to avoid long wait times.

They were extremely accommodating considering I do not eat meat.   Would certainly recommend this place for breakfast on the strip. Clean, nice scenery of the strip and fountain across the street, and swift service.

kBinWBJ3g45AGZsKSWqtPA.text: Solid place with good food and good vibes! Restaurant is really spacious so it's good for date night, a small group of friends or a larger party! -KO08fUJ2re3iMMEylFNIg.text: Went to Hexx yesterday morning for brunch. While the food was good, service was awful. We saw our waitress in frequently and she never listened only tried to rush us out. I ordered bottomless mimosas which showed up at the same time as our brunch. Her only saving grace was Antonio who was assisting her. He was awesome, friendly, and helpful and should really replace her without a doubt.

g9PEJOdDsu_PWtvvkJB0ag.text: The best brunch I have ever had in my life! Breakfast pizza and sticky bun are a MUST. Savory and great to share. I dreaaaaaaaammm about that sticky bun to this day.....  Would go with unlimited mimosas over the bloody Mary pitcher for a better deal. However, bloody Mary was accompanied with shrimp, veggies, beef jerky, olives, cheese, etc. and did not disappoint.  Corn beef hash was decent going off memory. Very modern and bright atmosphere. Great service.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bloody Mary Pitcher

FsomgEfwbSPxq6PBlmKKOw.text: During, the SUMMER this place is BUSY! I always, avoid crazy busy places in Vegas. I love the WINTER here! It was a perfect time to stop by and use my GROUPON! I was extremely excited for it!   I was soooo, excited I totally, forgot to take a picture of the menu. I was caught up with YELP and reviewing comments and pictures about the food. Who else does this?   I was using good ok' YELP to order my food!Thanks, to ya'll for taking pictures. I ordered the Breakfast Croissant with the MOST AMAZING potatoes! Every bit I took, I was like: Mmmmmmm!!!  You walk in and it has a "hotel vibe" decor feeling. Then you look around and the art on the walls are eccentric and cool looking  As I reviewed more YELP REVIEWS...Why didn't I ever see anything on the customer service? I was not impressed. When you walk in there's three blond hair ladies who didn't have a warm greeting. I was trying to conversation saying how cool the decor was and she kept to herself.  We sat down and were approached by a man who served us water and had great customer service. It's too bad I didn't get his name because, he was pretty epic and welcoming! I hope he runs the place soon! The world needs more people like that guy!   My poor review is based on how the customer service was from when we walked in - and how our service was when we ordered our food! This place is, "EXTRA" the service should be too! You pay $100 and up to fine-dine here! I would expect the service to be grand... you pay for what you get, right? Especially, since the restaurant is on the strip!  We clearly, stated it was our first time here!A few suggestions other than, "chilaquiles and croissant are good"... would be nice! I placed my order and so, did my other 4 guest. We also, ordered a dry ice drink that comes in the pitcher. Later, I noticed a large party and they ordered the coolest drink, "A DISCO BALL"!!!  My eyes lit up!!! I was like, "Wait, a freakin' minute... why was this not suggested to us???" I was bummed!!! We come from California to dine in pretty cool spots in Vegas! The service was mediocre! I was not impressed with the customer service at all! Next, time I'll be joining a buffet or dine at a Mexican restaurant where the service is awesome!  Especially, because this spot is on the strip-the customer service should be a great experience! Also, we were not able to take our plastic pitcher home. Our drink was $35!  A place like this should've allowed me even to pay extra for it! The worse part was, not allowing us to use our Groupon for separate bills. It was clear we weren't paying together and we were separate parties. This was horrible!   Be careful when you come here! If you don't care about service or Groupon-then go for it!

rjdKeLEu2iAvc8U3ihRlkw.text: We went to Hexx for breakfast.  Everything we ordered was delicious.    If I would  have any critique for Hexx, the pancake was a little tough (carrot cake), the egg (chiliquiles) was overcooked, and the waffle (chicken and waffle) was soft.  If I'm paying $25 for chicken and waffle, I'm expecting the waffle to be a little crunchy - not soft/soggy.  Service was mediocre.  Noticed that the server disappears every once in a while even though there were only 5-6 parties dining with them.  Bottom line, food is good, cost -  fair to expensive, ambiance/view is good, service is fair.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffle
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chiliquilea
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll waffle

-DFyhbWvllGbZIL0nwWGsA.text: We ventured to Hexx on a Friday with 12:30 p.m. reservations. We were so glad we had them as they were really busy. Despite arriving early, we were quickly sat in the main dining room. We were offered the option to eat outside but it was warm and windy. They have the giant windows / doors so it's still open air seating, but it felt cooler inside. This restaurant faces the Bellagio Fountains so the view is amazing.   We got two appetizers - calamari and garlic bread. Both were wonderful. The garlic bread is unique that it's a pull apart bread. We wanted more immediately.  My fiance got the Hexx Benedict and the Cinnaroll waffle. I went with the Chicken and Waffles. The other couple with us got the protein breakfast option.   They also do bottomless mimosas for $20 a person. It felt pricey with four of us but they were poured well and we definitely got our money's worth. We also shared one of their really cool potion drinks that have dry ice to give a smoking effect. I could of skipped the drink. It's cool, but it's a whopping $38 per drink.   The foods was hands down amazing. We enjoyed each bite and the table unanimously agreed the Hexx Benedict was the best dish. It's served over potatoes for a unique twist, and the layers of flavor shines through. I kept taking bites as my fiance ate his waffle. Ha! I really enjoyed my chicken and waffles. Perfectly cooked chicken that wasn't heavily breaded and a light, fluffy waffle. The protein combo looked good and was a nice balance to the heavy appetizers. The couple we were with really enjoyed it.   We skipped desert as we were full. Out tab was around $289, but we had five entrees (the cinnamon waffle counts as one), two appetizers, a potion drink, and four bottomless mimosas so it balances out.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Potion
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Calamari and veggies.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict

x7z_On10UNaulvRMhqSi0g.text: I really enjoyed the food I ordered and the friendliness of the waiter.  I ordered Shrimp Limone and it was soooo good.  We were celebrating my friend's birthday there and they had a special ice cream cupcake for her.  It was nice.

EiUzBoGSW28hRTO3X8OYAQ.text: It is rare to see a restaurant with this level of customer service! The wait staff was highly attentive and friendly, constantly checking on our table and filling waters. We were very impressed.   The food was pretty tasty, as well! I had the Hexx Benedict, which was served over yummy potatoes. A couple others had the chicken and waffles, which had great fried chicken but the waffle lacked crispness and flavor.   The space is also very large, so good for groups, and they have outdoor seating. Will be back next time I'm in LV!

0tcDRjeUbLc7-_0t8L7h4Q.text: Omg te food is amazing tou cant go wrong! Shrimp ceviche is so tasty. Pours are good the view watching Bellagio fountains is 1st class

iD1_NA4QvixYZYPsTjLEYQ.text: A True delight! This is people-watching heaven. Great cocktails that don't skimp, and affordable brunch items that won't disappoint. Personally I loved the bottomless mimosas and French toast with fruit. Side of bacon was worth it!

XAvLiO78DIk8t_omO1g5TQ.text: The food was ok. My fiance and I have been wanting to check this place out. It's in Paris hotel right on the strip in front of Bellagio. We went for dinner last night and it wasn't too busy. We got seated right away. However or waiter was horrible. He came took our drink order then came back and took our food order. He never checked on us. The bus boy was actually good, kept bringing us water and even asked us everything was ok, we thought he became our new waiter. We had to ask him for the bill and 20 minutes later our waiter brings the bill. We asked for the manager and he took an additional 20 minutes. I could only imagine if it was on the weekend how unpleasant it would be. Very disappointing, first and last time going here.

2izGn7Qj67HW9f_CMpi0lQ.text: Been here for both Dinner and Breakfast, and both times were pretty great. Most recently I went for breakfast/brunch!  Here are the highlights: 1. Bottomless Mimosas = because who doesn't love these!?!?! $24 for the bottomless option, and they come by to fill you up often, which was nice.  2. The Sticky Bun = do yourself a favor and order this. The bun itself is sweet and fluffy, and the cream cheese frosting is decadent and pairs perfectly on top. It's a heavy dish, so plan on sharing. 3. The Chilaquiles = GET THIS! I love me a good chilaquiles, especially after a night out. The chips were the right level of crispiness, and the dish has a nice amount of extras (guac/salsa/sour cream) without being too messy. Also they slice up the jalapenos nice and thin, but they still gave off some heat. I definitely recommend this dish!  The only real issue I had was with the wait. I'm not crazy, I know you're going to wait for a restaurant in Vegas on the weekend, but we were initially told 15 minutes and it took well over half an hour to get us seated... so I just wish they would be more conservative with their estimates, since nobody loves to wait.   Stay Cheerful ;)

a0mtKpsKVG5nDlZcMM1QTQ.text: 24 hour restaurant located inside the Paris Casino on the Strip.  We came here for brunch on a Friday. I would recommend making a reservation because it was packed. The restaurant offers patio seating but it is first come first serve. The patio overlooks the strip.  The restaurant offers bottomless mimosas everyday for under $25 a person. The waitstaff never let our glasses get empty.   The menu had lunch and brunch options. It was reasonably priced for the strip.  The inside of the restaurant had a DJ playing. He was playing everything from 70s to Britney. Our group loved it.  The waitstaff was super friendly and gave our large group excellent service. This is my new brunch bottomless mimosa strip spot.

qP5ZvzSqtRbV0r7A0DiVtw.text: Very good business casual dining, attached to Paris hotel. Extremely helpful waiter explaining menu and offering good suggestions. Creme brulee desert was very good, I would highly recommend.

XBR5GpvfyG6VUgnPwkeORg.text: Amazing food and environment! All employees are well dressed and are very polite/well mannered. Restaurant is super clean and has a great ambiance. Food was absolutely delicious! I had the Hexx Benedict and it came with THE BEST breakfast potatoes I have ever eaten! The eggs were cooked to perfection! Great place overall!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict

FeijhJGcGSTh22K_Acsq2A.text: Last night was my first time visiting Hexx for dinner. AMAZING experience from start to finish! Only had to wait 15 minutes for a table outside. It was my fathers 60th birthday, and our server Jasmine didn't disappoint! Great food suggestions, and she ended our dinner by surprising Dad with an adorable birthday dessert, candle and all. I'll be back very soon, and will be requesting Jasmine as my waitress!! THANK YOU FOR MAKING MY DAD'S BIRTHDAY ONE TO REMEMBER!

zILfj2_FYyi5Y22vTPihZA.text: FANTASTIC! With so many options in vegas, you need some help finding the ones worth your time. This is WORTH YOUR TIME!  The ambiance is great. When we sat down, the chairs were odd. Guess what? Two minutes later they were super comfy and perfect.   The food: get the CHEESY GARLIC BREAD! There's a hint of lemon, which you might not expect, but it makes the whole thing just sing.   You can never go wrong with a chopped salad and this was no exception. Anything with hearts of palm has me at hello.   Since there were 4 of us, we all got different entrees and each one was yummier that the others. Oh! And get the CHICKEN! We don't order chicken at restaurants -until now! I will go back for this. (And while the mashed potatoes are perfect, do yourself a favor and sub them out for the RISOTTO!) the SHORT RIB fell apart as it should, the SALMON was buttery and sumptuous and the CRAB CAKE ?!? HUGE!   Dessert and coffee were no slouches either. But none of it held a candle to our server, Jasmin. She took a great experience and made it extraordinary! Her recommendations were on point and her friendliness made us want her to sit down to join us. ASK FOR JASMIN!   We didn't take food pics because we were so busy eating! But the iconic pic on the wall had all of us obsessed! Go check this place out!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MQpSLTPwIayxGIXrk9CVhg.text: From the outside, this place looks like the most hoppin' non buffet brunch place on the strip. but don't let that deceive you.  Price: About $15-20 per dish. Small portions  Food:  Corned beef hash $18: I would not order this again. Too much hollandaise sauce and a pip squeak amount of beef. This dish was TINY... probably the size of my palm.  Carrot Cake Pancakes $13: This was pretty good as I am a HUGE carrot cake fan. The pancakes were not as fluffy as I had hoped and came out to be a little dry.   Drinks: bottomless mimosas until 3pm?  Service: SLOWWW. I had to flag down my waitress every time I needed her. Food took greater than 30 minutes from ordering to come out.  Honestly, I'm looking elsewhere for brunch... but don't forget to check in for free dessert!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned beef hash super small

wHAUqM2xKGKVUF5gy8yP_w.text: Great location pasta amazing!! Thanks Allexia for the great service. I just wish the brownie wasn't hard the ice cream was great!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pasta was amazing!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Desert was ok brownie was hard

I8G_gSW7riDwJylOTUD9Bw.text: Came here to try something fresh and new while in Vegas. I rather enjoyed my selection. Portion sizes are kind of large so be ready to eat.  My mother enjoyed her pancakes as well as soft cooked eggs.   My sister on the hand, had difficulty with the chef making soft eggs. For some reason the chef stated that this wasnt an option with an omelette. But hey, I rather enjoyed my meal.   Oh and mimosas are delicious as well. I will definitely be returning to try other options.

6ulGJVSUFeRYnrKo37yAwg.text: Worst carbonara pizza  Very dry. A lot of scrambled eggs. The waitress even said "it does look like more egg than normal" and did nothing.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carbonara pizza

dwc1fz7OE_OZb9G7AFfV0g.text: Always wanted to have brunch here when in Vegas, but never has the chance to. Finally tried it because my family had no idea what to eat when we landed.   We shared the chicken n waffles, corned beef hash, and the eggs benny. We didn't want to stuff ourselves since we planned on eating at the buffet later.   The food was delicious! The chicken was juicy, the waffle was crispy, the hollandaise on the Benny was creamy, and the hash was bombbb!!  Totally would go back again.

j1A7ozubNTIkF754SLe6jQ.text: Yummm!! Went for brunch - all you can drink mimosas! They are very generous with their mimosas and I loved it! The staff was very friendly. We ate outside on the patio (our request), it was chilly but they keep it comfortable with heaters. We started with Baked Spinach Dip as an appetizer. We asked the waiter for recommendations on main dishes and she suggested the Breakfast Pizza. Something new for me so I tried it. My friend got the Breakfast Croissant. Both were very delicious!! I hope to visit when I return to Vegas! Menu selections are not massive which makes it easier in my opinion to pick something you want to eat.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sausage &amp; Egg Pizza  Breakfast Croissant
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Baked Spinach Dip
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mimosa

O1cZKkyJ80NIqtXViDapxA.text: Great breakfast after a crazy Vegas night. Tasty food, reasonable prices, and great people watching.

DLO-sJf7CpgL7vlL7PIjZw.text: A casual eatery, open 24/7, and we went for a yummy brunch. If it's super busy, just take a seat at the bar and dine there. Lots of classic breakfast/brunch dishes. The bartender was super friendly! Loved the potatoes that came with the egg dishes and the chicken sausage was super yummy!

y0UDmi00ngsKQWDqlEUR5Q.text: There are so many good things and bad things going for Hexx. Let's start with the good. You have a wonderful view of the Bellagio fountains and strip with the outdoor seating. Check-in with yelp and get yourself a free dessert. They limit this 1 per table do that is the bad thing. My friend and I are both yelpers but they wouldn't accommodate both of us checking in on yelp. They have brunch 7 days a week. Nuff said. Bottomless mimosas (til 2 pm) and a colossal Bloody Mary served in a pitcher.   The service started out pretty good. Besides the fact that  the hostess at the hostess stand stood there instead of helping the other hostess seat people. We waited for about 10 minutes before we were seated even though there were tables clearly open. I'm guessing it's because that don't have enough servers. I ended up ordering the Hexx Benny. Absolutely no regrets on this. My friend ordered the same and also ordered a Bloody Mary. The food came out before the Bloody Mary did. I brought it up to our server because I'm guessing he forgot. The base of the Benny was made with scalloped potatoes. Layered with Canadian bacon, poached eggs, asparagus and hollandaise. Those potatoes stole the show in my opinion. Such a great switch up on your typical eggs benny. As we finish up our meals, I brought up the yelp check in offer and our waiter had to go ask if we could both use it. He comes back and said that they only allow the 1 per table. So I let my friend use hers because I was going to take it to go anyway. When our server came back I said can we have separate checks. He agreed he would bring it out. He brought the dessert, but no checks in site so I brought it up again. He brings out the check and it was 1 check instead of 2. For whatever reason, restaurants in Vegas love bringing 1 check out. So I asked him again and it wasn't until the 3rd time we got separate checks. Highly recommend the Hexx Benny, but the service here needs some work.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rassMkhuFu04vWA-cLv3_Q.text: Jason!!!  This guy, let me tell you, is a fantastic bartender! We came to Hexx on a whim when we first got into town and were so impressed that we came in again the next day based solely on his service. It was my wife's birthday that weekend and he mixed a special shot for my whole table to celebrate. It was clear to tell that he was passionate about making great drinks so I requested a drink of his choosing...he did not disappoint. The whole experience was a blast. My only regret is not making it back on my last day in town. I'll definitely be returning on my next trip to Vegas!

nULFWcepz60HM4qLERASzw.text: Enjoyed breakfast here during my Vegas trip with a few friends. I ordered the protein omelet which was incredible along with their home fries which is comparable to country potatoes but thicker and crisper potatoes. They tasted great!! Everyone at my table loved their food and raved about coming back here again next trip! Coffee was good too! This setting is elegant but comfortable. Indoor and outdoor seating. Kid friendly.

o1cPz2lEprjpeijOBMaiRA.text: Great Bloody Mary's, extra spicy double was perfect. Hexx Benedict is AMAZE. Severs actually know the menu, so don't hesitate to ask questions.

Be60sYd8vKt3hqYgFz0k2A.text: And 1 Star is being NICE . The restaraunt was pretty empty (about 5 tables of people) but the service was BEYOND slow. 3 tables went up to the bar to pay their tab because the servers were so slow. Aside from the slow service- the food was undercooked. The chicken was PINK. I sent it back To The kitchen and the waitress came back with the plate and said "Chef said the chicken breast is cooked through, but he will make you a new one"..... I immediately explained I jus needed the check, nomore food. She took about 10 minutes came back with the tab. Then we ended up Walking up to the bar to pay the tab and another couple was there waiting to pay. Horrible horrible horrible

i9nngw0vb9xdeyZCSeky1A.text: Today we were able to enjoy our Reggae Brunch with the amazing service from Jessica! We had bottomless mimosas , & Jessica was on it with those refills! Her service was amazing & she's so friendly, will definitely come back! Had the surf n turf sliders & they were good, even though it's an appetizer it came with fries so it made the perfect meal! The boyfriend had the HEXX burger & it was perfectly cooked, he really enjoyed it! Thank you Jessica & HEXX !

jfQ8k3mGQiK7u4qhGc7WFA.text: Tracee was an amazing server and she made sure we were quite content! Bottomless mimosas were on point and the food was delicious. Had a great time here!

Uc_221wFk-JngKVqHKWokA.text: Tracee was the best server for reggae brunch!! She got our morning started the right way! Hexx never disappoints!

eWRDY1kkIWRXwAFD4_EqPg.text: **Vegetarian Friendly** I ended up at this restaurant twice in a 5-day span, I had breakfast and dinner. Great atmosphere with an indoor and outdoor setting right on the strip.   Breakfast: Chilaquiles Definitely more of a brunch dish as opposed to a breakfast. The salsa and chips combo had a kick, and the toppings balanced the dish. Only downside, gotta eat it quickly so the chips don't soggy!   Appetizer: Tomato Burrata and Crispy Broccolini The burrata was very similar to a bruschetta, with a honey reduction. The honey complimented the cheese. The broccolini sounds very odd, and I'm not sure what they do to it, but it's definitely worth a try! It's a very unique flavor and a great new spin on broccoli.    Dinner: Pappardelle Pasta The pasta was incredibly fresh, and the mushrooms weren't overpowering. Dish was big enough that 2 people could share.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles

2baUvBoyE25trLIrppbhiw.text: My new favorite restaurant in Las Vegas & the best bloody mary I've ever had! The food is fresh and flavorful. Our server was super friendly and attentive. The atmosphere is bright and light and homey (I wanted it to be my living room/dining room) Although almost directly on the strip, indoor area with open air patio (we sat right next to the window)-you kinda feel more like you're in California by the ocean-its a refreshing change from a lot of the other establishments in Vegas that tend to be darker, louder and more elaborate. Definitely will be going back whenever we're in Vegas & I highly recommend you give it a try. (they also have a bar that looked cozy-I told my husband if he couldn't find me later, that thats where I'd be, sadly I never made it-but definitely will on the next trip)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. ham &amp; swiss croissant and roasted potatoes
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. best bloody mary ever
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. I want to move in.

f7p8i4AqkTTRQdo70PggyA.text: Rachel and Patrick where some of the net servers I've ever had!!! So welcoming and set on letting you have a great time! Best ever!!!!

shs3YYq2AcVwd2F6XCNAdQ.text: Here for a bachelorette party - Tracee & Ivan are amazing!!! We had the best time. Great food, even better environment! 10/10 recommend.

9H5WXPAhlLyDgSpj_myF9g.text: Went here for brunch on Saturday and were told it would be a wait of 20 to 30 minutes. We decided to try bar section to avoid waiting and found two spots at the bar end. We were greeted with friendly and fast service that lasted throughout our dining experience. No service complaints whatsoever.   Onto the menu, they had a wide variety of options available. Something for even the pickiest of eaters. While scanning the options, we came across a unique eggs benedict offering. Instead of the usual bread or biscuit offering as a base, HEXX Benedict used scalloped potatoes. I never considered this as a possibility, but don't think I can go back to normal benedict now. It was the best version of eggs benedict I have ever had. Egg cooked perfectly, potatoes were just crispy enough, and the sauce had so much flavor. Must have for fans of eggs benedict We couldn't pass up the offering of bottomless mimosas for $23. Signage out front claims this offering is available daily until 2 pm. As we got close to empty an employee will fill back up. Make sure to ask for an extra in a to-go cup for your trip around the casino or down the strip. The prices are what you'd expect from the location. Hexx has a chocolate store located next door for a variety of sweets available after a meal. Overall I would recommend this place for those visiting the strip. Can't go wrong with great food and bottemless mimosas for brunch.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Hexx Benedict (best eggs Benedict I&#39;ve ever had)

-2EoFxo_N_cbGGLslTKLTQ.text: Upon arrival I asked for an inside table and they sat me outside.  When I asked to change the table to the empty one we saw at the window, the host ignored me and placed my party in the most crowded spot in the spacious restaurant.  Overpriced for the mediocre quality of food.

Yl75Xuz3zHPNnrvgvMAIWg.text: Please take your significant other to HEXX a go with your girls! Great Drinks, Delicious food & Amazing Staff! I'll be back & send all  my friends!

60OkOLGqZJDkM1ZK1l15sw.text: We stopped by here to eat breakfast because Hash House had a 2 hour wait. The food was pretty good and service was average. I still recommend this place if you are looking for a breakfast or lunch place and walking the strip. The breakfast potatoes are incredible. Only complaint be is they didn't give me any Tabasco sauce with my breakfast.

cv7sP0AspY30tsN-1tDkog.text: TRACY AND PATRICK WERE THE BEST TEAM! they kept our mimosas full and I never reached empty! They are the best!

n0ZOSMa2FqlCGTzwKMNDaQ.text: Apollo and Billy were part of the best service I've ever had at a restaurant.  Visiting Vegas for the first time and I will be back just for these two.

qWh0Aeun852Aad2_lvJd5w.text: Best service ever! Raphael and Antonio are the dynamic duo . Our bottomless mimosa's were NEVER past half. We couldn't keep up. This was my early Mother's Day brunch from my daughter. We had a good time, great service and good food!

YrMkffBUuB1jDLc6-XVP3w.text: The worst place ever!!!!!!! Do no go there!!! Worst service ever!!!! Me and my husband went there to have brunch , I ordered a VEGETARIAN OMELETTE, my husband ordered margarita pizza, we waited 40 minuets for our orders and drinks and then when when the drinks and food finally came , I got a VEGETARIAN OMELETTE with BACON inside my omelette!!... I'm vegetarian for 16 years !!!!! If I'm ordering a vegetarian omelette like it's written in the menu, I expect it to be vegetarian!! When I called the manager and show her the bacon inside the omelette, she said she's sorry about the misunderstanding , it's not an answer to me. So me and my husband just left the restaurant upset and disappointed!!! We never come back to this place or recommend to our friends!!!

t9UN45pcCTD6J2zo_qLXbw.text: As a vegan in Vegas, I understand that not every restaurant is going to cater to special dietary needs. However, upon asking the hostess and server multiple times if there are vegan options on the menu, they kept reassuring me that there were. Finally after waiting 30 minutes for a table, I sit down to find that the only vegan option for breakfast they offer is a MIXED BERRY FRUIT BOWL for $10 USD. Ridiculous. Had to run across the street to a Starbucks to grab a bagel afterwards.   Other than that, I give 3 stars because my family had nothing but good things to say about their dishes.

Mat7pNE_2XpsUq8EINx4iA.text: I came to Hexx for brunch a few days ago and was extremely impressed by the food, decor, and especially the customer service. The hostess that seated my friends and me, Lena, was very kind, attentive, and quite humorous. She recommended mimosas and the spinach dip and we loved how fast it arrived even before our waiter came out. The experience was overall fabulous.

4YAGe8tW7b_kAcPI5rB-ug.text: Took a trip down to Las Vegas about 2 weeks ago and came across this place as we were looking for a breakfast/brunch spot.   The atmosphere of this restaurant was extremely cleanly and nice. We were seated as soon as we walked in because the restaurant space is pretty large.   The menu was very straight forward and there was quite a few delicious looking items.   There were 4 of us and we tried the following items:  1. Corned Beef Hash  - Portion was pretty small, however the dish itself was very flavorful.   2. Gravlax Benedict  - Wasn't the biggest fan of the English muffin because when it was brought out it was pretty soggy so it didn't have the right taste to it, however when removing the muffin, the rest of the ingredients were very fresh and tasty.   3 . Chilaquiles - Expected to get some crispy nachos, however there was a slight problem to food coming out soggy. So it seemed as if the nachos stood out for awhile and by the time they got to the table, they were no longer crispy.   4. Candied Bacon  - This was probably my favorite thing that I tried. Although the candied bacon wasn't extra crispy, the flavor was superb. Each bite was mouthwatering.   5. Venezuelan Milk Chocolate Cheesecake  - Definitely a very delicious cheesecake and the portion was HUGE! The caramel popcorn on the sides was the perfect touch!   Overall a decent place to dine and another plus side to it is that it's open 24/7!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TDfwXwAMrUDg55cy4MawTQ.text: Holy moly.. this is my new favorite restaurant on the strip! Love the ambience. Clean, bright, semi-casual. Sat on the inside but with the doors wide open so we had a good view of the bellagio water fountain show.   Customer service: amazing!! From the host to our server they were just perfect! I'm very indecisive so I ask a lot of questions and my server was so kind and patient with me. Love it!   Food: everything was so delicious!  Rib eye: melts in your mouth. Reasonably priced. Loved the caramelized onions and little peppers that come with it. Perfectly seasoned!  Caesar salad: I don't know what they put in the dressing but it's unlike any Caesar salad ive ever had. I'm gonna come back just for this salad!! Thin crispy bacon and crunchy croutons. Awesome!  Prime burger: made with wagyu beef. Best burger I've ever had! So good!   Hands down my fav place on the strip.   I'll be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Caesar salad, Prime Burger, Rib Eye Steak medium rare

ePJiq0QwZarJBUHUXN2X2A.text: Ate here with my fiance on Thursday night. The food was spectacular. We had the prime rib and the veal! The service was friendly and quick and the view was so nice. We will deff be back!! Oh and we had a groupon and saved $20. We come to Vegas every year and this was by far the best place to eat that we have been! Can't wait to go back and try something new!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

WIdcpk6eOujaahoJ1bTn4Q.text: Came here with my cousin to celebrate her bday. I got a hibiscus sangria and the bolognese. It was very tasty. I like the atmosphere of this restaurant and my server was very attentive and friendly. I definitely recommend this place.

lahZGPDRzgR-c2naaalzhw.text: Just WOW! We have been to LV for years and have never been here. Tried it today and the wait was very long, however worth it!!! The drinks and food were top notch. The service was stellar. Tracy was just amazing. Fun, great recommendations, danced with us, never made us feel rushed, we LOVED her!!! Ask for her for sure!!!! Excellent place for brunch! Oh and drinks...

SnsH0zi10X6VASFzHc2vJA.text: From our table in the open patio we had a great view of the Strip street actions. We started with refreshing draft local Hefeweizen beer and a playful Sebastiani Merlot. Tasty food and excellent service ensued. I loved the salmon served in a bed of delicious black quinoa & wild mushrooms. My spouse was happy with the vegetable pizza. We spilt a Hexx chopped salad (good serving size); the sweet pepper gave a nice refreshing (yet not spicy) kick to the salad of hearts of palm, artichoke and tomato.  Our dining companions liked their Caesar salad of romaine and crisp ham, and split an order of juicy, tender (their words)16 oz rib eye steak with sides of creamy mashed potato and asparagus wrapped with ham topped with a fried egg! These complemented the steak well (steaks served sans accompaniments). Kevin, our server, was superb, providing good food/drink recommendations & explanations. He's friendly and was always one step ahead anticipating our needs. He made our dinner a very pleasant experience.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ca0g-wfjb094dO0tfOIgoQ.text: A group of 6 of us showed up at 10:30am on a Saturday and put our name down.  The staff said it would be a 20 min wait and it's been an hour and 20 mins and nothing. We walked out.

bXQps3Db82W-UlDki-lwOg.text: Bottomless mimosas... Our glasses were never empty, never. We had two men at the bar (Daniel and Noel)... incredible guys! Both bald, both awesome... Daniel had us try a sample of the spicy Bloody Mary and it was DELICIOUS!! Great customer service from Mr. Daniel!! Noel, although the more serious type, always made sure our glasses were full. We weren't able to count the number of mimosas we had because of his promptness in filling them!

6jrbwWzoVQevHe4fV5TCrw.text: I've never posted any review (good or bad), in fact I had to create a user ID here just so I could post this 'review ' Last night while waiting for the elevator to head up to Beer Park I overheard one of THE MOST unprofessional rants at the Hexx host stand. I'm assuming it was between 2 managers (they had business attire on), a Hispanic female and a tall gentleman... the Hispanic female was literally yelling at the fellow ranting on and on about some servers (couldn't hear specifics) while several guests waiting to be seated watched, and the other horrified hosts stood gap mouthed watching this tirade. I must say, I feel sorry for any employee of Hexx that has to be 'managed' by that woman. Being in the service industry myself, and in management, I would fire anyone who thought that was ok to discuss management decisions not only in front of other employees but even worse in front of patrons. She should be ashamed!

Cdnw-QPgQR5XZTcQvbbfbA.text: The service was not good at all, but the food alone deserves a five-star review. The Hexx Benedict was amazing.

U8_zeybVyTvafzbtHtu1Gg.text: After having been to Vegas over a dozen times and noticing that this restaurant is always packed, I finally decided to put myself on their busy waiting list for a table on their patio overlooking the strip and it was worth it. We waited about 45 mins for a table on a Saturday morning around 10:30 which I didn't think was bad considering the day and time. It honestly went quick because we wandered close by until we received a text that our table was ready. I had their breakfast croissant served with aged cheddar, ham (which they don't skimp out on) and a scrambled egg. The croissant was so good, flaky and layered with butter! It was a giant breakfast sandwich but worth every bite and calorie. Loved it here and will be back for sure.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast croissant served with house potatoes and if you look closely, you can catch a glimpse of my BF&#39;s lobster roll

D6eTgo8twaCjR4soRD2R_A.text: It smells like shit everywhere, like everywhere! It's loud full of drunk people obviously.   The food was mediocre , nothing special at all. What saved the 2 stars was the super nice waitress . Would only come back for a drink and to have a chat with her.   Thank you for the birthday dessert :)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Basic menu

nyCHweA_pduY8wvQ3eyo-Q.text: It was so good we ate here for lunch and dinner. Taylor was our waitress for lunch and she was one of the best waitresses we have ever had. We checked in and got the free dessert. Chose the hazelnut pudding...oh my gosh!!!!! Definitely a must do!

lhE0fW44RnvnWNLb2_zS8A.text: They say first impressions matter... well then I should only give 1 star.  How dare we assume that one of the 3 hostesses would greet us upon entering! I'm so sorry to inconvenience you by wanting a table.   There was a glimmer of hope... food was not bad.  Good luck getting the check. Did we have a waiter? Apparently not...  Last but not least, thanks for giving us dirty looks when we were finally leaving your sight. Maybe EVERYONE who works here was having a bad Monday? I heard a waiter being rude to a customer and the table next to us was trying to pay their bill for at least 10 mins, but they also had no waiter.

1YoBBx1ZQkcHInXzYHKA7A.text: This place is definitely on the pricier side for the portions that you get. However all of the dishes that we tried were delicious. The servers were all friendly and helpful and I had ordered the bottomless mimosa and they surely kept them coming. Many times when you order bottomless you constantly need to wait, but but here. A must place to try while you are in town.

XbU3M9t2imbPSerCC43a-A.text: Hexx is hands down my favorite restaurant on the Las Vegas strip. I frequently visit and always have to make stop here. The food is some of the best you'll find on the strip and the bottomless mimosas are just an added BONUS!   Although I've been here a handful of times what made this pass experience even more memorable was our awesome server Sean and Mark. He never let our mimosas go empty and had great knowledge about the menu. He made our experience that much more enjoyable.    Definitely recommend!

Q8erBPDCTSgRsFIEQZGG1A.text: Superior food but even better was having a server that was knowledgeable and on top of the cocktails. Thank you Quinn for making our first brunch amazing!

A6WhtD1C6zrGlA2A2kCz1g.text: Came here on a Sunday. Made our reservation for 12 and was able to get our table earlier than expected around 11:45.   Taylor was our server and she was amazing. She made our experience great. Our bottomless mimosas ($23 unlimited pp) were never empty! The food took a while to get but considering it was Sunday afternoon, I wasn't too surprised.  I got the chicken and waffles and I almost licked the plate lol.  Plus the view is amazing. On top of everything it was my birthday and Taylor surprised me and my friend with a bowl of two chocolate lollipops and a birthday song.   5/5 recommend!!!!

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

iAWYz80i4jyhu_S4LwWfrQ.text: So, when you go out for a meal there are two things you look for...great food and great service. This place has both. We went for brunch the first time and was blown away by the food and service. Our servers the first time were Taylor and Abram. Taylor was amazing as her attention to us was beyond expectations. We went back a second time and not only were we NOT disappointed, we were even more impressed. We requested Taylor again and she was assisted by Patrick and Steven. Seriously, Taylor should classes on how servers should be. Go here. Ask for Taylor. Get the bottomless mimosas and enjoy!

uUhc8qpoJWG1wAhVrcKAJw.text: Wow!!! My husband and I arrived right on time for our reservation and seated immediately on a busy Saturday afternoon! So excited! Great vibe! Pictures don't do it justice! We had Rafael on the patio and he treated my husband like the King that he is. We went for brunch and even when we had only a sip of our bottomless mimosas finished, Rafael would top us off. He brought us 2 cake pops with a candle for my husband's birthday. And, great food btw!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegetable Omelette and Chicken and Waffles! Potatoes to die for! Terrific English muffins too! :)

u2TVDtFIjwZ_7k95x5xKwA.text: Great food and service.  We were looking for brunch and found it.  Potatoes are sensational!  Used a groupon which made it reasonable.  Will return

NCR0_yOjgQJDA3Qej9ikNw.text: Tracee was the best server!! Ask for her table if you come to this place! She had great energy and always asked of we needed anything else

7J4LMFA1wM2zDr57XEMRXA.text: Even though this place is expensive (you'll spend $50 a person easily) we came here 2 days in a row because we were so obsessed with the food. The steak literally melts in your mouth. The chicken is amazing. I ordered it both days because I loved it so much. Even better their wait staff is amazing. They are attentive, and respectful. We always felt like we being well taken care of even though the first night we went there it was super busy. We can't wait to come back here the next time we are in Vegas.

rOho_0A1QItplL_SHM35SQ.text: Very underwhelming. Fruit, sausage and strawberry jam were the part of our breakfast. Fruit appetizer took 20 min to come out. Omelette was overcooked and needed ketchup to eat. Chilaquilles were over done.  Eggs were not runny at all. Pancakes were ok but nothing you couldn't make from premix batter. Chicken sausages were good. Server was friendly but a little slow. Waited 10-15 min to eat outside on a Tues with a lot of empty tables. Hostesses were not friendly at all. I would not reccomend at all. Over rated by a lot

ugjTnQxAPQdIZSQ1ZW51NA.text: Delicious food and great customer service! Good price as well. Amazing view and the portion of the food was big. I recommend this place %

wHqo4honLAMFS2t5aLY7FA.text: Second time, but certainly not the last! The staff here is INCREDIBLE! There are not enough words to describe how fantastic they are. Tracee took care of us this time through - she set a goal of 9 mimosas for each of us, and she made sure we exceeded that goal. 10/10 would recommend - ask for Tracee! She nailed it!

wxcOMnK2fwCTr1SzbhLuYw.text: Sean and Big B WOWWED the crowd!! Very attentive even during busy hours! Totally on top of their game and an asset to the company. I'd come back to this location for sure.

B7-g7BGrRqBAdxQ6eVGwfQ.text: We went when the crowd was dying down after brunch and we got poor service. Waited over an hour for my food and they brought it in 3 parts while they brought my friend's food much earlier. They never came to refill our waters we had to get up and grab a pitcher ourselves.  The food was cold and not good at all for the price was not worth at all. The restaurant itself is nice and the music was great but food and staff is not good in service.

lQZ2Ctx2W53sgiIES6EZWw.text: Awful, awful service. Went there for an early dinner with my friend, and the staff was extremely rude and did not pay almost any attention to us. The food was delicious, but the portions were ridiculously small, and when combined with the terrible service, it is definitely not worth the time or money spent. I had to remind the waiter of the drink I ordered after he brought us our food, and Our "bread & butter" service was just 2 slices of stale bread and olive oil. Even after we asked for butter (again), we never actually got the butter. This whole time we were served by 4 or 5 different people. All around terrible service and would not recommend wasting your time or money at this restaurant.

KAtY9bm2KZxprtYKE0N0Cw.text: I love this place! I always make sure I come to this restaurant when I'm in Vegas. It's surprisingly affordable to be dead smack in the middle of the strip. In fact, we even found a Groupon for this place. The food is amazing. I've been for brunch a couple times. Shawn (or Sean?) gave us great service...shots out to Boston. He even escorted my God sister's mom to the restroom. The entire staff is friendly and the food comes quick. Can't wait to go back!

tnzdl1-XbjCmFYhi82ZmFw.text: Great service and cool location right outside Paris Casino... which you will pay for!  We'd just gotten out of a show nearby and restaurants start closing in droves after 10:30 pm even in Sin City.  HEXX is one of those places that run 24/7 and isn't your usual drab, out-dated cafe.    The staff are young, good-looking and smile even when you don't know what you're talking about.  My friend decided to order two shots, but since he's diabetic and rarely drinks he didn't know much about them.  The bartender was left to guess and what we got wasn't what he expected and wasn't drinkable.  They didn't charge for them, but I still felt bad.  The Hypnotizing Strawberry was awesome if kind of weak in the booze department and it cost $15.  That's high for any bar!  The cool looking Hexx potions (I actually think they must be pitchers to share) that they decorate with dry ice effects were over $30 each!  We ordered a Margherita Pizza and Spaghetti with Meatballs.  I thought the pizza was okay but I've had better.  The pasta, on the other hand, was great!  Three juicy, flavorful meatballs and a big pile of al dente spaghetti soaked in a wonderful tomato sauce coated with Parmesan and dried garlic.  Was it worth over $22?  Jury is still out on that one, but chances are we wouldn't return here even for that dish unless we were close by and thin on choices like this last time.  Service, ambience and food are pretty on point but just so very very pricey!  I'd gladly pay more for steak or seafood, but for pasta and a vegetarian pizza?  There are plenty of other places demanding high prices for food for now so we'll keep looking for that perfect place...

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margherita Pizza with half my Hypnotizing Strawberry
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Best spaghetti &amp; meatballs I&#39;ve had in quite some time

s_zbBnlo2PIaFdxu3sI7CQ.text: I wish i could give no stars. We were completely ignored!  We felt as if we were invisible! We were seated a little after midnight. Host did not have menus with her. Bus boy brought us water. We saw no one else for twenty minutes. So, we got up and left. Not even seeing a menu.  Not likely to ever go back.

vPROTLH0gjIyepeeclJMgQ.text: After going to several different places to eat, I must say that this is one of the best!!!! The food is absolutely spectacular and the portions are pretty fair based on the price. The service is also the best I've seen in a long time! Teddy T. And James were the absolute best and made the experience all the better!!! They were super cheery and helped with choosing what's good for menu! Congratulations to Hexx restaurant for having such amazing and dedicated employees! Definitely a place worth coming to :D

XbJJSzPjjurq-1JcD4Jx8g.text: HORRIBLE customer  service.  Waited 20 minutes until a server actually came over to take our order. 2 people came just to ask if we wanted something to drink , then finally someone came over to tell us that our server will be right with us. 30 mins later we order our food & I order a starter with my meal. As I waited another 25 mins until my food actually came out. I had to let the server know to cancel my starter because it was not out yet. The whole purpose of ordering a starter was because I was hungry and I knew that my food would take long. The manager did not car , he was rude , CHRiSTRIAN was his name and stay away from Juliet that was out server. Never again will I pay my money for there horrible customer service !!!!!!!!

8O_TYje2CmXZdEmrfK2LQQ.text: Ok nothing special, bartenders should really know what an old fashioned should taste. Went to a of Chang's and the bartender know a lot more about the drink then The hex bar staff knew, like serving it an a large ice cube. Worst drink I have had served.

3Xv3tvDXYrn8t4HorPUkJw.text: I got the ribeye (medium well), Mac and cheese, and fries to share with my friend. The steak was very good and tender and the Mac and cheese was substantial but not too heavy. We also got the potion bowl, that was also very good. Servers were attentive and very helpful. 10/10 would come again.

YG7f2Wx1_X_d9QLKyceKpg.text: This was our second visit to the place within the same week. Our first visit was amazingly delicious with an extraordinarily great service. So, my parents who came from some 10,000 miles far to visit wanted to go back to Hexx right after eating there. So, we went back.   With our first step we all realized something was different. We were there at 9:30 AM and our server, Olivia, took us to the bar area (instead of the breakfast/brunch area) where the music was too loud for that hour of the day. About 10 minutes after sitting they opened up two of the window doors looking outside that created a high courant d'air around the area that we were sitting. I kindly asked Olivia whether she could close one of them to cut the air flow a little. She said straight no and said we can change our table and move somewhere behind the room. My parents carried their breakfast food to the back of the room bythemselves. Mom never got her glass of water back throughout our short stay there for breakfast. During the short period we were there they used the door to go outside for only 3 times -so maybe it was not a very big inconvenience to shut it off afterall??  Overall, the food was delicious but the whole experience was brought down by the distasteful service. We have only couple of days together to spend as a family IN A YEAR and we chose to eat at Hexx for breakfast expecting to have a good experience that would be accompanied by a good family conversation. Instead we found ourselves rushed in eating our breakfast to get out of the place as soon as possible and had a bad start for the day. I hope someone from Hexx would read this review to prevent something similar happening to others.

fVkWnXFD00xtR41hz6MJ3Q.text: Tracy was amazing. She is the best waitress you could ever ask for. First time in Vegas, my friends choose this place and Tracy nailed it. Best service you could ask for. Thank you Tracy!! You made our morning!! :)

VWNIZ9GDI4hpkx7whw7mvQ.text: Amazing customer service but terrible policies. Did bottomless mimosas for $24 and you're guaranteed 2 hours of bottomless. But i guess if you spill a glass, you're cut off. Don't be clumsy here or they'll cut you short.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing customer service but terrible policies.

IUxC7R0heYTSFhm3s9S54g.text: Yummy breakfast and bottomless mimosas.  My boyfriend and I each had an omelette and shared the brioche French toast.  Omg the English muffins that came with the omelettes were delish - they were home made, not like any English muffin I've bought at the store or had anywhere else.  The side of potatoes that came with the omelettes were also so amazing - crunchy and had some spice going on.  We really had good service and enjoyed our time here.  Recommend making reservations as it's busy weekend mornings. :)

The chicken & waffles was delicious, Benedict eggs and bottomless mimosas! Plus the staff is super nice and it's right in the middle of the strip!

IgWoFaPETxlXBNjmN7czOQ.text: I wanted to get breakfast somewhere and tried this place on a hunch. They have a really nice outside patio which is great for people watching if the weather is nice. I really like coffee, their coffee is really good here! I would come here for the coffee alone.   I ended getting the chilaquiles (shredded chicken, roasted salsa, avocado, tortilla chips and eggs etc). This was an amazing breakfast dish! Packs tons of flavor, some heat but not too hot. I was full after this dish and didn't get to try anything else.   Great service as well. I will definitely make a point of making a stop here next time in Las Vegas.

-Tzzs_rbnxofDHbF974T6Q.text: This place has good food, and the Portion size is pretty good. The location is great and right on the strip. Their staff is very friendly and have great customer service!

U_cLmQjb34nS0AMIDLekwQ.text: Food was amazing and the mimosas is a big recommend to anyone who comes here!! I love coming here for the food! Ultimately Justin, the server, was so attentive and very sweet for my 23rd birthday! Thank you Justin!

tiL5VLl_MIfIp0OUXHR4vw.text: Not only is the food, mimosas, and coffee amazing but so was the service. Tracee is AMAZING! If you're fortunate enough to have her as your server, prepare for an amazing time. Her menu knowledge and vibe made my friend's birthday brunch even better. She deserves all the praise!!

avFjrlUrKGwulYJTQR-tsA.text: We came here for brunch and had the chicken and waffles and the egg's benedict. The chicken was so crispy and made to perfection along with the maple syrup. The egg's benedict was yummy! The hollandaise sauce was amazing!

mlSZl2Eh7eqwXNyprmcGrg.text: We really enjoyed the Hexx kitchen on our recent trip to Vegas. I purchased a Groupon and that helped with the cost - as with most casino restaurants - it's not cheap. We went for brunch and I had made reservations. We arrived early and they were able to seat us immediately. Reservations were probably not necessary that early unless you wanted to sit on the patio.   We were a party of four and we all ordered different meals. Our young twenty-one year olds ordered a flatbread pizza and the other ordered waffles. My partner ordered the steak and eggs and I had the corned beef hash. All of our meals were excellent and were plenty to leave us feeling satisfied. We even took some of the pizza and steak and potatoes home. The steak was extremely tender and flavorful. The potatoes were cooked and seasoned perfectly. My hash was delicious and my eggs were cooked sunnyside exactly as they should have been - not over or under cooked.   The girls and I ordered the bottomless Mimosas and they were truly bottomless. Our server was Johnny on the Spot with the refills which our two girls took as a challenge - which the server won lol.   If we are ever in Vegas again, I will definitely add Hexx to the list of places to revisit!

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

W2SVlEm-PpJS1qLcICuJJw.text: Be aware.  If you have a food allergy avoid this place.  They do not have the ingredients for their food. They discard the packaging, their words.  What that tells me is this place isn't servivng fresh food but priced up pre packaged stuff.  Unhelpful.

Q8STCNumFNaDNof9h6IwUA.text: One word:  EXCELLENT!  Excellent food, Friendly & Smiling hostess and wait staff, coupled with their Perfect location... HEXX is my new and must go to dinner spot in Vegas!  I've always walked along the strip and found HEXX to be perfectly located... their patio seating (with fan or heater) is the picture perfect spot for your Vegas visits.    We had a reservation at 5:30 (wanted to arrive earlier to grab their patio seating).  Upon arrival, the smiling and friendly hostess greeted us right away.  We hoped for and got the perfect patio seating -- overlooking the strip and right across from the Bellagio fountain, where we enjoyed the fountain show every 30-mins while we dined.  Thumbs up!!!  HEXX has the best wait staff!  They don't miss a beat.  They are fast, friendly, knowledgeable and flexible.  We were offered water right away.  Then the waitress came over to greet and check on us -- and made some dinner recommendations.  We opted for the following: * Purple Haze -- one of their signature drinks.  Very good with the fog ... unique drink  * Prime Rib (my fav!) -- cooked a perfect medium rare.  It was flavorful and tasty.  Prime rib was fresh and a True 16oz! * Rib Eye -- also cooked perfectly and perfectly seasoned.   * Brussel Sprouts -- sides.  So good!  For those of you who don't like your veges.. you will be hooked!  ;) * Pumpkin creme brulee -- recommendation by waitress and she is spot on.  Excellent creme brulee and not too sweet.  I often don't like dessert where they use sugar to mask all taste..  but this creme brulee is not like that.  You can really taste the pumpkin and it's really good.  Highly recommended.  We enjoyed an excellent dinner at HEXX and I'm kicking myself why I haven't come sooner.  We've got this as our new Vegas dinner spot and will be back for sure!

fc2YO_gOIprfeDRMOvugwA.text: The location is cute because it is located across the bellagio fountains but the quality of food isn't that great. The servers were really nice but the two hostess in the front were rude. We stood right in front of them and no one acknowledged us for a few minutes. They were too busy talking to each other. Then when they did acknowledge us they asked how many people and said nothing else other than walk us to our table. Don't bother!

QvP3YB5E-3h0JLfAzj6lxw.text: Stumbled upon this while walking down the strip a year ago, and the food was so memorable that I had to come back! It did not disappoint - everything was delicious. Have only eaten dinner here:  -MUST TRY the carbonara. So delicious.  -Friend had the prime rib and it was so soft and delicate.  -Broccolini was super super yummy! -Shrimp cocktail was delicious.  -Friend had the wagyu burger and really enjoyed.   All the food is great - and our server was outstanding. Also a beautiful view of the Bellagio across the street. Open very late in case you're hungry at like 1am but still wanna be classy. It's definitely not cheap, but not very expensive for the quality you're getting.

wBRAX0PcvRODjLsMK4hMqQ.text: I had extremely low expectations for a restaurant right on a strip that was open 24/7. It had to just be a tourist trap, right?  WRONG.  This was one of our best meals in Vegas and we went to caesars buffet. I would come here over the buffet HANDS DOWN.   We were able to get reservations for 10 for brunch and were seated immediately. Win. Despite being busy, our servers were all incredibly efficient and also extremely easy on the eyes. Win again. The food came out quickly and was not only presented well, but absolutely delicious.   My burger was cooked and seasoned to perfection. I devoured the entire thing despite having just eaten mcdonalds breakfast 30 minutes prior. The servers did not leave a single water glass or mimosa empty. Oh - did I mention the bottomless mimosas for $23!? It was heavy on the champagne too!    Overall, HEXX surprised us with the high quality of their food and the phenomenal service. Highly highly recommend

Really enjoyed the honey that was added to it and was more than enough for two people. Wish there was more bread with it. Wouldn't recommend the all you can drink wine - it's a step above the cardboard wine. Interior design is also great and overall a nice spot to visit with anyone.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loved the view at night.

zLK7TILJMMqIwNV3l1ZKqg.text: Came here for my friend's bachelorette party brunch and received the most amazing service. Our server Tracey was so friendly and energetic, she made the experience for us at this restaurant unforgettable! There was also a problem with my friend's credit card and the general manager handled it immediately, even giving my friend his business card in case the problem wasn't fixed. I would highly recommend. The food was amazing as well!

1I61SbByg6rbtdK6mXvYwQ.text: We were at Hexx this past weekend for a 21st birthday.  We had a total of 53 guests.  The entire planning process (thanks to Kayla) was smooth sailing all the way.  Once we arrived to Hexx (Christian) did a great job of handling our group.  The ENTIRE staff (sorry I can't name everyone) were professional, pleasant, and served us quickly and efficiently.  The food was delicious!  Everything from the ceviche to the filet mignon, and ending with the red velvet cake were all cooked/baked just right.  The staff was able to get all 53 of us in and out in less than two hours.  The beautiful view of the strip and the Bellagio fountain made the evening extra memorable.  We will be back soon.  THANK YOU HEXX for a great night!

evRPcOPuwguWK1gCqy_8Hg.text: Been here a couple times since I'm a local. Only downfall was being given inaccurate information on more than one occasion. Food is good, and location is great too.

KIm6cQPB-TSK-eFvEDCpIA.text: I want to like this place more than I can.  We arrived on a Sunday afternoon when most of the others seated inside had been enjoying the endless mimosas and other drinks for quite a while.  The place is extremely loud and our experience was made worse by a 30 year old drunk guy at the next table who broadcast his foul-mouthed philosophy on life at the top of his lungs.   He wasn't alone.  I used a decibel meter on my phone and never got a reading under 85; 97 was the high.   Loudness aside, our food was good.  The service was prompt and server smiling.  The beer selection is a thumbs up.  My wife's drink was tasty.   Too bad we couldn't quickly catch up to the mood and revelry of the others. Otherwise I'd give it 5 stars.

rYjEk5mBlpVpl0HwIVwtZQ.text: I've been in Vegas more times than i can count. Some for fun and most for business. Every time I'm here i pick the top 5 restaurants to eat and do my best to eat through my way. I love love how many amazing restaurants this place has to offer.   Hence i decided to try breakfast out at this place. Sadly I'm not a breakfast person, but what the heck, why not give it a try. I decided to order the hash. And guess what, a Big Ass Red Hair on My Plate. Like in plain sight. You mean to tell me, nobody, i mean nobody noticed that red hair lounging on the porcelain white plate before it ended up in front of me!! Maybe they'd cook, waitress, and bus boy needs some serious eye check.   Then it took me 10 minutes to flag down the waitress who was chatting and laughing away with the rest of the staff, who apparently gets paid to stand around instead of ensuring that their guest is ok with the food that they just ordered. Why is the food brought to you by someone else?? Who is doing the quality control?  Needless to stay although the food was good, it left me with a gross disgusting feeling.   Please keep in mind that the venue is absolutely beautiful. I sat right in front of their awesome huge TV.  Also i was never comped for my hairy plate.

QzKueUGWtBVrgG8RiKm2sw.text: Nice on the porch. Food was very well prepared. The colossal bloody Mary is one to share. Chick full of food and a good Spivey Mary. The chicken and waffles enough to share and the chicken was very moist. Got a breast and a thigh split. The farm fresh b-fast has the best potatoes and the eggs were done to perfection. Highly recommend. Keep in mind portions are such to be totally shareable. This will help with the$$.  It has been a while since the prior review. For some reason it did not post then (2017). This visit was again 3/2018) good.

bqsYRuxnLplDG7epthZZvg.text: My boyfriend and I visited Hexx for my birthday brunch on a very busy Sunday afternoon. We hadn't researched this place at all but decided to go in anyways since it looked like a cool place. We were offered the option of immediate bar seating or to check in and wait for a table. Normally, we would've opted to go to another place since we don't like waiting or sitting at the bar, but since we were hungry and tired, we chose to be seated in the bar. The only negative of our whole experience here was that we waited for about 10 mins before we were brought menus by the bartender, who ended up being our waiter. The wait was understandable though as the bartender had 4 or 5 other tables in his areas plus a few people sitting at the actual bar.   The menu had quite a few different things to choose from including sweet and savory brunch items, pizza, and salads, so I knew this would be a difficult decision for my boyfriend and I. In the end, I decided to go for the Veggie Burger and my boyfriend chose the Corned Beef Hash. Once we placed our order, the food came out fairly quickly considering how busy it was. My veggie burger was delicious! It had a great chipotle mayo with just the right amount of spice. Only thing I disliked about the sandwich was the huge slices of avocado, but that's just a personal preference. I am sure that someone who enjoys avocado would consider the avocado the be just the right amount. My boyfriend loved the corned beef hash too.  As for their drink menu, their brunch feature is $23 bottomless mimosas, which I feel like is a very fair price for unlimited mimosas in Vegas! There were a variety of other signature cocktails, bloody Mary's, beers, and wines to choose from as well. I opted for a simple Malibu and pineapple juice, while my boyfriend tried an IPA beer (Prairie Artisan, Phantasmagoria), which he enjoyed throughly.    Overall, we had a great experience here and will definitely be back to enjoy more of their delicious food next time we're in Vegas! Next time we will be sure to book a table ahead of time!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YY_addYl2fYwkSZQWA7oCw.text: The food and drinks are amazing and Jackson is the most amazing server friendly and make sure everything is good  I definitely recommend this restaurant to everyone!!!!!!!

8aHSUakhR_W8z-SLLRB5HA.text: My family and I came here on a Saturday at around 11 am. We waited for about an half an hour to get seated (not too bad). The place is HUGE inside. I didn't see any children, but it was quite noisy.   The prices were a little up there considering we only ordered brunch, but when the food arrived, it made sense. The portions were quite large and my family of five shared four entrees with food leftover. Everything was delectable, and the service was great! I really enjoyed my time here and will have to come again.
