Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spinach artichoke dip
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Purple haze pitcher

HxFNs99SSmJANDI8ger1gQ.text: Sean was extremely professional and attentive. He provided excellent customer service during our visit. He always came around I never saw the bottom of my mimosa glass.

YdCEzp69sA-ug-z4svKkRQ.text: Went here with the hubby and he had the steak and eggs and I had the lobster roll, they were both delicious! I would def come back here if I am ever in the area!

dmkqBrVn2VFYHiSdWUsS5Q.text: Huge proportions, and the quality of food was great! Taylor, our waitress, and her right hand man Chance were  unbelievably great all brunch long! If you're looking for good food and first class service, HEXX Kitchen is the place to be!

UHyW9YxI4cKVTsrZbnI6oA.text: Stopped in for brunch on a Saturday. They offer brunch until 2pm on Saturday and Sunday's.  Loved the cool vibe of the restaurant. Reminded me of brunch in Miami.   Service was spectacular. We were waited on hand and foot, and our water glasses were constantly being refilled.  We ordered a latte, chilaquiles and a meat omlet. Everything was delicious.   Can't wait to return for the huge pancakes!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Latte with almond milk
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YRjPTmlG9vnXNHfDQhTAkA.text: We arrived in vegas early friday morning. We walked around the town, going to bars and eating food, while we waited to check in. We ended up at hexx where we were served by Jason. Jason was the best bar tender I've had in a long time. My party and I had the best experience imaginable. He was knowledgeable, friendly, and attentive. Ye recommended two of their signature options for our group. Both were amazing. He made us a set of shots for my friends birthday and just provided the best experience ever.  The experience we had was so much better than any other we had on the trip. It was so good that we went back the next day and had him make us more drinks. I those drinks hit me harder than mankind hitting the announcers table after being thrown off the top of the cage during the hell in the cell cage match in 1988. Again Jason was the consummate professional. This bar was fantastic and its staff is second to none.

z3nYLNlUCRSpWGfub9XEsw.text: Bottomless mimosas for 3 hours. Great Benedict. Fun atmosphere. Service was great. We also got lucky with a short wait of 10 minutes.

ewsnsw3tAvV49DTWCzhAZg.text: I came here with my best friend. The brunch was so delicious. First, we sat in a small little intimate nook that seemed very separate from the rest of the restaurant. For our meals we split the fried potatoes, I got the Brioche French Toast and she got the Golden Pancakes. Everything was so good. The waitress kept the bottomless mimosas flowing. The French toast and pancakes were super good. I would definitely return.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried potatoes + onions
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brioche French Toast with berries and bananas

sAWAKzi2KTNaXCJU-YI3BQ.text: Hexx never disappoints! Tracee was a great server for reggae brunch! The drinks were flowing, the laughs were endless, the vibe was perfect! 400% coming back again! 13/10 would recommend Tracee!

fYyxO1ZHb6xQCANZdup6kw.text: I came here around 2pm for a really late lunch. My party and I decided to come here because the lines at Bacchanal and Le Village were like   Out of desperation, a long drive, and disappointing lines we came here. I liked the ambiance as well as the interior of the restaurant. Well trained servers and great service.   The food was very average. We ordered a meat omelette, a margarita pizza, and a hex burger. Very original tasting and very average. Portions weren't bad but I wasn't full. Nothing special. Kind of disappointed. I think I would come here again but would be my last choice.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

th2dFaSAoMONY4Cjn5kCbw.text: Food was amazing! We had a party of 14 (bachelorette party) and our server JJ was a True professional. He had a strategy for dealing with a party of our size and executed it perfectly. Venue itself is super bright and the perfect remedy to the dim lighting of Las Vegas night clubs and casinos. Would absolutely recommend, especially if you're looking for a bottomless brunch, they have a designated pourer, our glasses were never empty!

bbsLCpUYBIWs9fmFMiH1gA.text: Went here for a recovery brunch with friends on early Sunday afternoon. We had reservations and was seated immediately, but didn't seem that crowded (probably because it was already 1:30pm). Great food and atmosphere, I'd definitely recommend coming here for some recovery brunch. Make sure to make recommendations to avoid a long wait!   FOOD I ordered the chicken & waffles and omg you really do get what you pay for. Two HUGE pieces of fried chicken placed on top of a fluffy waffles, what more could you ask for???? The breading of the chicken was flavored just right and the chicken itself was juicy and tender. The waffle was soft on the inside and crispy on the outside. Ugh my mouth is salivating just reminiscing about it.   DRINKS We ordered 1 Purple Haze drink, which comes in a huge pourable & shareable jar. If we weren't so hungover, each of us would've gotten one. Great drink if you love berries.   SERVICE Service was on the fence. Our server was amazing, gracious, and engaging (totally regret not getting her name), but the food & drinks took way too long to come out. IDK if it just seemed longer because we were hungover, but still it was a long time. Plus it was around 1:30pm so I'd assume the brunch rush would be over.   Overall, we probably won't visit this place again because of the service, but if we don't find anything else, we'd come here.

2tGgq06SQRJtXObvDdYhxg.text: What a waste  of money!!! This place is below average  for Las Vegas. First of all the coffee  they brought looked like tea. I asked for a new cup. It was obvious  it was watered  down. Not to mention there cups has stains all over them.  I would not be surprised  if they weren't  washed. Second out watriess  never checked on us till we asked for the bill.  I have had better service  at Denny's.  We payed 56 dollars for  2 coffees and 2 breakfast  plates.  Not worth it. We had gone to the mgm park the day before which was a high  end restaurant  and paid less  for breakfast.

Hqa3tscpoLHql8xwzGyyXg.text: Really good!  Large menu that offers smaller portions and they are open almost 24 hours...about 22 hours a day.  In front of the Paris hotel.  Definitely will return, much better than I would have expected, great view, great service both times we ate here!

_89lTphj-b0fNfDw14NuUA.text: Very impressed with both food and service!  My date and I were at Hexx for an event, and were able to sample a beautiful assortment of small tastes and cocktails.  Honestly, there wasn't a thing that I didn't love. Real standouts were   Wagyu Beef "Burger" Shrimp Ceviche & Braised Short Rib.  I don't know if the Tempura Shrimp that we were served is on the regular menu; but dear God, I could live on that. I don't know how they did it, but it has spoiled me for all other tempura. I will return to eat a trough full of it soon.   The staff knocked it out of the park! Serving a very large group of picky people can be a nightmare, I'm sure. But each server that I  encountered was fun, friendly, and seemed honestly happy to be there (and trust me, this is not always the case on The Strip).   I'm sure you'll be made welcome in whatever you happen to be wearing (mostly) - but the atmosphere is nice-casual - leaning more toward the 'nice' at night. Street clothes are fine during the day, but you'll fit in wearing sharp goin-out duds at dinner time. Make Las Vegas Classy Again.  Congratulations, All -- Well Done! I look forward to returning for a sit-down experience with my Trough-O-Shrimp soon.

NbiZEFboGsE5SbJnHBadYQ.text: Looking for a place with good view. Walked in around midnight for drinks but wasn't greeted by ANYONE for a whole 10 minutes. Wasn't impressed by the customer service here1. However it is a good place to chill as they are open 24 hours.

aLjSjTP0r-idWq4lveBkvg.text: Our new favorite spot! Great atmosphere, friendly staff, and service was great. The staff suggested a variety of foods and they were all delicious, love the baba ganouch and magherita pizza. Thank you Arnold, Jason, and Anthony for a wonderful experience we will definitely be returning soon!

BM1LZ3-QvB_o5h0RWJpbRQ.text: Delicious food - I got the veggie omelette and it was a large portion. The drinks are good too. The only reason I give it 4 stars is due to the CNF fee they charge at the end.

4nBijQHHhkt-3lNs2-Ov7Q.text: I visited Hexx for brunch on a Sunday morning. We had a reservation and arrived on time, but we still had to wait several minutes before we were seated. That did give us the opportunity to walk around the candy store and they offered us a free sample of chocolate which was divine. The bottomless mimosas is definitely a deal that you can't pass up - it's not extraordinarily cheap, but it's not unreasonable either. The service was great - our server was very friendly, helpful and attentive. My mimosa flute was almost never empty! The atmosphere had an open and almost European kind of vibe, but the music was playing very loud and it was hard for us to hear each other when we spoke. I ordered the chilaquiles on the behest of the server and I'm so glad I listened to her. It was so much food I could barely eat half of it, but it was so tasty. The balance of the different components was perfect. The potato chips were a little soggier than I would have wanted, but I'm sure plenty of people prefer them that way. At the end of our brunch they brought a birthday cake to the table for our friend who was wearing a birthday crown and boa - we didn't even have to request it, they just provided it and it was not only beautiful but incredibly delicious. All in, I was originally skeptical about Hexx because it seemed a little too touristy, but I'm so glad that we came here. I was incredibly pleased with my experience!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Surprise birthday cake.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles.

ayWp65OWVO96NoC4u4gLAQ.text: I had a great experience in Hexx. The unlimited mimosas were amazing. Our waitress Jan was very attentive and hospitable. The food was great. The Hexx burger was amazing. My friends had the chilaquiles and the veggie burger. They were both very satisfied with their food. We all highly recommended Hexx and if you come ask for Jan. She's the best waitress, our mimosas glasses were always full!

8tRo_3kTD4K2A3xJ8kf27g.text: We rolled up on a Friday afternoon and there was a small wait for brunch. About 10 mins later we were seating on the patio and handed menus. They do bottomless mimosas until 2 pm so it was a no brainer! 1 mimosa for $12 or bottomless for $23. The menu had a great variety of vegetarian and non vegetarian items. My husband decided on the eggs Benedict and I had the veggie burger. This is where one of the stars got docked. My husbands meal was a little bland and had something lacking. My veggie burger with fries was ok the other hand amazing! The patty was thick and not dry at all! The fries were some of the best I've had. Perfectly crispy and flavored with some sort of spice. The portion of my burger was huge where as my husbands wasn't as large. The inconsistency was a little weird. We checked in on the yelp app which allowed us one dessert on the house. I highly recommend the tiramisu! The presentation and flavor together made it so enjoyable. You get to pour the espresso over the cake.  The cream was perfectly sweetened and not over the top. I would suggest this place to anyone visiting Vegas! Wait for the patio seating for prime people watching while you enjoy a great meal.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tiramisu!! Amazing!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie burger- 5 Stars!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict- slightly underwhelming

2RvlbELVgVBzjSBfhGlN7g.text: Great food. Great service. Nice atmosphere. Kids menu. Chef prepared special dished for our kids

WUi1lUmvGUcQV4pxvdF9Nw.text: When I went to Hexx in September, it was such great food! The carrot cake flavored pancakes were delicious! Waitress who was serving us was awesome! It was on the pricey side but it is expected since it's on the strip and had great food. Definitely recommend if you're in Vegas! Not to mention, the jersey shore cast went to Hexx in the show ;)

ss0_CnZvnq3UPtRK1OQ2mw.text: The service and bottomless mimosas were phenomenal. Tracee was amazing. Recommend to anyone looking to sit down and enjoy a meal and some delicious drinks.

oPbtYyuZToB2CFMI5LshCA.text: Favorite brunch place in Vegas thus far!  Let's start with the service, I thought our Waiter looked a little bit stressed out while serving our table, since we had a party of 7, I forgot his name, but he did his very best to keep it professional, he was friendly and came by once in a while to ask us how we are doing while attending other customers. Since we had 7 people we had the opportunity to try a lot of the amazing food as a family style. But I especially think they did well with their carrot pancakes and the chicken waffle, they made the chicken so well!! Very crispy on the outside and very tender inside! very flavorful! The drinks were also amazing, we got the flamingo and the Elixir. I much much prefer the taste of the flamingo it is so fruity, I can really taste the guava I love guava!!! The Elixir was very fun to look at and great for pictures and videos, but after that flamingo drink nothing else can taste better! I would say the only item that I was not a super huge fan of was the pizza carbonara, I thought it was slightly dry but not the crispy kind of dry. Other than that everything else was fantastic! And it was a great touch when the waiter bought a small red velvet pastry for our friend who is getting married to congratulate her, it was nice that we didn't even ask for it! He was still very sweet even tho we can tell he was a bit overwhelmed.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

QmaNVgsC9rIry6bpT9RjAA.text: Spectacular view of the strip, food and service! Definitely will be coming back on my next trip. Brunch was amazing, my favorite is the sausage, egg and bacon pizza. Our servers, Sean and Erik, were outstanding.

7pvhbHxGgbAAR02F9z3SsQ.text: Tracee kept the mimosas coming! Loved this place! Great food great price. Can't beat bottomless mimosas for $20. We each had 4-5 glasses. Thank you so much for a great afternoon!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ph8L84GCxBbtlGFDLRfHKQ.text: We got a sampler of chocolate at HEXX instead of committing to a large $6 bar  Chocolate: 2/5 - 71% Dominican Republic dark chocolate  - Bitter escalates to a sour taste - 73% ecuador dark chocolate  - Dirt plastic taste - 47% ecuador milk chocolate - this was the last one and best of the bunch but not the best milk chocolate I've had  Of the small sample size of HEXX chocolate I tried, I would not recommend paying a premium here.

DDmsimzmNFe20GyfKAvEPg.text: Outstanding service ! The food is good but the service is worth coming back for. Kalene you definitely made dinner enjoyable. You work very hard and still have a smile and provide great service .

ENxsq3glsbfJniu1wy3nhg.text: Came here with friends. They had already eaten but I hadn't. I ordered the pepperoni pizza. It was really good, but just dripping in grease. When I sat down I ordered a drink (nothing special just prosecco) and it took a long time before I got it. My friend ordered carrot cake and didn't get it for 20 minutes. I was already done with my pizza at that point. If it weren't for the snail paced service at times I would have given this place 4 stars. There were many great options on the menu.

G8v2y-iAK6jKOw0oUOr5vg.text: Overpriced & not worth it.   Food was cold.  Service was awful.  Drinks were just ok.   Awful, terrible, and regrettable experience. Just keep walking. There's much better in Vegas than this shithole.

ImiMRFGshdnIg8x_pXLXbQ.text: We had breakfast here, my BF had the traditional eggs & bacon breakfast, I had the wonderful tasty blueberry pancake. It's only one very large pancake, but so filling one is all u need. The coffee was really good here too! Nice place to eat & watch people walk on the Vegas strip. Lots to see & talk about that's for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

swTI1Wm2pZucI67vp_R-eA.text: Seriously the best meal I've ever had. Sooooo good. Halibut on some saucy rice ... Devine. Drinks are creative, and yummy. Dessert was good also

g8ndaWH8ihYYmzSu42ybjQ.text: Sean our server was amazing and extremely attentive! The food was amazing, I had the steak and eggs and it was cooked perfect! My friend had a traditional eggs bacon potatoes and the potatoes were next level! Will def be back next trip to Vegas

0i4Je_KC_d9Srbm_CeKmGw.text: Great patio spot overlooking the Bellagio fountains. Their bottomless mimosas were a decent price and the food was great. Check out their store next door for cute boutique souvenirs and candy.

otbEDiJU2d5u3QS4HpzEMA.text: Food and drinks were great. Best part was our server Sean! Hands down best service! Thanks Sean for making our bachelorette lunch a memorable experience!

ZlaXVTBMVLuht_vc2mYElA.text: 3 things you must order. The potion drinks, pizza, and chocolate cheesecake. You will leave happy !

Z8rKHjgAgX_Qsk2-kuwc0A.text: We heard about the bottomless mimosas and came running. They were fantastic, and the waitstaff was quick to refill.  Aside from the mimosas, we tried some other items. The maple bacon was amazing. Life changing, really. The fruit was incredibly fresh and there was a great variety of more exotic types of fruit than your standard grapes, blueberries, strawberries and melon. My husband, who doesn't usually eat fruit couldn't keep from stealing bites from my plate. The potatoes were indescribably good. A perfect crunch when you bite into it, with a smooth texture on the inside. They were seasoned quite well. The servers and hosts are attentive, warm and welcoming. Our favorite place on the strip.   If you stop here, you can't go wrong.

8vA4IQ4lhMREcnTFmN2xtA.text: Great outside seating with views of the Bellagio Fountains. A friend of mine who is local to Las Vegas and I grabbed dinner here on a Saturday night. Great food and service.

XTMeRv-R4CFqmWY-DcUjnA.text: I was a proud repeat customer of Hexx for the past 3 years but now that's no longer the case. After the extremely unprofessional behavior I witnessed I won't be returning to this establishment. During my last visit I overheard some extremely unprofessional remarks being made by a woman with blonde hair (I asked around & found out her name was Allison M., she looked like management). She was cursing & using foul language towards the employees ON the floor while guests were within earshot. One of the comments in question went something like this "If you guys don't seat this side I am going to have a FUCKING panic attack." as well as this same woman addressing another employee & telling them "You look like shit," again right on the floor as guests were walking by, one of which shot [Allison] a look of disgust before continuing on, passing the restaurant. Which I would've done had I been in their place to be honest. I honestly feel bad for the employees working under this woman as she doesn't seem to have a grasp on how or when to speak to those under her. The blatant condescending disrespect towards her employees is palpable & quite frankly disgusting. For these reasons I will not be coming back, I can only hope any future customers don't have to witness what I did.

0eXztxESeysG0nYZeYlNPA.text: Came here to have an excellent anniversary brunch but sadly, was disappointed. We ordered the Brioche  French Toast, overcooked bacon and the Frittata. The French toast and bacon came out cold. The Frittata was all egg. Where was the chorizo and potato? Oh, according to the waiter it was in there. Where, we asked again? Finely chopped, those little dots he said as hubby combs through all the egg with his fork. We look at each other and shrugged. When the waiter left we said hmmm maybe finely ground like pepper?! Lol, wth? To top it off, no refills on our water... Not one...I know there's a water shortage, but c'mon. With all the great restaurants in Vegas this one seriously needs to step their game up.  1 star for the adorable patio. Awesome views of the Las Vegas strip and the Bellagio Fountains!

BMbzVpuOdSflj5eQ0_lFgQ.text: The New York is 100% what I was looking for. They cooked crispy out side for me. So it became easy to cut and so delicious.

OpcLuRNa5EezU_AYTtox1A.text: Was looking for a nice brunch spot without a long wait and since Hexx is conveniently located on the strip outside of The Paris Hotel & Casino my party of 4 stopped in to give it a try. We did have a 5 minute wait to be sat in the brightly lit modern coco cabana like restaurant but it was worth it. We order crab cakes for starters and they were delish! 3 patties made with what appeared to be the claw meat of the crab and served with an aioli sauce, they were flavored well and fried to perfection. Our party also order Chicken & Waffles, which featured apple and white cheddar waffles and a mound of fried chicken,  the Protein Omelet which featured egg whites, chicken, spinach and a delicious avocado foam, home fried potatoes and a huge english muffin and the highlight Cinnamon Roll Waffles served with a cream cheese spread. It was all delicious and filling and reasonably priced. A definite must try if you're brunching in Vegas as they also offer bottomless mimosas and a variety of bloody mary drinks for those suffering from that good ole Las Vegas hangover.   They also have a chocolate and dessert shop next door where you'll find gourmet chocolates, cookies, a variety of ice cream, candies, unique  beverages and coffee drinks. If you have a seeet tooth this is a sweet spot for you.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Protein Omelet
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken &amp; Waffles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chocolate Bar

b54zLIIW7eYf4LrWOINr0A.text: Amazing Food. Excellent staff.  Polite and courteous.  Seated quickly and food came out on time and it tasted Amazing.  Great decor.

xog-2LHm4AnS52zcmHL6CQ.text: Great food and great service! Our host Flor was amazing. A really sweet lady who really made us feel welcome. Her service along with the food really made our experience. Our server allexia was also more than exceptional. I highly recommend coming to this place and if you have a chance request them !

k5VGmPRQyN9znc390SH0oQ.text: Came for dinner. Service was 4 stars, food was overpriced and was disappointed 2 stars.  Had their fried Mac-n-cheese app and Caesar salad. Too expensive for the mini portions. My friend got a soup and really?  $10 for a minuscule bowl. Save your dough and eat at Pink's.

K5A4DKqThttx4Yb4Cy4MAg.text: Great place to start the Vegas trip! Tracee was a great waitress and suggested amazing places for us to go! Loved it, definitely recommend. Amazing breakfast food!

wCQqVbUzt3ZxIR2-EIxc6w.text: We had bottomless mimosas on our first day in Vegas for my friends birthday! They have bottomless DAILY! If you're lucky enough to get Melissa as your server, you will be taken care of like you're the only party in the restaurant! The food was so so to me (I got a protein omelet) but the bottomless and service from Melissa makes it 5 stars!

f07BTwC46qJUXorx_zr9_A.text: The Paris being...Paris inspired much to my surprise doesn't host bakeries providing any macaroons. As I entered the greeter was polite but had no idea what a macaroon was, they ended up as three dollars a piece and their chocolate tasting was awful; second encounter was made to purchase an ice cream cake which actually consisted of harsh inedible tough cookies and better than expected Horchata ice cream. Also- the macaroons where over priced and a tiny cafe further into the Paris has far cheaper ones.

REM0GN_Md0TAgNvHQlDN5g.text: Technically we ate there while they were in transition. We had dinner on Feb 26th the day before they truly became Hexx. Since there no longer was a giant Goblet to try, my  girls and I opted for the Mega Martini. Loved it! We had the berry mojito and it's a sight to see..! Also, a creeper. Before we knew it, we were leaning. The equivalent of 10 shots is in that drink... Loved it! All of us ordered different things and the food was great. We sat next to the iron fence and had an amazing view of the Bellagio and the fountain. The only downside is people, cool and not-so-cool, kept stopping us to ask what we were eating and how it was. Lots of flirting going on too. Can't be mad at that! I loved eating there, and we'll probably go again when we head back in May. Gotta say something about Josh, who made us an impromptu cocktail that night. Eat here!

fQDzgnDIStSvji4AmeiS_Q.text: ordered the Hexx Burger. Cooked perfectly, i'd highly recommend it.

J3RiKPXM4tWj-cMt1syrbA.text: A complicated process to be seated, 2 people asked if I wanted water...5 minutes passed and still thirsty.  And a 4th person involved by the time I could order a drink.  I had a pizza which was good but service by committee with secret service ear buds and overstaffing takes welcoming to cumbersome.

nadcHY4U0MTLRhyXRmEmog.text: Dinner there was fantastic! The cocktails were a sight... They are made with dry ice so they actually smoke! A must try is the broccolini I! We loved it so much we ordered a second plate!!! Chelsea was an amazing server and very attentive. The desserts and the chocolate sampling were delicious as well. Will definitely go back next time we are in town.

VKwQwq5pMwONyAYMbTHl2g.text: Kevin Smith is a hall of famer! Best times of our Vegas trip and the food was amazing.

SE1xIM4km3nnFcbYokaOxQ.text: Below average service. Chicken and waffles greasy. Tomato bisque nice enough. Food and service doesn't reflect the price tag.

BEZej1j5ib2GtBLM4z0W3A.text: My friends and I saw this place on yelp while visiting Vegas and decided to check it out due to the bottomless mimosas. It is best to make reservations because there are long waits. We were sat down and greeted by a lovely young lady named Melanie. She is a server assistant, which great customer service. She took out drink orders and told us our server will be greeting us shortly. We were greeted by one of the GREATEST servers I have ever had by the name of Tracy. Tracy was on it, answering every difficult question we had. She checked on us plenty of times and made sure everything was good. The food was delicious. One of my friends and I ordered the fresh farm eggs and French toast, and my other friend ordered the chicken and waffles. Everything was so delicious. We never saw the bottom of our mimosas due to Tracy coming to refill everytime we got a little low. Melanie and Tracy were so nice and very friendly to us and we appreciate the awesome customer service that was given to us. We will definitely return and hopefully have the #teamhustle helping us again. Thank you so much ladies.

Ak9w90Ofw8iAWrgTgeeowg.text: Great food! Great Location and great service! Had lunch here and hosted by Maggie and I had no idea this place was that good. Best location on the strip for outdoor or indoor. the drinks were amazing as well. I recommend trying their chocolate next door. Had some of their chocolate from Ecuador.

8WIebSB8DH7Y5nZgEc3MTw.text: Great food and tasty. Sit outside for people watching and to take on the scenery. The French toast was very good.

vw-LZtQ0JIupYBKER_fAGA.text: Open 24 hours though found they don't serve all dishes all day. They have some high tables, fyi in case your party has trouble with tall chairs. Gravy fries, pepperoni pizza, and sea bass were good. Pizza came with slices of garlic which was a nice touch. Sea bass smelled fishy when it came out, didn't taste fishy. After a few bites the smell was gone. Desserts sounded really good, will be back to try them. They charge a concessions fee, shows up as "cnf" on the bill, can ask to have it removed.

2DB3hu9YtTki9Pt-De1nZQ.text: Juan and Cherry were great. Amazing food and awesome drinks. Definitely worth it. Everyone was super friendly and the food was delicious.

p38BthExyf4IPVI34-FICA.text: Great for breakfast. I came here two days in a row. The carrot cake pancakes are amazing with a delicious cream cheese topping. They also have bottomless mimosas to get your morning started right.

mQ9gDTiV8MO4sDQq0n91ww.text: I was hesitant to eat at Hexx since I had read about its chocolate specialties but nothing about their food. However, the food was fantastic and the ambience of the place is trendy and pleasing. It is a little noisy, perhaps because the seating arrangements are so close together and the room is open which creates acoustics of the voices over the background music. Still the food we had was delicious and the service was superb from the hostess to the waiters, we were always attended to with great attitudes. Their deserts are phenomenal and because we couldn't decide on one, we ordered them all. Definitely worth it!

P9m2-RNsM5h9VXt20O2oog.text: The food , ambiance and service is too notch . Mike our server , from Wisconsin is amazingly very attentive and give us guide to a good portions . The options are very generous . Finding a good breakfast place in Las Vegas strip is almost close to impossible . Will definitely comeback and beside this is my second time here and never failed us

BpGwdkZ5uZTeLQ3phxOvgw.text: I am a frequent visitor to Las Vegas and this is my favorite place for breakfast. I haven't had dinner here, but I highly recommend Hexx for breakfast. I got a traditional breakfast, which is available but not on the menu. I love the chicken sausage and the country potatoes. The bottomless mimosas were also really good. Sit on the patio if it's available. Good people watching and a nice view ofT The Bellaggio across the street. It's a little pricey, but anything that keeps me out of the casino is a bargain!

B8nR8zaeIw2GT59WcqZbsg.text: I used to love this place, view is still good, service is also, but I need fondue.. used to drive from green valley for it, but no reason anymore.

cwesYNjgMeoSlXSzjS90Gg.text: Eat here. The food is fantastic. I have eaten here a few times and will be back. Last time we had a late lunch eating their Turkey Sandwich and salad. It was great!! Ask to sit in Tracy's section. You will like her. She is very friendly and service orientated.

J4pI9k6QuZ_ENDAZBTaGTw.text: Drinks are great, but about 20% higher than even the overpriced casino bars.  We had fries with gravy cheese  etc. and the gravy was just gross.  Jambalaya was over seasoned and lacked taste.  I love spicy, but that was all we tasted.  Bacon dish is burned, they call it overcooked, but it is burnt.

4K3z8PtWvUE5oyFlXrPnsw.text: I didn't expect to come to the strip looking for great service, but I definitely got it here. About 6 weeks ago I was in Vegas for work, and I got served by Taylor for breakfast. She was very attentive and recommended the cinnamon roll waffles. Last week I was in town with my girlfriend, and since we were staying at Paris we stopped by for brunch. Who did I get as a server? Taylor! And lo and behold, she remembered me over a month later! I've been to some great restaurants before, but that is the kind of service that will keep me coming back!

zNCguuH3VrpL8NxGWVPUqQ.text: Hexx.....Way better than Sugar ever was!  For those of you that don't know Sugar was previously in this location.  Service was excellent!  The sausage pizza was simple but amazing!  I loved the twist on an original sausage pizza with the addition of pesto and baby spinach.  So good!  Of course you have to try dessert since it is their specialty.  The mini gourmet ice cream cone sampler was so fun and deliscious.  The ice cream was truly gourmet; very flavorful and creamy.  Definitely coming back!

RGWRa5_P7WPaBSlFeSZxCg.text: Standard menu for breakfast. The breakfast pizza was good but nothing special. The service was excellent. The waitress was very patient and accommodating with our son's food allergies.

_Woge33Xxo2XkDXlnpvRrA.text: My boyfriend and I had a meal package here for a Vegas show we purchased.  The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  We could only order from a prix fixe menu because of the special we had.  I ordered chicken and waffles and it was the most basic food for what was ordered.  The chicken looked like a kids menu from Denny's.  My boyfriend ordered grilled King salmon which was excellent.  Overall I would recommend this place but stay away from specialty item meals.

aEwn2gIUtDUOU1PPCMOzkw.text: Sunday Brunch was aMMMMazing at Hexx. Unlimited mimosas, great service & excellent food. But honestly, Tracee, our Waitress/ Mimosa Ninja, made the experience all the better. Can't wait to come back!

1A7HYttvUdlX-8ffa1aaIg.text: Excellent service, amazing food! Tracee is one of the best servers I have ever had! The chilaquiles were amazing, huge portion too. Great start to my trip, thanks Tracee!!

LUYbd2o0IAepp6lMse2YXw.text: Awesome!! YOU HAVE TO TRY THE BROCCOLINI! It was so good we ordered it twice. Also the Hexx martini was tasty. We received great service from both our server and the bartender Craig who was happy to make us our fancy Last Word cocktails. I appreciate the text when your table is ready so that you may walk the strip or drink at the bar. So happy we went with lunch here, it's beautiful and the food is delicious!! Will love to be back next time we're in Vegas!! :)

VMljdE6h6T0lAIV7gBzf8A.text: Terrible service. Took 20 min for someone to come up and take our breakfast order and the place was really slow at the time

5e_vMhldxO0bMiMN2YGGqg.text: Paid $18 for a salty oily personal pizza. Burger also burnt, salty, & expensive. The waiters are not to friendly either. Don't recommend this place.

fjlETx5OiI0zKNK2xYmggg.text: My husband, I & another couple ate lunch at HEXX for lunch on Feb. 15, 2016.  We were all starving and craving burgers.  The burgers were $18.00 (ya I know....it's Vegas).  We all ordered them. They were good, not great.....not $18.00.  Also, we asked for the burgers medium....they were well done. My friend did not hardly get any thousand island dressing for her burger.  They give you a ton of french fries.  The view is great & the service was friendly.

WSrDaw-IlyU48-mUV8L7Hw.text: This place is amazing original made a reservation for sugar factory and was thankful for the change..!!! Hands down great service, great food..!!! And beautiful view def suggest go around 7 so your whole dinner you get to see the water show at the mirage..!!! Omg..!!! I came with a party of 11 and was shocked how well we were taking care of.. And there birthday Sunday was soooo cute..!!! So please u want a great beginning to the evening start at the Hexx it was awesome get a steak and a glass of wine (fab selection by the way) and enjoy..!!! I will definitely make it a stop every Vegas trip..!!!

0gkW28sfFizKUYCAKPhCSg.text: Great View of the fountains at the Bellagio! Affordable and delicious.

Sc9mUV9rTVrZJw15Vp6UGQ.text: Did Hexx 3 tines in 48 hours so I have a good idea I think. Love anything outdoor in Vegas because the smoke kills me. Did drinks one night. One round for 4 people $75 with tip..About $15 a drink; not abnormal but nothing special either. Did breakfast 2 mornings in a row. First morning was early 830 am. Had omlette that is $14 and you get 2 items.Each additional item is  $1. Coffee is too strong; rot gut. Potatoes were interesting and good. Crispy and hard on outside and cooked potato on inside. One breakfast can be shared. OJ is $6 a glass! View outside nice; great waitress first morning. Terrible service last time. Waiter took an hour the next morning to bring one omlette and oatmeal. Almost missed flight, think I am over it. Inside has nice decor but think it is now a pass. Go to Mon aMi Gabi next door instead for another patio view. The location is great in that you are across from Bellagio water show.

DN8G3oCVClZ56CAreSxWvg.text: Tracee was a wonderful server. She has a beautiful demeanor that brightened up our morning. The food was delicious!

0maSioOL3q-LcZz_rqVeXw.text: Wow, we LOVED this place! We went on a Sunday afternoon for brunch. Service was prompt, we didn't have a wait at all. I loved the decor, all whites and beige. The interior of the restaurant opens directly onto the large patio so we got lots of fresh air and sunlight which was fabulous. Our waitress was attentive and quick. My friend who is a salad snob said her "Simple Salad" was one of the best she has ever had. I got the protein omelette which was very tasty. Our other friend ordered the sticky bun which was massive. Definitely will put you in a sugar coma if you try to eat the whole thing. The bowl of fruit was huge (definitely not the little side dish you typically think of) and has a great variety of fruits to snack on. Definitely one of my favorite restaurants on the strip.

3HP6aqXksJmIP2ncWVsdDg.text: Good food, wonderful view and FANTASTIC service! they are open 24 hours and its really hard to find late night restaurant with patio seating but this is the one to go to! their food is good but i love their dessert! make sure to try their pitcher cocktails. Also, they have brunch available on saturdays and sundays! :)

wdS8llB-Gqt7o1DZZmpXjw.text: I love this place!!! Jody was amazing!!! She really took care of us! And made us feel at home! THANK YOU JODY FOR MAKING OUR DAY EXTRA SPECIAL!!!!! My mom loves you by the way!!! The food was so good and full of flavor. I ordered the chilaquiles and it was bomb!!!!

gsY1z6KBb-HevqwPdLZCkg.text: We had a great brunch at Hexx!   The staff was dressed for the Game of Thrones theme and our waiter, Sean,  wore it well!  Sean recommended apple cheddar bourbon chicken & waffles.  It was great!  He was very attentive and engaged is in conversation which was very cool.  Good service is rare in LA!  Hexx is worth the calories.  Just walk the strip and burn it off in the heat :-)

OUyYrvn26bblarU8-JXusg.text: This place is great for patio seating and people watching, the fountains are right across the street so it is nice to sit outside and people watch.  Fun tip make sure to pick a shaded area if you get hot or burn easily, once seated they will not move you to a different seat.  We ordered cocktails and desserts, both were just ok. No show stoppers.  The staff is very nice. To use the restroom you do have to leave the resturant and walk into the Paris hotel which is not far but is a little confusing.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

nhqCw6YNgy99AMcng9u89w.text: In town for my boyfriend's 30th and I found this place suggested on yelp for American and I couldn't of been any happier!   We were going out for a night on the town, so this was the perfect place to start. Right across the street from the Bellagio fountains, we got to see three different shows from our table tucked away in a little private nook of the restaurant.   Service was great, dirty martini (with blue cheese olives!) was everything, and we had the crab cake, chopped salad, and blue cheese crusted sirloin all cooked to perfection! They even came out with a personal cake after I had mention via phone reservation we were celebrating the birthday! Will definitely recommend for future visitors!

awlUoB91EDNO58j84jK6zQ.text: OMG, best hamburger ever! The bun is made with white chocolate chips. Sounds weird but it's amazing. Trust me! My wife had the Sea Bass and, that, too, was really great.   This place is a must if you're in Vegas!

wYAX4eChtTeBLKjfYhwLTA.text: Nice ambience and outdoor seating right on the strip just outside of Paris and across from Bellagio. The food was good. Service was ok. Server got the burger wrong for my 10 year old and left him sitting there for at least 15 - 20 minutes watching us eat our meal. They could've at least left him the fries to munch on while they make the right burger. We ended up cancelling the burger they were still making and going somewhere else to grab him something quick to eat since he was starving. We only had the salmon, short rib, and a glass of wine and the bill came out to almost $90. We left still hungry. It's never good when you leave a nice restaurant still hungry after paying a Benjamin for it.

3g54Qyp8gytbi3SBJMIlhQ.text: I will be coming back for hat banana cream pie, over and over. Their signature chocolate is great, but a little too bitter for me. I wish they had a sweeter chocolate. overall still great!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ecuadorean Brownie
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Banana Cream Pie

nK0y-ZxV6cNmbRBpjk215Q.text: Shout out to our wonderful server Tracee... Excellent service, excellent food, and the best drinks... We were a rowdy bunch and she kept us pleased. Our drinks were never empty. Her excellent recommendations left us satisfied.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. We were so pleased with Hexx and Tracee
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tracee! Excellent service
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. After brunch treat

BK-0ZNbMO45Jinggfq08HA.text: I love this place. I've been here five times now for brunch, and I will continue to bring visitors because we always have so much fun. The $20 bottomless mimosa brunch is a great value, the waiters are always on top of refilling the glasses. The food is wonderful, the frittata and chicken and waffles are both top of the line. Tracee is THE BEST waitress, very attentive and extremely personable. Locals love this place and I suggest this place to anyone looking for a good, fun morning brunch!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waitress Tracee and our group &#34;dabbing&#34; after a joke brought about the popular dance move that we all have tried (and failed) at.

kAUZr8yVWYli3O9JLRQAZA.text: Great brunch place.  Trendy atmosphere.  Comfortable seating.  Nice view of the strip. Hash browns baked and fried  crisp to perfection.  French toast delicious.  Large portions.  Servers super friendly.  Shout out to Shanon and Natalie.  They were so pleasant.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rd4oEf3P7bI0BQqQEMAWbg.text: Worth the wait! It was super busy when we came here and the wait was worth every minute. The food was delicious, and the drinks were great. Our server Taylor led us to the best things on the menu and a bloody Mary that would make you slap your mother. Abram was great too, always making sure we were taken care of. Definitely better than a Vegas buffet!

1NeLYMy7Vr5NSae-H01vWQ.text: Not impressed at all the food is a 1 the service was good but the food was just barely average with mon ami gabi right there I would have to go there every time

BVz7neM0yxZBxSkvDa3NEw.text: Sean was our server and he was the best!! He made my girlfriends bachelorette brunch so special!

EU9iA8WSPO3V7HJOMLYlKw.text: My sisters and I stopped in here for a relaxed lunch on a Saturday. Surprisingly, they weren't that busy, which was nice. We sat inside, ordered a few drinks and a few appetizers to share. The drinks were very well mixed, and our food was outstanding, but three stars for the service!  Our waiter was terrible. He clearly looked and acted like he would rather have been anywhere but there; I so wish I remember his name! He brought us a second round of cocktails, at a sloth's pace I might add, and had a very hard time getting back to check on us. Or something. Then we turn around a see a table with a couple of drunk, scantily dressed ladies, and it all made sense! He was laughing and joking with them, while we and a couple of his other tables waited and waited for our bill. Not very impressive for a nice restaurant, sir.   The food and drinks, and overall atmosphere, definitely held our attention though, so I would definitely go back next time I'm in Vegas.

H6AzJW_kftGuoJo0O0hXLQ.text: Such a great time being served by Rafael. Awesome service. Such a great environment! So much personality. Always attentive to our table. Never asked for anything because he was always extremely professional.

YCGI1j2L3eXz6m9SbuZ2NA.text: My girlfriend and I were just at the Paris for 4 days and ate at the HEXX twice! The food was fabulous and the service from Tracee the best it gets Table 217 gets you a great view for people watching Thanks Tracee for a great time

YVCF1OEFN6nwGB0OLG4nkA.text: Juan and Kevin have excellent customer service.   Being in the hospitality business for over 20 years, I am very picky.  Their smile and laughter help create a pleasant atmosphere.  They knew just the correct length of time to ask how was the food, didn't come back a million times annoying us...new servers tend to adopt that behavior.  Amazing food and presentation made me come back for more.  Thank you.

0ssCilt-IFRbFrWSlGzHog.text: Beautiful setting tucked outside of the Paris hotel. Great for people watching and for enjoying some fantastic farm to table food. Everything was delicious and I left wanting more. Check out the chocolate and candy store for a post dinner sweet

67XRxXYeYv0y73EJE5hKUg.text: The chicken & waffles...YUCK!  Overdone, fried & battered to death.  Does this pic look at all appetizing?  Two stars instead of one because at least we got it refunded and had an okay spinach dip instead.  Much preferred the restaurant that used to be at this same site about a year or so ago.  Dissatisfied and won't being going back.  If you must just try a pizza or burger less likely to be burnt and gross!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Does this even look appetizing?  Can&#39;t even tell there&#39;s chicken under thick, dry, disgusting, burnt crust.

e1os3hWFkcjIk7FVniGdcQ.text: Being a local and trying all of the offerings Las Vegas has, my party of three decided to give "HEXX" a try. It was worth it!  From the time we were taken on a tour of Hexx  Chocolate & Confexxions by "Gianni" and seated at our table by "Parish" the service and the food were great. We went with the suggestions of our server "Steven" from the appetizer to our desert and his suggestions were spot on. We had two server assistants "Phillip" and "David" making sure our glasses were always full.   A special thank-you to "Juan Sanchez" and "Katelyn Ix" the two managers for the desert suggestions and the BEST chocolate martini called "The Hexx" my wife has ever had!  We group highly recommends "HEXX" and will be back for dinner, desert or trip to the bar, and yes they do have a Happy Hour!

oiUVG-xW1R5sSh16KKJppA.text: Great customer service! The location is right across the street from the Bellagio and is in the middle of the strip.  The reason I took away a star was because although the food was good, it wasn't great for the price you pay.   My husband got the spaghetti and meatballs and I had the shrimp fettuccine. Both items were good but it wasn't anything to write home about.  The customer service was phenomenal though!!

Y3CRdYk9mPIQxH9gbst8yw.text: Taylor made this place!!! So fun, great service, and we loved hanging out with her. Never let her go. :))

qSzQCvWzLXfC8tt4JC96pw.text: Hexx is amazing! A great place for the whole family. The cinnamon roll waffles are to die for. You definitely have to try the cinnamon roll waffles. They have great outdoor seating, and you can watch people walking down the strip, and you get to see the Bellagio show from the outdoor seating. Next time we go to Vegas we will definitely be going back to Hexx!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing!

5aTAbLTVF7fYZM65KA8SZQ.text: We just wondered in to this place while walking along the strip. The food was amazing. I had their signature burger which is certainly one of best burgers I've ever eaten. My girlfriend had the veggie pizza which was also very good and had some unique and interesting toppings. Sean was our waiter. He was very knowledgeable about the menu items which helped us make the right choices. He gets five stars for that and service. The reason I gave only 4 stars has to do with the hostess. The restaurant wasn't very busy at the time we arrived. There were so many empty seats that some employees seemed to have nothing to do. For some reason however, we were put on a 20 minute wait with plenty of empty and clean tables inside and out. No one could give a reasonable reason why. I would recommend this place, but next time I'm asking for the manager if they say there's a wait.

wE8j3X4BGu92vifvW6q5zQ.text: Service here is horrible .. came here with my Bride Team out of a group of 7.. 1 person just laid her head down cause she had a headache and a manager came to our table and told us that SHE CANT LAY her head down and be sleeping in this restaurant .. really don't judge a book by its cover .. SHE wasn't even sleeping to be at it .. REALLY!! .. your restaurant isn't even upscale like that.. and plus I think worrying about one person putting their head down is ridiculous.. THEY SHOULD WORRY ABOUT their POOR Food is service which  is extremely slow .. they just been serving water water water like fuck the water ... WHERE IS THE FOOD!

XfDp__EFgjtrC1opZU2ErQ.text: Great food, fantastic location, decent prices, and mimosas that totally hit the spot!

-shouks0ZiAi2_bnOoGADQ.text: Terrific breakfast and fab service by Sean. Will definitely return. Lovely start to our day. Thanks niece Cat for the recommendation. It's a winner.

7xkNS_7yzES47obcPkqSMA.text: This place has THE best steak and eggs I've ever eaten! The mimosas don't taste the greatest and are a bit overpriced, but the food makes up for it. Inside is pretty loud and crowded but the outdoor seating is wonderful and has a great view of the bellagio fountain show.

oD2cP7UmycThuSRqNsZ61A.text: TRACEE IS THE BEST. Bottomless mimosas are the bomb. Great atmosphere. Great food. Great service. Go.

STOVChmZdVrF1w4jpMa7jA.text: Great Brunch location, significantly bettered by the staff. Sean was our server and he was particularly excellent. Will be going back! Sticky bun was HUGE!!  Reservations a good idea.

Er6F_bXDzvSx7th0Q_7ajQ.text: Excellent food, well presented and great service. Was a bit pricey for brunch, but I guess this is to be expected given this location.

2zcDVj0EzUbxcAGqiYhqgw.text: Went for brunch during a mid week trip to Vegas. Sat on the patio and the view/people watching was great! They didn't advertise their bottomless mimosas (I think since it was during the week) but when we asked they still gave us the deal. The food was really good and nice portion sizes. One of my favorite meals in Vegas for sure!

pdIrWFUwZ2yqTZs18r3mQQ.text: On a recent Christmas Holiday trip to Las Vegas where we stayed at Paris Las Vegas Hotel& Casino,we had breakfast at HEXX kitchen+bar. Upon entering and being ushered to the hostess and after requesting if we could sit indoors but near the windows, we were immediately escorted to a table right at the front of the restaurant that provided a view of the strip as well as the Fountains of Bellagio directly across the street. The waiter who oversaw our servers was named Sean and he,along with the rest of his team, provided very attentive service and our breakfast selections prepared exactly as we had requested. When we were ready to leave they even brought us additional coffee in 'to go" cups,rather than just giving us what remained at our table. Excellent food and outstanding staff that provided one of our best dining experiences of our trip! We will definitely return and would highly recommend HEXX kitchen + bar.

fdNb_BbWamGJXYXCoA-3Lw.text: Love this place.. Actually we love Angie which is why we come here! She is such a hoot and always takes good care of us. Rafael was our server, and he too is the bomb. Highly recommend the chilaquiles. Thanks Ari for the blue sweetener!

V0GXp6lkEdg53Z1f0hsc-A.text: Beautiful view, excellent location, bellagio fountain on the hour.  Mediocre food. Pizza was bad (soggy on the bottom). Ate half a slice and gave up. Service was nice though.

YWByQzt_4t3djhlAHqZxdg.text: Went here for brunch on our last day in Vegas for a bachelorette party and we were so glad we did. It was a short walk from our room at the Cosmo and every single bit of food we had was delicious. Cece was an amazing server and made sure our mimosa glass did not run dry! Check this place out!

jWR-ElsQ7eHjCSYS_p1yCQ.text: My friends and I came here for happy hour which was 20% off appetizers, snacks, and pizzas. The happy hour tables were first come first serve and all of them were taken so we asked the hostess if we could sit somewhere else to get the happy hour. She spoke with the manager and we were able to get our own private booth! We ordered 2 hexx potion drinks... The magick dragon and the voodoo tea. The voo doo tea was extremely sour so we asked them to switch it out for another magick dragon which they were happy to do. The presentation of the hex potions were really neat because they poured the drink over liquid nitrogen which made the drinks really look like a potion!  We order a pepperoni pizza, a margarita pizza, grilled asparagus, and a chicken Caesar salad. Everything was delicious, especially the Chicken Caesar salad.   Overall, the presentation, food, and service was great.

4LdZrliv41tGNn4SszQ6eg.text: This place was loud. I could barely hear the server. The service was OK. The food was OK. We tried it out because we were going to a show at Bally's and it was close. I'm sorry that I don't remember what I had because it was forgettable. My friends had a special bloody mary and thought that it was overpriced and wasn't anything special. It wasn't a bad experience, but just not my kind of place.

ZCPclEs395DTdKaZWuH3Mw.text: Food was excellent!  Lobster roll was amazing. Sean and Crystal provided awesome customer service.  We'll be back again.

_RDSFgs4IqHgETHI-_onyA.text: The eggs benidict was amazing! I reccomend trying the sangria flight and of course bottomless mimosas! Amazing service from Spencer. The atmosphere is very warm and welcoming!

HjD50H_DScNXCGMvGJCYLQ.text: Love HEXX for brunch, it's always our first stop in Vegas and especially for the bottomless mimosas, my girlfriends and I always love dining here!! Service is fantastic, food is wonderful and we love the ambiance!!

yzXIKreAo843vGeVQP-1DQ.text: This place was great. We celebrated my 24th birthday brunch here and I couldn't have been happier. It was really hot and they somehow managed to cover all the tables perfectly. Our waiter was phenomenal and the service was impressive. The food was delicious with a good variety to choose from. We got this huge drink that came in a disco ball. It was delicious I suggest you give this place a try

KFrOeIMMPHegNES7c65uaQ.text: Awesome awesome awesome .  Our server Sean was so cool kind and attentive. Drinks food interior everything was on point. My friend had birthday day before so he brought her little cake with candle. Champagnes jelly dessert it's must have! Thanks guys!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Jelly champagne dessert!

QGTLWXjLr7jhP4wHfIQhTw.text: Don't believe the hype.  The $36 Bloody Mary was awful. They give you half a crabs leg, 4 shrimp, 2 olives, 2 pieces of cheese, some bacon, and it was watered down. The Golden Nugget has a better BM for $12.  The ceviche was flavorless.  The Brussels sprouts were good but tart.  The mushroom risotto was over down with mushrooms and also flavorless.  Burger was a tiny little patty.   The only good thing was the patio on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0Btpvsib4L7D82gpwsCBMg.text: This was our last stop in Vegas before the airport. A few years ago, my girlfriends and I had a memorable breakfast here - we still talk about the cinnamon roll waffles, so obviously we had to come back. It's fun to sit underneath the Paris Eiffel Tower and watch the Strip. We were seated quickly and got our drinks in short order. The cocktails are pretty pricey, so we skipped those and just got food.  My friend and I split a cinnamon roll waffle and a basic egg breakfast, reasoning that the protein in eggs would offset the sugar bomb that is the waffle. Totally works! ;) my other friend got the Benedict, which is served on a bed of has browns rather than an English muffin.  The wait for food wasn't great, and not was the service (friendly but slow), but when we eventually got the food - OMG! Get something that has the breakfast potatos! They are smashed and cooked til crispy and have Parmesan cheese and wow, just delish! Perfectly cooked eggs, crispy bacon, and to top it all off, a waffle made of cinnamon roll dough and covered in cream cheese frosting. Definitely a must for breakfast, as long as you aren't in a hurry.

uc1ZZIbpqeJkVNdAr2gr9w.text: Had a Groupon for $50 worth of food that I paid $30 for. Made a reservation and was seated immediately after arriving on a busy Saturday morning. Our waitress was quick and we had no issues. The food was amazing! I had the HEXX Benedict (no asparagus) and my husband had the fresh eggs (scrambled with bacon.) Both our dishes tasted amazing. Would highly recommend this place as a breakfast spot!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EgaSMeuyJlrOq7ZpHe1Qvg.text: Ordered our Thanksgiving to go from Hexx and it was beyond amazing!!! The food and the shear amount of it, the details, the cost, everything was perfect. The best thing though was the entire Pumpkin cheesecake that it came with. Sure, I need to buy bigger pants after all of it but it was 100% worth it.  Pick up at the Paris was really unorganized but whatever! Worth driving to Vegas for Thanksgiving every year. Thank you!

VV4px0bq9C4HeS5AJoF9RA.text: We went here for brunch and the food was absolutely amazing. I had the pancakes with bananas on the side and my husband had the meat omelette. Our food was so good and flavorful. And they give you a huge portion. We also had the bottomless mimosas and our waiter Apollo made sure our glasses were always filled. Great experience. We would definitely come back.

ZxIknd8VDG9lCPzpboVuIQ.text: One star based on my experience with the hostess. I'm in town for business, traveling alone. When I requested a table for one she immediately looked at me as if I wasn't worth her time. Before even telling me how long the wait would be she immediately told me to just sit at the bar (which was full, thanks, not my first rodeo). I then asked how long it would be for a table and she rolled her eyes and said ten minutes.  Thanks for the warm welcome. There are sooooo many food choices in this town, Hexx Kitchen is no longer one of them.

-peuKC1AvWxpO3sdRKc6Dg.text: It was a real disappointment! breakfast was not good and the place was so loud music!

Of1aR6gnhh8EFyVPie6Vww.text: Apolo was awesome and took care of us !! Totally recommend this place for bottomless mimosas and the ridiculous chicken and waffles

cdv0czkNUM12qtF-ZW8vBQ.text: My boyfriend got the ribeye and macaroni and cheese, and I got the pepperoni pizza. For the appetizer, we got the garlic cheesy bread. Everything was delicious!

jeyhqK8IqxLxHhufuu-FOg.text: Let's just say we had brunch at this place two days in a row and almost made it three! The customer service was great I wish I remembered our waitress name because she great! They had a dance off between guest and staff and she was being our waitress the first day was busting a move. I been to Vegas many times but when I entered into this restaurant it did not feel like Vegas. It was a good feeling of being on vacation without the craziness of Vegas. Let's talk about the food "fantastic" even the drink I enjoyed the mule probably one of my favorites I had while visiting last week. If you are thinking of a place to eat this is definitely your spot. It was hot but with the ceiling fans and misters it felt good. I look forward to eating here when I visit again!
