Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dgbNMG110BAONL5eVAMoAA.text: Unexpected find on my first full day in Vegas. Food elevated the standard fare and was delicious. Highly recommend!

zua5m84-PDcgEwTvo77Xag.text: Huge portions and Excellent Food We have been to Hexx multiple times, due to there amazing breakfast/Brunch menu. The first time I went I ordered the Chilaquiles not knowing what I was going to get they bring out this massive plate of chips and cheese and eggs, it was so amazing I knew it was not the small portion.   The second time we went I ordered a break sandwich and it was also very large and amazing. So much flavor and very great portion sizes for the value you get.

SFHf_B8RlPyxKqtSS_o1vg.text: Get the carrot cake pancakes!  Delicious and the portion is definitely shareable.  We went on a Monday morning and were seated immediately without a reservation.  Overall very relaxing brunch experience.

6DUN5VekuGEa1EgDybCgKw.text: Everything I've had here is fantastic!! We seem to keep coming back versus trying other restaurants. There hasn't been one menu item I have had a complaint about.

fn5ihL0G_3Sgj3WrIX8zjQ.text: After a long NYE night at Omnia with Calvin Harris, we woke and needed some comfort food. At Hexx, we had the French Toast, Chicken & Waffles, coffee, and their Hexx specialty drink. Everything was good, a dj was blasting tunes which was a bit much until the coffee and food see in and we then could enjoy it. Our server was wearing a pink rabbit onesy - hilarious. Great time and got us pumped up for another crazy day in Vegas.

tDLRsnqjiDywQATqUZYi5A.text: In Vegas for my bachelorette & my MOH choose here for brunch. Let me tell you, the mimosas brought us in the door, but Tracy MADE our brunch. She totally understood the whole bachelorette gig and kept us entertained and the mimosas flowing. The food was decent. I can't really remember it to be honest. Give Tracy a rause!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Sf82Sbn9mWMJYbOsg3pw4Q.text: We had a great breakfast here sitting outside on the strip. I had the three egg breakfast, and the over easy eggs were cooked perfectly. The potatoes were nice and crispy on the outside.  My wife had the ham croissant. It included a lot of ham, a flaky croissant, and she added an egg (which she recommends). All of it was tasty. Would definitely come back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Hqtf7m_O0p0-FADvqQ9kOA.text: My experience at Hexx was amazing. We had no reservation and the wait time was minimal. Our server Rachel M was one of the best servers I have ever had. I've been working in hospitality for over 10 years and Rachel M has been one of the best employees I've encountered. She was so warm and welcoming. She even wrote us a list of places to check out. Rachel M made this brunch the best I've ever had... and I brunch ALOT!!!

tZItVxF4aNhbF3ZCARERKg.text: Came in for breakfast..it was decent. We were automatically led outside to eat without being given a choice to eat inside. When we asked to eat inside, it seemed an inconvenience but we were accommodated. Customers like choices. Pancakes were really good, came out hot. Our egg plates looked as if they were sitting around, waiting while the pancakes were cooking. We had to ask for extra syrup; one shot glass size syrup is not nearly enough for 4 fluffy pancakes. Even the extra shot glass of syrup wasn't enough but I didn't have the heart to ask for more. I ordered coffee..pretty good but my complaint for the coffee refill is this; the coffee canister hangs off the tub that holds multiple canisters of ice water. The coffee refill was lukewarm at best. Because it was lukewarm, it tasted bitter and wasn't worth finishing the cup. This doesn't make sense to me. The server was pleasant and eager to please. The complimentary chocolates at the end were a nice touch. They promote the connecting dessert store next door and it was a nice tasty treat to finish the meal. Overall, the presentation was nice..good pancakes, potatoes and service. Not sure it's worth the $60 for breakfast but that's standard fare in Vegas. Probably won't go again for breakfast..a crepe from La Creperie will probably suffice.

POt3s4GCzZTATUZ82aLNsw.text: Very welcoming atmosphere with a friendly staff.  Love the smothered fries and the lobster roll sandwich has so much flavor. We stopped in at the ice cream bar & enjoyed the chocolate tour. Such a unique gem in the city!!

XYHFyiysJ1XOPzgf-6xv3A.text: The food here was fantastic but even better than that was our waitress Tracee!! She had so much energy and went out of her way to make sure we were all having a great time. I would come again just sit at her table!!

DwtUHrAw_y8K4IfjAxI9_w.text: Tracee is the absolute best! Bottomless mimosas for $23, great food, and excellent service. We will be back!

SFFFE3mXzmhE7Cc_p9HPwg.text: I had the steak frites and regret it.   The steak was indescribably bad the fries were stale.   There are far better ways to spend $35 than paying for the opportunity to suffer through this food.   Offering a shot at redemption, I returned a couple days later for brunch. And left regretting it too.  The Veggie Quiche was inconsistently cooked, and somehow, really greasy. The potatoes were served with substance that resembled a house speciality Ketchup but was actually a strawberry jam and butter puree. Because Vegas, right?

vysaNiZzARjKNRnHNs41Hw.text: Tracy is our lifeline.  We are going to live thanks to Tracy!  She kept that vitamin c coming!!!!

TJg9g77cKHPSi4-VqjSnCA.text: There restaurant itself is a 4 star but the Short Rib dinner was a 5. Would definitely go back for that and the Jambalaya was a 4 star. Also the patio is a nice place to people watch overlooking the strip.

6UPS5fvyFFg-2knDtICieg.text: This is the best pizza on the strip. Julia is the best server here. I would like to come again. All five stars.

YilhMTC4ZNXDgYUCWLynwA.text: My boyfriend and I work having a slow start to the morning and arrived late to bottomless mimosa brunch with our friends. The "bottomless" deal was about to end, but Julio talked to the manager and allowed us to do one hour of bottomless mimosas. The chicken and waffle breakfast was amazing as well. So thankful for Julio our fabulous server and being so accommodating, quickly refilling drinks, very friendly, knowledgeable about the menu and making our experience great!

kg0jv8XDxTEcGyR42LxEJQ.text: We came here for dessert and drinks only, they have a very nice patio with a beautiful view. The prices are decent for the spot. The desserts and drinks were all really good. The service was one of the best..

19vAHIm-CyvTAinqc7yrzA.text: Amazing food! Amazing Service!! Jessica was absolutely great!! Loved the overlooked bacon and the desserts are to die for!!!

dpB0xSHiXTKiWgNP6Tboqg.text: Just ate here with a Groupon and won't be back. The temp here in Vegas is in the 40's yet the front door was propped open to attract customers walking by. At first I felt sorry for the hostess who was wearing a winter coat. Then I felt bad for me as I was freezing my entire meal and I'm from Chicago! Apparently it's more important to entice new customers than take care of your current ones. Obviously the food, once served got cold really fast.   I ordered the soup which was excellent and the smothered fries which is supposed to have pulled pork in it. I tore the fries apart and found one small bite size piece of meat. When I questioned our server about this, he could have cared less. But that didn't surprise me as he could have cared less about anything. I requested salt and pepper when our food was delivered. I ended up having to get up and get it from a table by us because he just disappeared. Meanwhile don't forget, the dining room is freezing and my soup is getting colder by the minute.  People next to us ordered coffee, got it, but didn't have spoons. They requested spoons several times and again the waiter just disappears. I'm sure their coffee got cold while waiting for something to stir it with. The garlic bread I ordered was burned. We had to laugh and said it was just like home. But seriously what kind of chef burns bread and then sends it out of the kitchen? What wait staff professional would serve it??  So, in a nutshell, service was bad, restaurant was freezing, my food was ill prepared and no one cared. The manager came to our table to swipe my Groupon and couldn't be bothered to ask about our dining experience. The high prices here will deter most people. Having been to Vegas dozens and dozens of times I still get shocked when a glass of pop at your table is $4.95. It's truly highway robbery.   I HIGHLY recommend any other of the many dining options close by. Mon Ami Gabi right next door is 1000x better for about the same price.

3TsjKR7vy7hCYW9_h9E6oA.text: Just had a perfectly wonderful lunch at Hexx. Met with a friend I hadn't seen in a while to catch up. Service was great, food was delicious, and the atmosphere was so cool. You could watch people walk by on the vegas strip but we weren't too close to the commotion. Our server, Sean, was awesome. So nice and attentive. Couldn't ask for more!

aiH6J6RD88Px1HlqSNmAlA.text: Wonderful bottomless brunch spot. Great service, fantastic food, but the service by Sean was the best part. Very attentive, friendly, and great recommendations on the menu. Cannot recommend enough - ask for Sean!

yn8-pXGUSj4_CWmYbavjJw.text: I asked for medium rare on my steak --- They gave me a well done piece of chewy New York piece of charred shit... If not for the decor and service, I would have rated this place less than one star.

fw93g6iVj_lAUuAWwwsZiQ.text: Came here excited to try the chicken and waffles. Service time and waitress were good. However the chicken and waffle plate came with huge disappointments. Chicken was seasoned very oddly- heavy hand on the seasoning and thus over powered the entire meal.

Za1PnQZt1HhmoEPkERQ36w.text: Nice decor inside and good outdoor seating overlooking the strip. Started with the meatball small plate and I did not particularly like the meatball or sauce but the polenta underneath was really tasty. Had the mushroom pasta and it was quite good! Giving it a three due to the inconsistency and the relatively slow service given how empty it was that night.

2htimKXwiuSvs5X_FG-uSg.text: Very disappointing... came back to see our server, Shannon to find out she's no longer here. My husband said to give it a chance. We sat on the patio thinking the view would be worth it. Food was mediocre at best. Service was so-so. Managers look frantic and unorganized. Really thought we had found our new favorite place in Vegas. Unfortunately, our previous experience that we were so fond of, was a one time deal.

av1Um66pc2P4RcMs65ZFNA.text: Favorite place in Vegas wonderful atmosphere right in front of the bellagio fountains they have an outdoor seating as well. We got the bottomless mimosas which is unlimited for $20 can't beat that. Food was amazing tasty as well I will definitely be back

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carnitas hash and brioche French toast

YeLBSYNWzBLKxE4hb3GbZg.text: I always like to come to this place with me and my girlfriends but on the May 1 2016 I went in and say on the patio .TRACEE was my waitress and she was so nice and upbeat ...I'm all about positive energy and she joke with us and came and checked on us frequently something that I had not experience any other time I been there she even got me to try the dessert  that she personally said was delish! Honestly the next time I got in their which will be soon because I love the margherita pizza here I hope TRACEE is there !!! I hope I spelled her name right and if she reads this  Hiiiiii TRACEE !! Thanks for the good time and fast service

jiOpH-uGJ2J0yAlaFsDfNg.text: Went here for a later dinner recently and we ate on the patio which was great for watching the Bellagio fountains and for people watching.  I ordered a steak and received a recommendation to order the broccoli. The broccoli was meant to share for the table but everyone should order their own because it is amazing!   Like everything in Vegas, is his dinner was also pretty expensive.

_pm5ztsBr14bRZRcFyk6XA.text: Food is good. Service is good. The view is beautiful. The price is super high tho. Cheese bread with ricotta cheese was super good. The steak was cooked to perfection. The Mac and cheese was very taste. I recommend this spot just not if you are on a budget. This is the kind of place your spouse and you go to celebrate a special occasion. On the upside they do have a Groupon for this spot.

vBkw2EfW8bxjoDzbqXTWkw.text: This was the perfect brunch. We sat out on the Terrace and enjoyed freshly squeezed orange juice amazing pancakes and syrup awesome chicken sausage and the breakfast potatoes were the best I've ever had. Service was casual yet professional we never felt rushed. Nice mix of music too.

5MrGh3sP5vPBmiuAYgeEgQ.text: Excellent brunch, bottomless mimosas (our server always seemed ready to pour before we ever got close to the bottom), wonderful service, pretty patio seating.

FC09yE_B2HIWeV0BiYItIQ.text: This place has a nice airy feel. Huge glass sliding glass doors that open the restaurant up onto the patios. I love music but it was really loud and head banger music in a classy place like this.... was making my head hurt and I found myself wanting to leave because of it. I couldn't relax and enjoy my meal. I had the Benedict. It was presented beautifully. My first egg was perfectly poached. The temperature of the meal was warm. The hollandaise sauce was bland.  It was nice to find this as a gluten free option. Hopefully next time the eggs with be the same and the entire meal would be a bit hotter. Our server was very kind and knowledgeable. I must say that I would hope this was just an off day for them. I would give it another chance.  I saw many beautiful plates of food passing me by.

IZQ6jFW0NWDT782kkJcS0Q.text: Came here for Sunday brunch. It was amazing!! We had a great time. Make reservations because there is always a wait. The mimosas were great and they keep refilling them as long as you want. They are really bottomless mimosas! The chilaquiles were soooo good! Best brunch item on the menu. We enjoyed them and they filled us up. The service was so great. Even though they were busy; they were very attentive and friendly. The ambiance is great and you have a wonderful view of the strip. Will definitely come back!

gSCjt71XRExiKpF662iNiQ.text: Best spot for brunch and unlimited mimosas!  My husband and I got spinach dip and the pepperoni pizza.  Delicious! We will be back!

2S1crNPXRAFFTWGMmJiAlg.text: The food and service was incredible. Our waiter Jackson was very professional and on top of everything. The management team was very accommodating and made sure we had the best dinner possible for my boyfriends mom. Overall one of the best dinner services I've had.

QQZKd3PMcGicCutX0fkFpA.text: The food and beer was amazing, however there was only one bartender on staff which made service at the bar slow. There was 3 of us total at the bar and service was still slow. My wife got the veggie pizza and I got the prime rib Both were really good. My wife even liked the prime rib and she usually doesn't enjoy meat at all and is pretty much a vegetarian. Used the yelp checkin for free dessert which was a bonus.

z7nFL48oPHj2cjf7XDBdMg.text: We liked it so much on our recent vacation that we went there two mornings in a row. Despite the busy season they always were able to seat us quickly. Service was excellent, the food came in generous portions and seemed reasonably priced for the area.

gE31zbjK0NZ9Bs7kXI5q0A.text: This review is long overdue. Me and my wife wind up in Vegas last year for Christmas. This was a very last minute plan as our original plan got canceled. It was December 24th, we didn't have any reservations for any other restaurants. Surprisingly they were able to seat us in almost immediately.   Service was excellent. The prime rib took the jewel crown here. It cut through like butter, melts in your mouth, perfectly seasoned and salted. Just amazing. Probably the best prime rib I've ever had. We also tried their truffle fries which was fantastic as well. This restaurant is priced very well considering the food!  We appreciate the good service. It's a nice restaurant with a great ambiance. Go here if you haven't. I have no bad things to say. Thanks guys. Will be back on my next Vegas visit.

jx20TMWoUaZQ0g0glLfOAw.text: I came here with a groupon on hand and it's a good thing too because restaurants on the strip can be pricey.  I made a reservation and requested to be outdoors facing the the strip and that is exactly what I got.  It's a perfect location because you can view the Bellagio fountains across the street and just people watch. Our wait staff was fabulous and attentive.  I ordered the chicken and waffles and a midori sour, both were excellent.  We also tried their famed Hexx pitcher which was neat and worth trying atleast once but I would not get again because the price is a bit ridiculous for me. On your way out you can view where they mix and make their chocolates.  Overall this place was a very nice place for any meal.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5tPzNCpyAfTToe8El0KIBw.text: Great people watching spot, no doubt.    But I can get a BETTER omelet from IHOP for half the price.  No one at breakfast was impressed with the meal.  Service was good and nothing was gross, but there are better options on the Strip.

9KQ7qR2G5BFQiNhcHmIezw.text: This place is so good for brunch on the strip. First off, the view is so beautiful and located perfectly. Second, bottomless mimosas. Enough said. Third, the food was soooo good. I had the eggs benedict and my boyfriend got the chicken and waffles. Both were outstanding. We will definitely be back.

zGzp4mA3EnpHfCTtQNc_ow.text: Stopped in at HEXX for brunch while on a girls trip in Vegas. We were searching the strip for somewhere to eat and HEXX had lots of diners enjoying brunch so that's always a good sign!  Our server was fantastic! Really wish I could remember her name, but the service any place we went in Vegas was really just wonderful. Every server was top-notch!  We ordered the Colossal Bloody Mary to split between 4 girls. It was huge and came with a king crab leg, shrimp, bacon, and pepper skewer.   The food was average and good enough to combat a hangover. The one shining star to the meal was the pecan sticky bun! OMG order this if nothing else because it was so so good. Everyone in the group order an omelette, which came with an english muffin and side of potatoes. The potatoes were tasty; potatoes roasted and topped with parm. I didn't care much for the meat omelette since there was just too many random meats in it, like the pork wasn't very good and especially not mixed in with chicken and bacon.  Atmosphere was cute with an open dining room and doors that open into the patio area so the space feels very large. Decor was light, neutral palette and reminds me of a Santa Monica vibe.

LtcZtKZdsuZzlc6n2mCvMw.text: Great service from Tolu (sorry if I spelled it wrong) He was awesome.  The food was awesome.. The seating was great!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy!!!

OCIqh-3UuaAmwSHvaMmpaA.text: Excellent service! Maria was our server and helped us select wines for our meals. The food was very flavorful and the atmosphere was very warm and inviting. Can't wait to go back again. Also, very vegetarian friendly.

AM8vpyH1WUlmuB5k3atEYw.text: Nice brunch spot located at the Paris hotel street facing the Bellagio. Friendly, attentive wait staff. Food was great but nothing special or different from your typical dishes...especially considering the price tag. I felt $20 for an omelet and home fries was a bit much but we just rolled with it. The space is clean and there is indoor and patio seating. Recommend patio seating of course!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nice patio view
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie omelette

f1ANNmMjwjbxv67Am4uWTA.text: Excellent service and excellent food!!!! Tummy satisfied. Stacy and Patrick hands down had amazing customer service!!!! Will be back here for sure!

SeYV78Po0PxQ_AuPuET3Rg.text: We found this place purely by chance.  We had a great table right by the sidewalk on the Strip.  Great for people watching.  We ordered a pitcher of Sangria and it did not disappoint.  We also ordered Ceviche and the Beef Tacos, both excellent.  Staff was very friendly.

WC8GYcrqyX3o1K-HtqaoCg.text: This is my 3rd time at HEXX. In the past I got the Benedict which is good. This time I got the Bloody Mary which was great and the chilaquiles which's was super disappointing. The prices are expensive so I expected more.

AQr-vWza2HgiZeUN6AYcYA.text: I took my son for his birthday, it's a nice restaurant. Piano music on one side and the other was a lounge seating type. Strip view Fountains of the Bellagio great for seeing foot traffic on the strip but the only thing that disappointing was that they didn't sing to my son for his birthday. He was feeling a little down and I wanted to cheer him up to make him feel special and our server obviously was not in the mood to sing or properly take care of our table. Food was ok I would love to give you a 5 star but if your server looks like he's in a hurry then I will give you a poor rating. You never know who's dinning Concierge Dine too and give feed back to our Guest!

OfrlBG5lH8V5LNY2WiJSDQ.text: Last day in Vegas and stopped in for brunch, very busy but we got seated quickly and were able to pass to a different table that was under the heaters with no issues. The coffee was good and seemed to never drop below the rim of the cup, our waitress was constantly topping it off. We ordered the eggs Benedict and bacon and eggs plate.  Although the Benedict plate seemed a bit small, it was delicious and in my top 5 list now...Breakfast Republic's version in San Diego is on that list as well.  No issues changing the English muffin on the eggs plate for toast and the potatoes that came with it were very good.  Great service for how busy it was, I would go back just for the Benedicts again.

yOC_B7n0kRiLMp32D7evKA.text: Came here for a birthday brunch for my best friend on St. Patrick's Day. I remember the location when the Sugar Factory was here. The staff and service here is wonderful! They were accommodating of last minute changes, even on a busy Saturday! The menu has a few options under each category, but there is a lot of variety! We had a party of 13 and everyone ordered something they liked; talk about a miracle! We sat outside on the patio and again, just a beautiful experience. I would definitely come back; maybe even for my birthday! Oh they also serve cake pops if it's your birthday :)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Patio view

PfWdZXzUAZZwEAbaLOX2dw.text: Absolutely impressed by this place. Maybe we got lucky that day but the service was impeccable. Since we stepped into the restaurant we were nicely welcomed by the host. We did have a reservation so we got seated right away. No matter from where you seat, the view and the decor of this place make the experience better. Our waiter was really nice. He suggested couple of dishes and he was on point. Besides ordering from the menu, we algo used the Groupon offer for wine and cheese tasting which we had it at the end of our meal so we took our sweet time to enjoy everything. The food menu has a little bit of everything; for meat lovers like me as well as for vegetarians. I loved everything I had. We got to see the fountain show across street and that's pretty cool. I highly recommend this place. Food was freshly made and the atmosphere is just perfect either to enjoy a good conversation or just to relax and enjoy a good meal. Loveeeed it!!!

lM_e2IFPt7y3gPyveV0Hpw.text: Wow. The Benedict was something else. So yummy!! Also make sure you try the crab cakes- super crabby and a little hot tempered.

qWZmgQcXwOBknBF7f0r0bw.text: This is a place I will definitely be back to and recommend. I got the $50 towards food and drinks for 2 people. We had the crispy calamari to start and it was surprisingly tasty with the buffalo and ranch sauces. My husband had the wagyu beef hamburger - it was awesome and really best with the homemade pickles on it. I ordered the gnocchi pomodoro. The pomodoro sauce was almost better than the gnocchi. I also ordered 2 drinks - the Hexx fusion which was well-balanced and not too sweet; and the raspberry fizz which was also good. Can't wait to try brunch!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Juicy wagyu beef hamburger with all the trimmings
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The pomodoro sauce was very yummy

YmyAl1NaKe4k6AthyRmHAQ.text: Me and wife were on our short 3-day vacation, and on our second day, we decided to check out Hexx, as the menu looked really appetizing. Little did we know that the dining experience (brunch) would blow us away. I started out with a berry bowl, which was really good. Then came the main course: Hexx Benedict for me and Protein Omelet for my wife.  The presentations were simple and very eye-appealing. Loved the asparagus topping the whole of egg benedict. The ham and the thinly sliced potatoes were really well complementing the dish.  Protein Omelet was really, really good. It was nice and moist and fluffy. Far from all the omelets we've had in the past. The guacamole was a very nice addition to the dish. Adds a very nice flavor to the whole dish.  This is one brunch we're not going to forget anytime soon and will reminisce for weeks to come!  Ps. Forgot to mention our server, Enrique. Very attentive. Very courteous. Right on point. Would recommend him.

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yd-oHY8ulJ_rwzN72_HA2w.text: I've actually already written a review for this place for dinner, but decided to check out brunch this time.  I was going to order the bottomless mimosas, however due to activities the night before, alcohol was not on the to do list anymore haha. It did look like they were filling other guests glasses often though.  I opted for the ham and cheese croissant. It was large and delicious. It also came with breakfast potatoes.   I was also able to sit outside on the patio and enjoy the "cool" Las Vegas morning and watch walkers on the strip.  Definitely check this place out. It has a nice location and the food is great.

6aHKJO6EEQQKodNxJmaehw.text: I went to Hexx with a very large group for brunch one Sunday as our last big hurrah in town. Hexx did a wonderful job seating our party of about 12 as well as keeping us entertained before being seated. Once seated, our waiter introduced himself promptly and we all loved him, he was fun and dynamic. Several of my friends ordered the bottomless mimosas to get the party started. After ordering our food, we had a strange encounter with the kitchen staff... as they were bringing out our food (which was brought individually, not on one of those big platters), the girl carrying the food approached my friend and set his food down very quickly in front of him, knocking over his mimosa and spilling it all over the table and him. At this point, she turned to all of us and scolded us, saying "You guys are going to have to move your drinks, that whole situation could have been avoided." She didn't apologize, offer to refill his drink... she was blatantly rude. Mind you this is a busy restaurant, we did not know our food was coming, and he was the first to receive his food, which was our only tip anything was coming. I was LIVID. I was literally shaking and my voice started cracking I was so angry. We all kind of jumped on her and she just got angry and walked away, she was very unprofessional. We told the waiter and he was very understanding and assured us that the restaurant did not stand for that kind of behavior and that she was scheduled for a sit-down meeting with the manager at the end of her shift to discuss her behavior because it was unacceptable (the waiter's term, not mine). After a few minutes, she came back and gave an obviously forced apology and quickly walked away. I did think it was a little strange they did not comp my friend's mimosas or give him a free coffee or anything, especially since he was so nice about the whole ordeal (he kept his cool while we all got mad on his behalf), but it was nice to know that the restaurant did not endorse this behavior.  As for the food... I had ordered a meat omelet and was impressed by the taste. The omelet contained bacon, sausage, pork, chicken, and cheddar cheese... mmm. It also came with a sort of breakfast potatoes and an English muffin. I rather enjoyed my food and everyone else at the table seemed to enjoy theirs as well.  All in all, I appreciated the waiter sticking up for us and telling the manager about the way were treated, but the whole ordeal sticks out in my mind as one of my more frustrating dining experiences. I don't necessarily believe that is indicative of the restaurant as a whole and therefore would not say I will never come back here, but if I do, it will be at someone else's recommendation, not because I truly want to come back.

zBsff-z12NHoovZWVBDDTQ.text: Lousy service. Over an hour to get a light snack. Miserable.   I highly recommend you skip this place and instead forage from a local dumpster.

0-k3AiZ5ic0rR0WDaEW4jw.text: Went here for brunch today, the food was really good and bottomless mimosa was a great addition. The only thing lacking was the service because it's a very busy place.

My friends and I found ourselves singing along to the music because this place truly has all of the jams. Also, the manager walks around and parties with the customers which was very very lit. Overall, 5/5 stars -- would come again and probably one of the best parts of my whole Vegas trip.

TnvRem7DOA1LEZ30epBKCg.text: Poor customer service from the two hostess. Forgot to enter my name and Diane claim they said my name a couple of times. Was standing right next to the door told her she dint have to lie and just said I was next. Waited 20 minutes after my reservation. Out waitress Quinn was great. Food was great.

AZQwz8nwOjF5HO7HmBWV1w.text: The food here is excellent, especially for a super busy restaurant ! And the Drinks are amazing . Service is top notch . Will be back next time I'm in town !

uaWtA2gagqauQBe4wMumjg.text: Amazing atmosphere for those looking to have fun while dining. Bottomless mimosa option for only $26 which is such a bargain! The food was amazing and service was great.

N23rUmWRqnSYd0r0CezsQw.text: Had the protein omelette (egg whites with chicken and avocado spread on top) which was ok. Had it not been so dry it would have been a winner. The potatoes that came with it were fantastic. Service was on point, friendly, and efficient. Quality vs quantity was a good deal for Vegas. Tip: Get here before 8 AM and you'll be seated immediately. After that, wait times go up exponentially.

IwusZjSNnURV2G7PYBJDMQ.text: Amazing service and delish brunch!  Beautiful setting. Our server was very friendly & took good care of us. It's a great spot & open 24hrs!

DrCSoToHlP2iemwHOSxwYA.text: You definitely get what you pay for in my opinion. The bottomless mimosas are great and the outdoor patio seating is so refreshing, even in this summer heat! I tried the eggs Benedict and they were delicious! I would definitely recommend trying this place. Good quality food and decent service.

J1GGcCArxSGSwn1NSEJASg.text: Really wanted to give this place a better rating because the ambiance was perfect for dinner.  Hexx is situated right across the Bellagio and so you can catch glimpse of the fountain show from the restaurant.  But the restaurant lost two stars for the food.  We ordered the lump crab cake (ok), Australian wagyu ( too salty ), shrimp limone ( too salty ) and ginger panna cotta ( too sweet ).  The meal was pricey for the quality.

J4Kqx1y7svGf1G0UL-vsXg.text: Stopped in for breakfast because I saw a good deal on Groupon for this restaurant. So happy we did. The restaurant was beautiful, the service was great, and the food was amazing. We ordered the lump crab cake and it was outstanding. It was all crab and no fillers. I ordered a waffle and my husband ordered a meat skillet. Both were delicious. I would highly recommend this place for brunch.

zvRgwvouMQL0HSAufGr5-g.text: Lovely place. We came here as locals for brunch. After reading a lot of the reviews, we came early (9am). The place was mostly empty, and service was attentive, and food came out quickly. We had the steak and egg (real good, although pricy), the eggs Benedict (delish!), Chilaquiles (real good) and the pancakes (awesome!). We sat outside on the patio, as the inside is incredibly loud. Place is huge!  We will possibly come here again, but this not a cheap date. Again, they milk the fact they are on the strip and do nothing for locals (which most places do usually). That was disappointing.  They need to care more for locals. They don't. 4 stars.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. We had a great time!

VNU90Ou00UCnCLPkR6nnZA.text: Of all of the sit down restaurants in Vegas, this is the best I've found so far (there's not much competition though). I've been here two years in a row for brunch now and I really enjoy it.   This year we got the carrot cake pancakes and the chicken and waffles. The chicken and waffles were a little dry and definitely needed the syrup but pretty good once you added the syrup. The carrot cake pancakes were amazing. They were like eating a dessert. I would definitely get them again. I tried a bit of what my sister got - the chilaquiles which was very good.   It can be a little pricey depending on what you get at brunch but not too bad.   All in all this is one of my favorite places to eat in Vegas. There's always a line if you aren't a diamond rewards member though so get there early or be ready to wait.

21WDnTr9KD5DM7Vp_BiUlw.text: This is the most unpleasant place I've ever been in my whole life . 4 stars in yelp ?! This is shame I feel so embarrassed in that place . We feel such a racism from the waitress who doesn't stop asking where we from and the host who kept asking us where we from and why we speak a different language in them restaurant.   A very bad service , everything took so long so many people working there but no one wants to help .  And a waiter that kept looking at us and laugh for no reason .  The most is the manager of that place Chris that didn't want to even tell us his name because he probably was afraid that we will complain about him .  They over charge us 8$ for 2 orders of bread that we been told by the manager that it comes with the food the we order and its also written on the menu . We asked from him to cancel the over charge but he didn't want and was so rude to us ask for our card and he got us really scared .   They over charge us for any sub we wanted to get which normally it's substitute so it's not supposed to cost even tho we wanted the most basic stuff instead of meet a slice of tomato they charged 2$ how is this even possible.   Bad service , racist , the food not good at all for 4 stars , the worst manager I've ever seen , over charging , too much waiting , very expensive for no reason .  They even take 4.5% on top of every bill for no reason at all .   A place that just want to rip off nice people who walk down the strip

Now to the food...carrot pancakes were delish and the fruit plate didn't disappoint. But....my favorite part of my experience with HEXX was the outstanding service from Jorge. He always made sure my girlfriend and I had a full glass of mimosa, made sure we were tended to during our entire brunch and answered all of our touristy questions of what to do during our stay. This place is amazing, can't wait to come back !!!

WWHKIwRBM6zM-e-0Ts5cJg.text: JJ & Patrick were fabulous, the food was delicious but the service was phenomenal! Brunch with bottom mimosas is the way to go. Eggs Benny and the pancakes were beyond yummy! Thanks - we will be back!

JS8GQULd4Z7HeV8l4ck6xw.text: Trendy spot right across the road from the Bellagio fountains. We made a reservation and were seated outside immediately at 8pm, right when the show started. Great flavors, smaller portions, higher prices. We used the $50 for $35 Groupon, but our bill came out to be around $90 before the discount.  Two people: 1 cocktail, 1 soda, 1 app (spinach dip), 2 entrees (10" pepperoni pizza and gnocchi dish). Vegetarian options available. Service was great!

8QAZc0gzUqJ6vb0jvpI_mA.text: We found this place via Yelp and decided we deserved a nice dinner out. We purchased a Groupon and placed a reservation. We were sat as soon as we arrived. This was the best meal we've had in quite some time! We ordered a filet + mashed potatoes and the beef tips which are served over mashed potatoes and roasted Brussel sprouts. Delicious! Our waitress Allexia was a delight. Highly recommend. We will be back during our next trip to Vegas.

l-QvrgS9yZieECPY64dvBA.text: This is by far my favorite spot to eat in Vegas.  The food is 5 stars and, if you sit on the patio, the people watching is even better.  I had the Ribeye with mashed potatoes on our first night and a bacon burger our second night both meals were absolutely perfect.  We did brunch on Saturday and I was a little disappointed that the breakfast bacon wasn't the same bacon they use on the burger at dinner - the breakfast bacon was like buffet bacon and the dinner bacon was thick cut and super flavorful!  They did have endless mimosas so I forgot about the bacon after a few drinks.

qAR1-9t1g59xoqiabuBVVA.text: Glad this place had a Groupon deal!  Very nice presentation of the food and the taste wasn't so bad either. The Elixir drink was a nice touch to the meal. Make sure you have your camera ready to record when they bring it to the table. It's also nice that they have a patio right on the strip. Very memorable experience

PeAzyAEjMxR5Rc-HQMNWrg.text: Do NOT miss out on Hexx for brunch! Went for brunch today with a big group of about 20. Great atmosphere, open and bright, and a good view of the Fountains at the Bellagio with seats on the patio or towards the back. There are bottemless mimosas, FYI (imperative for a good brunch). Everyone enjoyed their food. I had the Corned Beef Hash. Somewhat of a smaller portion than I expected based on the size of the pancake stacks and sandwiches others ordered. But lemme tell ya, delicious! And with the croissant that came with it, the meal did end up being filling. I drank a Thyme Moscow Mule, yum!! And had a granola parfait before my main meal that was tasty. #Gluttony. I did taste someone's cinnamon roll...so sweet and tasty!! No one from our large party was disappointed. Thanks to our waiter Steven (sp?) for the great service. I'll be back again!!!

yurACns_qrhnyJTl8i449A.text: Before criticizing the rating, please first understand the context. In the land of uber and high roller everything, HEXX offers a "more reasonable" priced menu with Ruth's Chris-type quality.  Every was essentially on point, including the service. The drinks, were not only refreshing, but pleasing to the eye and extremely well balanced. The mashed potatoes were super creamy and flavorful and the sprouts were well seasoned and crispy.   The main courses of course, the proteins, ribeye and prime rib were perfectly cooked and expertly seasoned. My only grievance is the dessert which is some sort of fusion of a bananas foster and a churro, should have been perhaps served warm. Even with that, I found this place outstanding.

Corn beef hash... and the dessert smash!  You can see the water show at Bellagio.. and watching the people is fun too!

qXUQAc276DB7Tr12QUhNIg.text: My friend and I bought a Groupon deal, $30 for $50 worth of food, and it was well worth it! I was immediately impressed by the classy ambiance of HEXX kitchen. My friend and I came for dinner and the view of the Belagio fountains and glowing lights made it a wonderful place to celebrate the end of the quarter. We started off with the Chipotle Guacamole, ordered the Jambalaya for our main course, and then finished with an Aztec Chocolate cake. The food was excellent, but my only critique is that he Jambalaya was a bit spicy and could have had more flavor. Overall, it was a wonderful experience!

P-LQNJ1TwdnWHTYJ7OBusA.text: Hexx offers good food, high, expensive prices and spotty service.  Beware that a breakfast for two without liquor will cost around $70.  There are many breakfast choices. I had the French Toast and my friend had eggs and bacon.  We shared a fruit plate which was plentiful.  The hostess was not friendly and our server while friendly was not attentive to our table and overcharged the bill.  First the fruit plate which was ordered early did not arrive at the table. We asked the server who delivered our food for additional needs and he never returned.   The only great service was from a new hire named Todd who was attentive and diligent.  This breakfast was not a peak time so management needs to upgrade the customer service of its restaurant.

4gHOLYbSGct2CmLe-QOLUg.text: Excellent food and great time Our food was fast. The waitress was amazing  Tracee!  She kept our unlimited Mamosa's coming all morning long!!  David had a wonderful birthday song started by Tracee!!! We will come back for our brunch again!!

2m9YUutTOo6cTDj9FfHwwQ.text: Came here for breakfast on a weekend.  We waited about 15 minutes to be seated.  Very friendly hostess.  We were seated outside within great view of all the strange folks walking up and down the Vegas Strip.  We ordered chilequiles and a side of broccoli.  Great tasting food and very filling for 2 people.  The bonus was the bottomless mimosas.  These were very good and our waitress kept them coming.    Great spot to take a break from all the craziness.  Prices are good too!

d-804uG1q2oqw_lXLwfIlw.text: Highly recommend this place!!  If you're looking for a cool spot in Vegas for brunch or lunch with the excitement of the strip and good music it's great!  All good we ordered was to perfection.  They also have bottomless mimosas and you definitely get your money's worth.  Double thumbs up to Adam our server!!!  I've been to a ton of places for brunch with bottomless mimosas in a lot of cities and it's sometimes disappointing due to the service bc of having to track down the server for refills.  Not this place!  Adam was amazing and never let me drink get less than half full!  But it wasn't just him I watched all the servers and they were very attentive.   Food on point and service on point!

ujSHXgsXW-Trji-xSatxGg.text: Sean was AHHHHMAZING!  I have never met a more friendly and respectful server. Patrick was great at being attentive to our crew. Thank you so much to these two for making a hangry group of girls- happy!!

Ldc6aaJXspkWXw3RYoupKA.text: My wife and I goes to the Hexx for breakfast just because it is great.  But I try to get my wife to go on Saturday and or Sunday mornings for breakfast.  The reason why is we will sit on the balcony next to the strip to yes enjoy the fresh air.   But with my devious mind I enjoy watching the drunks from the night before walking or should I say trying to walk by to catch the bus or walking to the next hotel.  Also it is fun to watch the ladies of the evening go by then come back with their catch also.  So I tell my wife that we are having breakfast and a show.  The food is fantastic.  The service is fantastic also.  I believe our waitress' name was Johanna.  She you give a good impression about yourself and then you come back she will remember you.  She remembers us and where we are from and kind of what we enjoy doing.  It makes feel like family.  Thank you Johanna.

tNiqfPKV9oXfJ8a7mQnufg.text: This place is amazing for breakfast, lunch and dinner.  Went to Vegas for 6 Days and ate here 3 times.

-D3LS1QW5NPOcPO0SdCXRw.text: Bottomless mimosas for $23 with brunch. I had the colossal Bloody Mary which looked awesome. The mix could use a little more spice, it was a tad bland. The sticky bun was soooo yummy. Would def come here again.  Ask for Stephen! He was the best waiter ever. They sat 5 tables back to back in his section while we were there and he rocked it

MCjoS4zn1imBFH_O-Z4K0Q.text: Breakfast is my favorite meal of the day, and therefore I am ultra-critical when it comes to reviewing places that serve breakfast.  Breakfast is easy, but that doesn't mean it's always good. For some reason, finding good breakfast places on the strip (aside from buffets) is pretty difficult. Perhaps it's because people aren't typically awake in time?... This was one of five places we found we wanted to try, and ended up being one of three places we actually enjoyed. The service was great; our server was personable and easy-going, not too loud or pushy. He checked in frequently to ensure we were enjoying our meals. I ordered the banana bread French toast, and let me just say that it is THE most delicious French toast I have ever had. The toast had the consistency of banana bread, but wasn't as dry. The flavors were SPECTACULAR. Caramel drizzle...and fresh berries! Wow, seriously the best. My one issue with it was my own fault...I added the syrup they provided in a small bowl, and it definitely became inedible towards the end because of how sweet it was. Whatever you do, don't use the syrup on this dish! It's perfect and sweet enough without it.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Banana nut bread French toast

rCMuHvuwagn3n6ydREUj7g.text: Very cool place to have breakfast or brunch. We were a party of 6 and we had to literally wave and dance to get the waitress attention every time we needed something. Other than that the food was good and I liked the fact that we could see the water show at  the bellagio from where we were seated.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EzhpKGD5kuLDlHa4HMsVFQ.text: Get the yelp!! 30$ for 50$ of food. Also highly recommend the muffin, fruit and coconut whipped cream starter! SO GOOD!
