oFd0UkATJrNohukKlfcjTw.text: Went for breakfast. Mimosa had too much OJ.  It was fixed after we asked.  Corn beef has has shredded carrots (a lot) rather than potatoes.  Tip to chef - chop rather then shred carrots if trying to offer something different and cut down on carrots... way too much.  Also wrong vessel for this item.  Corn beef is mushy and not at all crispy.  Where's the toast? No toast came with the corn beef hash with poached eggs.  Crab cake was very good.  Returned chiliquillas.  Didn't care for. Egg on top was over hard. Not sure why as they didn't ask for a preference but would not expect an egg that was hard cooked. Meh.  Got the regular egg breakfast with bacon and potatoes. This was good.  Potatoes nice and crisp, good portion of bacon.  Didn't care for the homemade English muffin.  No nooks and crannies for the butter and their delicious raspberry puree to land.  Next visit will try Mon Ami Gabi which is right next door.  This place was crowded and looks good on yelp and website.  Same prices for breakfast and they give you a loaf of crusty bread and butter.  I had to pay 4 something for a side of white toast at HeXX.

hBlHQjg1S4XkPWRJEhxbBQ.text: Had so much fun here. Great service and great bottomless mimosas! Definitely get the chilaquiles. So good!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PHfImwPjlZ36iZDDNOiGCQ.text: Had dinner here with some coworkers the other night, and was fortunate to be seated right away. They were pretty busy but service was extremely slow. Took 20 minutes for us to get our cocktails (jack and coke, and an old fashion) I opted for the ribeye and it took a little over 45 minutes to receive. Needless to say it was cooked perfectly and was very tasty. I also shared a side of the mashed potatoes with my co worker since I was told that a side was for 2 people, but it wasn't even enough for me. At $10 the side seemed like a complete ripoff. Overall this restaurant has good ambience and very good steak, however they do seem to be lacking in the speed of service as well as portion size for their sides.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

R2DhavKddQpP9iMM8oGTQw.text: The worst restaurant ever!!!!!!! The service is terrible and the manneger is so rude . The worst experience I ever had. The food is taking so long as well as the drinks and don't taste good . Highly recommend never go there !!! I will do everything I can to help people and not going to this place !!!!!!

JnD7jWgsrJgZ4M0waBj7pA.text: Went for birthday dinner this year, and have been for breakfast in the past.  Stellar food, great view and a chill atmosphere amongst the hustle and bustle of the Vegas strip.  Looking forward to coming back on our next trip.  If you happen to be there around breakfast- check out the cinnamon waffle- best thing ever!  All of the food has a wonderful presentation, but service can be a little slower, even when the restaurant is not crowded.

ad7Wu2MhnaDqN29OCUl5wQ.text: After reading other people's reviews, I was convinced to come here because many people talked about the good view of the Bellagio fountains. This wasn't REALLY the case. Even though I sat in the patio outdoors, the fountains were still on the other side of the street and blocked by trees. You can really only hear the loudest blasts of water.  In any case, the food here is pretty good! In my group, we ordered the spinach artichoke dip (comes with pita and chips), salads, jambalaya (very spicy), a burger, and I ordered the pappardelle. Good service as well.  Walk out into the main part of Paris' casinos to get to the bathroom!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This is the view of the Bellagio fountains from the patio

KZ4Qxzf_-TLeW29IaYnzLQ.text: Our server was friendly & knowledgeable, but the wait was painfully long!  My husband & I came here on a late Monday morning thinking we'd have a relatively quick meal before moving on with the rest of our day...we ended up spending over 2:30 hours here!  My husband enjoyed his burger, but my chicken sausage benedict lacked flavor.  In the end, the manager took 30% off our bill, to make up for it.  I probably would not bother going here again...there's so many other great options that won't hold up your day.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

p4OWgoU4AC_10fHeVjgkrA.text: Delicious food and I nice view of the strip on the outside patio! The protein omelette is amazing and comes with potatoes and an English muffin! Definitely a nice brunch spot on the strip

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_aEyFyahWGKnA0547Ut51w.text: Sunday brunch at HEXX is a great way to end a Vegas weekend before heading home. The DJ plays feel good music without the club style electronics beats and the room bustles with fun energy. Drinks are solid. Breakfast menu is on point with biscuits, hash and a good selection of entrees.

uMu5m1TH60UPokeOKqDrqg.text: The best place for brunch and bottomless mimosas! Carl, our server was amazing! Our mimosas were always filled and even though he was busy, he made sure everything was perfect for us. We will definitely be back!

Tfk4grOe5MDnq6ZYBlLRQw.text: Went for dessert only late night. The service was great and the dessert had a nice presentation and was delicious. Easy to access walking, friendly and timely.

AMztiKfP8djqz_EKZ-EjTw.text: We visit vegas monthly and love trying different spots every time we are in town.  First time at the Hexx, we went for brunch. It's a great location and a beautiful restaurant, I honestly expected the food to be the same. But I was disappointed, sadly. I couldn't decide on what to order, but I kept seeing the prime rib French dip being served at multiple tables and it looked delicious so I went with it. After waiting 20 mins to be seated (mind you, the restaurant was half empty) and another 25 mins to finally get my food, I immediately regretted my food after 1 bite. It was SOOOOOO bland. Like no flavor at all! I shared it with friends at the table because I didn't want to waste it. The customer service was friendly but so slow. After we asked for our check it took our server 10 mins to bring it to us and another 15 to bring it back, what a mess. Probably won't be returning.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime rib French dip

SlqNhYEMz1oDPc1dOP9vzw.text: Little bit of a wait even on a Wednesday but worth it. I had the carrot cake pancakes which were delicious! My friend had the French toast with a side of potatoes which were also delicious. The potatoes were so sweet and crispy. The atmosphere was open and we sat on the patio. The bottomless mimosas were 23 dollars though, a little high for me. Would definitely come back.

hJG_46kZZdeYGLiYX6GC6A.text: Can I leave zero stars? Sat at the bar at around 4:45 and waited 45 minutes for a veggie burger. It never came and the bartender actually tried to charge me for it?!? Worst service ever here. Don't plan on ordering food.

e4piXiMzqNanJ99yZyH4qw.text: Christian, Spencer and Olivia were GREAT! I like that Hexx serves brunch till 4PM. The Benedict was super tasty; light, fluffy and the eggs were perfectly cooked. OMG the sliders were unbelievable; the steamed bun was different but were wonderful and order again. We also enjoyed a pitcher of Bubbly. Food is great and so is the view, we always sit on the patio. Can't wait to go back.

NkshB37Y7lRJ9LbPmprt9Q.text: Love this place. Bloody Mary is amazing, food is great!   Always on the itinerary when I come to Vegas.   Our server Sean (007) was fantastic!!! Friendly, attentive and on it even with like 6 tables!!!

PoPn0PjL6er3_YYnVBDmBA.text: TRACEE DO YOU LOVE ME? ARE YOU RIDING? - she's the best server out there & Ivan is the assistant of the year foreal foreal 6/5 stars

mJLwP2d78PSTnPlPjN9dRg.text: This experience was wonderful!! Our server, JJ, was amazing! The food was delicious, and the bottomless mimosas were always flowing! You never saw the bottom of your glass. Will definitely be coming back!

8Dp28TrCHxNYk4oChntjMA.text: Beautiful building. Friendly staff. Great prices. Location was great. Superb taste and a great atomsphere

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZsbH7_F8GpEh-dA_8buCBw.text: Came here for a 7:15 dinner reservation. We chose this place as it was an easy walk to Planet Hollywood for a 9:00pm show. We were seated immediately in the balcony facing the Bellagio Fountains. Awesome view. We were here the weekend of EDC so it was perfect for people watching. Weather was blazing hot but they have misters to help. Our waiter was really nice and full of personality.   We had one of their signature cocktails which comes in a cute jug and presented to you in a spectacular way, as our waiter said "it's a big production". I had the Prime Rib medium rare. It was on point with plenty of fatty parts per our liking. We ordered mushrooms to compliment the steak which were delicious and tender. The side dish orders a la carte are big and can totally be shared.   My man had the salmon on quinoa beans. His dish was also amazing. The salmon was nicely cooked. Both our meals were large in quantity not allowing for dessert space. Pricing wasn't bad. We will definitely be back and highly recommend the place.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salmon on quinoa beans
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime Rib (medium rare) with a mushroom side a la carte

o1v0rHx3OgjkP5zPmnU2Sw.text: Nice place. Great view of Bellagio fountains. My husband and I split a pepperoni pizza- it tasted great but was a bit expensive. Expected for a view of The Strip.   Side note: we came around 11pm on Friday night and the music from Chateau was really loud and distracting.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Really tasty

6iRNAGNvjLwboRpV7W5XRw.text: Hexx was an amazing brunch joint for my large group and the location of the venue was impeccable. Tracee is hands down the best server I have encountered in all my times traveling to the strip.   Her recommendations on menu choices were insightful and I definitely had the best Bloody Mary I have ever had at Hexx.   Tracee made the experience incredibly worthwhile and made the price of meals absolutely worth it.   Ask for Tracee if you come here, and if you want quality foods, head to Hexx!!

5m_O4YvtHhZFqmA18CSdDw.text: Best shrimp cocktail I've had ever, I'll be back anytime I come to Vegas. Great atmosphere, great service!!

8MEIVPadDWrwNvxKXVpIRQ.text: Had a terrible experience here for brunch. We were told a 20 minute wait but we could sit outside right away. We opted to sit in the bar while waiting for our table. The bar was very noisy. No one even approached us to buy a drink.  We received a text that our table was ready and the waitperson took us to a table in the bar directly under the speaker.   It was ridiculously loud. I asked to be seated at another table and was told I would have to go back in the line (which was now an additional 35 minute wait. This was by management. Totally unacceptable. On the quiet side of the restaurant there were tons of empty tables that they could have easily put us in, if it weren't for small minded manager. Believe me there was no way that manager would have sat at the terrible table we were given. I rarely write reviews this bad, but this was an epic fail in the part of management. We left and went to eat elsewhere.   We could have stayed in the bar and not have waited for the worst table.

EL5Bof2PmcayPrXLNQ72GA.text: I went to HEXX for Sunday brunch and got the bottomless mimosas and the carrot cake pancakes. My glass was always topped off and the pancakes were amazing. I highly recommend going!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carrot Cake Pancakes

P9f6MqfS3LLXb3R0KNm-JQ.text: Stopped in quick for late lunch.  Very well staffed and good service.  Spinach artichoke dip is great.

XnOsSHj4KYDFsVuCLRHnoA.text: This place is amazing!! We had APOLO as our waiter and I can literally say he gave us the best service we have ever had! The food was great and service was amazing! We will definitely be coming back here!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3hCbL3R59Uwr7CHgRN1Eqw.text: The Sugar Factory in this location used to be a breakfast spot favorite whenever I was in Vegas. After Hexx took it's place I looked elsewhere for a couple years. I gave this place a shot during my visit this year and I like it almost as much.  Obviously, Hexx still has the great patio area with a fantastic view of the strip. The staff is friendly and service as good as I remember.  I went twice the last time I was in Vegas and got cinnamon roll waffles and carrot cake pancakes. Both gave me the "I know I shouldn't be eating this for breakfast but it's soo good" feeling I would get at Sugar Factory. Although I can't help but feel Sugar Factory would have served both with ice cream...

m9YbJewX-Rojr_6qXBt1hQ.text: Great view o the Bellagio fountains.  Service was superb and we really enjoyed our meal.

8nq4n-_B0P8Y0-ZU8l-LPw.text: This place had great ambience, the color scheme and layout was cohesive and pleasant to look at and be in. The service was great. Most importantly, the food was amazing. They have a large variety of menu items and their presentation is amazing. I loved it so much that I came back again while I was in Vegas. Will definitely be coming back.

EYx8kL7ZfTFqDh3lpjtgyQ.text: I had brunch at HEXX earlier this week, and my four star review is more about great service and atmosphere than the food. Our server was friendly and attentive-my coffee was never more than half empty before he would stop by to refill it. The inside of the restaurant has lots of windows and light-colored furniture/decorations giving it a great light and airy feel. There is also a nice view of the Bellagio fountains. The food was okay. There was nothing wrong with it, but I would have been as happy with the Waffle House equivalent for about half the price (I had coffee and the farm fresh eggs with chicken sausage). The friend I was eating with had French toast, which they said was good.

dyWNwJVhOmvpDp-Y1klnIA.text: So I've eaten here before, after 12 AM. This time it's a bit earlier. We waited maybe 5-8 minutes to be seated inside. Our waiter was just okay. He was semi attentive in the beginning and then once our dinner came out, he disappeared. Never came back except maybe once to ask how things were.  I did notice that he was always at the table next to ours, but never at ours. That was irritating. He came back at the end to delicer our check, and that was it. Expecting a tip for what? That I don't even remember his name isn't surprising.   It also was a nagging comment in my head that maybe he didn't want to wait on a group that looked like they wouldn't tip as much as the table next to ours. I get that all the time when I go out, I'm 30 and I tip based on service. If my service is terrible, do I think you deserve 15% or more. No. If you did amazing maybe you'll get tipped 20%. I guess it was the attitude that out waiter put off was not very pleasant. I want to say his name started with an M? Older gentleman, I think he wears glasses.    On the other hand, the gentleman replenishing our waters and getting us boxes for our leftovers was great. Spencer, good friggin job. We joked throughout the meal about leaving a pitcher of water at our table, because he was frequently back refilling all of our waters. As soon as our cups were either half full or empty, he was there.  I'm hoping he got some of the tip we left and it didn't just go to our lazy waiter. He took away our dishes right away.   Okay now onto the food.  So the menu is alright. We ordered the Caesar salad, seafood on ice, braised short rib, wagyu burger, brussel sprouts, broccolini, and the mushroom risotto.  The Caesar salad was not bad. The seafood on ice was okay. The crab legs were super cold and tough to eat without a small fork. The prawns were slightly overcooked. The tuna poke, shrimp ceviche, and lobster salad missed their mark. The garnishes on the plate were mostly inedible. Not a good choice.    We ended up asking for clarified butter for the crab. The lobster was not bad, it wasn't over cooked and was tender.    Hands down, the braised short rib was the best thing I've ever had there. It was the size of my forearm and the meat was just fall off the bone. There could have been more sauce that they braised it in on the plate.  The mashed potatoes were tasty, but a bit gummy. The acidity of the Brussel sprouts on as garnish was a bit much.   I ended up eating the nicely charred brocoolini. That with short ribs and mash was delicious. I would definitely order this again.   The wagyu burger was like an burger. The taste was alright, and the texture good. But it came out rare when we asked for medium. The pepper bacon was thick cut, good flavor. The fries were forgotten among all the food we had. Not sure if it was $23 amazing.   The mushroom risotto needed to be cooked a little longer. When the rice still has a bite to it, and it wasn't creamy like risotto should be. The starches did not release. Risotto is a timely dish. You rush it, it doesn't come out right. Mom said flavor was good, but texture and execution were not.   Overall I would come back. The view was great. Got to see the Bellagio fountain show.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wagyu burger and caesar salad
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Seafood on ice
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Braised short rib

RiMi3OAd1agxIihQDpTrnQ.text: We love brining our family here when they are in town! Awesome views of the strip and great food and drinks. I can't wait to try the brunch.

wetpcaML_eIMuMaWDHZtqQ.text: We've been to Hexx a few times each for brunch and dinner and every time the experience is amazing. Ari, the manager, is wonderful and every server we've had has made the experience great. We had one issue once with a groupon (not Hexx's fault) and the manager on duty was extremely helpful and accommodating. We will definitely be returning our next time in Vegas! (Order the cheesy bread.)

jfSMBuJQ_3NmohzHJ26CMg.text: Loved the relaxed scene inside and the show of the Bellagio fountains going off while we ate a high end dinner on vacation. The best calamari appetizer ever, had a buffalo sauce of some sort and was fried not to crispy yet not to soft or chewy. The steak was cooked perfectly to & had great steak knifes for an easy cut!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GyqP916pu4B9PN6-LIwZsw.text: Apollo and Quan are the best! I'm in Vegas for business and they made the week worth it! Very knowlegeable and made sure our drinks were always full. Come see them, they won't disappoint!

6c6eAiIUyUr2DOPXRunHdQ.text: 5 stars is not enough for this place!!! We Went there for brunch in January for our friends birthday with four more couples and we had  an amazing time. The food is spectacular and our server Tracy was the best server ever!!! She's very knowledgeable about the menu gave us suggestions on what of her favorite foods are with little twists, our mimosa glasses were taken care all the time, she's very outgoing and entertained us the whole time. Definitely going back there when we head back to Vegas. Best brunch ever !!!

ZbVWAjEkyKacX83YyFqWzg.text: What a pleasant experience here.  From the hip, clean, and 'natural' interior design to the quick wait staff and absolutely delicious food- I'll definitely be coming back!  My wife, who's gluten intolerant, got the Hexx Benedict which was just scrumptious! The typical poached eggs and sauce were placed on top of a bed of stacked cut potatoes. (It was so delicious we're going to try and recreate it at home!) I got the eggs and bacon- which is typically a simple plate, but they managed to make it both complex in flavor and presence.  Also, I can imagine this place gets pretty packed so I'd recommend either going early in the AM or making a reservation- they also have bottomless mimosas for $23, so in theory you could spend hours here!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Kc0Hp93QoX4YVDE45gTFCQ.text: Time and time again this restaurant not only provides great service, but great food. If you are looking for a good spot for brunch, this is it.

XxQ-XLBRp0DzxUZiGtatCA.text: Overall,  this place was okay.  Not great & not bad.  Same feeling as others... great yelp reviews, but felt over hyped.  Food: great portion sizes, food looks better than they taste (or ...at least the cinnamon waffle). My hubs enjoyed the lobster roll. I enjoyed the french fries. Chicken & waffles were decent.  Pricing:  3 plates & an iced tea cake out to $90ish with tip. Not surprising bc its right off the strip & looks bougie.    Service: Ehh, our waitress wasn't the most attentive person to us. The servers were great, nice & were more helpful than her.  Took me to be almost finished eating before i could ask for an iced tea.   Would i come here again? Nope.

qenH-YEseRD6BosxJ_v0tg.text: Love this place. Such a great restaurant on the strip. Bottomless mimosas and amazing crunch! Rachel was such a great server. Told us some cool things to do on our engagement trip and gave us a little gift! Our mimosas were never empty! Highly recommend this place.

C_u2gqy_nhJUM1pn98aZBg.text: While visiting Vegas, my friends and I wanted a place to eat at for brunch without breaking the bank. Vegas is notoriously expensive when you eat in the strip. This restaurant is a great place to go to. Located in Paris Hotel on the on the side of the strip. It's cute and quaint, got seated right away for inside dining. Outside dining had a wait, but we wanted to be out of the heat.   Our waiter was amazing, service was great.   I ordered the Hexx Eggs Benedict's which was good, but the portion size was small.   If you're looking to get some alcohol in your system for brunch, I would recommend getting the unlimited mimosa. My friends and I definitely got our monies worth there.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict. Mimosa.

Lpq0Pz0EWiEe0raSakK_Gg.text: I had my birthday breakfast here because I don't usually make it to dinner when I'm in Vegas to celebrate another year.  I made reservations in advance just in case of a wait, but when we arrived for our 9:30 meal, there were still plenty of tables. We were there on a Saturday morning but I think for a holiday weekend, its still recommended.   Our server was Steven and he was very nice and attentive. I had got the corned beef and he recommended the croissant with it and it was very much needed. Why? Well, they have bottomless mimosas for $24! It's totally worth it because they constantly keep your glass filled. Don't be surprised by the size of the glass because they are monitoring it and the refills are always coming. My food was very good and I loved the veggies in my meal. Everyone else in my group also enjoyed their food and I have a feeling that we'll be back here because their menu had many other items that I wanted to try.  If you need a good breakfast and brunch place WITH mimosas (or not), I highly recommend this place. They also have tables on the patio if you want a view of the Bellagio fountains but it was cold and I was fine being inside.

fWpa18fWFmqSG8YdNmicfQ.text: So I saw this restaurant on a TV show months ago and really wanted to try their breakfast, but instead I took my boyfriend there for his birthday. Great place to park is in between Paris and Bally's hotel. The entrance is on the strip. They have a great Happy Hour between 4-7p, which we couldn't do because we had our little one. When we came in we were welcomed and seated right away! They sat us where we still had a great view of the Bellagio water show, but we were inside where it's cool. Our server Jasmine was super awesome and answered transparently with choices of food. We ordered a Purple Haze Potion that definitely did the trick ;) for an appetizer we ordered the Spinach Dip, which was super yummy. They have a kids menu and the pizza is enough for TWO KIDS for the parents who knows their lil ones don't eat much.  I ordered the Shrimp Limone which the brown butter carrots and spinach were cooked to perfection and was the perfect blend with my side ordered of fluffy mashed potatoes. My boyfriend ordered the Short Rib with a side of their macaroni cheese. The ritz crackers gave the Mac and cheese the perfect little crunchy taste. The short rib had these red peppers and Brussels sprouts that were super delicious. One point to add in, if you're torn between Prime Rib and Short Rib...my boyfriend suggests the Prime Rib. Finally they have the option of a complimentary cupcake if you're celebrating a birthday or this raspberry lemon flavored cupcake stack (don't know the name, but Jasmine showed me it) they brought both! My boyfriend hates attention but I always gotta embarrass him lol!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Limone
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside view of Bellagio
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thought this was a cute message from Jasmine:)

qnVboj2KebxgKFzwoqVArA.text: Came in with intention of eating brunch. Walked in from the Casino side and was wondering why there is no one to greet me! Decided to walk around and saw that entry is meant to be from the Strip side.  Got seated, and then waited for 15 minutes for waitress to show up. Yes I am on vacation but do not abuse that!!!  Finally asked for manager who fixed the problem and service from that point was improved.  Burger on the brunch menu was good, but chipotle mayo with fries made that show. Yogurt with fruit and cereal was delicious as yogurt had pretty creamy texture.  I would not mind coming back and hopefully get an improved service!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1K3e-166eACx44CW5lk5lw.text: Birthday Brunch for the 19yo. We started with a twisted cinnamon roll to share, OMG. Dude and I were swilling sangria, yum. I had the lobster/pork sliders, dude went with the veggie burger, Burger Boi had pizza and Birthday Boy had the " meat" omelet. Friendly, efficient service, great space and seriously yummy brunch.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pork and Lobstsh sliders
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat omelet
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pizza for the Burger Boi

YoZ3p-ESTfYy0q6bff_fIQ.text: 8.16.19 ate here for their Sunday brunch as the end of my friend's  bachelorette Vegas weekend. Our server was very friendly and answered every question we had int the menu... I order the chicken and waffles. The portion were a good size for an individual person and it was delicious. My friends were torn between the different flavor of pancakes they offer, so the servers said she can give them both the pancakes so my friends could try them both. The buss boys were very tentative and constantly checking on us... water refill or coffee refill. The servers and bussers were friendly and the whole environment of the restaurant were great. The price of the brunch were ideal, especially being in the Vegas Strip. Definitely would come back to this restaurant.

F2AlDmigEKC95-024maoHQ.text: Brunch at Hexx was GOOD! The wait was long but it was worth it. Definitely get reservations. We arrived around 12:30p and was told it was a 45 minute wait. I wanted to see some sites so we waited. Once we were seated we noticed that we had about 15 minutes left for unlimited mimosas but our great waiter let us know we were safe because we sat before the 2pm cut off. We ended up going with a different drink, the Magik Dragon for $36. Which ended up being a shared drink with three straws (there were three of us). It was good and filling enough. I had the veggie omelette which scrumptious. Service was great. Very cool place. I would go again.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3jbviSK9W8dyhFT8-4NFkg.text: From the servers, to the food and drinks everything was amazing.The prices is super affordable. I had the Chilaquiles with chicken had salsa, eggs and sour cream and asadero comes with avocado and to top it off with some bottomless mimosas. If you looking for a spot on the strip try HEXX  #BestBrunchEver

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. HEXX

-xmwWN1Wxd7QLCSz7Py6Ig.text: This place was fun! Great food and drinks. I wanted more time to make a trip back for their awesome signature drink in the disco ball but alas next Vegas trip. The Carrot Cake Pancakes are delish and surprisingly not at sweet as you'd expect; a perfect brunch treat.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Raspberry fizz
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carrot cake pancakes

n88BA1TtMpY-OXOkhL_mBg.text: I was looking for a place to get brunch and I saw this restaurant as I was walking around.   Ambience: The interior is nice. The environment is clean, modern, and spacious.   Food: I got the chicken & waffles and it was decent. The waffles had a nice texture and the chicken was well seasoned.   Overall: Decent spot for food but I wouldn't recommend it since there's also many other restaurants nearby.

jGg22a6SWA2i4UCNeXb51A.text: Came with the family for brunch. Patio was full so we sat inside, six people total. Service was good, got our drink orders in quickly.  We ordered a variety of things from French toast to eggs benedict. The time to get the food was a slow and it wasn't packed being a Wednesday. I know some places do run a bit slower to allow time for apps, visiting, etc. and no one complained at our table, so it's all good. I'd say it took a solid 20 minutes but the wife says it was closer to 30 mins before the food was served.  Everything was very good, eggs were all cooked perfectly and the French toast was very good. The bacon was a little undercooked for some of the folks but it was how i like it...not so crisp that it breaks into pieces but still a bit soft.  I'll be back again and do recommend a visit if you're in the area.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Benedict
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DwKVFjjII8BRe37h55-iGQ.text: My friends and I went to Hexx a couple of times during our last trip to Vegas because it was super convenient having stayed at Paris Hotel. We first went there for dinner and drinks. We sat close to the bar and got excellent service from the bartender. They were playing some nice live music, and everyone loved their food and drinks. The second time we went here was for brunch a couple days later. We didn't have reservations but were seated immediately. Our waitress was super friendly and had a fun sense of humor. She provided excellent service as well, and the brunch food was great. If you sit outside in the patio you get an amazing view of the fountain across the street, and the strip overall. Highly recommended to anyone visiting Las Vegas.

0OhaY-sqjl1NsELLlVitSA.text: Can you say Sunday Funday?! If you're looking for an affordable (at least by Vegas means) bottomless mimosa brunch for the weekends, HEXX is a great spot to get the mid-morning party started!  Located in the Paris hotel, it's literally steps off a Las Vegas Blvd. You can sit in the restaurant or on the elevated patio (makes for great people watching) and get a view of the Bellagio Fountains and the general hustle & bustle of the Las Vegas Strip!  Hands down, one of my favorite items includes the CARROT CAKE PANCAKES! You get a huge stack (4) pancakes covered in candied nuts and cream cheese frosting. They put shredded carrots in the buttermilk batter and boy it just hits the spot. If you LOVE carrot cake, I highly suggest that you stop by HEXX! The maple syrup comes on the side...and let's this sugary treat is basically like eating carrot cake for breakfast. Goes perfect with their coffee and an order of carrot cake pancakes is only $13...easily shareable as well!  Of course, when it comes to Vegas...everybody will have a different opinion on what's overpriced and what's a good deal. HEXX to me, is pretty cheap, considering that all of the brunch entrees were under $20. Everybody in my group was satisfied with the food and service here.   Solid 4 stars! I'd be back just for the carrot cake pancakes!  Final Piece of Dirty Donovan Life Advice? $24 for bottomless mimosas!

Qu2izB0z544IIuR0T76xKg.text: Service here is garbage, the waiter is just not having it today it seems like, but we come here for the food is most important. Overall, just ordered 1 plate since my girl wasn't to hungry so I am assuming is why the waiter was mad because we are not buying much food so he will have a small tip, whatever I am not here to support you for doing nothing. Just ordered simple eggs, bacon with english muffin and house fries. The house fries were really good and worth it, never had it in this style. it is a nice place to sit outside and people watch, food is ok typical breakfast, service could be a hit or miss.

XqEY2i9nsEL-ZyoNy0IKOg.text: Bloody Mary was great (I didn't get the crab leg one which was $36, the regular kind was $15). I ordered the chilaquiles which as you can see from the photo we're more then disappointing. I told the waiter they were the saddest chilaquiles I had ever seen and he offered to take them back. I said yes. It should be noted that I rarely say anything and can't remember ever sending something back (I guess the bloody was strong). I got the eggs Benedict for my re-do. They would have been great but they were room temperature and took another hour and 15 minutes. The waiter/bartender (I sat at the bar) was so nice but clearly overworked and it took forever to get service. All in all it was a less than mediocre dining experience, but if you're looking for a bloody this is a good place if you're willing to wait.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. &#34;chilaquiles&#34; ummm what?! No thank you

AcyDSpkma_ESPhRf7FbFWg.text: Our waiter, Kevin Smith!!!! Your services was welcoming and outstanding you made our experience spectacular!!!!   And a big Thank you to Brad!!!!!

3EU8byGon2qi0aMcpq1m8w.text: Went for breakfast. Simply lovely. It's at the bottom of the Paris hotel. We sat outside overlooking the Bellagio water works. The service was excellent. The restaurant is very pretty. The food was excellent. They were out of the corned beef hash so I got the steak and eggs. Really as good as could be. Expensive. Like $75 for breakfast for two.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

AuKJdbughJu_EdPlxQYqvA.text: I'm always looking for chicken and waffles at brunch spots because that's my favorite thing to eat. HEXX kitchen + bar did not disappoint. The chicken was crispy and moist. I actually enjoyed the chicken more because it had no bones. It was very easy to cut and eat with my waffle. The waffle was also very moist; it was not dry at all. A bit pricey but I would highly recommend this meal/place if you're looking for brunch in Vegas. The Only thing I will say is their unlimited mimosa deal is quite expensive! Their unlimited mimosa deal is $27 and one mimosa is $13. I've had it cheaper in LA. I had to give it 4 stars due to that but, clearly the food was good.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken &amp; Waffles

ZOSe19KiakhseuTbzV-HTQ.text: The service here was great aside from one mistake on our order but nothing to complain about as it was an easily made mistake. We ordered a berry bowl but received the fruit platter but was happy to accept it as it was beautiful and delicious! Our waiter was very friendly and made sure that our bottomless mimosas were indeed bottomless and never once did we have an empty glass. Although we were seated inside, the doors were open so it was pretty toasty I there, especially since it was the beginning of July. The fans didn't do much to circulate the air but.... it's Vegas in July! I wasn't expecting a miracle! The prices are very reasonable and the food was very good. Located right on the strip so you could choose to walk out to the madness or head straight to the casino! I will definitely be returning here and recommend checking it out if you're ever in Vegas looking for a good place for brunch/bottomless mimosas!

w5Vshxcrt2uqXW2IEQhVnQ.text: Delicious!! And great view of the Bellagio fountain show if seated outside! We came here for brunch and got the bottomless mimosas, carrot cake waffles, and corned beef hash. Everything was so good!! The hash is a smaller serving but the waffles is a huge serving so my husband and I just split both! I added bananas to the waffle which was a great recommendation by the server. The service was excellent, my mimosa was literally bottomless as they constantly filled it throughout the meal. I never had to ask for refill. We'll definitely be dining at Hexx again during our next visit!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned beef hash - 4 stars
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carrot cake pancakes - 5 stars

juPyQcTtyn36I8mB0xmhfA.text: Breakfast here twice now. One word......AWESOME! You have to try the cinnawaffles or the chocolate pancakes or preferably both at the same time. The cream cheese frosting on the waffle is too delicious to not spend it on everything. This is my go to spot for breakfast in Vegas now. Oh and did I mention the bottomless mimosas

4xhiX_TdXNcNOxIVJuX58w.text: Great views of the Bellagio fountains! We made a reservation and requested a table on the patio. Weather was perfect. Food was very good with excellent service.

jXVJCVrpeDeAJs2LknYXiA.text: One of the better casual restaurants on the strip. Their best quality: the employees. Our waitress, Joana tops them all. She was very attentive regardless of the number of tables she has. We did not feel rushed, in fact, she made us feel like we are her only customers! That's quite a feat. She made four ladies happy with our bottomless mimosas .  The food was pretty good albeit pricey. Try the steak and eggs, and don't skip the potatoes that come with it. Take the carbs, it's worth it.

-YKuZGKiCRErmzfm-d9-3A.text: Great brunch. Sean and Abram were awesome! Great deal on Bottomless Mimosas and some of the best Bloody Mary's you will find in Vegas. PS get the HEXX Benedict

JhlB7qm10Zii5mb-tu7TCg.text: Hexx was great! The kinky drink was magical, and seriously yummy. I ordered the short rib and absolutely loved it. My friend ordered the New York strip; it was slightly under cooked for our liking but our waitress Chelsea took care of us. Completely satisfied, would recommend to anyone. Ask for Chelsea, she made our experience tonight spectacular!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

kfHmSmUbiWrwl7o8wD0j8A.text: Excellent food and service!  We were in town for a business meeting and Jessica A. provide great food and friendly service!

aeOpUZr25euVc1T0QBdQyw.text: Tracee is great!! She kept our bottomless mimosas flowing and the food came out fast. I got the quiche and it was heaven in your mouth, I definitely recommend it. We have 12 people here and everyone loves their food!

AhLx9I_J6rxFg-F2wHX0oA.text: Quickly seated outside under the heaters with a great view of the fountains. Delicious food, a tad pricey but not too much for the quality. We will be back

IyZvvaCAJL6vDpW7s0KR9A.text: Pricey but worth it!!!! We had the crab cakes($18) for an appetizer which were average. My husband had the chicken and waffles  ($25) and they were awesome. They were served with a bourbon syrup which he said was the best syrup he's ever had. I had the spicy jambalaya  ($28) and it tasted very authentic and spicy. I would definitely come back.

zUR3-ph1Jj2UtFmfx3xdtQ.text: We used the travelzoo promotion for 2 4-course dinners with wine flights.  Pretty disappointing.  We started with the charcuterie appetizer - 2 cheeses, 2 cured meats and a giant pretzel with condiments.  It was huge and decent quality.  2 simple salads were also good.  3 of the wines came just after the salads - decent wines, small (2 oz) pours.  Unfortunately the rose & white were served cold but were room temperature within minutes because of the small size glasses.  Promotion (still today) lists sea bass which was taken off the menu.  It also lists 14 oz ribeye, but menu price is now higher than promotion value.  After discussion, we got the ribeye, but it was the smallest 14 oz steak I've ever had - more like 10 ounce.  Way over cooked - ordered med rare and it was grey all the way through.  Venetian cheesecake was mediocre.  We get better cheesecake at Outback.  Not worth the money, even with the promotion.

0bPwHRF-jC6I7YfpoU4tyg.text: What a view!  I have always touted Mon Ami Gabi as being my favorite restaurant in Las Vegas but now there is competition!  Al fresco dining on the Las Vegas Strip and in front of the Bellagio fountains has me hooked.  Diverse menu for vegetarians, which I always appreciate.  I got the pappardelle pasta but next time I have to get those carrot cake pancakes!  Staff was extremely nice and made accommodations for my picky friend.  Prices are ok and if you like a side or entree you can ball on a budget.

dqjY8dd3_dhFdSUoser9Bw.text: No words can describe how amazing my experience was. The orange juice tasted freshly squeeze and salad was simple with a pinch of salt and pepper but it was extremely fresh and tasted like someone picked it right from the garden. The lobster roll was amazing and very fulfilling. Complimentary chocolate at the end of the meal tasted very different incompairson with other chocolate I had before. The dark bitter chocolate is my absolute favorite.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Belgian dark chocolate
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster roll with hand cut fries
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Peach margarita

J3huWwgsYdoQwgYdzkKYAA.text: Rafael was absolutely phenomenal!! At a lot of places with bottomless mimosas, servers "forget" to keep coming back to give you refills, but he was on top of eyeing when our glasses were empty. Super friendly service and he was 100% honest with his food recommendations and we both LOVED our food after taking his advice. 12/10 for service!

yu1vdVduzMU0qle64w8M-Q.text: Only reason for 4/5 stars: it took forrrrreeevvveerrrr to get our food after we ordered. But other than that, the food was so good! Excellent French toast, perfect fried potatoes, the eggs Benedict were delicious too. Great ambience, an open air patio that lets in fresh air, and couches as part of the table seating were a great setting. Would highly recommend to anyone with a picky pallet and time to kill.

ymtbQEG-LmW8FuvOV2mu0w.text: Tracee was an awesome server, great food and the best colossal bloody mary! Right under eiffel tower at Paris, Kenny had the best steak and eggs ever! Outside seating but shaded..

YcoJu5ajAywRQlwLJkWjmw.text: This place gets five stars for service and food!  We went twice when we visited Vegas last week.  The servers are incredibly attentive and the food is delicious!  We had the margarita pizza and the macaroni and cheese!  Wow, that cheese sauce was so good!  The pizza was wonderful and had a lot of flavor.  I think the pizza was around $15 and was worth every bite! I highly recommend it!  We will go back again when we return in the spring! 5 stars!

sr5ePCMe6IzPLMqaosddTw.text: Taylor is the best server I've ever had. Very fun, great recommendations and very attentive!! Fantastic food as well. Bobby is the bomb.com as well

OHljJ1p1TWDlhyjdySx9LQ.text: We had lunch here and loved it!! Sean was our server and he was amazing. He was very friendly and we had a minor complaint which he handled very well. It was busy when we showed up but we still got excellent service. Definitely must try, and sit in Sean's section!!

XjAXCqSreVbRVqpS5E-TJA.text: AMAZING! Came here for brunch and did the bottomless mimosas. The food was amazing and they kept our mimosas full constantly. I'm writing a review mainly about our waitress, Jody.. SHE WAS AWESOME. I'm visiting from New Jersey for a long weekend and I can honestly say she was probably the best waitress I ever had in my entire life. She was super cool, attentive, and overall great. The staff in general is fantastic. We had to wait a little bit for an outside table, but it was definitely worth it.   Definitely would recommend it! Definitely would come again! My friend and I can't get over how much we enjoyed our experience.

NdWUbET9kd6V_bf5f54-mA.text: Good Food... mimosas great! Had sticky bun, pep pizza, some fancy burger, humus. Server Ninja Tracy was awesome!

GjqoRZPAxpj530B2i5bM9Q.text: Girlfriends and I were in Vegas for the iHeart Daytime Festival and wanted to have a good meal for our last night in town. My weekend roomie found a few good places on the Strip including Hexx! They take reservations, and our party of 5 in the late evening was no big deal. My roomie and I arrived first, and they seated us promptly. Our waiter greeted us the second we sat down and offered us water options while waiting for our other friends to arrive. He provided amazing service the entire evening.  I made sure to order one of the house drinks-the Hypnotizing Strawberry- and do not regret it! Great blend of alcohol and flavors. All 5 of us ordered different entrees and loved them all! I got the Short Rib meal that includes horseradish mashed potatoes and roasted Brussels sprouts. It was almost too beautiful to eat, but I ended up devouring my meal. One of my most-favorite meals I've ever eaten. All of the flavors blended together beautifully.

rJtq7LJgeNQSuEgaWCH3iA.text: Great brunch place for Vegas!! Waiters Sean & Julio were AMAZING!! The carrot cake pancakes were to die for!!

KQs074ziX0srYaabfMr8YA.text: Bottomless mimosas. Yas. Please. Real talk, food is phenom. Sean, my amazing server... cordial, attentive, polite, so many positive adjectives I can write.  End of this short story, good food, good ppl. Come here.

kSOKU7yefhhe-CKHbi-RzA.text: Love this place! My husband and I came for brunch on a Saturday and sat on the patio. The misters made the heat not feel too hot, and it's great location to people watch and see the bellagio fountains. The food was great too! Had the sticky buns as an app, and we both had an omelette and a side of bacon! Delish!!

kHzApFLEffh5LwEFwOwBGg.text: Waiting 45 minutes to our meal, they made mistakes with the order so we brought back the order and left the place. Very bad service. We will never come back!

2e0EYNRSL5jC5eudJQuoBQ.text: My husband and I purchased a Groupon here just to try it out on our most recent trip to Vegas, LDW.  We got the gravy potatoes, which were amazing the guacamole, which were meh, and the spicy jambalaya, which were amazing! Overall, we will return as its 24/7, plus we got to sit outside for a nice view of the Bellagio fountains and ppl watch. If it weren't for our Groupon, I feel it is a little pricey for some of the items, but the items are big enough to share for at least 2 to 3 ppl, just something to consider, for the ones on a budget eating.   I wanted to try their chicken & waffles, but decided we will be back and give that a try. I hear it's one of the popular items! Our server was also great and attentive, so A+ for the service.  Great place for breakfast, lunch, and late eats.

PhM-t-MbPUaacJ31eXrI6g.text: The bloody mary and view were excellent as well as the service. The food was acceptable, but not worth the steep prices they were charging.

_0PlwSeyWElNkqmNTpeP5g.text: Wanted a good  steak in Vegas, with outside seating and a view. With Hexx I only got 2 BECAUSE THE STEAK WAS GREAT!!! Totally unexpected but I got a flatiron steak ( I like thin steak sliced and particularly enjoy a flatiron steak )   This out of control steak was 3 eye rolls ( an orgasm is 3 so no sex needed tonight). My companion had a filet and did an awesome eyeroll as well) pity I am sure I wouldn't be able to get that reaction from her.   Great people watching if you sit outside ( was able to get good seats at 8:30 on a Saturday with only 20 minute wait)  You also get a bonus view of the fountain s at Bellagio. All for a reasonable price in Las Vegas. NICE!!!

Ul0m2pE2AoWska6Zasi-NQ.text: Our first visit to HEXX was for dinner on the strip Thursday night. Ordering their HEXX burger and filet mignon, we were not disappointed.  The meat was tender, flavorful, and the portions were more than enough to fill my S/O and myself. The sea salt fries had excellent texture, color, and taste.  The ambiance inside was clean and upscale. The staff was very friendly and accommodating when we requested a specific table outside along the strip. Our waiter was chummy and interesting.  The bill for both of those entrees as well as a shrimp appetizer came to about $120 including 20% tip. A fair price for the food and a prime spot sitting outside across from the Bellagio, taking in the view of Vegas while the hustle and bustle moves about below us.  Recommended! Just be sure to grab a seat outside and enjoy the patio.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The HEXX burger with cheddar cheese instead of the standard American cheese which comes on this particular burger.

EGWPHBtMUNWVwyDDiHSv2Q.text: The food is fairly good, and constitutes a value considering the area; the interior is nice, and the patio provides an attractive place to watch people stroll down The Strip; the service we received was completely inexcusable. I drink decaf coffee, and I'm accustomed to the low priority many restaurants give to my crowd, but the cup I received was both tepid and watery. When the waitress asked how we liked our coffees, I politely stated that it was not good. She seemed hesitant to take it away until I asked for a double latte in its place. Another person delivered a cappuccino (not a latte) five minutes later, and it was almost pure milk with virtually no taste of coffee. The waitress delivered our food and asked about the latte. Again, I politely told her that it was simply milk. Clearly showing that she had had enough of me, she said, "well, that's the machine, not me," and walked away. I was hoping such a good time with my companion that I decided to just let it go. I wondered if perhaps she would exclude it from our bill, but no, when we were paying I noticed that the $7.49 cappuccino was there. We had other things to do, so we just paid and left. We won't be going back there.

oVh2AaUiPsx172L5H1vovQ.text: We went to Hexx for Sunday brunch and it exceeded my expectations! Not only is the atmosphere amazing so is the staff and food. They had a DJ playing great music, and the servers come around constantly checking on us and filling our glasses. We got bottomless mimosas and they truly are bottomless, most places I've been to you have to ask them to refill your glass but not here. I got the surf and turf sliders and they were delicious we also got the brioche French toast which was also delicious.

PT8ZrMmd5UKdHiIyi3jmzg.text: Awesome breakfast menu. The carrot cake pancakes are to die for. They are also great with drink service. We never had an empty glass.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TLYFIGKe7YRYHoxexCnWRQ.text: I got the chilaquiles which were meh. I tried the carrot cake pancakes and they were UHMAZING

t0fnMHV5Rildc3VMpqZ3DA.text: Hexx is a must for bloody Mary's, endless mimosa's and a great breakfast. We hit it with just my wife and I, or a large party. It's always been great food, drink and service.  Ask for Sean he must own the place because he treated us like we were his only table.

dDR-PGv5QC973-qkNH4shw.text: Bottomless mimosas and amazing food. The service was great and the spinach and artichoke dip is to die for.

2GmS1LaokQRw7VfLoqFBAA.text: Beautiful restaurant! We had the prime rib and the sliders. Also the amazing lobster and creamed corn!  We weren't able to sit outside this time but we will wait next time. You have a great view of the water feature at the Bellagio. I am excited to return

vA_rbxM4mHGelEaHdb2jsA.text: When we arrived (with reservations in hand), there was a long line there awaiting us. After navigating that (went quickly), we had to wait about thirty minutes.   Upon being seated, we were greeted with a fun view of the strip and the fountains.   The food: it was ok. Nothing amazing. Nothing great. Average to good, in my opinion.   The service: a little slow for my taste (except the guy in charge of filling my water...he was constantly filling it).   I wouldn't go through the hassle of this restaurant (parking, waiting, etc) to come back here. It was one of those "oh hey let's check out that restaurant right on the strip" type of places that you do once and never again.

iEla3ZiX1HsYLX8LD9Awmg.text: Food, drinks and atmosphere were excellent!! Service was horrible! Everyone was friendly, but the restaurant was slow, there were a ton of employees, but it was hard to get a waiter to your table when you needed anything.

cS9pz9beDl9yHxr_G6dSjw.text: OMG! This is the best place for Sunday Brunch! Everyone from the hostesses to the support staff was incredible! Our Server Steven B was so amazing, patient, professional and super knowledgeable!  He made our experience unforgettable.  Patrick was also so attentive and on top of his game!!! I recommend and will return.

nUCyEUlLv46OrY1AZpBCow.text: HEXX has been a longtime favorite our ours...the cinnamon roll waffle is the BEST!!!!

MFJxcWu_N3x3vUhDyX53ug.text: HEXX is a fantastic restaurant conveniently located outside of Paris on the LV strip. The food that is served here is absolutely delicious. I would say this place is probably one of the best restaurants on the Las Vegas strip.  My wife and I came here for breakfast with some friends in the summer. I ordered the carrot cake pancakes, and my wife got the yogurt parfait.  The pancakes were extremely fluffy and sweet and came with this tasty cream cheese topping.  Will be back again when visiting LV.

qZC4TPHxnOn36ZSzulhh3g.text: Stop by this place with my best friends and it was awesome. It was a perfect place for a boozy brunch with girlfriends. Bottomless mimosas were $25 and they made sure to refill them before I could get to the bottom :-)  Had a patio that over looked the Strip great place to people watch.   Service was pretty good waitress/hostess were super friendly. I would love to come back next time I am in Vegas.

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

O54kTNH8iUhq9rgWRuP0gw.text: Had this place again and it was even better the second time! Chicken and waffles were perfect and the Hexx Benedict is by far one of the best things I've ever tasted!   Also would definitely recommend getting the Sunshine Express Sangria pitcher!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sunshine express sangria

URu4MS403wsJVf7omIJFcw.text: This place was so amazing, we started our stay with patio dining.  We love a good patio brunch spot.    The reviews were amazing and the lovely pictures are what made us stop at this location. I loved every bit of the patio set up, the inside dining was really beautiful, the portraits on the wall were pretty amazing as well.      Listen to this, this was the best brunch spot we ever tasted here, we came back again today. The great thing about it, we got our amazing waiter Raphael again. If you ever go here, make sure you ask for him. He's efficient, fast, and very professional.  Oh yea...they have some really great bloody marys, coffee, and lemonade.   Anywho...i could go on and on. But I'll just share pics and comment accordingly. Thanks for reading, until next time.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

C256OQfx92znv6Asiz4x-Q.text: Crab  cakes, Cesar salad, calamari and a house speciality drink  Las Vegas weekend getaway .... just getting started!

P9bec_opJrQEh602kJ7tYg.text: We were too early for the Eiffel Tower experience so we decided to get a bite to eat.  I turned around and saw an awning with the word "Brunch" on it.  Sold!    We waited a bit at the hostess station and someone finally came over to tell us we had to go to the front of the restaurant to be helped there.  (A little sign may have been helpful!).  The hostesses were all in little black dresses, the wait staff was all dressed in nice uniforms.  Just about the time we thought that maybe we were a little underdressed and not suited for Hexx, our server came over, threw her weight all on one hip and said, "Can I help you guys?"  I instantly felt at ease.  :)  I had the Farm Fresh Eggs which came with bacon, potatoes, and an English muffin.  I also ordered the Berry Bowl.  My husband got the corned beef hash and our son ordered chicken and fries from the kid's menu (another sign that they're family friendly -- they have a kid's menu and crayons).    Our food was superb.  At first look my potatoes looked kind of gnarly, but oh, they were so tasty!  I could have done without the black burnt bits on my plate, but no big deal.  Everything else was fantastic. We shared the berries -- strawberries, blackberries, blueberries and raspberries.  So wonderful!  It was a little spendy but it was our only Vegas meal so we went ahead and enjoyed ourselves.  I would definitely recommend Hexx and I look forward to returning!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Behind the ticket counter for the Eiffel Tower Experience.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Berry Bowl

j7qYN4SyFzQxqTwDJRFbpQ.text: Came here on our last day in Vegas for brunch and it was well worth it! They were pretty busy, but we went and sat at the bar and was able to eat food and order from there. We were greeted pretty quickly and our drink order taken. They do have bottomless mimosas while you're there, so the more the merrier! They have a pretty good variety of options on their menu, so you can definitely find something you'll like. We ordered and the food came out pretty quick and was sooooo good! I got the Hexx Benedict and YUM! They cooked the eggs perfect, the ham wasn't chewy, and the scalloped potatoes melted in my mouth! Overall delicious! My friend said she liked her farm fresh eggs and sides that came with. Good size, and perfect for what we were looking for. I will want to go back and try their dinner on the next trip!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Farm Fresh Eggs
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. He&#39;d Eggs Benedict

djT1AwOQlRmoA68uxM64vQ.text: The Hexx Kitchen definitely has a limited menu and has too few wait staff for the overwhelming number of people going. We had a reservation for 10 AM on a Saturday for 6 people that we made a couple of days prior to the date and it still took a while for us to be seated. There is self parking in the Paris hotel for free for the first less than an hour but for an hour to two it is $9. We asked how long the meal would take because we were trying to make it to the Day Club prior to 12 and they said an hour, but that definitely didn't happen. It took over an hour and a half to order, get our food and go.   We ordered the cauldron (~$40) which had Prosecco and orange juice. I didn't like it because there was no hint of sweetness, however, for $40 we had enough for six people to have two cups and we got to take home three to go cups of it.   Here's my biggest qualm about this place. I ordered the egg platter because it was the cheapest item on the menu and it was still $15. I didn't find any appeal in anything else and really just wanted eggs. The food took 20 minutes to come out and everyone else who ordered eggs Benedict, the po boy and the burger got their food first. They all started eating and 15 minutes later they finally found my order and all that it had was three eggs, one English muffin and two chicken sausages. I was asked if I wanted to ORDER anything else while waiting but we were already on a time crunch and it would come AFTER I would get my food so there was no point in ordering more food. They didn't even offer to do anything while I watched all of my friends finish their meals. When I got my meal, the eggs were cold, the potatoes bland as all hell, the muffin hot and really good, and the chicken sausages tasted like they were filled with cardboard. Absolutely horrid. For $15 and a 35 minute wait I was absolutely pissed. I didn't even finish my meal at all.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

yIqvxzIELSNzj27dJVTHZA.text: Vegas has SO many options, which is fantastic but also overwhelming. We were staying at Bally's (which is attached to Paris) and needed a bite to eat before going to see O. We made a date night out of it and decided to try out HEXX! THIS WAS A WONDERFUL DECISION!!!!!!  The restaurant is beautiful and has terrace seating right on the strip (as well as indoor seating for a more quiet dining experience).    I ordered the shrimp, which came with a puree, roasted carrots and crispy ham! IT WAS TO DIE FOR! I was literally sad when my meal came to an end!!!!   My boyfriend ordered the daily special: a wagyu steak with potatoes! His portion was HUGE and was probably the best steak that I have ever tasted. The meal was expensive (as are most things in Vegas) but 100% worth the price!!!!!!   Thank you for such an amazing meal!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Wagyu steak with roasted potatoes and peppercorn sauce

evY9y-Dd2UWVF03wOnL_Dw.text: A very exciting brunch spot which seems to be extremely popular among bachelorette parties on weekends; there were 4 large groups on a Saturday morning each having a wonderful time and singing along to the 90's music that was bringing back memories.  My friend and I split a Chopped Shrimp Salad and Cheesy Garlic Bread. The salad was huge and easily enough for two people. It was fresh and delicious and the dressing was delicious, I just wish they had put a little less of it. The salad was a tad over-dressed for us which made it taste a little salty. Also, the shrimp was perfectly grilled but I'd have liked to see a couple of more of them for the price; 4 shrimp seems like skimping on such a massive salad.  The cheesy garlic bread was ok. The bread itself was baked nicely but the cheesy center was under-seasoned and overall it was nothing to write home about; I'd pass.   Overall it's a fun place with a nice vibe, the food we tried was not bad but not amazing either. It's a little pricey which is understandable given the location. I'd probably pass the next time around since there are a lot of other options in Vegas that beckon to a foodie's heart.

nhCtpWYIHj-A5nxK32pfqA.text: A hunt for good brunch spot isn't difficult to find on the strip so we "eeny, meeny, miny, moe" this place.  This restaurant is HUGE, the wait was about 10-15 minutes, and the ambiance is lovely. Oh, did I mention? BOTTOMLESS MIMOSAS.   The chicken and waffles were okay. Definitely could skip it next time. One piece of chicken was good but the other was really dry and I wasn't really a fan of their syrup.  MUST GET (again): S T E A K & E G G S!! Yumm literally a plate a heaven. I like my steak medium rare and FATTY. It was so perfect with a side of over easy egg (my choice), an English muffin, and potatoes.   Our service was a bit slow and she seemed to forget a lot of (small/basic) things here and there. Despite those two things, she still had great customer service and eventually brought everything out so I didn't really mind, could have been busy/short staffed so it's understandable.   #food-industry - I feel it 100%  Coming back for their steak and eggs!

XJVIDysORo1c3b_Z9bjR-A.text: They had me at bottomless mimosas. They don't even let you get halfway empty before refilling!  This restaurant is spacious. The wait time for 2 on a Saturday at 3 was about 10 minutes. They have 2 bars you can sit at and drink while you wait.   The food came out quickly and everything was great! I wish I had more of those chicken & waffles!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken &amp; Waffles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yogurt parfait
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spinach Artichoke Dip with chips

U0cHZFnih3EV6LFrvNLA8Q.text: YES! Got a delicious shrimp chopped salad and ginger panna cotta. Then I decided I was obsessed and went around Vegas eating panna cotta everywhere I could find it. Honestly this was some of the best panna cotta in Vegas. Am I weird? You bet. But seriously. Do you love panna cotta as a summer dessert when you're in Vegas in July and it's 320 degrees outside?

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ginger panna cotta

7sl_95Oha7xF763DephccA.text: The fresh fruit platter is really fresh and beautiful. It comes with a wonderful coconut whipped cream and the perfect little muffins. Awesome.  The pancakes are really heavy and chewy and fluffy. You get four, which was way too much for me. I only ate 1.   The service wasn't great at first...the first waitress never came back after we told her we needed a minute to decide what to drink. We waited a really long time and had to flag down someone to get a waiter to take our order, which wasn't cool at all. The waitress who served us after that though was phenomenal. Engaging and attentive. They add a sketchy concession fee which I hated, but didn't protest.   My husband had the burger which was huge but delicious.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fresh Fruit platter

ctl0M2Svgioanmku3dGqzg.text: Recently while in Vegas we had our wedding brunch at HEXX kitchen + bar, and it was awesome! We absolutely loved our experience here!   We had a group of 8, so we made a reservation. We lucked out and got to sit outside, which is what we were hoping for. Their patio is lovely and right on the Vegas strip. If the weather is good I highly recommend you sit outside if available. You have a great view of the Eiffel Tower as you dine.  A few in our group opted for the Bottomless Mimosas, but we chose to share the Magik Dragon cocktail, which is served in a small (but shareable) pitcher and contains Tito's, Bacardi Dragonberry Kinky Pink, passion fruit puree, and blood orange puree. And the presentation is awesome! The server will pour the beverage over dry ice creating a really cool steam (or dragon's breath) for you. Plus, it tastes awesome!   My cousin ordered the Twisted Sticky Bun to start, and it was huge! It's served with toasted pecans and a cream cheese frosting. It was so decadent that she couldn't finish it all, so B and I helped out.   I opted for the Breakfast Croissant, which came with black forest ham and aged cheddar, and I added scrambled eggs. It was served with home fries. Everything was delicious! And the serving was so big! I didn't come close to finishing it.   B opted for the Carrot Cake Pancakes. They were served with cream cheese frosting and maple syrup, and they were so good! I prefer a savory breakfast, but these pancakes were definitely a welcome addition to my meal!   And, the staff caught wind that it was our wedding day, so at the end of the meal they brought us a little ice cream cupcake with a candle in it. They were too sweet!  If you're looking for a brunch spot in Vegas, I would definitely recommend HEXX kitchen + bar, we loved it!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vjWkWxd9jH-kZJx5Jgvv6Q.text: Food is standard American fare with big portions. Staff seems friendly, but service is a bit slow. I've only dined here for dinner and HH, but it seems like they're better known for their brunch. The best parts are the views of the Bellagio fountains and there's generally no wait. I recommend making reservations if you want patio seating.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime Rib
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Traditional Caesar Salad

_SVTzC1MUe5dpt43ocfgKw.text: This place was mediocre. I desperately wanted a benedict, but after seeing pictures through yelp, i decided that it wasn't worth the price. I ended up getting an omelette which was okay. There wasn't much taste so I drowned it in hot sauce. The inside and outside seating is nice, but I probably won't be back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Omelette

eYBsNKZyLVIJ2NF488jE_w.text: Overall, our experience was fantastic! Mainly because Natalie, our server, was amazing! We never saw the bottom of our bottomless mimosas. This was probably the most mimosas I've ever drank, in one sitting, lol.   Located inside the Paris Hotel & Casino, HEXX, is a very hip & trendy spot. Groups of bachelor/bachelorette parties, as well as bdays, etc, celebrating.  Some tables had a giant disco ball drink, called the Cauldron, which looked refreshing and delicious.   We had a reservation, and arrived a few minutes early. We were sat immediately at our reso time. Our group was 8 deep, and were sat in the less noisy, back area, quiet section,which I was totally fine with. The main area was loud, fun and popping.   Everyone was very pleased with the dishes they ordered. My fave was the Hexx Benedict. The portion and flavors were perfect. The ham croissant was a bit much and ham was a little too salty, but potatoes were delish. The chilaquilles were tasty and spicy, kinda like breakfast nachos.  The star on the table was the carrot cake pancakes! They were SO good!!!! Get them, for sure. No need to add any syrup, they're perfect the way they come. The cinnamon roll was delicious as well. Portions for both were perfect for our table of 8 to share. it was way more than enough.  And again, our server Natalie was AWESOME!!! She was super friendly and honest with her thoughts on the dishes, which I appreciate. Also, turns out, she's a Spartan Race Sister! She gave the best tips for my upcoming race. Amazing!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ham croissant with egg added
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carrot Cake Pancakes were THEEEEE BEST item on the menu! Absolutely get these!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Hexx Eggs Benedict. DELICIOUS!!!

5sh4ULe3NW9CcGWdRxzhlw.text: Had such an amazing meal here, by far the best service we received from our waiter, and the food was , definately a must go to while in Vegas for a great meal and ambiance

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outdoor patio seating, amazing view!

7AzBYJRDELJKM7RQXCaTqg.text: Food was great, had a hex burger and chicken and waffles. The latter is enough for 2 people to share.  The service, nonexistent. Apolo took 11 minutes to greet us, not exaggerating. We were sitting on the patio which had 3 total tables.  I had to get up 3 times and fill my own water. They use a short cocktail glass for their water. The 4th time the water pitcher was gone, so I  started to call the restaurant for service when he showed up. He never asked how the food was either, fortunately it was very good. If not, we would have had an issue as he was never around.  Spoke to Denise the manager, she gave me her card. We will go back to see if it's any better, and write and updated review if it is.

L9jHg4VNikq-i4dig-mT0w.text: This brunch was AWESOME. The food was delicious, the bottomless mimosas were such a great deal. TRACEE WAS THE BEST!!!!! She made our meal top notch, we had a blast. She made my sister (the bachelorette) feel like a queen and we all felt like rock stars! We sat inside, but it still felt like open air/patio. Highly recommend!

CFe8QH-hGxY1duPBgaJSzw.text: This place has style!!!!! The ambience is upscale but chill. The service was great, my water glass was always filled and the busser's were attentive to the table plus they were not smothering. I ordered the prime burger with a side of brussel sprouts and I really loved the presentation of the food. Our server Denise was awesome! She was really nice and very helpful. Thank you, I'll definitely come again!

Had their Caesar salad; it was light and fulfilling. My brother had the traditional burger, may I add that it was scrumptious !! (yes I took a bite) lol  Their artichoke dip was fabulous ! Will be coming back ! :)

QuM8Jdly5HoOOdQIIaBj2w.text: We came here after deciding not to wait for Mon Ami Gabi. We decided to sit in the bar and immediately we're served by a nice young man named Andrew. He went through his favourite items on the menu and recommended the pancakes and eggs Benedict. Both were great. The eggs Benedict is served on a bed of scalloped potatoes.   We opted for the $23 unlimited mimosas and had a blast. The restaurant is clean and has a great vibe. After breakfast we sampled a variety of chocolate and then pick up a few bars to go.   Great alternative to waiting next store with friendly staff and excellent food.

EFsgW8FZyRRhGq7ga52qsQ.text: We came here for brunch and were so glad we did! Perfect location looking at the Bellagio and the seating outside was great! Our meals - turkey club and omelette were one of the better meals we had during our stay. The prices are very reasonable as well! $45 for 2 is a steal in Vegas!! Wish we knew about this place sooner!

aWCIIO36oWAW7LbxdXXgEg.text: Amazing meal - full of flavor and excellent service.  Ten minute wait which was negligible - will certainly be back

M2chem6glmFQjexolHV-jA.text: I have mixed feelings about this place. The food was great (try the carrot cake pancakes) and the bartenders were charming, but the service was terrible. The food took FOREVER to arrive and some of it was nearly cold. The cheese on the carbonara pizza we ordered was already hard. The hostesses/servers were pretty snooty, and I got the sense that they were resting on their laurels of being in a prime location on the strip and didn't care very much to do a good job waiting tables. My party and I kept glancing over at the counters to see what was taking so long and it looked like most of the waitresses were chatting to each other and laughing. I'd understand if the food wasn't yet ready but there wasn't even a single attempt at visiting the tables to see if everything was alright or if we were enjoying ourselves. My glass of water didn't get refilled until the bill came at the end. So if you don't mind slow/careless service and paying the nearly 5% concession fee (basically just for eating on the strip) then I would recommend this place simply because the food is worth trying and the location is choice. Watching the Bellagio fountains from our inside table was pretty sweet, I'll say that much.

Gocyur_EByZZWpNAwzCKyA.text: Really great experience both with our service and with the quality of the food. We ordered the Chilaquiles, the meat lover omelet and the bottomless Mimosas. I wish we had pictures but we devoured our meals before we could (our bad!) Sean and Bobby really took care of us and made our meal memorable. Drinks were never empty and they had lots of recommendations for things to do on the strip. They even treated us to a sample of the Hexx Chocolate- made in house and was sooo good. Can't wait to come back and experience the dinner menu.

s9UIAl5KW59zW_J6_oBDlw.text: We went for brunch and it was such great food and atmosphere that we came back later that weekend for dessert and drinks. All their chocolate is made in house and it's delicious!

QyL3vGrGucfDtVbLOohf1Q.text: We ate here on a Saturday at about 1:00. It was extremely crowded but we were seated quickly. The service and food are good quality and we would come back.

QQTzYHUFsnHlLokwHxz68w.text: We were there on my birthday in March for brunch although we waited 30 minutes for an outside table but it was all worth it. Our waiter was awesome and attentive. The foods were amazing. I had the crab meat and the shrimp. The atmosphere was great. Best place to have brunch and breakfast.
