nYG7jMsNNZ3bC1cDoKK4Zg.text: We visited Hexx lounge during happy hour.  We were told certain beers, snacks, apps, and pizzas were 1/2 off. Seeing the beer prices, I opted for a beer listed at $8, as did my husband. We ended up ordering a second round, with one $8 beer and I think the other was listed as $10.  The only thing we ate was the cheese & charcuterie, which was good. When it came time to close out, everything was listed as full price, coming to $58.69, when supposedly our beers and the charcuterie plate were "half off." I double checked with the bartender, asking specifically if these were the happy hour prices, and he assured me they were.  So I guess a non-happy hour snack there would be more than $100? I know it's Vegas but that's ridiculous. I would not return.  Long story short:  buyer beware. Confirm prices before ordering.

V6ko5Qq4xnBoDONV9cWpBg.text: Absolutely love this place! The atmosphere & vibe was perfect!  First time here during breakfast & we sat out on the patio. Great view of the strip. Good music played in the background. Our waitress was very nice & attentive.  My friend & I are both got the sangria flights (comes with 3 sangrias) with different flavors. Couldn't tell you which ones we got, but they were all good.  I ordered the lobster roll with fries & both were delicious!  Def my new favorite spot in Vegas.

CoXZ86FxPzJuWBEi5uoxYQ.text: We had good food and great service here! Would come back. I had the scallops; they were delicious. And the butterscotch creme brulee was amazing. Also, the butter lettuce salad with white cheddar, coffee nibs and vinaigrette was a great beginning! We had a great deal by purchasing show tix to Paranormal (at Bally's) in a pkg with dinner here at Hexx! Very nice evening!

pZ-hSzN2CsKnpiH8aCDoNg.text: Came to the bar this past weekend. I was excited about trying their Bloody Mary because I've read reviews saying they had one of the best ones in Vegas. To my disappointment the bartender was totally rude. She gave us a menu and completely ignored us after. My husband even said 'excuse me' to her a couple of times when she walked by but she just kept walking. Mind you the restaurant was DEAD  at that time and it was just us 2 and another couple at the bar but the bartender was way too concentrated on helping one couple. We ended up leaving without ordering anything and definitely will not be back here.

r6oen-Cu7v8Gbv9ypXnx5g.text: We had a pretty horrible experience here. If you find yourself here, do NOT order the chocolate manhattan.   Trying to find a quick bite to eat and escape from the crowds, we approached HEXX from inside of Paris. Looking into the restaurant behind the hostess counter, it appeared dim, quiet, intimate, and a little upscale.   But then we were escorted to our table. A walk down a hallway and around the corner...and arrived at our table which appeared to be in a completely different restaurant. It was bright. LOUD. Packed. We considered leaving immediately but we had been searching for a spot to eat for a while, so we decided to tough it out. Wrong decision.   Here are some silly things that happened:   -- The staff allowed one large table of 20+ people to be disruptive to the entire restaurant, as they did the high-pitched whistle over and over again to get the groups attention, sang Happy Birthday 5+ times, and basically screaming at each other.  -- It took over 20 minutes for anyone to visit us originally. Basically 10-20 minutes between any server visit. The entire meal took 2 hours when it should have taken 45 minutes, if not less. -- For some reason, people from the strip kept (accidentally?) entering through a side door that entered into the restaurant. The signage on the door wasn't really clear and no one from the staff was regularly in that area, so people would open the door and stand there with the door open, or open and close it, etc. It was 40 degrees and windy while we were there. The tables right next to that door were literally completely bundled up with hats, gloves, EVERYTHING. We kept our coats on.  -- One of our food items that was delivered was bad. Really bad. (It was the mac & cheese - how do you screw that up?) It was so bad we each had one tiny bite and didn't touch it again. Server never asked how our food was, and picked up the completely full, nearly untouched dish at the end of the meal without even questioning it.   Nothing on the menu made sense. There is no theme in the cuisine - it's all over the place. One thing we ordered was the sausage pizza. It was the highlight of our meal but consider that every thing else was terrible. Basically, it was slightly above average in ingredients and flavor.   The only -and I mean ONLY - saving grace of the meal. I ordered the chocolate manhattan. Now I will drink pretty much any adult beverage no matter how bad it is. But I couldn't choke this down. The server did notice I had barely touched it after about 30 minutes and offered to swap it to their moscow mule for no charge. For this gesture they earn back a star.   There are so many excellent restaurants nearby -- do not stop here.

x97Gei4hWkfvZlE6TPhTgQ.text: Good chilaquiles and chicken and waffles and affordable bottomless mimosas in a chill  atmosphere. Service was great - -JJ took great care of our 10 top even during a very busy Saturday brunch. Our glasses were never empty. Will definitely be back.

B2foP6RNCs8I_vBKQO0bDQ.text: Mark was our server and he was really great!! He was such a nice I person and so attentive I practically wanted to ask him to join us. Food was wonderful. I had the filet mignon and my friend had the scallops. The peanut butter cheesecake was really outstanding. It was a very refined dessert and the perfect amount of sweetness after a big steak. Totally enjoyed ourselves!!

VKA8ZLJvoVPkiYN9wFNqJw.text: Sean and Patrick are positive, friendly, and wonderful people to be around. Definitely go there and ask for them. Also Sean is an author of positive body image, which is a beautiful and important thing.

xfMdDdPfrgMaR4YZhv3TGw.text: Pros: People watching patio, good service Cons: A little bit over priced menu items. Not all that impressive.  Maybe it's because of the amount of people who was around, it was a bit difficult to get seated.  Kudos to the servers tho.. they are all nice and hot :)

YHz9FXwG0W_mwksk46q39g.text: Breakfast   Straight f*ckin flames ... my Gawd them chicken and waffles so fire! And them bottomless mimosas will have you lit. My glass never reached the bottom (seriously). If there's one place you go for brunch, it's here!

XOceYUE7_Y-hGcIYsLFD4w.text: Four of us went out for some late night dinner at Hexx & had a great time.  We had a few different items, sharing & trying various things.  All was good, the service was great, & the price wasn't too bad.

6tqXVh94vAJXh8RDZdr7FA.text: Not a fan!  Place is loud, food was not good.  Chicken sausage was DRY, corned beef hash was meh..  nothing memorable about the place or the food!  Will not go back or recommend..

UZ2X6y005LJ5SvQRkQ8ZUQ.text: This place has a great patio with a view of the Bellagio Fountains.  The whole staff was very friendly, from the host to the bartender (while I waited for my patio table) And the waitress.    They gave me an amazing table (see the photo to see my view).  Their food is good, I had a Ceviche and, my guilty pleasure, Mac and cheese.  I have to confess that I liked the Ceviche way better, the max was missing some flavor.  The prices are not the cheapest for cocktails, a martini was like $18.  For the food, as I ordered an appetizer and a side, it was a good price.  But is Vegas and that's what you can expect.  Overall, I had a very nice experience.

0yMNFT_4fed9co5febbMsA.text: My sisters and I ate brunch at Hexx today. It was absolutely fabulous!! Everything we ordered was SO GREAT! Our waitress Tracee was the best !! She made our brunch better than we expected,she was so attentive and fun! If you go there you better hope you get Tracee for your table!! The three sisters loved her!!!

BSSAxG3vAfAc7HYZdck20g.text: I'm all about atmosphere when it comes to restaurants, besides the food and customer service being superb...this trendy spot on the Las Vegas Strip definitely won me over!   I had the Vegetarian Pizza, which was amazing!!  I ate the entire thing, even my friends were trying to get a slice With my pizza, I ordered a glad of white wine, perfectly chilled and crisp for sitting on the balcony.   I've only been here twice, however I will return with an appetite and my iPhone.   Please enjoy my photos...I tend to take myself on a restaurant tour while I wait for my food.  Besides being an ultimate foodie, photography is my other passion.

B1G3Ziq4Etb3gmCLlLuudA.text: Brunching here with Yelp friends is always a good idea.  Thanks to Stefany, we had a group of 6 enjoy a weekend spread of brunch items.    Friends that share - care! This is why I like to dine with this group.  We decided to share several menu items, Carrot Cake Pancakes, Hexx Benedict and Chilaquiles.  The Hexx Benedict was definitely the star of the show.  Instead of being on an english muffin, a layer of scalloped potatoes are nestled beneath the canadian bacon, poached eggs and hollandaise.  Several spears of asparagus top off the lovely dish.    The Carrot Cake was no slouch either.  The spicy batter comes out in full flavor with the dollop of cream cheese frosting. It's generously fill with walnuts to complete the ingredients.  With all of that sweetness you really don't need to add the syrup.    The Chilaquiles lacked comparing to the other two previously mentioned items.  It was good but not great.  This is dish is good for sharing since you can just grab a few chips with toppings.  Our service during this busy time was decent.  The gentleman had a fun and friendly table side manner.  The assistants helping refill drinks were very consistent in checking on our table and keeping us hydrated.  They certainly were attentive and made our visit enjoyable!

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Benedict

X17St2hhVQtKdXJw-J2jbg.text: Amazing. Right on the strip overlooking the bellagio fountains. Wide array of fantastic food choices, everything was delicious. Service was spectacular, our waiter Jackson was top notch, he actually anticipated our needs, as did Lupa.  Highly recommend

ZYgxaXzScGuv8AukXzNJNQ.text: Food is simply delicious! I got the eggs Benedict and loved every bite of it. The only reason I did not give this place 5 stars is because the service was horrible in my opinion. We waited 40 minutes for a table despite numerous tables being empty. Also, after ordering the food, it did not arrive until approximately 1 hour to get our food. If time is not an issue, I highly recommend this restaurant.

_ye2an7093642TURv-wQPQ.text: We had a terrible experience. They are so busy that customer service is their lowest priority. We had a meal that was horribly overcooked and our experience with the manager was insulting.  Trust me, this place isn't worth your time.

cvsZgIMg9-IqIxhvBSJKqQ.text: We stopped in here for brunch. I highly recommend making a reservation as they stay pretty busy. We got their baked spinach dip to start and the entire table enjoyed it. The artichoke hearts gave it some flavor and the cheese was creamy and not overbearing. We also grabbed a twisted sticky bun that was perfectly cooked, the pecans added a welcomed crunch, and the bread was soft and not over baked. I had the corned beef hash for my meal. The eggs were poached perfectly, the corned beef was moist, the sweet potatoes complimented the dish very well, and the hollandaise gave the dish just enough of a splash of extra flavor.

lPP5MY3VuQA0IpTFYDJJ7w.text: You MUST ask for Patrick and Rachael. Coming from customer service, I appreciate GREAT customer service. They took the best care of us!!!! The food and service were TOP NOTCH.

htwCA1sjJ3B0fGw-rYJokg.text: Shout out to Tracee and Ivan! The real MVPs!   Had a great time celebrating our bride at Hexx! Good food and great service! Thanks for a great time!!

bSULwRiT0pyFRln6WWZ47w.text: Food was good.  But service wasn't.  "Bottomless" mimosas option took forever for refills.   Then our waitress took forever to come by. We sat outside so maybe it was easy to forget about us.. At first I thought maybe it was because management gave her too many tables to wait (inside and out). But when our waitress came outside, she completely forgot every table to the right of the door! She didn't even look our way for me to get her attention. Later when I joked that she missed us, she gave me an attitude!  Meal started out good. Then waiting forever for refills, a little salt, the check, then getting attitude cause the waitress forgot us? No thanks. No wonder they needed Groupon to lure customers in.

HTGIORpxyKjohm_3NI3yDA.text: 2 words: bottomless mimosas. Tracee kept them coming!! We came here 2 days in a row because the service and food were so good. The view of the Bellagio fountain show doesn't  suck, either! The food portions and quality are worth the price, in my opinion. Had the lobster roll yesterday and steak and eggs today. Would absolutely recommend. We are staying at PH and Hexx is about 2 doors down.

VBJA3LeMKalrIUocTIkm7A.text: Why try Hexx?   Because it's simply the most underrated restaurant in Las Vegas.   I've been coming here since it opened. This restaurant is unique in that it is a 24 hour farm to table restaurant, great for late night and excellent for lunch and dinner during normal hours. The food is amazing and the quality is impeccable.   The manager Juan and staff are outstanding, this is my go to spot whenever I'm in Las Vegas.

dGBHQATsh6UIe4TcaTrg-g.text: We ate here for breakfast twice in three days. The food was good, and we were able to get patio seating with no waiting. Chilequiles were super yummy, and I would highly recommend it.

p3IL1IPLJc6hJK0tvnAT-A.text: Our waitress Tracee was amazing and had a fun personality, making the experience that much better. The food is amazing, and the bottomless mimosas will leave you feeling some type of way (but only if served by Tracee). Xoxo

CLwC-i0OAHelwM1bgx_Rfg.text: Amazing place! Our server David was wonderful! I love the management and the food was excellent! Must stop for families, date night, and any other time!!!! Love love love love love this place! 100% recommend!

jHLLfbk5nsKlses-zf58Mw.text: Food was awesome and I'm picky (French toast) and my husbands was great too (meat omelet) then you add in the Bloody Mary and bottomless mimosas you got 5 stars from me. -J_7k-g9xNyCf_zlflFIlA.text: I ate breakfast at 12pm here and it was very delicious. I got the baked french toast and my babes had the chilaquiles. 0L9iq9YO667-4aQdCppUfg.text: Don't have much to say unfortunately. My girlfriend and I came here because it was 5:30 am and we saw this was open 24/7.  The first night we stayed we went to bed early due to jet lag and such.  It literally states on their restaurant, "breakfast/lunch/dinner 24/7."  We go in and they are vacuuming, no one to seat us for awhile, the bartender had to go in the back to get someone who told us, we had to only choose from a shortened menu as they are "out" of several items on the menu.  Needless to say, we walked out.

e9q9HtfIvPi-oi6wGY-6Qg.text: Stumbled upon HEXX kitchen + bar when looking for a nice brunch spot during my stay in Vegas that wasn't a buffet and Yelp led me here! Located off the strip across from the Bellagio fountains, HEXX focuses on fresh, quality, approachable American cuisine with extensive drink options OH, and it's attached to a candy store as well! What's not to like about that?  I loved the atmosphere; modern, cozy, home-y vibe that made you feel like you were in someone's house casually sitting down for a good meal. As we settled in we pursued the brunch menu and I actually had trouble picking what I wanted because everything looked so good to me. After some rounds of coffee I opted for the ham and cheese croissant which our server recommended and I was not displeased in my decision. It was a huge sandwich with aged gooey cheddar, a nice helping of black forest ham, and a nice soft and warm croissant bun served with a side of their home fries. Seemed like the perfect way to start my morning as  I was completely satisfied with what I ate and now was ready to get my day started. And although the candy kitchen seemed very tempting, I had to restrain myself since I was still basking in my brunch pleasure and it seemed too early for that, until next time!  Give this place a shot for great food, views, and atmosphere when you don't want to eat at a buffet.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ham and cheese croissant

sobpHt_-8ffhqmPoWvk_iw.text: Atmosphere: a fun, young, and hip (does that negate everything I just said?) vibe.   Breakfast: I am not a fan of potatoes, but these roasted and pan-seared fingerlings were done well- crisp, buttery, and sprinkled with sea salt. The omelet was good. Want a hearty start? I loved the multigrain porridge, loaded with barley, farro, oats, and a variety of dried fruits and nuts.   Sweets: the candy shop offers free chocolate tastings at the bar that faces the chocolate-making room. You can try 6 darks or 6 milks. Everyone is so friendly and well-trained that I bet they would gladly offer all of the samples. Same with the ice cream! Ahhh, heaven. They use their own chocolate in the different chocolate ice creams offered. Feeling like going all in? Make it an ice cream sandwich, which can be make vegan with the sorbet or gluten-free with the GF chocolate chip cookies.

Dh9jEfMJi1qBYdsBhzk0vQ.text: The restaurant was only 1/4 full but it took us 40 minutes to get our food. The Wagyu steak came out well done. We asked for medium. This is not acceptable. If I'm paying for Wagyu steak, don't serve me jerky and expect me to pay for it. The burger came out entirely wrong-as in the wrong burger. My child had to wait an extra 20 minutes for the burger to be remade. By the time the burger came out, half our party had already finished their entrees. As a result, we were late for our next exciting Vegas excursion.

lJXDYL2b0UZPpfTE8llOjg.text: Worst experience ever!!!  Our waiter did NOT pay attention to us.  I asked for packets of sugar and never received them.  I asked for ranch and he never brought it.  No refill.  No "Is everything fine".  Our food took a long time to come out.  We were there before some other groups and yet they received their food quick.  I don't know if it was because we were Mexican and they were Caucasian.   I had to raise my hand in order to get our waiters attention.  He even admitted to us that if I wouldn't have raised my hand that he wouldn't have came since he had forgotten about our party of 4.  Never again.  Beware my people of color. You may be ignored and put aside if you're not Caucasian.

76eI8KqJ9rKzwc5yL6zcEw.text: Our favorite place to have lunch in Las Vegas the mimosas delicious and food are so delightful and flavorful. The atmosphere is the best in Vegas. The music is fun and the service r amazing like I said it's our favorite place thank you see you soon

kZBP2V9twytPwTyx_dWBUA.text: I'm going to give my honest review as a resident of Las Vegas.   I came here with a few coworker's to have our annual Christmas dinner on a Wednesday afternoon. We all live in Las Vegas, so it took us awhile to find parking to the hotel & casino, and then walk to the establishment.   We had reservations and we were quickly seated. We decided to sit inside, although they had heaters on the patios outside. We wanted to be warm.   Service 3/5: I'm honestly not sure what our server said her name was because she spoke so quickly I really couldn't understand her. I did hear her ask what type of water we would prefer to drink, and there were several options; which was a nice touch! Service could have been better. She was friendly, but spoke way too fast.  Food 2/5 I was so disappointed. I ordered the King Salmon, and I'm not sure why I was expecting it to be king sized. I ate it in 4-5 bites. It was a super small portion but the presentation of the salmon was beautiful. I was going to order the chicken and waffles that my coworker ended up changing her order to, but I didn't. It looked way more filling than my salmon, and it also taste so much better than my food. I should have ordered the chicken and waffles.   We also ordered two alcoholic potion beverages. The first one was the Jungle Juice potion. It was very delicious, but of course it had low alcohol percentage. When we neared the bottom of our potion drink, we noticed a hair in our dry ice. We were all disgusted, but we work in the food and beverage industry so we know what it's like to have unruly customers. We told our waitress, and a manager came and quickly resolved the issue. Thank you! We also ordered the berry potion (I forgot the name).   Ambience 5/5 Hexx Kitchen was beautifully decorated and very spacious. The patio was also very beautiful, and every 15 minutes, we were able to watch the Bellagio's water show.   Overall 2/5 Unfortunately, I felt we could have spent less money on the same portion-sized food. It also took forever to find parking, walk through the hotel and casino, and find this place. It was an alright first time experience, but I more than likely won't be returning.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and Waffles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Jungle Juice Potion, that we later found a hair in. =[

PAfpIPrZIq9v2PLbYWCjbg.text: Taylor and Ivan were the best duo ever in the history of service! They are an essential piece to Hexx and Emjay and I appreciate them especially since it was our birthdays. Promote them!!! They deserve it!!

qfWwNa6kIVTNaaqjwocnUQ.text: Rachel my waitress was amazing, the service was great, if you come to Vegas this spot is a must! Everything is prepared beautifully and the bottomless mimosas are fantastic!

tbocPamM6fp_0TI_XRY96A.text: This was the worst experience both my husband and i have both had at a restaurant. It took an unreasonable amount of time for the server o even take our drink order much less get our drinks. When we finally for our food. My husbands steak, who he asked for medium rare, came out still bleeding. When we requested another steak, he waitress looked annoyed. When the second steak came out it was well done. At this point we asked for the manager and the waitress rolled her eyes. The manager came out and said she would take it off our bill and get it fixed. About another 20 minutes go by and the waitress comes back and asks if we need anything else, and we said we were still waiting for the meal, and she responded in a snarky way and said, i didnt know you wanted it. Why would she not think we would want the dinner we came in for? At this point we asked for the manager again and had to wait so long that my husband had to go find a different manager. When the original manager came to the table i explained to her what was going on and she too rolled her eyes. She said we never requested a third meal said she took care if our bill and turned and walked away. The male manager was very helpful and offered for us to stay for a drink. I am not one to turn down free alcohol, but we were so turned off we didnt even want to stay. When we returned the following day to speak to the general manager, she was unavailable to talk to us because she was in a meeting.  If i could give zero starts i would. This was the worst restaurant experience ever. I would never suggest going here.

b-kNZ0UUZbCI75fAwrvjaA.text: Amazing place with amazing service. Got the Benedict and it was perfection. The mimosas are also very strong and they don't cheap out on the champagne. Sean was awesome and he was helping us before we even needed more water or mimosas. He was super nice. Thanks for the amazing service Sean!

TI04v6ckxBedXmRepJ4CcA.text: I made reservations for this place yesterday morning. I parked in the parking garage and it was a bit confusing trying to find it within the casino, but from the Strip is located right in front of the Paris.   I dined in for the Brunch and it was great. Had the bottomless mimosas, which the price wasn't too bad. Our server kept filling us up when we got half way so our drink was never low. I ordered the Cinnamon Apple Pancakes and they were absolutely delicious. No need for syrup. Every bite was heaven.   However, my wife ordered the Steak and Eggs and she had to return the steak because it was way too salty/over seasoned. But the eggs, biscuit and potatoes were good.   I would definitely try this place again and I would recommend. The staff was great and the view from the patio seating was nice. They even had heaters outside to ensure their guests were warm to enjoy people watching. Loved it.

53y_kUyr1d7j46WVo36w-g.text: Great place with great view.  Food was wonderful from the white bean hummus, to the chopped salad, braised ribs and divine sides.  Must try the roasted cauliflower... has a kick and is so good. But the two best things about this restaurant was the service and their specialty blackberry infused gin cocktail The Desert Storm!

brRxpcdf9FMCv6gRI_Z32Q.text: Amazing food and drinks. The manager was extremely kind and brought us a bowl of some amazing concoction of watermelon and cucumber. Service is great and food is even better. Nothing beats this amazing view.

jbC_FgNd0yemmRBbqCNi4g.text: Stumbled across this place while walking on the strip on Valentine's day. Checked out the menu outside and was impressed by the options so my bf and I decided why not- let's give it a try!   Menu was great and he decided on the 14 oz. ribeye while I had something smaller- meatballs, cause I wanted to save some room for their desserts.  14 oz ribeye was SALTY- too much peppercorn. Meatballs came out COLD and DRY- returned it and rejected a second order, because we had already waited more than 20 minutes for our food to come out.  Disappointed but was also looking forward to desserts because BANANA ICE CREAM caught my eyes and I had to have it ;)  HOLY CRAP- banana ice cream was bomb! It was the Chocolate Budino!!! I'd def come back for deserts but not too happy with the food.

6Jww_Tn6Hbd6wuYtUW-0PA.text: The worst place we ate in Vegas. Giving it 2 stars bc the food was okay but service was horrendous. We were a group of 4 and the place was not busy. Took forever to get drinks and each persons food came out 10 minutes apart. By the time the last person in our group was served the first person had been done eating for over 20 minutes. It was insane. Waitress just rolled her eyes at us. Definitely skip this place.

3KxWjRVXgzhfKEqkAJofRg.text: Located on the Las Vegas strip and has an outside seating area.   Great location to people watch.  My friend an I shared a brunch meal of delicious yukon gold potatoes which were incredibly tasty; crispy on the outside and well seasoned.  They accompanied and egg white omelette which was just okay.   We had a cinammon role with pecan syrup for dessert and it was fabulous!  Service was impeccable.

-V-nAioalHMOFewhVEfRtA.text: 5 am and hungry, where to go? Not many options at that time. I wanted pizza but the place closed at 4 am. I coulda gotten a sandwich, but I had that earlier in the day. I wander over to the Paris hotel and after playing one hand of blackjack (yes! 21!) I asked the cashier what is there to eat. She said Hexx.   Now because it was so early in the morning, there weren't many people in there. Sat at the bar so I could watch sports highlights. Bartender was friendly and let me look over the menu at my leisure. I ordered the Hot Mess. A mess of fries, pork, eggs, and gravy. It took a long while before my food appeared. Like a really long time. Or it seemed really long. Because I was famished and tired, I ate some but not even half. It was salty. Told the bartender and he offered to get it remade. But I was too tired to care. Paid my bill and went on my way.  Great service for salty food. What else could I ask for at 5 am?

aK5KrypCeuZ-FRebR4YS0g.text: You're paying for the strip view here. Service was ok. Branzino was delicious. Salad was just ok. Smore dessert was ok but not great.

XNzKaiW94NZJEpXlBcWxag.text: Great brunch! Seated quickly with no reservation. Great food. Competitive prices for Las Vegas. And Rachel M. was the PERFECT server. My friends and I had bottomless mimosas for less than what we'd pay in NYC and a great time with Rachel. What an awesome kick off to our vacation.  **** and THEN Rachel brought us a specialized list of bar/sights recommendations for the rest of our trip! What a gem!

eL-AfZ-gEpWqy0CSqBMNCQ.text: I loved the attitudes of all the staff at this restaurant. I can't remember the last time the staff was so playful and felt genuinely happy to be working at a restaurant. I came here during slow hours for brunch, and the fried chicken and waffle was delicious!  I'm not sure how they got the fried chicken to be so crisp, but it was definitely one of the top 3 fried chicken and waffles I've eaten. There's a slight spicy kick to the dish that I found enjoyable, but it's a little bit different from your normal fried chicken and waffle place. The portion size was generous, and I was struggling to finish everything.  I don't like Vegas, but I'd definitely drop by here again if I come back to this city!

_wszh4b9_P9rhHL1ToupwQ.text: came here around 4:00 and made it for their happy hour special. sat at the bar.  I will the say the service was a little spotty. I think i would have originally given this a 3 star review based off service, but the food was just fantastic that it deserved another star.

Sb8ghnZvtcQDSRgJgcOdfg.text: I had the BEST eggs benedict ever!  It was so delicious!  What I found unique was that it did not include an English muffin but rather a poached egg and ham were placed on potatoes instead. In fact, all the dishes our group ate was very good. Excellent service from our server (David) too!

tk4IbNp8VyTw6A_NQFlRoQ.text: Good food and a nice location to sit along the strip and view the fountain show at the Bellagio.  I thought the food was slightly over priced for the amount that you received.  For example $17 for a small dish of calamari or $9 for a piece of cake that wasn't a piece of cake, but two small lines of cake the we're about an inch wide by 3 inchs long.  But by far the thing that really pissed me off was the 4.7% concession fee that was added on to my bill by the restraunt.  When I asked a server about this charge, he told me that it was imposed by the owners to help pay for the cost of owning a restraunt on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5hVIGIJjly5pNtSBpkoUlQ.text: Amazing service! They view was unbelievable and the food was spectacular, the best calamari ever had!  Pro tip: The beer park right above is the best view in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eYw9Dm-DoMBlGqSRLnT9SQ.text: Fabulous outdoor venue, perfect for people watching in the cool desert morning with a Farmers Bloody Mary and eggs Benedict. Excellent service was expected and received.

GcpQh-PIDEqKfQdjyhYH2g.text: Had a fantastic meal today for lunch at hexx. Brunch there is amazing and their bottomless mimosas are wonderful. The food is super good with great menu items. Prices are also very good especially for the atmosphere and location. This is always a very happy place. Customers always seem happy and the staff is soooo friendly and efficient. Our server, Sean, did an amazing job and made our dining experience wonderful. Hexx is a definite must go to when on the Strip!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Our server became part of our family after taking such good care of us!!!

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

obP9lJhU0MxZQPFG1hCCEQ.text: Daniel our bartender was so excellent we came two nights.  We hosted an impromptu event for 45 people and he and his team handled it like pros.  Daniel is friendly and makes amazing sangrias!  The food is all excellent. The steaks salmon and katas are great and the tiramisu with amaretto pour rules !   We love this place, such a cool vibe.

-_as5U2XxGLmpf4xnGGB_A.text: Never in my life did I think that I could go out someplace in Vegas and be so disappointed! We showed up to Hexx around 9AM. It was busy on one side, but totally empty on the other. We assumed the other side was a different restaurant. We said we were okay with any table, inside or outside and the hostess said it would take 15 minutes. 30 minutes later we are still waiting for our table with absolutely no update. We finally go up to the hostess to ask if our table was ready and she asks us if we ever got a text message, which we didn't. The hostess apologized and took us to our table. We sat there for about 15 minutes when a server finally came and took our orders.   We ordered 2 coffees, an egg white omelette, a croissant sandwich, and a yogurt parfait. Our coffees showed up in tiny little cups while everyone else had regular coffee mugs. The server said they were out of big cups and would bring them as soon as they were available. We continued to wait another 30 minutes to get our food! At this point we are hungry and still waiting for bigger coffee cups. I asked the server for bigger cups and he said, "We don't use those mugs on this side." We were the only table with small coffee cups. I decided to give up on that.   I took about two bites of my omelette when I noticed a long brown hair in my food. I wanted to THROW UP!!! At this point I'm hungry, don't have enough coffee, and just pissed off! I called over the waitress and as she was taking the food from me she said, and I quote, "Eww that f***ing disgusting!" UMM EXCUSE ME?!?!? This is supposed to be a nice restaurant, not a trash club! Whatever, I order the yogurt parfait because I was disgusted by my food.   I waited over 45 minutes for them to bring me my food. My friends were DONE with their breakfast at this point. During this time our server dropped a glass of champagne on a guest sitting across from us. She dropped two glasses and broke them and acted like it was the customers fault. I got pissed and went to the manager and asked for the checking letting her know I was clearly done with this trash of a restaurant.   When we got the check, to my disappointment, she only took off the charge for the omelet! She didn't comp us our meal after everything we had been through, she charged us for the tiny coffees we ordered after we asked for mugs many times. It was disgusting. We paid and left without leaving a tip.   Honestly, this place is TRASH!! TRASH TRASH TRASH!! With so many nice places in Vegas it is NOT worth even going here. The general restaurant at TI has better service than this junk of a place. I honestly wish I could leave a few bad reviews because people need to know this place is NOT VEGAS QUALITY and they shouldn't waste their time.

5O6npQ5BYZeYmi4hHOmhJg.text: This place was delicious, but very overpriced. My friend and I split a large group drink, an appetizer, and an entree, and we still both paid over $50 each. The food was great as well as the service. The large drink we ordered was tasty and strong. We were trying so hard to finish it and made a joke about to go cups. The server was like oh yeah we can totally do that! So in case you didn't know, you can get to go cups of alcohol in Vegas.

Yo6sWqNFvSJZpmsO7bfInQ.text: We wanted to grab some dessert at the Paris hotel, but ended up in this restaurant for dinner and dessert.  It was a little confusing to get to the front desk to get a table. We went in the restaurant from the hotel, but the main entrance is at the other end of the restaurant, facing the Bellagio hotel!   Server wasn't really attentive, probably because he was really busy serving at least 7 tables. Even though the service wasn't great, the food was fabulous.   We had: 1) Pan seared scallops - this was our favorite! 4 huge juicy scallops were served with onion puree.  2) Filet mignon with King Crab Oscar - the beef was tender and juicy 3) Roasted cauliflower - the cauliflower was delicious  4) Mushroom risottos - this is also our favorite! Not too creamy, but yet tasty! 5) Chocolate hazelnut pudding - tiramisu was sold out, so this was the next option. It tastes like Ferrero Rocher with Nutella, this was alright. Not a mind blowing dessert.  If the service improves, we will probably return for the scallops and mushroom risottos.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mKua8AJuqyz5WgMqoWuF0g.text: Although the food here was good, I wouldn't recommend going here unless you don't mind a noise level that is utterly deafening! It was almost louder that any of the nightclubs that I've been to. I literally could NOT hear the person that was right next to me, which made the overall dining experience unpleasant & the food almost forgettable; an opinion that most of those at our table shared. In addition, the wait staff was average & in need of improvement in the attentiveness department. They were polite but, seemed "stressed" to me. I couldn't figure out why it was so remarkably loud compared to absolutely EVERY restaurant that I've ever been to in my life because it seemed to be a typical Saturday morning really.

0g0wSfUzuuHGCGk4efyMVg.text: What an enjoyable place to have brunch on the Strip... While a bit pricey, it is easy to get your money's worth from their Bottomless Mimosas and there Chicken and Waffles were perfect - especially their in-house bourbon syrup! Though the giant line can be intimidating, they are very good about offering - and honoring - reservations, no matter how far in advance you make them. We made a reservation 10 minutes before arriving, found out the wait was over an hour for non-reservation holders, and were seated less than 5 minutes after arriving. Not bad!!

vfuMUho89wds6BIeOa-cUQ.text: Beautiful restaurant with good service, accommodating and friendly staff with delicious food.  We enjoyed our time there in the positive atmosphere with our grate Waitresses Julia and Taylor.   They are the best, make sure you ask for Julia when you go there. She knows all the food and she makes good recommendations.

6-NCNBF18XCJgNsshptxiQ.text: Hexx is absolutely amazing!!!!!  The filet minion is delicious  and succulent! Highly recommend medium cooked!  We even went back at night to get dessert after going to see a show!!!  When you get the same customers within the same day... Yeah the restaurant is a winner!!!!

MgyIEAt4wxfBkaH32pCxAw.text: Walking around Vegas looking for coffee,wound up at Hexx for coffee at the bar. Decided to have breakfast too....off the chain steak and eggs....Perfectly  cooked to my request, perfectly seasoned. PEETS coffee... fresh English muffin, Potatoes were  delicious....Now gonna be a regular.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rib Eye steak and eggs

HrA28PZFIYnbs1amfhjfXA.text: Such a great kitchen. We were visiting Vegas and could never agree on where to eat, especially with my pescitarian diet. But here we both found great dishes. I had the lox and chive waffles. It sounded weird but ended up being amazing. There were no pictures of it so I'm including one. My boyfriend had the carnitas hash. He really enjoyed it as well. Out server josh was amazing. He said that he had only worked there 3 days but I couldn't tell at all. He was a pro!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Waffle and lox menu item

kAwf5CF65N9lmZjfgIyHbA.text: Just finished brunch here. The food was excellent but the service was second to none. Our server Sean had the best personality and was on top of all of our needs without being overbearing. I personally recommend asking for Sean if he's available.

S1hsPUl-w4lEUfyk2dFVQg.text: Came here for dinner, they are open 24/7. Sat outside and watched Bellagio fountains. Waitress was excellent she gave me their vegetarian menu which had quite a few options! I had a wedge salad and spinach artichoke dip, prices are avg for the tourist areas on the strip. Also they have homemade sodas which was fantastic!!

o11An-ryTl87yp0_bCOVzg.text: The food was amazing!!! I got the burger and fries with macaroni and cheese on the side with of course the bottomless mimosas. I was hesitant due to the fact Yelp has failed me wrong once or twice. Everything was delicious since we all shared as a family table. Service was awesome we had Stephen. I will definitely be back!

K_cexmxxk2OYS5FyXxFP3g.text: My Desert Mash drink was phenomenal! Vermouth Gin, blackberry and rosemary was the perfect combo!!! Thank you Lupita for your adorable service! Best waitress I've ever had at Hexx! Highly recommended to anyone wanting a great dinner with a perfect view across from the Bellagio! Ask for Lupita, she's fantastic!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Desert Mash!!! Amazing!!!

dqTIw-jfW2vOhCPp-cjgRw.text: This place was EXCELLENT! While I was craving comfort food and went straight for their pepperoni pizza, my dinner mates each ordered steaks. For appetizers, we had the meat and cheese platter and the spinach and artichoke dip (one of my favorite appetizers, so I get it almost everywhere... This place gets first prize. It was incredible). Three of us split two sides, the creamed corn and the mac n cheese, and it was enough for all of us to go with our well-portioned meals.  Their motto is something like "simple food done right", and I truly can't agree with that statement more. Everything I tried from here was top notch and hands down one of the best things I'd ever tried, but nothing was over complicated.  For dessert, none of us could decide which one we wanted the most... so we each got two. Overall at our table we had the orange bar, the peanut butter cheesecake, the panna cotta, the s'mores, the champagne shaved ice, and the passion fruit mousse. Each one was delicious in its own way (and the dessert portions were small enough to merit two desserts each). My favorite ended up being the passion fruit mousse.   My only gripe was the server. I'm not sure if this is a restaurant-wide policy or if it was just our server who did this, but any time we would ask about an item on the menu ("Are the sides large enough to share? How is the Waygu beef aged?") She would answer our question and then list off her favorites from that section of the menu (even though we never asked for suggestions)... And because we had questions about each major section, I could walk in there right now and order an entire meal for her from start to finish. She was very nice, but that kind of information wasn't asked for, nor was it relevant to anything we did ask.

NBlKVdN7JqWnO2ltfNXAaw.text: OMG....good food and the best wait staff ever!  I love good customer service,l and Steven, our server, was the BOMB!!!!

SH6B61kTd20lxJeiNZ-_iA.text: Had to come through and show them some love on the review . I was part of a party of like 50-60 ppl who came in at different times throughout the time of the brunch ... and they were very attentive and had us covered amongst the chaos . Big shout out to the black waiter dude who started a month ago . Make sure you keep him !

cAOpgqvPH9_D8NBAlmSe7w.text: Thy change a 4.7 % fee just to eat there. They call it a franchise fee. Be aware and just say no!

UGeWaBchMS29UtTw9Jfv9Q.text: SEAN , SEAN , SEAN ... is he best server . Hands down . This is the kind of customer service I am talking about. Love it !!!!!! Come here and ask for SEAN to be your server !

7WiM9AHdK6TmR7RIkiSSkg.text: We got the travelzoo deal and enjoyed every second of our meal! Lovely calamari, yummy salads, short ribs and filet mignon were cooked to perfection. The portions were just right too. We were helped by Maria and Coty - they were super nice and accommodating! My partner and I appreciated their quick service and friendly attitudes! DEFINITELY COMING BACK!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Short ribs and filet mignon in the back. YUM!

GCTlQN-NvrnFCVsPvmU2Xw.text: Had lunch there today and it was absolutely amazing. Food was excellent, but the service was outstanding. I know that Las Vegas is the top in the service industry but a gentleman named Sean was our server and he was top notch. I have owned several bars and I know that customer service is the most important part of a business no matter what your selling. There could be great food anywhere but if you don't have great customer service you will remember that. Thank you Sean for a great lunch!!!

CxmroMyx9jFxTYjaTgPfaA.text: Excellent chocolate. Cool store. Beautiful design on the hexx merchandise. Rainbow eyes and lips. And ice cream! And loose candy by the bag! Right outside of the Paris Las Vegas Hotel. We used a groupon for the chocolate tasting and saved 50%.

DWMgDrOjiqnzEzum1Tim6A.text: Had an awesome server. Thanks, Brandon! If you're dining out late when it isn't too hot, sit outside. The people watching opportunities are great.  And you have a pretty sweet view of the street and lights.

TI69RrgboV1O0ywTxBQz3A.text: We had breakfast there and then came back later that night and had carrot cake!! Wow! Best carrot cake in Las Vegas. and I feel to be an expert ;)

FTF9VQRe4H6tPkejWedBnQ.text: Came here a few Saturday's ago with a group of friends visiting from Denver and Texas.  We saw the Lionel Richie show and needed some dessert and drinks after.  We were immediately seated and given dessert menus.  Our server, a young man with light hair (can't remember his name) was phenomenal with recommendations and putting up with all the questions from a group of 8.  Wow do they have a variety of desserts and drinks.  After much contemplation I settled on the chocolate cake and couldn't have been happier.  It was unlike any cake I've ever had.  So light and airy and not in a tall slice form.  This cake looked like spun cotton spread out with cinnamon cream cheese frosting and chocolate ganache on the side.  Sprinkled over the top was toasted almonds.  The carrot cake and banana cream pie also got 2 thumbs up from the group.  Needless to say my carb count was ruined for the week but what a way to fall off the diet wagon!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Their signature chocolate martini type drink.  Try it you&#39;ll be in love!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious chocolate cake dessert

YzpWYNDdMuJbOY_Ew4Fu2A.text: Great food and great service. We made a reservation and went around 10:30 am on a Tuesday. Not sure a reservation was necessary. The Carrot Cake Pancakes and Cinnamon Roll Waffles were great. Definitely would go back.

K9y71dd6l8GBTJlhJdG1yA.text: Great food and great service! Sean was awesome! We had the chilaquiles, carrot pancakes,  French toast and bottomless mimosas!  All delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

o2hTTFAecNwiOooGirhS-Q.text: The atmosphere is beautiful and the views are beautiful. Great decor and a excellent setting for brunch. However, the food was just okay. Got the carrot cake pancakes and side of eggs. Based on the ratings and amount of reviews--I was expecting so much more. The carrot cake pancakes were dry and bland--I had to add so much syrup just to make them taste good. Eggs were way over cooked and bland too. The place wasn't that busy and service was slow. Overall, I would only return for coffee and pastry because the atmosphere along the Strip and view is beautiful but won't order the meals ever again.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

5DZogb3bZ1lBoj22G-5Wgw.text: Food was great, we all ate breakfast. My only disappointment was the greeter in front desk she seemed quite uninterested. Luckily our server pulled it back with great service. The young guy who brought over my coffee forgot the milk but it's no drama I'm an adult I can ask for milk.   Views are fantastic right opposite bellagio, well worth a visit.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

A6c281pTOy_pe3YkqWyu3A.text: As a frequent Vegas visitor, I wished I could say good things about this place. Thanks to it's strategic location across from the Bellagio, this restaurant relies solely on heavy tourist traffic, one-time visitors. Hence, it can afford to be below average or just plain bad. Sadly, the food is mediocre and the service is beyond terrible. The manager (white guy with brown hair about 5'11 or so) appeared to have a racist attitude and apparently  treated me, a minority, as a second-class citizen. Our waitress was better, but not notably better (considering her superb treatment of our neighbors. She even offered them free desserts for no apparent reason). Very disappointing and upsetting to say the least. Please do yourself a favor and find a better restaurant on the Strip unless you want to feel less of yourself.

IKN3KVVJYFH9tUzeRlq5Vw.text: Always wanted to try this restaurant & it didn't disappoint. Originally wanted to try the bottomless Mimosas but we came after 2pm so the server recommended the Hexx Cauldron. It was DELICIOUS & super cute. !! Food was amazing as well ! Definitely recommend this place.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx cauldron

B1h9ZyRRp5o53oag6RlRXA.text: Had brunch yesterday and it was awesome. Gotta writethis down before my Vegas memories fail me lol.  The wait was not as long as we thought. Anyway we were quickly seated and our waitress Melissa took care of us. She's the best!  From recommending the special cocktails to the best brunch options and sides, she was on par.   I had the brioche french toast with bananas on top, fiance and 2 others had the corned beef hash, a sandwich, an omelet, and one had the gravlax benedict. The corned beef hash is a little on the small side so I suggest you also get the pulled pork fries. Ohhhh yes.  The brioche french toast was a little dry so I drowned my toast with syrup. The corned beef hash was actually really good but I wish there was more of it.   The special dry ice cocktail punch bowl thing was also good. We prefer the jungle juice one. Serves 2 if you really wanna get wasted but can easily be shared with 4. Drinks are actually pretty strong (at least the purple one with absolut acai).   If you come here, gotta ask for Melissa. Kept us entertained and gave really good menu options (the fries were one!!). Definitely will come back when we are in town. Thanks for giving us a good time, Melissa!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The purple one, jungle juice (our favorite) and dragons punch
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

3aRsbbUmZJax9aVGV0IyZg.text: Steven is the best waiter ever, I would come back just for him. Did bottomless mimosas and brunch, both were awesome

IxHA4J9q4ug0zDVtq9ptyA.text: I honestly can't remember what I ate, not the restaurants fault (I was too drunk to remember something in Vegas, I'm sure it happens pretty often.) I do remember, however that I was very excited to have eaten there after the fact. I believe I was able to eat both at this restaurant and at Mon Ami Gabi (Both apart of the Paris Hotel).  I will go back again just to jog my memory.

OLHnm8uVDk3Pj-SLO9N6cQ.text: We came because of the yelp reviews.  The place wasn't that busy but it took almost an hour to get our food and what we did receive wasn't very good.  Short ribs were mostly fat; baked chicken overdone...our server was no where to be found.  When we asked to see a manager, 10 minutes later the manager shows up with some security person and when we express our concerns, the security person says he reviewed the tapes and we didn't wait 2 hours...it was only an hour and 46 minutes...what??  I am a business owner and this is no way to treat customers.  2.5 hours after arriving, they offered a 20% discount.   This was not a good experience.

Ha7CYqGsb8TcqovFgqEyAQ.text: My husband and I stopped here during March Madness. We sat at the bar. Full menu and drinks at the bar, and no waiting for a table. Bonus!  Kyle was our bartender. He was knowledgeable, friendly, and took time to speak with us about our drinks. Try his Old fashioned it is fantastic! Or the "barrel aged" from the menu. You cannot go wrong with either.

WN-Zc7OptMVGID_pz8yejA.text: Went here twice in one vacay,,, that says ALOT!!! Brunch is amazing. I really enjoyed the poached eggs, my fav, but the corn beef hash was great all together!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. corn beef hash !

iN8eZopsQDiieFZzutVqZA.text: Great service and beautiful view on the patio. We were able to watch the Bellagio fountain show while eating lunch. We had the shrimp salad and the vegetable pizza and both were great! I would definitely go back!

hjXtDdGcp19hAiEWiupP6w.text: We arrived to Las Vegas around a awkward time so we decided to do a quick happy hour to get some food in our system.  I stayed at Planet Hollywood so it was a quick walk next door to get to Hexx. Their happy hour deals are great and the food is yummy!  I ordered a crab cake and a spinach dip!  Crab cake: Delicious and they did not skimp out on the crab meat! Every bite was satisfying!  Spinach dip: The dip was LOADED was spinach and artichoke. The cheese pull was mesmerizing !   Service is remarkably awesome, the staffs are so friendly and nice! I definitely will be back!  Thank you Hexx!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spinach Dip @ Hexx Las Vegas
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crab cake @ Hexx Las Vegas

upjiys-EDTDHdzjGozfhlg.text: Came here for my 21st birthday. Love the ambience, food, and service. The restaurant is so big there is a seat for everyone!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great menu! Ordered the braised short ribs

kscdyvkS541zt1gUa6NpbA.text: Nice spot on the strip for people watching.  Laid back and relatively reasonable prices for food and drink.  Good spot to see the Bellagio fountains as well. Had the "deconstructed" tiramisu which was good, and had the Wagyu beef hamburger as the main.  Would go back for a nice casual dinner to save a few dollars for the craps table.  :)

54I7QSdaZ-FjcWin5JskUQ.text: The drinks are delicious and the bartender can even fashion and xquisite virgin cocktail.   However the food leaves much to be desired.... the ingredients are not the best and the huevos rancheros is an abysmal affront to Mexican Cuisine. Fries are good. Sandwich meat and bread are subpar.   Service is outstanding. I believe with better ingredients and a revamped menu this place would be a gem.

aH-3voIQW28jOsYC_MfAKA.text: Great place for breakfast, lunch and enjoying the scenery of the Vegas strip. Print and courteous service. Tolu our server anticipated our needs( refill on drinks without asking) and was very friendly. Highly recommend the Cinnabon French toast and the potatoes were scrumptious!

guByHR3suUXsVtsPRHg6dA.text: awesome food, even better service. the sticky bun was to die for. if you get the bottomless mimosas they make sure your cup doesn't get below half way.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. mimosas

AbUZAMF0KGvYBFQEt76J8g.text: Hexx is located where the old Sugar Factory used to be (in Paris).  They still make their own chocolate and sell candy in the old candy shop.  Pretty neat.  The surroundings are fresh and modern, the menu is unique and the food very good.  I had the "Chicken & Waffles" and it was fantastic.  The syrup had a burbon and cinnamon flavor that was very unique.  Specialty drinks and cool desserts top off a solid dining experience.  4 stars!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry milkshake
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffles

ZSfqWoO5aXlLHKQe9gMnig.text: We got the chilaquiles and artichoke dip as an appetizer. Both were very tasty. The dip was one of the better examples of the genre. The chiliquiles was very good but could have used more chicken. It's a big plate of carbs, which is fine if that's what you're looking for. And it is tasty, but it won't blow your mind.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Artichoke dip

QxWAYUiT2ib8_ewB85jkuw.text: Favorite brunch place on the strip!  Been here twice so far and love the food, service and ambience. First time around, came here with girl friends and we ended up waiting close to an hour before we got seated at a table. The food was pretty good and we left satisfied, so I didn't mind the wait and was prepared for it for the next time. Got seated in about 10 mins the second time when it was just my husband and me. Our server was very courteous and guided us through the menu.  We started with the sticky bun and cappuccino and it was the perfect combination, highly recommend both. For the main course, I got the hexx Benedict, the same thing I  had ordered on my previous visit and husband got the chilaquiles. Don't let portion sizes fool you - the potato base in the Benedict is creamy and uber filling. Loved the sauce on the chilaquiles. They also have guava champagne, something I haven't seen in a lot of places.  Hexx is right across from the Bellagio fountains, so get an outdoor table if you can.

pJkkeeLos_NBB_jahtoikA.text: One of the best breakfasts I've had. Bottomless mimosas were great! Don't know if the glass was ever empty. Great service. Ordered Cinaroll Waffle, which we both agreed is great. French Toast was good. Ordered a side or sausage with hot sauce, this was very good. Good location, good food, good service.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PX5SXjHFAaHzwY6w4XZEMA.text: Great place!! Went for an afternoon brunch and very good. Great service, food, and environment.

tAIgkRUeVV0SeZgcG4scYQ.text: Definitely recommend coming here for brunch or lunch! HEXX kitchen + bar is right on the Vegas strip so I imagine they're usually always busy. We came around 11 AM, put our names down and within 10 minutes our table was ready. This place has a ridiculous amount of seating so no wonder our waiting time wasn't long! The interior is so nice and to my surprise was connected with the Paris Hotel/Casino. It did take a little bit longer than usual to get our menus and place our orders. Our waiter was serving so many tables that she was crazy busy, but also very friendly! I ordered their carrot cake pancakes and I did not regret that one bit! If you're craving something sweet for brunch, I'd recommend going with this. These aren't average pancakes, these literally taste like carrot cake and their topped off with delicious frosting. They were so filling too I could barely finish half of it without exploding so I'd recommend splitting them with someone.   Food: 10/10  Service: 8/10  Interior/Seating: 10/10

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

KU_G6cGA7SbTimWuLtbYoQ.text: Located in Paris on the strip it is a cool spot where it over looks the Bellagio water show. Very good brunch deals, and the food is solid as well. I enjoyed the meat omelette while my girlfriend had the chicken and waffles. We made it bottomless for $22 more (ends at 2pm, but if you sit before 2, you're okay for two hours). Considering it's Vegas and on the strip not a horrible price for brunch and good food. (Home fries are awesome)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Side of bacon and home fries
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat omelette
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast

Xy_V9bLoGoRuVdXOozi3fg.text: What a fantastic way to spend a few hours enjoying some sunshine, good booze and good food! We posted up at HEXX around 930 on a Friday and sat outside with a very minimal wait (they have heaters to keep you warm at your table BTW). Started with the fruit platter and man, was it super nice and fresh! Did I forget to mention that we did the bottomless mimosas as well? Then we moved onto the eggs Benedict as our server suggested and they were a nice portion and filling as well. All in all a great spot to people watch and enjoy a beverage or three on the deck.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

kVY_Luq_YvtzCuIwEnF9uQ.text: Let me tell you this place deserves 5 stars ! I loved the service LOVED the food it was really good !! Went there back to back had breakfast which was delicious meat omelet I think it was called and a HUGE thank you to our server Juliet well deserved excellent service !! Went back Sunday and had pizza and a burger which was also good and tasty ! I didn't get our servers name but thank you tall guy with a beard Great service as well !

pezmXI5A_t7_rur2guB6BQ.text: Beware of Extra Fee!    We've eaten here a few times during our twice a year LV visit.  The Bloody Marys are definitely the feature here.  I had the Farmers Market.   I should have just ordered a second and counted as my meal.    We had 6 diners; everyone had a pretty average meal.  Average is fine, but so considering the price point and location, it should strive to be better.    Our server was absolutely fantastic.  The people working in front of house were above par for the strip.    My big issue was $10.00 tacked in to the end of the bill.  We asked if it was part of gratuity (it wasn't a full 20% so we were confused).  Apparently the owners charge the patrons this fee for the luxury of "dining on the strip".  We asked for this to be removed and left the extra $10 for the fantastic server.    This fee is absolutely ridiculous.   I don't think we will be returning after getting hosed with this sly move.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ok1BCS6Xr1p_L880Fu61Ug.text: Wonderful breakfast!  Even though warm at 8 am, dotting outside alongside the strip was comfortable!  Veggie  and cheese omelet was huge and very tasty!  Served with potato and homemade toast.  Was incredible!  Will be back again!!

SXT9IPjn8WzzxCpoWQKn2A.text: Solid 3.   Very friendly staff, but the food items we had were a hit or miss.  We ordered the calamari for a starter. My suggestion - the calamari is seasoned well, but the ranch and hot sauce should be on the side and not drizzled on it. If you go, ask for it on the side. The drizzle takes away from the taste of the calamari and is too salty.  I ordered the steak and eggs with potatoes. Amazing! They cooked my steak (medium) to perfection. It was so tasty!  Boyfriend ordered the cinnamon bun waffle... it was a no for me. He also had bacon with his, but some of the pieces were burnt. I wouldn't suggest ordering this. The waffle lacked the YUM factor.   Definitely go if you're visiting. It has a nice ambience and it is clean. Trust my suggestions, though!

iew2-QgGwWHDAk7VOHuxMw.text: This place is awesome!!!!! Best bottomless mimosas in Vegas!!!! When you arrive ask for Apollo to be your server, he is the absolute best! We sat at the bar because it was extremely crowded, but Apollo made us feel like we were the only people in the restaurant. He was so attentive and made my experience one of a kind. I would 100% come back here, but mostly because of Apollo. He made our experience AMAZING!! I will ask for him every time I come back here!

RhieN9dtAnLpgwb4TR-yTg.text: Love the place, perfect view our server was nice and friendly and the food was delicious... Happy tummy definitely coming back...

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brussels sprouts yummy
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime rib tasty
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spaghetti Carbonara DELICIOUS

fn9tJHBj3ROFyE2U-yF6KQ.text: Didn't wow me too much but it's a good place to fill you up before you start your day in Vegas.  Decor is clean and nice, the hosts and waiters were on point and the food was good. To balance out the taste buds I ordered French toast and my friend ordered a plate of scrambled eggs, potatoes, and steak.  It did the deed, wasn't too crowded for the 10 am hour on a Monday and it didn't hurt the wallet too bad either.   Would have been lovely to sit outside if the weather was warm, but definitely head in and try!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

fVofzb2-SGbjBU4opM-IpA.text: Came for brunch on our way back home. Located at Paris hotel (right under the Eiffel Tower across from belagio) We were seated fairly quickly. We sat outside with a nice view of the belagio fountain. They have plenty of shade outside   Food:  Buttermilk pancakes: I asked them to add berries. They were delicious! Nice and fluffy . Full of flavor. It came with four pancakes - which was more than enough to fill me   Fruit plate: pineapple, kiwi, pear, melon, blueberries, raspberries, black grapes, whip cream and banana nut muffin . All the fruits were sweet and delicious   Protein omelette: egg whites and chicken with potatoes and English muffin. Delicious and healthy  Carrot cake pancakes:  fluffy and delicious . 10/10 recommend   Chilaquiles: were the only thing we did not enjoy  Customer service: 10/10. They ordered our drinks as soon as we sat down. At the end, they made sure we enjoyed all our meals. We mentioned we didn't like the chilaquiles - the manager gladly took it off our menu . We weren't expecting that so that was nice of them   Overall, I'd definitely come back here

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

lIBhATInMrwB7NzQUgRHQw.text: HEXX was great!! We went after checking out the Gwen Stefani concert next door and it was perfect timing! The restaurant wasn't very crowded and we go into a table immediately.  Also, due to the timing, we were able to check out their night time tapas menu AND the dinner menu.  Our table tried the awesome burger and it was incredible.  The presentation was beautiful, the taste was awesome, and the portion was very generous.  If you are looking for a good burger, definitely check out this option.  There was also a really nice salad on the menu.  It was coated in cheese (yes!) and included bacon bits along with candied nuts.  For the healthy folks in the group, this is a good option.  Especially if you are grabbing lunch on their outdoor patio, this is perfect since its nice and cool and full of water .  Lastly, grab a seat near a window - free views of the fountain shows at night. YES!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BURGER!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salads for healthy people

4T4LDv75UugXGt0BZpu4Cg.text: I got a Groupon for Hexx & finally went the night before NYEve which was hectic but I took an Uber so I'm not sure how parking would be in general. The restaurant is inside the Paris hotel-there's a large seating area(s) inside as well as a street patio area. It was way too cold outside to sit outside. My complaint among w two other tables was they kept leaving the glass door open from the patio And it was so cold my food was getting cold. Disappointing but he busboy finally shut it and locked it I thanked him! I ordered the hangar steak ($28) and a side of risotto ($10) I wish the steak was sliced for presentation bc it looked like a brown log..& the risotto was a little chewy and got cold fast bc the door was kept open. The dark red chimichurri sauce was good and I tasted some of my guests horseradish sauce as well. My guest got the ribeye and mashed potatoes ($34) Our waiter was good and friendly but wish they had some bread or something to snack on while we waited. He didn't come by much bc there wasn't anything to do & they had a water guy-talk Asian guy who I told he was awesome as we walked out. He hustled and was great. Overall it was a decent place not sure I'd rush back or go without a Groupon tho. I'm all about paying for top quality but hard to enjoy our meal w/it being so cold the entire time inside -I've never had to wear my jacket the whole meal. The prices are above average but not for the strip restaurants but they also charge You the customer a specific additional tax just be it's on the strip-not sure we should have to be surprised w/that tax. Not big on bill surprises. I really appreciate restaurants that post their prices on the menu via online so people can be prepared. I saw a table of 4 come in & I heard them speaking @ the pieces they got up and left-just post your prices. Cool different bar/private small seating areas to sit in so maybe I'll go back & check that out.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YJxM_3JB0-MnmqmntrOQBg.text: I graduated with my masters and I decided to have my grad brunch with 6 friends. I sadly forgot the name of our waiter, but he was amazing. I told him I wanted something to drink that was boujie but strong. He brought out the perfect drunk. Three of us including me order the steak. My steak was sooo good that I forgot I paid 40$. I like the vibe of the place. It gave me classy but casual. Meaning you could dress up formal or just comfortable. There Mac & cheese was not shareable contrary to what my friends thought lol I refused to shared it.

D2vFhkfyjzkomPLqgTNE1Q.text: This place is the place if your looking for bottomless mimosas. The staff is friendly and the food is great. If you ever get time stop and and check them out.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

j36NW6gts2MPndjA7-gxfw.text: I really enjoyed the dinner we had here. We had a reservation. When we got there (Monday night) the place was packed. We got seated right away at one of the tables that borders the patio, but is still inside technically. We had the best of both!  We ordered the crab cake appetizer, one of their salads, and the vegetable pizza. We had a couple of drinks including the raspberry fizz.  Overall a very nice dining option on the Strip. I would definitely recommend making a reservation. Based upon some other reviews and the photos posted here, next time I will try it for brunch.

H2_r0F9CnsI0uu3g6wNn_Q.text: This place is so amazing.  The food (Jambalaya ) is really good.  Our server Julie is amazing with a great attitude and awesome recommendation.  As a Vegas nut, I've been to over 75 restaurants, and this is hands down a great late night restaurant with exceptional drinks and service.  Thanks Hexx!

5C-LdXNWBf1Sg6Q6KuvXJw.text: I'm giving this place a 5 star rating for their improved food. I used to go here for awesome french toasts, waffle, etc. but I'm gonna say their steak and eggs and home fries is a lot better the last time we've been here. I love my steak!

F8WrvftMvgbvQaw3EV8NTQ.text: Over priced food,  horrible service,  below average food.  Chicken and waffles consisted of soggy cheesy waffles with overcooked chicken fingers for 26 dollars.  Only thing that was good was the view of the fountain at belagio

xdS_Yd50J_WGXtDXhHde9w.text: Food was delicious. Has the chicken and waffles and a Caesar salad. We got bottomless mimosa which was well worth it. Our waitress Tracee was amazing. She was super friendly, funny and personable. Tracee was super quick at refilling our mimosas and very accommodating with our requests.

7BNoyySXJV3EaBuQcAd6Uw.text: This is my favorite Las Vegas restaurant. It's directly across from Bellagio so you can see the water show. They have phenominal appetizers burgers drinks and desserts. Jessica A took care of us made suggestions and was spot on with the choices.  It was a wonderful evening of our last night in Vegas!!! If you go ask for Jessica A and start the evening with the purple haze.   Sue & Gima

nfhtapuBiCzxBcHH3QAfTg.text: The place is nice with a nice view all around of of the strip. For breakfast,  the place is not very busy but the service was absolutely SLOW. The food was pretty good but our waiter SUCKED!!

aUiZLtSv5cF9PXpB1bP3_A.text: I went out looking for an amazing meal. And amazing meal did find moi. Their signature cocktails. A..ma..zing and fun. Wanted a steak tonight but went for what originally caught my eye...chicken &waffels ...fantastic. breakfast lunch dinner AND dessert all rolled into 1.  Sad I'm not a sweets girl because I know whatever they would have serve me for dessert would have been superior to your life in general. Thank you for making my last night in vegas perfect with this culinary abstract amazingness...pickels ....check ...Hexx if your not married. Call me.  Or if you are...ya know...vegas...PS Julie ...my waitress completed the night. As a daughter of a ginger another sign I was meant to be here and ya'll were meant to make great food #MtOlivePickles try them. Keep on keeping on xo

wB-BE5T1KZvzTAAn199e7A.text: I was very intimidated to go in since it was very empty on saturday night,so i was very surprised of how good it was. Crab cakes omg just delicious  Cesar salad tipical nothing espectacular about it but good The sea bass absolutly delicious licked the plate Great service,nice atmosphere,the only reason i do not go higher  is because the music is really loud besides that i recommended a lot will come back again

C0TKKsPMa3LIhlehNNMMqA.text: Great for breakfast! We sat outside on the patio & it was a good location. Wished the guy singing outside was a little quieter but not the restaurants fault.  Sean was our waiter and he was friendly and personable, service was quick.

O-D7fxEDCFlwIqCiRMws_w.text: So completely over priced it's sad. And the place is freezing!!! People at my table, and other tables, we're shivering but the management wouldn't turn it down and they wouldn't let us sit outside, even though they had empty tables. You go here because you are already walking by and you can see the bellagio fountains - my suggestion walk across the street and watch the fountains and find a cafe inside paris hotel.  But if you do eat here, get the groupon!  8 people in my party. We all shared, so we ordered 4 dishes, 3 cocktails ordered, and the bill was $200.00 so not worth it!!

izlo6zhOx81IUd0D4C3oIQ.text: We came here for brunch on our last day of our trip. It was awesome. Tracy took great care of us, she was accommodating and very upbeat and personable. The food was good and portions were large. We got the colossal Bloody Mary and it was huge and well worth it! Definitely will be back next time in Vegas, the view of the bellagio fountain was great too!

ZEUT6KjmCmNbXCZ561ijAQ.text: The service here is garbage.. Couldn't take our food and drink orders at the same time.. Ridiculous. The food was subpar, burger was so greasy it was barely edible and my friends steak looked like it had half a stick of butter on it. Bad experience overall

awk2Q7YiMbVmgFENTPquCA.text: I loved it! The energy was vibrant, the service was great, and the food was amazing! Don't forget it has the biggest patio on the LV Strip, and you can't beat the view. The broccolini is a MUST try and so is the simple salad. Loved my Branzino as well. Looking forward to going back for Sunday brunch real soon.

5U8HEhhLztGcKN_kEDuJ6g.text: Absolute crap. Didn't get what I asked for, toast was wet and soggy, scrambled eggs tasted like whipped cream home fries looked like they had been used before when asked about eggs was curtly told I was wrong.

fdubRIYdf6C9TEVF3HwhiQ.text: Excellent food and service. Had the Hexx Eggs Benedicts and they are to die for! Service was outstanding. Quick response to our needs and very cordial. Highly recommended! Plus, the location is perfect.

93cS1aOKGy8n_DRhDaHtcQ.text: Ask for Tracee!! Great server and lots of fun! She is real tentitive and always kept he glasses full. Great food Also bottomless mimosas for $20 is a huge plus...

nWvaEAbUwZ7P4XBTCTsR0Q.text: Tracee was amazing! (As were my pancakes). Tracee kept the mimosas coming and gave us wonderful recommendations on what to see and do while we were in Vegas! She made us feel right at home and was so attentive and personable. We will DEFINITELY come back because of her.

hCsOYoFC0TRQpSEjRsLLWw.text: Great spot on the strip to sit outside, eat and people watch. Food was pretty good and our server Sean was great.

d7e_Rwwu_u6dgLQjxG3JNw.text: Came on a sunday afternoon to have lunch, all of the food arrived quickly and was very tasty. The fruit platter was really big and was super refreshing! All of the meals my friends ordered were a great size (turkey club was amazing). Our waitress Tracy was the highlight of the meal she was so attentive, and delightful!

ndHVikTSxcPD8rHeVYKhHg.text: The menu reads like an upscale trendy breakfast spot but beware from menu to kitchen to table there is a problem first our food came from the kitchen cold the eggs were under cooked then over cooked like burnt On a positive note the eggs Benedict was great better if hot upon service

TfMCouxBkHHg9uq9Qtv1wg.text: One of my best experiences in Vegas. The food was delicious, our server was so attentive and the art on the walls is absolutely beautiful.   I would definitely come back here. I hadn't been back to this spot since Sugar Factory was here but I'm glad we stopped by.   I would recommend the Hexx eggs Benedict, I was surprised it didn't come with the usual bagel but instead they had scalloped potatoes which were so tender and extremely tasty.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing art!

MlIK0DyQlK8EmZEgxxMjeg.text: What's there to say about a place that has a nice view, and a tasty dish, but you wait literally 9 minutes for water at sitting down, and then a total of 17 for your server to even introduce themselves?   1- we loved our water guy, saw him most in our dinner  2- our server was nice, he had a great personality, he was just too busy juggling very large parties, so our three top wasn't priority  3- I did enjoy the short ribs, and felt the portion size was appropriate.  But to spent $66 a head for a cocktail and dinner that we sat for a long time waiting felt like an inconvenience more than an experience. We were seated at 8:30, and still had not received our entrees at an hour mark.  Normal me probably would have complained and been very outspoken to someone at the time, but we were on a ladies night- and didn't want to make a fuss and ruin our vibe or time.
