H2G19qgKVmPFib8Xo8QGwg.text: Great food with an amazing view!!!! I ordered a steak and mac and cheese as a side! Amazing! We had a large party and the food was brought to us on a timely manner and all together!   Cons: the chairs are uncomfortable and it was loud.

9Xh9_I0qGDf9d1ix-gQ94w.text: Lovely lovely lovely!!!  Spent a good portion of our morning with bottomless mimosas and delicious brunch.  I opted for salad today, rather than eggs, and I was very happy.   They accommodated my dietary restrictions and gave me daily and gluten free salad. We sat out front on the patio. A nice view of the strip and everyone stopping to enjoy the misters was a fine time indeed. Service was quite good and atmosphere was spot on cool. The interior of the restaurant was also very nice. Location within the Paris Hotel Casino was perfectly near the lavatories, this was convenient and not a terrible trek through endless mazes within the casino.  Would love to try other meals here besides brunch, but, for now, was quite happy with the breakfast and brunch!  You have until 2pm to order the bottomless mimosas and a two hour limit! Go!

-lxX0GQXy610mqvZWaLp1g.text: We had a 6 hour layover so headed to this restaurant for dinner! Beautiful view of the fountains at the Bellagio! Steak was the best ever!! Teddy was our server and he was amazing!! Very quick and fast to seat us and a accommodating to move us out of the sun. This is our second time eating here and it was exceptional!! Very quick to get here from the airport!!

_5bT7E5rBi0KBKhzhXQ31w.text: Ask for jasmine! She was the sweetest waitress and very attentive.   We wanted something on the strip and outside. The view is beautiful! They had a smaller menu but very great choices.   Since we were going out after- we chose something lighter. I had the wedge salad with ranch and the Mac n cheese. The Mac n cheese was amazingly creamy and the salad was fresh and delish!   They had a big drink menu.   A very hip place with a beautiful atmosphere. I would come back!

PqjaOdTybjUcYpfVeENMOA.text: Wow. This came very highly recommended from the yelp community and it did not disappoint. Just a block away from the mile high ships and planet Hollywood Too! You can actually sit outside or inside - if you sit inside, they let the fresh air fill the room and it makes such a nice ambience. Now let's talk about the world class service and profesional staff - from the bus boy to the waiter to the hostess on down - wow. I mean. Wow. This was probably the best service we had all week and I am So glad we stopped by. They are very vegetarian friendly too and don't get me started on how delicious their wine selection was. We ordered a bunch of vegetarian goodies from the hexx chopped to the Caesar salads and the vegetarian pizza and white bean hummus. OMG and don't skip out on dessert or you'll regret it. I recommend the red velvet cake !

vjegp72lAv_9uzV20xypDw.text: LOVE THIS PLACE! We went for dinner. And at 6am coming back from a wild night out. The dinner was a little pricey but SO DELICIOUS! And the breakfast was cheap for the portion size and also very tasty. The staff (SHOUT TO SCOTT AND SARAH) were extremely pleasant and accommodating.   For dinner we sat in a private room and it was a super cool swanky upscale vibe. Do yourself a favor and get the spinach artichoke dip. DROOL! Seriously the 4 of us demolished it.   My friend and I both got the noodles with peas in it. I know it sounds weird!! But it was SO GOOD!  And the other 2 got a couple different cuts of steak. Both cuts were delicious. They make an old fashioned CORRECTLY, and the wine was delicious as well. I will definitely go back!!   When we went in the morning I got eggs bacon and something else. I'm going to be honest, I was pretty drunk. But my friend got the pancakes (they're humongous) and all the other dishes were VERY generously portioned. We shared everything and they were all delicious.. The morning staff was super energetic and bubbly which we really needed because we were about to fall asleep at the table and cranky. THANKS GUYS!!  And that's really all I remember lol. Hope that helps.

9-R_UHZf3NMs00Fc9T91EQ.text: We passed by this place several times and thought we'd give it a try for breakfast. It's located at the Paris Hotel and also accessible from the Las Vegas Strip. There were two seating options, indoor and outdoor; we opted for indoor since the weather was getting warm. Restrooms are located down the hallway separate from the main seating area.   After we placed our order, the food took some time before coming our way. The order consisted of the Brioche French Toast and the Buttermilk Pancakes. I honestly was not expecting 4 fluffy pancakes that were also gigantic. The pancakes and French Toasts were topped with a bit of powdered sugar and equally enjoyable.   Dave was our server and he was a pretty fun guy. He made a few jokes every so often during our time there. Our drinks were also refilled quite often.   Overall, this was a nice place to relax and enjoy breakfast. The decor is nice and the option to sit outside when the weather is a plus.

D-tGxIPghTVDJBcf2ByREg.text: First time I've been here and the food was awesome. My friend knew the chef so it was her idea to come for dinner.   I got the salmon with quinoa and it was delicious!! The salmon was perfectly cooked, not overdone, it was juicy and melted in my mouth. The quinoa was also flavorful and delicious.   Dessert was a variety of items but my absolute most favorite was the blueberry cobbler. If you don't come for anything but dessert, you HAVE to get this!!   Service was good, we sat on the patio because of course Vegas strip is the best people watching.

8v_rwQaXE2eqlaa0SnY85w.text: This place was very yummy and we had a very interactive server. This is def a go to place if you're staying on the strip. I looked at a table next to us and they had pizza that looked delicious. I would say its a bit on the pricey side for the portions they serve you.   I would def return here if I visited the city again

vj3QT7OGGOco7GD_13WlAA.text: Wonderful wonderful wonderful that's all I need to say!! located At the Paris hotel and casino right along the strip.   We arrived during the brunch hours and was immediately seated and presented with the menu. Wow talk about overload there were so many options that I wanted to try but I settled on the chicken and waffles. Omg what delicious flavor awaited my taste buds. We also ordered the amazing sticky bun, moonshine cocktail and unlimited mimosas. What a treat this place was. I will almost guarantee that there is not a bad option on the menu. Can't wait to return.

57zbnNBghUBo7WIxMp7pnA.text: Fabulous Brunch Saturday of Labor Day Weekend. Slid in before the crowd . Beautiful weather . Gorgeous sights and flowing mimosas. The servers were on TOP of their job when keeping the bottomless mimosas flowing . Never had to wave any one down . I stepped out the box and tried the chilaquiles. Breakfast Nachos. Delicious! The pancakes looked fluffy and huge! The fruit adorning the pancakes was picture worthy and tasty . The burger looked amazing ! Everyone at the table was satisfied with the ambiance and service!

wFeQZHCB3UOxzGBukA5cOw.text: Made reservations here for brunch on a Sunday. It was pretty packed but we got seated right away. We requested outdoor seating and the view of the Strip was amazing with the Bellagio fountains front and center.  We got the bottomless mimosas, which they kindly kept refilling throughout our brunch. The food came out quick and fresh. We ordered the steak & eggs which was delicious. The house fries were so good.  All of the staff was kind and very attentive. It was sept 15, so they had a live music for Mexico's Independence Day it was great.   Overall would definitely return to this place, I loved it. I would 100% recommend it.

WVZbLjuKbmN8e97uqj3vlQ.text: I went to HEXX for brunch for a Bachelorette party and we just loved the atmosphere, the bottomless, mimosas, and the staff. Our server, Brendon P I believe, was an absolute saint with our crazy group and he kept his cool and made us laugh. I hope he gets recognized for being such a great server.  Take your bachelorette party here! You won't regret it!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zv_KSKEed0qZWkbsZ8gDsw.text: I've been here a few times for brunch and always have a good experience. I am not a fan of the dinner menu so I always try to go before 4! I went with 2 friends yesterday and we had a waitress come over who seemed agitated before we had even spoke to her. We asked for more time to order and next thing we know we had a different waitress. We thought maybe the other waitress was leaving and just didn't want to take a new table but she was there the entire time that we dined so I guess that was not the case.   However, the new girl they gave us was amazing. I want to say that when I looked at my receipt it said her name was Maria (sorry if I'm wrong). But she was great. We had a lot of questions about the food and the drink menu and she happily answered everything for us.   I got the prime rib dip with the butter lettuce salad instead of fries. We also got the HEXX Cauldron to share. The cauldron was the reason for all of our questions because we wanted to know how much alcohol was in it lol (6 shots of vodka and 1/3 bottle of Prosecco) for those who are curious. The prime rib dip was really good and I like that they gave the horseradish on the side so that I could choose how much I wanted to have on the sandwich. I didn't love the flavor of the Au Jus they have to dip it in. It tasted to much like gravy to me but it wasn't that bad. I really liked the red wine vinaigrette on the salad! Super good. The drink was good and our waitress was very impressed we were able to finish the entire thing because it is their biggest one and comes in a little disco ball which is cool to look at if you spin it in the sun.   Overall it was a good experience as usual after the little switch at the beginning. Will for sure go back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Prime Beef Dip Sandwich Butter lettuce salad
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. HEXX Cauldron

ShAHKHSk66B0rSG36oEIug.text: Definitely we will back to HEXX Kitchen bar. We were 7 persons. I ordered buttery lettuce salad and rib eye steak. Both of them were so delicious. I enjoyed a lot fro good and drink that the waiters recommended to me.  Jasmine our waiters was so nice and served us very well.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LvX5MYUkGFPkvhX9qnxK4w.text: My wife and I came to Hexx (*formerly Sugar Factory*) wanting to give it a chance. We ordered the Veggie Pizza, garlic cheese bead, and finished off with the Oreo dessert. The food was overpriced for what we ordered. The service was good and the food tasted good as well. The restaurant was very hot since all the doors were opened to the strip and made our dinning experience uncomfortable. At the end of the meal I noticed there was old food stuck to the inside of my glass. Very off-putting! We will not be back.

Y4DTR24PxS1S7plsvxT2Kw.text: Our first meal in Vegas for the trip and we decided to indulge ourselves in some cocktails and classy entrees.   HEXX kitchen + bar is located along The Strip with a great view of the Bellagio fountains and indoor/outdoor seating. Talk about an ideal location! Alexxa's and Hexx share a front entrance. If you plan on dining and having an actual meal, you'd be in Hexx's domain. If you plan on imbibing in cocktails or munching on some tapas, you'd be in Alexxa's. The two places are under the same ownership.  The roasted salmon with black quinoa, peas, and beansprouts and the braised branzino with tomato sauce and pea risotto were absolutely delicious! I'm glad no one was watching me eat, because I could not for the life of me figure out how to eat the beansprouts off the roasted salmon without looking like an animal (chopsticks, please?).  Because we enjoyed the food so much, we came back the next day for brunch. Their Hexx Benedict and Carrot Cake Pancakes were melt-in-the-mouth delicious! The Hexx Benedict over scalloped potatoes was executed well. Perfectly poached eggs over a bed of buttery scalloped potatoes. The Carrot Cake Pancakes tasted as if they had come fresh off the griddle and the cream cheese frosting and syrup made me question whether or not I was eating brunch or dessert for breakfast.   Of course, we paired it with a pitcher of sangria from Alexxa's. If you're not sure which sangria to get (and there are many to choose from), the sangria flight is a great option!  Needless to say, we were very full and satisfied with our meal. Definitely a great restaurant to check out with a nice ambiance right in the heart of the Las Vegas Strip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Benedict with avocado add on
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Braised branzino
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Roasted salmon entree

v3t1U9p7V4flI64QRXCeFA.text: I don't write a lot of reviews but this place was delicious, we sat down right away for Sunday brunch and they had a DJ (because....Vegas). Also caught a glimpse of some else's Bloody Mary...looked amazing if that's your bag. There was bacon coming out of it.

1SWV1xYpuD-5WAzfNQALPA.text: Breakfast was okay nothing exceptional. Potatoes were very good but that's really all:( Waiter was very nice when we sat down but did not wait on our table. I had to basically wave him down to get a cup of coffee. Yet he could hang out and chat with the other staff. Was NOT happy with the HEXX and will not eat there again.  Expensive and it definitely lack character! We'll chose another restaurant.

zk_xUzPyH-YrwVJ5v0uYMg.text: Sean's service was incredible and the food was great.  Great spot for a quick bite and people watching on the strip.

AhrW-8TDiK9bAYdwVNMhOg.text: So we visited Hexx twice last weekend in Las Vegas.  Once for dinner and once for brunch.  It was excellent both times!  First, let's talk about the service.  Our servers both times were super friendly, attentive but not intrusive.  They both made the dining experience pleasurable.  For dinner we had the shrimp cocktail, filet, Mac and Cheese, and sangria.  The shrimp cocktail was not served like the classic dish.  It was presented on slate with carefully placed complimentary cocktail sauce.  The filet was cooked perfectly.  It had a nicely season crust on the outside which was a wonderful surprise.  The sangria was refreshing.  The Mac and Cheese was good but not great.  For brunch I had the yogurt and granola parfait.  Holy Cow!  It was huge and you did not need the honey that comes with it.  Eating it was pure heaven. They have bottomless mimosas and huge pitchers of Bloody Mary's too! The hash browns were awesome!  They were not shredded but small potatoes that were first seasoned and cooked in the oven, smashed to split them open, and then finished off in the deep fryer!  I've never had hash browns that were so good. Hexx was fabulous!  I highly recommend it.  Double bonus!!!  You have a perfect view of the fountain show at the Bellagio as well.  Enjoy!

HVIjVNNTvlQ9GMY1ch_JKA.text: I was looking for a cafe that had chilaquiles and this was the spot! Highly recommend it! Although it is a little pricey, approx. $18, for chilaquiles the view, service and decor make it all worth it.

uJC2NOcqLzTxoSBzxLsi8Q.text: I'd like to give this place 4 or 5 stars because the food was outstanding but the service was not as good, unfortunately. We waited almost 10 minutes before we were asked what we wanted to drink and then we were asked twice, by two different waiters. We finally got our drinks, gave our order to the waiter, and waited quite a while before finally getting our food. I had the protein omelette and my sister got the corned beef hash, both of which were outstanding! Again, the service was nothing to brag about as once we finished our drinks, they remained empty the entire time, and nobody bothered to check on us until we were totally done eating. I was really excited to try this place and was pretty bummed with the service.

ToQJlC81El5kFpXPIz2UFw.text: Had the chilaquiles corn beef hash and roasted beets.  Chilaquiles good  Corn beef hash hubby liked it very much but slightly too salty which sometimes happen with corn beef Roasted beets good . Have had better versions with goat cheese and not worth 18 dollars for a salad All items are expensive considering it's not a mind blowing experience  I would hope for more chocolate in the menu items considering their brand but they r normal American cuisine   Cannot beat location for the tourist. We r locals though. Nice decor Service is average . Bit of a wait time I had a groupon. I am not bothered to return .i wasn't that impressed.

oiFt-XeIJSZaQJH34emuQw.text: Unlimited Mimosas=Sunday Funday. Chilaquiles were kind of disappointing but tasty, the chips were soggy. I should've gone with the chicken & waffles.

3DNvINGWYDyhMxYHIo267g.text: HEXX was absolutely amazing. My wife, brother and I were tired of waking the strip and chose an eatery at random without really looking at the menu and were pleasantly surprised. We enjoyed everything we ate: shrimp scampi (which they made into an entree for myself), the wedge salad, veal, spinach and artichoke dip, cheesy garlic bread, pita and hummus, and brussel sprouts. Our waitress was also nice and always made sure we were happy with our experience. Would recommend business casual as I felt a LITTLE out of place with jeans and a t-shirt, but they will still seat you. All-in-all, when we go back to Vegas, we will certainly be eating there again. My only regret, knowing how good their apps, sides, and entrees were, we missed the desert!

0IIa_y2f-yPfpghSFlvePA.text: Not only was the food bomb but Tracey was amazing great customer service she's great !!!! Now that raiders are moving out here I'm visiting vegas more often you are great Tracey !!!!!!

LN_53dBS9CzNPNCXB451rw.text: My girls and I went out for a drink and apps and Hexx was perfect!    The food and Bloody Mary selection was great!   We wanted to try them all!!!   Service was amazing!  Sean and Josh were Awesome!  What a great way to spend some time with friends!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sean and  Josh was so Awesome!!  Great food and service!

sASdlmT74rwBPiRdiujAoQ.text: Great service, great food and absolutely stunning view if you get a chance to sit out on the patio. Great for family or romantic brunch dates as well.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DM0mzvTYDO6MOEZNLU7KCw.text: Sean was the best server I could ask for. Not only did he make sure I had everything I needed, but also helped me choose a delicious dessert (milk chocolate cheese cake). He was very welcoming and friendly, had all the answers I needed for a picky water, dessert loving person as myself.   As I was seated on the beautiful terrace overlooking the Bellagio fountains and it was about 100F outside (yet definitely cooler on the patio), he and Shannon always made sure I had plenty of water and I was extremely comfortable.   Would definitely recommend the place and Sean is a superstar there.

zaNgTNOl_s7RCamCBoAzJQ.text: This is my favorite spot whenever I hit Las Vegas. Exceptional dishes and service is always good. Sean is AMAZING. He was attentive and patient with our questions. He made an effort to check on us and accommodate our complicated orders. Awesome Awesome Awesome service thanks to Sean!

KJlpul_bBNnW1m0jyJza1w.text: Great brunch w/ bottomless mimosas and Sean was an excellent server.  Perfect place to round out our Vegas trip.

9SUboSslsLK3hW4yOa5eeA.text: I did not have a chance to dine at Hexx just grabbed a drink at the bar for happy hour. I love the set-up and would love to eat on the patio next time we are in Vegas.The food looked so good that the servers were bringing out. We received good service at the bar.

xrUefAW_p0DB8ieCahBFZQ.text: Food and drinks are amazing. The customer service is just as amazing. Whether you have a huge appetite or just want something light and fulfilling they have plenty of excellent choices.

Za9afxYd_UaZLmKUdngeDw.text: First time experience and will definitely be returning again on our next trip to Vegas! Food was delish and service was great!! Carrot cake pancakes were the best I've ever had!!! So glad we made a quick stop before heading home.. prices are a tad high but I definitely don't mind paying for good quality food and service!!!

YipP2vFYR0CWHiXNg6MhQA.text: Dined here on Friday, March 9, 7:00pm, extremely busy. Mushroom risotto was under cooked and crunchy. Order 2 burgers medium well. Waitress must have written down medium rare because they were so pink we were afraid to eat them. She never returned to check on us, so we simply paid the tab and left. Disappointing!

msXnkBzguoKaZMVlk5CDZg.text: Great place to drink bottomless mimosas, relax and people watch! Bellagio is just across from HEXX kitchen so ask for a table outdoors. We waited approximately 15-20 minutes but worth it.  The food was good, so overall was a great place to dine.

qPt7ghxlf2NwD_-l0GDzNg.text: My buddy and I attempted to eat here at 11pm on a Saturday night but we were unsuccessful.   We were greeted by two hostesses upon entering HEXX. We were told there would be a 5 minute wait because they had to clean a table up for us. That being said, I expected there to be a packed restaurant. Hostess #1 asked if we would like to sit at the bar instead because there was no wait there. We replied yes.  As we walked into the main dining floor/bar area, we noticed HEXX was practically empty aside from a few occupied tables and a handful of patrons at the bar. As we sat at the bar, this male bartender told us that this other blonde female bartender would be taking care of us. She came up to us and asked if we wanted any drinks tonight. We replied with "No, can we start out with two glasses of water?". She replied yes, and that was the last we saw of her.  Long story short... we never saw those glasses of water. Our bartender never came back to us with those waters even though we saw her standing idly by, 20-25 feet away from us on the other end of the bar. She never returned to take our order even though we had read over the food menu for five-to-seven minutes already. My friend and I cut short our dining experience here and left abruptly because we were put off by the service here at HEXX.

r1GXlIHoU4b3LatlVN8kMQ.text: Breakfast was delish! Turkey club, ymmmm. Thanks Julia for great service. Good for people watching.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

D3Lo8o8ffF5NAdAWEnoWZA.text: I wish I took pictures of my food. Great food great people and great view. Lisa was serving us and she was awesome. Definitely we are coming back for breakfast.

sU_xbJ9tbIn2cgOI4FCEwQ.text: We loved going on the chocolate tour but there is such high pressure salesmanship that you can't just relax and enjoy the chocolate experience.

bbSTf_4ekzS_rgRrkguc4A.text: Went there for breakfast, seriously worst Chiliquillas I've ever had. The description in the menu said it came with avocados. When it came to our table, it had a couple squirts of a green sauce that looked nothing like it even had avocado in it. I asked if I could get avocado on mine because that's what it said in the menu. They put avocado slices on a plate and charged me an extra $3.00.

-tk3uBHxWrsjUn8wQWEuzQ.text: We've been coming to Vegas for years and walked past Hexx hundreds of times  Never stopped until tonight. So glad we did. Jambalaya and chicken and waffles were ridiculously tasty. Chocolate bread pudding was delicious. The service was excellent. Dave took great care of us as did the "Taylor Lautner" lookalike. We'll definitely put it on our must-do list for all trips in the future!

IcgkxK_-dd6-8vuWsRdOEg.text: AWESOME! Food, professional friendly service! Happy Hour is happiness! A great time! My family and I eat there two days in a row. Our servers Ray & Gustavo were as AWESOME as the food!

tON4qXZ4WztjUAw_6RkXvw.text: I have been meaning to write this review. I went with my bf to hex about a month ago and it was the best experience I have had in vegas for breakfast! Sean our server was awesome!!!! He was so nice and attentive and overall provided us with great service. I ordered the chicken and waffles- the best chicken/waffle combo I have ever had! Seriously, the chicken was so crispy, juicy, and just plain perfect. The waffle was the right amount of sweet and the bourbon maple syrup was the perfect topping. My bf had the corn beef hash and he also stated that it was very tasty. I will definitely be coming back on my next vegas trip and I hope we get served by Sean again. If you are looking for a great brunch spot on the strip- this is a go to breakfast spot in Vegas!! You will not be disappointed! And I forgot to mention there was practically no wait time (that's a win in my book!! Especially In Vegas) thanks again for your great service Sean!

845bNjhB54V25MsWujt-LA.text: Service was great!!! Food was good, but wasn't anything to write home about. I would go again, if anything just to hit up the bar that was tucked away from the rest of the restaurant.

79OunnMbN_EXaL1zT2qz4g.text: Food and drink quality was excellent! we had a group of 4 - We got the carnitas hash, steak and eggs, mandarin orange mule. The potatos are roasted which was amazing. Steak was perfectly seasoned and perfectly cooked. 4 stars because their service was extremely slow and it wasn't even that busy.  Great spot if your not pressed for time.

VWo-xHydzXOq14ap7XlgeQ.text: Fantastic service - Sean was great. This is our third time to Vegas in a year and a half and honestly this has been the best service we have gotten throughout our visits. Food was fantastic and drinks were endless... We could barely keep up! I would definitely recommend and also request Sean for your waiter!!

cixTzU3hdBi15WyA43My3g.text: We stopped in here for breakfast today! Our meals were very good! I ordered off the menu and they didn't blink an eye. I ordered eggs Benedict which were perfect. Some places get a poached egg all wrong. This place knows what they're doing. They served it with asparagus which was a little odd but tasty! My husband ordered an omelet and it was huge! It came with an English muffin and smashed red potatoes. The smashed potatoes were amazing! We also had a Bloody Mary and iced coffee - both great. The patio seating was a nice touch considering in Vegas you tend to spend too much time inside. The service was quick and we were well taken care of.

F_TGZqispTnriZ04V3ndtw.text: Great service. Friend and I popped in for a snack before heading out to party. Sat at the bar. Got vodka drinks, they were reasonably priced at 10-15 per drink. Drink menu clearly marked with drink prices big plus there. Got spin dip and it was awesome! Fresh, hot and yummy! Pita was delish! 15.95, good pre drink snack for two gals. Had awesome service at the bar from Joe. He was patient and helpful as I asked for advice about the best party places. Makes a big difference as we truly have had garbage service in a few other Vegas eateries. Thanks for the good food and good service!

txYBFz1mNK_S3O6hXeXUsQ.text: Definitely one of my favorite restaurants on the strip. Food is always delicious and I love the seating outside to watch the water show while eating !

BtwXbTFXS1mAYX8Val8TQw.text: My wife, myself and my daughter went on a Friday night. We had a great meal, 2 steaks and fish. The drinks were tasty, the service was efficient. Our waiter was friendly and we didn't wait long for food. My problem, and it was a BIG problem, was when the bill came. There was a charge for $8.00 for CNF. I asked the waiter what CNF was. He said it was a concession fee, a charge for the privilege of sitting outside on the patio. WTF?? I immediately told him to take it off. I wasn't going to pay it. Now, it wasn't the $8.00. I had just spent $197.00 on steak, fish and many drinks. It was principle. He immediately removed it. And I thought, "How many people are paying this extra fee, and how much more money is the restaurant taking in on this scam"? Be careful. Read your bill.

d5NsGw9SeldZXKHAhcDeZw.text: This place is so amazing! Not only was the food amazing the service was great. Tracy our server was on top of it and made things very personable and great. #Seahawksnation

HjTTQa7G3o1RKQZaIOCDfA.text: Came in for lunch with friends visiting from Toronto.   First impressions of the restaurant was great, the interior decor was modern and clean. We sat at the high tops located right when you enter the dining area.   Not 100% on the name of the pitcher we order for drinks but i believe it was on a special drinks menu and it involved dragonfruit (Kinky something) recommend by our waitress. It was delicious, only down side is it cannot be poured into separate glasses (says the waitress) because the presentation involves dry ice.   For appetizers we ordered, Over cooked bacon, which is exactly what it sounds like haha, Crispy Broccolini, which were great (must try), and the spicy pork rinds which also what it sounds like. Figured there would be something more than just the obvious.   We also ordered Chinese Chicken Salad (yum), Sausage flat bread (meh), and the spicy jambalaya (super spicy but the best entree we ordered out of everything).  Great for a one time meal, most likely won't be returning. Quality of food vs. price isn't worth it. Still a nice place to sit outside and enjoy the Bellagio fountains across the way.

sFxatr3e_NWrvnCXtovXkQ.text: Endless Mimosas for $20, pancakes and maple bacon....kill me and send me to heaven! The staff was super friendly and informative. The waitress we had was on point with never letting my mimosa go low and she even recommended the bacon to my friend and I to share and it was just the right amount of food. They even helped us out when we needed to change tables so accommodate two more in our party, and then the fifth member at the end. Try these guys earlier in the day while all your friends are sleeping off the night before...you wont be upset. Promise.

eH_vJIZAGKZ1NnOEKCNtzw.text: Outstanding location, service and menu.  We really appreciated Sean and his attention to us and he made our experience delightful!  The food was delicious and the wine selection lovely!  Only place in Vegas that felt like a vacation and treat!  You should take in the decadent chocolate they make!

WXUJ_kEWCyIgxhiXEB22gg.text: I stopped on over Tuesday and had the greatest waitress, Mari Fe. She was very attentive and made my dining experience much better.  I had the chicken and waffles and it was amazing. The chicken was crisp and the waffles were firm and supple. The pricing was expected for a fine dining establishment like hex. I will definetly stop by again.

qPJx_lerCT0yY_1s4boyXQ.text: First time coming here and I must say that this is an upscale place! It's very modern and classy.   Our waiter was very very nice, I believe his name was Jay. Our food came out quick me and my date ordered the Spicy Jambalaya dish! Ahhmazzinggg! I thought it was a bit overpriced but overall it tasted excellent!   The vibes are great here! Definitely a MUST if you're near Paris on the strip!

d6JsNXPfnWe1ub3tVtE3yA.text: Amazing food, amazing service, amazing view. First time in Vegas and we decided to do the bottomless mimosas brunch here and it completely exceeded all of our expectations. The mimosas are on point! The Margherita pizza was delicious. The food was incredible, and best of all was the service. Our waitress, Taylor, was attentive, empathetic, and kept the bottomless mimosas coming all morning. She was great at making recommendations and was so sweet. She deserves a raise!! It was the perfect balance of great service and a fun environment. Overall, I will be recommending this restaurant to everyone I know, and I can't wait to return next time I'm in town. Thanks Taylor for a great experience, we will be back!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

s5L1FfZOIRLixaNpKCRo4w.text: Review is for dessert only. We had a good solid French dinner at Mon Ami Gabi next door and wanted to have dessert here because of all of the single origin chocolate hype. We ordered the Ecuadorian Brownie with Coffee ice cream and Chocolate silk pie.   Brownie - texture was crumbly and not the melt-in-your mouth texture we were hoping for. Coffee ice cream texture was fine but it needed more coffee flavor.  Chocolate silk pie - it was a tarte with a thin layer of chocolate mousse in a thick graham cracker crust and a large mound of whipped cream on top. The chocolate mousse lacked strong chocolate flavor and once diluted with the whipped cream, was not strong enough to stand up against the strong graham cracker taste from the thick crust.   Disappointing considering this restaurant was supposed to specialize in chocolate.

OJtwnnsLvJ0lrUJn_0QAKA.text: Went there for breakfast. Ordered the steak and eggs. Service was good but food was not impressive. Steak not really prime and covered on too much pepper. Place is nicely decorated with large winery and waiters very friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Grease leftovers from my steak and eggs...

upTWq-lFl5OmnvvJu4uirg.text: Excellent portions for the price!  My guest and enjoyed our food. We added salsa to the eggs for more flavor. I didn't like that it didn't have Coke products. Our server was nice but wasn't quite on top of things. We loved sitting on the patio. The bar area was super cute. I would love to come back and try more!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs- amazing potatoes- bacon- English muffin

En8_7GsE-q9TjkGbYOu7ow.text: A nice brunch place on the strip. The view is nice because it's right across the Bellagio water show. The service was great and timely. I had the corned beef hash and I thought it was pretty good, a 8/10. They have unlimited mimosas for $23. They also have a large variety of bloody mary's if you like those.

NG-CdI7LXgrpZD3sXL-0qw.text: We dined at Hexx, before a show, at Paris. We had the dinner/show package, so they only offer you two-three choices of an appetizer and entree. Very limiting. The other choices, came with surcharges. The place is decorated nicely, with indoor and outdoor space. The staff is dressed in blue jeans and a denim top. Toni was our server. Very friendly and explained the menu adequately. It took a very long time to have our empty dishes removed and get our check, which made the experience more annoying. The food was good, but not what I expected. I ordered the salmon, which was a tad overcooked. It also comes on top of soup (yep, weird) and has a salad on top of that. The salad falls into the soup, which is weird. Not a wise presentation in my book.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The salmon, presented in manhattan clam chowder, with clams, and arugula salad on top.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The tomato bisque soup was amazing.

3KlJlCoRn4FL8WqX3Ub0NA.text: LOVED this place for an amazing breakfast and bottomless mimosas. Food was incredible. I got the farm fresh eggs and it was absolutely amazing. My husband got the same and said the sausage was the best he's ever eaten. Amazing food, bottomless mimosas were never empty, and the location is absolutely perfect. Will be coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottomless mimosas overlooking the Bellagio

tuLYt1NvKWtSmBJa1hjYjg.text: Me and my friend had an amazing breakfast before we headed home.  I had the eggs Benedict which I loved! Instead of English muffins, the used these creamy cheesy potatoes and added asparagus. It was amazing. And my friend had chilaquiles that looked like a huge plate of breakfast nachos and she loved it too. I can't wait to come back and try the desserts and dinners! And the coffee was perfect!   Service was "eh!"  Our waiter could of been nicer. Luckily the food was fantastic.   Ambience was modern and sleek. Beautiful opened Windows. View of the strip and weather was gorgeous this morning. Really refreshing  Prices were not bad at all for what it was. Definitely coming back

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. chilaquiles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict

I0pOtKDzeCHS6qrOkjThvQ.text: Eh. Overpriced, and the food was whatever. Only reason I gave 2 stars, is because the staff were nice.   Anyway, I never splurge on myself. Like, when I go out to places, I don't order the salmon cause I'm a cheapass and I just don't. BUT, I was in Vegas and I thought to myself, ehhh what the heck. So I ordered the salmon, and my friend did too. YUCK! It was beyoooooond salty. I mean, unbearably salty. The only reason we ate it is because we ordered avocado with it, and it drowned out the taste (and because we were so incredibly hungry). My boyfriend ordered the turkey club sandwich, which he said was good. He had no complaints.   All in all, I was angry because I figured "It's Vegas, their food should be good, right?". I'm just gonna stick to not splurging anymore, because it's just not worth it. At least at this place.

8_BAczQAg_ZcSVyTJsaEng.text: Fantastic meal.  He had the hummus.  The Cessars salads were delicious.  The Brussel sprouts were to die for.  The Mac and cheese was just ok. All our steaks were cooked perfectly!   Wine was great.  The service was top notch.   So glad we stopped here!

LnNIMp8gy0yjZDMVDPW0VA.text: The food was good here but the service was terrible. We waited quite some time to get our table which was okay because we were informed it would be a while. However, once inside we waited even longer just to get our coffee and water. Waiter was hard to track down and when asked for something was rude and took another good long while to come back with requested items. The couple next to us also had there order completely forgotten and had to reorder.

5xXEpP9z8WM5KENylH9_ug.text: Service is toooo slow! It takes more than 40min, the brunch is good, but I don't know if you have to do it

XEGwpgG8m8bQBjdJPJ5hQg.text: I WILL NEVER RETURN TO THIS RESTAURANT AGAIN. Never in my life have I received such poor and disrespectful treatment from restaurant staff (or people in general). I am a medically retired Marine Corps officer due to mental health issues and trauma. In order to help cope and deal with these disabilities, I have a service dog that I bring with me everywhere. She is fully trained and not disruptive in any way. Our waiter gave me a very difficult time for having her, even after I explained she was my service animal (I carry the paperwork to prove it, as well as my retired military ID). The manager then came over, ARI STOTLAND, and was even more aggressive and rude than the waiter. The manager said "the dog has to leave" even after I brought up the federal laws for service animals. At that point, I got up and walked out of the restaurant. It is so disturbing to me how cruel the manager was. I have never experienced something like this! My dog is so well behaved, quiet, and friendly. AND SHE'S A SERVICE ANIMAL!!! I am currently looking into filing a lawsuit. Discrimination, failure to comply with federal laws, and disrespect are the traits that were exhibited at this restaurant. PLEASE DO NOT SUPPORT THIS ESTABLISHMENT. We should be past behavior like this in year 2018.

o2Ymy0WeUx75ONoagsrK3w.text: Good food, sat at the outdoor table and enjoyed the views. We had the spinach dip, plain salad and Salmon.

fhGrA0qzHiykaCahs_42eg.text: I really enjoyed the Hexx kitchen and bar. My wife and I went for dinner. We started with the Spinach Artichoke dip which I thought was the best I've ever tasted. She thought it was too salty but still good. We both had the wild mushroom Pappardelle for our entree. The server suggested an added protein (chicken or shrimp) and we both added the shrimp. Let me say that it wasn't necessary. The shrimp just added calories and I'd suggest not adding any addition protein to the Pappardelle which was fantastic. The pasta was cooked perfectly and the mushrooms and sauce were awesome. Despite the protein issue our server was great.

M34wyj5DaTHKnlNdWNKfvQ.text: I just had a fabulous brunch at Hexx.  I had the streak and eggs which was cooked to perfection!  My bartender Shena was A+. Very attentive and cared that I had a great time!  Bravo Hexx. Can't want to come back!!!!

ux9OgXpggFzNnrcK9hHO3w.text: The manager should aware of the unprofessional hospitality caused by its waters. I got extremely annoyed by my two waiters, who constantly talked while we are eating. Don't put your hand on the shoulder of your client!

7Imxo8S0M14e2QTjpn7FZw.text: With a generous amount of tequila, nothing can ever go wrong!  After getting off the monorail and going through Paris, we came out to the Hexx Bar. With our 32 ounce mugs in hand, all we had to do was decide on a flavor of slush. We did electric blue and lemonade mixed. It tasted fantastic. When she posed the tequila, I wondered how much were they really allowed to give us? She filled up the jigger, then kept pouring over that. That means nothing of course, until you take a sip and taste perfection.  I hate it when all you taste is the slushie.  This was not the case. We took a sip and it wasn't too strong and it wasn't too plain. It was nice to get a real drink made. That's pretty much what you get in Las Vegas.   We talked to the girl behind the counter for a min and she was very upbeat and welcoming.   Thanks for a great drink!

q499v_8Do9bFr35W8_K3fA.text: OHHHH MY GOD, being a Texan I am a steak connoisseur. Until today my favorite has been the Ribeye at Ruth's Chris. Nothing could prepare me for the Ribeye with Oscar Lobster sauce at Hexx, Las Vegas. Funny thing, is I'd asked for a steak knife when they'd brought me a butter knife. When I cut into the steak I realized I didn't need a steak knife; a SPOON would do. It was crispy on the outside Med/rare and it was like BUTTER. Our waitress Alayna was amazing and so was the view of the Bellagio Fountains--absolutely exquisite experience.

R8ZPa2OkOv4NSpRUhaC4gw.text: This is a good restaurant, but why would I go back when only a few steps away I could go to Mon Ami Gabi, which has the same great patio views, similar comfortable ambiance, and even better food, for about the same price?  Well, I suppose it would be because Mon Ami is often full to the gills, while Hexx was half empty.  Other than that, though...  The menu had a little bit of something for everyone (including a pizza or two, which seemed out of place) but only a little bit.  There were items among the eight listed entrees that sounded good, but Hexx seems to be mostly a steak house.  My wife and I started by sharing the Surf & Turf Sliders - a creative idea which was pretty good, but far from astounding.  We then each had a wedge salad, which tasted like a wedge salad - pretty good.  For the entree I decided to try a steak other than my usual favorites (filet or rib eye), so I went with the hanger steak.  Once again, good but not great.  Perhaps that's just because hanger steak is a cheaper cut.  Or perhaps not.  Anyway, most of the flavor came from the Bearnaise sauce.  A side of creamy mashed potatoes was very good.  My wife thought her Spaghetti Carbonara was excellent but, seriously, isn't that dish sort of excellent by definition (assuming you can afford the calories)?  Our server was pleasant and attentive, but made a significant error in adding up our check.  One last gripe, which is not specific to Hexx.  Both of the big casino chains on the Strip (MGM and Caesar's) seem to insist that their online menus do not include prices.  It's annoying.  So, for reference of Yelpers, the meal described above with two rounds of drinks came in at about $170.

OP976k2p1YztEz17GXou0g.text: We came here with an opentable gift certificate. We started off with their version of poutine and were impressed by the large portion. For our main entrees, we ordered the filet mignon and burger and I had a custom mudslide cocktail.  Service was fast and attentive.  The pepper crusted filet mignon came out huge and flavorful.  I wish the presentation was a little more appetizing, but not a big deal. The burger was good too, though not special enough to be worth the cost.  All in all, Hexx is a decent place to eat on the strip.

Se45oppfYssXPVqEHADo-Q.text: We always make sure we grab lunch/dinner there every time we are in Vegas.  You can see The Fountains of Bellagio and the strip from their outside/patio seating! Their food is very good and customer service is great! We got two small Hexx Chocolates after our dinner and they were delicious! :)

PVffhdubDXPNgTYmPlsSvw.text: Amazing buttermilk pancakes, best I've ever had. We've gotten this the last two times we've been and it's better than any buffet or poolside breakfast! Sean was our server, great service every time with beautiful outdoor and indoor seating. Highly recommended!

m_72HrP6nwAB6otrX7sqMQ.text: Nom nom nom!!  The food here is great (Mac and cheese: oh good God!)   Request Chauncey as your server. He gives you the best advice on the menu, he's honest about what he likes and doesn't, he's so patient and doesn't rush you, AND he's hilarious! My sis and I had a great start to our evening because of him. We will certainly be back! Thanks, Chauncey! ;)

CSN86a8-235omvgfuz-2ag.text: The food here was average and not worth the price. I got the Margarita Pizza (flatbread, tomato, pesto, basil and mozzarella). It was decent. My fiancee got the shrimp scampi. The noodles were okay but the shrimp was bland and super oily. I would only go there for an appetizer. We got the artichoke dip and it was amazing.

XnJwzUn1sURExfbbL4LoZQ.text: Disappointed that my friend and I had to send our broccolini back because it tasted like a salt lick. Our replacement was tasty and fresh. The pizza was awesome and our "bake sale" sundae was a feast for our eyes and stomach. The service left a lot to be desired though as our waitress all but ignored us until it was time to bring the bill. For the price of the meal, service was a disappointment and i would never eat here again. Note: Ask what the significance of the monkey paintings are but do it BEFORE you order. Lol

HzPGFdJtrmyrb4hnHfm94w.text: This used to be Sugar Factory, and while they didn't have the same place with its strangely sexual candy shop, HEXX was nice enough. I actually didn't like my watermelon sour - way too sour - and was too polite to say anything. The bartender noticed and he took it off the tab, which was very nice. Mr. Harris ended up finishing it along with his Crown on the rocks.   I loved the decor, very edgy and sexy, with the bar off to the side, but still close to the entrance. I'd go back.

rlp86lAii4QpiHjoLyPMRA.text: Came in this morning without a reservation, not expecting it to be busy. The hostess was very nice, and we were quoted a 25 min. wait time, which wasn't bad for how busy everywhere seemed. We decided to go to the bar to grab mimosas while we waited, but ended up finding seats at the bar to eat. The bartender dropped off menus and then ignored us. We didn't get asked about drinks (or even given a water) for 10 minutes. Waited another 15 min at least to get asked about food. The food did come out quickly, which was a plus because we were hungry. We ordered an eggs Benedict, chicken Caesar salad, and a typical eggs and bacon breakfast plate. The food was for the most part good, except for my Caesar salad, which aside from it having a long hair in it, was dry with not enough dressing. Of course, I couldn't get more dressing for it because the bartender didn't even ask how our food was until we were all done with our meals. Literally didn't speak to us until taking our plates away when she asked, "was everything okay?". Don't get me wrong, she was really sweet when she did talk to us, but really poor service on her part. I understand she might've been busy and I don't need small talk, but there are certain things you do no matter what that take one second. A) drop waters off. B) ask how the food is!!! Won't be coming back.

TZ5V_TyOX9JOSgtiW66tYQ.text: Food was amazing ! Best lunch on our trip so far! Big thanks to our server Natalie and jordan for the awesome service!! The only down side was the manager with the glasses, he seemed really rude and just made the experience not as pleasant. Maybe find someone else with a better personality and more cheerful like our servers!

tgxhFefORcCJ0aMO0D0i3Q.text: This  my second time here at Hexx. The first time I was here Traycee was our server. She is awesome, Funny and  made my first visit here great I had to return.  My second visit was today and Sean and Shannon were my servers. Both were very attentive and made my second visit also great. The French toast are amazing. I will return soon.

Lxn0R3RicInyv-HzrzAlZw.text: Had dinner here. Great ambiance and a great view of the Bellagio fountains but it was hot (mid June) even when we sat inside. Food was a mixture of great and not so good.  Appetizer: crispy broccoli This was delicious. Perfectly crispy, sauce was sweet and sour (like a sweet lemon sauce). It was really good! There was too much sauce though and it was sometimes overwhelming.  Main course: pepperoni pizza Really good. The Arrabbiata sauce was amazing and the garlic slices were delicious. Had to ask for more garlic.  Main course: pappardelle with mushrooms Terrible. Pasta was overcooked, not al dente at all. Not enough sauce so all the pasta stuck together in a huge clump and it was dry. The dish has big chunks of mushroom but it tasted bland. Not much of a mushroom flavor at all. Needs some salt. In the end we added some of the garlic from the pizza into the pasta and it was much better. Still not great though. Disappointing especially for the price.

5i1Ij57pjCkPrIkJj9fpzQ.text: Great place! Food was excellent and service was great. Highly recommend it. I liked the spaghetti carbonara and my co-workers pizza was very good.

Vc6BICp0dOPlgkRlN7CLAw.text: Sean is literally the best... We came for drinks and snacks and sat on the patio. Amazing food and Bloody Mary's!!! Sean and Josh were wonderful... truly a great customer service experience. **It helps that they are also easy on the eyes :)** thanks so much Hexx!!! We will back for sure!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bloody Mary&#39;s at Hexx!

Sq-_jtBR0g4dWqv6v40UHQ.text: Excellent patio and great service. One of the new servers, Sean, was extremely friendly and knowledgeable. I would highly recommend this place for breakfast/brunch.

-9sw8ymYGkKadqn0fdl-gg.text: Food was good but service was very slow. In Vegas everything is expensive when it comes to food and drink. The quality of food is very good, especially the Yukon potatoes. We went there a couple of times and the wait for our food was very long.

svUqmR34_UQFOhYj8-TWww.text: We were walking around the strip, and decided to give this place a shot, it was a long wait, so we assumed it would be really good. The food tastes bland and was over priced, service wasn't the best either, I wouldn't go back.

MYOV1ogki0R0ThGqZ-XB7A.text: The local is awesome and the food is great.  So the reason why i gave this spot 3 stars had nothing to do with quality of food.  There a mid price when it comes to eating in vegas but it's tasty.    The 3 stars are due to the horrible service provided by the waiter.   He gave a sense that he didn't really care about taking care of my table.  He only checked in on us ones for drink and the for food.  My brother had asked him for a water and it never came.  20 mins later i asked another server for water and it finally came.   The other waiters where doing a way better job than the one assigned to our table.   I think the restaurant manager should be more involved in the quality of service being provided by the waiters.

1EKk5lGFwtTFWtRUyqJeyQ.text: We went for the smoking bubble drinks, our server Steven was AMAZING!!! Our drinks were spot on and would totally recommend them, the purple dragon was my favorite! Steven helped point us in the direction of some awesome spots to visit on the strip along with providing us with a great experience while at Hexx. We plan on going back for their amazing breakfast today and hope he is there to serve us! Thanks Steven for being SO NICE to girls from the East Coast!!!!

2_i13sT-9yt4GDkxJQ-C6g.text: Love Hexx Restaurant. Great food, Awesome specialty drinks, Tasty deserts, Delicious in-house made Chocolate, One of the absolute best patios for dinning with a Amazing view of the Las Vegas Strip. Hexx is definitely a must stop for every Vegas trip. Must try the smothered fries, AMAZING!!!!!!!!

rpshAFdgvDr_1I4oe9vjLg.text: Decent atmosphere, middle of the road food, and awful service.  The wife chose this place for breakfast (I wanted to go to Hash House A Go Go) because it has decent reviews. I guess we must have just come at the wrong time. After being seated and very promptly being met by our waitress for our drink order (apple and orange juice), she returned with them, but didn't have enough OJ in the carafe to fill my glass, and said she would return with more after taking our order. After that, we didn't see her again for a while. Our meals were brought by a different person, minus the English muffin we ordered. I ordered a waffle, but was never given any syrup of any sort. The waffle itself was very plain looking, and softer than a waffle of this style should be. We watched countless people (including our waitress who reappeared) walk by helping our surrounding tables, but never once stopping to check on us. We finally had to go get her and request the English muffin, syrup, and orange juice. The wife said her home fries were good, so there was one positive out of this.  One thing to note, the table next to us must have been getting the same service, because they had to stop someone to ask not only where the waitress was, but items they were missing as well.   I recommend finding another breakfast place if you're in the area. You could probably do much better.

Abqg5PgzwaaixIHPOsO2sQ.text: Went here for breakfast.  Great service, food was sub par.  The homefries are just deepfried whole potatoes, not good at tall.  Breakfast sausage has way too much paprika.  The ham and cheese croissant was ok, same for the Belgian waffles.  A better option at Paris with a similar price tag is Mon Ami Gabi.

Cq_M8s1bcwC5ewHqsa1qkQ.text: just went there on Sunday 11- 27-16. our waitress Tracee was awesome. My wife Debbie tried the Johnny Cakes and they were amazing. We will defiantly be going back.

4HQTevpcpd4mD8BbOD2wlw.text: The patio dining here is across from the Bellagio Fountains, and has a lovely view, which is reason enough to check this place out. The food is great too and has a wide variety from burgers to steaks and pasta.... So if you are dining with a kiddo, like I was, there is something for everyone!

nupEjFhN2Afbcm4UaiyW5w.text: Me and my girlfriend decided to stop into Hexx for a quick bite to eat. We wanted to get something small but our server Alexia sold us on the smother fries and the were ABSOLUTELY PHENOMENAL! Then she suggested the spicy jumbayla to my friend and I was interested in a red wine so she suggested the banfi cab with the ribeye and it paired SO well together!! We were set with our meal but she dropped the dessert menu and explained the Hexx chocolate experience.. we were so full she suggested that we check out the retail store to get a tour. It was the perfect way to end our meal because we got to try all the different chocolates from around the world. I'm going to make sure to tell my friends about this place and will definitely be back again to see her! Thanks for everything!

lgnrEDPerTFl-0YXcEaeOg.text: only had the Big ass bloody mary...pricey worth it??? not bad...its a meal so come hungry...it is horsedaishy(?) so heads up...the mix is pre made as most are but this tasted like Mr. T's, and service was ok but at $40+ for 1 I expected more...and hello its a crab leg give me a fork and napkins...its sad people dont care about details anymore...

uCHtYr0MGWOGZCV4HjBDUw.text: Had to try their famous chicken and waffles for breakfast. Wasn't impressed. Breakfast @ Mon Gami Abi located next door is much better.

xDG6joUT6O74MjSzQCVSeQ.text: This is one of the best places to go for a great lunch. I'm sure dinner to! I was there for 2 nights and ate here twice it was so good. Everything I had was good from the crispy broccoli, asparagus and the crab cakes. Not to mention the view from the patio is awesome day or night.  I doubled back bcuz I had to try the Margherita pizza which was as good as it looks!   I recommend this place hands down. Esp after the rude service and extremely pricey dishes at some of the other restaurants. Although I don't mind spending for great quality food, I was happy with both the prices, taste, and quality and this restaurant.

KXPyosFLsZbW2_uxWnWlwQ.text: Came in here for breakfast on a Monday morning as other places in the hotel were a bit busy. Went in through the casino and it was pretty quiet and empty. A bit worried it wasn't actually open. Made it the front and saw someone at the bar and asked if it was ok to eat here. She said of course and started chatting with me.   Ordered a latte first. It was alright and wouldn't recommend getting one.   Asked for some suggestions which included the steak and eggs and the ham and cheese croissant. However, I had my eye on the chicken and waffle meal. She said it was great and a big portion.   When it arrived it was the waffle with two strips and two wings fried to a golden brown. Crispy on the outside and nice and hot on the inside. The wings were ok, but not enough meat.   The waffle was good, but wasn't blown away. It could have been a bit crispier.  Came with spicy pickles which were pretty tasty.   Didn't eat it all, but came close.   I thought the service was great as was the chicken. Came at the right time and sat at the right spot to get that personal attention. I'd probably order the same meal again and sit there at the bar. Next time I'll get the Bloody Mary instead of the latte.

V9vPr2E95nI3zs6cQ5vUxA.text: We went during happy hour and had the Maryland crab cakes and the mushroom oven pizza. Both were tasty and well prepared. The bartender Craig was friendly and helpful.

l0QHL3f8NqGsLpwgDbDoCQ.text: I had meetings in the Paris and this restaurant is attached. Ate here 4 times, once of my choice, the other times due to co-workers. Decor is nice, soothing, staff is 4 out of 5; food is 3 out of 5 (I had a Chinese Chicken Salad, no chicken to speak of and blah); desserts looked good though I didn't try any but co-workers did. They are known for their chocolates I guess.  The owner must be a moron though. Twice when I was there it was about 40 degrees in the restaurant, once the front door was open and staff was not allowed to close it as per owner/management. Bizarre....it was extremely cold outside that day and I swear colder inside. There was also construction or repairs going on during lunch.   I think the Effiel Restaurant was fantastic.

P_QvvBr2zpBM2tMB1KptBw.text: While it's a great location, the atmosphere is lousy. While paying $39 for a steak, I don't need to have "Down with OPP" blaring in the background. Other people were complaining too. The music kills the atmosphere. Wait staff are nice though and if you sit outside, you can see the fountains... Still, suggest Mon Amie Gabi next door instead.

M5e4gKEUkD1B6jyMzJ2G_w.text: No comments!!! Is not worth paying 75 for a breakfast plus waiter was rude!!!! Also went to buy some lollipops for my daughter i got two in my hand both of them say best by 8/8/2015 and this was 8/23/2015 i was about to tell them but my husband didn't let me so we just left it there and walk away!!

9bTPJp9-fkRGDts-VXIU6g.text: We had a great meal but the service was the highlight. Tracee was our person. Exceptional service with a smile

ZmQvJCApvKIa58BdCbsMfw.text: Great meal but the service was amazing by Melissa! Thank you for a great experience! I recommend the corn beef hash or the steak eggs.

GqEqRWafEjmrv6zcR4DQeQ.text: Ambiance is great facing the dancing fountain at Bellagio hotel. We ordered medium rare steak but they serve us the well done and the beef was hard and chewy. The good thing was they have offered us another one and this time it's perfect. Thanks to our server Teddy!!

eupGfBsVDVhwGPzHMtTw1w.text: We had breakfast and bottomless mimosas.  It was excellent!  I had the lox waffles which were an excellent choice if you want a savory breakfast.  My companion had the cinnamon bun waffles....yummy but very sweet!   We also had the over cooked bacon and it was super good.  View was great and service was decent.  I would definitely go back!

eWPoHyVSkjSzsqoqYTkR4A.text: I had such a great time on my visit and have found my favorite place to eat because of there great staff. Julie was extremely attentive to all our needs and made our visit priceless. Can't wait to come back the view and food was great.

-9bOqXtVgKl8X7jSPab-RA.text: The food and drinks were awesome. I would def recommend the tomatoes bruatta. Our server during happy hour, Joe, was the best. Definitely request him if you can!

RXFYBp8LLC54nrbRbbQVbA.text: What honestly makes this restaurant great is how it isnt named after some douche bag celebrity chef like "Gordon Ramsey" "Emeril" or "Micheal Mina" -clearly an exploitative way to make money off your name without actually doing anything. The food was glorious(white chocolate burger bun) and the bartender Craig was a solid professional who truly understands the science of mixology without being a know it all. The "all you can drink mimosas" is a miraculous way of being inebriated in Vegas. HEXX's clientele radiates CLASS with the type of gentleman who takes a girl on a date and covers the bill without expecting a blowjob. I would recommend this place to anyone and not just for dinner but for hosting weddings, funerals and even bat mitzvah's.

CEh11J9txVWtiVhIkXy4gA.text: Hex is a Great place!!  It's a must try! Also loved the warm touch from the Manager Michael whom was very nice when he stopped by the table to make sure everything was great!!

1MHN-n0YT8EI2nMJ1L_WHw.text: Pretty damn good. Came for brunch. My friend ordered the Mac and Cheese and a side of bacon. They were good separately and together. I ordered the crab cakes and the broccolini. I got the sauce on the side since one review said it was too soggy. I actually enjoyed it without the sauce. The tips were crunchy in a strange way. Like each strand had a crunch piece to it. I loved it. My friend had a love/hate relationship with it. On a side note when looking around the restaurant I noticed everyone ate a majority of the food on their plates even the skinny chicks that only eat once a day. They have an outside area and inside area. You have a great view of the Bellagio fountains. Service was slow but overall i enjoyed it and we are coming back for breakfast tomorrow.
