T-lRmFpdQGcbS-SMuhJuhA.text: Sean was the man - awesome server, attentive. Very good food. Highly recommended lunch spot.

L52xusWy7vg8B2OE9UMyWQ.text: Went to lunch here had the classic burger. Little cold so sat inside. View was great of the Bellagio fountains. Food was good you could tell they used quality ingredients.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

TKniXFftPuiAkwY7Md-LvA.text: Had an amazing brunch. The corn beef hash was to-die-for! The vegetable omelette was perfect. Had fresh vegetable and the salted just right. We ended the meal with the carrot cake pancakes, which was delightful. Plus, you cant beat the location which was right on the Strip. Definitely a must. Which they had a branch in California.

OVxFL2pgRrblmQ19M2ePMw.text: If you're in Vegas you have to get Brunch at Hexx!Be sure to ask for Sean and Patrick. They are the absolute best in town. I will definitely be back and  for them. They are the best in Vegas!

AjK7DbmMwlYckhRQYdY6aQ.text: HEXX was ridiculously good!  My friend and I randomly came here for brunch on Sunday before heading home.  The restaurant is open air and awesome for people watching.  The service is good and on top of things.  All the drinks looked amazing and the once we had were delicious.  Both the food and drink prices are crazy good, especially considering you are in Vegas.  I had the Ham and Cheese Croissant.  It was huge and cheesy and just what I needed.  My friend had a huge burger and she loved it as well.  They also have a chocolate and candy store attached with tons of cool stuff.  You can also do a free chocolate tasting there.  HEXX is a great place for food, drinks, chocolate and candy.

FHW2pLYiiWQqxCemtbx_ww.text: We had a fabulous brunch here with Tracee our awesome server. The food was delicious but the atmosphere and Tracee's friendly fun service was even better.

uCeQEn9mNgQHD2LWdlH-kQ.text: I'm not really one for writing Yelp reviews, but after eating brunch at Hexx with my family, I had to. Not only was everyone's food delicious (I recommend the veggie omelet and definitely the bottomless mimosas for only $20!) but we had an exceptional time thanks to our server Tracee. She was incredible!! From excellent food suggestions to making my sister laugh to chasing down my grandfather when he forgot his jacket at the table, she really went above and beyond to make it a great meal. The manager Ari even stopped by to "dab" with my cousin. If anyone is visiting Vegas and looking for a fun place with excellent food and impeccable service, I highly recommend Hexx!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This is the manager, Ari, dabbing with my cousin! So much fun!

dTl7XOIV_O7m0oeehEn_Vg.text: Josh and Stephanie are the best people I've ever met! Genuine people, genuine atmosphere, and bottles mimosas.... Nuff said.

QN-iCzZENA-dfqAnxYlFgg.text: Great brunch spot!   Atmosphere: Big, open, indoor+outdoor seating. Lively and casual.   Food: The food was tasty. Ordered the Chilaquiles and they were able to accommodate my needy vegetarian lifestyle happily! Bottomless mimosas are +$23 and are truly bottomless for as long as you are enjoying breakfast.   Service: Adam was a delight! He was so attentive and always made sure we were taken care of. The rest of the staff was friendly and helpful as well!   Overall, A+! Definitely a great brunch spot on the strip.

9xk6lKBxDcOAbWMQX2R5TQ.text: First time dining here and absolutely loved it! Not only because the food was fantastic, but because our server Sean was absolutely amazing! He was so professional, personable, and really checked in on us throughout our dining experience. Eric was also great in helping Sean out! Will definitely return just to visit him! Great job!

_l2fYfwFzVVdrj2QDqFZYw.text: Welcome to Las Vegas, and the outrageous prices. The place is cool and looks very modern and minimalist. The food, though it looked fun, as not good. My salad with supposedly avocado, had maybe the equivalent of a table spoon of avocado and the rest was filled with large pieces of croutons and kale.  My guest had a burger and it was overlooked and dry, even though we asked for rare.  This was actually the first place to offer green tea, but at $6.50 a cup without refill, it makes the $5.54 Starbucks look cheap.  My friend had coffee and never had refills either, and the overall experience was a $65 bill for a salad and a burger. I get it it's Vegas, but come on people, if you want me to pay these prices, you better review what you're offering. A little courtesy and welcoming staff would really be appreciated and would go as long way.

9knqV2OTp_wwBSGXi3sVkw.text: Great location, great service and the food was good but I feel it was a bit overpriced.  Despite the pricing it was a great evening and the service definitely made up for the premium you pay on the food.  Filet mignon was perfect exactly as ordered, salad was good, calamari and the s'mores dessert was underwhelming.  With so many options on the strip, unfortunately I would skip this one

xRZzLK8T1L0qu6oM1ejlbg.text: This place is top of the line! The chefs put their hearts into the food and the servers are amazing ! 10 starts for hexx!!!!

q4Kz60kWzevuRlo7wqd6EQ.text: Just stopped by this place for brunch with a friend and the food was delicious but my favorite thing was the service. Sean and his assistant Big Bobby provided amazing service. The decor of the place is pretty great also. I'd definitely come back here.

sVI0zaafJjYfNkYh7aW-Dg.text: We just had a great breakfast at hexx. Honestly our favorite part was the amazing service. Our waiter Sean was on top of everything and so nice. And Bobby was also great. Very good way to start the day! A+!

8e28RPE3pP0tyL3JU-BDww.text: I am so disappointed in this place!   The presentation of this restaurant makes you think it's a great place to have brunch at. It's across the street from the Bellagio fountains, outside dining and for some reason it's packed.   I waited 45 minutes for a table to be so disappointed! I ordered the ham& cheese  croissant and the carnitas hash. What a mistake!   First the croissant was deli lunch meat ham with cheese put on a croissant. The carnitas hash was potatoes.. No joke! Like no flavor in anything. Only good thing about this place is location and their potatoes!   Service is slow too! I would NOT come here again.

iQl2iR3_ncWZLSXnB9HPVg.text: Soggy slider appetizers that came after my entree. Sat on a nice little patio with misters yessss got to people watch and be in the shade on the strip. Cute little lesbian server. Best french fries iv ever had in my life. Amazing shrimp salad-add avocado for extra yumminess:) will definitely eat again

uZkywX3gjpOWQbkxYFjdWg.text: Always one of our fave spots to hit for brunch while on The Strip. First off the Hexx Potions are a must. We were here in 2015 and come to find that in 2016 they have added like 4 more. They are a fun experience and super yummy.  Now on to the service and meal. Traces was amazing. She greeted us with a smile and kept it fun during the whole meal. It is what makes a dining experience truly a great one. She took great care of us and made some amazing recommendations. We definitely want to come back and sit in her section. The meat Omelette and chilaquiles were excellent. Cooked right to perfection and an array of great and tasty ingredients. The Hexx Potion washed it all down with perfection.  When in Vegas you have to come here for a great brunch experience, sit in the outdoor area (if you enjoy people watching) and sit in Tracee's section. You will want to come back again and again!

HdEdy9GXKKjidol0tlRBog.text: Awesome new restaurant experience on the strip. We are locals and have eaten everywhere, this place of going to be a winner! We took some out of town visitors and  they loved it. The calamari and rock shrimp appetizer is excellent. I had the Jumbalaya, my wife the short rib. All well prepared and very tasty. But what sets Hexx really apart are two things: 1. Some really awesome servers and 2. The chocolate. The desserts were off the charts. I don't usually have dessert but I'll definitely have it every time we eat here, which will be frequently. If you're coming to visit Vegas, make this a must do. If you live here, go tomorrow. Did I say they have a view of Bellagio's fountains?

rjwyeXYk4e8vz0aecaFRPQ.text: Great drinks!  Good ice cream next door(although it's a bit warm and soft).

QjuQql33IaksAV89J_qOuQ.text: Great brunch with decent pricing for the strip. Service is on point. Have been here before for dinner Lisa G. Was an amazing server. For brunch we had Andrea and she was so attentive it's hard to find good service these days. I recommend this for local and tourist. Plus you can't beat their view from the patio.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

R9jNZMgKxOSodIK_fMVYYA.text: Went here on a whim.  Seriously craving a Coke and  they have Pepsi products.  My server, Sean, went to cvs and brought me back a bottle of Coke. Honestly that was way above and beyond any expectation I had.  The food was great, I had the burger and am kind of picky and my order was accurate and delicious. I cannot say enough great things about Sean, truly an exceptional employee!

KbkI5TPlauYjM4fWnozwUA.text: The food was great like always. My girlfriend and I have been here half a dozen times and have always been satisfied with the food and service. This time it was different because we were served by Rafael. He made the experience very enjoyable. We came for a late breakfast so we had bottomless mimosas. He made sure we were always topped off and he would come and dance with us! I swear his vibes and energy were high and oh so contagious. Super nice guy. The visit started with him making funny jokes (usually at his own expense) and making us feel comfortable. His service was excellent, but his attitude is what made him stand out. We love Hexx, and Rafael made it that much more enjoyable thanks to his upbeat attitude and great service. He also loves to dance and groove to the music, very cool! Thank you Hexx and Rafael!

hOa0JquZ9B1hPrgF5Ge5fg.text: Waited forever for drinks to come and waited nearly an hour for the food to arrive. Wasn't even busy at all. Don't think I'd come back here to eat but I would go back to the candy store.

yulrngi0u4ejfXgx-4WNfA.text: Let me start off with saying that the food is fantastic! Had dinner here last night and wow. I would definitely return. I had the chicken Cesar salad, I was speechless! The most biggest, delicious salad ever! Had some dessert, which I forgot the name of, but it's somewhat new. Extremely tasty! The waiter was super nice and hilarious! Super friendly staff, great environment!! Definitely recommend coming here!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

79y0kW0RH7-Agma0z2ehFA.text: The breakfast food was excellent, service was amazing, and you couldn't ask for a better view of the strip. It is right across the street from Bellagio. I definitely recommend the outdoor seating. Sean and Crystal were both top notch!

IT_4ddSqZ0y7fOZ8-7brhA.text: Very disappointed. The positives first: attractive trendy looking restaurant. Located at front of Paris casino so you get a nice view of strip if u want it. My protein breakfast was very good (chicken egg whites etc). But everything else was sub par. Took almost 20 min to get 2 sodas n even then I had to tell the manager we were waiting on them. The French dip was overcooked & lacked flavor. For less than their $19 price, my hubby has had way better. The spinach dip tasted so bad he didn't want another bite. Once you're seated and get bumped by other patrons and your server trips over your chair 2-3 times, you realize the layout is way too crowded- like management didn't account for being at full capacity when they placed the chairs.  In fact, my work blazer ended up on the floor twice after the woman seated back-to-back with me stood up and bumped it off my chair as she kept squeezing in & out of her seat (she was a very slim woman btw).  Overall, a pretty poor experience, especially when you consider the price for everything.

TCgE2nD1VL2cV2wDFhhM5w.text: Such an awesome vibe. Very pretty inside and the menu was great. The staff are all so friendly and you can tell they all genuinely get along which was nice to see. Our server Tracy was such a lovely lady and gave great suggestions for off the path places to see. Great place will definitely go there again! Try the Lychee Martin it was excellent!!

UU43Wanhnx4dme-yp39yaA.text: Hexx Benedit was amazing! Perfect spot for brunch on a Saturday with unlimited mimosas for $23 dollars. The service was also amazing. We didn't have to ask for anything. Definitely ask for Sean! He won't let you down.

Mwbck_m2XreCS9GljytbyA.text: Great rail seating for people watching and enjoying the summer weather as the Bellagio fountain puts on a show.

3mnURUwgQfTI7gCje-rmrA.text: This place is amazing. The service JJ provided was excellent. I spent a great time with my family here I recommend it if you haven't been here before. The French toast is amazing for anyone who has a sweet tooth. And bottomless is a must here in Sin City (:

FrtLTh23YHRqB2QhhskMkA.text: We went for brunch and had the best experience. Shout out to our server, Adam, for being on it with the bottomless mimosas and for being concerned about my bacon (I ate it so fast when it came out that when he came to check about two minutes later he was worried I didn't get my order- I definitely did). Our food met our expectations and beyond. I ordered the Brioche French toast and my sister ordered the protein omelet. We split our meal together so we could each experience it. I highly recommend it as a solid brunch spot. Everything was so great that I'm hoping to make it back to try their other items.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Protein omelet with potatoes and English muffin. Solid breakfast.

uAfBLP1NR3PC_aopsW5sjA.text: Rafael was awesome! He was so friendly and fun! The food is awesome here. Bottomless mimosas are only $23 so worth it. He was so quick and easy going with our complicated orders it made it so easy to order! I have never had such great service. Thank you Rafael for being such an amazing server! This man should be CEO!!! Such a lady charmer.

-8uhInM2pYjHhSOkFPa3Bw.text: On vacation in Vegas for the first time over Memorial Day week. We hadn't eaten on the strip yet and wanted a snack after a concert at Planet Hollywood. I had read the reviews and was a little cautious due to a suggested inflated prices and unsatisfied reviews. We were very pleased! We arrived close to midnight- promptly greeted and asked inside or outside. We chose inside however the doors/windows were open so we could see and hear the comings and going of the strip. We were seated inside and Philip was our server who was happy even at midnight.  I love pizza -self described pizza snob and hate a bad pizza. We ordered a pepperoni pizza (6 slices) and crispy fries. My hubby and and I shared. Huge pepperoni slices-a great crust- the pizza did not disappoint!  and fries were definitely crispy! Hubby said they were the best fries he's ever had!? The fries were hot and salty-the best kind of fries! We had a great time and would definitely go back! Mind you the candy/ice cream store is not 24 hrs!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pepperoni pizza. Good crust. Huge pepperoni slices! 6 slices!

o6u70dna8f-gpzocdT23ig.text: If you are looking for amazing chicken and waffles look no further! Went here for lunch and the food here was great! We had the fruit plate to start and then chicken and waffles! So flavorful, perfectly cooked and lots of it! The best part though was our server Tracee!!! Tracee was so sweet happy and excited! She was super attentive without being overwhelming and always near by when I needed a refill on my endless mimosa! If you get the chance to go here do and ask for Tracee, yo won't regret it!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffles!!

EF-u0cMtuOMeCvbYUd_bLw.text: Food is good, but service is slow. Ate brunch here twice and on the second day it took over 30 minutes to receive an omelette and breakfast croissant. We asked for salt and pepper and it took forever to receive (I don't know why they're not already on all the tables??) and we had to ask our server twice for sugar for our coffee. I really liked the home fries, they were delicious!  I do love the atmosphere here and on Friday afternoon there was a DJ playing music. But, the music is loud inside and you can't hear your server or have a conversation with your spouse. We saw a lot of people texting at the tables and we joked that that's how they were probably communicating with each other because it was so loud. I recommend sitting outside if the DJ is playing music.  BEWARE - This restaurant adds a CNF charge to your bill. Ours was over $3 the second day and we never found out what this fee is for.

DHoJeFX6LdBI0r_ahKDO-g.text: Let me start with the fact that this restaurant is under rated. The service from the time we walked in was superb. We had Taylor as a waitress and Tristan as a hostess and they were extremely accommodating. Compared to most of the food on the strip this place was really unique. We started with the broccolini because I needed some veggies. The broccoli was just the right consistency and it had an orange vinaigrette which made it all the better. I had the French toast with fresh fruit which was refreshing and well seasoned. My husbands omelet was heaven, he did the meat omelet minus the pork (it would have been too much) it was so good the chicken was a pulled chicken and after eating it we felt like we went to a buffet. The homemade jelly for the English muffin was a great topper and the home made potatoes were seasoned and cooked perfectly. I can't wait to come back here!

BwyhwFcd-XTeE33UoCdlSQ.text: TRACEE IS ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL! My girlfriends and I came in for breakfast and bottomless mimosas and had the best server ever. Tracee was amazing and took such good care of us, she had the best personality and attitude! Thanks for the laughs :) oh yeah and good was also amazing thanks hexx! - the 88s and cancers from SD

efY-Ix7Q0wyVNhwdZXeOPg.text: We were staying in the Paris hotel, where HEXX is located, but we didn't go just because of conveniece - we went for the amazing reviews we had heard. We had brunch and the food was delicious! Amazing service, too. Sean was our server and was so great and so nice! Would definitely recommend if you find yourself hungry and on the strip! They have the best outdoor seating - you're right on the strip but still get that classy atmosphere that HEXX offers. Alternatively, later into the night, they have greats bands playing too!

P4DNfZqJkDx7Vi6tZLIGCA.text: Just "OK", I wasn't very impressed with the $20 burger, it was so so, definitely (in my book) overrated.  Wait Staff were pleasant, but slow.  Don't know about it, maybe my expectations were high, but left feeling disappointed.

y1N7NA-wffYhX_FWfVcuAw.text: Welcome to an evening of food Bliss!  Stopped in at Hexx the other night with my son.  What a treat we had!  Jessica was our server and please when you go, Request Jessica!  She is top works by far!  Her recommendations were perfect!  We started out with "Smothered Fries", okay, you can almost make this one a meal by itself - OMG - The Cheese Curds, excuse my drool, all of this cheese with the right amount of pulled pork (LOTS) and this fab gravy toping it all off! In between we had "Maryland Crab Cakes", just the right amount of everything in them! By far my FAVORITE of them would be the "Crispy Broccolini" OUTSTANDING! The balsamic dressing they are tossed with To Die For!      We had time to enjoy the fountains between our courses, we were sitting on the patio!  We then had a visit from Michael the GM! What a personal touch this made!  The night is Incredible! Our entree's arrived in perfect timing.  We both had steaks tonight, I had the 7oz Filet, OMG, this steak was EXQUISITE, and boy do I LOVE red meat, cooked to perfection this was! My son had the 14oz Rib-Eye which was just as enjoyable as mine! They were served with grilled asparagus, the only way to eat it in my opinion!      Dessert was so fun! We were treated to an ice-cream cone tasting Extravaganza!  We had 8 different flavors, my favorite was the pistachio!  Not to be let down by the Chef, we were toured in the Chocolate Factory, and learned quite a bit about Chocolate, where it is grown, and how they prepare it! We also had the opportunity to try each of the chocolates they offer as well.  How Amazing this night was! They should be a must on any trip to Vegas!

i0pyqfC_Stf7WQHRQVR9iQ.text: So I was VERY disappointed with this place. Now to their credit maybe it was bad because I went at 4 am for steak and eggs but if you can't make it then don't offer it. Maybe the chef who specializes in steaks wasn't there but man it was bad. I asked for it medium and it came out burned on the outside with a medium interior. Sent it back and they brought it back slightly less burned and STILL charged me for it!!!! I couldn't believe it! If this is the service over night then close your doors because it's not worth it to lose customers over it.

UWl0m0zO9XHtHuEOkfRpsw.text: As much as I've passed this place when I go down the strip, I've been intrigued in visiting Hexx, the ice creamery & candy place, not the restaurant. . So here was my opportunity... Right away it is split between the candy/ice cram shoppe and the restaurant. I just ate a good sized lunch so I thought of treating myself to a sweet something. The candy area resembles any other candy place here in Vegas, with a mixture of Mickey Mouse, Hello Kitty and Star Wars items like purses, glasses, cups, wallets, etc. i steer my way to the ice cream bar where they also service roof beer floats, teas and coffees drinks. This is where my disappointment begins... I ordered a scoop of Horchata ice cream in a waffle cone and an ice hibiscus iced tea cooler. First my order was wrong and the gentleman gave me black ice tea from Peet's.  First the ice cream was ok...good but not like "WOW" and pricey over $6/scoop with tax. Now to the ice tea...the cashier noticed it was the wrong tea and I was given a simple ice black tea. He asked the other gentleman to re-do the kind of iced tea I wanted and how to do it. So, not only the taste was very bitter unsweetened, but not enough ice for an typical ice tea in 106 degree weather. I had to add 4 packets for Splenda to get thru finishing my drink and trying not to feel I wasted my money...which I eventually felt anyways.  Honestly, the iced passion tea at Starbucks would've been more satisfying than here. I paid for the name really, and probably won't go back. Sorry!

Nzl6eMxcjyxBI7Egu8v5vQ.text: I enjoyed the experience and the food of this place except the very end. We got our ticket and there was a CNF charge next to our bill and we asked the waiter what it was and she said it was a charge for being on the strip and immediately called over the manager to explain. We found this behavior really odd. Once the manager came to our table he said he would discount one of our food items. Our question Was what was CNF charge? We didn't expect a discount BUT we realized they charged us a fee for something that was not disclosed anywhere on the menu or advertised as such. Everything was great except the sketchiness of this charge. Weird business going on here.

eyfOyaMxsmzaYFIIMsgFcA.text: Great spot for brunch or any meal, for that matter, because of the street level view of the Bellagio fountains. If you want a sweet dish to start your day, the chocolate pancakes are the way to go. It's made up of four thick chocolatey pancakes that are plenty sweet with a cake-like texture. It's essentially like eating chocolate cake for breakfast, but you'll feel a little less guilty because pancakes are a breakfast food, after all. The carrot cake pancakes were slightly better, in my opinion. Fluffy, well spiced and full of bits of carrots, and much lighter than the chocolate pancakes, they can be very sweet as well if you consume the entire mound of cream cheese frosting on top. The brioche French toast is rather pedestrian compared to the other stuff we got, but well executed. The "overcooked bacon" was just that, overcooked to make the 1/2 pound of bacon strips exceptionally crispy, with a maple glaze covering them for a touch of sweetness. I can see this place being popular just for the view, but the food is a good enough reason to pay them a visit.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0uE2wJptzMUfq-S0In7mfg.text: My wife and i were here earlier for breakfast and just had to come back for lunch. For breakfast i had french brioche toast with a side of over cooked bacon. This dish was proof that a heaven exists and all the angels must dine here at hexx. My wife had a vegetarian omlet. Delicious if you are a veggie lover. It was loaded with fresh spinach mushrooms tomatoes and more. You can taste the freshness. Having so much disappointment in vegas with mediocre food and high prices, this place was a treat. So we came back for lunch. Since we saw that their portions was plentiful during lunch, we decided to share a chicken and waffle meal. This was nothing short of greatness. The chicken was crunchy and juicy with perfect seasoning. A little bit of spice with tanginess with the maple syrup topping off the sweet. Now that the greedy part is out of the way, lets talk about the service.  Our waiter during the morning was Melissa who was nothing less than phenomenal.  We were surprised to hear that she was only here a week when we requested her manager to compliment her. Yes, she was that good. And coming back for lunch was no difference. Josh gave us the same welcoming, timely service we recieved from Melissa which tells me they do a pretty damn good job in teaining them. Definitely will be back for dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Food is amazing here. Service is even better. We had Melissa for breakfast and back a few hours later for lunch. Our waiters were on point.

uEAD_v4EQ7lvq1sdfj3TGQ.text: This place is overly priced and the food was horrible. Everything was bland and small proportioned. The spaghetti and meatballs tasted worse than the frozen ones at the market. The margarita pizza was bland and had no sauce on it. The "crispy" French fries were thick cut and soggy, not crispy at all. The chip and artichoke dip was decent but so very small for the price. Don't go here, go across the street and go to the Cabo restaurant; it's so much cheaper, tastes better, and bigger portioned.

THl3Lk7B6hObbCrGZmIjZA.text: Let me start by saying I've been here before and had a delicious meal, so good I had to come back on this trip. This time I had a horrible experience. I ordered the filet mignon and a tortilla soup. Waited about 10 minutes for the soup, which I didn't mind, but it was the wrong soup! Brought the right one out 5 minutes later. Waited an additional 20 minutes for the main course, they brought us the wrong order. I was starving and craving the food I ordered, but with a fussy baby, I wasn't waiting any longer. That's what happens when the waiter doesn't write anything down.

86Kj9QZ26ktvmK2znYyqgQ.text: Best. Meal. In. Vegas.... EVERRRRR!!!!  From the ambiance, to the service, to the food/drinks to the incredibly talented Chef Piekarski... everything was beyond amazing!  I could not ask for a better experience!  I was celebrating my birthday and decided on this restaurant since I knew we could sit on the patio & have a wonderful view of the Bellagio water show as we ate.  I'm so happy we went here.  From the moment my party & I walked into Hexx - we were treated like we were the only ones in the restaurant - who wouldn't luv that kind of service?!?! Our table ordered the Overcooked Bacon & Hummus Bruscetta for aps - both were perfect on the palette!  Not so heavy of an ap that it ruins your appetite for dinner either.  They were spot on for taste & portions! For dinner, we ordered the Rib Eye, Chicken & Waffles, Sea Bass & Chicken Schnitzel entrees.  All 4 dinners were mouthwatering!  The Ribby (my fav cut of steak) - so juicy, perfect char, and cooked to my exact liking - medium.  It came with this dollop of garlic butter on the rib eye - that took the already delicious steak to a whole new level of deliciousness!  The Chicken & Waffles - Even better than we anticipated.  The chicken wasn't at all dry & had a perfect crunch to it.  The waffles - not your ordinary waffles.  What a wonderful suprise of flavor!  I could eat those all day!  The Roasted Sea Bass was absolute perfection!  Respectively seasoned, juicy & had a little crunch to it cause of the perfectly cooked skin.  That too, had a flavorful char on it (I do luv me some char - lol).  But the best dish of the night was the Chicken Schnitzel.  OMG!!!   As my sis would say "Their Schnitzel is the Shitzel".  We really didn't know what to expect from this dish but from the moment I tasted it... there was a very savory party going on in my mouth!  My taste buds were definitely doing the happy dance! We were so impressed by the food that we just had to thank the Chef in person.  I asked our fabulous server, Vanessa, if we could speak to the Chef & without missing a beat, she told us she'd go get him.  A few mins later, the accomplished Chef Piekarski came out and chatted with us for appx 10mins.  He gave us a little Hexx history & a little backstory about himself.  Super friendly & super gracious!!  He never once made us feel rushed to speak to him & he happily posed for pictures with us.  Meeting him and being able to show our gratitude was the cherry on top of everything.... Or so I thought.  Next thing we know, we're getting served a heavenly array of desserts sent from the Chef himself!  The Creme Brulee... absolutely divine! I was in Vegas for 5 days, did all sorts of fun things, ate all kinds of different foods & saw a concert.  Hands down, the highlight of my entire trip was my experience at Hexx.  I can't thank Vanessa & Chef Piekarski enough for making my bday dinner such a memorable evening! We're heading back to Vegas next wkend - I already know we'll be stopping here to try out their breakfast.  Chilaquiles or Carnitas Hash.... Here I come!!!

rTW49p5LuEzfenqNYjHdNw.text: Great stop for lunch.  Our server Sean was outstanding and kept our water glass full.  We sat inside but had a great view of the street.  We enjoyed the Hexx burger with the White Chocolate bun was awesome.  Sean provided us with a sample of Hexx chocolate and the Hexx Chocolate Store was next door with delightful employees that were very knowledgeable concerning Chocolate.  Sean made our lunch stop a very nice experience.

yWvwU1Mg6LSQhRUoRIlL0Q.text: My wife and I had a show at the MGM we were going to see but wanted to see the Bellagio Fountains before hand. So we parked at The Bellagio and walked around waiting to see the fountain show, but ended up waiting 2 hours due to the high winds. Right across the street is Hexx. A reasonably priced venue for food that makes you feel fancy even when you're on a budget (compared to other places on the strip). My wife and I shared a margarita pizza which tasted fine, nothing special, and the hummus and pita which isn't your typical hummus. The garbonzo beans were whole and had a lemon tahini paste that kept it together. The server we had was super friendly and the view wasn't too bad. We sat right next to the window looking towards the fountain. There wasn't any wait and we were seated right away. Overall we spent about $35 for an iced tea and the food.

AaQ6X4D4tk-d6CEU3m5dfQ.text: Hexx, I think they put a spell on us!  What a wonderful space! Cozy little nooks puffed with pillows for lounging, a warm bar to lure you in, a grand modern dining room.  For dining  al fresco, there is an inviting patio, great for people watching with a dazzling view of the Bellagio fountains...not to mention an innovative chocolate shop whipping up fine chocolates right before your eyes. On that sweet note, I visited the candy shop where I bought a huge bag of candy. By the way, upstairs on the roof there is an outdoor beer garden.  Sorry to say I ran out of time as this space has so much to offer...next time for sure!       On to the hospitality and the food.  We were greeted kindly and warmly by Parish, what doll! Kevin was our Server.  He was very professional and approachable, knowledgable and fun! I felt like I was receiving fining dining service without the fussy white tablecloths.  His wine pairing were thoughtful and on point as well as, his food recommendations were stelar! Kevin mentioned that they have a new Executive Chef, Gregg Fortunato.  We enjoyed each dish so very much.  Charcuterie board paired with a warm pretzel and blueberry jam, Fresh heirloom tomato and burrata salad, rainbow beat and farro salad, plump shrimp cocktails and then the Chilean Sea bass cooked to perfection! Everything was so well balanced in color, flavor, and texture! All was plated in the way of art...Edible Art! I loved it. We were so very pleased and satisfied even the manager, think his name was Chris or Christian stopped by to see if we were enjoying ourselves.  Nice touch!   A wonderful experience! Looking forward to our return!

a7DNh-HiJgXdF4qtn8Dd8A.text: Great food, Huge servings and our server, Sean, was very attentive and pleasant. Sean made our lunch very enjoyable.

uY3p8oWLP2SuhMab42dkow.text: I like the calm and serene decoration at 3am. But we did not get a server for a few minutes. Not even to offer water. Not even to say a quick hello and be back to serve us. When we finally decided to leave, as we pass the host counter, they bid us a good night. We simple said 'we did not get served' in response.  And the host said 'oh, shit!'

ACAbgas4Csegiuy3LDrnSQ.text: Absolutely LOVE this place! 2nd time here on our most recent visit (May 14th) & even better than the 1st time (Oct 2015)! Amazing food! Amazing bottomless mimosas! And even more amazing service! Tracee was our server & she was beyond amazing! You can tell that she loves her job...so refreshing to see! We will be back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Turkey Club
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottomless Mimosas
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and Waffles

1oPuQr10qAu3H82ZBJFozg.text: Love this place. Came here 2 days in a row for brunch while visiting. $20 bottomless mimosas and the bartenders and staff were attentive and kept the glasses filled at all times. The first visit, my husband and I sat at the bar. Allison, the bartender was great! The second day, we had a bigger group of people so we sat at a table in the main dining area. The omelettes are delicious with huge portions of home fries. The frittata was also delicious but it was a small portion compared to the omelettes. I will definitely be back the next time I'm in Vegas.

aAgAx3qAhUGar3xZLRzOqw.text: This place was disappointing!!! With all the great places to eat in LV you need to do it better not cheaper my wife had the quiche the mere appearance of it screamed Price Club it looked processed and tasted the same.  Good coffee cold bacon and the Carnitas Hash was mostly potatoes!! The service was good our server Amanda was great. But do yourself a favor and walk 100 ft further and go to Mon Ami. Oh plus it's too expensive for the quality.

HxFBNyM1Ig-XMVSSSdty8Q.text: Yes. This place is gold. Good food (Hexx burger) chocolate Manhattan. Great service, attentive not overbearing. Will come again.

SEkZch1Ds2AkyGvDNLLsuQ.text: We came across Hexx on accident and we were not disappointed!  The food was amazing.  The candied bacon was phenomenal.  My husband had the club sandwich and I had the the prime beef dip - both were excellent!  Out waiter, Shawn, was the absolute best.  He was attentive and made sure we were happy.  Hexx is a must try!

m1RcpRW_gMZi2RnVwW-a3A.text: Favorite place to eat in Vegas. Amazing food and service. Highly recommend. I got the Hexx Benedict and I loved it. Everything I tried was amazing!

3bC-e49ha_-qtiTq1Zo69A.text: I was not impressed with the food I received. I went on Sunday during brunch, and it wasn't busy luckily. I ordered a croissant sandwich which came with a croissant, cheese, and ham. I added in an over easy egg to go with my sandwich.   The service was okay, nothing special. I didn't really enjoy the sandwich. The eggs weren't warm and the ham was cold. Considering it was brunch, I was expecting a warm sandwich. The other people at my table didn't enjoy their meal either. I would recommend going else where for the money.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Croissant sandwich with added over easy egg

xKrn5l5Gi6-u2cFbzhF9JQ.text: Simply amazing. Front start to finish. Endless mimosa were great, I personally had six and I'm feeling great. Orders spinach dip (SOOOOO GOOD) and turkey club ( also soooo good). Had JJ as my server (be sure to ask for him, he's literally the best). Overall, if you looking for great good, drinks, and atmosphere COME HERE !!!!!!

M5uIXSX4XW8UD5NBvS5cbA.text: While my husband was attending a conference, I shopped and stopped here alone to dine. Glad I did.   I got a Prosecco cocktail and the spicy guacamole for a snack. So tasty! Then I really was craving a cafe affogato which was not on the menu. The waitress had it made for me. It was so good they should add it to the menu! The ice cream was extremely creamy and blended perfectly with the espresso!

3D103GShnxAGz1SqCz1ZJA.text: Had an amazing time at HEXX, with great friends. Sean was the best server, and we could not have been happier with the service. Great birthday celebration!! Cake pops are wonderful!

O1meN10j2BsQd0UqZX4n0Q.text: Every time we come to Vegas this is the breakfast spot, the coffee is the best!! Service today was a little slow today being it was a Tuesday, but overall being that the weather is wonderful and that we were seated outside makes up for it! This spot is must!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. View of the strip
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crossaint and steak and eggs
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

Qx2rq9WUhTRta5YHl-xqxg.text: Very good to try all their foods and dessert as well. You're here already anyway why not try it, there won't be any other place to see them or go to with this kind of food and especially the ambience

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Passion fruit mousse cake
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Peanut butter cheesecake
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Flamingle

pKhAF3Mh2OQj37GOtGMvAg.text: We happened to be walking past this amazing place on our recent trip to Vegas. Needless to say I'm happy we decided to come in. Brunch was fantastic! If the rest of their menu is anything like what we experienced then you can't go wrong.

z9O3S1qsoGbncX2Xnwk4ZQ.text: Food was a little pricey and disappointed with the food. We ordered the prime rib, med/rare it ended up well done and looked fried!  Service was not great . I had the chopped salad and calamari, not bad.

ZKRP5-_-2M4syi9voqOMbw.text: Great customer service! We had an incident with the high winds and an umbrella that broke the lamp above us. Long story short they moved us to a new table right away and comped our entire ticket. Throughout the whole experience they were just so great. The food was delicious; the flamingle punch drink is a great deal when you have a few people drinking and the vegetable pizza was bomb.com. Definitely will be back!

XUSUBJjhwIFCTZjKM2B1dQ.text: Went here for Sunday Brunch with my family for my mom's birthday.  The weather in Vegas is beautiful this time of year so we sat outside on the patio and it was absolutely lovely to watch the Bellagio water show while we enjoyed our meal.  My dad got the salmon, brother got the carbonara, mom got the veggie omelet, and I got the chicken and waffles (which was a huge portion! So that's good!) All the meals were maybe slightly above average, other than the waffles, the waffles were definitely above average! The brunch in general was definitely not worth the price, but it's on the pricier side because of the location of course.  The service was very okay. Our server was super nice, just extremely slow though. I'll come back for the atmosphere and view.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and Waffles. Huge portion! The waffles were delicious!

h0AQdZdYWDURV1ExD5jRxQ.text: I LOVED HEXX! The location is directly on the Strip, almost underneath the Eiffel Tower. It has a large wrap around patio where you can see the Bellagio fountains go off! Prices are reasonable- bottomless mimosas for $23 and most food in the $15-$25 range. Food portions are MASSIVE- worth splitting with a friend. This is a perfect place for people watching and filling up your stomachs before a long day of Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Preview of menu. The Bloody Mary selection is one of best I&#39;ve seen in Vegas!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Food portions are HUGE!

Nitgm2EKzTj3M7_M9iTMqA.text: I've been a huge fan of Chef Carlos for years. From Vegas to Austin, TX and back.  When I found out he was at Hexx, I couldn't get there fast enough.  He never disappoints. The brunch menu is stellar and if you like a good Bloody Mary, you'll be glad you came. Great food, great drinks, great view, just bring good company and you can't possibly go wrong!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ham and cheese croissant sandwich, add over easy egg.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fresh fruit plate with Dragon fruit.  Yummmmm.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious cinnamon bread.

azYpfdhZd5U1gM2qbqf22g.text: The food was underwhelming and small portions for the cost. I had the eggs Benedict which has undercooked poached eggs to the point where the egg whites were clear. My latte was terrible. It was half filled and so burnt it was undrinkable. I think the rating for this place comes from the mimosas. The atmosphere was like a nightclub at 10am. Hard to hear the waiter speak to me.

n5OM1TAG7infDCn6cWW2pw.text: I came here with my sisters who just recently landed and were starving.  We wanted to sit outside and it took them 15 minutes to seat us when there were empty tables.  Once we got a table we wanted to sit somewhere else because the sun was blinding our eyes. Once we got a new table it took 15 to 20 minutes for someone to take our order and give us water.  We ordered salads and it took about 25 minutes to get our salads. When we got our salads they forgot to give us silverware. We waited for silverware and finally were able to eat our salads.  I would not eat here again because the lack of care for thier customers. Also, it was not a busy day so there should be no reason for horrible customer service.

HCnolUs8TmTveRudFnsP3w.text: Sean and Mark were excellent. Find a way to clone them. Sean & Mark should be promoted. You can't afford to lose this team to your competitors. Excellent customer service.

le5cKND9BM5YGi6ZaHLCdg.text: Went here specifically for "The Colossal Bloody Mary" that they advertise on Instagram that has a crab leg sticking out of it. The bartender asks I'm sure that I want it because of the size. I said "yes, I've seen it on your Instagram page." However, he did NOT tell me that they were out of crab legs. I noticed it was missing, so I inquired. He told me "we're out of crab legs, so I added two extra shrimp." That would have been nice to know before ordering a $36 drink. Or perhaps reducing the price since the crab is what makes it expensive. Wouldn't go back. Extremely disappointed. Should have gone to TOD's instead.

hXTk2iGGH1kRHdKjDG53yg.text: Loved it!  Stopped by for Saturday breakfast and only waited about five minutes. The space is so bright and airy, and the food was delicious. I loved the little arugula salad that came with my quiche, and my friend really enjoyed her cinnamon roll waffle as well. It was also super fun watching other tables get some of the zanier items on the menu. There's a Bloody Mary that comes in a little pitcher with a giant snow crab leg sticking out of it! Also saw someone get a drink with dry ice. Would definitely return.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious quiche that comes with a little arugula salad on the side.

oRmQJyzCe0aSKODTqqTo0g.text: Saw the reviews of this place and decided to try it for breakfast. We had reservations and we were seated right away. They are part of Caesar's and if you are Platinum or above you can get priority seating. The place was pretty crowded and we sat inside but close to the windows. My wife ordered the corn beef hash which was scratch made but didn't really taste that great. We always like trying everyone's corn beef hash but this one was just ok. I had the French toast with fruit. It looked great but the taste was just like that of Ihop. Oh well we probably won't come here again . Since there are so many choices for breakfast in Vegas we will be going some where else. The food wasn't anything to write home about. Don't get me wrong it was ok but we are foodies and want somewhere that is yummy.

HIdzKhS7pSPpNHpEhpGrLA.text: Wow! Everything this place puts out is unbelievable. Had breakfast and dinner there same day. Steak and eggs was great. The home fries (potatoes) were no afterthought. Heck, even the English muffin was good. For dinner the salmon was great and the wife's ribeye was awesome. Service was top notch. Everybody chips in to help and they hustle. You can't beat the setting and view there too. Possibly my new go to in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salmon
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak and eggs

a_asHlG7C-KVsm506egoKA.text: This place is great.angie is the best and so is Elaina!! Will not go anywhere else for bruch wen in Vegas. Food and customer service was awesome!!! And the view is an additional bonus.

PXKgo9G8E-pSqbavrfz4dQ.text: Our family sat in the patio.  The weather was nice.  It was in the 80 with a breeze.  My family seemed to enjoyed the food.  They finished everything on their plate.  I ordered a grilled shrimp salad.  It was really fresh.  Overall great customer services, good portion, clean, and food was good.

68DmyjKFwDqc1ifec9M3kA.text: The hotel concierge recommended this place for a last minute reservation.   They said it was "just American".  We sat outside and could see the Ballagio fountains and Intel light show.  The service was nice and didn't hurry us.  The food was also good.  I had the salmon over squid sauce.  The squid sauce was a little bit heavy, but the salmon was perfect.  Overall, I would recommend this place to others visiting Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp cocktail

kBchGc2gKNA-yo5vioxn5w.text: I would not recommend this place. Very busy, loud, bad service, food items ok, & menu limited. Very disorganized, server brought our meals while having appetizers, we had to clear the table. Asked for a few items, salt & pepper, butter, had to ask several times. A lot of better choices, & probably cheaper & more variety.

hxy3D40BBCIw3-jEvikfMQ.text: Outstanding. Went in Saturday morning. Only about a five minute wait. The twenty-something sons were called in by the bottom-less mimosas, which got high reviews. They also shared the colossal Bloody Mary which was amazing.  The food was great as was the service (thanks Mark and Shawn).  The home fries were fantastic. Our group had the cinnamon roll waffle, protein omelet, chicken and waffle, brioche French toast, veggie omelet, and farm fresh eggs. Everything was unbelievably good. To top it off they brought out cake balls to celebrate 24 year-old's birthday. And they were the best ever.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0rDUievuEbsaVpLvHV-mTg.text: Highly recommended for brunch on the strip. Great food and service, and you can sit outside right on the strip!

Rdq-8t5cRXExaQkxQgyulw.text: This was my very first place where I bought alcohol with my ID on my 21st birthday :D I've been a fan of this place ever since (it used to be called sugar factory). It's actually been rebranded to HEXX and I think it's a positive change. This is a very trendy, clean place and a great place to people watch.  Food: I would definitely recommend their pizzaaaa. Yummm Drinks: Okay this is why I make a point to stop by on every vegas trip. You need to have "The HEXX" I think used to be called a chocolate martini. Best drink EVER. No seriously, you dont believe me try it for yourself! Also if you're in the mood for drinking more then the dried ice drinks are an experience I haven't had anywhere else. They prepare the drinks in front of you and because they put dried ice int he drinks, when they pour water over the drink there's so much fog that comes out.   It's conveniently located in the middle of the strip right in front of the bellagio fountains so you can sit outside, sip on your drink and watch the fountain show.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mmmmm
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Inside decor is classy

ugrYQytgVrx1P_2CLMWorg.text: Great food and ambience , a must stop if in Las Vegas salmon was cooked perfectly and mushroom risotto was so tasty .  Sit inside or outside doesn't matter great place great food and amazing service ...

HCdfA2mX8E4CZq6FqnfB-A.text: Tracee is the best server I could have had for my last morning in Vegas. She is beautiful with great energy! She gave us the best breakfast experience we have ever had. Protect her at all costs. I will always return to Hexx for Tracee!

5j64ee4tbTeXCnIXHsvJ6A.text: Trendy restaurant in the Paris Hotel and Casino. A lot of food options including dinners and tapas options. Outdoor dining allows you to watch the Bellagio water show from any seat really. You can watch from inside too as the patio is open to the dining room, that's really nice. The Sangrias were good! They have at least eight different kinds. I had the Salmon for dinner, it was delicious but the falafel was just alright.  Music is very loud, if you choose to sit inside, I think a lot of people complain about that, it really didn't bother me much but if want to have a conversation, it could be intrusive and definitely hard to hear. Solution is to sit outside. Band started around 9 pm and they were good, can't remember their name. Dessert was the most notable part of the evening at Hexx, chocolate cream brulee.

nRbvBVuNM6yUDc27-aY2mw.text: Great location. We sat outside over looking the strip. Quite lovely. We weren't looking for anything fancy more focused on atmosphere. Steak was delicious,burger was good enough. All in all a good evening for a casual simple meal.

cLWZ11I-1IdvE5m3BxPlxQ.text: We visited a few days ago, excellent service! We started with a round of drinks and the butter lettuce salad as an appetizer. For dinner he had the braised short rib entree and I had the gnocchi pomodoro. Both, cooked to perfection! Mine was bursting with flavors and his rib was falling off the bone, I had a bite and it melted like butter, delicious! He liked the brussel sprouts, but commented the mashed potatoes didn't wow him. We both had drinks, I went with The Hexx, a little  chocolate number that's delightful! Was told it's been changed a few times over the years before they feel they perfected it, well, I was very pleased with it. Only snapped one photo as we like to enjoy each others company versus staring at the phone, so just a drink shot..no meal ones. Trust me, you cannot go wrong in stopping here.  Our waiter was amazing, the server, crumber and busboy were very friendly and attentive. Very friendly staff, would highly recommend it! Plus is you can view the Bellagio fountains that go off every 30 minutes. Enjoyed our visit!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Hexx, speciality cocktail. Amazing!

7cvk8iZNz7SNIkO0tFDhEA.text: Delicious fries!! Loaded with gravy, cheese curds, shredded protein.... Omg. Completely worth the indulgence and a conversation starter for patrons around us who were quite envious of our order. So. Good.  To counter the cheese and grease, we also had salads that were quite good! My friend had the chicken Caesar & I had the green salad with the vinaigrette. Both were wonderful!   We closed our visit to Hexx with some amazing chocolates that came with our bill. Rich and satisfying, Hexx competes with top notch chocolatiers .  Service was wonderful. Cool environment. Great job, Hexx!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fries. Cheese curds. Gravy. Uhhhhhhhhhhh.

gkT1r_eNk7gRDayfvT2a2Q.text: My wife and I were looking for a place to eat breakfast with outdoor seating and found Hexx kitchen. I had the Colossal Bloody Mary which was one of the best Bloody Marys I've ever had. I also ordered the all meat omelet which was good as well but with the mere size of the Colossal the omelet was overkill. The outside patio was very nice with view of the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

mI9foOw4NCi2xl96mwsA1g.text: Super yummy food. Patio is very nice and comfortable and a great view to the Belagio fountains. The cake and shake dessert is bomb.

eLYdGWvDM9uylEqmQlC1uA.text: Only reason for the low rating was because of the service! Came here on a Wednesday morning when it wasn't busy at all. Food was OK.  Definitely would not go there if I am in the area.

zQei5tJW38MnYHhg05N4nA.text: First time here - my friend and I got a table out on the patio in the shade and next to the misters and couldn't have asked for a better place to people watch. We had bottomless mimosas and let's just say it was the perfect start for our weekend of debauchery. Tracee killed it! She never let our glasses empty - talk about a saint! If you come here for food and drinks, ask for her. She will take good care of you!

FVwQOWTegfluApHbUWeAiw.text: We stopped in to HEXX for lunch on a Monday around 12:30. The dining area was fairly large and we were seated without a wait. Servers were friendly and the restaurant had a nice air-conditioned view of the street to people watch. They have a patio section as well, but the shade was sparse at the time of our visit. I had the chicken Caesar salad, which was sizeable and fresh. Dining Partner had the grilled chicken sandwich and fries and he downed it quick. Our waters and ice teas were constantly filled. Great service, good food, great area and vibe.

fF0g446mDX4igRFulmpu3A.text: Was there for 30 minutes, ordered food and drinks accidentally spilt a drink and got kicked out. Laurie and Christen are horrible mangers which made us pay for food even though we did not eat anything and drinks that were brutal, would not recommend to anyone. Disrespectful and rude servers. ZERO OUT OF 5 STARS

TZsA9KBz4q7RgkgJMuJZTA.text: Tracee (with 2 E's) definitely made sure our large group was taken care of. She went the extra mile for  the Bride to be. Making sure our group really had a great time at this beautiful restaurant. Thank you Tracee

a6iCOGD-6RdAlkWGA3jIGQ.text: My rib eye was $39 without a side. I added a side of broccoli for $10. Not really worth it. Our food came out cold, our waiter gave me an unused steak knife left behind by the table next to us after they left. Water glasses are left on the tables to collect street dust which you then drink water from. Staff was apathetic at best. Will not be back. Expensive, lousy dinner.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PYGMxdYR_V5acTjoW34UeQ.text: So it was 2:30am and we wanted something to eat my 19 year old and I. My son wanted to try this place so I said why not. Wow so happy we did. I would definitely go back. This late they have small plates he got the Prime Rib Pierogi and I got the prosciutto flatbread. The pierogi is 4 pierogi's served with a horseradish sauce. The flatbread Had smoked provolone and arugula. I also go the Modern Sangria. Everything was so good my son took the first bit and he just grind and you can tell he was in another place. I let him taste my flatbread and he took a whole slice. It's great size to share. Both were full of flavor. The flatbread was crunchy and that prosciutto and the smoke cheese was perfect together to balance the fat in the prosciutto. Sangria was citrusy and wonderful. I would go again for breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_vW5db4PHCutu4ni3jLBxg.text: The service was amazing the bottomless mimosa were totally worth it. The portions are so big you do not need to eat much before you're full. Not one dish disappointed us. We visited 3 times during our visit.   The two hour drink limit for mimosas is a turnoff at first but honestly you will be satisfied and ready to leave after an hour. This is the first place that I've ever visited where the bottomless mimosa never actually reached the bottom.   It was amazing. Ask to sit in the booths, you will literally want to sleep there when you are done eating

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French Toast
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Short stack of thick fluffy pancakes

EWyleq8lReSyhcDlTibmdg.text: If you want to splurge in Vegas do it here. The prices are high but so is the food quality. I had the filet and my boyfriend had the wagu, their signature steak. Both were incredibly tender and perfectly cooked. We shared a spinach and artichoke dip to start which also hit the spot. Our waiter was attentive and not pushy with the menu which I appreciated. We didn't wait long for the food and were placed in an ideal location to watch the Bellagio fountain show a few times. They have patio seating which positions you perfectly. The meal was costly but a fair price in proportion to a fantastic dining experience.

AO3_OxUlrIJcTDGAYqM3TQ.text: Love this place! Bottomless mimosas....yes please! Cadillac Margaritas...yes please! Delicious breakfast dishes...hell yes! People watching... oh yes! Go there

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

VDc-jAkBEMi540tjuW09yw.text: Jessica L. and Felecia were amazing and so accommodating! Great service and so friendly. Bottomless mimosas were the best and Jessica made sure we got out money's worth! Amazing!!!

Iduqa8lge9B9J64jBK_BOg.text: The service was excellent and the food was decent enough.  I'm giving you three stars because of the additional charge you put on everyone's bill.  That 4% CNF Charge (Concession and Franchise Charge) that a lot of people probably never notice because most of your customers are tourists.  You are out of line for charging this additional fee.  I've eaten at many restaurants on the strip and not one of them has charged this additional fee.  You are ripping people off and I will never eat there again.  If you need to make more money then raise your already high prices on your menu.  The only reason why I didn't complain to the manager is because I had my mother with me and it was mothers day. She was enjoying herself and I didn't want to ruin it for her.

V0CZa5J96QK9YG9iKyEIhQ.text: The food was average.  The flavors just do not come through as you would think when you see the plate presentation.  Shrimp cocktail - overcooked and far too firm.  Should be moist and tender. Sliders - too many flavors and not able to focus your tastebuds  The best part of this place is you can sit outside and watch all of the nonsense going on on the strip!  Great place for people watching.

QlVxzzxNsxl56J1yXR6PCA.text: Trying this restaurant because the sign has sangria which is very good except the food which taste bland and service is awkward.  I ordered scallop ceviche which on the menu said has avocado, but come nothing.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Bmy1WPpNZPV5e8sxQ-3_2Q.text: I recently checked in last weekend for a bachelerotte party. We made reservations a few hours ahead of time and were able to accommodate us for dinner. When we arrived the view from the patio was spectacular, facing directly at the Bellagio fountains. As we were walking I saw that there are private areas as well. We were seated inside but still had a view of the fountains. The server was great, I wish i could remember her name she had glasses and was a brunette. She smiled the entire time and made sure we had what we needed. Now to the food and drink. I tried the prime wagyu burger, over roasted chicken and pizza. Everything was absolutely delicious and flavorful. My favorite part was the Elixir potion drink I had! My only complaint is that it was a bit sweet. Overall the experience at HEXX was great. I will definitely be returning in the future. I really want to try the brunch here.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZFqYtxJP6E7S4hwuC6OzUg.text: Nicely located restaurant. We requested to be seated on the balcony. It was a nice night and the restaurant sits right across from Bellagio so you're able to watch the water show every few minutes if you'd like. I love to people watch as well so it was nice for my hubby and I. Our waiter was a little inattentive. However, it was the end of the night so maybe he was just a little tired. I ordered the spaghetti carbonara that consisted of pepper smoked bacon, smoked fontina bechamel and a fried egg. I was pleased. Believe it or not, that bacon adds a different level of savory to the dish. Although I enjoyed it, I feel it was a bit overpriced but hey, it's Vegas. Hubby ordered the braised short ribs with horseradish, mash potato brussels sprouts and gremolata. Now THAT dish did it for me. The short ribs were sooooo tender and juicy...seasoned to perfection. I'd guess the chef who cooked them is somewhere from the south LOL. I almost felt like I was back at home! All and all nice experience.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vz_PBkEpkEuGsqpa81L9RQ.text: Tried this place out for brunch.  The carrot cake pancakes were different and worth a try, but overall I'd say the food and experience is just ok.  The location is good though, so if you're on the strip and looking for a breakfast place that's open pretty early, its a good option.

E72SNQ4oBt4pMov3onQ3kw.text: I yelped this place and the carrot cake pancakes really caught my attention, I couldn't wait to visit Vegas to try this place out, I'm glad I did, I ordered carrot cake pancakes and they did not disappoint, they were so good, food and service was amazing so the hubby and I went here 2 days in a row ..

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Fb8vjlNaVM8ydm6OKFsdnQ.text: Me and my brother went to Hexx for Saturday brunch. Mostly, we wanted the bottomless mimosas for $23, served until 2 pm. The brunch looked good though, so we thought we would give it a try.   The place was crazy packed. We were super happy we made a reservation, but still had to wait a bit to be seated. The restaurant was really loud from the DJ music. We were sitting pretty far, and could still barely hear each other. Not a bad thing at a bar, but not my favourite for brunch when I want to talk.   The bottomless mimosas were a good deal. They bring around a pitcher to fill up your glass, and we had about 4 by the time we left. The prosecco was a bit flat and the OJ was cheap, but I expected that. The food was pretty awesome too. I had the chicken and waffles, served with house made pickles and syrup. So yum. The chicken was crispy on the outside, juicy on the inside. The waffle was a bit dry, but the syrup helped. I liked the touch of the pickles, which cuts the heavy meal. I really enjoyed it. My brother had a chicken Sandwich and he really enjoyed his meal too.   I would give the place 4 stars, but something just felt off about the atmosphere. Could have been the loud music and cold server, but I can't quite put my finger on it.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Really yummy chicken and waffles

y3EwnG03LPjWfCJDrJ7Uag.text: We ended up here as a last minute decision and it was great!  You are sitting right on the Las Vegas strip so the people watching is of course amazing.  The service was great! Our waitress was very attentive!  They offer bottomless mimosa (this was a Sunday) and they are seriously bottomless! You NEVER wait for a refill.  I don't know if my glass ever went empty.  They have people constantly walking around ensuring your mimosa is full!  This is always nice if you are paying the extra price.  The food was also very good.  The portions are large and the prices are reasonable.  I find it hard to narrow down a good place for brunch, but I highly recommend checking this place out!

no35HBif01vtddmVXY-2Iw.text: Revisited Hexx for brunch. Business is located at Paris Las Vegas.   Easy to get seated at 1030am mid-week. We scored a table on the patio overlooking Las Vegas Boulevard.   Quickly was met by our server assistant to get introductions and waters. Server arrived a few minutes later to gather drink orders.  Ordered a twisted sticky bun for the table and meat omelet as my dish.  Bun arrived soon after and was piping hot! A twited cinnamon bun rolled into a circle and baked. Then, topped with brown sugar, cream cheese frosting and toasted pecans. The warm frosting oozed over crevices and intothe bun as we cut into the dish. Highly recommended for those with a sweet tooth.   Dishes arrived soon after. Meat omelet was bountiful. Musthave included 3 eggs, stuffed with bacon, chicken, pork and sausage, with cheddar cheese. Dish is served with an English muffin and home fries. Home fries are smashed and seasoned new potatoes flash fried. A hearty addition to the dish.  Servers were friendly and attentive to our needs.   Would definitely return to explore this brunch menu again.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat Omelet
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Twisted Sticky Bun
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Flatbread Carpaccio

obwpMb1oc7qjMK_W635WFw.text: Very poor service today, 11/10 at 1 pm. I waited about 25 minutes.  The hostess stated I could eat at the bar,  however the waiters stated " we don't service here," then the hostess stated they do. They had several tables thst needed to be cleaned,  yet no one was cleaning them and several tables were empty.  several customers left as well for poor service! POOR SERVICE  Hire more people!

kJ7Bte65phd-AacirD3ZWg.text: Great service, food and drinks.   The restaurant is located right on the Strip inside the Paris across from the Bellagio fountains. A great view to watch the fountain show sitting inside or out on the patio. It was a little loud inside.  Self parking is available in the hotel parking garage or main valet in front of the hotel.  They are open 24 hours! The menu offerred a lot of variety. The menu focuses on dishes made from fresh, quality-sourced ingredients.   It was a Tuesday night at 10pm and the place is still packed, that's a good sign.  Drinks are pricey, ranges $15- $36. The food came out quick. The sliders and cocktails were tasty!  Our waitress was friendly and attentive, even with it being a busy night.   Make sure you go next door for the chocolate.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ZrJ6cqkFL6fIxwLw5oWlrA.text: I'm so sad! So much has changed within a few months. And not very good.   Apparently they offer brunch.. and ONLY brunch until 4pm - which is when the dinner menu is out. Who eats brunch til 4?  Anyways. We came in wanting something savory and healthy - unfortunately our options were heapingly sweet and big/unhealthy options around lunch time. Boo. So we left and chose another restaurant.   That same weekend, we came in around 2am.. they have a VERY limited menu late at night. Which is ok. But how UNFRESH the seafood were.  We had the lobster sandwich (think of a lobster in between two biscotti's for size comparison) and a flat and left out Caesar salad with no dressing.  We ALWAYS get their cocktail shrimps because they're amazing - but in his case they tasted like old fish and was warm...   And we had the hummus, stale "pita bread".   I'll also add we were intoxicated by quickly sobered up after tasting how awful the quality of their food had changed Just because it was late night. It really made us think was our $100 bill worth it for these 3 items? Probably not. Really disappointed because we've had much better but just during a different time - but quality shouldn't change just because high traffic times do.

IiAYi_TxgrOorEfgFi7Rew.text: This review is only for their happy hour (daily 2pm-6pm, nightly 11pm-3am; 20% off starters and pizza on brunch and dinner menus). I didn't think the happy hour menu was that great because even during happy hour the prices were still a little on the steeper side, even for Vegas. They have a seating section just for happy hour so make sure you ask where to sit and the employees will direct you.   We ordered the spinach artichoke dip and the carbonara pizza. The spinach artichoke dip came with bagel chips which I've never seen before. The dip was delicious but I'm not sure how I felt about the bagel chips. I think I would've preferred just regular tortilla chips instead, but the best thing was by far the dip. Just be careful as it's really hot when it comes out! The carbonara pizza was good as well. I liked the bacon on top and the crust was nice and light. It was a good happy hour shareable.   For four people, these two dishes filled us up (granted we weren't that hungry) and it was a nice place to have a drink and chat.

VjgxIIJxmQlTrTcjHfeRDg.text: Casually upscale restaurant with nice outdoor seating perfect for ppl watching. Portions are pretty small so I wouldn't come super hungry, but flavors were pretty good. They also have a decent wine listing with a variety of options.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ttkzX2EvXfBzNijscwuH6g.text: Rachel was my waitress today and she was amazing she was so sweet and great at her job! She kept my bottomless mimosa always topped off! The entire staff was extremely friendly and kind! I got the carrot cake pancakes and they were the best carrot cake pancakes I've EVER HAD! My husband got the corned beef hash and OMG it was sooooooooooooo good! It was like a corned beef hash Benedict. It's these perfectly hashed browns with corned beef and seasoning a peppercorns and peppers. It's hard to explain it but the poached eggs were beyond perfection and topped with the most heavenly hollandaise sauce! The flavors of everything in this dish are perfectly balanced and the flavors explode in your mouth since they left some of their spices whole like peppercorns. It's the most beautiful corned beef hash I've ever had. Hexx is a very friendly and inviting restaurant! I really think rachel went above and beyond to make our experience special! I can't wait to come back!!

Uv7Ouj8ZZwmLJQE755ribg.text: Came here for brunch, good food and great service. Our waitress Vanessa was amazing !!

hvoA_DDsAgA5xk3VKJZ69g.text: Vanessa was by far the best waitress EVER! Great customer service !!! Totally will be back here again ! The food is also great ! Delicious

PcTuvt2QrsW8GyvkOySk8w.text: Meh. Price was regular for the strip. Drinks were a bit absurd. 1 fountain Pepsi and 1 coffee were $4.95 a piece and neither were refilled after our initial one although both were empty- so not sure if it is $4.95 for each fill or the staff was too busy- which was prolly the case because they seemed slammed!!! Our bartender was very nice and as on top of it as she could be but she is not an octopus and had like 90 tables sit at once . Food was regular. Not bad, nothing to write home about. If you're hungry and don't feel like going elsewhere, might as well.
