_m7dFsuwzzYVnVIoiSnkhQ.text: I can not say enough good things about this place.  Especially about our server Apollo. I think he may be the best server we have ever had. Such a great guy.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

NlrZhcTUadY9zOtlmPE4cg.text: Last minute decided to eat here for brunch because they have a bottomless mimosa option, but my boyfriend and I went with a few drink orders instead. I loved their spicy Bloody Mary vodka, and their Pinky Swear sangria pitcher was SUPER good, like too good....like i want to keep drinking it and you can easily get drunk-off-of-Grenache good. We decided to share the Jumbo Lump Crab Cake and the Carbonara pizza, both of which were very yummy choices. The service was on point, and they even gave me a free chocolate ice cream cupcake for my birthday hehe. What really gives this place the five stars it deserves is the spectacular view of the strip and the Bellagio fountain water show going off every 30 minutes. The decor is very classy and cute with the football game playing on every corner (football Sunday!!!). Love, love, loved it! I will definitely be back in the future to enjoy some bottomless mimosas in the heart of Las Vegas.

IAlyfM7a1qmEB-hmukRZrA.text: Amazing food and service. Had the French toast and it was perfectly fluffy and not too sweet. The sangria needed more alcohol but other than that it was great

nLA9d17jlCYUDWyGSAGa9g.text: I came here for brunch as a party of 5 on a Tuesday. Not busy at all! We walked in from the sidewalk on the Strip. You can enter from inside Paris Hotel too. We checked in and was seated within 5 minutes. I guess we had to wait because we requested foe patio seating and they had to set up our table. Once we were seated, a bus boy asked us what we would like drink. Our waitress came a few minutes after to get our order but we needed additional time since I came with my family (don't speak much or read English). We all shared and decided to order:   Hexx Eggs Benedict (5/5) - I really enjoyed this because it came with scalloped potatoes instead of an English Muffin. I usually don't like English muffins so it was a win for me!  Carrot Cake Pancakes (3/5) - These were just okay. It was pretty much what I expected. Maybe even a little healthy sneaking in some carrots to the pancakes. LOL. Sausage & Egg Breakfast Pizza (2/5) - I couldn't really taste the egg. The pizza was a little salty. It was just alright. This also gets cold really easily so if you eat it ASAP then maybe it would be better.  Crab Cake (4/5) - I don't usually like this but I thought this was executed well. Lots of crab meat and the aioli sauce went well with it. Not too heavy if you share it with someone.  Veggie Omelet (1/5) - plain 'ol omelet, so if you're into an overpriced omelet, enjoy. Not much flavors, even I can make a better omelet.   As I was ordering though, the waitress kept asking me if I wanted to add stuff to my order. Little did I know, each item I added would be an additional charge. Example, she asked me if I wanted avocado to my omelet or if I wanted an english muffin with my benedict. Anything added was an additional charge so be careful!   This place was ok. Not much to rave about for brunch. The service was actually kind of slow too. The waitress took a good 15 minutes before she got my aunt's coffee.

1t85Undi9fAfxk_MiFoqhA.text: Hexx saved the day...or at least breakfast for us on the last day of our trip! We had planned to eat breakfast at The Henry in our hotel but were so disappointed to see it closed for a facelift. That's when I remembered Hexx and how badly I'd wanted to try it.  I was worried we wouldn't get in without a reservation on a Saturday morning but we only had to wait 10 minutes to be seated (it would've been more if we had wanted to sit outside). The Yelp pictures of the food here kill me; my god everything looks amazing. I ordered the Chiliquales and my husband got the Farm fresh eggs which is basically an all american breakfast with the works. Everything tasted as good as it looked and we saw at least five other things we would've liked to try on the menu for next time. But the kicker was the Flamingo Punch we ordered to share. I had heard of the famous Hexx potion drinks but I had never seen the one we ordered. Our waitor was stopped a few times as he brought the rose gold disco ball filled with our cocktail to our table. We got a lot of questions about what it was from passerby and nearby tables as well, but who can blame them? We had a giant, shiny disco punchbowl at our table! The drink was amazing and definitely something to share. We got ~8 glasses each for my husband and I out of that order (don't quote us on the number since we got too boozy and stopped counting after round 4). Come here for a one of a kind Vegas dining experience that's for sure. We will be back guarenteed!

B2Y9FO4DOI-bKNU4r2i1nQ.text: Popped in for breakfast on a beautiful Sunday morning. Sat on the patio with two other guests. My husband ordered the carrot cake pancakes and my mom and I had the three egg breakfast. The coffee was awesome, best I've had in quite a while. My breakfast was good. My husband loved the pancakes. Our waiter was a tad slow at the end of the meal with our bill, but it was a lovely morning and we weren't in a rush...though the people waiting on tables may have been. (Lol) Overall, great place to enjoy the weather and have some breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Three egg breakfast

gPTJKUkivQlzWmPVRqOhZw.text: 2nd time going here for brunch, I'll make it a must each time I come to Vegas. The drinks are great! I couldn't remember the exact name of my meal but it was like a turkey sandwich except on waffles, well anyway it was bomb.com!!!

pPk3yTaOR3vxHfPXAiwhRw.text: Our favorite meal in Vegas!! The brunch was delicious. $14 for a huge meal of eggs bacon and many sides. We opted for the bottomless mimosas and they did not disappoint! Well worth the money and such a great atmosphere.

1RGpewI16dMMFrjZD31POA.text: I really enjoyed this restaurant! I took my grandma and came for an early 5pm dinner prior to a show. The restaurant is modern, trendy, and decorated in light colors with green and brown accents. Very "California" beach vibe. There are both patio and indoor seating so you can overlook the Bellagio Fountains. There are misters all around the patio to keep you cool as well.   The menu has a nice selection of American food. For our appetizer we had the calamari in buffalo sauce and ranch, a twist on the typical calamari dish. We also had a large crab cake with chili aioli. For our entrees I had the filet with mashed potatoes and my grandma had the veal with mushroom risotto. Both were fantastic. The portions are very large here as well.   The absolute best part of my night was the dessert!! I cannot rave enough about the hazelnut chocolate pudding. OMG SO GOOD. Our server, Denise was very kind, friendly, and checked on us multiple times throughout the meal.   I will be recommending this more often for dinner.

_IIR-P5LoN8Vg159ygNbiw.text: My sister and I went for a girls trip back in Nov 2018. This was our first stop to kick off our trip. We came in with a Groupon for a charcuterie plate and bottle of wine. Everyone was so helpful!! Our server was Maria. She was super friendly, attentive, and welcoming. The charcuterie plate was THE best I've ever had. And I've had a lot. It's probably our favorite thing to order on any menu. Hexx does it best. Truly. Everything on it was so flavorful and delicious. The berry compote is the best thing ever, I think about it every single day. If you're visiting Hexx for the first time, order the CHEESE!!! Excited to go back and try more off the menu!

qHj6Sb4p_0o-0Q56K_BSeA.text: Such a great brunch stop. If you are awake in Vegas in time for brunch, get over to Hexx and enjoy wonderful service with your delicious food. The bar is great and I recommend Eggs Benedict.

I really love that they took over the Sugar Factory and made it into a lounge! With live music!! Thank you Christian and your Amazing staff for a great night!

KISfr2iSkz_sluu9noUa0w.text: Hexx was able to accomadate a large party at short notice and split checks.   Oh, and the food was great too.  I had a special cocktail to start with.  I can't remeber the name but it was a bourbon based beverage.  Delicious.  I started with a salad and had the short rib appitizer.  The short ribs where tender and delicous.  Everyone in our party was pleased with their order.  No famous chef's name, but damn fine meal.

h0ZeY2TstbPfllpzixLdGQ.text: Came here for brunch before I went back home. Apolo served us. Greatest server I've had! Must request him! The food great and the service was very attentive. We had bottomless mimosa. Must go! Butttt, make sure to request Apolo you won't regret it, he'll make your day! Thanks Apolo we appreciate you!!!!

4-HFusofakId7O9IWScOUg.text: Good food and good service. Venue is cute too! We went in a large group for a batchlorette party and everything went really well, would recommend for large groups or as a cute date spot!

Lvgi61OHC4aGPKr8HQKRtg.text: Great service, good food, and sweet ambience. I think the steak menus are a better deal compared to pasta or anything else.

SrG13pWNIV9W0HnULQysHw.text: Wow! Hexx was the perfect place to get the morning started. Between our server, Tracee, the food, and the amazing drinks, our party had an fantastic time. Tracee woke us up and had us all ready to start the weekend right. The food was great, our party of 6 got an assortment of foods, but everything was delicious. Overall I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking for a good time and good food.

38HUCXjM9qSkAsX8_U46tQ.text: This was really good food, but Tracee really did an awesome job. An amazing server with a killer sense of humor and great taste in music. We would absolutely come here again!

Ia3jsaod9VJkIAl8eBaiOQ.text: This was one of my favorite restaurant s we ate at.. I wanted to go back a second time.. everything we got was amazing and the view was great... I would highly recommend this place for any meal..

tYNHfGVQRtRNw83FuM6wCw.text: What a beautiful spot!   Our server was Taylor, and she was the best! I'm not one for getting brunch drinks before noon, but she mentioned that they can make their Bloody Mary with a spicy vodka and I was SOLD. It was actually my first Bloody Mary and it was spectacular.   The restaurant itself is lovely- and even though it was full in there, you could still hear your tablemates just fine. I got the Belgian waffle with fruit (Lovely) and my boyfriend got the eggs benedict, which is served on scalloped potatoes instead of an english muffin. I would have stolen his food, but I was too stuffed after devouring my own.   We will absolutely be back the next time we're in Vegas, and I'm definitely asking for Taylor again! That girl knows her drinks!

fEeLYAXhAHvITnnrEabRZA.text: This place was amaaaaaazing!!  Drinks: 4 Stars Citrus & Bubbles: 4 stars, very delicious Brown Ale on tap (something something dog brown ale) 4 stars, also very delish  Appetizer: 5 Stars Cheese & Charcuterie: holy moly. The pretzel: baked just right. Cheese homemade jelly (caution: super sweet)  mustard great   Entrees: 3.5 Stars Pepperoni Pizza: 3.5, not bad Hexx Burger: 3.5 stars, meat patty was cooked perfectly  Dessert: 5 Stars Ecuadorian Brownie with Vanilla Ice Cream (comes with coffee ice cream): 5 stars, the best brownie/ice cream combo I have ever eaten  Service: 5 stars Our server JP was amaaaaazing, came by at the right times, gave great recommendations, gave us a sample of their Ecuadorian milk chocolate when he dropped off the bill, great personality!!

I recommend to sit inside even tho everyone wants to sit outside !!! Get one of there special hexxx drinks you won't regret it.

1elOir2ucuHkXNE6NCoRsw.text: TRACEE is bad and boujee and kept us bad and boozie!!! Thanks, Tracee. You da best.   Killing it.

rjVjBGmkk_qdOAYKl-XbMA.text: NOT COOL - I had a huge allergic reaction from the Roasted Branzino, that did not state it had any PEANUTS in it, the manager (whom I will leave nameless) defended his staff and only gave me a meaningless, pathetic "sorry".  Hexx is a very modern restaurant in the heart of the Las Vegas strip, where there's a field of vision outward to the Dancing Fountains at the Bellagio.  THE STAFF -  The menus are quite small and very disposable, so I could see why they would not label their dishes' ingredients.  But who's fault is that to go the cheap route? I insisted the Manager (whom I will leave nameless) to start labeling all ingredients on his menu; but, for him it was not the case, he promised that there were no peanuts, then minutes later he consulted me saying there are only pistachios.  What a liar.  Vanessa, our waitress, was very attentive, sweet, and looked like she actually cared when she saw me choking up and breathing heavily after eating my branzino THAT HAD PEANUTS IN IT - she took off the price to my fish and tomato bisque which was so generous her, but she deserved a bigger tip, so we decided to give her an 80% tip.  THE FOOD -   Roasted tomato bisque was utter perfection!!! Seriously the best, it gave me a hedonistic sensation of nostalgic feelings.  I loved the consistency of the tomato bisque, and the creativity of the dish.  The Crab Cake was another appetizer we ordered, which had a subtle citrus savor to it but did not overpower the dish itself which takes a lot of work. The garnish on the other hand was a bit over seasoned which is an honest mistake for a 3.5 star restaurant.  The Roasted Branzino, oh lord, what can I say that I haven't already? Well the fish was glistening, cooked to perfection, but once I took a bite of the diced peanuts that were sprinkled on top, it was game over.  I had to take my dish back after choking and heaving, and watch my date enjoy his lovely looking ribeye the rest of the meal.  Total public humiliation and a shame.   The Ribeye was ordered by my date, whom I was envious the entire time; watching each delectable piece evaporate from his plate to his mouth and the aromas of perfectly seasoned meat infiltrate my nostrils.  It's a bit rude to ask for a taste, but I did - and I was not embarrassed at all! A girl's Gotta eat, i finished 2/3rd's of his rib eye in moments.  I really wanted to love this place, my tomato bisque was astounding, but I can't accept pitiful behavior from a manager who denies accusations when it comes to him, then apologize for his so called "miscommunication". My review might not matter in this vast internet world, but I do hope I might save a life or two.

Zwmx__qcKJT2bHk9gnSPeA.text: Awesome brunch! The sangria flight is a must, they have so many delicious flavors!! The food and service were absolutely wonderful!

oz6g7mpxGGhuXcVlNvG-lg.text: Amazing food, so delish that it has left us speechless. And to top that, our waitress Tracee was super fantastic on every level. She made our dining experience the best yet in Vegas!

vPlFKTXCAHOnMVzd9kCXMA.text: Second time in vegas, first time eating at hexx and it did not disappoint...our server tracee was the best server we had on our trip..she came in doing cart wheels while holding the food lol, that's how good she was. Very entertaining, and sociable. We will be back on our next trip to vegas.

rrFr7AWY0gmyFnkCQbC_Bw.text: Went here for brunch with some friends during Memorial Day weekend and needless to say, it did not disappoint! We ordered several dishes and desserts which were all delicious! I will def be back here next time I'm in Vegas

zkbPdISq-EFfKsDiGhY-FQ.text: Expensive but worth it.  Mac n cheese and chicken sliders were amazing.   Fantastic viewing of the Bellagio fountains as well.

X69b7PlIEgoP1llcFmFPVA.text: It was a busy Saturday morning, President's weekend.   We had hoped with the warm weather to sit outside and people watch while having breakfast, but they were hopping and we opted for a seat at the bar.   Very attentive staff.   I ordered a simple eggs over easy, with the usual english muffin etc along with a very well made Irish Coffee.  It was vacation afterall!  My friend ordered the croissant ham and cheese sandwich which she added eggs to (recommendation of the bartender).    Croissant was well made,  crispy outside and perfect inside, along with a large portion of ham, cheese, avocado and perfect eggs.  Portions in both case were fairly large.  Everything came out quickly despite the crowds.   Highly recommend if you are looking for a great breakfast on the strip.

2ZXLfKzycfSmpS7GEYdd2w.text: We had a groupon for this restaurant and went as a group of four on a Wednesday evening. It was bustling inside but we were seated immediately even though we didn't have reservations. You can tell right away that the restaurant has a classy/sort of upscale ambiance, but without the pricetag of other high end restaurants in Vegas.  We got the mushroom pizza to share which was a tad bit salty but still very tasty. The mac and cheese was amazing! Perfect warm cheesy goodness topped with a slightly crusty layer. We also got the purple haze cocktail which is huge so be prepared to share that with a few other people. They add the dry ice at the table which is pretty cool to watch. Our waitress was extremely attentive and very quick. She refilled our waters multiple times during the evening and was very efficient getting our orders and bringing them out. Overall great experience.

JN4pBVEE915gORduoS50zw.text: so the service wasn't all that great, but they were extremely busy, so totally understandable. their alcoholic beverages are yummy! I can't remember which one I got though. and their eggs benedict, along with the steak and eggs, and waffles were finger licking good. definitely would go back

RMI1NL7QJptUfv2VmAmBPw.text: Service was very slow. Food was very bland. Came here because it said vegan friendly and our friend is vegan.......they have one "vegan" option. Don't waste your time. Too many better places to eat in vegas before wasting a meal on this place.

Cl1L957EKgQtW-c6MlRZHQ.text: My go to spot..overall...can't wait to go again.... Staff is very professional and courteous. The food is great. It's a nice outdoor or indoor place to take your significant other. Nice portion of food and the price is decent. The staff is extremely attentive, constantly coming to see if your satisfied or need anything.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster  roll,French fries, cranberry juice &amp; bake potatoes steak with English muffin &amp; orange juice...Brunch

gDujyCOQfRO3iuba0gxyzg.text: The brocollini was out of this world! Our waitress, Tracee, was super attentive, fun and had an adorable smile and laugh. The patio was awesome for people watching, the food was super yummy and the whole experience wanted us to come back!  Thanks, Tracee for the suggestion about coming back in the evening for mash potatoes! They were the perfect midnight snack- & so delicious!!! (They should be available 24/7!!!)

TFD3QSQ22LqKwxzfBc5Hjw.text: We sat in the bar because it said service right away, our server was not the friendliest, the guy filling our coffee and water was a lot nicer. The food was ok, the ham and cheese croissant was nothing special, their smashed potatoes were good though. Next time will choose a different place

3GUv2GTGUCrpWP4eMlKqew.text: I loved the Sugar Factory and was sad to see it go... But I had such a great experience here that I didn't care! My friend and I shared a cheese platter that was tasty, simple of course. We also had a delicious mango cocktail that was on special and cheap! The highlight of everything- dessert. We ordered 2 sundaes (they were both. HUGE, but we wanted to try a bit of both!) Bake Sale and Birthday Cake. They were heavenly. Everything you would want if you have a sweet tooth!!!! The service was also outstanding. I'll definitely be planning a dinner here with friends on my next trip!

nkE9VKI5JREWmXs7x2jrGA.text: I thought meal was OK.. Very small portions and a lil pricy.. Overall staff was good but some had no courtesy. I will not return.

QRnI8elFa17gMtTIkERUHQ.text: Joanna was our waitress and she was absolutely phenomenal!!! There was an increased number of people because it's raining outside (IT NEVER RAINS) and many people had to move inside who were on both wait lists. When Joanna came to introduce herself and apologize for the issue she was more than accommodating and made us relax from a hectic travel experience just to get here. The restaurant is extremely clean and price aware for being in vegas. I appreciate the value of training they have done on all employees and they accommodated by a free appetizer. Great work Hexx!

dGr9KpPtnx4XL-3Eim7mgg.text: Walking in, the restaurant is bright and spacious. We had reservations and we sat immediately, which was really pleasing.  It was only a few moment after being seated that, Tomas - one of our table helpers, came to introduce himself and offer some waters. The entire time he was super friendly and accommodating. He checked on us frequently but not overwhelmingly. A++ for Tomas!   Josh, our server, came to take our order and was very helpful! He was also very friendly and quick with everything we needed. Another 110%!  I ordered a ham and cheese croissant sandwich (which Josh recommended to add an egg; do it!) And it was huge with some delicious potatoes! Omg, so yummy!  The manager later came to check on us which was really nice as well.  Great food. Wonderful service - thank you Josh and Tomas!

dra_9fUvUtFwmiNqX4S7zQ.text: Fabulous bottomless mimosas! It was very busy and  our server Tracee took great care of us!

PZ2bkkCA_ZHfmnbZCJz37g.text: From a local's perspective: AWESOME!  Came here on a Tuesday evening during the week of the fight weekend so there was a decent crowd already in town.  Made an easy reservation on their website.  We were immediately seated on the patio along the strip as we requested.  The table offered stunning views of the strip looking directly at the Bellagio fountains as the canons went off every 15 minutes.  Tom was our server who was phenomenal. He was positive, quick, and knowledgeable of the menu.  We enjoyed a bottle of cab reasonably priced at $60, the meatballs ($15), the margarita pizza ($16), and the flourless brownie ($10).  Everything tasted great.  The pizza was a little cold but did have a lot of flavor and the brownie was very VERY rich, you'll only want a couple of bites.  All in all a great experience.  Will definitely be back.  P.S.  We entered in from the casino where there was no hostess at the stand so we had to walk through the restaurant to the other entrance just off the strip.

y8tA4qZl2zStlyZP2uERCA.text: I am a local and love this place. Today I had the Chinese chicken salad and the candied Bacon, they were both delicious. Sean was my server. He is very professional and always has a smile on his face. Makes the lunch more enjoyable.  I strongly recommend this place.

iuspqOJP8YIUmZBpFLrBBg.text: Traycee and Ceecee were INCREDIBLE. They made the experience amazing and I can't wait to come back here the next time I'm in Vegas!!! Impeccable service!!!

JWZQtOUL9_H-uTobOP8cTA.text: Everything here is great - you can't go wrong with anything you order. Melissa is the best - Try to get seated in her section!. I hope they open a Hexx in LA soon...

wo0YiY4Zo_D9qaZ4aThzgg.text: We ate here for brunch and our server Sean was outstanding! We will always request to sit in his section. Delicious food, great atmosphere and view of Bellagio fountains.

6yBxfna7VpIV3EPtIL3law.text: The service was good. Our waiter was nice. View was good. It was the food that was not so great.  I ordered the "spicy jambalaya." I tried jambalaya in Louisiana and really liked it so I thought it would be a safe choice. The spicy jambalaya at Hexx kitchen was easily 4x saltier than what I had at other authentic restaurants. I thought there was some kind of mistake and the chef accidentally poured a lot of pepper and salt onto the dish. The waiter was nice and tried to bring us extra rice, but the rice unfortunately was also almost just as salty.   This is the first time I have ever complained about a dish because I just could not stomach it down. I drank 4 cups of water and still was not able to finish the meal.   If you do decide Hexx Kitchen, I would stay away from Spicy Jambalaya unless you like super salty food.

dbNF_6Vt7sZqEifmXcFumQ.text: Hexx was delicious! What really makes a restaurant great is the service and they had just that! Our server, Sean, was wonderful! We never had to wait to ask for anything. Always on top of making sure our needs were meet! I'd come back just for his service!

9b2JhSwn1pk3_OBe6TkfCg.text: There breakfast menu was amazing. I had the eggs Benedict and it was amazing. Our waitress Clare went above and beyond. She helped us with everything from choosing drinks to food. I would definitely come back! Thanks to Clare!

r1hI0vG2Y0jOTIZYjXfQJg.text: I can't comment that on the food or drinks. The service was hilariously horrible. The hostesses suggested we go into the bar for happy hour pricing at about 3:30 on a Friday. We went in and sat at the bar. We waited 5 minutes and had some menus delivered. We were then ignored for 15 more minutes. So we left. The bar was not crowded. Does this fly in Vegas?

9dY45c0tWeTpIPVnaQFNSg.text: The food was amazing, the service was outstanding (and I work customer service so I have high expectations) and it was a 5 star experience for sure. Highly recommend eating here if your on he strip

0mwXQAUtK79szBN6GT39WA.text: So there we were , sitting at our lovely table when Julia  (the server) walked up and asked "how we were". Let me tell you ! Julia was the highlight of our day . She made us feel welcome and she even listened to our fabulous stories. She was so sweet and excited to serve us . She made our experience great we forsure will be back.

ZBc9XSFlH3RrwKwiYbQtQQ.text: The food was great the service was so slooooowwww unfortunately. When the staff was around they were really nice and helpful. Unfortunately it took about 10 mins to get our drink order, (the place was not full btw) once we got our drink order, it took 30 mins to get our food order in, another 30 mins to GET our food. We did get an apology for the wait with our food, that was nice :) we never got our water refilled. We arrived at 2:30 and it's 4:00 pm now. We are waiting for our cc back let's see how long that takes. I wish we had had a better experience because like I said the food was terrific!

Eg_IRYu9Ciu4oOPjq2zx3w.text: It would have been a 5, but they charge a resort fee tax in the restaurant! Vegas is just trying to take all our money.

VH-7gONgYscISEubNOx4gg.text: Santa here,   Hexx had me Hexx ed!   Nice place,  will come back. Staff was nice,  food was great.  Love ya all

7IuxNT7tl4sa4my5664LWw.text: This was a fun spot for our late night dinner upon arriving at the Paris Hotel. There was no wait and we were able to sit outside. Great view of the Bellagio fountains. The food was good, though we both just got burgers because we were so tired from travel. We shared one of the big cocktails with dry ice, which was fun and very easy to drink. Our waitress was lovely! Excellent service.

tafwn23sDGZS4fsNlIizMA.text: Breakfast was awesome!    We had chicken and waffles, French toast and the berry bowl. Everything was fresh and good.   Wouldn't hesitate to go there again.

XiwsWtXhpBgVTLhqYLqYqQ.text: Good food.  Service was a bit missing.  Waitress was friendly. Drink took a little too long.  Music was a little too loud and kept playing the same millennial stuff over and over.

RKFBhyFuJU5hbkrnASTpIA.text: The Hexx is a cool spot to go if you are in Vegas. It's perfect for any occasions and it can be as fancy as you want to make it (if you want to dress up) or as casual as you can come. The environment in the restaurant is fantastic. The employees here are the best employees in Vegas, they are energetic, and have a positive attitude and always with a smile. Our servers Sean and Charles were attentive, friendly and really took care of us really well. The food, the food was AMAZING! I had the Pepperoni Pizza and it was perfect, my friend had the Carrot Pancakes and they are to die for! Next time I'm in Vegas I'll for sure hit this spot again.

AxX8L4QcTPUjqjtqIFaYPQ.text: We reserved for 9 + a high chair for lunch indoors. We got there on time and figured that they had given our table to someone else. They tried to seat us on a high table where we couldn't have the child sit at the table or said they'd seat us out doors. When we declined to take the high table and refused to sit outside in the hot Vegas sun with a 2 year old; they asked to wait and was not able let us know how soon they could give us a lower table indoor. The girl at the front unapologetically stated that reservations are not a guarantee for a table instead of apologizing and trying to arrange a table. We decided to take our business elsewhere. Extremely pathetic service.

FJXA5DA1xCEfTFblfb9-sQ.text: I am giving this restaurant 1 star because of their poor service and the food quality. Took my mom here for her birthday and expected to have an unforgettable memory for her. We ordered a rib eye steak with well done temperature and mussel, scallop rice curry. We waited an hour for our order to be delivered and they delivered a pizza instead!!!! I told the waiter that " this is not my food and please check again with our server. Our server- Megan came over and talked to me like "I heard you guys didn't want your food". How rude is that?!? I told her that we ordered a steak instead and reminded her to double check her notes. She looked at her notes, felt embarrassed and said "okay, I will put in your order" with a bad attitude. She didn't even apologize for her mistakes!!! So unprofessional! Then, our steak came out and looked like a piece of coal. My mom and I could taste the carbon dioxide on the outside of the steak! I called Megan again to return my food and she gave me impolite and incooperate attitude. 20 mins later, the manage came over and gave us the bill. She said "we took out the steak" and here is the bill. I asked her to explain, she said "we don't want to make your order the third time". The manager was also unprofessional. I showed the picture of the steak and her face was just stern, no reply, no apology. My mom was ruined, everyone got pissed off at this unprofessional services and over-priced food. Never come back here and spend a penny on your restaurant!

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

0VRzYrgR4HAr8IL0aZ8ZSQ.text: This place was good but overall a little over priced IMO.  Stopped here for our first breakfast of our trip in Vegas. I ordered the bottomless mimosas ($24), and split a turkey club with my mom. My stepdad and husband split the Johnny Cakes.  --Turkey Club- this has turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and was on a cranberry challah bread. Overall a great sandwich but not the best I have ever had. I think the bread was the best part. The turkey was low quality you could tell but I still liked it. It also came with fries that were pretty good.  --Johnny Cakes - I tried these and they were pretty good, a little doughy for my liking, but my stepdad said that is how they are supposed to be so maybe I am just not a Johnny Cake fan lol. They reminded me of pancakes made out of cornbread.  --Mimosas - Although they were really good, $24 is the most I have ever paid for bottomless haha. But then again, we WERE in Vegas.  Pretty good restaurant but I think Mon Ami Gabi is better.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mimiosa
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Turkey Club

58qnrOawYnUSHP6dDGOlbA.text: Yup, these desserts were the first things we ate at 11:30 am in the morning. I don't have a sweet tooth so I tend to shy away from eating sweet desserts, but I caved in and came here.   I had the Budino which was a massive oval shaped dessert. The chocolate was light and the sweetness was just right. There was also a banana flavored undertone to the chocolate boudino, which was interesting. I appreciated that their chocolate is made from real cacao beans. I also enjoyed the crunchy walnuts topped with caramel.   The single scoop of banana ice cream was a reprieve from all the chocolate. Without the ice cream cutting through the richness, I would not have been able to finish most of the dessert. If you are not a serious chocolate lover, do not get this. I do not really like chocolate all that much. So after the first few spoonfuls, it stopped tasting wonderful. As I continued to eat, it started to become very heavy in my stomach.  I sampled my friends' French Silk pie and Brown Cow. The pie was topped with massive amounts of whipped cream and was indeed silky. The chocolate was fluffy and sweet. The Brown Cow, which sounds complex, in the end was just a simple chocolate milkshake with root beer.  Our server was great. She offered to have all of our cards individually processed. The atmosphere was sunny and relaxing. I would come again to try some of their other desserts.

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cute spells that had tiny different flavored chocolates.

We went with a Groupon though and to be honest, I find this place incredibly overpriced. 1 coffee is $5 and if you leave the strip you could find the same quality food if not better for half the price. Service was prompt and friendly. All in all it was a good experience but I probably wouldn't go back without a Groupon.

We had a party of ten and had a reservation we were seated promptly and the waiter was patient in dealing with a large group of us. The food was good I had the chicken and waffles but the Bloody Mary was bomb.

uCaBrxmH8nIvYNM46rDvqA.text: Great restaurant! Had the best service and a great brunch.  Sean and Patrick were so attentive to our party.  Most definitely would recommend Hexx Resturant for the food and service.  The french toast along with the chicken and waffle went perfectly with the bourbon syrup.  The restaurant had plenty of seating and our wait with reservation took no time.

b4SZ1MlJ0sxARygLv5Y6xQ.text: Best brunch spot in Vegas ! We have bottomless mimosas and amazing breakfast food! Great view  Happy Valentine's Day!

MwyFvA6_E-5vDbVZYKnUjQ.text: Cute brunch spot, but quite underwhelming. The food certainly wasn't bad, but it wasn't great either. The benedict was a very small portion, and my friend who had it finished his food well before the rest of us, leaving him dissatisfied. What stuck out at HEXX, though, was the service. Our waiter, Sean, who asked us to mention him specifically if we left a review, constantly tried to upsell everything we ordered, persistently trying to persuade us to order more when we'd already declined. He failed to tell us that upgrading the potatoes with "onions, mushrooms, or peppers" would cost an additional $2 PER topping. So the $6 upcharge on our bill came as a surprise. Sean also kept referring to Patrick, the person refilling our waters, as his "assistant," which seemed pretty demeaning and self-important, even if it was True. Amidst his constant upselling, Sean also made strange comments that came across as faux-charisma: for instance, we asked for salt and pepper, to which Sean replied "upon request"... The atmosphere and decor of the place is cute and "aesthetic-y," which I'm normally a big sucker for, but in this case it felt like a pretty face with a bland personality. The seats were uncomfortable to boot. Overall, it was a fine brunch, but ultimately we wouldn't go back.

eAxkM7xK66Ctlvx9kNSTyw.text: My friends and I had dinner on Saturday night. Obviously we are in Vegas and so drinks had been coming in since earlier that day. By the time we reached dinner, we were a bit too happy aka tipsy. My friends were being completely annoying with repeatedly asking the server to turn on and off the outside heater. They were also being loud however the service never seemed to change. We received fantastic and friendly service the entire time! We primarily stopped by for drinks because last time we hit Vegas, we remember the wonderful drinks at Sugarfactory which is now HEXX. The drinks continue to be amazing of course.   Now, I'm not kidding when I say that HEXX has the BEST broccollini EVER. Please consider in trying! It's soooooo good.   Towards the end, we were even more annoying by asking to split the bill between a lot of us. There was a bit of confusion from my friends regarding the final amount that at one point they thought we were being overcharged. But at the end of it, we were wrong and I am deeply sorry for the trouble we may have caused and so I hope that sharing my wonderful experience with the fantastic service makes up for our tipsy actions. I appreciate the friendliness by the staff during our entire visit !

nPQfvNvP1VSaJm3A-rPZMg.text: Today I tried the brioche French toast and it was lovely. My wife loved her Benedict, she has had many in her lifetime, and considers this as her favorite. My only complaint is the chicken sausage, it was the best I ever had, but sausage would be the way to go. I would definitely return to this restaurant.

hxuSKV4SahWaW1cRi9LSDQ.text: We came for brunch on a Friday morning around 1030. We made reservations just in case, and we got there a few minutes late and were seated in about 15 minutes on the patio, which is first come first serve.  We did bottomless mimosas which were strong, a great price, and were filled almost immediately after taking a sip. We each got different meals and were all impressed! I got the veggie omelette which was one of the best omelettes I've had.   There is no time limit for sitting and enjoying your mimosas so we sat for some time after we finished our meal and enjoyed our $25 bottomless drinks. I would definitely recommend this place for a reasonably priced meal on the strip!

qgAC85OQ3M2pbQUf6fZexg.text: Great place to grab brunch! Had great coffee and bottomless Mimosa special for $20. Had the banana foster French toast. Fresh fruit and banana nut bread was delicious. Only issue I had was how the hostess sat me. Plenty of open tables and didn't offer to sit me outside. Sat me literally right next too another couple. Other than that had no wait and wait staff was great!

glxdcZL4tiWp_Rbp205rvw.text: I reside in LV and yesterday was my birthday after a long day at work my lovely husband decided to take me to HEXX for dinner to celebrate. Very nice and yes it was a busy night with a convention in town. We got our table at 8:50pm placed our order at 9:10pm by that time it started dying down a bit. Well at 10:05 my husband and me just look at each other and wonder why the table next to us which is a party of four and get seated 20 min after get their meal. Our waiter, Lupe finally comes and states "let me check if your food is ready" it's 10:15 ish by this time my husband is frustrated, hungry and really disappointed. She came back and said it's going to take another 5 min. At this point after waiting this long, being ignored and had a long day at work and us simply just wanting a decent meal since it was my birthday failed.It really sucks to have your hopes up on a restaurant and have my birthday dinner ruined because the waiter forgot about our table. Extremely disappointed, we left.

jLkRPGOSas937animxAIZA.text: This location used to be another 24 hour food joint called Sugar Factory. Was expecting a better experience. I had the garlic cheese bread for apps.  It's was not your average cheese bread you would expect. It was cut in mini squares and had a little cheese in the center of the tray. Definitely wasn't cheesy enough for me. My wife made reservations in hopes in getting our table immediately upon arrival, keep in mind we have our 9 month son with us so time is valuable. We came on time and had to wait 25 mins for our table. They didn't give us a reason why we had to wait. I didn't find the menu very appealing so I ordered a Pepperoni Pizza. Why? Because it's hard to be disappointed with a Pepperoni Pizza! I was playing is safe. My wife had the Crab Cake and didn't finish it. Note to management, if a customer just takes a bite and doesn't eat the rest, I recommend asking if the customer would like to order something else or take the item off their check, especially if you know it wasn't liked. Our waitress was busy with other diners. She didn't even take our drink order. Had to flag her down and let her know we want to order drinks. Back to the pizza, it was good. Cheesy and greasy just the way a pizza should be. Our other 2 guest has some pasta and steak, they didn't complain so I'm assuming it was good. We payed around $250 for 3 drinks, one app, and four entrees. Not bad for Vegas. The place definitely needs to improve on their guest experience.

8JijIfyVLCWrH4TDnHXlyQ.text: Overall food was good - the waiters were terrible! Had a wrong bill all the way up & didn't accept our tip and they were beging for more money.. didn't let us go until we gave higher tip - worst restaurant ever, will never go again! shame

IUnEzsiRvDOxeoDwzBbccQ.text: Can't say enough about this place! The breakfast/brunch is amazing, i recommend the chicken & waffles, I could literally just drink their bourbon syrup. The decor is very cool and in the mornings it's very light and airy. I suggest getting a table outside if the weather is nice bc it's right on the strip; there are so many interesting things going on that you'll just want to sit back and sip your coffee while taking it all in. I also liked how they acommodated our party of 10 in a huge square table where we could all talk to each other and share food without anyone being too far. This place gets busy so get there early or expect to wait a few before being seated, but it's a large place so it shouldn't take too long. Our waitress was very nice and everything came exactly how we ordered it. Seriously, just go there.

Q9_3pUAyt3Xb3o85iwAZRQ.text: Went here for my birthday this past weekend and my entire party (mind you there was 8 of us total) enjoyed our meals! I called only about an hour before to reserve our table and they were able to accommodate us, even for it being a busy Saturday night. Great food & Great vibe. And our waitress was more than helpful.

CdGP2Prcaa4l70NZAJzJ0g.text: Not bad and fairly priced for the strip the Sugar Factory was better though  Service was great and food was good

jMnNvdA6MwWFdCBsjtTJxg.text: Bottomless mimosas, chilaquiles and the ham and cheese croissant are amazing!! The $38 Bloody Mary was cool but your paying for all the stuff in it. Awesome place to people watch!

ucFhBPLPMifezGZfc9SJEg.text: I only post if something is exceptionally good or bad and this place was awesome. Our server, Natalie, was spot on and the food was delicious. We had the chilaquiles and salad. Our new favorite weekend brunch!

GbZvUzeAW9YWgMQkQTXNjQ.text: I came to Hexx for my birthday brunch & Tracee absolutely MADE MY DAY! Excellent service all around & such a beautiful personality. She made sure that not only was my birthday amazing, but she also made sure that my guest were happy, pleased, & having a good time! This restaurant is highly recommended if you're looking to celebrate any special occasion. Awesome location, beautiful scenery, food was GREAT. & most of all, the service & the entire staff was outstanding, but Tracee was EXCEPTIONAL! Tracee, you're a rockstar!

fLmFVd9sb8kmb9J4e3MWuw.text: Sean was fantastic.  The food was amazing definitely 5 star service from sean  and would recommend to anyone

EABE9UNZ-qiOE9iRTlT0NQ.text: I stopped by here with a business associate for lunch. When I arrived, we asked the hostess for a table outside since the weather was amazing, and this restaurant's outdoor patio is directly on the Las Vegas strip across from the Bellagio water fountain display. The hostess showed us some available tables, and we asked for one that was directly in the sunlight (our bad). After sitting there for about 10 minutes it began to get uncomfortable. We didn't even have to ask our waiter about moving, because a manager named Matt approached us and asked us if we would prefer to be moved to a spot that was shaded!  I had the jambalaya and my associate ordered the salmon. They were both excellently prepared and arrived at our table in good order. Everything about the experience was excellent and I will be bringing future business lunches here.

RKcUSit1nbJSzoAJSKIv_A.text: Holy crap!!!Tracee Eric and Ron are amazing!! Get them as your servers we got here for bottomless mimosas at 12:30 and it only goes till 2 and we are sooo messed up they will take care of you and food is sooo good!

89Mme1NFbCp_nMsJZLlQpQ.text: The food was good and pretty reasonably priced considering you're on the strip with a view of the Bellagio fountains. Our waiter was attentive and very helpful in finding a dish that would work with a long list of food allergies. Will definitely consider eating here on future Vegas getaways.

uszOavqreTFn65SUWZRYbw.text: This is the place to go for a nice dinner, with fabulous service, on the strip. Our server was Kevin, aka Chocolate Thunder!!! I have never had such an attentive, personable server at any restaurant before!!! When my friend and I were deciding what to get to drink, he immediately recommended the favorite HEXX Potion. It was definitely a favorite. Upon being seated, he also immediately noticed that I had an injured arm and tried to make light of my unfortunate situation, which was so appreciated after a week of, "I'm so sorry" or "that sucks". He was great. We ordered the calamari as an appetizer. UH-MAZING. He immediately noticed from a distance I was struggling using my left hand (I'm right handed). He strolled right over and assisted in putting a portion of the calamari on my small plate. When I thought he couldn't get any better... I ordered the rib eye, not thinking about having to cut the steak.... he sees that the food was brought to the table and immediately walks over and begins to cut my streak for me!!! Talk about service. I was so impressed, I will only come back to be put in his section!!! Thank you, Kevin, for the best dinner!!!!!

UfffFnvx-DVFQtf6EOHZXg.text: Absolutely phenomenal! From the drinks to the food to the service, this place did not miss a thing! We went here for appetizers and drinks and they were both amazing. We got some "potion" drink with dragonfruit to share and it was amazing. For food, we got the spinach and artichoke dip which was great, and the burrata and tomato which was AMAZING! When she checked our IDs, our server saw it was my birthday 2 days ago and as she brought out the check she brought out a bowl of ice cream with a few pieces of chocolate and sprinkles. Absolutely unnecessary and soo nice! Everyone at this restaurant from the hostess to the server to the manager could not have been nicer and friendlier, and the food was excellent. I only wish we had the chance to go for breakfast or dessert too because those look amazing as well!

x7DemMPS7ieUxDs_dZiP0A.text: Stopped by for a quick bite in the hot Vegas afternoon.  We had the cocktail of the day and a couple of appetizers.  Both the dishes were excellent.  The cocktails were on the sweeter side but refreshing in the afternoon heat.  Definitely recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Peach cocktails and house chips... Yummy!

T-abmoffbmsDGe34GKmKYw.text: The wait staff was quick and very attentive. The food portions were huge! The drinks were tasty and amazing! My party of 4 sat outside and watched the Bellagio fountain show a few times. I also used a Groupon, this was an amazing meal and restaurant! I would go again without hesitation!

oqVu65ZNHIkBeg0v0pJ2Nw.text: Sat there for 20 min and didn't even get a menu. Manager came up asking if we were going to order something, then said he will get us menus. Never came back. Never got a menu. Never got a waitress. Terrible service.

S8QqQrLe8PWrEG61bvAiSA.text: Didn't wait long to be seated. The food was great mimosas were strong. Service could have been better hence the 4 stars. Sat outside and got front row seats to the strip entertainment.

KIwcAnsh2bZ-BOR9QcUMrg.text: Spectacular restaurant in the heart of Vegas. I couldn't be more impressed with the food. The eggs Benedict was amazing, as well as this cheese bread we ordered to start as an appetizer. Our waiter was really nice, but took around 30-45 minutes to charge our cards for the bill. This was extremely disappointing. We had thought our waiter maybe forgot about us and went on break with the bill in his apron, maybe he was in the bathroom taking care of business, or maybe he was stealing all of our credit card info! The amount of time to charge 3 cards (split bill) was outrageous. Nonetheless, our cards were eventually charged and we were on our way. I would have loved to give this restaurant a 5 star rating, but due to this major issue it must fall under a 4, which is the utmost generous.

RiifYcPhxI5M2jqOkzp9Wg.text: Tracy and Patrick were ANGELS!! They made our bachelorette brunch SO fun and made sure to keep our mimosas refilled at all times. They made our experience very memorable. Thank you Tracy and Patrick!!

3WZVjA6LDhBrW3IS0aRzDw.text: Trendy restaurant bar located inside Paris casino. Classy vibe, full bar with creative cocktails, several sangria options served by the glass or pitchers. Great menu with lots of variety, including a tapas menu for the patio area. Sit in large dining room, bar area, bar, or outdoor patio with view of the street for awesome people watching. We ordered from the tapas menu and everything was delicious with a beautiful plate presentation. I would definitely go back for cocktails, date night, brunch or lunch. This place has a little bit of everything.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The churros alone are worth the visit! :)

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Key lime Martini (left), El Nino drink (right)

VdRKOEXcgxOQQIULeEa4iw.text: Awesome food, and amazing service.  The Wagyu burger is easily the best on the strip.  10x better than those at the burger joint owned by that famous british chef....  Not kidding...   So, if you want a burger  in Vegas--skip every spot with the word burger in its name ,and just come to Hexx....  Also their cocktails are totally on point. I highly recommend their BlackBerry smash.

eNNMH162pdiWst6LRKM09Q.text: Service was nice and friendly.  Didn't like the smoke smell while eating. CNF fee was a Dang surprise, beware! I won't be going back, because of this added fee.    Braised Rib was fall off the bone tender and juicy.  Great subtle flavor and the accompanying Brussels sprouts were charred just right.  However, the mashed potatoes tasted old and hard; the rib presentation was on point, as the mash was a smash dud.    Salmon with Black Quinoa was unique in a sense; quinoa colored your lips, and was cooked appropriately.  Yet, it lagged on the flavor.  The Salmon was nice and moist, yet didn't pair well with the black quinoa.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salmon
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HntTB2k_w2aCx1J1Ma2vXw.text: Lovely place with views of the fountain / Paris tower. Food was decent but took forever to be prepared. We stopped by around 3pm and the restaurant wasn't crowded at all. It took us a total of 25 minutes before getting fed. A little slow in my opinion.  Food was A-OK. Nothing special but edible. Pricey but it's Vegas... Will I be back here? No. Not because of anything bad but simply because it's a very basic American restaurant... nothing grand or special. Convenient location though.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Edible food.

OmWTvD9P1AdMwGHQULMWNA.text: BEST BLOODYMARY IN THE WORLD!! My favorite drink is a bloodymary if you couldn't tell, and I'm extremely picky about the ones I drink. If a bar does not make a good BloodyMary i get really disappointed, and for the most part many places have crappy tomato juice mixes. Hexx is my absolute go to spot for brunch because not only do they have an amazing bloodymary, they have about 4 options of them, variation in the vodka & flavors infused into them. The one I took a photo of here is the "campfire Mary" soooooo delicious!!!! Last time my sister and I shared the big one I forgot the name of it but OMG SO GREAT! It's to much for one person, however if someone wants to drink with you, definitely go for the big one it's totally delicious & worth it. I'm craving one as we speak.  Now moving to the food. Amazing amazing amazing! I ate the Hexx Benedict, mouth watering! Seasoned to perfection, the potato was cooked in a unique was it was a great brunch. My fiance had the French toast with bananas, it was honestly the best French toast I've ever had. The food is delicious & priced fairly, you won't pay an arm & a leg and you will receive a meal of top quality. Hexx is on my must visit list for Las Vegas, definitely give it a try if in Vegas & wanna brunch!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

JQwYmFq_7J9VvoMBpM6bsQ.text: Staff is wonderful. Beautiful restaurant. Nice environment. We sat outside. Under shaded umbrellas.  We had breakfast. It was mediocre. Roll was good. Bacon is cheap. And fried in the deep fryer. No flavor. For the price. I would think they could do better. $63. For 2 people for breakfast. And we both had coffee. No alcohol.

4fZZIhhUX-2jLb81MCvXMQ.text: For those visiting Las Vegas, you'll be pleasantly surprised dining here. I went up for the weekend for a bachelorette party and realized that it's not as cheap to eat here as I thought. It wasn't until our last day in the city that we stumbled upon Hexx.   What a modern, open, and spacious place! You'll love eating here and being able to watch the fountain show across the street at the Bellagio.   As this was the last day in Vegas, the thought of endless mimosas almost did me in. I chose iced tea instead. As for brunch entrees, collectively we had: the classic burger, French toast, omelette, and the prime rib sandwich.   Not one person had a complaint. We gobbled up just about everything. These portions are HUGE so don't be turned off by the price. The fries are deliciously seasoned and fresh out the frier.   I inhaled my burger -- it was absolutely delicious. Warning: it appears to have a thousand island dressing (or mayo /kethcup). Make sure to clarify which sauce(s) you want on your burger.   After the meal, make sure to take your receipt to the chocolate store next door and get yourself something half off!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Classic Burger -- amazing!!

6zz6yna_6G43mBdnjWGXvA.text: This place is awesome! We decided to go after reading some of the reviews on yelp and our visit was great! There were four of us that I made reservations for and it was a little chaotic when we arrived as there were a lot of people waiting to be seated. Our server was great... attentive, knowledgeable and charming.   The food was pretty good. A little pricey and you'll wait at least an hour to get your food... but it's good.  For starters we got the lump crab cake which was good I just wish it was fried a little more. The fried calamari was good but the rings and everything was a lil small... it was good with the ranch and buffalo but I asked for the sauces on the side. I never thought to pair buffalo and calamari together but it works! Two people in our party complained about the buttermilk pancakes not being soft or fluffy enough... I got the chicken and waffles. Chicken was seasoned perfectly and waffle was fluffy. Two people got bottomless mimosas... $24 per person... (makes sense if you're gonna get more than two mimosas since they're $12 each)   All in all, I would good back. But I encourage people to make reservations. As you could be waiting to be seated for a while since it is on the strip so it's really busy!

-E4YJ87hDUQcEBMrvKI_ow.text: Perhaps the best feature of this restaurant is the view of Bellagio's fountains. Service is good as expected from such nice restaurant on the Strip. Food quality falls short though.

dVVRoSIr7OX6NO4hQdj86Q.text: Tracy our waitress was the best part of our brunch, she has such energy and loves to interact with everyone, she helped us out on everything on the menu and she was just the chillest person we've have met, give this woman a raise Haha

x6YRolLXelrlDt_XFr-WEg.text: Came here randomly after a pool party didn't see much that I wanted on the menu I didn't want anything too heavy so I ordered their pizza and it was amazing my friends tried a slice and ordered one themselves

nWo78kF3tFe8f0pB9S7SZA.text: We had breakfast here everyday of our. What's trip. It has a lovely view of Bellagio fountains and very open style restaurant. Carrot cake pancakes were my absolute favorite. Their coffees are really good too.

WcMZ4vMhhA-zKy3oQdwILw.text: Loved this place! Came just before 9am on a Saturday morning, and glad I did. It was packed shortly after. Had the bottomless mimosas and chicken & waffles. Service was great. I plan on coming here next time I'm in Vegas!

FPqq1ITtazwb74Um5pnd6w.text: Wow the food is fantastic! I highly recommend the carrot cake pancakes and the omelets as well. The service was very good, we were seated almost immediately and the atmosphere was nice. I will say however that the drinks were just ok and over priced for what you get. (Except the bloody marys)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Carrot cake pancakes. Bomb.com.

wB9jxqempLevAjqaSTQMwQ.text: Located in Paris by Bally's. They have a great selection for dinner. Salmon, steaks, salads, etc. they did not have the rib cap so I had the veal steak. Portion size is large. Most items are priced for entree only with sides extra.   Recommend. Veal steak, ahi poke appetizer, mashed potatoes.

rzi7BT5RMJSWpJ-Js-jyLQ.text: I love this place. My sister recommended it. Apollo is the best waiter. We got unlimited mimosas on a Wednesday morning and carried it into the afternoon... we loved the shrimp chopped salad and  chilaquiles. We got seats outside enjoyed the sun and the atmosphere, I LOVED this spot

uOlT-0iXnHxtAkM6Y_UtaQ.text: If there's one restaurant I've been excited to dine at this trip, it's HEXX. The pictures on Yelp make this place look amazing but I should have realized that most happy Yelpers came for brunch. Dinner is something else.  My bf is gluten free but I'm not, and when we ordered two of the same meal but cooked differently, they made both gluten free making mine skip the fries garlic I was craving. They didn't offer to give me me garlic and didn't stop by to check on the table for 20+ minutes. Our waters were not once refilled in the hour we were there, and we were told the appetizer we ordered was gluten free, just to find out AFTER my Celiac-disease boyfriend spilt it with me that it wasn't.  While the location is great and it looks amazing, our service killed any chance for a higher review. We spent $80 on dinner and barely received any service...along with getting the wrong food.   I might try this again for brunch, but I wouldn't return for dinner. I can see why they're on Groupon, and hope they're able to work on their employee training so guests can have a better experience.

XtixqNVE7tbabnro3l1hEQ.text: SOOOO good. The best Eggs Benedict I've had. They also have bottomless mimosas and they are very attentive about filling them up. All the staff was friendly. Def coming back every time I come to Vegas.

xFWGwgCMv63BlKtAgyRHsQ.text: I went here for breakfast and it was absolutely delicious! I ordered the French Toast with fresh fruit.. so good! Although the waiter did not make me aware that the fruit would be extra since it is not on the menu when he offered it to me. My mom had the eggs Benedict and she can not talking about it! Altogether great restaurant! My family will be going back there again before we leave Vegas.

fHiaLPm-_bTEHQ1_PEJiMw.text: We went are there for breakfast on our last day in Las Vegas.  The atmosphere was nice, food was ok, nothing super spectacular. I liked the bottomless mimosas for $24 as that is a steal if you have two or more glasses;  in Las Vegas as all drinks are $12-$20 per cocktail! Our breakfast for two with one bottomless mimosa and one Bloody Mary came to $90! You are definitely paying more

rAiyQwhU6czBMlekYq2BLQ.text: This is for late night dinner only.  We bought a voucher on Groupon $30 for $50 worth of food. Groupon was also having a sale so we actually paid $20. Let me tell you, even with that much discount, IT WAS NOT WORTH IT.  Portions were extremely small and everything was so salty. Only thing that wasn't salty was the heirloom tomato salad. This was the only thing on the menu that was actually good. We ordered bolognese and prime rib sandwich and these were the worst pasta and prime rib sandwich I've ever eaten. I wasn't necessarily expecting Lawrys prime rib sandwich but these were horrible. Instead of prime rib, we got what appears to be deli quality thinly sliced beef. Au jus was think and tasted like mixture of beef stock and A1 sauce.  I think this place is known for breakfast/brunch menu but I'm not sure if I'll even want to try that after our horrible dinner experience. Server was very nice but service was slow.

PIwTO4j9kzKODfolFpQuYA.text: I mean, how do you say no to bottomless mimosas? We went at 11:30am on a Friday and only had to wait for a few minutes to get a table on the patio. Two hours of mimosas for $24 per person was reasonable, and they refilled the glasses liberally. My chilaquiles were OK, the tortilla was more like Tostitos chips than i am used to. A great spot for brunch people watching.

CWiHfgKgG2isvw0pHf50bw.text: Brunch is the go here - we got there later in the afternoon, so the crowd was light as the bottomless mimosa time was running out. It was also lucky that it was a nice day and we could sit outside, because inside the DJ had the music cranked up to 11. If you want to talk, sit outside. If you are seriously into drinking and yelling "woo woo" sit inside. They do have patio heaters and you can see the Bellagio fountains across the street.  The service was excellent, very on top of refills and such. The food is inventive and there are lots of breakfasty choices. I had the corned beef hash with poached eggs and asked for the hollandaise sauce on the side - a good idea because it was very bland and thick, more like tasteless mayo. Maybe an "end of the day" problem. The hash was a nice mix of vegetables, sweet potatoes, shaved brussel sprouts and corned beef. The poached eggs provided enough of a sauce, for me anyway. We also got the cinnamon bun waffles to share, they were good, and lived up to the promise. I'm not sure I could eat one as a meal, but it's a fun treat. We also tried a couple of items off their special "90's menu" and the "hot pocket" was good! Essentially an empanada stuffed with meat and cheese.

78hm9UrCQy0IjIq3fqjiBQ.text: I absolutely loved this restaurant! I went here with a friend for brunch while on vacation and it was such a treat. I had a beautiful fruit platter spread as a starter and eggs with bacon and french toast as my meal. The atmosphere of this restaurant is lovely as well. Great service by the staff. I'm would totally come back next time I'm in Vegas!

5XfKw-Dgbk9_pzPhPdfqug.text: This place is perfect for breakfast, lunch, and dinner!  I could dine here for all 3 meals everyday and not have the urge to dine anywhere else.  The menu has food items for all appetites.  Situated directly across the street from the Bellagio water show, it makes for a perfect night to cap off an evening.  I look forward to returning to Las Vegas just to dine at Hexx Kitchen & Bar!

6T3h0qK5v9QECSWNP8OrZg.text: Just came to have brunch and we had such great service from Craig, Romo, and Tom! The food was delicious and we had such a great time getting drinks and food. Will definitely come back next time. LOVEEE   Came back about a month later and had great service from Sean and Patrick! This place never fails me because of their customer service, positive attitudes and awesome brunch options!

xTSYzYg67ww_cyknrZev5g.text: EEEEE I really liked this place! Right front and center of the strip, convenient location, friendly staff, and great food. I ordered the steak..was it the flat iron? I don't rmbr which cut it was, but it was cooked perfectly medium rare! It was the perfect portion for me. What was even more memorable was DESSERT. We got the Red Velvet Cake split by 2 people. Sometimes the best things come in smaller portions (and sometimes, they taste better that way!) Too much of anything is not good :P The whipped cream, cream cheese, and density of the cake was PERFECT.

27GzYb0_vbPXZsJC_Ed4eQ.text: On a recent trip to Vegas, the girls and I came to Hexx for brunch and really enjoyed it.  The ambiance was great, the food and drinks were great, and the service was great.  As you look around at other guests you could fee that everyone was having a really nice time there.  It was rather loud, so if you're looking for a quiet place this spot may not be for you.  I had the chicken and waffles and it was really good and a big portion - I couldn't finish it.  I forgot the name of the drink we had, but it was huge also (it had passion fruit in it).  Near the bar they had a champagne vending machine which was fun to see.  The restaurant was in a great location on the strip (in the Paris hotel).  Overall I recommend checking this place out.
