wnvfmAjJi6TIs5ZVNWlvKw.text: Made a reservation for brunch on a Friday. Patio seating is first come, first served so I knew there may be the chance we would have to sit inside. When we checked in, we were told patio seating is about a 15 minute wait but within minutes we were called and taken to a table outside. The patio is a great spot to people watch on the strip and you can see the Bellagio fountains. We started off with the fruit plate and bottomless mimosas. The fruit platter was visually appealing and the fruit tasted very fresh. For our entrees, we both ordered the Farm Fresh Eggs which came with 3 eggs, applewood smoked bacon, potatoes, and an English muffin. We were also given butter, ketchup, and a jam on a separate plate to pair with our food. Everything was delicious. The potatoes were the best breakfast potatoes I've ever had- so crispy and seasoned perfectly. I wish I could remember our waiter's name because he was delightful. Def a spot to check out if you're in the area.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fruit plate appetizer
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

4nJwplTbXkzGQg8pLig8PQ.text: Tracee is amazing.  We had the best time at brunch today.  Tracee made the experience much better.  We had so much fun. The food is amazing. Try the HEXX Benedict! You will not be disappointed.  Of course there are also bottomless mimosas.

aARKFkpMyTu9oS74lflQ5w.text: Stopped by Hexx kitchen and bar for breakfast. It is located in the middle of the strip and seemed like a good option as it was busy. We were seated right away outside when we arrived. Our waiter was very friendly and gave us refills often. I had the vegetarian omelette and it wasn't the best. It was certainly overdone and missing the fluff that most have. My husband did enjoy his selection however and shared his with me. I probably wouldn't come here again because it is over priced for what you get (what isn't overpriced on the strip though?).

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MPyp-hJlElSvjQyEIAnITw.text: Oh em gee. The food here is ridiculously delicious.  I was skeptical because I'm always super skeptical about those fancy, shmancy restaurants that serve small portions but charge ridiculous amounts. I had a slight impression that this was going to be one of those restaurants but BOY WAS I WRONG.   I came here on a Friday dinner date night and was seated immediately for two. Right away we were greeted by super friendly servers who were nice, offered recommendations and treated us like royalty! We were already soo impressed!   Located at the front of "Paris" right under the Eiffel Tower, its beautifully decorated with a clean, classy, upscale vibe. The menu was just as beautifully crafted as the ambience of the restaurant. They have different options from seafood, gourmet meats, pizzas, etc!   We ended up ordering the "Big-Eye Poke" Appetizer and omg, it was easily one of the TOP poke's I've had in my entire life. The fish was SO fresh and seasoning was on point. There were crispy onions/leeks and macadamia nut pieces on top which added and amazing texture to the soft poke fish. Not too salty, not too fishy, just freaking delicious. Me & my bf were literally eating it super slowly to savor every delicious bite.   For entrees, I ordered the Pan Roasted Salmon which was SO unbelievably good; crispy on the outside & fluffy & moist on the inside. (BRB salivating while writing this review) They really do cook the salmon PERFECTLY. The salmon is served on top of a "quinoa" mixture with black quinoa (YES, BLACK quinoa.. don't worry its freaking wayyy better than it sounds), wild mushrooms, peas, and a lemon-ey gremolatta sauce. This thing was just as crazy delicious as the salmon, so together it was just an explosion of flavors in your mouth. I don't think my body was ready for such deliciousness.   We also ordered the Pan Seared Scallops which was another explosssion of deliciousness. Words cannot express how delicious this food was, friends. My explanations really don't do it any justice. Scallops were light, buttery, fluffy, perfectly crispy yet soft. Came on top of a deliciously creamy puree & various cooked veggies. SO GOOOOOD.   Surprisingly, we were pretty full from all the food even though we expected not to be. Maybe because our mouths were trying to recover from such outrageously delicious flavors. This place is now a new DEFINITE must to go-to in Vegas!! This place is open 24/7 so there are no excuses not to try it out!  By the way, sorry for saying delicious like a billion times. :D

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pan Seared Scallops Entree
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pan Roasted Salmon Entree
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Big Eye Poke Appetizer

grA21RR8iugNs0VyZoU1Qw.text: The brunch food was stale, we had the brioche French Toast and the Chilaquiles... the French Toast was dry inside and stale. The Chilaquiles were equally stale, with a bad almost red sauce.  I would not go back here again with so many great dining choices in Las Vegas.

r1P9OcWXByi253NdDScjSA.text: The Hexx Benedict was the best thing I ate while in Vegas this trip. Very very good. So satisfying!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict

Qqtzz6TtJK4-HgdwNZzkTg.text: No joke, we had the best time here. The food was out of this world delicious. You have to go try it local or not.   I don't know about anything besides the breakfast but if their breakfast is that good... everything must be!

JWAE6S4MuGiq6l2-qfl_GA.text: Been to Vegas twice and came here both times. The smaller drinks are pretty strong but the big cocktails taste like there is barely any alcohol, for $36 I expected to get a buzz. A little pricey, but the food and service here is amazing.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sticky bun

UZ-urbwu7AjfYZ2kGvBWrQ.text: We started out sitting inside the restaurant on this Monday night, 8:00PM reservation but the noise level was unbearable so we asked to move outside. The noise level/acoustics were so much better outside.  I ordered the tomato/burrata salad to start. The Parmesan tart was way too salty. The salt masked any Parmesan flavor. The tomatoes were beautiful chunks of multicolor heirloom tomatoes but they were super cold as if they had just been pulled from the refrigerator. Tomatoes do NOT need refrigeration.....this changes the texture and flavor!  I ordered the short rib entree. The short rib was really good but the Brussels sprouts it was served with were over-flavored and overwhelming to the plate. My husband ordered the blue cheese crusted steak and there was soooo much blue cheese (with an unusually strong flavor), that he ended up scraping it all off and asking for the Peppercorn sauce which never came until he was finished with his steak.  Also forgot to mention that I ordered a glass of wine upon being seated that took about 30 minutes and a reminder before I got it.   We definitely won't be back.

sqVDB-aB7dmK06iMcJsWqg.text: We went to this restaurant for brunch on a busy Saturday morning. There was a wait but they sat us in exactly the time frame they communicated! The food was really good, I highly recommend the sticky bun to start and share.. although you'll want it all to yourself. There was a woman who worked there visiting people's tables to sing along to the music. We called her the Hexx hype girl, and it made the experience really fun!  Great spot for a large group, and they take reservations!  I would definitely go back if I find myself in Vegas again.

y596HCHC0PGkan5N7p8t_Q.text: Love this restaurant! The location is fantastic right in the middle of the strip across from the Bellagio fountains with outdoor seating. They have a nice variety of food for those looking for something healthy or an indulgence. Great burgers, salads, side dishes and drinks. If you are considering trying this restaurant you won't be disappointed.

vrQEJyVmJP7DK2ToenPpBA.text: Lots of covered outdoor seating right on the strip. Went at noon on a Wednesday and sat right now. Food came fast. Very fresh.

kYULFbHYKmgT1VZVBncxJg.text: Excellent and attentive service. The food was delicious as well. We ordered eggs Benedict and the chicken and waffles. The ambiance was also nice with the indoor/outdoor feel.

aPUYTd_qCDoEd-CDH1dKgA.text: We went two days in a row for breakfast.  Food was tasty and the servers were very knowledgeable and attentive.  Would definitely recommend.

GZIucU4w4nAXe_Gj_C5PnA.text: Two words... Bottomless Mimosas! We made a reservation for brunch at Hexx and were not at all disappointed! We wanted a relaxed environment with good food and an endless brunch cocktail and that is what we got. We were lucky enough to get a spot on the front patio next to the water spritzers and were quickly greeted by our waiter. We ordered our food and were never disappointed! I had the chicken and waffles and bottomless mimosas! My glass was never empty and I left with a full and happy stomach!

niDIzhuRl6m_QMPuGDYKmA.text: The options were limited but the food was really good. The atmosphere was nice and quite. They even packed up our leftover food. Will return!

0gwnRx8kgb5XpPtu8cg1-Q.text: We originally wanted to go to Gordon Ramsey Steakhouse but it wasn't open yet and they recommended Hexx. When we got there they took us to our seats fairly quick BUT our table and chairs were dirty. When it was brought to the attention of the hostess she looked around and said I don't know where a buss boy is. So we took it upon ourselves to swap chairs for clean ones as she watched and offered no help. Then once seated we sat there for 15-20 mins and no one came to give us water. Another group sat next to us and within a few mins the waiter came and said "I will be with you in one minute". Now that we sat there and didn't even get a drink of water we decided it was time to go. There are so many places to eat in Vegas and do not recommend this one.

b8Q0dXPglBjlzWN8SAehHw.text: Looking for a place to eat where my boyfriend could have his typical breakfast food but I could have a meal that didn't consist of eggs, cheese, or meat. Harder to find then we expected but Hexx turned out to be perfect. He got a standard breakfast of pancakes, eggs, and bacon and I was able to get a veggie burger with some breakfast potatoes and coffee to make a burger qualify as breakfast. The food was awesome and the portions were big. Our server was Sean. Sean was friendly, professional, funny, and very attentive. We made quite a few modifications to our order and he brought out exactly what we wanted. They also had a bottomless mimosas deal that we didn't take advantage of because we were heading home after breakfast but I will definitely be going back for the mimosas, the yummy food, the pretty atmosphere, and the great service.

fKnh66heVonBS8e-BrjW6A.text: Everything was great with this place from the beginning . Staff was so friendly , my waiter was also amazing and my food was so food . Highly recommend .

E-O9-8IOAj2GJPAXC108rQ.text: The food was delicious. We came for brunch and had the bottomless mimosas as well. Our server JJ was AMAZING! He was sweet, constantly checked upon us and was on top of refilling our drinks. Will be coming back again.

zbn1LkNqIToyEXmX2gptHw.text: Food was good but a bit pricey. Good service but a better view of the fountain. If you're looking for something fun and light, a good place for dinner. Food is served la carte  so it can run you some extra money.  Not including the burger, fries were included.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

KhPgC6o-bYdWumD8sQq-9g.text: Live jazz band on the weekends is such an awesome touch to the experience here. The ribeye was really good for the price.

lpd3OMEUZtZF4Ip11N788Q.text: Service is great here and you can sit outside and watch the Bellagio water fountain shows while you dine. I had the scallops and risotto. The risotto was excellent, perfect texture and flavor. The scallops were prepared well; often chefs will over cook scallops leaving them a bit rubbery. However, they were not bursting with flavor. A sauce would have been a nice compliment to add flavor. I would try this restaurant again, but probably choose a different entree.

1VwhjLba8pvqk6TJ6wv89w.text: Service was lacking a bit. Food was good but nothing to rave about. I looked at the pictures on Yelp prior to comong here. There were so many dishes I was interested in. When my friends and I were looking over the menu I found out from our waiter that the menu frequently changes. I would go back due to the ambience and location mostly. We sat outside on the patio and could see the Bellaggio fountain. Now we did go during breakfast so maybe the lunch or dinner menu is better.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Breakfast nachos with chicken. Pretty good for hangover food.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tasted like a Cinnabon! Pretty good.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Tmbm2mX2443V-NcPET3H-g.text: This place is awesome! I had the carrot cake pancakes and the hexx eggs benedict. I actually had to split it with my friend. They have large portions.

iYnduyayQdn3MKiRa9jWfQ.text: No complaints ordered the ribeye and asparagus and I was pleasantly surprised. I mean it's not a steakhouse so I wasn't expecting the best of the best but the rib eye was delish. Cooked perfectly, I always order more steaks medium well. It was cooked to perfection and tender and juicy. The asparagus was great as well.   The service was good, location is great (the old sugar factory). It's a good late night dining option in Vegas.

ZMaayYzYmWbGT_K-Vxs4mg.text: Great breakfast.  Gourmet meets comfort.  Carned beef hash was amazing.  Sean and Matt did a great job taking care of us. Thank you

ze7wa7W2Hqlri_hkd3vCNw.text: Tracee made sure my bachelorette party and I were treated RIGHT!! What started as a much needed breakfast turned into a highlight of the weekend. Thanks Tracee and Hexx!!!

kW-tTWY_OSAKcCznlvF3cA.text: Love, love, love this place. We have eaten here twice and every time we became the menu is updated so I've always tried something new. Never been disappointed, the way that the spices and food hits your palate is amazing. You have to try this place.

RDdTrSA-2INvNn2hraHfbA.text: This place is great!! The food is delicious and the presentations are beautiful. The atmosphere is amazing, right across from Bellagio fountain. Great view! The staff is super professional and courteous.

e_mO-UvYIlCJGrQR_XXj7w.text: My husband and I went to Vegas for our honeymoon last month.  We went to the Circus 1903 show at Paris (which was awesome!) and then went to HEXX for a romantic dinner.  We got a table on the outside patio, so we were able to people watch and view the Bellagio fountains.  We ordered the Hanger steak (medium) and the Shrimp cocktail, both were delicious!  However, I must say, the Hanger steak was one of the best tasting steaks that I have ever had!!!!  Service was also great. Look on Groupon, the usually have a great deal for HEXX

yMUjX8l173L4G54hb9fTeA.text: Pancakes and their cream is  BOMB! Literally no wait, perfect place to have a nice meal while people watching. The chicken and waffles looked great Too. Servers were awesome. Will definitely be back.

3zSsaxaXmGZqkod1-5cDgQ.text: I miss sugar factory. But Hexx has similar items. I wasn't keen on it at first but it definitely has grown on me.  The waiters we have had we're really great!  Very on top of everything with drinks and food.  The food is really good. We did brunch and dinner. Brunch is by far my favorite. Not a huge menu but it's great. Bottomless mimosas. Can't go wrong. They kept them coming!!   You can make reservations if you'd like but it's not as crazy busy during the cooler months. And you can still choose to sit outside if you'd like with patio heaters out there.  Definitely worth checking it out.  We always make a stop every trip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon roll waffle. Yum!!

qj8Z56DFq6iGff3ScyfTyQ.text: First time here. I ordered the buttermilk pancakes which were very good. It's four full pancakes and I only ate two before getting stuffed. Also had some home fried which were just as exceptional! My wife ordered the french toast and scrambled eggs and she enjoyed both. She said this has become a new favorite breakfast spot for her! We sat on the outside patio which has a great view of the strip and you can get some good people watching views lol.

7rLdAkCrQKWhnVY5tpme6Q.text: We had a great brunch at HEXX. Good was great and service was quick and attentive. Spencer did a great job and we will definitely come back Next time we come to Vegas

ePEriMX6UQJoMLZQvxpd4g.text: Spencer was our server and it was a great experience! Definitely recommend this place! Ask for Spencer as your server!

QybsuQCxt9XP5pWOx3AOnw.text: Amazing Brunch!  Bottomless mimosas at 24 bucks, steak and eggs, and chicken and waffles.  Both dishes were so good we wound up going halfsies.  They got half my dish and I got half theirs.  So good.

aRQeg2Zc08SwVOAIuWefVg.text: Sooooooo good! Service: excellent. Food: excellent. Went on a Sunday for brunch. Busy place. (that tells you it's popular) We had a party of 3 pp. Wait time to be seated: ~5 minutes. Our server (Quinn) did a great job. She was busy, but checked on us frequently, while not being intrusive. She has a nice demeanor. The food: delicious!  You MUST try the brioche caramel sticky bun. It is the most wonderful breakfast roll I have ever eaten. We shared it. So good. My breakfast was also very good. Everyone in my group agreed that is was really, really good. Would we go back? YES, definitely. Oh - we had their bottomless mimosas - happy we did. This restaurant is on The Strip, in front of Paris and across the street from The Bellagio. If you sit outside, and don't mind the traffic noise, you'll have a view of the Bellagio fountains. The weather was nice, this was such a great way to kick off our day on a high note. It was a little chilly, but they have heat lamps going on the outdoor patio.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

528JicEOXk1S-ucPO8BdEg.text: There is a lot that is great about this place.  One of the great things is to sit outside and people watch.  There is a whole lot going on.  The restaurant is nicely decorated and very modern.  I wanted to try the carrot cake pancakes and they were so accommodating in letting me order only 1/2 an order.  I also ordered the chilaquiles and a guava mimosa.  Everything was delicious, the pancakes had shredded caramelized carrots in between and on top, it had a dollop of cream cheese frosting.  It was a great excuse to have cake for breakfast.  The chilaquiles were very tasty, not too spicy, so my husband probably would have liked to add something to give it a kick.  Between the two of us, we couldn't finish the pancakes.  Overall, this place is solid.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Guava mimosa
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Enjoying my Chilaquiles and Guava mimosa

6KilD3EV0HMzAZcQeGyZ_g.text: Hexx Kitchen was great place to visit in Vegas for brunch. Me and my family decided to have brunch here on Saturday. I ordered the Jumbo Crab cake, Carrot Pancakes, Breakfast Potatoes. Don't judge me.  Everything was great. Definitely a place to visit while in Las Vegas on the Strip.

7zJE4ci6unD5ugef8R9yyQ.text: Fantastic service!!  Had Sat brunch of wagyu steak and eggs. Couldn't be better. Seriously.  Wife had some of the best chilaquiles we've ever tasted. Note -- the eggs on this dish come over hard by default. So be sure to order them the way you want.  It was an excellent place for Sat brunch.

-c0Htctyt9-29FZ9W4NqOg.text: Found this place walking into Paris hotel from the Strip. Was not going to try it out but I'm glad they had their menu posted outside of their restaurant. Thinking that this was only a candy store but also they have a dine-in and bar. Went to the bar and came to find out that they have daily happy hour from 2pm-6pm; amazing find in a fancy place. Their beer taps were okay not much selection but they have an extensive cocktail list to try out. As for the food the french fries here are idaho cut potatoes; a must try if you're  fry lover. And their margarita pizza was freshly made and cooked perfectly. Will definitely come back to Hexx and remember that the bar is small and tables at the bar are shared and open seating.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. If you&#39;re into bloody mary&#39;s like me. This is one place to check out.

ewsDplklt2aF4D6YFMw1tw.text: Tracee saved my vibe!!!! Went to Hexx for a great breakfast and a little hang over recovery. We left feeling like we went to the best brunch party ever. Ask for Tracee she won't let your bottomless mimosa empty and she will be the life of the table. Not to mention... food here is A-MA-Zingggg!

Jux28_hvqODvpozbeVczWQ.text: Tracee was the best, would not recommend any other server Han her. Past that, the food was amazing, and the bottomless mimosas were so worth it. #gocancers

oZz3oxSKryEbCqNvFOX6pg.text: This wonderful restaurant is located in the Paris Hotel Casino. The food was delicious but I was more impressed with the service. Everyone who worked here was friendly and attentive to whatever we needed and asked for.

z1pJfaEQ2wUN2Yn_qF3u1Q.text: On our last day in Vegas, we came here for brunch. Sat near the patio because we couldn't sit on the patio with the stroller.. it wouldn't fit. (Lame!)  My husband ordered the Chilaquiles and I got their French toast. My husbands food was almost too spicy for HIM to eat, which is saying a lot & my French toast tasted a little funky and we're super soggy. I was too starved to say anything though, just wanted to eat and go before the baby starts crying again haha. Overall, it was an average brunch. I've had better in San Jose & at way cheaper prices!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles. Extremely spicy! Be careful
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. French toast

r7T6TP_D6PJ3NpBdWSrB6A.text: Review is for dinner 10/30/16  I had promised to take my wife to a 'nice dinner' before a show at PH next door, we slipped in here after browsing the menu posted outside.  We were quickly seated inside, since it was starting to cool off and windy.  The indoor dining room is lovely, the chairs super comfy.  The server was right there, took our drink orders (just soft drinks).  Nothing on the menu indicated how much they were, was a taken aback to see they charge $4.99 for a coke.  Anyway, before you quit reading,  I want to point out something I didnt see in any review:  "CNF"  What is that?  After I questioned it, the waitress told me its a Concession/Franchise fee.  An additional 4.7% of your bill tacked on at the end.  Surveying the menu again, I spotted it, sure enough in very small print at the bottom they state this.  I hope this isnt another monstrous Vegas trend, like 6/5 blackjack, resort fees, or parking fees.  Anyway, just make sure you dont TIP on the TAX nor the CNF.  We were a little short on time, so we both ordered entrees, no appetizers or sides.  Wife ordered Tagliatelle Scampi (shrimp, butter, garlic, wine, parsley, chili in fettuccine noodles) and i ordered 8oz Filet Mignon with roasted asparagus) - medium rare.  Soooooo, out comes the food - now, I ask you, how many pieces of asparagus would you expect? 6 (standard serving)? 8?  How about 3.  Yes, 3.  I know this is an a la carte restaurant,  but if you say it comes with asparagus, I expect a whole serving.  And sadly, for $37, they cant get a piece of Filet Mignon cooked right, its on the done side of medium.  I dont have time to wait for a refire, so I ate anyway, and didnt complain.  I was given every opportunity, but didnt.  The Scampi were fairly small shrimp, i'd guess in the 51-60 range, cooked about right.  But the sauce seemed bland, neither of us detected a hint of garlic.  The 'chile' were shaved pieces used as garnish on top, we both thought pretty inedible.  I wouldve salted this up a bit, but like any haughty restaurant, you wont find salt/pepper at your table.  High prices, a somewhat hidden tack on fee, bland scampi, didnt get the steak right, i'm left at 2 stars.  If we had ordered a full meal and 'real drinks'  we wouldve easily been over $61 each, so its $$$$.

C7lBBM-6dMnpjrIYfeh6FQ.text: The sangrias are really good! The best I would say. It is a bit pricey though and the food is good but not something I would go home and crave for again.

kuy6R-FSjQVqQVV73QiG5A.text: Great food. Loved the wagyu burger and calamari. The view of the Bellagio fountains was nice at night.

z3Xsv9QYslYZps6c0O78DA.text: We came here on Monday morning for breakfast before our long drive home to San Francisco. Tracee was our server and was training another server who helped us as well. She was very outgoing, personable, and friendly. Great recommendations, we enjoyed everything we ate. Out of our whole Vegas trip Tracee was by far the most impressive in service, I appreciate the genuineness and I would go back just based on the service we received. As a retail business manager myself I know it's hard to find talent as good as hers, great job! thanks again for the experience!

zthi-6aluYBPKYNYrXLzkA.text: You pretty much pay for location. The food was mediocre for the price. The service was ok. Waiter just seemed to be in a rush and checked on our table once when we were all done. Overall experience here was meh.

kpnF7PpGdstqTL3a1djS1g.text: This place was fantastic. We went in while staying at Paris Las Vegas and we were surprised at the selection. I got the Johny cakes and they were awesome. They came with a jalapeno syrup. It was amazing. I suggest going there when in town.

TzwEVHCZOHd8et8HgHTB5w.text: We had the best brunch. Sean was our server and was on point all meal. He even went above and beyond to do a surprise birthday dessert and then got the ENTIRE restaurant to sing Happy Birthday. The food was tasty and you can never go wrong with bottomless mimosas. We will definitely be back!

sSHl2NAGuEcAjTHRO4E1SA.text: Great food (minus one star for no vegan options) with nice atmosphere, all brunch menu seem to be in a decent price range for Vegas. The staff was nice and friendly. Our waitress forgot one of our orders to go and she apologized profusely. The outdoor seating has a great 'street view' to look at Bellagio and the Cosmopolitan. I heard their drinks are really good too. Will definitely go back there.

WmB39FGFJ2dhhqAYhanE1w.text: Stopped here for lunch today. Food was awesome and our waiter, Sean was great and made sure we were taken care of!

xgdZMnsGBoCwocS8EzMM0g.text: Very good breakfast but best bottomless mimosas on the strip! Only $23 service was good and prices reasonable. Would go again for sure!

cadFn9w8ON4myis1jZr0fg.text: Great food and service!!! Our server Sean was awesome! Thanks again for everything Sean!

V4UjODZcJShN28HdA5FRBw.text: Had lunch here today to celebrate my boyfriends birthday and our first day in Vegas. Our server was Sean and he was one of the best waiters we have ever had! Very personable and always checked in on us to make sure we were happy. We would go back to this restaurant solely based on the service we received!

Wsp1aXYvlNqG0mxT70mzAw.text: Stopped in here because we were looking for a quick brunch before watching football games, and it was attached to our hotel. We decided to sit at the bar, and ordered some appetizers because we weren't too hungry and everything was expensive. Got Mac and cheese (delicious) and the overcooked bacon (great). May try it again on a weekend if I feel like going for bottomless mimosas (only served during weekend brunch).

vftq8rK8GGQ_4rOvjAcf0A.text: We went here for late dinner when we stayed at Paris hotel in Vegas. The location of this restaurant is simply amazing with the views of Fountain at Bellagio. There was no wait and had plenty of seats as we went late. Service was good and food was excellent. We ordered Sandwiches and Pizza and both were pretty tasty. One main factor I would not go there even though everything else is good is, this place is expensive and not for weak pockets.

hRmzgBJBfG_33qp5LQa96g.text: Went in during happy hour and got $7 cocktails and 20% off starters and appetizers. Also ordered a spicy bloody marry and it was perfect! The tomato and burrata and crispy broccolini were also delicious.

7uDDZqI58Kkfxdz-0rbhaw.text: Only reason I gave 1-star is because you can't give less. We sat at the bar for 10 minutes with an empty glass with 2 bartenders walking by multiple times, looking away each time. I would strongly recommend you spend your money somewhere else on the strip. No with the time.

d_iHeDhi8VZDKr9Z9qgkqA.text: Claire was so amazing! So helpful and sweet. A group of us came from Texas and she was very welcoming and patient! Ari was also very helpful and wonderful! Couldn't ask for a better experience here! We loved it and will be back when we visit again for sure!

4hKMxc2tT12bC3lUudLUuw.text: Ate here and had the most amazing waitress. Tracy was so attentive and fun I had to write a review. The food and atmosphere was great! Definitely stop by here for a meal!!

X8dPnMqq_3ILUou5UIAdpg.text: Just landed in Vegas. Perfect spot to brunch. Bottomless mimosas filled to the brim. Was given VIP treatment. Felt like a gluten free Celine Dion. Our waitress Clare was amazing. We tried to get her to come out with us, but she professionally declined.

1L4q0Xuf2hHDHz9-oP8hPQ.text: Wow! Great food, great service (thank you Jody), great location, and great ambience. I had the turkey sandwich with a side salad - yum. Everyone enjoyed their food and drinks. Wide variety of Bloody Mary's and specialty cocktails. Add this restaurant to your Vegas vacation.

vRKtMQ59TBLwfRh8y1_Z8A.text: My friend and I came to Hexx for brunch. Our server Sean was fantastic and helped kick off our Vegas weekend on the right foot! Mimosas and coffee were free flowing and the food was fantastic. Try the chilaquiles and the protein omelet. We will definitely be back for more!

8PrjEKRU3j62TFxStoqFzg.text: Decided to go to this restaurant coz we were starving and there was no line at the time. We were seated at a table for three and couple minutes later our waitress came and asked us to move to another table at the end of the hallway by the exit which super horrible and freezing. Waitress almost spilled cocktails on my cell. Foods were just plain. Not great. Ceasar salad's super Salty. Go somewhere else if u can. Wouldnt recommend this restaurant to anybody. Never again. To Manager of the restaurant if u are reading plz take this into your account. Thx

GiuOINiyHq0FYuwxKq8kdg.text: A friend and I decided to stop in for lunch during our conference to get away from the crowds.  We were planning to go to Martorano's, but we got there too late to enjoy lunch.   Hexx seemed like a good option and I was extremely pleased with my selection.  I enjoyed the chicken sandwich - it was messy, but oh so tasty!  This restaurant has great views of the Strip and the Bellagio fountains, the service is great and the decor is comfortable and classy at the same time.

Xx4MCX-ertgH1XU4Mkq-8w.text: Was staying at Paris and this place is there so decided to check it out for dinner on Sunday night. Didn't kinks how packed it would be so made reservations for 6 like at 5:45. Really cool decor and awesome patio on the strip for awesome people watching. Had the jambalyay with shrimp, sausage and chicken confit. Big portion but it wasn't as flavorful as I would have liked just somewhat hot. My sister and the crab cakes (appetizer) but you get 3 okay sized and they were really good. She also had a side of broccillini which was very tasty as well. My friend had chicken and waffles. Big portion and delicious! Awesome chocolate shop too where they make the chocolate. Definitely a go to if your in the area!
