Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crab cakes and brocollini
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken and waffles

TcX98Hmvv_PUeWa6wMOoDA.text: Came here for brunch and I must say the moment we walked in I was in love with the decor! We were seated right away (thanks open table) and our server greeted us within seconds. She was very sweet and attentive. Mimosas are delicious as the same goes for the food we ordered. If going for brunch, make sure to order the meat lovers omelet!

6m9JXP_aOqgZV4RLe7-R_w.text: Good food, horrible services. Ordered an app, salad and dinner, all came in same time. Asked for the the manager and complained. Nothing was offered for inconvenience. Will never return.

09LJIc4qnqKCvni24WikYg.text: A nice little place right on the Strip with pretty decent food. We got to the restaurant at dinner time on a Saturday night and were seated immediately, despite not having a reservation. Once we got to our table, though, I think that we were a bit disappointed; the restaurant forgot to swap out their lunch menu outside with their dinner menu, so the meals we were looking at weren't really an option. I ordered a margherita pizza, which was fantastic, though it was pretty pricy for a 10" pizza. The actual entrees were even pricier. The establishment itself was really clean and appealing, with outdoor seating available as well. I'd recommend this as a treat or special occasion!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margherita pizza!

A8yYFtbiNVY5yJW2ome5dQ.text: We had an amazing brunch! We were a group of 6 and were sat within a few minutes of wondering in hungry. Taylor our server was great. Funny and totally on point along with her friend Steven. They helped each other out during the busy shift. Definitely a great place for brunch, lunch or just drinks! Fantastic Bloody Mary (ask for the Taylor special)

Q8fdHUDAC1h_oVjCL-bPOg.text: Was really excited about this place. The entrees were seasoned well. We got the HEXX Benedict, Chicken & Waffles and the Sticky Bun. Getting seated was a typical 25 minute wait. The employees were nice. The Benedict seems like a small entree but it's very filling and delicious. The chicken and waffles were fairly good. I was really looking forward to the sticky bun and it looked amazing BUT was extremely tough :( overall it was average and the view of the strip on the patio was a highlight. Will go back for chocolate at the store next door before I dine in to give it another try.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Benedict. This was such a great entree
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Looks delish, but sooo tough :(

fO-RMIYQme8k8lGgUTMWRg.text: While walking the strip we came upon this place by a promoter who recommended it for the happy hour. They had a two for one on selected specialty drinks $14, the watermelon mule was a refreshing beverage! The food was all so tasty and cooked to perfection. Its a great size restaurant and modern furniture. The bar is pretty big and dimly light, the main dinning area has a clear view of the strip and right across from the Bellagio Fountains. It's a nice spot for a dinner date with cheap prices for quality Vegas dinning. There are private hole in the wall spots with cushions. We love it and will definitely come back during our next visit.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margherita Pizza $18 &amp; Spaghetti with Meatballs. Perfection!

d-vBxXl7t91UZNnKAXMRqg.text: Food is by far the best food I have had in. Eva's. Taste palette is a wide range in flavors. I usually don't eat burgers but they have such amazing amazing burger I took the executive chefs advice being that the menu was recreated by him. Calamari is beyond amazing. Lobster ceviche is amazing. I would have to say that chef Carlos has made an amazing choice in making a change to the menu. Had the best food experience and  our server Jessica was amazing at giving us suggestions on the menu.

h6KQVxcFccO3DzEpxCLO2Q.text: First I wasn't sure what this place really was. The restaurant was renovated and it looks much more elegant now. There are views of the Bellagio fountains through the balcony. This restaurant incorporates it's chocolates in every food item. The service is great and the ambience is modern/classy.  The food was delicious. I tried the burger made with white chocolate buns. Surprisingly it was delicious! Their alcoholic beverages are fun with dry ice vapor.  The manager greeted us and asked about our experience. This place is a must go!

6nWiab_qqk1Nv4O4mfpNJQ.text: Food was good - had a filet with mushroom rice.  Tried to use a Groupon that said it was valid on any day but a federal holiday and New Years.  Manager said the owner can choose not to accept Groupon if they don't want to anytime.  Would not honor the Groupon and we ended up getting cash value for it.

gRhCFPgD1T0O8DqApyfT3w.text: Great food and excellent service. It's our first time here and we did a birthday brunch for our friend; we had the BEST waiter name Sean! Super attentive, extremely kind, and really made us feel welcomed. We're definitely coming back :)

TvNJJP3dCqCnAC7L_7VH7w.text: The service was excellent. Our waitress for dinner was very helpful by suggesting some excellent choices. We started with the tomato and burrata, but it would have been better with sliced, toasted regular size pieces of French bread instead of the small crustini crackers and there were too few. We were hesitant to order the grilled crispy broccolini, but it was excellent. Great choice. We ordered the beet salad and a Hexx Burger. Both were very good. I would highly recommend the Hexx burger. It came with some good fends fries. For dessert she recommended the chocolate s'more and panna cotta. Both were very good especially the s'more.

h1zqjXoXsHBtnwKor_Oepw.text: The greatest jambalaya, wonderful roasted beet salad, different And excellent food.  Cec was our waitress and did a fine job. The environment was incredible and we can see the Fountain's across the street at the Bellagio. We highly recommend this for lunch or dinner as it was in unexpected surprisingly good and unusual surprise

baW-nfUO7PRGPF195IGyMg.text: This is a very contemporary eating establishment but I would have to say it is more on the high end of cost and not the two $$ this app gives it.   The staff is friendly the food is ala cart style.   Steaks are tender and along with salmon perfectly cooked.  Very enjoyable atmosphere.

9_MhqLNhwC4LWcw0KFdPcw.text: We waited to be able to sit outside and I'm so glad we did! The fountain and people watching was great. As for the food - it was very unusually presented in some cases but it was *absolutely* delicious. The burrata tomato salad was unique and really good. It came in like a cracker pie crust looking thing (but was not sweet). It tied everything together really well. We both got the filet mignon and it was cooked to perfection. With this we shared a side (which was plenty) and the broccoli was crispy and tasty. The service was also great.

JWnDDLlcAlGcwU54MTNyWA.text: The food was delicious. Time of service was fast. This is the best service we've had in Vegas thanks to Sean and Charles. Definitely will be back on our next trip.

6vSJv5B-8nYiF20kJoTDdA.text: If you want an amazing brunch in vegas, stop here!  Bottomless momosas and the food were top notch. Prime rib french dip was superb and my wife has the benedict that was to die for. On top of that, Sean and Charles killed the service portion of our meal. We will come back when we visit again!!!  Thank you Hexx, Sean and Charles for an amazing brunch!!!!

uvWmDU9Qdumrgh3O0pRPAg.text: OMG BEST LAS VEGAS EXPERIENCE!!!! Naomi and Steven walked me through the menu so I understood the concept perfectly! The recommendations was exactly what I was looking for. Thanking the manager Christian for the wonderful experience was the cherry on top ! What an amazing team. I will definitely be back!!

5mPG7xN4MzlMmEcMm98tRw.text: They have bottomless mimosas here for $23. I found a new spot for day drinking if you're not going to the clubs. Food was great and service was even better. Thank you Tracee for being so attentive! Ask to sit in her section! #CancerPower

G-PGjgL-K-4ElWpuuAnrsw.text: The food and atmosphere was so good! Plus at a bachelorette party bottomless mimosas don't hurt. BUT MVP OF ALL TIME was Tracee. Not only did she make our experience super fun she took care of everything we could have needed. Aces all round!

Qd9gYSOgmZU78nacsznSPQ.text: Sean are waiter is on point with the bottomless mimosa's. Ask for Sean if you eat here!!

HZECGTfvv42CsVBZvtmJIA.text: Definitely good food! However, eggs Benedict in a bowl just doesn't work. It's very hard to cut when you have a bowl instead of a plate. Please put it on the plate next time.

rjn0SOakcDN63C53XC9VYw.text: The crab cake was delicious but the macaroni and cheese could definitely use more cheese.

dzpXUd2brup06we-Weh6uA.text: Had a Protein Omlet.  Very good.  Efficient service and great bottomless Mimosas.  Others in my party liked their dishes too.  A little on the expensive side for breakfast but well deserved.

QRCE5TWTfXWSFyhmtTVmQQ.text: Came of breakfast  The food was SO GOOD.  The buttermilk pancakes were borderline too sweet, but still delicious.  And the prices were reasonable for being on The Strip

MmNpz1co9ixIeFcKN4Kclw.text: Ummm I love this place! A must go to for brunch every time I'm in Vegas. I have never had dinner here but I love their brunch menu. When I went, we ordered a variety of different foods and they were all so good! Don't even think about it, just go! And their 20-somehting dollar bottomless mimosa well surely help start your day off right! If you're looking to meet your friends or family for breakfast after a night of partying or just for brunch, this is your spot! Just do it. Love this place!

015wMhxQieINf7LBcm57Cw.text: Delicious food and thoughtful service. We enjoyed dinner (halibut, salmon, short ribs) and breakfast -(Hexx Benedict). Even better they are open 24/7

jF8Aj3X-d8eZ9PcO9RZfDw.text: Stopped in here for a quick cool off beer during happy hour. Ordered two beers and payed full price for beers, asked about hour hour prices was informed my beers not covered under happy hour. Hell a couple of buds not covered????? Anyways felt like they were pulling the old bait and switch game. Downed my beers and left to seek better places. No return ever for this traveler

dLWQhDOkeiGlCrRWpJyhSA.text: Came in on Memorial Day for my birthday!!! SEAN thank you so much for making my 24th memorable !!! Service was excellent!! Our food was delicious & arrived at a timely manner. We got the hexx burger and the chicken and waffles ! Chicken had great flavor and was tender and juicy! Sean was very attentive and has a great personality!  Must try one of these!

0WgqzZDoI0Hg_H4zct67Hw.text: These were probably the best eggs Benedict I've ever had. I wasn't sure I would like them over scalloped potatoes but they were a nice touch. Very nicely presented and delicious. Also enjoyed some bottomless mimosas. I don't normally get dessert with breakfast, but decided to try the hazelnut pudding and it was amazing. I can't wait until I'm next in Vegas so I can come back here. My waitress was very nice as well and helped make my dining experience even more enjoyable.

JQnztiOMn4GYYiLJiju4SA.text: Very good food all except mine. I wasn't a fan of my dish - which was  Mexican chicken  egg dish. The turkey sandwich , hamburger and bloody Mary's were excellent ... We sat outside to people watch

Y9FNpDtbwdvofHDBizblMw.text: Stayed at Paris and walked right on out to Hexx. Waited all of 5 mins and the host thanked us for waiting. Sat down and was greeted by Rafa. Rafa was the man. He was everything you want in a server and more. Great recommendations and was always there when our mimosa was gone. Food was amazing as well! Rafa 6 out of 5 stars! Thank you!

yZPKpLHAM4P5CzTCbN3xrQ.text: Stayed at Paris for a work related convention, and needed breakfast to get off to a good start.  This restaurant is situated right in front, and just to the left of the hotel.  My friends and I decided to give it a try.   There are several options on the menu.   Something for everyone.   I had the Farm Fresh Eggs with bacon, toast, and home fries.    The potatoes are out of this world! They are small size new potatoes that are crisp on the outside, and tender inside.   Very well seasoned, and just delicious!   The strawberry jam for the toast is made from scratch, and is just delicious! The service was great, and the atmosphere is wonderful!  I definitely recommend this restaurant as a breakfast option.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Farm Fresh Egg Whites with bacon, home fries, and wheat toast.

hCpGz6LsSfRt4SLxbnDIzQ.text: We stopped in for lunch and had a great time! Food was delicious! The burger was cooked a perfect medium and fries super yummy. Our server, Sean, was excellent! He was super attentive and made sure we were taken care of. Overall excellent ... 5 stars and will definitely go back again.

hQzlz30oopa97DGN8ZoFGQ.text: I love this place! I had the chicken and waffles, with the pickles being the perfect addition to the dish, and hubby had protein omelette. We were both very happy with our food, although it was a LOT and we probably should have shared one dish. Next time I want to try the loaded bloody mary.  I love love LOVE the decor of the place and was impressed at how they made a single large room feel cozy. The back of the restaurant leads directly into Paris Hotel.

RgiQm81q8dVmI3u7CodWaw.text: Loved this place when it was sugar factory. Love it even more now. The Bloody Mary is still the best in the entire world and the food was actually super good. Our waiter Sean S. was brilliant. Super friendly from the very beginning and gave us pretty incredible service for how crowded it was. Everything came exactly as we ordered it. It was a birthday brunch and it was perfect. So thanks Sean and Hexx!

-rW-R39XXYkHcj9nlnwUbA.text: Craig, Romo, Tom! Awesome servers I'm definitely coming back for them! It's my 21st Birthday and they definitely made it memorable ! Great service and awesome people !

smw7uspuqdkNCNM1xqkhzg.text: Delicious brunch!! Good deals, especially the bottomless mimosas. Sean and Luis were such an amazing team in serving us. It was my birthday and they made my whole table feel so special. Our glasses were never empty and they gave us more ketchup as soon as we asked! Def come here if you need a good place on the strip to eat and go!

Myl7BgayUaCSGeDIdXF2Nw.text: Service and most of all the food was great! Compliments to the chef! A must try when in Vegas. My pitcher of passion fruit concoction poured over dry ice was delicious and a site to see.

dUjYWEdbxZGRdFlXKf8mHA.text: Food was delicious. Drinks were super fun if your into that stuff with all the smokey dry ice (I am!). Nice outdoor seating off the boulevard. I'd definitely come back here on my next visit.

_9FRNp1e5V2Z3RkwQKyvpA.text: Talk about a great dinner! This place was awesome. Not only was the dinner and service superb there is a chocolate shop next door to satisfy that sweet tooth!!

8RLgeqwRYiBz0fvcMMnTug.text: Great food, i love their jambalaya.. i ate the whole thing! Waitress is very friendly and my water is always topped!

UoeOGiu4vfj30yEnui6_sA.text: I stopped by Hexx for Sunday brunch and we got the French toast and the chilaquiles. The food was amazing and the plates were big. I was too full too finish! Our server was great as well and the outside seating was perfect right in front of the Bellagio fountains.  FYI- they have bottomless mimosas for $20.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles and French toast + banana slices with a few dollops of cream cheese

38bW7DR-sLvDof5RTHSNIA.text: GREAT food with large portions. We went for brunch on Monday/Labor Day, and didn't have to wait long to be seated. The drinks are definitely overpriced though - $4.50 for a cup of coffee and over $6 for hot tea. That's just crazy

zqVlyybcRJGHhfqb4N1r_g.text: First off our server CLAIRE was amazing. She really made our dining experience over the top, made us feel welcomed and was very sweet! We also had the pleasure of meeting David, who was a busser or server. He greeted us at the bar and brought over a bar stool so we could sit down rather than wait for a table. Chilaquiles are the way to go for breakfast!!! So good! This would have been a 5 Star review if it wasn't for the rude hostesses... Besides their lack of customer service and friendliness, my experience was great!!

S3bdKR9PRu6V-qLgrPAwRw.text: Great location on The Strip. We sat outside so we could people watch. Service was great. Waitress was friendly and attentive. Food was great. I ordered the short rib, which was moist and tender. We ordered a bottle of wine for the table, which was good, plus they let us sign it and they place on display in the ceiling of the restaurant which we thought was cool. My only knock was that it was a bit pricey (We used a Groupon and still paid over $100 out of pocket) but I guess that's Vegas.

seHiL-Ou_RNF5LlmfsbCgA.text: After some shopping, we stopped in for lunch.  The girls in the front were very friendly and sweet. We got seated fairly quickly.  Our server was amazing and knowledgeable of the menu.  She was also very patient with our toddler, who had a lot of energy at the time.  The pizza was delicious and the mac and cheese was yummy!  Definitely toddler approved!  The dessert menu was unbelievable... we had a difficult time deciding... With some advice from the awesome manager and our server we narrowed it down to the brownie and cheesecake.  OMDeliciousness!  Thank you to all the Hexx staff for being so wonderful!  We will definitely be coming back!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

FlzKnX6_REmJJi2weKjLpg.text: Definitely worth going for the brunch. Loved sitting outdoors and enjoyed the people watching; heaters on the deck kept everyone in our party warm. Enjoyed the protein omelet, great flavor using chicken thighs instead of white meat. Side of potatoes were crips, but not oily-slightly under seasoned. The staff was attentive and kept my bottomless mimosa filled.

zO6XT9TTbfDI3uDDc04jMg.text: Our server, Maria, was amazing. She was this sweet little edgy girl that was really fun to talk to. Our water was always filled and our table was always cleared of dirty dishes. I would honestly go back to this place just to have her as our server. She was laid back and real, which is a nice difference from the servers that always try to sell you the highest price stuff. The outdoor patio has misters that keep you nice and cool and you can see the fountain show at the Bellagio across the street. We had the broccolini for an appetizer that was amazing. It was fried just perfect and had a nice citrus taste to it. The bolognese was to die for. It was different than your run of the mill pasta because was savory and almost had a little sweetness to it. The Marguerita pizza was super fresh and delicious.

IT5TdgmnattP85P0zXqGxw.text: Hands down one of the best places to have an awesome late breakfast. Our servers Julia and Taylor have been great and made it an excellent experience. Will come later for drinks and food.

-6cp5cf_zLQbzWCrPY6iLw.text: Came here twice on a trip to vegas. The first time was just for happy hour. We had the guacamole and it had great flavor. Some of the pork rinds it came with were really hard though. Hands down best bloody Mary I have ever had. They infuse their own vodka with a mix of peppers. The ambience is pretty cool except that it's  so loud. When we came back, I got tomato basil soup. It was barely warm so I sent it back to be reheated. It had good flavor and was hot when the second time. My friend got the ceaser salad, it was embarrassing. Basically lettuce, parm, olive oil, and croutons. The dressing had absolutely no flavor, it was so disappointing. She was so disgusted that we elected to cancel the rest of our meal. We watched people at other tables send their food back as well. I ordered a Sierra mist after drinking too much alcohol the past few days and it was 5 dollars!!! What a rip off. Our server Denise was amazing though, so sweet and helpful. Even the free chocolate was disappointing. Skip this place unless you just want a bloody Mary and guac.

PhweJiY-KnoSx3mHaH5a5g.text: The food was very good. We came for brunch the hex burger was amazing. Couldn't really taste the white chocolate but the burger with their pickles had a great flavor combination. The turkey club was very good as well. The cranberry is in the bread which gave a slight hint of sweet flavor. The server was also so nice, someone got something they weren't really a fan of and the server offered to get him something different and wanted to be sure we were happy with everything.

86CUAqUooUdKhleL3B8lrg.text: This is somewhere we'd had good food in the past. Not anymore. The only " good" thing was our server Krista. Everything that transpired she had no say over, EXCEPT she should of asked about our food, should of asked if steak was cooked properly. She didn't ask, never checked after bringing our food. Our dessert The banana cream pie, we questioned her on after flagging her to our table. The crust was EXTREMELY HARD, we thought it was frozen, but she said no. Ok, it was a graham cracker crust that could not be cut with a knife. 3  people tried. Jambalaya was SO spicy that a lot was leftover. Here's the BIGGEST THING, check your bill and be prepared, they add on a "cnf " fee. No this is not sales tax, this to literally to help them pay their rent. Lol. We asked about this charge, they would not take it off our bill. It's not listed in small print like you see additional fees/service charges in other restaurants. Tried to tell us a lot of places in Vegas add it on. We ate at many places the last week there. They were the only ones.

HvaH-ECNMrxU7MszE-SEMg.text: Jodie is the best server I have ever had. Such an amazing lady who is an expert at her job. She is so caring, considerate, and sharp. We had a wonderful experience and it was all based on her service. Thank you so much!!!

bwOp617YNEfDd12-00CR8Q.text: Came in and was seated right away. It took the waitress a good 15 minutes to come over and ask for our drink order. We ordered the chicken and waffles and Margarita pizza. The chicken was chicken strips and kind of meager for the price. The pizza was good, not impressive. Hex felt like a tourist trap. Overpriced for average food. They do have a great view of the bellagio fountains at night.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margarita pizza and chicken and waffles

nXAQC-QlnmIYh4bzx-T3rw.text: Sugar Factory was fading. Glad they tried something else. Got a small gelato and two cookies from what used to be the candy shop. Came up to 9.53. Looks like their focus is more chocolate now. Would like to come back to try the restaurant. The desserts were good, not phenomenal.

QJUTfULqnMC1PC0rF5Gxzw.text: The food was delicious and Amanda was great she kept our mimosas full and anticipated our split bill.

id6513jy3hntWjtiUdsLew.text: The chicken & waffles dish was not good at all, more along the lines of awful. The "apples"baked in appeared to be more like just apple skins, but tasted like pickles (and I opted not to have the pickles on top, so that should not have affected the taste). Overpriced for the poor taste. The mac and cheese was just ok.

8CuSGVNNipzNsIMKp2CziQ.text: YUM! Had breakfast here with my family. I ordered chilaquiles,-nachos with Pulled pork, salsa, eggs and avocado It was spiced perfectly, I couldn't stop eating it. My sister ordered blueberry ricotta pancakes, they were very light and tasty. You will be stuffed, the portions are large. I took away a star because its a tad overpriced. Over $100 for 4 people with breakfast coffee and juice. However I WILL come here again, it was THAT good.

PNISVjHyHBHvWrGikRkCtg.text: Very good lobster roll n smothered fries were delicious!! Andrea was a very good server!!

Npr1sOngQXs2oGMz4z4mSw.text: Overpriced food, not very good quality.  Got 3 stars b/c service was great.  I had spaghetti carbonara.  Spaghetti was about 2 minutes from being al dente.  A little under cooked.  Should have been angel hair or thin spaghetti w/ carbonara.  It was the thick spaghetti.  Sauce was too thick.. should have been creamier.  Flavor was ok.  Not worth $26.  Husband got burger.  Fries were cold, server, Dominque (who might be the hottest girl on the planet lol) was very kind and brought us hot fries immediately.  Burger was good just not worth $23.  I can cook better dishes at home.

tM3w3KA0MO_HG-4eKZ0Z8Q.text: Disappointed! I had heard so much about Hexx and was looking forward to the visit. Our party of 4 came here at 2am after a concert. Had to wait almost 30 minutes to be seated. Only 2 small groups were before us! After being seated we counted and only about 12 tables were taken and most of them were party of 2! It took 45 minutes for the food to come and the Mac n cheese was cold. The veggie pizza was hot but bland. The calamari was also hot but fatty and cheap bar snack type. The waiter knew exactly what was going on. He apologized and offered discount from the manager which was appreciated. That is the reason for my 3 stars. Otherwise the food and service was one star. It seemed that the kitchen was low on skilled staff. My party's previous experience was much better. To give them the benefit of doubt, I will try Hexx one more time to see if it is any better.

IrTPDdh7w0_eTI3eW0P4GQ.text: Cute brunch place with excellent food! Our server Tracee was the best and had so much energy!!

cKCxpCy4sXJW_od-nldH-w.text: Amazing service, Brittany is fantastic! Sat our party of 19 in less than 15 minutes! Bottomless mimosas are on point, food is even better! Thank you for taking care of us!!!

kdACLgN806efBqLePVbaDg.text: Best service I've had in Vegas came from Marife! We ordered the Spinach Dip and then some burgers. She was great and our drinks were never low or empty great lunch spot .

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

EKdIACGj-totp_co6bUQYw.text: Visiting my friend while in town and we wanted to play tourist. Second time here I love this place, and our server was awesome this time he was super friendly and looked like he enjoys his job. Checked up on us but not too much where it was annoying. His name was Sean. Definitely coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Their tomato app
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The simple salad. Added grilled chicken.

gqOF9xMkaJTV5_KWwm_CWQ.text: Wonderful food and amazing service! Food portions match the price compared to most places around here. Highly recommend it!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

NayETPRevryTQW-eGv1QbQ.text: Best chicken BLT sandwich I've ever had. How could they improve on something as simple as that is just attention to details and deliciousness. The salad was exquisite! Ice tea was tasty and they gave me a cup to go as well. Servers are delightful.  the ambience is fresh and clean inside or if you desire there is people watching on outdoor patio.

74ZLn5r6FWCoU40Da8cB1A.text: So I found this place whilst walking along the strip and the smell caught my attention! So glad to have discovered this place and would definitely recommend!   I came for Saturday brunch and surprisingly the wait wasn't as bad as I had thought. There's a candy store connected to the restaurant that's fun to check out while you wait. Once they texted us that our table was ready, we sat down inside and had a lovely view of the Paris Paris hotel next store. The interior of this place is super cosy! It's super bright and fresh inside and not over the top "fancy".   Service was a bit slow, but the food was so good that it made up for that! I ended up getting the club sandwich and it hit the spot ! The sandwich itself was huge and it had this almost sweet bread that ended up being the perfect complement to the salty flavours of the sandwich. The fries were also super crispy and good. My friend ordered the eggs Benedict and they were to die for!! The eggs were cooked to perfection and tasted heavenly with that smoked salmon. The side of potatoes were also heavenly. Would've loved to have tried the dinner food here as well! The pizza looked amazing!   Additionally for brunch time, they have bottomless mimosas here for around 20$ if I remember correctly. They were super good, although after 4, the taste was too much.   All in all, if you're looking for a good brunch/ dinner place with a big variety of different foods and you wanna try something new, give this place a shot! It can be bit expensive at around 15-25$ /plate but it's on the strip so what do you expect?

XBHRG_qBzt2HUi6kgFX1XQ.text: First time ever in Vegas. We had a Tracy as a server and Melanie assisting her.... they were the BOMB. Very attentive, helpful, polite, friendly, accommodating and overall had a very good brunch experiment. I had the chicken and waffles and my girls had the French toast. Everything was soooo yummy. You can never go wrong with bottomless mimosas. Definitely will recommend this place and ask for Tracy or Melanie !!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

RWvlF-EWe88ZZZt6DfOBIA.text: Could not get any service at Beerpark which is located right above Hexx (it was a Tuesday night and not busy, but the workers there seemed to not care), so we took the elevator to Hexx and decided to grab dinner here. Glad we did. We were seated in the patio right away. Ordered a 1/2 veggie and 1/2 pepperoni pizza and a pitcher of Sculpin. Kids devoured the pepperoni pizza and wifey and I finished of the veggie slices. Pizza was very good and the ice cold beer went down smooth (was probably in the upper 40's outside but the heaters outside did a great job keeping us warm). Service was great as well. With the view to the Bellagio fountains and people watching, I would recommend.

KTV43ZEKlERQjzRSay4gJQ.text: I came to Hexx with a group of 4 for brunch on a Saturday morning around 11am. The wait was not very long, just 15 minutes. The staff is very nice and the restaurant is very pretty yet casual. I love that the atmosphere is relaxed but has a higher end feel. We all ordered the bottomless mimosas which were $23 each person and shared the smothered fries. The smothered fries were very good. The fries held up very well even though they were topped off with gravy, pulled pork, cheese curds and cheddar cheese!  For my entree I ordered the corned beef hash. It really was not what I expected. Its made with grated sweet potatoes and Brussels sprouts. It was good but what disappointed me was that it was missing the crispiness that I expect with corned beef hash. I did however enjoy  the poached egg, great touch!   I tried a bite of my friends entrees also. I really liked the Johnny cakes great texture. I would not recommend the chilaquiles, they are pretty much nachos. The tortilla chips do not hold up well at all. The majority of them were very soggy.  So overall I enjoyed the restaurant itself, service was good, and food was good but not as expected from reading the menu

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Johnny cakes
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corned beef hash
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mimosa

2da_e5Sl8SWpgHhgTKgBZQ.text: Hexx was great! Fantastic service, and the meal was tasty. Sean was our waiter, and he was absolutely delightful. I highly recommend eating here for breakfast.

_eVZuMuxsMyILM6LvuKh8Q.text: First off, our server CeCe was the shit!!! (meaning GREAT)... The restaurant itself is sheek with an open layout. Food is amazing as well! I had the short rib sandwich along with a healthy serving of bottomless mimosas.   Check it Out...

8cyUYn9nAm1BwaDFVPaOxQ.text: Highly recommend! We went to Hexx for a birthday and all really enjoyed the decor and food. It was personally one of my favorite spots in Las Vegas.   To start, we got the candied bacon and spinach and artichoke dip. Both were very good, but they quickly were overshadowed by the spectacular show of two mixed drinks that we ordered. These large mixed drinks were served over dry ice, and it was so fun! Definitely unique.  I got the pappardelle pasta by recommendation of our server, and I thought it was delicious! Others around me got the jambalaya and hexx burger, and everyone was happy with their selections. From our experience, anything you order will be great!

tDHA63v4OnF0V2z4PWdhvw.text: The food was pretty good - which normally that's what matters the most - but here the service was real bad - waited forever to get a drink then to get our food and then to get our check - but ok I can live with that too as long as I have a drink and the atmosphere is good - but there was a dj and it was nothing but rap music blaring in my ear the entire time - so maybe it could have been me if the audience was the young type - but it was mostly middle age folks like me - so if you want a rap concert this is the place - otherwise look elsewhere

rA3wtTL5zcddOuBHmFfz5w.text: Amazing food !! You can't really go wrong with anything on the menu. I love this place

aXELdsDdhkGZ0-eN1HE89A.text: My husband and I had the best experience here!!! We walked into the restaurant and were immediately greeted with a warm smile by Jeffery, who couldn't have been nicer. Jan was our waitress and she was extremely helpful suggesting some awesome apps and entrees. My husband got the short rib and I got the chicken. The short rib was OUT OF THIS WORLD. If you are wanting an amazing dessert, try the S'mores!! We will def be back. Thank you Jan, Jeffery, and Christian for making our experience worth it!

1B2RZ4ri4RvSCA1WHsOpUg.text: We were walking around Paris Hotel in search of a cheese and charcuterie board when we stumbled upon HEXX.  We weren't in the mood for a full meal as we already had dinner reservations, but really in search of a snack. We walked in and were seated promptly.  Service: Service was rather inattentive for it being so slow - in between lunch and dinner.  It took a while to take our orders and our waters went empty for at least 5 minutes without being refilled.  Food: The Cheese and Charcuterie board was good.  Both the cheese selection and meats were standard with nothing to write home about.  The large pretzel as the bread component was an odd choice but it worked well with the whole grain mustard on the board.  Decor:  The modern farmhouse style was nice and comfortable.  The acoustics made it nice so that we could hold a conversation without having to yell.  Our seats also had a good view of the Bellagio fountains.  Overall an OK experience worth another try of their other menu items.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cheese and Charcuterie

yA1kpq1iqlKfjG5hx8Zg7Q.text: This is my first time in Vegas and on my last day here, me and some friends went to HEXX.  I'll make this short because we got a lot of stuff to do but I wanted to write a quick review first:  Our waiter Shawn is great! He is so professional, attentive and super friendly. Also, he is very fast at getting something we needed, like water and hot sauce. I am very satisfied we had him as our waiter.   Also, I ordered chilaquiles and the portion size was very good- not too much and not too little. I ordered it without cheese and it was really delicious- light but crunchy, not too heavy on the sauce and just enough sour creme that the chips weren't drowning in it.   We sat outside and this guy on the street who was singing from a karaoke machine serenaded everyone with hits from Phil Collins and Lionel Richie. This kinda stuff adds to the already awesome, offbeat experience of being in Vegas!  So pretty much at HEXX, Shawn and the guy singing on the street made the best experience for my last day here!! Thanks!!

Mic0mQh9BokDJz9QBIkSMQ.text: Had a fantastic brunch at Hexx! The crab cake is fantastic, and our server Sean was attentive, courteous, and personable. We'll definitely come back!

_wS_mm-Hju78PSoAfA4JaQ.text: Went there last night with friends that live locally here. We were not disappointed at all. We were sat right away and had ordered our drinks and appetizers within minutes of sitting down. Service was fast and the drinks were amazing!  Did I mention the drinks???oh yes, the bloody Mary's have to be the best in town. Ordered the colossal and it was a total meal by itself. Great flavors and great drink. I would definitely recommend ordering this drink any time of the day.   The food was great. Friends ordered the classic burger and it looked mouthwatering. I myself  ordered the Margherita pizza and it was pretty yummy.   Overall I would recommend this place to anyone. Great service, amazing food and drinks and beautiful ambiance (especially with Bellagios water show right out the door). Go to it...you won't be disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The best bloody Mary in town!! Great service, amazing food and awesome ambiance. Hexx will have us coming back again and again

XPnGAVR4gPHhi_2Mwk6ewA.text: Fantastic location across the street from the Bellagio fountain. The fountain is visible from much of the seating. The place has a modern and fun vibe. The food and service were both excellent. The prices are high which I expect is a result of the location.

B4eDOZycxKi48amMLO0qPw.text: After a very slow beginning, the Hexx staff and menu won out! We walked up with no reservation and were seated promptly. Very busy night with a large private function going on. Waitress took our drink order and disappeared for while...drink wrong when it arrived but was quickly fixed. Guacamole was delicious! Pizza was great too! Staff very attentive and friendly! Maria was great! Full of energy! Great view of the Bellagio fountains. Good vibe. Recommended!

ZGnHzpS_4xKIQH_1fNHBpA.text: Ate here twice during our friends bachelorette weekend! Delicious food and bottomless mimosas during brunch! Our server Sean was awesome!! We loved him! Will definitely be back in the future!

DJGJe9GWTT3-nS_w0KGU7A.text: Melissa was wonderful. Such a great experience with my family. They brought a special grilled cheese off the menu request for my little niece. We can't to come back! Thanks Melissa!

iE0JWpqwya7GoaquHt3JFw.text: I came with my four girlfriends and I cannot complain about one aspect. The open wall/windows were a wonderful addition. The decor is simple and beautiful. The brunch offered anything you could want. The bottomless mimosas offered to us by our server JOSH!!!! were the.best.part. He was so friendly and accommodating and attended to us with a to-die-for smile. The fact that his family was from South Boston (we're from Boston!) was an added bonus. Basically everyone in my group concluded that the mimosas and JOSH's baby blue eyes, freckles and butt were the best part. We would recommend this restaurant to anyone. Thank you!

IP3VN3ecp9BNaR1ZTUtl2A.text: We came for Saturday brunch, had a reservation and were seated right away. The decor is fresh and light. The bottomless mimosas were on point not too heavy on the OJ. The staff are friendly and fast. The food is priced well and everything we had was great, I would highly recommend trying this place.

t2yqcUc0nQQ3izmS42M10Q.text: Went for the bottomless mimosas. Tracee was one of the best servers I have ever had, and I am picky on customer service! She was so friendly and kept the life of the party up! If you are visiting Hexx request her it is worth the wait for great service and a good time!

Ztose2gYFr_MKB45B8FhdQ.text: We had brunch here it was pretty good. Variety of food to choose from we ordered chicken chilaquiles, omelet, pancakes, coffee and their signature drink.. We got to sit in their outside area, which was a pretty cool view of the strip and the Bellagio fountains.. It's connected to a candy store that has a variety of unique buys.. We bought a couple things .. Overall I think we would go back :)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pancakes
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Omelet
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken chilaquiles

VGZdfhTwzleN9eDipTtYGw.text: Located on Strip,  quite busy during holidays. Typical service, food is decent. It's just convenient.. Location location and location.. because its on strip, right across the Bellagio Fountain.  I would recommend it to people who wants decent food, but not really expensive to visit Hexx. I had New York Striploin there, portion is not big, but taste good. Not much to say. Just a typical American restaurant and bra

8nquqcWBmfbcjXPuWyu6jA.text: I came here last weekend with my cousin who was visiting from out of town, and had an amazing experience. We both enjoyed great drinks and amazing portions. Tonight, I came to this establishment, expecting similar results, and was completely disappointed. The outside patio was not slammed at all (I worked in food industry for 5 years) but the server was completely rude to us. We had horrible service. The waiter Kevin, was nice and friendly to every patron in the establishment, but was very rude and delayed to my party of 2. When we asked for the check, he simply placed it, when we asked for a box, he rudely placed it without uttering a word of conversation. It was completely different than the way he was interacting with other guests. I must say, I was excited about this new eatery I discovered being that I went here twice in one week, but I will not be coming back.

oYa7U28RCvPEWxvK1sJtYA.text: I've been to Hexx restaurant and bar twice now, once for dinner and the second time for brunch. I absolutely love this spot! They always have great vegetarian options, and the portions are hearty - essential if you plan on making a day or night of it in Vegas. The atmosphere is beautiful. You can sit outside and watch the Bellagio fountains every 15 minutes, or you can sit inside and enjoy a really chic and cozy atmosphere. The bar is set apart from the restaurant and has an even cozier vibe - little loveseats, perfect for double dates. The drinks are well made, though I've never dabbled in their signature drinks that smoke! Quite a show :) Definitely recommend the sparkling rose!!

AIlYKb5iNpCnS3R7NIBmgA.text: Went for dinner and sat outside with view of the Bellagio fountains, the heaters kept us plenty warm.  The food was incredible. Everything we ordered was so full of great flavors and perfectly cooked. The halibut with the tomato risotto and curry broth was insane. My friend ordered the short rib which looked like something from the Flintstones and was incredibly tender.   I would totally go again

iaXZHLEE4y3vpWfB-PLv-A.text: This is hands down my favorite spot for brunch in Las Vegas. We came here today and Sean was amazing! Attentive, friendly and expeditious with our food and drink orders. The bottomless mimosas are fantastic and the location in front of the Bellagio fountains can't be beat.

mv8mYc0Y1zBhBtlJLFXANA.text: This place just opened up and honestly have the best employees! We went to the Cafe but not the restaurant and when we went in we got treated with a free sample of a gummy bear. Jesse served us our ice cream and was extremely nice! Ice cream is soooo good! Got the mango sticky rice which reminded me of island tropical mangoes! Will be coming back!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mango sticky rice ice cream!

21145NiHQVrBnzwfGx7Y9Q.text: We went for breakfast about a month after Sugar Factory become Hexx . We were disappointed that it was no longer Sugar Factory as we had always had good meals at SF.  Not knowing what to expect, we were pleasantly surprised to find that the menu was basically the same as we remembered from SF. My wife enjoyed a large omelet with some crispy potatoes...very good. I ordered the Sausage Breakfast pizza, which turned out to be enough for two people, and was also very good. This was the same order that we had the last time that we ate breakfast at SF, and the execution of the food was identical.  We enjoyed a great breakfast on the patio at the base of the Eiffel Tower and had really outstanding service. We will go back for breakfast next time we are in Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. View from patio table
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sausage Breakfast Pizza

IZt30vCGWAxg64DDZ3oYig.text: Good food and great service from Sean! Fun ambiance too on the front patio right on Las Vegas Blvd. Would definitely come here again!

EwYH42FSGjo_1J4-QaWguA.text: #need6stars. Tracee killed it. Kept the mimosas full and all around fantastic waitress.

tNimqRZ5E2LccUMgZdKR4Q.text: Came for brunch one morning in Vegas. This place would have gotten 5 stars but our server was an asshole. Nice beer selection and a lot of fun mixed drinks. Expensive but pretty typical for overpriced Vegas strip. Husband and I shared the pulled pork hash. It was good. Not incredible but pretty good.

QyvhaE9PRFwgDgzzLiCotg.text: Our waiter Tracee was absolutely amazing!! She helped us celebrate our friend Tara's 21st birthday and had such good energy! Also the food was great and the atmosphere was fun!

mWjCTo1GOjWZbBca0AogBg.text: We used to love this place... before hostess, the blonde one, called my husband an "ASSHOLE"... Brought parents here for dinner and asked for table outside. Waited for 15 minutes to be seated while there were plenty of tables. When my spouse asked , how long more to wait, she didn't find anything to tell, but "CHILL OUT"... Absolutely inappropriate behavior. Never again!

Of2wSoz5bYAIj19IJ3s1TQ.text: I came here for my birthday -  taylor and chance are the best!!! Best waitors/waitresses I've had!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. BEST WAITRESS TAYLOR

0E-R_AOyPsY8bDIkOSYc6Q.text: Well.... We came for the view of the Bellagio fountains, heard the food was ok but not spectacular for the price. I had the ceviche and a side of mushroom risotto. Both were delicious. Domaine Ott rose is not common in a restaurant so that was most enjoyable while watching the fountains dance! He had the surf and turf sliders. Interesting, but not recommended. What did detract though was the live band at the Alexas bar right next door competing with the music and the ambience at Hexx! No bueno! I'd suggest sitting outside on the patio when the weather is good and watching The Fountains having an appetizer and a glass of wine and calling it a day.

QCP3KQh7SJ5tmPzxgCRUtQ.text: Very delicious food. A little pricey but definitely worth it. There brunch menu is the best. Definitely recommend this place for breakfast. The service was terrific here!

X69MKDFoVQSXjyWufp8R8g.text: Sean and Ivan went above and beyond to make sure our experience with Hexx was above and beyond! Thanks for a great first time experience in Vegas, boys!!!!!

xwJunP77hgKl3OlHa8ExaQ.text: As much as I use Yelp, I never review or comment on any restaurant. However this time, it was necessary! Love this place! The atmosphere was great!  Food is amazing!!!! Service is totally above and beyond!!!!! Couldn't find what I wanted on the menu as a meal, but my amazing server Jan gave me wonderful accommodating suggestions! I was more than pleased with the results! Only in Vegas for less than 24 hours and couldn't have been happier with the decision of choosing HEXX for brunch! Food came out really quick, staff was extremely attentive, and accommodating! Will be back to visit on my next layover! Thank you Jan soooooo much for an awesome experience! When you have terrible service you are more likely to tell more people than when you have a great one! I will definitely RAVE about this place and JAN!!!!!!!!! So worth it!

dmXHwLxQtYyP3LBlq-1Zxw.text: Not an inexpensive place for a family of 4 to eat breakfast but we took advantage of a groupon which basically took 20 off the bill and justified the two bloody Mary's.  We had the chicken and waffles, cinnamon roll waffles, eggs Benedict and the protein egg white omelet.  The egg white omelet was mine and I know it sounds boring but I am trying to be good with my diet even while on vacation.  I am so glad I ordered it because it was delicious and not boring but was definitely not great for the diet!  I believe they used roasted dark meat chicken and of course cooked in a good amount of oil/butter.  It came with roasted potatoes that were a bit salty but also cooked perfectly with crunch bits and an English muffin which the kids ate - so much food!  I assume the eggs Benedict was good but my son devoured it in short order.  The dessert breakfast cinnamon roll waffles my daughter had was delicious.  My husbands chicken & waffles was also great but I thought the cheddar waffles would have a bit more cheddar flavor.  Would go back

8EU2eF5AZQbL1R6q0x2Arw.text: At Hexx now for brunch, and I would highly recommend! It's open early, and your glass will never be empty! We did the bottomless mimosas, and I haven't had an empty glass since we got here. Our waiter, Apolo is the man! He's the best waiter we've had in Vegas. Ask for him.

gVVnTR1tTtTWGVjTwIz4xA.text: It was an ok experience as my first time. First of all I like I can sit where you have shade and a view of the strip. The wait for my table was fast. But the food is mediocre. The burger was so dry. I think the missing spreading makes it dry. All I got is lettuce tomatoes, bacon and dry bun and the patty... sadly..I have better burger at local drive throughs. Service was decent . just bring your drinks, food and bill.. my house  Bloody Mary was good though.

ZQHElixiH87g6KdZEAmfAg.text: When we visited we ate here at least twice because it was that good. It was a bit pricey but what isn't in Vegas? The food was great as well as the service. We got seated right away and got to get a table outside right on the strip. Def recommend!

C7eUStSH4GPbWdjzzNZv0w.text: Best customer service! Tracee was the chillest waitress and got the birthday celebration started!

iXXNnPCO7oVYtf3EHeBbxg.text: Rude rude rude customer service! Husband and me wanted to fuel up before our race (Rock and roll marathon 11/11). When we arrived we were told with a big sigh that wait was 30 min we agreed and then pointed to the bar which was packed and told to wait there and very sarcastic tone, then another waitress asked for our names and then realized it wasn't us and just said "oh no not you I'm looking for someone else" and just brushed us aside. Other people were complaining that they were told to wait at the bar and after a much longer wait they were told that they would have to wait all over again for a table. WE LEFT no need for rude sarcastic waitresses and hosts that don't care about customer service at all! GOODBYE HEX!

bs_hywdCf-Z98urb-PqU1A.text: This place didn't impress me at all. I ordered Chilaquiles and what they bring me was a mountain  of chips, with very little salsa, pretty dry. The pork meat was pretty tasty. I had to order another side of salsa to make it a lil better . Service is super slow. We seat there for at list 10 minutes before anybody came and offer us water. After we order the water,it take forever to get to my table . I probably won't come back cs I know  other places with way better food and fast service. Like China poblano for example. Eggs Benedict were blah! Better order them in room service at the cosmopolitan hotel

QnrIsbujIj_qfCGvmBsxew.text: First timer here! Impressive place and great food. Good thing they're just few blocks away from our hotel. Def going back and try some of their food. Place is amaaaaaziing the servers are very attentive.

jDCSUeINFNud-SrpD38Q-w.text: Had a wonderful mousse dessert with coffee and baileys Irish creme on the cool and we'll appointed terrace while enjoying the occasional blast of the Bellagio musical water fountain directly across the street. The terrace elegantly juts into the side walk making you one with the passersby while also elevating you so not to be completely in it.  Great people watching!   The food was great but the servers Jessica and Kevin stole the show! Rarely do you find wait staff more genuine. They are good people, engaging and passionate about their craft.   Great dessert, cool vibes, incredible service, a beautiful fountain while people watching! What more do you need?

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

YVqSrnO8Xl82M_8Vs2i_bg.text: I was finally able to eat here! I have had their candy and chocolate but not food. We sat outside looking at Bellagio. Great for the water show. It was late night and they had a 10.00 breakfast special. We got that and it was great. A huge portion of food for a great deal. Staff was friendly. They even had no problem moving people to the outside heaters if asked. All around great service. I can't wait to go back.

Qc1oTK7FR1Yg7QddpfA3pw.text: This Bloody Mary was amazing!  We also had the chicken BLT and the hexx salad with the shrimp.  It was amazing!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CcH56c-4r4NIuyDIQv6eVA.text: The food and service were both outstanding. This restaurant is also fantastic for vegetarians. The veggie burger is made with beans and quinoa, which is a welcomed change from portobello patties or patties that are essentially rice cakes. There is a pretty decent beer selection as well.  The service here is also fantastic. Sean, our waiter, had a super knowledge of the menu (for example, he knew by memory that the Caesar salad had anchovies in the dressing and was not suitable for vegetarians). He was also very attentive and very amiable throughout the entire lunch. I thought he did a categorically outstanding job.  We certainly will be coming back here.

rblnhFClV7SV4h-aAA33vw.text: Food was good we came because of a groupon discount and we werent disappointed.  Had patio seating which is a great spot for watching the Bellagio fountains.

yxd32uFTqqH7twM5KZ3PvA.text: Came here while on vacation with my husband and the food was good and they have plentiful portions. I had the chicken and waffles which had a different take as far as flavors but I found it to be pretty tasty. My husband had the meat omelet which was a nice size and served with huge potatoes. The location and the ambience was really nice. We had Sean as our sever and he did a great job!! Very friendly and kept checking on us and made sure we were happy with everything. All and all I would recommend this restaurant and will come back here again.

zERwlmABtudM2V62GXJMgg.text: Amazing! What is not to love? The atmosphere is great, service was top notch, and the food was delicious. We shared a pitcher of red sangria (ask your server) and we each ordered the Hexx Benedict. It was one of the best egg benedicts I've had. The complimentary chocolate taster at the end of our meal was a nice touch. Can't wait to come back during our next visit.

kie-vxX-ChbAyXizZ8aK0Q.text: Amazing food, BEST view of the Bellagio Fountains, gorgeous decor and great ambiance. Also incredibly nice staff, very responsive, well managed. Shout-out to Juan the manager who took very good care of us and all the management team and staff members contributed to a beautiful artistic culinary experience. I especially enjoyed the Bloody Mary, crispy broccolini appetizer, and Jambalaya.

PqKkTEF4rnyq6EljDMoxYQ.text: I ate lunch at Hexx today and was quite disappointed after reading such great reviews. We waited 45 minutes for our food, and judging by the ice cold steak placed in front of me, our food waited for quite a while too. My eggs, ordered over medium, were basically raw. My tablemate's diablo Bloody Mary was just horrible, although the other bloody Mary's we ordered were decent. To top off the already mediocre experience, we were seated in the rain and had to move to a new table ourselves after asking the waitstaff to move us several times. Not the experience I expect when paying $40/head pre-alcohol.

nsC4RvxaLU71Iy5c5s4qPw.text: We wanted to go somewhere fancy while visiting vegas and found groupon for this place. We were very glad we chose this place. We had our best steak in this place. We got seated with amazing view of bellagio fountain at night time. Our server was really nice and was recommending what was good on the menu.  Menu was not that big but their salad appetizer, steak and short ribs all of them were totally worth it.

OR2bcGKVwxEk3Hza2gBlJA.text: Came here on a Friday night and was surprised to find it fairly empty for being right on the strip. Not necessarily a bad thing it was actually quite nice to escape the craziness of the strip without straying to far. Had the margherite pizza and it was heavenly. I'm typically not a big thin crust eater but it was done so well I had no complaints! The Cosmo I ordered was delicious I had to remind myself the night was only beginning before I ordered another one! Service was great not once did our water glasses drop below half before someone was already refilling it! Will definitely return on our next Vegas trip!

An5Bm1cFip4v-42v4Oi4ZQ.text: Brunch was by far the best one I have attended in Vegas. Our waitress, Melissa made or time worth it. She was very patient and was very helpful when it came to explaining different dishes on the menu. If you come here, request Melissa for a superb service.

wt6VY7RypnP_Qcm_g1Z6jw.text: Delish brunch! I feel like Tracee saved my life! Lol! My mimosa was never empty. The food was great! Check it!

VAxeYbjJrJ3pbc8t2-kbSg.text: Delicious! I went for Brunch on Sunday in a group of 7 and tried almost everyone's food. No complaints from me or anyone else at the table.

irbLzL1sKNbRr54NRDcf-g.text: DINNER REVIEW  As most of these reviews are for brunch I felt compelled to share our experience for dinner here. Hexx could possibly be the best on Las Vegas Blvd restaurants. The views/service/food was simply fantastic.  We got a great table on the patio where we were met by Kevin. A funny but great server! He was great with suggestions and really made our experience great. We started off with the crab cakes and spinach artichoke dip. The crab cakes were delicious. Very clean and fresh tasting and I love how the sauce that came with it was very light and did not drown out the crab cake.  The spinach artichoke was great too, one of the best I had.  For dinner, I had the short rib and my lady had the seabass. The short rib came with a delicious mash and Brussel sprouts on the plate. It was fantastic. One of the best things I've ever eaten. The short rib was so soft it was easy to simply flake with a fork.  My lady's Seabass was phenomenal. It was so unbelievably fresh and clean. The dish itself was so refreshing and delicious. It wasn't fishy at all and was super mild. Seared to perfection and perfectly cooked.  One of my favorite things parts about Hexx is the chocolate bar. After we had our meal, Kevin walked us over to the chocolate bar where we got to see chocolatiers make chocolate from scratch and got the chance to taste all the chocolates they offer.  Overall, with the great food, service, and views, this restaurant is the best bang for your buck on the strip. I love the experience of the chocolate factory next door. Finally a restaurant on the strip that offers more than just great food, but a great experience as well. Well done Hexx! We'll be back and so should you!

dgHh-WA-gSM1cdKw1PfmGw.text: The restaurant had amazing ambiance and the decor was nice! My server Jody was beyond amazing, the best service i have ever had! The calamari was a perfect match to the potion she recommended! Very happy with my experience!

OSFVhbCr1eX-i1BON3d-nQ.text: Melissa took amazing care of us. I will ask for her every time. She was so personable and attentive. She definitely made our brunch perfect! The food was fantastic as well. Great portions.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Meat omelette with potatoes and mimosas.

j8_GCZkwsKiZAg0NJ4I0qA.text: Went here with a group of friends and we found the food to be good and fairly priced for the location. It's right across from the Bellagio fountains, so you can get a nice view depending where you're seated. I had the burger and it was tasty, juicy, and a good size. Portions all seemed to be good size. Service was good and it wasn't that crowded around 6pm, much to my surprise. I'd visit again if I was in town on the strip.

vV58jPmAdezV6eLnc6hRSg.text: If I could leave a less star I would! This was the WORST service I have ever had by far.. I ordered a glass of wine from LISA she had the manager come over and card me as well NEVER got the wine, then my family ordered their appetizers and Lisa never cared to ask for my order she just walked away.. we asked the manager for a new server but he did not allow so my friend had went and asked another server to tell ours i needed to put in my app, food comes and we never seen our server again for at least 30 min and when she finally comes back she ask if we wanted a dessert.... well Lisa we would of liked to of had dinner since that was the whole point of coming here but no we declined because at this point we just wanted to leave. Get the check and we wait another 15 min for her to come back and when she does she said "do you need change" I have always found that disrespectful and greedy you should just bring the money back and let the customer leave what they want. I loved the calamari I had but that's all I ordered so not much else I can say great about this place. I could see this place being great just DO NOT LET ***LISA**BE YOUR SERVER!!!

LHq0jreBFEJ47_z5CSgTgw.text: Tracee is AMAZING!!!! We went to Hexx for a bachelorette brunch and she made the brunch SO. MUCH. FUN. Like I wish we could hire her to be our hype person for the whole trip. She's the mimosa ninja. You NEED to come here on your trip. Also, get the chilaquiles bc they're bomb and aren't as spicy as everyone says. You can handle it boo.

mkTBnrVTkSVFY4YMLs4Xww.text: Location, location, location! HEXX has prime real estate on the strip. You get a great view of the Bellagio fountains from the patio section. The food is okay and a little overpriced (but whatever, its Vegas!) but the location can't be beat! The patio serves as a great refuge from all the sun and is a good spot for some people watching. The inside was nicely decorated as well but it was beautiful day outside the day we came.   Although the patio is first come, first served - we made a request for it in our reservation and they were able to easily accommodate us. We ordered the smothered fries for the table to share. They tasted just how you would expect -  fries smothered with gravy and cheese. This dish came out extremely fast which was a good thing for us because we needed something to munch on after a night of drinking. They could have let the cheese melt for longer though because in some sections, the cheese was a coagulated mess. Our table of 4 ordered all three of the omelet options (protein, veggie, and meat). Omelets were all okay - kinda wish we ordered something else but everyone was feeling eggs. The smashed potatoes that were served with the omelets were pretty good and seasoned well. Pricing is reasonable for Las Vegas. Oh...they provide you with dark chocolate at the end with cute little "spells". Cute touch! I wouldn't go out of my way to dine here again but it was just the type of place we needed to chill at after a night out.

u0cvYMvoiBl5sowENEyA1Q.text: Food is great. Unlimited Mimosa, combined with great service, and outside seating,  makes this a great place for breakfast/brunch.

zIr8D6CWkXg_E-GsXY68XA.text: Breakfast pizzas pretty good. Omelette and Carrot Cake pancakes were awesome. Bottomless mimosas were great and now $23 not $20 as shown. Service was very good and people watching was fantastic sitting out on the patio just across from Bellagio's fountains.  We will make this a priority on next visit

qJqv095XmB-08TjlJQJF-Q.text: My daughter and I went there for breakfast. Sean our waiter was the best. He special ordered chocolate chip pancakes for my daughter and was very accommodating. My corned beef hash was awesome too.

aEJnZeULARV2GEjEurvkaA.text: In one word, PHENOMENAL! We were served by Teddy who was very kind and funny. He gave us  the ideal Vegas dining experience. Very fast service & food came out fast. We had the pork rinds as an appetizer, then the spaghetti & meatballs and the short rib plates. The short rib was nice and tender atop fluffy & tasty mashed potatoes and the spaghetti was a nice portion. I was appreciative of the reasonably priced Prosecco on the menu. I really liked the chocolate fortune and the view is great for people watching and taking in the Vegas vibes. Will recommend to everyone back home!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chocolate tasting -free!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fortune chocolate
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spaghetti &amp; Meatballs

5ZD84KIUvofWy3SfadV--A.text: Great location and food that can't be beat. The sticky bun was perfect to share. The margarita pizza had a perfectly thin and crispy crust. My husband raved about the turkey club sandwich and fries - said they were the best fries he has had.  We came because we thought it would be a fun atmosphere, and we ended up with the best meal of our Vegas trip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Turkey Club Sandwich
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sticky Bun
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margherita Pizza

yb0sj0QfQGJGeBcplgwPgw.text: made reservation for 3 but ended us being 4of us. Hostess was very friendly and helpful sat us right away even though they were getting really busy..line out the door..  Menu is daily prices and some good choices..  all is enjoyed our meal and they even prepared one of the meals gluten free for a member in our party. She was very happy! :) tried their espresso Manhattan.. was interesting.  over all great experience.. Only negative comment will be, that it's very loud in there and couldn't hear each other cross the table.  but very open and nice environment. will be back

kDhWy3sqRJSBZf8eR745Yg.text: Out of the 100+ times I've been to Vegas, I can't understand why I have not stopped in here. I built my own omelette and had a English muffin on the side. It was delicious. Comes out really quick and while you're waiting the endless mimosas don't hurt. The weekend I went there was a big festival going on and it seemed like one huge party in there. The servers were so nice, I remember talking to a waiter about the opening of the Janet Jackson show that was happening that night. It was a great time. We ended up coming here twice on our short 3 day trip. The food is also very reasonably priced. This will be a staple on my Vegas getaways from now on.

BQ_ocm8qdecQQ-L4ECWTEQ.text: We had a wonderful meal at Hexx last week. I ordered the Hexx Burger, which was really tasty and satisfying. My wife had the prime rib dip. It was the best I've ever had. In fact, I don't think it even needed the au jus - it was that tender and juicy.   Would definitely recommend and hope to return the next time we're in Vegas.

sS1909l2lSeJG-vVHzBfAg.text: Amazing location on the strip with such a cool vibe! The seating options were different as some of the options included couches with a table. Huge screen on the wall which was perfect for keeping up with the March Madness games. The restaurant was very open so you were able to enjoy the nice weather while still being inside. The menu had a wide variety of choices and the food came out with such a great presentation. Portion size was still very filling and the food tasted delicious. There is an uber pickup/drop off right around the corner, and is like a 2min walk. Will be back next time I'm in the city!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict with Avocado

LAugvoze_T3sLnrNOeQcLg.text: Tasted great. Surprisingly delicious.  Ate breakfast at the bar. Asked for bacon Got sausage didn't eat. Didn't mention it probably wouldn't have eaten either. Had a Mimosa average taste. But I drank It all It was that good  I would eat there again

88Uxl0Wi_-Qdr57o-Qd6Uw.text: This is a dichotomy. The menu wants to be haute. The surroundings and decor wants to be a restaurant chain. They are partially successful on both accounts.   The spinach dip was a nice start. A warm cheesy mix with some crispy edges, but an almost full basket of chip pieces, rather than whole chips made scooping it up difficult.   The Shrimp Limone was almost great. The shrimp was cooked perfectly, but the surrounds did not display the finesse you'd expect. It was almost sloppy.   In any other city in America, this would be a radically overpriced restaurant. In LV, average. Because of this crazy overpricing of food in Vegas, you tend to rate meals based on typical prices. That being the fact, this would clearly be a 3 Star. In LV where water is expensive, I have no choice but to rate it 4.

tre0FYwSuX0z-g68eWOnMg.text: We did bottomless mimosas on a Saturday here with six people. We were promptly seated and we ordered the mimosas as soon as we were seated. The server was very quick to bring us water and the mimosas. The mimosas were a good mix of champagne and oj. The servers were really good about making sure our glazed were always filled so we got our monies worth.   I got the eggs Benedict which was different but good. I really liked the potatoes instead of the English muffin. The hollandaise sauce was a good consistency, not too thick.   We had a Groupon which the manager took care of immediately.  Overall it was good service, food and mimosas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict

nhE4R6A-QRk345GRmPBfVg.text: What a delightful afternoon! Great venue to be seated across the Bellagio fountains and enjoying me some sangria. Our wonderful server Lake was so attentive and friendly. Quick to clean the tables and ask for any thing we need. Keep up the great work Lake! Food was very tasty, we decided to order second round of ceviche. Overall was a good experience and would recommend this place.

MGsSiP-K-gYPMJVvq_m4xA.text: Saw this place walking down the LV strip and said "we HAVE to go there" .... 2 days later we finally did and it was worth it. The wait was about 30 min for brunch (on a Sunday) but the views and the ambience were definitely pretty dope. The menu had a variety of options so if you wanted pizza, nachos, or breakfast, it was available. Ordered the French Toast for about $12 but unfortunately there's no "combo" type option, so you have to add some sides for about $4-5 each depending on what you get. French Toast wasn't anything special to look at, nothing creative, however (comma) the brioche bread was really good .. an added benefit is being able to watch the Bellagio water shows while you eat from inside or outside .. Would definitely would recommend a drop in if you're near the Paris Eiffel Tower

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Brioche French Toast, Cheese Eggs and Bacon (a la carte) ... French Toast was quite delectable

r6serM7gmKUSx3-KDFqpdw.text: Boy oh Boy!!  I am stuffed.   Our group visited Hexx for Brunch twice this week.    Hexx is a trendy restaurant on the strip.    The food was great and prices are reasonable.    They also offer  unlimited mimosas for $25.  I took advantage of that deal!!!

u-le6C53dq65fM_Kth1YcQ.text: Jayjay was our server today and he was absolutely amazing. The food was delicious and our glasses never even got to half full. Best service on the strip. Thanks jayjay!!!
