AlHLo6NObMJ7NWmF8rVMcg.text: Sunday Brunchin' at HEXX was wonderful. I love the open feel, ambience, and misted-patios. This place is beautiful -- bright and cheery! I highly recommend sitting on the patio. It's nice to people-watch and also get a clear view of the Bellagio water fountain show. Winning!   The food was delicious. What we ordered:   -- Cheesy Bread for appetizer - It came out warm and golden. Eat it right away while it's hot! It was absolutely delicious!   -- Eggs Benedict with Au Gratin Potatoes - When it came out, it looked average, but don't let this fool you. It was Really good! One of the tastiest Eggs Benedict I've ever had (and I've had a lot). Love the salty, sweet, creamy flavors -- all in one!   -- Carrot Cake Pancakes - Good, but it didn't taste much like carrot cake? I couldn't hardly taste the carrot at all. It just tasted like normal pancakes, but it was good nonetheless.  -- Tiramisu dessert - I was expecting something that looked and tasted more like the traditional Tiramisu cake... but this one had a nice presentation, although you basically get bread with chocolate, coffee, amaretto, and cream on the side. You just put everything together yourself. I wasn't feeling it. Let's just say, it looked better than it tasted! Would pass on this...  Service was good, but expect to be charged for everything. When the pancakes came out, it didn't look like the yelp picture which had whip cream on it. The waitress was nice to offer taking it back for whip cream (which was delicious btw), but failed to advise me that there will be a $3 charge for it. I thought it was included with the pancakes?? It wasn't much, but as a courtesy if they're charging extra for something, I think they should mention it.   Brunch came to $80 which was a bit expensive for brunch, but what do you expect from Vegas? We didn't order much except those 4 items, plus 3 juices and 1 coffee for 2 adults & 1 child. I would come here again though because loved the ambience and food.

zhDFJlLQnvlY7TqYbKDfQw.text: Beautiful breakfast spot. Elegant. Tons of light. Lovely ambiance. Every one of us polished off our plates. We ordered the French Toast Brioche, Corned Beef Hash, Pancakes, Poached Eggs, Side of Potatoes.  The service was incredible. We worked with Anthony and Apollo. Both of them were fun, fantastic at reading cues, charming, and had awesome personalities.   Absolutely recommend.

mxrHXcS7sJ--t_An5dK8Ng.text: Great place for brunch if you're on or near the strip. The fact that they take reservations is a major plus! Location is also super prime, right across from the Bellagio Fountains so if you're sitting outside (which I highly recommend) you'll have great views of the bustling strip and the fountains.   The food here is on par with the location. I had the Chicken & Waffles which were fantastic! And the Carrot Cake Waffles on the menu looked so good we just had to get it as well. Long story short we ordered more than we could handle but it was totally worth it! Highly recommend this location to all you brunchaholics out there!

Lm6TV-nfN-winVde048BaA.text: My friends came here for brunch as it was supposedly one of the few places with bottomless mimosas but the food overall wasn't that good and there are so many other options to eat and get drunk around Vegas.  I had the Hexx Benedict and it was like a pile of gloop. The eggs were runny and that's normally fine on an English muffin or drier carb, but on scalloped potatoes it just became a messy affair, with it just being a liquid, unpleasant ooze.  The mimosas weren't all that good either. It tasted like crappy orange juice concentrate was used with cheap champagne.  Overall this place wasn't that great and I'd avoid coming back here.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hexx Eggs Benedict

lvOH5FXT-D84fHplTqmmbQ.text: I like it!!!   Good location, good food!  Had both brunch and dinner here during the last year or so.  Patio seating is fun since people watching in Vegas is must.  I'll be back!

eAqp6BcvFjSZgOsLoLRuLA.text: Hexx Kitchen was delicious. Beautiful place to eat. I had the all meat omelette and it didn't need any extra seasoning except pepper. It was very satisfying and gets you full.

O6ayRF8qEvDUByBHzmTZ4g.text: Had a reservation, waited about 30 extra minutes to be seated. The restaurant seemed super busy when we came in, so I gave them a pass...   Until we were seated and noticed legitimately 15-20 dirty tables with no customers at the tables, waiting to be cleaned, with nobody cleaning them. And dozens of tables waiting to be seated. That's unacceptable.   Food took a LONG time to come out, around 50-60 minutes. Tables next to us who were seated before us got their food much quicker than us, a table of three. When we ask our waitress, she proceeds to disappear for another 15mins without explanation, then the food comes out after that time. With no apologies or explantation. I guess she just pretended that never happened...  Food was okay, not the worst, not the best. It's fine. But the service and management of this restaurant might have been the worst I've seen in Vegas.

v7jF-q7PniJTOsIscdYFyw.text: IT'S NOT THE SUGAR FACTORY ANYMORE!!!  This place is horrible. Overpriced food and horrible customer service. This place just opened, but it's so not worth the money. It's a wannabe 5 star restaurant. Just trying to warn you guys to save your money. Unless you wanna pay $50 for a hamburger.

SWTA7QrCHQ6OYq0qxWz14A.text: Hexx is a nice looking place in a great part of the strip, however we received some of the worst service I have ever had. After being seated, it took us 20 minutes to be asked for our drink order and then another 30 minutes to receive our drinks. It was not even a complicated order, simply 4 beers, two glasses of wine and a couple of vodka tonics. The place was far from packed and the bar just had two people sat at it, so to have to wait nearly an hour for drinks was completely horrendous. In addition to that, one of our party ordered a steak cooked rare and it turned up medium well done. When he spoke to the waiter, he then removed just the steak, leaving the rest of the meal and returned 15 minutes later with it cooked properly. Meaning the rest of the meal was cold by the time his steak turned up! To top things off, they did not comp the steak until we complained to the manager. The rest of the food was actually pretty decent when it turned up, but at that point our night was ruined. My tip is for you not to go here, unless you don't intend on doing anything else that night.

vlHg_jmpy0Ib-S-HUFYrCw.text: Great service. Food is decent price. Food isn't the best but definitely good enough. Really good location right across from Bellagio fountain. For the price and atmosphere, I'll definitely come again.

Ax7p8nEakrZ-9OqiZXUcTA.text: 10 out of 10 recommend the potato balls. ask for tracee and get the unlimited mimosas. u will not be disappointed. give tracee a big hug for me

RerLm6nMTdoeKhmWitalHA.text: I made this reservation when it was still Sugar Factory, but ended up changing over to Hexx.  It was still a great restaurant and nice to sit outside and watch the people walk by on the strip.  Dessert was still delicious!

22A0zSnAUA-moLJWJRgBwQ.text: food was amazing. jack cakes with bacon and butter. bottomless mimosas for $23. The problem was our waitress. if its a bottomless service i don't want to see.my glass empty for multiple extended periods of time. I spe t hf my time waiting for drink refills. Get on the ball. It's Sunday brunch!!!! Maybe Tracee had a shit day.

oakqGpyC40f8dtOVHMSayw.text: Tracee at Hexx is the mimosa ninja. Bottomless mimosas with this girl will be your best brunch ever. Food was great but Tracee will make it that much better. Highly recommended!

vb87uBjdRDCKx3BaALAnAA.text: Slow service and when we ordered a pizza, burger and appetizer for 1 adult and 1 child, the waitress didn't even think to mention the size of the pizza being enough to feed two. Way too much food and we waited so long before anyone even offered us a drink despite the place being over half empty. The good: nice decor (although my daughter's chair had a loose point that kept poking her and she was too embarrassed to let me switch it out for her), and the patio seating is nice.

baIfNsVvWi29A-hSlRP7zA.text: We arrived at hexx Friday morning for breakfast tracee made it such a WONDERFUL experience I would recommend requesting her. We come here all the time when we're in town  Chilaquiles definitely our favorite. You will not be disappointed!!!!!! Cheers!!!!!!!!

BrsM_hbEDhAuLkG2WSw1jA.text: This past weekend while I was visiting vegas I came to hexx to eat some good food . I had some of the best service and good I had in a long time . The servers name was Julio and he recommended this huge and amazing tasting bloodily Mary !!! The food was amazing as well but I would def go back to this place just to be served by Julio

cUz96tfIVyuzjpg9qwjRsw.text: This place is amazing for brunch! The food sizes are great and it tastes delicious! The bottomless mimosas are top notch! Tracee was our "mimosa ninja" and she made sure our glasses were always filled. This place does not disappoint!

LVHwUR6Gv8VkP1BFH9TUDA.text: we have stayed @ Paris 3 times now but this was our first time eating @ Hexx.   the food and service was amazing!    we leave tomorrow morning but want to eat here one more time at least.   Will for sure go again our next stay in Vegas.   two thumbs up!!

a_aQNLyxOXEh-g1mW7zzAQ.text: Stopped in for lunch.  Drinks were awesome, and the burgers were delicious.  Sit in the bar area to avoid the hectic atmosphere of the Strip.  The bartender took good care of us.

GEI-lxO9n1S4xHjychm2JQ.text: Came here for breakfast and bottomless mimosas with two others and a forth to join later. The server was frequently unavailable and many times we searched for her for refills and the time I had to send my breakfast of frittata back due to lack of sausage in it. She came back with excuse that bar was busy(8am?) It eventually got so bad(20 mins for a refill and dropped check without us asking) I had to go speak with manager; she was pleasant and our service went better. Our forth joined but our bill was over $150 and my meal was sent back and only three was drinking mimosas; just expected a little courtesy from manager. I would never recommend this place.

TERxBqLhcc3uVz0WbvUDsA.text: Looked like a really cool place and the menu is very impressive. Couldn't wait to try the chicken and waffles... However, after sitting at the bar for almost 10 minutes unacknowledged, and then after a bartender asking if I had been helped and handing me a menu I sat there another several minutes with no water and no service. I don't know if they were severely understaffed or unprepared for this Saturday afternoon but I'm terribly disappointed I walked here from down the strip and left hungry and disappointed.

T0Rq_B0oDCSjbDmN3CyRFw.text: Went there for lunch with some friends while we were staying at Paris Hotel. What a great choice! Had the Chinese chicken salad, Margherita pizza, pasta, and spinach artichoke dip. The pasta was a little bland the rest was exceptional. Best salad I've had in a while. But it's not just food that makes a restaurant great...IT'S THE SERVICE. And I have to say the service was also exceptional. I would recommend it and I will be back for sure. Nice job Hexx!!

QyPyvyMqefmK5UAc-ybPbA.text: Fantastic food, fantastic beverages (bottomless mimosa ), but most of all, our waiter Sean was AWESOME! Breakfast was phenomenal and just the little things made our meal so great and his warming and courteous manner is an asset to Hexx! Keep it up!

CZgHoKr4jrK64vOvmX-H-Q.text: I got there just in time for brunch and bottomless and it was the best decision I've made in this city. The omelette I had was amazing given that it wasn't super expensive. The service was the best part though. Johana was on it with the bottomless mimosas and my glass was never empty. If you're thinking about a bottomless brunch, definitely hit this place up

VS8ubt-naRpjiYew-gbQ8g.text: They may be Hexxed.  Hmmm... Lets just say they are brand new and are on the strip. That's good.  Isaac the manager was kind enough to visit and apologize for the poor service and mis-marked prices on their high end sprits. He wouldn't fix the problem. If you are not turned off by the greeters, you may be...  Since they were charging $51 per shot for $18 tequila at the Bellagio, we went back to the Bellagio. I'm happy to pay $100 a glass for the good stuff.

Cf9B0k9hcS0zbdbxD4yLWw.text: Dinner with my husband. the spinach and artichoke dip and Broccolini appetizer were to die for. Al had the jambalaya (better than New Orleans) and I had the short ribs (melt in your mouth tenderness). Our server Jessica and Manager Mike Main were very attentive. We even got a complimentary dessert. Our over all experience was excellent.

VWXqRNjB3Qrol-8m8za05Q.text: Great food and great location. I had the chicken and waffles while people watching on the blvd. Great great experience and my food was delicious and visually pleasing. I highly recommend this place. Prices are very reasonable too. Great get away from all the buffet food

SAHhbyUtv1OhsLbukKkKMg.text: Came to this place after a long drive. So glad we did!! This is a nice restaurant with cool drinks! The steak with egg on top was delicious. Don't order the poke tuna. It's way too small for $16!!!! Waste of money. The salad wedge was delicious and so was the HUGE Bloody Mary!!!

5zwfe3wAWcAW3wVn8HXlog.text: The food was phenomenal. I forgot to take pictures but the four of us shared 2 veggie omelets, a breakfast croissant, and an order of the chilaquiles. Everything tasted wonderful and was cooked perfectly. Would definitely recommend.

dKYDabmubsRdDHByrrBn6Q.text: While looking for a good brunch place in Vegas we stopped by Hexx and tried it out. One of the best choices we have made. The food was awesome and our waiter provided good service and was very attentive to ensure my mimosa glass wasn't empty. I'm telling all my friends who visit to make some time and enjoy Hexx while visiting in Vegas.

LXk85To9BRunnNjIyTDeOw.text: Tracee was absolutely fantastic. Loved her, she took such great care of our table! The food came out so quick, she was so friendly, and attentive. 12/10!

oy4H6JPtY1VEv3KGxteJRQ.text: Tracee(with 2 e's) was amazing! So friendly and quick! We loved the great atmosphere and amazing service :)

u4nC2Ve8kr9xMdCNyjaq9A.text: Tracy and Patrick were very attentive and made sure we were taken care of. This place is awesome I would highly suggest coming here!

HWJg1iZzVVPFs0kWAdLuBQ.text: Great view of the strip, we had meet omelet and cinnamon waffles, both were delicious. I only gave 4 stars because of the size of the tables, so tiny! We like to share our food which means we always need extra plates, there is just not enough space to be comfortable. My husband ended up knocking the creamer pot off the table

ZiLvKaP21WVlianxnDA_Fw.text: So disappointed with their food.  I ordered the hexx Benedict and it was super bland.  My partner ordered French toast which was nothing special.  Then I ordered the chocolate hazelnut pudding which was another disappointment.  Overall this place has pricey bland food but I believe you're paying for the water show across the street at the Bellagio.

fIiwYo62QqxnF5O7r3zQGw.text: Service was ok. I never expect too much as a local when going anywhere on the strip. It was cute and that was the initial thing that drew ya to go there. Not sure if I would go back again, food was good but nothing really gave me the desire to want to go back from the overall experience.

mH5vVHXpjjjx-lmIetZ-_Q.text: Went to this spot for brunch today and wow was it good! I took some friends from out of town here and we ordered the bottomless mimosas and I had the meat omelette which was loaded with great flavor. We were seated outside on the patio with a view of the Bellagio fountains across the street. Morning person or not, mouthwatering food and mimosas with a spectacular view will start your day off on a high note, cheers Las Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

kAviiRQssDuPZo2Kr-YYzA.text: BE AWARE OF THE HIDDEN FEE ON YOUR RECEIPT CALLED CNF CHARGE WHICH WILL BE 4.7% of your total bill.  This is very deceptive and unnecessary.  Heard a few other places  are following suit.   Skip the strip, shop and stay downtown.  Between the resort fees, parking fees,  and the CNF fees, this is SO ridiculous.    I feel sorry for the servers because people generally will not leave as big of a tip as they normally would.  Wake up you greedy las vegas casinos and restaurant owners...........before it is too late.

BbqJcqsLq93krafHjvZMCw.text: This place was phenomenal great great great!! Highly recommend. The crab cake was very good

9camEURWSsXiB1pgEovz1w.text: Delicious brunch food and bottomless mimosas is my kind of place!!! It's $23 for the mimosas or you can get a $36 Bloody Mary which also looks on point but I am more of the bottomless type   One disappointment I had was the fact that you can't mix juices on the mimosas, I prefer passion fruit or pineapple in my mimosas but I choked down the orange bc it was a good ratio.  We ordered the chilaquiles and the french dip which were yummy, but I have had better in my home town (hard to beat San Antonio chilaquiles). They also brought the champagne ice free for my birthday which was really tasty!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict over potatoes
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken blt
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles

tXOzKavolFQdt2lzLmC_Cg.text: Servers name was Olivia. Outstanding customer service! Food was great as always!

VHiSrfIbP44UVZoCNCrwWg.text: THE spot for #Brunch & bottomless mimosas!  Natalie was our server and was absolutely amazing! Our bottomless mimosas were never empty! Man up and wait out the line as they can sms you when your table is ready while you mill about. You won't be disappointed for views of the Bellagio fountain, service, and satisfaction!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

LF3Kvife7RQfgB2XSHvoIw.text: The food? Excellent  The service? IMPECCABLE! The mimosas? Amazing  I work in a food restaurant as well but this place impressed even me.  They have great service, they make a personal experience for you even when you are one of 100 checks in the place. Sean was our main server and Myrna was our secondary and both paid so much attention to us it was incredible. So nice and attentive. The food was absolutely delicious but even if it was subpar I would come back surely for the service. Management  here is trusty blessed with great workers

XSsOT44kghcxmGHd6ql3gg.text: Ask for Tracee! She has the best energy and made the bachelorette party so much fun. We had a group of 20 and she was attentive to each of us! You HAVE to get the bottomless mimosas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

dPwkjpiEidaD5JkDxTMVOA.text: Very good place to eat a get together with friends Where entertaining view from Bellagio fountain good food and drinks

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

9RJ4sZYX6Lh5YizY4ruqLg.text: The best bottomless mimosas! Really fast & friendly servers. Kept the refills coming quickly.

GzlbMhnhFiKqtrpgP7TAoQ.text: Little pricey, but good place to eat. Pizza and pasta were both good. Awesome vibe on the strip and the service was really good. I do wonder how so many places just like this can be found in Vegas, without anything to make them stick out

WOvl28qlVQV5YQouhfJHAQ.text: Happy hour was on our minds,  so we stepped into the bar and enjoyed the good food and drink.   Started with blueberry rickey cocktails which were refreshing and effervescent.  $7 so a good deal and worth it!   Appetizers and pizza are 20% off during happy hour.  We shared a crab cake and a pizza margherita, and both were well made.    Nice ambiance and good service, so recommend coming here for happy hour.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

26_Xt8C1TFp_kRziWtYfoA.text: This place was recommended by a friend. The ambience was very nice and relaxing. It is right off the Las Vegas strip inside the Paris Hotel. The brunch menu had lots of options. I had the chicken and waffle with blueberries. The chicken was good, not dry at all. To quench the thirst I had the unlimited mimosas. The waitress was great on not letting my glass get empty. For dessert I had the peanut butter cheesecake which was ok. I should have gotten the red velvet cake. Overall this restaurant is nice and recommend this place

2OfklXluO5zez59F3qQu8g.text: Las Vegas cattle call!  3rd time here but my last for sure.  Service was non-existent and they're just interested in turning tables over.  Food was good even if it came our lukewarm.  It really sucks because the location is great and the atmosphere is charged but when you have to ask for utensils, coffee and condiments when chunking down  $60 for breakfast for two it gets pretty old.

XuVuaD3O0g5sffVh4jukOw.text: I'll start with a positive- really wonderful, really fast service. Everyone who tended to our table was awesome, and our server even went out of his way to see if the chef could make something for us that wasn't on the current menu. Now the actual review- overpriced and mediocre. But that's generally been my experience with most restaurants similar to this. Very modern menu items that sound interesting, subpar execution. I know they are not a steakhouse, but I think medium rare is pretty self explanatory. The steak was hardly even pink in the center. I also had the calamari and surf n' turf sliders. The calamari was well cooked, but I was not a huge fan of the Buffalo sauce on top or the fact that almost half of the dish was sliced carrots and celery. The sliders were almost good, but it was just a miss as far as flavor goes. The short rib on the sliders was dry, and they were cold within a couple of minutes of arriving at the table because there was so much coleslaw on them. The sauce on the short rib just didn't work well with the lobster slaw. I wouldn't recommend them. Their pizza was very good! I'd say that was the best value and flavor of all of the menu items I tried.

kWS_aqXuiCs1Fo8LAtZDLg.text: Besides waiting almost 10 minutes to be acknowledged by staff, this place was fairly pleasant. Their menu isn't that large, but I still think it has something for everyone. I enjoyed the prime rib dip and my boyfriend found the chicken BLT to be "just alright".

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

xqw47xeq5Vnf3pZgAxEixA.text: This place is great.  The atmosphere is wonderful. They also have seating right out on the Blvd. so the bellagio fountain is right there while you're dinning.  And also check out their tapas menu.  Great tapas!

fYbJ089FbN5RBZOr6nOL3g.text: I came here Friday right after me and my friends got off the plane and were dying for breakfast and mimosas!!! First of all our waitress Theresa (praying that's her name, hard to remember after 5th mimosa), she was AMAZINNG! So sweet and hilarious, we always had a full glass and a smile. Also brought me a birthday treat and made everyone sing to me! We absolutely adored her and the food was really good as well! Next time I'm in Vegas I hope to return and pray she's still there!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

u_VOF8oq27Eapz4ogPNiAw.text: We had a reservation for a big group but were seated 45 minutes after the reservation time, even though we were on time. They then told us they had run out of croissants and mimosas...terrible experience.

azoRzkCHRmc6I92K81nAaQ.text: Wow, were we pleasantly surprised by this gem.  My husband said that the short ribs may be the best he's ever had in his life.  The 16 oz prime ribeye for $38 is a great deal.  I loved my carpaccio and my husband's crab cake looked like it weighed in at 1/2 a pound.  The peanut butter cheesecake is fab and the service was attentive, precise and well appointed.  Our server, Tom, appeared for our every need, and stayed away when we didn't need him.  He never interrupted us, but seemed to appear our of nowhere when we wanted something.  We plan on coming back here, especially since the Bellagio fountains put on a show from the main dining room here!

LPmVI3YpWzjFb-5ipChzfA.text: We made a reservation on OpenTable and all our special request were met when we arrived. We were seated immediately on the patio just like we requested.   We choose the outside patio, as it quieter and quite lovely. The waiter greeted us and they offered three types of water: Pellegrino, Fiji, and tap. One of the reasons we choose the patio is because you can see the fountains of Bellagio show beautiful entertainment while you wait for your meal.   We ordered the shrimp scampi, spaghetti with meatballs and the chicken parmesan! Everyone enjoyed the food with some white wine as well. They also have a very large selection of wines which was really nice!  I must say that you do have to wait for your food, so don't be in a rush (the fountain show makes the time go by a lot quicker).  My scampi was very good, the sauce wasn't too thick and very buttery. They are also really generous with the shrimp! And the bread was my favorite part soft and buttery nicely toasted.   Definitely, a place to try on the strip!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Patio seating
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chicken Parmesan, spaghetti with meat balls and the shrimp scampi!

E5bzw5HB8PTHenffr28pEQ.text: I was excited to try this place as the food looked amazing and the reviews seemed to suggest it as well. I ordered the Chiliquies and let's just say it was subpar. The tortilla chips were so soggy almost as though it had been sitting in the kitchen for a while before they brought it out. I was not impressed and the food did not make up for the wait at all.

xam67BsOh1TXL1EjhoutTg.text: After coming down from the top of the Eiffel Tower, we decided to get something for dinner. Leaving Paris Casino, we immediately walked right past Hexx and decided to try it since it had decent reviews and was still open. It was probably well past midnight at this point, but Hexx is open 24 hours so we were able to get a table without having to wait.   We got a table on the patio which sits right on the Vegas Strip so it is the ultimate location for people watching. We decided to split an order of Spinach and Artichoke Dip for an appetizer and then also decided to split their Ribeye Steak. Everything we ordered was good. The Artichoke Dip was pretty much what you expect. The Ribeye was large and cooked to a perfect medium. It was served with asparagus. Again, everything was really good, but nothing was outstanding...  Our service was pretty good. The restaurant has a cool modern style and great location. The prices are a little on the higher end, but not bad.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Exterior
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ribeye
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spinach Artichoke Dip

qrQjKMQQuVRAHkFxc5ookg.text: I really don't leave reviews for places but this place had absolutely amazing service. We sat outside where the heaters were cooking us and they turned them down. Then the sun moved so we were baking in the sun and one of the bussers came by to move us in the shade. Water glasses never empty and mimosas never empty. The food was just a bonus to everything. The French toast my wife ordered was insanely delicious. I ordered the breakfast croissant and I'm pretty sure I just ate food from heaven. By far the best place for brunch in Vegas!!!

_WjsfRZ1jDBOkzRyY_0tYw.text: Let me start off by saying the food was great!  Everyone enjoyed their brunch offerings. Little on the pricey side but we took advantage of a groupon deal!   Now for the not so greats...we made reservations at 1pm on Sunday and were seated immediately. The wait for food was a bit long. BEWARE of the CNF fee that is attached to every check!  This is a ridiculous unexplained fee. Even worse no one can really quite tell you what it is for. If it wasn't for the deal we got I'd take my business elsewhere!

UvgpK8cK5gLffyg6pCLXsA.text: Great customer service always trumps a bad experience. I decided to take a couple of clients back to HEXX for a meeting. We did truly have great service, without me mentioning the previous experience. At the end of the meal, I asked to speak to a manager and she took care of the bill for us. It was really nice and overall, my opinion has changed and I think that the first time we went, the waiter must have been having a bad day. It is not reflective of the rest of the staff.

w-7Gx5Pdl9-AHqqFRa-lcg.text: Server was fantastic. Menu was.....ok. Good food but just limited options and fairly pricey. Breakfast menu looked good though.  Update: Went in for the brunch menu. Fantastic!

YxoPQLTUVpLImYk0lFV_Zg.text: Delightful patio bar across from the Bellagio Fountains  We sat outside and enjoyed the street activity Fun vibe  Great specialty cocktails / beverages  The food was good and beautifully presented though a little pricey for what it was  Definite option if you want to eat on the strip

RjwgktprYaBxc2Hx3qpPnw.text: Came here on a Tuesday afternoon, it wasn't busy and yet we were made to wait by the hostess with the eyebrows from forehead to ear and the twinky 5'3" guy on a power trip. We're regulars, never seen these two before, but we're like we're here so whatever.   10 mins standing around and we're told we can't be seated because we have a dog who's in his stroller. Even though we were here two weeks ago with our dog, in his stroller, and the staff loved him and couldn't stop making a big deal about him. It's like the restaurant changed staff overnight. We explain we were just here and had never heard this rule and Twink says he'll bring the manager over. Our dog is ADA certified so we figure, we'll just show his certificate. But the manager, Christian, with his bow tie and cummerbund comes over guns blazing, telling he's refusing us service and dogs aren't allowed on the strip. Are you kidding me? Please hire people with half a brain and some sense.   This place literally makes me laugh because a bunch of minimum wagers on a power trip work here and are lucky to have a job at all, I don't know who hires people who can't even smile and have no presentation. I've decided to stop coming here because this place is garbage. Every day it's a new rule, they're all so entitled for no reason, have zero education and it shows. Keep on making your minimum guys for the new week or so before your establish closes.

Lov5tFTt_qnViH1tdz39Kw.text: My boyfriend and I made a brunch reservation at Mon Ami Gabi but as we walked past Hexx Kitchen, the outdoor patio space looked so inviting that we stopped in to ask if there was a wait. Inside there was a nice row of couches available and we hung out for a few minutes until our table was ready.  To start, we shared an order of the twisted sticky bun. We had been debating between starting with that or an order of the carrot cake pancakes and the server helped us decide. I think we made the right decision. It's a large bun similar to "monkey bread" where small pieces can be easily pulled apart and it's perfect to share.  For our main dishes, we got an order of the chicken & waffles, and also the Hexx Benedict. Both dishes are staples for us when we go out to brunch, and Hexx delivers these classics in True Vegas "indulgence" style. We were not disappointed.  The atmosphere at Hexx is low-key and open. It's perfect for a nice sunny day and is great people watching out on the strip.

akGaILRHHpy29nit6uddTA.text: The ambiance is very welcoming and classy. The food was spectacular, we came here for brunch for my friends birthday. The corn beef hash was so delicious and fulfilling. The Bottomless mimosas are life here. Thank you for the amazing service Cece , im happy my glass was always full  I recommend this place , im definitely making this a destination every visit

5BqBHt46nchIpH1kmMXlJw.text: After we meandered in to the restaurant looking for the bar section, we accidentally ended up in the regular dining area. Our server Sean didn't skip a beat and seated and served us promptly. In a nutshell, service was great. However, the food was pretty average which was too bad since I really wanted to give this place 5 stars.

vJeY1apRMndPaqwcAdYA6w.text: My friends decided to sleep in, so I went out solo to wander and explore the strip on a Sunday morning.  Hexx had a table for me without a wait - right on the sidewalk.  (It was Mother's Day and was packed, but they still had a table for me right away.)  The waiter was attentive, but not too attentive.  They had something on the menu that looked, um, interesting - "Lox and Chive Waffles".  I wasn't sure about the idea of lox without a bagel, but the waiter assured me that the waffle wasn't sweet, but had chives in it.  So I tried it.  The lox and other toppings (hard boiled eggs, onion, sour cream, cucumber, etc.) came separate on the side of the waffles and you assemble the way you like.  It was fabulous!  I would definitely go back!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lox &amp; Chive Waffles

JIsNmNx4GRYWs4eXjeOZGA.text: Was in Vegas last weekend and no weekend in Vegas is complete without a brunch. This was a fun place! The decor is very California hip. Lots of white and natural finishes. Fun music was playing and everyone was kind of grooving in their seats to the music. We opted to sit indoors rather than outdoors which had a lovely view of the fountains and great people watching but it was 105 the day we were there.   Our server, Tracee, was wonderful. Very fun and high energy and fast. Her station was full and she had a smile on her face the whole time.  Hubby had french toast and I had the chicken and waffles. Both were very delicious. My chicken and waffle was a huge portion. We could have split it. In fact, I gave hubby a big piece of my chicken since I had more than enough and he needed some protein. The fried chicken was excellent!  The mimosas were also good. The pre mix the oj and the bubbly into pitchers so they can refill glasses quickly. I would have preferred not having them pre-mixed just because too much acidity in the oj can bother me. However it wasn't a deal breaker.  Will definitely return on our next trip!

DkWIzgy5tEpgzASPSBPNvA.text: This place is awesome!! We had the Ribeye and it was delicious!! Kevin is a great Server!! We will be back for sure!!

guC2UxdUSpsf0eJ4qHi1bw.text: Had a wonderful breakfast on the last day of our vacation. Our server Sean was very friendly, and made sure we were taken care of. Sean is an asset to the team, and we hope to see him again on our next trip to Vegas!! Also, yay for bottomless mimosas!!! Thanks again!!

Pq_LnIwxlcr4kIUwaRFhDA.text: Anthony is phenomenal and the Pear Naked Lady is delicious! Get the artichoke and spinach dip. Lobster roll is a bit too saucy. Broccolini is good but too sweet. Anthony and the drink make this place a must stop-by.

O5ShsQs76YbBes0VdF4xgQ.text: was a little disappointed in my brunch here. i ordered the gravlax benedict, not really realizing how salty gravlax is, so maybe that was my fault. in general though, i think i could've still enjoyed my benedict had it not been for the completely overcooked eggs on top. my other friend who ordered the benedict had one egg poached correctly and the other one also overcooked. i just can't understand how a restaurant like this can mess up poached eggs so consistently. i'd say the best part of the meal was the tiny side of mac n cheese that we shared among us. views and atmosphere were lovely too but food was nothing special.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. both &#34;poached&#34; eggs were completely overcooked
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

CiAKFRVycsJIU6Wnb-gLJw.text: My husband met the manager Michael Main while in the candy shop next door and he talked up the restaurant so much we had to take our family here and we were so glad we did! The ambiance of the restaurant was airy, open and inviting. We had the opportunity to dine outside and enjoy the nice Vegas weather. Our service was impeccable, Tracee with to e's, was incredible, she was funny and attentive, a perfect way to start our day! There were eight of us at breakfast and we all ordered something different! Everything was delicious, with the exception of the Carnitas Hash! Which was described as runny and soggy. We started the meal off with a fruit plate which was not your ordinary fruit plate, it had all kinds of interesting flavors like Dragon Fruit and Japanese Apple. We also ordered sides of the aged bacon, also a delicious choice. The protein omelette with avocado mousse was delicious and the breakfast potato's were some of the best I have ever had in my life! The ham and cheese croissant with an egg was a popular choice, we saw it on a guests table and two members of our group decided that that was what they had to have. They said it did not disappoint. I had the Cinnamon Apple pancakes with oat crumble and brown sugar butter! The brown sugar butter was candy delicious! This establishment offered unlimited mimosas and when in Vegas, you have to partake! This was hands down one of the best breakfasts of my life, a fabulous find in Vegas! I wish we lived closer, I would be a frequent visitor!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Our Waitress Tracee!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. &#34;Cinnamon Apple Pancakes with Oats and Brown Sugar Butter

IkH7KrUg91DBsYrQ3J32uA.text: Came here for brunch on Saturday at 1030a. Not too crowded; we sat on the patio which was wonderful. We got the sticky bun for an appetizer. It was ok; the bun itself had not a lot of flavor but with the toppings on top it was better. Chilaquiles breakfast was good but could've used more toppings and less chips. The quiche meal was delish, it was crustless which is something to note. Also the brioche French toast was yummy although a bit dry because it seemed a. It dry and overcooked. We all got the endless mimosas and our waitress kept it filled the whole time so that was awesome. Overall, great view of the street on the patio, decent food, slightly overpriced in my opinion.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

OGcfiV3wVWhwgExjJnGWtw.text: Awesome food and service by Steven. The antipasto salad was delicious. The pizza was just as good. Portions are big enough for you to split. The chocolate dessert to die for. Sit on the patio for great people watching. Great on the strip restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chocolate banana Bundio
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Antipasto Salad

MHwMhIv_1jdcsQ_xYHEDhg.text: Had my first meal in Vegas here and it exceeded all expectations. My first impression was that it was loud and my party of 3 would be waiting forever but we ended up getting seated quickly and all the laughter around us just showed how much everyone enjoyed eating here. The bottomless mimosas were so nice and my food could not have been any better. I believe our servers name is Bryan and he made our experience here even more enjoyable.

GmFIiI6P4nh4B24GUrVcXw.text: Really a great experience here!  Came for late lunch/early dinner, so it wasn't too crowded. Got a seat outdoors (which, by the way, is great for watching the Bellagio fountain show, and also for just general people watching-the outdoor seating alone gives this place an edge).   Ordered the mushroom pizza, which was honestly huge-could have easily been shared, but I was by myself, so what is one to do? Desert was, of course, phenomenal, being that Hexx chocolate shop is right there-I usually say you can't go wrong with chocolate, but that is really True here.  Service was great, from the hostess station to my server, David. Pretty average prices for Vegas. So good food, delicious desert, amazing view, and outstanding service-what more can you ask for?

ccXEDXtFjvX-Sc78j__jRg.text: Came here for Brunch after our Paris Staycation.  We made reservations for 1130am and when we arrived we were given a table outside looking over the Bellagio fountains.  The view alone was awesome, sunny day and great for people watching.  We started out by ordering 2 Farmers Markets Bloody Mary's which included bacon infused gin, and garnished with bacon, white cheddar cheese, pepper stuffed olive and beef stick.  The Bloody Mary's alone were like an appetizer themselves!  On top of our Bloody Mary's we also ordered the overcooked bacon which was like ordering extra crispy bacon.  Since there was already bacon in the Bloody Mary's we probably should've went with a different appetizer, but I guess you can never have too much bacon right?  Our entrees arrived shortly after and I went with the lobster roll, while my boyfriend had the frittata.  The plating was cute but to be honest I was surprised how small the portions were, I would say there were a little on the smaller side but I was still full when we were done.  Our server was very attentive along with other employees in the dining rooms making sure our waters were filled, plates were cleared away etc.  The only reason why I took away some stars were for the pricing.  The service was great, ambiance and view was great, but after using an Open Table Dining credit of $50 and after paying CNF fees, balance due was still $51.40 so a total of $101.40 for 2 people before dining credit for brunch.  I guess this is what you expect from dining on the strip, either way, I would still recommend if you are looking for a good Bloody Mary on the strip with a great view.   *CNF fees, not listed anywhere else but apparently is a Concessions and Franchise fee that is included with this restaurant.  I didn't ask about it since I heard some restaurants on the strip may start charging this.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The view from our table (patio dining great for people watching!)
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Overcooked bacon with maple aoli
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Farmers market Bloody Mary&#39;s

L4D_5m-It3gaq1FGiITKtg.text: Wow...really enjoyed breakfast.  There were 3 of us and we wanted everything on the menu.  Settled for the French Toast, Omelette, and Eggs Benedict.  Plus we ordered 2 Croissants to share.  The table was full of plates after they delivered and we said no way we could eat everything.  Well...long story short the plates were clean when we left!  We ended sharing or at least tasting everything.  The Eggs Benedict was the best I ever had!  They served it on French Style potatoes layered with gruyere cheese.  SIMPLY AMAZING!!!  Order Croissants for the table but do yourself a favor...order with a side of house made cream cheese sauce. PS...service was the best!!!!

3HIc_SB8amK4htqlFRUPiQ.text: Bottomless mimosas.  Sangria.  Chicken and waffles.  Turkey club.  French fries.  Sean and Josh kept our drinks and bellies full.  Thank you so much!!!!

yndfnEOUBobWkL9Rw1usRQ.text: I went here 2 weeks ago for my sisters bachelorette party. There was a group of 6 of us and we were not disappointed. The food was moderately priced and oh so delicious! We ordered a variety of foods and tasted everything. We also had the passion fruit margarita potion (3 of them.....don't judge us, it's a bachelorette!) and it was absolutely delicioso.....we all felt good when we left there. It was a Friday night and wasn't too crowded. We sat at an outside table just under the Eiffel tower and were able to people watch while we enjoyed our meal. Stephanie was our server and she was awesome. Very friendly, answered all of our questions and very attentive. Overall a positive experience!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salmon, very juicy and flavorful
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy jambalaya, pretty spicy, they also have a version that is not spicy....both tasted great!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Half eaten chicken and waffles....sorry, we couldn&#39;t wait!

fvDBcmsK5lUHXfNgJq3DXw.text: Breakfast here is delicious. The restaurant is spacious, clean, and inviting. The service was phenomenal, the server doing a great job of being attentive to guests while also not rushing them.  There's an outdoor patio as well, if you'd rather sit outside and people watch on the Strip.

fi2oKtbAwxvDz5vm2EKJZQ.text: Place is nice. Right outside Paris hotel & casino with a spacious area to sit inside or outside. It's literally right across the street from the fountains at the Bellagio which is a plus. We came here for breakfast on a Monday. It wasn't busy so we were seated right away. Had our drink orders taken shortly after being seated and our food shortly after that. I orders the banana nut French toast and she ordered the regular buttermilk pancakes. Both were cooked to perfection and delicious!! The prices are high on the strip (duh!) but the food we had here was at least worth it and I would come here again!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Banana Nut French Toast!

u4XrC61Lj6arqqaok_0OYw.text: Ive been here about four times now and I always ask for my two favorite waiters Jay and Jerry, always have an amazing time here. Food is great, Chef William Loche, is a great cook.  And always please and entertained by Mr Juan. Usually you don't see the manager engaging the customers but he definitely goes above and beyond to make sure I'm given the best service.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing scampi

7DJJQ-D4EfjR3pHzS8TCPQ.text: Best Steak and Eggs I've ever had!! Can't remember the last time a plate had me thinking about it days after. Would drive back into town just to have breakfast there again.

uVw1G6bYpFFrN8COY9uFXg.text: I appreciate the ambition to do fresh food as the menu states and not to use mass produced product.  My wife and I are both disappointed with the food. Perhaps we're being a bit unfair since we had dinner yesterday at one of Ramsay's restaurants, but we're not likely going to be back. Too many other better choices.  The broccolini starter was so pungent and the florets so overly dried out that after one bite we asked that it be removed.  The waiter removed it from our table but not the bill. Disappointing.  My wife had the scampi. The sauce was thin and lacked flavor. She's had scampi at many fine restaurants and knows her stuff. I tried it and thought exactly the same.  I decided to go safe after the broccolini incident and went with the classic burger. I asked for it prepared medium. It was medium well but still juicy. The cheddar they chose has good flavor but is extra dry so is not a good melting cheese. This dry texture on a juicy burger may not be for all.  My burger came with simple French fries. They looked good but we're quite soft.  Overall the atmosphere is quite good, it's modern but touches remind you this is at the Paris hotel. The service was fine. It's located directly across from the Bellagio so the view is good.  Is this restaurant the Paris Hotel's answer to the Bellagio Cafe since both are open 24 hours?  It only wins if you care less about food and more about a patio with a view.

hM_PF2CaFVjdcku7ul3sRQ.text: We used to love this place when it was the sugar factory, the food was awesome and the people watching on the patio justified strip prices. Now that it's changed to Hexx the coffee is not great, but the food is still average. Today we came with a specific request to sit by the railing on the patio - a request that came with a wait. We waited for our table and we were placed on the patio far from the rail. As a local, we don't pay strip prices for something less than what we ask for ... we requested to be moved to one of the several open rail tables and were told we would have to wait. Seeing as how we had already waited, this was upsetting. A conversation with the "manager" revealed that she wouldn't move us because people specifically wait for those tables ... read above. She was very unpleasant and unapologetic for the lack of service. We left today and didn't have breakfast. We will not be coming back and hope that tourists heed our warning - you will pay a lot for breakfast here, it's not worth the cost when the food is average but the service is terrible.

i8Q_kFWagK-el2eUtwa-GA.text: Got strip side view. Nice and cool dinner weather.  The broccolli vinagrette appetizer is very very good. The flavor will make you remember this place and write a review about it.

bRUT-vDG8r_29xDVkLxtsg.text: Great for a late night dinner. Generous portions and not crazy prices. Denise was a great waitress. Sat outside looking over bellagio fountain.

Us5opqvlbqk-eDKwuQ1iXw.text: My wife and I came into HEXX and had such an amazing experience . The food was out of this world , the service was impeccable (Shay being our server ) and the atmosphere was dynamic.  Juan the manager had given us a table on the patio which made my wife extremely happy. We were able to see the Bellagio water show which was electrifying .. Juan also at the end of our meal explained in detail and showed us how chocolate was made .. He went above and beyond what we expected . Working in the industry myself for ECOLAB  I plan on defiantly returing and notifying all my fellow Las Vegas contacts to visit this amazing establishments .  Thanks again for an unforgettable evening . Thanks again Shay and Juan ..

jL04x6DhMZtD-6xpzFe5bA.text: Had a date night last Saturday the 25th.It started a bit rocky with our first stop at Paris Cafe(awful). Didn't order anything so we left.  We then walked over what I thought was still Sugar restaurant. Turns out it was replaced with a new restaurant called Hexx. They renovated the inside nicely. We were seated outside by the patio area. At night, we had a nice view of the Bellagio fountains.  Our waiter, Chris was excellent. Attentive,not slow and knowledgeable. The food was superb. The sangrias was a awesome.My company was the best.

Allexias ( I hope that's how you spell it) was outstanding, she went above and beyond for us. She is one of the reasons I am going go to go back next time I'm in Vegas! Everything Allexias recommended was on point delicious!!! Thank you again she turned our boring night into an amazing night, thanks for recommending club Chateau to us we had a great time!!

KZwvqHPYSllR38d-uwwl5Q.text: I usually don't write reviews but everything from service, cold and salty food was totally disappointing.  It is also so loud that you can't have a conversation..... The management should really take a good look of how things are being ran.  There are so many other places in Vegas to ever return here!

dA4nTIP5Ikwd1FZ3UISs-g.text: Great place to stop and get a drink while walking the strip. Shade, water, beer and alcohol.

N12qFh8l5Eb4jMQVMujU1g.text: it is in a great location right on the street across from the Bellagio fountains, they've really improved their cuisine over the last couple of years since the opening.  tremendous food in one of the most prime spots in the country, killer wine list and cocktail program..  in addition to having a really deep, interesting menu, they happen to have my favorite dark chocolate in the entire country at the candy shop next door.  they make the amazing single origin chocolate right there from scratch!

I dont feel you should do this unless you have no other options... it was pricey and sub chilis grade food.

0mvfWoK5uxzGdHIWKqY8tw.text: Amazing food , great service (thank you Lisa) and a beautiful view! Great place to enjoy an excellent meal and view.

DmjUe1BqPnGGi1e1ZWKw_w.text: I don't think we will be returning here.   Let me start off by saying that we took advantage of the groupon deal to try this restaurant out.   The food was wonderful and I had no issues with any of the dishes we ordered. They are a bit pricey for what you get but its Vegas so it's expected.   Our server with the red hair was a gem, super sweet. The only thing that got irritating was how long we waited for everything. It took forever to get the menus, to order, to get the manager to approve our groupon, and to get our check. We got there around 8 and didn't leave until 9:30. 30 minutes was wasted due to waiting around for the check AFTER the manager came to apply our groupon.   For the prices and the service wait I would rather go to a different restaurant.   I'll pass on this in the future.

mHvitCVibor-LJCSe2QXFQ.text: After traveling that day into Vegas with a group of 6, we were eager to find something to eat but had no idea what we really wanted. We were staying at Planet Hollywood and decided to venture onto the strip to find something to eat. Paris was right next door, and I had read that Hexx was a great place to check out. After viewing the menu outside, we thought we'd give it a try.  Our waitress was awesome. She answered any questions we had with menu items and thoroughly went through the drink menu - as we were thirsty! She recommended a few items and let us take our time to order; this was around 5:15 pm on a Monday.  I ordered the chicken and waffles, opting to try something different at our first place to eat for the few days we were in Vegas. My husband got the Filet Mignon. Both were excellent. Others in our party got another meat, a couple pastas and the crab cakes. Everyone said that their meal was very good. One of our party ordered one of the pitcher drinks that had smoke when another drink was poured into it. I cannot remember the name, but it was cool to watch and was a good drink.  Overall, it was a great place to eat on our first night in Vegas. The service was great and the food was even better. They gave you chocolates with a little fortune when you receive the check. It was a dark chocolate, and although I prefer milk chocolate... it was still nice to try.

9K5z3UnWN_r1zDqYjT6tLA.text: My 1st time here and I've been coming to Vegas for 30 years.     Great view of the Bellagio Fountains.  SEAN was a great server.   Loved the carrot cake pancakes.   Oh and did I mention unlimited mimosas for 24 bucks next time I'm coming for hours

qSidSkqyOwhT3Eo6dahB2A.text: Friend had chicken and I had the pizza. Both were delicious, as one would hope of a restaurant prominently located on the strip.   However, service was extremely slow at a time when server to diner ratio was very favorable. Seems they forgot us a couple times and kitchen must have been half asleep.  Also, server forgot that my drink was ordered on the rocks. Server said he would correct it and left. I slowly sipped my drink while he was gone, wondering what he was up to. When I was halfway through my drink, he finally came back with some ice which he then poured into my drink... what?  Anyways, food was great and prices were not bad for its location. I will give them the benefit of the doubt and that fourth star despite the slowness and questionable service.

FhidiPkIqFF2AtzsyPMXEg.text: Hexx has the most magical atmosphere on the strip with patio seating facing the Bellagio water show. It's a little pricey, but the food is above average. The bacon appetizers and cinnamon waffle are my favorite. Sean was our server-- hands down, the best server we've ever had. He was personable, attentive, prompt, and kind. He made good recommendations and kept the ice tea refills coming. I would give Sean 5 stars. I gave Hexx only 4 stars because while the food is good, it isn't outstanding. I asked for my fries well done, and they were floppy, and my cranberry turkey sandwich was a tad dry, but still tasty. I look forward to our next visit. I do wish their Groupon was still available- such a good deal!

A4AY8wsPUNXiqgtQmgriQg.text: This is one of my new go to breakfast spots in Las Vegas from now on! I have passed this place  multiple times while walking on the Vegas strip but I never stopped until this most recent visit. There is not usually a wait here (well not on the two times we visited two weeks ago) and the staff is really friendly! If there is a wait, they take your phone number at the front and send a text message, which I think is better than having a buzzer that cannot go far.  They also have bottomless mimosas for only $20 bucks (which I think is winning)! While here I ordered a side of bacon, an omelet, and a sticky bun. Our server (on both days we went) were very nice and friendly! My server from the first day also stopped by our table on the second day to say hello, and say she was happy to see us come back. The manager also stopped by on our second visit here to check on the hubby and I, and make sure we were being well taken care of. She was very friendly as well, and I appreciated her stopping by to check on customers ( she checked on every table to speak with customers--just amazing customer service). The sticky bun we ordered was AMAZING! We asked for extra Carmel glaze to make it stickier and more delicious and BOY WAS IT! My bacon was also cooked to perfection and the way I wanted it! My omelet was okie, I might have took a wrong turn by ordering ham, but I could not finish it. I also loved being able to enjoy the water show at the Bellagio, while we waited for our food (great views all over the restaurant). I am def. stopping back by HEXX on my next visit to Vegas!

T8E_j2OTq1n6oOtJdLPi5g.text: The food service took a very long time, but the waiter and manager gave such great service and were very apologetic. The food and atmosphere is amazing. (We were there Christmas Eve so it's possible the kitchen was too slammed) although we waited a long time I would still recommend this restaurant to anyone.

yPW5YT3mdqYBJ6howpURXg.text: Had a reservation for a group of 6. We were seated almost 20 minutes late. This could have been a 3 star review but after delivering 3 free starters, the excellent entrees and constantly refilling our bottomless mimosas they earned a 5 star rating. We will definitely return. Between the group we had the Hexx Benedict, pancakes, French toast, omelet and veggie burger. Everyone was happy and the service was great.

AAo6x4q5ML5My3O7C40-1Q.text: We ordered 4x Wagyu, the most expensive steak on the menu and the chef just could not get it right. Even the rare was mostly well done. Also at the table next to us  the guy got a rib eye 2x and left the 2nd after one bite. If you are looking for an overpriced place where you don't want to go back to the Hexx is the place to be.

xUbqlkwRz9MpU7xouiWIIQ.text: Seriously kudos to Chef Loche! It was a group of 6 of us we ordered the Spicy Jambalaya, shrimp scampi, smothered fries, regular fries, and crab cake. My SO got the hypnotizing strawberry drink which everyone else ended up getting as well.  I was a little skeptical at first when Jay, our waiter, said that everything he's tried has been great. He was not lying! We all shared the plates and everything was tasty. I would say my favorite was the jambalaya. I was worried it would be too spicy so I asked the chef if he could tone it down and he did well for my baby taste buds!  I would definitely go again!

pTqcnDZzPbZzrJaoiaIPsw.text: Breakfast/ Brunch are good! I ordered the Hexx benedict and it was awesome! Staff were really professional.

S3xIXCzDU1b0TxkmhkApoQ.text: LOVED the views here!  The food was delicious and the staff was super friendly and attentive.

ym8HD_wjoz51CCeJbNJ9UQ.text: Taylor our waitress was amazing....best spot for breakfast by far. Off the strip in Paris. Bottomless mimosas. Goood vibe and food is True to the pictures and taste even better. Breakfast panckcakes and potatoes amazing. Breakfast croissants to die for. I will certainly be back ever time i touch down in Vegas....yassss. love it!

BycPajdt82sXRFouJ83J7Q.text: We came here for brunch during our Las Vegas trip. He patio is great and overlooks the strip. We had fun people watching as they walked on by. We ordered the chilaquiles and guava mimosas which were both great. They also had an option of bottomless mimosas for $20.   Great view, great food, great drinks.

m7_LB5o0OZg-yZ1x8cr-sA.text: The worst service Ive ever experienced at a restaurant of this caliber. The food was aweful and brought out at different times. Two of the guests got entrees about 20 minutes after everyone else.  If money is no object and you dont care about quality and service you will find this place acceptable.

aF9DM8oEznuBw8DK9V5Jyw.text: I loved this place! We arrived in time for Bloody Mary's and breakfast. I ordered the traditional Bloody Mary and was so delighted when it arrived. It was the best Bloody Mary I've ever had. the vegetables complimented the spicy fresh tomato juice so well. It was a meal in and of itself. My friends ordered the crispy broccolini (WOW!), overcooked bacon (surprisingly good) and the chilequiles (also amazing!). I got to taste everything while sipping on my delicious drink. The atmosphere was fun, too. A very relaxing spot and the view is of the Bellagio fountains. We all agreed that we'd like to go back and eat there again. We didn't make it back on that trip but I know I will next time I'm in Vegas!

tqsnGBdcvm6dnYFMM0heFA.text: Thank you to the Hexx staff for making the day after the wedding brunch such a success . Sean was very attentive ,always had a pleasant smile and was willing to help (even through the storm lol) . The food was great and came out pretty quick so a big shout out to the kitchen team as well   I loved how we did not have to ask for mimosa refills  Again thank you for the hospitality Sean

UNVjemQfeo2uRqjh4Xmu6A.text: Faboulous food great atmosphere but our server Steven was amazzzing.  Great personality super attentive. Hexx is very lucky to have him

b_hbnoAHq60bRfLgMeZZvg.text: Great food, great food and great service. The manager Olivia came by to check to see how everything was. They went above and beyond. Will be back for sure

nBGQBH8uJnhzrtrdgoSjmA.text: Horrible customer service. The waiter took 20 minutes to take our drink order and by that time we ordered dinner as well...45 minutes later, no drinks and no food. The only thing that came was my sons milk. We were seated at 9:15 came to us at 9:35 and at 10:10pm we still had no dinner. Since I asked for our check for the milk because I was ready to go, all of a sudden (after another 10 min wait) the manager and food came out. I refused and wanted my check since I still hadn't even received my drink yet.  The manager didn't even apologize for being late or anything just asked if we wanted our food or not. I'm like can I at least get my beer? Needless to say they suck! Unless your cool with waiting 1 hour for your food then this place might be for you.

BloaymHPFMbV7AABzJrr3A.text: Great place for bottomless mimosas! Showed up fairly early around 730am and received excellent service from our waiter Raphael. Protein omelet and the home fries were amazing! I also ordered a farmers market (I can't recall the exact name) Bloody Mary and it was perfect. Great view of the water show if you sit outside!

It was juicy and tender.  The service was excellent too.  May I say they play great music too.  Highly recommended.

gAjxybu2x447cQ0V36AwBA.text: Even if the food wasn't excellent, which it was, Hexx was a fun place to dine. Sitting on the outside patio is a great people watching experience. We also had a fantastic view of the Bellagio fountains. Chris, our server, made perfect suggestions for appetizers as well as an amazing Roasted Bass entree. In a city where everything is overpriced, this was a hidden gem.

pzqOw0wKesSfLL2wIhdrWQ.text: My husband and I were recently in Las Vegas for 4 days and had dinner here one night. The food was wonderful... I had the margherrita pizza and my husband had the salmon and quinoa. Both were delicious. Our waiter, Sean, was wonderful! He was so personable and nice. He was very helpful in answering menu questions and provided outstanding service!! Would definitely go back!

Op1eXnOS0LKWdKHACngf-g.text: Great place for late night eats after midnight in the area.  Food 24 hours.  Ordered cheeses, salami, big pretzel, skillet potatoes, pizza.  Everything was delicious.  Lots of food (leftovers). Will definitely eat there again.

vbGh6jA9jN0uKgon_9e1Uw.text: Typical Las Vegas: overpriced and pretentious, yet mediocre. AND THEY CHARGE A CNF FEE OF 4.6%. Breakfast for 2 $50.00.

8eysRNQXz9TeHCPAo5KwXg.text: Very decent food. Ate a burger and fries. The burger doesn't come with lettuce or anything else. Just meat and bun for $20. Very under staffed. Took 30 minutes to get my check. I stood at the station for 20 minutes trying to pay. The server was doing his best; he was slammed. Granted it was about 3pm. I was going to try it for dinner but I'll find somewhere else.

O0UCJ9OO53HrHz5FxnsXfQ.text: Fantastic food and even better service! Sean was one of the best servers we have ever had. Very attentive and personable. We will be back next time we are in Vegas!

wC5rZvY2OwLqcWm9uTTHjw.text: We stopped in for a late lunch and had a lovely meal with excellent service! SEAN was our server. He greeted us promptly with a smile and a warm welcome. Told us about about the menu and got us set up with awesome endless mimosas and mandarin mules! My husband had the jambalaya--lots of shrimp and andouille with great spice level. I had crab cakes--all crab and no filler! We were too full for dessert but the menu is incredible! We will return!

xy2sPpG7eYytlyOCqp29AQ.text: We did the chocolate tasting and  education  at HEXX . It took about 30 mins. We tasted / samples 6 milk chocolate and 7 dark chocolate samples. Lots of fun!!

RBPp3tdYFOTdColOpV9HLg.text: Good coffee, great hangout. Food is okay at best. Did not get much out of our server. Food was brought out and that was it until the check came.

3tDBszVaIWM7aBBEwqPHYA.text: Just finished lunch at HEXX. The food and cocktails were amazing, and our server Sean gave us fabulous service! If you're headed to Vegas, you must eat here!

1LieJi6AQYQKL-CBxmOJcQ.text: Was in Vegas for 2 nights and 3 days and ate at Hexx 3 times!  The location was great and we got to see the Bellagio fountain show repeatedly.  The food was terrific!  Loved the sea bass, the antipasto salad and the turtle dessert was spectacular!  The wait staff was friendly and the seating comfortable.  The lighting in the restaurant was perfect too.  Loved the open air feeling yet away from the activity of the street.  I highly recommend this place.

UShKzJiQqekPyQcQEPL4cA.text: Love this place! Great brunch spot after a long weekend in Vegas! Great prices and bottomless mimosas. Our server Joshua was fantastic!!!!! Love him!

kD3d6KVyupLbVqfYOnYOmw.text: Came here for brunch before heading to dayclub, and wow. Their food was amazing.  I got the ham and cheese croissant, which was sooo delicious and HUGE! I wanna say the whole croissant sandwich itself was about the size of my face (but I guess that's not saying much since my face isn't really big but still...). The croissant also came with a side of potatoes which was mouth watering. The potatoes had the perfect amount of garlic and crispiness to them. I lowkey wish they gave me more.The whole meal itself was really filling, and I was already full before I even made it halfway through.  I guess the only sad part about the meal was I couldn't finish it.. wayyy too filling for this tiny body. But I couldn't take it to-go with me either cause we didn't have time to go back to our hotel room, and you can't really bring food in with you to dayclub ya know? Actually, I'm pretty sure that's not even allowed.   Service was also good. We were seated immediately, and our waitress was very friendly and attentive.

nsN5yHsUHuritSqMhw5wwQ.text: Came here for breakfast on my own... to be honest I wasn't expecting much. But... I was greeted with hands down the best waitress I have ever had. Taylor is the best! She was super positive and attentive despite the crowds. The food was also great it's hard to make noteworthy breakfast potatoes but this place certainly does it right!

7xcIR4t5-XSNDVe1eR6O6g.text: I was so disappointed we were intending on going to The sugar factory but ended up here. I got the bottomless mimosas which were disgusting because they were pre-made "all orange juice" but the food was great.  There was a water leak from the roof and we asked to be moved while in the middle of moving 2 waiters came up basically screaming at us that we couldn't sit where we were moved to. I was embarrassed but the manager came over and offered us 2 glasses of champagne "alcohol doesn't make up for bad service " not to mention the prices are too high let's just say we won't be returning

j2stMqR8siGjxKCmzMAEEA.text: Great breakfast selection, giant portions, we couldn't finish the delish chicken & waffles between us!

EXFCaolbl4hgkbadyqC3vA.text: Started off with bad seating experience we asked for inside and lead to an outside table in 100 plus degree heat.  The girls at the front are completely indifferent and it took 15 minutes to get seated on a Tuesday night.   Our meal was so salty filet mignon,  schnitzel,  mushrooms that we sent it all back and left without eating our dinner.  At over 20 minutes to get our main course it was inexcusable.   Our waitress explained that the sides are pre salted downstairs and that there was little chance a second try was worth it.

a3lKyuxo6zWSVWZYMMyhbQ.text: I loved this place. Was kinda pricey,but was worth it! Stayed at the Paris hotel and having this there was nice. Breakfast food was my favorite. Must try this place if you're around.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. $10 n some change for the pancakes.. very good! the home fries were like $6 and wasn&#39;t worth it so I&#39;d do without those.

znwZ70UiHCLq-huVvsciSg.text: Only giving this 2 stars for the view. Stopped here because it's the only place that's open. Food was blah, blah, blah. Pasta = blah. Margherita Pizza = super bland. Only come here if you're drunk, hungry, have $40 to spend and nowhere else to go.

znykXfv2yUXdAp-zrd5Idg.text: HEXX is a newer dining establishment on the strip that's open 24-7 for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. My first experience was decent, but a few things kept me from making this a four-star review. Here's the dealio...  HEXX is located in the front portion of Paris Hotel and Casino with a wraparound front and side patio that's great for people watching or taking in a view of the breathtaking Bellagio fountains. Since my husband and I were staying at Paris, we entered through the casino where there was a hostess stand, but no hostess. I hate that awkward feeling of wondering if you're meant to wait there or seat yourself. We decided to carry on and planned to ask the first restaurant employee we came across. We walked, and walked, and finally we were standing at the outside entrance on the opposite side of the restaurant where there was another hostess stand and three hostesses. Just a suggestion, but you girls might want to spread out a bit to avoid this confusion.  Once we were seated on the patio, we were finally ready to enjoy our lunch. The patio does have table umbrellas and light misting to keep you cool. It felt perfect even though it topped 100 degrees. Then again, I'm a desert lovin' girl.   The menu had plenty of variety, all at your typical Vegas prices. My turkey sandwich served with fries was $16, but I suppose it was a "gourmet" price being that it was served with avocado on cranberry challah bread, right? It was still very tasty though and was a decent portion as well. It's rare that I have food envy over what my husband chooses. It's more often the other way around, but I guess I was off my game because I wanted to switch plates with him during our entire meal. What did he have that looked so appealing, you ask? Chicken and waffles. Not just any chicken and waffles, but chicken breast tenders and an apple cheddar waffle served with bourbon maple syrup. He gave me a bite of his $24 lunch entree after he caught me drooling over it more than once, and it confirmed my suspicion... I should've gotten THAT!   Our server, though a sweet girl, seemed a bit off. She over-poured my ice tea nearly missing my precious phone, and didn't seem too confident in her answers to the few questions we had.  I'd be willing to give HEXX another shot due to the fact that there are plenty of things on the menu that begged me to try them. Helloooo chocolate pancakes with caramel syrup... I'm talking to you! Give me a better experience next time, and I'll bump it up a star. Until then...

_BytcqIqKyR_6QYF58xbmA.text: Cute little patio makes you feel like you are in a European cafe. I decided to sit on the patio and have some brunch along with their delicious sangria. The view looks directly onto the Vegas strip so the people watching is plentiful! Also, you can see the Bellagio Fountains from here as well. If you're looking for a place with an awesome atmosphere and delicious food then this is the place for you, whether you are visiting or not.

XMx7QCLrGrpfff0XLRcPYg.text: My first ever brunch in Vegas and I'll definitely come back. We had reservations for 11:30 and still waited half an hour- not a great start. When we were finally called, we were told by a grouchy hostess that only a patio table was available, even though we sat across from multiple empty indoor tables for the duration of our entire meal. Luckily as we were seated on the patio the chilly morning burned off into a gorgeous afternoon.   We dined under an amazing view of the Bellagio and Caesar's, and the pop of orange from the umbrellas made everything that much cheerier. For our table of four every dish was incredible. Eggs Benedict, Cinnamon Roll waffle (with a mound of cream on top), Margherita Pizza, and Ham and Cheese Croissant Sandwich. We all loved our food and marveled at my husband's cinnamon waffle until his last bite.   A large rowdy bachelorette party kept our nerves on edge as they would burst out in loud sing alongs to the music- but for a place with bottomless mimosas I guess that's going to happen once in a while!   Would be 5 stars for the food, interior design, location and beautiful view, just wishing the service was a bit better. Still an awesome experience overall.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Margherita Pizza, Ham &amp; Cheese Croissant, Eggs Benedict, Cinnamon Roll Waffle with mile high cream swirl

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gorgeous view of Bellagio and Caesar&#39;s from the patio.

b6dU03szcKFcE3yAZikOlQ.text: Came here with HIGH expectations, but the food was mediocre and so was the service. Such a disappointment!! The server took about half hour to bring our food out - She was super sweet, but the food timing was way off. They had a limited late night menu. When the food came - everything was dry! Ordered the lobster roll (the bun was stale) and the turkey club - the bacon was burnt. Maybe it would have been better if we tried it during the day. The food from the late night menu - felt like leftovers.

wBcuaf_Iyl2y--2dUyJtmQ.text: We had the pleasure of having Maria wait on us and I say pleasure because it was just that.  Myself and my Husband being in the food and beverage industry we tend to be more opinionated than most and Maria was not only knowledgable about the menu, but, very personable as well.  We even had the pleasure of meeting Christian and just the same.  I highly reccomend anyone that visits Vegas to stop here and ask for Maria, you wont be disappointed!

4ViKvv3_rEch20670WKwSA.text: A fucking mazing!!!! Our survey Rachel M. was super fun! She was polite, suggested great menu and was fun!! The food was great! Traces was super fun and sung the R&B birthday song with us! Plus helped me chugggg a whole glass of mimosa!!! Thank you for a great bday celebration!!!

vhk2d4pnl8NfoBZXO-D4nA.text: It was a sweet experience. The bf then surprised me with a nice dinner and one of their cool drinks! The food servings were over the top and food was delish!!! :)

PI5WisVT_b-J1njvOPolRQ.text: I ordered the chicken and waffles. My husband had a meat omelette. The food was pretty good...but if you're frugal, this is not the place to go. Breakfast was about $65... Again the food was pretty good, but not amazing to spend that much for breakfast! But most casino restaurants will cost that much. Our waiter was friendly and attentive.

zLUoGZ2AmQh4OiGNPX_j2w.text: Apollo was our server. He was very attentive, friendly and knowledge about the menu. Juan was also very a attentive, making sure we never went without water. #dynamicduo!

tVW_gO-EuZsumF2tqg7k2Q.text: Came here without a reservation and was able to get sat right away in the patio, which was amazing. Ordered one of their portions, which are a bit pricey at $36 but are meant to share and is worth the hype. Got the spinach dip as an app and the jambalaya for dinner. The jambalaya was spicy (server warned me), but oh so good!! They also gave us a piece of chocolate after our meal from their store next store. This made us go next door and do the chocolate tasting and I bought a few bars. So good!! I am still dreaming about that chocolate...  Would love to go back for breakfast or brunch.

oJryJqoNFe1HHt4e8UR8Mg.text: The big drinks with the dry ice are probably the only reason I would come back. That and the view you get of the strip when you sit outside. It's great for having a few drinks and people watch. It's also right across the street from the Bellagio fountains so you get a pretty good view of the water show.   I tried the food once and it was only okay and pretty overpriced. But it's the strip so you can't expect anything there not to be overpriced..

Suggestion for the pancakes; layer the frosting in between... will promise they will be more appetizing.   The bloody Mary's though... scrumptious!!!  Would definitely return for breakfast anytime.
