KqJpRWtYQFBAukRn_on9BA.text: Big disappointment. If you are looking for good food and nice view better go to Mon A mi Gabi. We came there (hexx) for an anniversary and won't came back again. My husband got burger - dry and salty. He had to ask for extra sauce (only one good thing about burger) to keep it a little moist . White fish (I think it was haddock) - dry. Thanks to the moist risotto i could eat it. 36$ fish meal should taste better. Punch - the only cool thing about the drink was the presentation -  fog over it. We would love to complain about the food at the dinner but saw server briefly 4 times  - took drinks order,  we were not ready to make food order so he had to come back to take our food order - stopped him to get extra sauce  - dropped at out table sauce - fast - asked us about desert holding already check for us. Pretty much when server gives you check and ask about desrt it's like "hey are you hungry yes or no well  I already have check for you so I'm done here".   Spend more than 100$ for dinner but nothing special about this place. Not for celebrating anniversary or any other occasion  maybe just for a quick bite while u walking down the strip because service was fast . We were in and out of the restaurant.   I went to the chocolate tasting next door - it was amazing! Chocolates are very Good! Cookies were great as well. That place deserves 5 star

XYYwYZENXWOjlPwCS_zO9Q.text: HEXX kitchen + bar is exceptionally delicious! Favorite would have to be brunch; Eggs Benedict and bottomless mimosas. Dinner; the Chicken and Waffles or Seafood on Ice. Highly recommend the Pan Seated Scallops. Overall great presentation and even better service. The ambiance is perfect with great views of the strip. A lively crowd. Yet still able too enjoy ones self. All while enjoying great drinks and even better American Cuisine dishes. Always well taken care and in a timely manner. Highly recommend when in town.

eiYZIrk3m2J_Uc7lBnwyaA.text: My wife and I dined at Hexx while we were visiting Las Vegas. We are so glad we did. We were greeted promptly by two very pleasant employees as soon as we walked through the door.   We were shown to our table and very quickly our server, Sal, came to take our drink order. When he returned with our drinks he took our food order. We had the fried pork rinds as an appetizer. The were very delicious, especially with the Fresno peppers and the lime flavored oil. My wife and I both ordered hamburgers and we were both very pleased. We like our hamburgers rare and very often they are too overcooked for our tastes. These burgers were cooked to perfection.   Hexx has great food, great service, and great ambience. Do yourself a favor and visit Hexx when you are in Las Vegas. You won't be disappointed.

e8Y6n1IX6ojT5xEfxPrwdg.text: Sean & Alec made our bachelorette party brunch the best!! So attentive & courteous. Shout out to Tracy for keeping the party going!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Ql5Pd8UH_rpXZlXHLQcF-g.text: Great breakfast option on the strip and reasonably priced. I had the braised pork and hash that was accompanied with some very flavorful pico. Yum Yum! Choose the bottomless mimosas for $20 and that was a great choice. The waitress kept them coming.  The patio view was nice.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Braised pork and hash

38jPHIu0njr54ujqH3hxiw.text: Sean is amazing!!! We were the first sat in his section and within seconds, 5-6 tables were added. He was able to engage with every table and still make time for recommendations and answer any menu questions. He was jovial, friendly and AWESOME!! His support, Abram was also great! Always present when needed, providing refills and whatever we needed. You could also recognize his frustration when the section was not setup for success before the hostess began seating. He wanted perfection prior to guests being seated, which to me, is a priority in food and beverage. The two make an incredible team and I plan to visit again as soon as possible!

yFHbE5wfqQGEWbkGJHxSAA.text: We LOVE HEXX. We came here by accident two days after we got married for a trade show we had to attend. They had us at potatoes. Literally the most insane roasted, fried, carb perfection you will ever meet. Couple that with the bottomless mimosas and here we are, on our one year wedding anniversary for the same conference- and we are loving the food, people watching and SERVICE. Sean was so kind, accommodating and flexible when we wanted to relocate to avoid the sun. He is the perfect example of HEXX service. The hostesses were also so friendly and the text message alert when your table is ready is so easy. This place rocks and we will be back for many years to come.

FpvSnYbR_LwkUvXnADENCA.text: We had Tracee as our server and she was simply amazing! Helped us out with food recommendations along with sports bets. Doesn't get better than that! Food was perfect and so was service. I highly think this is the place to be with brunch. Come here and you will be happy you did:

1krjLNqB49ZcNpp9MDGEQQ.text: Tracy was one of the best servers i've ever had. She provided great service and was friendly and fun. I've been to many restaurants in my time, but Tracy really stands out. If you're in vegas go to Hexx and ask for Tracy.

Ld5e14FBz3wRPw1lqu0VBA.text: Whenever I visit Vegas, I come here for breakfast!! Today I had a great breakfast and unlimited mimosas! However, the best and most wonderful difference today was my server Tracee! She was kind, informative, efficient and FUN!! Made my first day in Vegas start out great! Keep up the good work Tracee!! Love your energy!!!

E9758PXQcj7J5d7b-V9RZw.text: I came here for lunch with my sister, had a great Bloody Mary and salad for lunch. Best part was the hospitality! Sean was our server, probably the best service I had throughout my stay in Vegas. Thanks again Sean!

ZuIm8mizWI4bOQbu2UL3tw.text: Expected the sugar factory, ended up at Hexx. Everything about this place feels rushed without any sort of thought in to its concept. They tout chocolate and candy but the front desk is surrounded by wines. All the furniture looks portable as if it's a popup restaurant. The chocolate they gave us as a taster after eating was horrid - I'd rather eat semisweet bakers chocolate. I ever write reviews, and in fact I made an account just to write this. Something about this place spurred me to do so. Take it as you will.   If you are looking for sugar factory, move on - this is not a replacement.

omjNbETm70ZhaplJL0El4g.text: Great casual dining! Big patio on the strip. Our server was attentive & fast. I had the pasta & my husband had the jambalaya. Although my dish was vegetarian, the server asked if I wanted chicken or shrimp so I added shrimp which was perfect! Would definitely go again. As we were leaving, I noticed they had a nice little bar as well that we might have to try before we leave.

3VPGNXYBozEp10cbSM2EZA.text: Doesn't get the credit it deserves. Hexx chefs wonderfully prepare feel good food with a modern twist. The chocolate is made from the bean right there in its little location so do the chocolate sampling ... You won't be disappointed . Eaten here on several trips but the food seems to be getting better and better . The covered fries are insanely delicious and if you want a LARGE portion of food this is where you want to go !

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loaded cheesy gravy fries !!!! Feel good food must .
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Both the charcuterie and loaded Gravy fries
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cheese and charcuterie

Qkdgo1ld7d-28IIyehV0xw.text: We ate breakfast here one morning. I ordered the carrot cake pancakes and a side of bacon. Both were generous portions. I ended up taking the leftover pancakes with cream cheese icing back to the hotel for later. It was still good the next day. I probably would rate it 3.5 stars if I could.

cTIxf82jjTdgWIKKcsHe6g.text: I ate at Hexx for the first time, my friend and I were wanting places we can't eat at home. We split a pizza and cheeseburger, kind of what you would expect of a cheeseburger and pizza. We had made our reservation on the open table app and we were seated right away, the staff was super friendly and nice. Our food came out pretty quick too. Both meals were really good, they even gave you a little chocolate sample at the end (wasn't my favorite, but it was still cool since they make their own).

ao7zyabMqCAD_ro4mAWHbg.text: Excellent brunch spot! Not cheap, but the food and service make it worth it. We had cinnamon roll waffles piled with cream cheese frosting and an order of buttermilk pancakes. The addition of bourbon syrup was a surprising bonus to the cakes.  Our bottomless mimosas never went empty and the service by Tracee was THE serving highlight of our stay in Vegas.  There's a reason she is specifically mentioned by dozens of Yelp writers - she'll make your meal more enjoyable and have you leaving with a smile on your face.

yHGGr-d2LdPTX-q61RGMkA.text: Very good but bring your wallet! Had the jungle juice potion drink at $36... About 2.5 drinks which is run of the mill Vegas pricing. Smothered fries... think poutine but elevated... Delicious! Side caesar salad was one of the best I've ever had. We also had jambalaya and the Hexx burger... Both great but burger overcooked. Lastly good carrot cake. Overall great food and service at a price.

RrDkJ-_1W3aZymk1JlMFIA.text: Love this place.  Open terrace seating that's covered with cooling misters makes it even better.  Great brunch options, and items for any time of the day.  Girlfriend and I shared the Margherita pizza and the crispy broccolini.   Margherita pizza was very good (12"), worth the ~$13, but the crispy broccolini - OMG - delicious!  Lemony zest to compliment the lightly salted crispy broccolini.   Service was a bit slow, but the atmosphere and food made up for it.   Tip: VIP access (SPG) card gets you a table very quickly.  If you are a platinum SPG member, be sure to get this card at Caesar's so you can take advantage of serious line cuts and discounts at all Total Rewards venues.

HLvssRua1ac7eM_HuKavvg.text: We had lunch at Hexx today and it was delightful! It was crowded and we had a large group, but our waiter Sean crushed it. He was on top of our mimosas the whole time and was able to split our checks efficiently despite moving tables and more people showing up. Couldn't ask for a better experience!

5wyVbp7wAAn2Dyu6pGy8Mw.text: All 4 of our foods were cold, soda had no carbonation. Took quite a while for the food to come through. 3 stars for presentation of food. Server was nice, music was decent, however not coming back.

vQD65Jh-tvTaTxODwa8tzQ.text: The server was very attentive and friendly, but i found the food to be quite bad.  I also didnt care for the fact that the menu isnt 100% accurate on the ingredients in the dish.  For example, my salad had olives and artichokes even though many other ingredients were listed on the menu.  Two foods i cant stand.  The bucatini sauce was mushy and just not to my taste.  I'd give it another try for brunch since most reviews rave about their brunch, but considering the 1000 other options...it wont be soon

mar0G6Rk8AnpjDOM4PcnYg.text: Loved this place. Everything was great from the meal to meeting the chef. Will be back in Vegas in 2 weeks and we'll be stopping by again!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loved it

v7DfFM8EMGVPkU7Tdfy8-w.text: Visited Hex Tuesday Jun with my sister. I frequent vegas often but have never eaten here. Upon being seated for breakfast Sean, our waiter, was servicing another table right next to us. He came over and said he would be right with us while on his way to the kitchen. He came back only a few moments later and introduced himself.  He was attentative, efficient, and and great down to earth guy. Once the food came my sis asked for some extra dipping sauce and got it with no problem. He even brought me extra syrup that forgot to ask him for. It was like he was reading my mind. He had about 4 tables to serve at once and never missed a beat.I wouldnt have known he was new if he hadn't mentioned it. CHEERS TO SEAN! Great service, professionalism, friendliness, and efficiency were all of his qualities that made our experience great. We'll be back again!!!  -CARLOS

VIZ4perFr_FGq0qzSkWdHQ.text: Honestly I never write reviews for yelp, but I had such a good time here that I would feel wrong for not doing so.  The bottomless mimosas are legit, and particular shout out to Jody and Mike for their excellent service, I had an absolutely wonderful time, and would definitely recommend Hexx to anyone who is coming to Vegas looking for an excellent brunch experience!

yJRRrd944uHejJFrWl2eag.text: My sister and I were looking for a place around town to eat at. I saw this place and they had lobster roll my favorite.  We came to restaurant around 1:15pm expecting high expectations as always since I work in the restaurant industry.  We got sat at around 1:15 it took 10 minutes for us to get served. I had to flag another server who then told me my servers name "Spencer " but she can take our drink orders. Erick was the busser he was AMAZING !! He was so respectful , very attentive .. honestly he needs to be a server .  Spencer didn't come to our table until I asked for him to do so.. why would I have to ask for my server to come to my table that should be common sense ? Right .. anyway he took our food order .. my cocktail came first then my hot tea why would that happen ? I have no idea improper training no reason why this should happen neither .. now .. moving on food took another 45 minutes to come out the manager came to the table with fruit to apologize meanwhile our server said the food is ready .. confusing .. We told the manager it's been hour she argued with her customers that ticket time"30minutes " no reason why manager should argue with customer rule of thumb .. anyway horrible customer service .. will never go back ever again .. very tasty food .. the restaurant can make good money if they train their manager and servers correctly .. servers should always work as a team .. no reason why my plate should be sitting on my table for 20 minutes and take 20 minutes get my Check .. I was on vacation I wasted my whole day in this establishment ..

wPdeJ5nzb3gfdWvzBxZmAQ.text: Excellent dining experience. Wait staff was great - thanks Johnny.  Flavours were wonderfully complex and presentation of the food was very pleasing to the eye.  We will be back.

C8uR1WY33K7NKvgnOxtFDA.text: This restaurant is a great choice! It's on the strip with open air seating, you can choose outside seating or inside and still watch the folks as they pass by on the sidewalk. The atmosphere is great and the staff is friendly! I had the salmon and clam chowder with fresh clams.... oh my goodness, delicious to the last drop!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Iyd4x5ajrupGGTyjqgZNGw.text: With all the good restaurants in Las Vegas, skip this one and don't think twice about it.   The service was the best part of this place. The food, at $20 for a sandwich/salad/burger, was below average. By a large margin. I should have known to pass Hexx up by the fact that from the street I could see that most of the tables were empty.   My fiancee had the panzenella salad. Lots of "white" lettuce, head lettuce, barely any avocado, barely any other good stuff at all. Her comment of "my salad in the airport was so much better!" Summed it up perfectly.   I had the turkey club. A big sandwich, but the ingredients were not great, the fries we worse than McDonalds, and it just wasn't a $20 sandwich. I'm not opposed to the prices, but I'm from Chicago. I know good food. I'll pay $20 for a turkey club in Chi and it will be a memorable experience. The only thing memorable about Hexx is how sub par it was.   Go someplace else. That's all there is to it.

Pi7Y62bc9LDThDxRc4Dirg.text: This place was great in so many levels! 1) Location: right in front of the Bellagio fountain if you sit in the patio, at night the atmosphere is alive because of the club atop the restaurant.  2) Food: although my ribeye was overcooked, i still enjoyed it, had enough flavor to compensate for the slight toughness. My girlfriends' Filet was on point. Pricing is reseaonable. 1 thing i didnt like was our server didnt let my girlfriend substitute her asparagus for something else. Im a server & i know it isnt really a problem at all to do that..  3) Drinks: they upgraded from the Sugar Factory's goblets to these even bigger POTIONS! pretty exotic looking drinks with the dry ice. Tried the Jungle Juice & Purple Haze, JJ was excellent!  4) Service: other than the asparagus i cant really complain! The bald busser there is really kept an eye on us & took every plate away asap without us having to ask. Shoutout to him!  5) Time: its pretty packed during the day, but they still open a little later than most restaurants. Went in around 12:30 & they were open a whl Ile longer after that  Overall, this place is definately worth coming!

QAyS3WJe6vJEE4MQo0s8iw.text: Had a great time here. They were super busy and we couldn't find our server to order. Sean noticed we hadn't been served and dropped everything to pick up our table and rushed our order so we could make our flight. Great service! Thanks Sean and Hexx!

dv6ZiBuYNTpEFoWJmADabg.text: Not bad... I stayed at the Paris Hotel & Casino while in Vegas and ate at HEXX the morning that I flew back to PHL. It's such a nice restaurant and I wanted a seat outside overlooking the fountains at the Bellagio, but there was a long wait and I had things that I wanted to do before I left Vegas. The bar had immediate seating so I sat there.  I ordered the Chilaquiles with coffee on the side. The coffee was nice and strong (the way I like it) but the meal itself was just ok. Chilaquiles were made with chicken and the chicken tasted like it was leftover and reheated. It wasn't horrible and it was certainly edible but it was  hardly what I expected from a $15 brunch dish.   I would give this place another try (if I'm ever in Vegas again), but I would certainly order something else next time.

pCADKV49sIJ0iN6uRd4mHw.text: I love dinner at this restaurant but brunch is a whole other story. We went for brunch today and were sorely disappointed. The menu is limited and the food wasn't all that impressive. I ordered the veggie omelette which came with an English muffin and potatoes. The veggie omelette was grossly under seasoned and the English muffin was soft and not toasted properly. My friend ordered the meat omelette and she was just as unimpressed as I was with mine. The coffee was not very good which surprised both of us. The total for both was $50 which we felt was way too expensive as the food just was not that good. We will definitely not be coming back for brunch. I gave it two stars for brunch and this is why the average comes out to three stars because dinner is about 4 to 5 stars and so the average comes out to three stars for both experiences. Evening/ dinner: Some of the dinner items were really good and others were average, yet overall, I would come back here and that gives it four to five stars for. Let me start by saying that it is a beautiful restaurant. Cool decor and relaxed atmosphere. As soon as we walked into the restaurant, from the inside of the Paris Hotel, we saw an area where you could sit four people with pillows all around you and two small but still good sized tables. It was comfortable and I totally wanted to chill there. The waiter told us that if we are having dinner, we really should pick a dinner table as there is not enough room in this area. I wish I had listened to my gut feeling because he sat us at a table with chairs that were higher than your average chairs, which most of the tables have, and it was very uncomfortable for me at 5 foot 4" and I could actually feel my legs falling asleep! I did not want to be rude so I did not say anything but as soon as we were done with the entrees, I asked to move back to the lounge area which was so relaxing and everyone agreed we should've stayed there from the beginning. That is just a clue for anyone that is not as tall and there are tables with normal chairs, and by that I mean they are closer to the ground. THE FOOD: we started out by ordering two appetizers which were the hummus with pita chips and the meatballs. The hummus was just okay. I would not order it again. The meatballs were really good: there are two medium-sized meatballs that come out and the sauce made of tomatoes and cheese around them is delicious. The entrees were as follows: one of my friends got the classic burger and liked it. He said it was not the best burger he's ever had, but it was really good. My friend got the salmon which was amongst clams and a rich broth. She said it was delicious. I got the Seabass, which I was told was one of the chef's favorite dishes. I have to say it was good but not amazing. The roasted Seabass was good, but I have had way way better Seabass. It was on top of a couscous and that was delicious. One of my friends and I got a drink called the desert smash which consisted of gin with several fresh fruits in it and I loved it. This drink that we got was crisp and clean and it was delicious.  The asparagus, which was a side, was absolutely delicious. One of my friends got the crushed Yukon potatoes as a side. It was good. I'm not the biggest potato fan so I would not be the best person to judge it but it was good. We had some very nice people providing the service. We were offered free dessert and two items came out: one was a warm apple pie in the shape of a small round pie with a large scoop of vanilla ice cream over it and the other was a brownie with a large scoop of ice cream over it that was really good. We are not big dessert people, yet I will say for people that like sugar, either item was delicious. I am not a big brownie fan, but the ice cream on top of the brownie was outstanding. We will definitely be coming back here for dinner. It was a lovely experience with a very nice staff. There are a lot of items on the menu and it's all about what you like.  Make sure to ask for a table that you know you'll be comfortable at and if all you're going for is either appetizers and drinks or just dessert, the small areas where you can sit amongst pillows with two tables side-by-side, where four people can fit in comfortably, is really cool. Great service, great ambience, great location, good food. We came here because we won a gift certificate at a charity event. I am glad I won it because this was a really nice experience and it exposed us to a very cool restaurant that we are definitely coming back to. Therefore, in summary, brunch is not worth it and we would never go back and there are way better places in Las Vegas, even in that same hotel, for way better brunch. Dinner is very good and I do recommend it.

M_H57EJOQU7x30LSCkfi6A.text: The food was just ok. The portions sucked. The calamari & sliders left much to be desired. Very little lobster in the sliders & the calamari was chewy. Our server was extremely slow & seemed to enjoy to ignore us. My water cup seemed to stay empty half the time. There was a 25 minute wait but the restaurant was half empty... what gives?

6NTz_zxXcbfgw9-l-JszPA.text: We had an amazing brunch here! We had the eggs Benedict and the cinnamon roll waffle and they were both amazing! Also our servers were so on top of things - Apollo and Juan - my glass never got less than half full and they were just so friendly. Definitely made our experience even better. We'll definitely be back!

81nvg9X19isVQeMGKbWjxA.text: We ended up eating here multiple times during our Vegas weekend. The food always tasted so fresh, and the garlic bread appetizer was a win every time. Totallyyyy recommend

HH8GATSrYzvd_UBtN2NuqA.text: Just came for dessert, and it was delightful! Although, I must be honest and say it was much better (esp the milkshakes) when it was Sugar Factory :/. but i still enjoyed the atmosphere and all the other food and drinks that passed us by looked very, very good.

StY6Xx6tkgquBXHqAXkM_A.text: Loving the atmosphere here at Hexx!  Really loved the menu- so many great options And of course the food was great!    We showed up at lunch time on a Saturday and the place was packed.  It really is in a great spot in the strip.  Directly across from the fountains at the Bellagio.  Sitting outside is a huge added bonus!  When we arrived there was going to be a 30 minute wait for our table, so we snuck into the bar and snagged a table.  They were so busy we went unnoticed for a little bit.  But once the manager saw that we were at the table with no water or menus she came over and handled everything.  She was amazing, took our order, got the flatware and waters out to us and recommended some great dishes.  She didn't just see us once and get us help-  she stayed on top of our service for our entire meal.  Christina definitely is a top notch manager-  digging in with team.  What great service!!

t-EFhVdy1NZBoUldbeDfng.text: Disclaimer: I have worked as a server/bartender for 2 years with over 7 years of restaurant experience.   I came to Vegas on a birthday surprise trip and I had TRACEE as a server for my final day here. I could not have had a better experience. From beginning to end I felt as if I was embraced and celebrated for being here. She made our party feel overly joyous for choosing this place to end our trip on a great note.   When the bottomless mimosas were ordered for our whole table and they ran out of champagne for a busy day, she turned to rose and embraced it as if I had just upgraded to a premium package.   Overall, restaurant has upbeat vibes with beautiful touches of class from their silverware, glasses, seating, and decor posted all around: classy and aged-framed tapestries, artwork, grand windows viewing the strip, and well set light fixtures with hundreds of wine bottles displayed on both the ceilings and walls in the bar area.  Food came out with class with no surprise. 10/10 would recommend for anyone looking to celebrate with class and joy. Cheers.

Zwb0MWF5lY8u5l4WE69Xog.text: Enjoyed dinner here.  Had the short rib and OMG it melted in my mouth!  So delicious full of flavor in every bite!   Had the Elixir drink, which was too sweet for my friends so I drank the 32 Oz pitcher myself.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Elixir!!

YDppn9qxGaBMX0RTI5NcCw.text: I went down to Hexx with my sisters and a good friend.  It was the perfect location!  We sat outside on the patio and was able to see the fountains and do some great people watching.  The patio stayed nice and cool in the heat with the misters.  Our waitress was amazing and very attentive.  The brocollini was amazing along with everything else we got.  I ate bone marrow and was obsessed with it!!!  Anyway, I totally recommend Hexx.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

I3TuZprCtPsoBmvxTTK-6w.text: The food was good but over price. I ordered chicken & waffles & received two small chicken thighs with the waffle.

xUYE1W7Wfxkipp_dQkctYg.text: Apollo was absolutely fantastic and completely made the experience . He was super high energy and attentive. The food and environment was great as well. I would absolutely HEXX to others as it was a great time.

_GMow13l18wVIr4fAs97vA.text: Best lunch I ever had! Lobster roll was unbelievable! Thanks to Tracee, our photobombing waitress!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

hPrhVdVMd_Tv3q2_txERzQ.text: This trip to Vegas was nothing short or awesome. There were a few bumps in the road with all of the persistent street marketing teams, but that's all part of Vegas. Luckily, it didn't stop us from experiencing this great dining experience at HEXX kitchen + bar. The modern atmosphere made the whole experience cool. All the furnishings, lighting and decor tied into the theme. The food presentation was very neat and fun. The drinks were smoking, from the dry ice, and the food was hot and fresh.  From the extensive menu, I decided on the pancakes and bacon. The order came with 3 large and fluffy pancakes. Topped with powdered sugar and parted with whipped butter and a nutty maple syrup. They were great and syrup was an awesome pairing with the pancakes. My wife enjoyed the pepperoni pizza that was large enough for two people to enjoy. The pepperoni on the pizza were larger than normal and they covered the pizza, we couldn't see any of the cheese because there were so many pepperoni. The pizza was topped off with toasted shaved garlic. The garlic looked like large Rice Krispies, but the flavor make the pizza even more savory. We both enjoyed the bottomless mimosas that were a great kick start to our day.  I really enjoyed the restaurant and will definitely go back to visit, on my next trip to Vegas.

zVbh67uGzJYaRLkzNy28bQ.text: Great food with a great outdoor atmosphere. Our waiter Rafael was on point from start to finish. Definitely worth at least going once for the great service and fun drinks. However, just like everything else in Vegas be ready to pay for it.  Overall not as expensive as other not so yummy places tho. One order of chilaquiles, brioche French toast, reg pancakes, chicken and waffles, French dip sandwich and a pepperoni pizza came to almost $200.00. Yes that also includes two root beers, a chocolate "hexx" drink and one of their $36.00 drinks with a dry ice show.

_ELQjh_TYf7nFzIxqvp92w.text: Gals weekend and we were doing a Bloody Mary club crawl on a Saturday morning. This bar was on the top ten but at #3 or #4. We started at number 2 on the list and they had the worst service and a sad representation of the advertised drink. We made our way to Hexx and then never left to go any further. We split a Colossal, it was gorgeous!  A pitcher of spicy Bloody Mary w a meal perched on top. They infuse their vodka there with basil and spices, it tasted sooooo good. Don't forget to tell then to make it spicy so they can use this special blend. We sat on the patio and watched people go by, it was a good time.  We had to come back later that night and received the same great service and drinks during happy hour. Thank you Hexx.

E7SacChLFuNCGYO-ozDtOA.text: This is a great pace to have dinner with a wonderful view of strip and Bellagio fountain. Recommend the salmon was wonderful and shrimp pasta. A bit pricey but location was worth it. Expect to spend about 30$- 40$ per dish for dinner! Service was ok waiter was friendly.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great views of strip!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nice views from patio!!

ODikUcenOgX7SpHZ-Cn-9A.text: Filling and simple. I was halfway through my meal of eggs, sausage and potatoes with side of carrot cake pancakes when it me that I was not going to make it through the whole meal. Food was delicious and atmosphere was trendy. Medium score was because things were a pit overpriced and  service was slow (even though it was busy we waited a good ten minutes before we even got our water filled up)

9K930f52_hbgvajghULa8g.text: So happy with the service and the food. I'm just going to keep this short and sweet. Mac and Cheese - GREAT. Short-Ribs - so frickin' tender. Wait Staff - Professional and attentive.   That's about it.   Eat Here!

L0w4fxLZT2HdziHKZlmFZw.text: Had chicken and waffles, the carrot cake pancakes and a side of bacon. We got the Groupon and went for breakfast -  ended up being around $25/person but that's not bad for Vegas prices considering it's on the Strip. It was pretty quiet when we went for breakfast around 9:30AM, the waiter was nice & attentive.  I really liked the decor, very sleek and modern. Would recommend if you're getting the Groupon! The portion sizes didn't look huge but they are - we had leftovers for our flight back home!

jxEAMliX5EKpDFOBb99LsA.text: First off, bottomless mimosas??!! Yes please!! We had brunch there and it was amazing!! The food, the presentation, the comfortable seating and most importantly our waitress, Tracee! She was awesome!! So personable and funny! She took real good care of us! I was with the elderly, meaning my parents, my two aunts and a family friend who is their age. Lol So she did a good job of helping me out with them.  Highly recommend!

-DoZYcOBrfcLBskIjC0cKg.text: The 2 stars are for the service alone as it was awesome!  The food..... not so much.   Spent $30 on the spicy jambalaya and $10 on the side mushrooms.  Jambalaya was over cooked and under-seasoned. It was very mushy and the mushrooms were WAYYY too salty.  I also got the hexx potion of jungle juice which was tasty but not worth $36.    Overall, spent $85 on a dinner that I would not even pay for anywhere- PERIOD.   Not worth it.  Lots of other and better food around, esp in that price range.

VdFKFvyG_Fo0CgUCUVuFkg.text: Was passing through Vegas and stopped here for lunch. We had lobster roll and hexx burger. Both were delicious. The lobster roll was perfectly seasoned. Our server was attentive. Location is great, right across from the Bellagio.

gySEO59dnkDHOf5cBAqJsg.text: I really enjoyed this restaurant. I left out 1 star because I think their cocktail prices are pretty high. No cocktail under $15, even though delicious, they add a lot of ice in a small glass. And it took a while to get drinks, the server said the bar was backed up. I ordered the pasta cabrona ($23) and it was very yummy. My husband ordered the sausage pizza ($19) he said it was just ok. We ordered a jumbo shrimp appetizer ($18) and it came with 4 jumbo shrimps and cocktail sauce. Yes this place was pricey but the location and setting was the best part. Great for people watching and a view of the Bellagio! You're almost under the Eiffel Tower so that was pretty cool to look up. The best part was Ben and Lauren from the Bachelor show sat behind us, I was pretty excited about that. I would definitely go back to this restaurant for a nice date night next trip to Vegas.

OJ-Jj6tGUEXbMndfCjd8EQ.text: Love this place. Having lunch out front with Bellagio fountains in the background. The people watching is fantastic. Great meal and really enjoyed the cocktails. Our server, Tolu, was amazing. Made great recommendations and really made our experience memorable.

gDQpF8K_e_p4znArguOjlQ.text: Homemade spicy vodka in a Bloody Mary was the best! Ordered traditional Eggs Benedict, a Gravlax Benedict was but they said they can easily make traditional. It was very plain. Very little ham and not much sauce which was bland. They did offer another breakfast though which I declined so they took 50% off of the meal. Don't order off the menu.

yLrzgda8hZm8cK7nZqrX0g.text: We stumbled across this restaurant looking for a place for dinner. We were pleasantly surprised! The food was excellent, but the service was better. Teddy was our waiter, he was knowledgeable and friendly. The way he described the menu items, I could almost taste them before they arrived. The ambiance was just right with the music playing and you can also watch the Bellagio water show while you have dinner. 5 stars!! I will definitely be visiting them again on my next trip to Las Vegas,

qKDl_yqI6Kv4YxyV0grqfA.text: What a great place to eat! Inside was a bit loud . We ate from the brunch menu. Would love to try dinner. Server was very friendly. We will be back for sure.

7C2WJ_3NDpvkVGB3LxreuQ.text: Overpriced for food that was a glorified of Chili's if that. It did not take me long to get seated to the Ambiance is great you can see the Bellagio water show from outside which is nice however the service really does suck the taste of food including salad was Bland and all items were highly inflated most likely due to the area in which it was the seating was elegant and stood out to me very modernistic but as far as food very poor

CrI6C8ZSNYyn92yMpDQN8A.text: Hexx was great! Our server Taylor was very attentive and super fun, we'd come back here any time we're in Vegas. Great food and awesome servers. Thank you!!

Xvs_UHOl6QEyDSO3XpDg1g.text: Taylor is amazing! Best waitress and best brunch  Bottomless mimosa and delicious food!

2P_L4eBDPMnvn9n8X9H0Mw.text: Excellent food, excellent service. We made a reservation and got a table right away. Our bottomless mimosas were awesome the food was delicious.  Our server Taylor made our day!! When I come back to Vegas I'll definitely be visiting Taylor & Hexx again!

0NP-TpB-LOqW8yRg1bIJ5Q.text: The portions are enough to feed two people per plate and the food is delicious! The scent of chocolate from the chocolate store across the restaurant is tantalizing!

Ia6JB743f4qpyZF31BF1tQ.text: Got seated quickly but service was horrible! Got our food and still.. no drinks. Server brought my drink finally but STILL no drink for my hubby! Finally half way through the meal she brought it. Ridiculous and it wasn't very busy. Used a Groupon cuz I wouldn't pay full price for this. Food was okay, when service starts off poor, food can only be okay.

keLP6c41y_ytzRC5DU8crw.text: Pricey, but everything is on the Strip. Ice cream was good and the guy helping us was super nice and polite about all the samples we wanted. Cool place to grab a quick dessert from.

iT9_RYaKJytY0-ADJEAtfA.text: Cool chill place for lunch. You can see the water fountain show at the Bellagio from here. Our waiter Sean was very nice and extremely funny. We would definitely come back!

Hgl8sYkuvHKG-flyvozDhw.text: Excellent meal & mimosa. The atmosphere & service were great! I had a Caesar Salad that was fresh but not extraordinary. My girlfriends meals were very good! I would definitely recommend this place for not just a great meal but visit the chocolate side as well!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Mimosa
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yellow Ghost Bloody Mary
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Classic Caesar Salad

hBXrOsfGpRwFj5FvOf2AJg.text: Outstanding in every way! From the incredible aroma of chocolate in the air when you walk in, to the view of the Bellagio fountains on the patio, Hexx delivers an awesome experience. The lobster roll is perfectly toasted and meaty and the short rib bolognese pasta is to die for! My partner loved his meal as well and I can't wait to bring my grandma in for dessert! The service and wine list both ROCK and the chocolate is truly one of a kind. Hexx is a must for locals and tourists alike. Enjoy every bite! Went back again last night with a group and the food and service was fantastic!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. experience tasting all the single origin chocolate from five different countries! The &#34;bean to bar&#34; experience is really cool!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. LOVE LOVE LOVE the chocolate spells!!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Short rib bolognese to die for!

syTrJpYMDbXqE9bUIYM1lg.text: The food was delicious and the service was great. Sean was an awesome waiter! I would recommend this restaurant to any of my friends who visit Las Vegas!

OG5SMuSctv3TgXtoAe2bkA.text: Hexx is one of the few 24 hour dining establishments within the Paris Hotel. Previously I never dined with them but I was a bit hungry upon my return from a show (I ordered around 12am) so I decided to give it a try. I was dining solo and was directed to sit at the bar. Once I placed my order it took a while for the food to get out so I changed my order for takeout. Service was somewhat efficient however not very warm or inviting. The lady ringing me up said she was unable to charge my room as there were too many people with my name and that I did not come up under my room number. Although it was not a terrible inconvenience I found it a bit open to doubt as I made 2 charges to my room within the same hour prior to placing my order with no issue.  The portion size of the Gnocchi Pomodoro was fairly small and the creamed corn seemed more like a liquid with bits of lobster. I do understand that it was late night dining and thus my rubric should be adjusted. However after arriving to my room and ascertaining what I received for roughly $60 (including tax + tip), I did not feel fairly satisfied with the meal.  I feel if I were to actually dine-in I might have a better opinion so I will do a follow up on my next trip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Gnocchi Pomodoro
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster creamed corn

EgF0QYgriG7OzoKOl_IMgw.text: This brunch restaurant is delicious. The omelette was filling but the other foods were a bit pricey for the small portions. This restaurant is more on the high end so it is fancier than your average brunch place. The carrot cake pancakes were still unique and quite yummy.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. left to right: Corned Beef Hash, Carrot Cake Pancaked, Veggie Omelette

Nc8-_Wr-7y0QQKn2-v3NtA.text: This place is incredible, especially for brunch! Bottomless mimosas plus the Hexx Benedict and the cinnamon waffle, such a delicious and perfect combination. What made our experience even better was the amazing wait staff! Sean, you were SO great! Will definitely come back here every time I'm in Vegas! (Only sad part is that they got rid of the chocolate candied bacon!!)

cqZC5iopDb0bOEuxVoQSog.text: We had a really good Saturday brunch here! I had a HUGE chicken tortilla egg thing (can't remember the name) - two can split was reasonably priced & bottomless mimosas for $20 on top. They have a handful of Bloody Mary's to pick from too.   Drinks were kept full and food was flavorful - big portions too. They are attached to a chocolate shop - some of the best chocolate I've ever had and smelled amazing in the lobby!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

HkLW6wFCOx1VeA1wVmuvkg.text: TAYLOR is the best waitress is the world! I came with a party of 6 and she made sure we were well taken care of. Her attitude and enthusiasm definitely added to our experience! Thank you Taylor for starting off our Vegas Trip on a great note!

TkfYF5UP2FvAS1-Jy-dcxQ.text: Amazing. Amazing. Amazing.  I love every bit of this restaurant from the location, to the food.  What I didn't love was the prices, which aren't disclosed until you're seated.  But we were prepared, so I suggest you be.  This restaurant has beautiful decor, trendy chic vibe, an open patio that faces the strip so you can watch the fountain show at the Bellagio, and the staff was super friendly.  We had a party of 18, reservations on a Saturday at 6pm, & were seated as soon as we arrived.  I ordered the 16 oz prime rib, with the bacon wrapped asparagus (a la carte) of course.  He had the rib eye & lobster cream corn.  Everything was absolutely deeeeelish! Only negative was my steak was the last out, & the waitress didn't bring me au jus... we celebrated a birthday and the manager on duty was sweet enough to send over cake pops & red velvet cake at the end of the meal.  Makes the $175 dinner worth it, I would definitely go back.  Thanks Hexx!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

gQE3HHOz4gchYawarclByw.text: This place is naturally busy given its location right on the strip and directly across from the Bellagio fountain.  We had the Cinaroll waffle and the farm fresh breakfast I think. Both were really good although they took some time to come.  Good location and good food!

s-BLi7kM0NJOd89t2CnHWQ.text: Best place ever!!!! Reasons:  1. T&t tracey and tristen are the best! Tracey is the bomb and gives you as many mimosas as you can handle! We love Tracey!!!! 2. Bottomless mimosas $20!!!! 7-2!!!  3. The food is awesome!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rACqQiLqXuNDX15dh_inJg.text: This was our favorite "nice" place to eat! Nice atmosphere, attentive staff. Salad was fresh and delicious.  It was recommended by the waiter who left stuff off that I said I didn't like--hubby had a steak that was cooked perfectly. Want to go back to try there breakfast !

HdbU1IZ-gwJYj_WCN-vtmw.text: Was walking down the strip looking for a breakfast joint and found this place and it was awesome. Had the chilaquiles and they where amazing. And our servers Sean and Steph where the best. Will be back when we visit Vegas again!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

c5VESF-j-pjexNNaNz2G7A.text: Really nice spot! We had brunch here and it was very good. My husband ordered a bloody Mary and it's the best one I've ever tasted. Food was great, too. Would definitely come back.

luXOyE4jzjvaBzZYmUntkA.text: Some of the best corned beef and hash I've ever had! The eggs Benedict was amazing as well! Got a great view of the strip for optimum people watching.   Our server was excellent. Kept the drinks coming and recommended a bunch of places for is to check out as well.  The only downfall is the bottomless mimosas cut off at 2 but brunch service doesn't end until 4, do if you have a 1pm reservation its annoying. Overall great experience!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chocolate hazelnut mousse
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

DteR0Xt0GvPWsG5Z5t0b1A.text: This place is great! I am a local, so touristy places on the strip are usually off the list , but this place is in the frequent rotation! Great View, great food and the service is also great! Bradley took care of us the last two times and he is awesome! Definitely a place to check out, even if you are a local.

xBhbVOr31Nb5cZ1r_k9xJg.text: Seriously one of the best restaurants I've been to in Vegas! Came here on a girls trip and it did not disappoint! There's something for everyone and I highly recommend it. Call in advance if you have a larger group!

ftg1CQWjiIbZaMrb4iZs_g.text: Had the best time here!!! The music was on point, the service by Tracee was amazing! The food was phenomenal! I definitely would come back!! Came for lunch with a group of friends while in Vegas & saw this place had a lot of good reviews so we came! My friends got their drinks in a disco ball, lol! So fun! It was so tropical it set the mood! The place was very comfy & you get a good view of the strip. I ordered the carrot cake pancakes and the corn beef hash. The carrot cake tasted exactly like carrots! I love the added walnuts & the cream cheese melted everything together. The corn beef hash was surprisingly amazing! The added pickles was a good touch. The hollandaise sauce was so yummy. I wanted more. The beef wasn't dry. I love that it was equal portion of everything so you get a little bit of everything with every bite. Amazing food, hella down to earth server, with the most poppin atmosphere ever, definitely coming back!!

BDk-QAkrEi6smqpOsV4TcQ.text: Great service and decent food.  We purchased the groupon for Hexx and went with a friend. The fruit platter is awesome but the Sticky bun is even better. The sticky bun comes warm with cream cheese frosting and a caramel drizzle. The Chicken and waffles was ok, it was nice that the chicken is boneless but the syrup is SUUUUUPER sweet so be prepared. I asked for hot sauce and they bring it out in a small dish, it tastes like seasoned tabasco sauce (not my favorite 'seasoned' flavor). But the dishes were all cooked well and as we ordered them. The waffle was crisp & so was the chicken. The server Shawn was accommodating, professional, and kind as he was the last time I came to Hexx, the drink/water guy was also super nice. I'd like to try the Chopped shrimp salad next time I come as the shrimp weren't over cooked and were a nice size.

zSQP0sGN4dWOl8WX90RDMg.text: The Good: The actual restaurant is beautiful, big, and located at a great spot on the strip. There was a busser there who was very friendly and tried to be as helpful as he could. We actually tipped him separately for trying to make it work.  The Bad: SLOW. Yes, it's busy but they were altogether forgetting some of our drink and food items. We were here for a bachelorette party so, of course, we're trying to really have fun and enjoy ourselves. Nobody wants to get annoyed or upset on vacation, but I swear places like this take advantage of that vacation mood. Eventually we had to start pointing out "why hasn't she gotten her cappuccino yet?", "why has everyone had their food for at least 10 mintues and she hasn't?" "This is supposed to be bottomless mimosas we've been waiting for a refill". Then people started hustling, bringing the forgotten items, apologizing and taking things off the check. It shouldn't have to be like that. Wish I could say the food was amazing and made up for everything but it was normal breakfast food. Nothing knocked our socks off.

JPy8ygE4_UEOMQv-zg23zg.text: The food and the service were both amazing, plus we had a great view of the fountains at the Bellagio. Get the mashed potatoes, you wont be disappointed.

3jnS4aj9rirUbqZejsutTA.text: Good food. Decent Bloody Mary. Sat us on the bar side where there were loud speakers. Hard to talk. Ask for left side.

0ht9gi5bMQmzdOgDbqpXQQ.text: Very nice location and nice looking restaurant. Burger and fries were awesome. Also got a pepperoni pizza which was also delicious. Service was good.

0hFN9dD0VG8nlGyCD7eXfQ.text: We used a Groupon for an inexpensive dinner right on the strip! The view of the Bellagio water show was fantastic and so was the food,wine and service!  We will be back the next time we vacation in   June 2019 Returned to Vegas and headed straight to Hexx kitchen for another wine and cheese plate.  They knocked it out of the park once again.  Buy the groupon!  It's the best deal on the strip!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

sgcmLQv2gL-8nOXP-_assg.text: The SO and I decided to try this restaurant since we were staying at Planet Hollywood and didn't feel like braving the cold and venturing out too far for dinner. The restaurant is pretty large and offers both indoor and outdoor seating. We opted for a table by the window facing the strip but if you sit outside you can get a great view of the Bellagio fountains.  For dinner, we ordered the Caesar salad and the 16 oz. ribeye steak along with the risotto, mashed potatoes, and asparagus. Everything was delicious but we especially enjoyed the caesar salad and ribeye steak. For Vegas, we were also pleasantly surprised that the food was pretty affordable, too!  Overall we really enjoyed our dining experience and was given great service by everybody while we were there! We will definitely return next time we're in Vegas!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. 16oz Ribeye Steak with mashed potatoes
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Risotto

toEmUb4L5tGT-gWuSFLAbg.text: Ventured here because of Groupon! I've seen this featured on Groupon for the past few years and always have been curious. Conveniently located right in front of Paris this quaint little restaurant is right next door to Alexxis with a yellow front. There is no walking through hotels to find this place you can't miss it and the door is right there front on the strip.    We did have reservations which i don't think is a necessity but helpful depending on the time of the year. We got seated right away with the friendliest server who had a great conversation with us about Vegas in general and the menu selection.    This place has lots of great unique drink options. They have quite a few beer selections to choose from and if you're a cocktail girl like me then you'll like this place even more! They do offer pitchers of mixed drinks which is probably a better deal if you plan on having more than one drink.   We just ordered appetizers which we opted in for the calamari and the spinach artichoke dip. The calamari was spicy! If you like spicy and buffalo sauce then you need to order this app you'll be pleased. I'm not much of a buffalo fan but my husband is and he ate more of this than i did. The calamari wasn't greasy and did have a lot of taste just not what i prefer.  The spinach artichoke dip was delicious. I was looking forward to their bagel thin dips that I've seen in previous reviews to dunk them but ours was served with just plain chips which that was a disappointment but it was still very good!   I would definitely visit this place again for lunch or brunch. Their brunch menu looked fantastic and they do serve brunch options throughout the day i believe. Service was great and food was decent.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Calamari with buffalo and ranch $17
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spinach dip $16
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Orange monkey beer $10, summer mule $16

mJpTYcYOD3_KLOwUeD8mSA.text: Not that this place needs another review but they are worthy!   I made a reservation in Thanksgiving and the place was pretty full. They sat us at their neighbors restaurant I believe Alexx. Very small tables and it was a bit cold and a huge window wide open right in front of us, that's my only complaint. Beautiful view of the bellagio fountain but cold.   The food and drinks are just amazing! I've never had such great thanksgiving meal and I can cook lol but this place is just like finger licking good. The service was amazing! The waitress saw there was no room to put the side plates so she brought a small side table, very accommodating.   You can park at planet Hollywood  or the palazzo and walk to the place. truly recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Everything was delicious
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thanksgiving dinner $55 per person

FcKM90TSyw5XBOnZLbNnGA.text: HIDDEN FEE ALERT! Please keep in mind they will hit you with an additional 4.7% "CNF" fee that is not disclosed till after you get the bill.   Mediocre food. Subpar service. Over priced.  There are far better options on the strip that does not charge you with the CNF fee. Totally not worth it.

jaR0QUlw42TTOhOY8sDXOg.text: Came in here during HAPPY HOUR! We sat down at the bar and ordered some Sangrias. They were super yummy and cheap!!! If you want to get a little more tipsy... I recommend the red sangria because my brother basically knocked out after one. But if you want to have the taste of yummy fruits and wines - then I recommend the white one!  Super beautiful place with a nice ambiance. Will definitely come again to try out other drinks and apps!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MbYLA_VKMQjmucwgiCFIxw.text: We had reservations for 10 on a Sunday at noon. We were sat on time. Had a great server. Didn't catch his name. Food is all good and rich. Bloody Mary was amazing.   Only complaint is the noise. Super loud in there. Hard to visit.  Location is great across from bellagio fountains.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Scallop roll

WTD96AG_aO-oddauRf5RcA.text: Every single thing we ordered on the menu was such a huge disappointment! Cannot believe we chose this place over all the wonderful options in the neighborhood. We might have not chosen their bestsellers but restaurants should stop putting food on their menu to just fill up the space. Highly disappointed! On letting the waiter know that the food was disappointing, all he did was clean up the table with full arrogance without showing any respect. Way to shut up customers with a meaningless discount when attitude itself can speak so much.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Vegetarian pizza which could qualify as dessert
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garlic bread which is clearly undercooked.

OMsVkjzaujwT3GkDQLRWig.text: We arrived in Vegas late afternoon so by the time we were ready to hit the town it was pretty late - almost midnight. We asked the concierge at our hotel if there were any nice late night spots and she recommended Hexx Kitchen and Bar. It's actually located in Paris Hotel and is a pretty large restaurant.   We were seated in a nice section with a perfect view of the Bellagio fountain show which is absolutely beautiful at night. There was live music as well which was nice. It was a Friday night. Not sure if they have live music daily or just on the weekend. Ambience was perfect for a date night. Service was great and food was good. Prices were good as well. I liked the menu. We had chicken sausage pizza with fig and it was delicious. They even gave me a cute little cupcake at the end of our meal for my birthday! Only minus was that it was a cold evening and the front doors were open but they were really accommodating and closed them when we (and another table) asked. I would definitely return whenever I go back to Vegas. Just ask to be seated where you can view the fountain show- especially at night!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bday cupcake
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Calamari and chicken sausage pizza

lfWowJhGkYg0_O6knbhvSw.text: This place is a show stopper! I kid you not. It feels like a cozy house with tons of friends inside. The seating arrangement can feel tight around the bars but overall you get the feeling you need to talk and collaborate with others around you. We had a reservation for brunch. I highly suggest making a reservation during holidays. We were sitting on the patio outside and it was nice to have a view with the food. We quickly chatted with a group of guys about what they ordered before we order our meal. The food came out quick! I loved my ham and cheese croissant but my friend said she wasn't in love with her po' boy. I will say the food was overpriced but you're paying for the experience and that was best part.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. These are the private tables inside
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp Po&#39; boy
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ham &amp; Cheese Croissant - I add eggs

zrJanuv_u4JZtwftrtytZw.text: The food is pretty good, entree portions are decent and service was attentive. However, this is a $$$ place (not $$ as Yelp has it). We sat on the patio and enjoyed a relaxing meal while watching the sideshow that is the strip right in front of us.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

1Y8c4xQ03cV5qASuEpRulQ.text: Decided to come here before our flight home. It was a weekday and we had trouble finding a place that would serve good breakfast after 10am but discovered HEXX on yelp. We were not disappointed at all! We were sat immediately and the server, Alejandra came to us right away. We ordered coffee and our meals and decided to do bottomless mimosas after she suggested it would be a better value for my boyfriend and me. They did not disappoint. Alejandra was super attentive and very personable the entire time we were at HEXX. She frequently checked in on us and made sure everything was great the entire time. The food was great and drinks were perfect. Plan on coming back again!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottomless mimosas

OpRMMLVmRdfoqmoN0xLgqQ.text: I'm so mixed on this place I've been here before and loved the happy hour specials so we came back for dinner. The service was wonderful Kevin was our waiter and you could tell he has a passion for service. He was very informative about the menu and was super attentive. We had martinis and they were well made. The food was just ok. I had the salmon on black mushroom quinoa and I really wanted to love it but there was too much squid ink in it where it caused a large puddle on the bottom of the plate which caused everything to be black. Also I don't get why peas are in everything here. It was in the mushroom quinoa and in my wife's Bronzino and did not add anything to either dish. My wife's Bronzino was ok it wasn't bad but she felt it was missing something for the price.   The dessert menu looked very heavy and nothing looked appealing so we passed  on dessert.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chopin Martini
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Salmon with black mushroom quinoa

e9tSYmx0vyBNbvyBKS19UQ.text: My husband had been wanting to eat here for a long time.   As we didn't have any reservations anywhere, we decided to finally check this place out.  I thought it was a small place but it's actually huge!  There's no restroom in the restaurant but there is a casino restaurant on the right side of the casino.  If you come in from the casino side, you have to walk the long corridor through the restaurant to see the host/hostess.   As it was slow/middle of the week,  we were seated right away.  Our waiter, Chris came to introduce himself and took our drink orders.   He was very helpful and attentive.  Since they are famous for Sangria,  we ordered Breeze air and Pinky swear.   Both drinks were delicious and came with fruit.  We ordered the jumbo crab cake,  surf & turf sliders and veggie burger.   Everything was delicious!  Every single person we interacted with was welcoming, pleasant and professional.   Both inside and outside area were clean. They do heat the patio on cooler days.  We'll definitely be back,  next time we're in town.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great food and amazing service!  Chris was very pleasant and professional!!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Veggie burger
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Crab cake and surf and turf sliders.

BtULw_Cvj828OMYmi4WdEw.text: The service was mostly attentive. (Took is a few minutes to be seated because they did not have the entrance from the casino staffed so we had to walk to the strip side. Wouldn't be a big deal but O don't understand why they wouldn't have a sign instructing folks where to go)  The food left much to be desired particularly for the high cost. I had a braised short rib with mashed potatoes and Brussel sprouts. My Wife had the fillet with blue cheese on top and French fries on the side. Her medium rare steak was difficult to cut and not tender at all. The only flavor you tasted was a mouthful of pepper. The fries were limp and undercooked. We sent them back and the fries were removed from our Bill. My meal was ok but again could have been far more tender and for $40 I don't expect something to just be "ok."  I would be curious about their brunch but I would avoid having dinner here when for this cost there are far better options on the strip.

tdV3z-1f3xvgTn7zuz7MaA.text: Pretty good but not mind blowing!! I wouldn't say you have to try this place for dinner but breakfast menu looks better. So this what we ordered for dinner: Calamari: came out with buffalo and ranch dipping sauce. Nothing special about it. Jumbo crab cakes: $18 for one!! Eeekkkk....it was also quite forgettable  Braised short ribs: came with mashed potatoes and Brussel sprouts. The short rib was very tender and tasty. Hangar steak: seasoned and cooked well. I'd recommend this dish. However, it came al la cart so you'll have to add a side or sides for $10/each.   Service: our server Abe was nice and attentive. The restaurant wasn't too busy when we dined there around 530pm in a Saturday evening.   Also you'll be charged a "concession fee" of 4.5%!! WTH??

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tequila and a kick of spice
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hanger steak: yummy!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hangar steak with broccolini

JEU0XgaPHfmlQO3KykggAA.text: I've been to Hexx twice now, once for dinner and once for brunch.  Both times we sat outside, near the misters, and got to enjoy the fresh air and see the fountains at the Bellagio across the street.   For dinner, the server recommended the fish (I can't remember the name, but it was similar to black cod and it was absolutely delicious.) My friend had a salad, which was also delicious.   For brunch, we had the chilaquiles(these are a must-get at Hexx! So amazing!), the protein omelette (also delicious--i would definitely order it again) and a Bloody Mary and mimosa.   The service was fantastic and the overall experience will definitely bring us back to Hexx!

56RKoJfTIQ6eMAs59Es8-Q.text: Service was great The view was amazing, right under the Eiffel Tower & overlooking the fountain  The food was pricey for what it was & I guess that's what you sign up for when going to Vegas but that's why the 4 stars.   Overall great & classy place

cem4lkLlYqa-WKV0RL4KVA.text: The food here is okay... Nothing special, just very basic brunch food you can get anywhere. The quality is average as well, considering the price. Each dish was round $17-25. I tried vegetable pizza, chicken & waffles, calamari, and fiesta punch bowl. Fried chicken was a bit too salty for me and calamari was very thin, almost did not taste any of the actual calamari, just the fried batter with ranch and buffalo sauce. Also, just so you know, there will be "CNF" fee on your bill on top of sales tax and tips and the Hexx kitchen + bar is connect/ the same as Alexxa's Bar.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Punch bowl at the bavk, Chicken &amp; Waffles and Crispy Calamari next, and then Vegetable Pizza

1VhgGP7Yss-puvkmQdLbtg.text: Been here a few times but never received such outstanding service as I did today from Apollo!! He made our brunch experience so awesome!!! He's was friendly and attentive! We had a few drinks and some bomb food!!!! Highly recommend!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rfwcMM_wal9FrPZOkFERzw.text: I had one of the best burgers ever and for $16, it better be! However my rating was lowered because of the other item we ordered. My husband had jambalaya and he said the shrimp was cold. And the sausage and chicken was old. I could see that it was dried out. So we had mixed results on the food. The drinks were great. The service by Maria was impeccable.

QC93zdAsqm91GZKr9mlFnQ.text: OK food and bad service.  I ate at Hexx Kitchen on a Saturday night (7pm). We had a reservation for a group of 10. Upon showing up right at 7pm, the hostess asked us to wait just a little until our table was ready, even though the restaurant was not full (at least 1/3 of tables were open, including at least 3 which would have accommodated our group size).  After a 15 minute wait, we were seated. Unfortunately no servers came by for yet another 15 minutes - we finally had to flag someone down. By then we were all ready to order both drinks and food. Our drinks took another 20 minutes to come out. So, here we were with a 7pm reservation were just being served our drinks almost an hour later. We were very frustrated and thankful that we had such good company and a decent view of the Bellagio fountains to distract us from the poor service. Luckily our food came out shortly after - I was a little underwhelmed by my entree of the Bucatini, and the added chicken was quite dry. Everyone else seemed to enjoy their meal (many girls ordered the antipasto salad).  So, the food was ok/good but not amazing, and service pretty terrible. Although, I will note that the server offered to separate the checks for each of us without us even asking, which was very appreciated.

y9FPVREl7BERRROROyvP3g.text: Thank you Tracee! Our waitress was a sweetheart with great suggestions for our brunch options! I had chilaquiles and mimosa. Wait time was not existent, we were lucky! The food and service was great and glad we came! She was so fun and had a great attitude!

FA_eIqo6uANoVeddWYUZqw.text: I want to give a shout out to a fantastic server Jessica A. This was my first time here and not only was the hamburger great the service and personality of Jessica A was phenomenal! I would highly recommend Hexx and Jessica A

x2VajEfuBRmO_RbmzoXPmw.text: The food at Hexx is on fire. What's great is how nimbly they dance across food trends in order to accommodate the myriad of food issues and concerns so common nowadays. Paleo? No problem? Low carb? Got it! Gluten free? Yep? Vegetarian? Gotcha covered.  Standout starters are their pork rinds (yes) enlivened with vinegar and pickled fresnos you add yourself, veggie pizza that is as pretty to look at as it is to eat; caprese salad that isn't a bore; some of the best calamari I've had in a long time; roasted broccolini that's a nice  change and candied bacon that you'll fight over. And that's just for starters. Plus there is tons more. But save room for dessert because it is Hexx after all and the chocolate is made on premises and it's a real star of the Vegas strip. You can even get a tour and a lesson on how they make it and have a chocolate tasting from all the regions they purchase their beans.

IUMrtiHX2UgcpwYcLlPnuw.text: The food is amazing! Also big portion too. Sean I want to personally thank you for the amazing customer service you provided my friends and I! Your energy and vibes was on point! Will come back for sure on my next Vegas trip! Thank you Sean and Hexx team!

XXn43vjL6ytc4toNdU--SQ.text: Our first time here! We stayed at the Paris hotel so this was perfect! The inside is very intimate, clean, and beautiful!! The food was delicious and drinks were wonderful as well!!!

You can't take the best thing on the menu off! So sad. Thank goodness Tracee is our waiter and her sweet personality made up for it! Word of advice: promote Tracee and bring back the bacon!! #makehexxgreatagain

580qSBmntpPFKhXWPFFWeA.text: BEWARE OF THE CNF CHARGE!!! This is a totally bogus charge the put on your bill and they say it's because of a law that states all restaurants that are opened 24 hours are required to have. That is completely not True and it's just an okay place anyways. Go to Giada's or Bouchon down the street for much better food.

Lvt7cIsbsMTOQRzAMFql6A.text: HEXX did not disappoint for a weekday brunch. This is a nice spot if you don't want all the bells and whistles of over the top Vegas brunch but still wanna fill up before a long day ahead. My party and I opted for all breakfast items such as the protein omelette, veggie omelette and a three egg platter. HEXX takes substitutions with no hesitation--add mushrooms, add sausage, and swap English muffin for toast, respectively, though forgot my boyfriends wheat toast the first time.  Each plate came with Parmesan home fries which could've used a touch more salt during the cooking process. No one at my table happened to clean their plates but we all left stuffed and satisfied!

Gd4I8sCtoQxTJEhV1-rg-w.text: I went here twice (with family going a third time without me) and I'm taking all of those experiences into account for this review. If I had only visited in the early morning this would probably be a 5 star review.  We came here very early shortly after opening for a breakfast. We were still on East Coast time and decided to get some food and avoid the crowds.  Service was attentive and friendly.   We were sat on the balcony in a still cool breezy morning.   I ordered the eggs benedict and my husband had the cinnamon bun waffles. The food was perfect, I was completely in love with my benedict, perfectly cooked eggs with ham and asparagus ontop of gorgeous scalloped potato. Probably the best benedict I've had in a very long time. My husband was over the moon with his breakfast as well since it came with an actual mountain of cream cheese icing.  The problem we get into is the other visits. On my recommendation family went later on in the day and had a much less enjoyable experience.  A day or so later we stopped by in the evening on a whim to grab a few drinks and same deal.  It seems that the second they get busy, all bets are off. They recieved cold food, and the night with drinks we had an incredibly long wait for ordered drinks, so long we couldn't justify getting more than one.   So all in all, it's a good enough place but they really struggle when it comes to dealing with a full house. Unfortunately, where they're situated on the strip, they will ALWAYS have a full house during peak times.  If you can go crazy early like I did, you'll have a great time, otherwise maybe choose somewhere else!

NTOZJgLdtQfqu_C_ekww3Q.text: Okay so ... chicken and waffles is something I look for at every breakfast restaurant, and these chicken and waffles exceeded my expectations. The pancakes were fluffy and they came with powdered sugar in them. We also got a side of bacon with the pancakes because the pancakes just came by themselves. The service here was great , I'd recommend sitting outside to see the nice view of the strip if it's not tooo tooo hot. We were seated pretty quickly with no wait and served quickly as well. The restaurant is wonderful it reminds me of Hawaii the way it's set up. This restaurant was great I'd recommend it just make sure you call in before to see if there was a wait time so you don't have to wait.

AuhEdySwI_Zg_aX784jKCA.text: My boyfriend and I made reservations on open table to dine here one of the nights on our recent Vegas trip. We called ahead and asked to be seated outside so we could watch the Bellagio fountains. At first the host said that the outdoor seating was first come, first serve, but we told him that our entire goal was to be seated outside, so if they wouldn't be able to accommodate that, then we would just find another spot - he quickly changed his tune and confirmed that we'd be able to sit outside at the time of our reservation.   The view outside was definitely what we were looking for. The patio also had heat lamps there which would be great for colder evenings. Our server was very energetic, made a few wine suggestions, and brought out some water and our wine. He was mostly scarce through the remainder of our dining experience (but not absent...just gave us space).  We ordered the spinach artichoke dip to start. While the dip itself was delicious, the chips seemed like they were just store bought. Would have been nice to have had something more fresh and/or authentic. Also the chips are too thin for this hearty dip - they kept breaking when we tried to scoop up some of the dip. We then shared the mushroom risotto and the bone-in ribeye. The risotto, while it was tasty, was mostly just OK, nothing incredible. The steak was ordered medium rare, and was served slightly more cooked than I typically prefer, but it was still yummy. Our total bill (which included a bottle of wine, an appetizer, one side, and one steak) for about 160$ after tip. We also had a 5% off coupon from Tix4Tonight. A bit overpriced, as neither of us were blown away by any of the food, but all in all it was an enjoyable experience.

BYIHSKvWhFzkujCV7cLdzg.text: We came in here some friends and unfortunately there was any Normas roach problem crawling across the floor and there was some screaming involved by my girlfriend the table behind us had three people and the woman almost vomited in side of her napkin and she slammed down her food To gentleman from another table got up and we're trying to catch this enormous and stomp on it which caused a huge scene Everyone was gagging and yelling the roach was approaching my girlfriend shoe since she jumped out of the table she left the shoe at the chair and ran towards me while I was trying to pay the bill  Manager name Christian came by and basically left at the situation and my friend became very frustrated and then he took my card without saying a word and slid it and hand it back to me  I calmly questioned him as to why he had nothing to say as my girlfriend was sick to her stomach I was laughing because the scene was so crazy and everyone was getting worked up over this situation that once I came in contact with Christian I just couldn't believe that his attitude was basically" whatever" What made matters worse was a Nother woman manager approached when she heard all the screaming and commotion she didn't do anything but roll her eyes and say that she was calling security  Then we were questioned If we were even guest at the Hotel and yes we were.   There was nothing security could have done as we did pay our bill & for people in total had raise their voices and it just seemed like they wanted everyone out of the restaurant  For future reference lady instead of calling security why don't you just call an exterminator Christians only excuse was that he has no control over what bugs enter his property.   The food was not bad at all But I will never recommend this place and I'll never returned ever not after the way that they treated everyone who was just trying to enjoy their dinner.  They could have at least said us someplace else and offered us a cup of coffee. But not an apology at all which makes me wonder about the health inspection.  I went on Facebook and told everyone and show the people live video of everyone freaking out over this roach. And my friend Steve said that that's not the first time he heard about there past control problems and that the place was disgusting.   It was my friend first night in Vegas first night staying at the Paris.  We wish we would have went to Bouchon instead.
