-yolPlZxNWcaHjwg_6Gc1w.text: Amazing brunch with great Vegas strip view! Mimosas were exquisite and the food was amazing as well, service was excellent!

4Atvv6jeYEkdovM2evZ-OA.text: Wowowow. I didn't do too much research into this brunch place before making a reservation purely on the basis that it had bottomless mimosas and a view of the Strip, but HEXX ended up being one of my unexpected highlights of Vegas.   There was a slight hiccup in getting us seated - we were slightly late for our reservation but called in ahead. When they tried to seat us a few minutes later, there was some miscommunication with the hostess and she led us around the restaurant in a confused sort of way while speaking to someone on her headset before apologizing and bringing us back to the front lol. But after 5 minutes or so we were seated for real, and in a WONDERFUL spot on the patio that overlooked the street and the Bellagio fountains just across from us.   I have to say that the atmosphere here is worth the 5 stars alone - it's busy but in a good, excitable sort of way, the servers are so warm and attentive, and the location is spectacular - located in Paris Las Vegas (the bathrooms are actually outside the restaurant in the hotel itself, so I got to walk around and explore) right on the streetside. Because we were seated outside, we got to absorb the energy of the Strip and the sheer quantity of passerby while still hearing live music from inside - plus every 15 minutes we got to see a show from the fountains! I would definitely suggest requesting a table outside or at least with a view of the street.   And then there's the food!! I got the chicken and waffles, and considering I've only ever had Roscoe's chicken and waffles, this was deliciously impressive - the fried chicken was soooo satisfying, and I loved the apple cheddar waffle. My BF really enjoyed his corned beef hash. They also have $24 bottomless mimosas, and these servers mean bottomless - they were topping me off constantly, and by the end I had definitely indulged in my money's worth.   I highly recommended HEXX to friends that I met up with right after, and they visited the day after for brunch and had just as great of an experience. In terms of casual brunch on the Strip, this is absolutely perfect!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

I_UUJ9Oh1iZ7DDBPwIquRA.text: First off I'd like to say we had Jessica as our server and she was spot on. From beginning to end, she helped with any questions and knew about everything to do with the menu as well has the chocolate they specialize in making. She was super friendly and hard working. So thanks for making it a great experience.   As for everything else. We were able to walk in and be seated right away. The meals are reasonably priced when compared to many other places on The Strip.   As for me, I had the prime rib. It was probably close to an inch thick, tender and juicy. Be sure to make use of the au jus and creamy horse radish dips. It also comes with a side of mashed potatoes.  My girlfriend opted for the flat iron steak (the best butcher cut).  It was delicious and perfectly cooked. Her side of roasted cauliflower really hit the spot. The spicy aoli provided the flair and the spiced almond provided the crunch.

yFUY8P2vcnNoPMSBscQO_w.text: Absolutely loved. Had the French toast with the bottomless mimosas and had a BLAST. Service was amazing.

I honestly had never noticed this place but i was browsing travelzoo and found a deal saw the good reviews and thought what the heck,so i got the travel zoo that included drinks SO GLAD I DID! We had to make reservations so I did make a reservation for the next day no problem. So we arrived 7pm reservation on July 3 seated right away. Restaurant is open air so though we were inside it was like being outside without the sun scorching down on us which was great. Our server, Mark was absolutely fabulous very attentive but no too much. Travelzoo was two drinks,apps,entrees, and desserts. For drinks we got the hexx fusion and the raspberry fizz SOOO GOOD! For apps bf got a salad I got the shrimp ceviche...the ceviche was AMAZING it was soooooo good!!! I would have bought a tub to take home if i could have (i do wish it came with more chips) but it was so yummy. For entrees we got the prime rib (cooked medium well) and the scallops. Both were nothing short of delicious my scallops came with carrots..Idk what they did but even the carrots were delicious and the prime rib was cooked to perfection comes with au jus just perfection. Desserts were fabulous too, s'mores and red velvet cake. This is my new favorite place and I'll be here EVERY trip with or without the travelzoo coupon because it is so worth it!! Yeah

SWzgZItGDBQIPSimOEyOQQ.text: Came last week and had unlimited mimosas with steak and eggs. I can't even begin to describe how amazing the drinks were, how amazing and soft my steak was and how perfect my amazing waiter jay jay was. I been to Vegas countless amount of times and I can't believe I BARELY tried this gem. Literally best part of my trip. What a great experience for breakfast. Friendly and professional staff. CHEFS AMAZING

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

uu9uwl6v2mvA__xZoT3Zdg.text: We were on an early walk along the strip and happened to stop at this hotel eatery. I had a standard eggs, bacon and toast, and my wife had the Benedict. Both were very good. Service was a little off in terms of waiting for refills and such but was good, just the same. Nothing was wrong at all, let share that out front. It was just that for standard fare, nothing stood out on the menu--especially for strip prices.

4fnJOijRoHk3NCAhyMz8fA.text: Let me start by saying that if you go to this place you MUST sit with Tracy! She was fun, energetic, attentive, I could go on and on.! We were celebrating my husbands 30th birthday with a large group of people.. although a big group we felt catered to every step of the way. Our mimosas were filled before they ever got empty (along with our waters and sodas too ) and the food was delicious! We tried several different things on the menu.. and I can honestly say you can't go wrong. I highly recommend Hexx to all!

0WqmHM2sS8LeGwYS2wanKQ.text: I recently came here on a Saturday around noon for their weekend brunch. We had a group of about 6 girls and had no problem making a reservation and being seated quickly. We sat inside which had a huge seating area and was full of sunshine. One downside though is that they don't actually have their own restroom so you have to use the casino ones.  For food I went with the corn beef hash. I enjoyed the flavor of the sweet potatoes, but did wish they were a little bit more crispy. The portion size was more than enough which made the price worth while to me. I also had the bottomless mimosas which were great. They certainly kept it topped off at all times, great service!  Overall I'd recommend this place for a great brunch option on the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corn beef hash
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bottomless mimosas
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Giant dry ice potion drink

3eSx73QrlL8Ucn1BA3cWIQ.text: Hexx is a large beautiful restaurant with plenty of outdoor seating facing the famous Belaggio fountains. They are open early and relatively late.   I bet Hexx does a lot of awesome food. But their chilaquiles is not one of those things. My friends loved their chicken with waffles and chicken salad. I just made a bad choice. They have a pretty diverse menu I will just have try something else.   The servers were really nice although the hostesses were a but abrasive even though when we showed up it wasnt packed.

7rFgqp7HxwUbnwF3k7zVWA.text: Omg! A prime rib the size of my head! AND it was soft and delicious!!! I am actually craving that prime rib now that I'm writing this review. Have to come back!!  Prime rib- did I say it was delicious?!?! Suggesting you share this one with someone. I couldn't finish it.   Dry aged rib eye- packed with flavor! Every single bite! I love it when steaks are seasoned just right. It shows care in the process of making the food.   Customer service- what an informative young lady! We had questions about a few things and she knew all the answers! She was prompt and filled out glasses often. We were never down from our high after one bite of the meat because she also kept us going. I do want to mention that the young host was lacking in friendliness. It felt like he looked down on us and responded with the hoity toity attitude. Dropped our menus on the table and left. Luckily, we had a stellar server and an even more amazing meal!!!

5tTO4lbSPUztQ9dy3H6cjw.text: Hexx has indoor and outdoor seating at the Paris hotel. They said 20 min wait but it was 5! Great brunch menu. My daughter and I split veggie omelet with potatoes and fruit and had the peanut butter cheesecake. Just right. :)  Our waitress was great. Hostess was great. Great vibe. Saved 10% by using the Tickets 4 Tonight dining card. Highly recommend for lunch/brunch.

ML8s8rA_a5u-eoLB4ZgBfw.text: Best brunch in Vegas. Perfect location on the strip. Bottomless mimosas are a plus! Taylor and Josh were attentive and kept the drinks coming! Wish we could have sat outside for an amazing view of the Bellagio but the inside was super cute and AC was wonderful. Will def make this a dining destination next time in Vegas.

A0qFjUgNwTIvF66-co7hrw.text: TRACY TOOK CARE OF US IN THE BEST WAY. She was amazing. We appreciate her so much, even though she is a cancer and cancers are crazy. She's amazing

_LT13PSPX1ohAzkA-BU0ZA.text: Raphael you were the best server! Thank you so much for serving us and being so entertaining, it made our Vegas experience that much better. The mimosas were 10/10 and the food was amazinggg! Definitely recommend HEXX and the philly cheese steak sandwich with their signature fries!

XSY7MhSgNLCv-giLLzsQzA.text: Brittany was amazing!!! We showed up last minute from a work event with 19 people and they immediately got us a table! Mimosas and food were all out on the table for everyone within an hour. Brittany was super calm, sweet, and attentive to every single one of us. The entire staff was super accommodating, esp Andrew with bussing and helping Brittany clean! HEXX ROCKS!

WjmX3uG9HBJjct2NH8zalQ.text: The atmosphere of this place is awesome especially if you can get a seat outside to watch the Bellagio water show. When visiting Vegas this restaurant stayed packed, they have some featured drinks with dry ice, seemed cool but it was to early for me to try. I did have a mimosa and you can order unlimited mimosas for $23. My meal was the classic burger which was delicious, I rarely finish an entire burger and I was very close. My husband ordered a chicken sandwich and he seem to like it. The wait staff was friendly and attentive. This restaurant is good just a bit pricey.

CUkK3FdwcfWw20rMs4UVZg.text: If you don't wanna wait in the big queues then this is the place to go.  My friend and I came here two mornings in a row because we get seated right away.  The food is really good and the service as well.  And their serving size is big so be ready to pig out! Lol

zKDFEfNxWyJGEvyrtihvWQ.text: Since we stayed at Paris Hotel, this restaurant is very convenient for us, there is an entrance inside the lobby. Great place for people watching if you sit on the patio. Great view of Bellagio's fountain too however, the menu is limited and the price was too high in our opinion. We spent $90 for 2 sharing an appetizer, a salad and a pizza, a beer and a glass of wine. Good experience, however since there are so many choice of restaurants in LV, we won't be back.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Pepperoni pizza and salad. Just ok!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Great view for people watching!

sP0Ch2NPymLxrLfYSipw9A.text: We ordered from the tapas/small plates menu.  The food was creative and delicious. Our waitress, Jasmine, was friendly and efficient.  I definitely recommend Hexx.

xtiGKhNKowYMA8olmehv-A.text: We enjoyed the brunch.  My husband had the steak and eggs which he absolutely loved.  I had the egg and bacon breakfast which was delicious.  Our server was attentive and cheerful and added to our wonderful experience.  Sitting outside along the sidewalk, watching the Bellagio fountain and listening to Pavarotti added to the lovely breakfast.  We will definitely eat here again on our next trip to Las Vegas in June.

PFHPm2zad9y0ahcG3hvy1g.text: Stumbled across this place while on the strip one night! I think it used to be the old sugar factory? Anyways Lupita was our server and she was excellent! I have a few allergies and she was able to direct me on a pleasant culinary adventure! I don't go to the strip very often anymore but this was the best meal I've had in a while.

w-pn_OcaVke9JI0-h45cmg.text: Everything was absolutely excellent. Kevin our server did a wonderful job. Even though he was extremely busy. We had the beet appetizer and it was delicious. I had thw king salmon and my husband had the fillet with mac and cheese and everything was perfect.

s9kzpGMBIP5tFQlRRtW52A.text: Great food, staff, cocktails, and view! Overall the best experience I've had at a resturant on the strip! The jumbalya is delicious and the espresso martini is the best I've ever had. Please try to sit on the porch outside because the view of The Strip is fantastic! Also try the chocolate and treats next door. The chocolate is honestly like fine wine! I had the pleasure of meeting Issac, Chelsea and Carol they were a pleasure to be around all night! Thanks for the great evening. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PfeyrWN_jh3EId_-XIfhHg.text: Only came to Vegas for 2 days and have already eaten here twice! Our server Steven was amazing! Very knowledgeable about the menu and super friendly! Definitely will be back for our next trip!

IdHwQ1YB2GKAsTrctAIz0Q.text: Came here Sunday morning for some breakfest. Techinically during lunch time but they were serving breakfest until 2 P.M. I got the french toast which was good but nothing amazing! It did fill me up. We also got one of the drinks that are made with dry ice which makes "smoke" come out of the cup which is very very cool but once again nothing amazing. The service was good for being the day after new years when everyone should be groggy and not wanting to work. I guess for there not being any wait to get in its good for a quick bite but other then that I would probably try something else next time for a quick lunch. Nothing too special for me here.

RaajQj-wtcMPUBtdt3U1hQ.text: Saw this place across the strip from the Bellagio and what a find it was! Tracee and Luis were extremely accommodating. We started with a party of 3 and our friends came to join us. They quickly helped us turn the table from 3 to 5. The food was delicious! All of us had great meals and added the bottomless mimosas for good measure. Thank you for a great time!

Z8HYXYiRzPkA5KCkTSu_oA.text: Made reservations a month ahead of time to get in here. It was worth it.  Omar and Seth eerr amazing and made tbe experience ebven better- if possible. Staff was all great and friendly. Food was awesome and drinks were amazing.  Defiantly a Vegas favorite!

OJR5Q71HGOXTCBmniE50yw.text: This place is so great. I've been several times now and am always able to get in with or without a reservation. The food is pretty good, prices are moderate by Vegas standards, and the staff is attentive but not annoying. The best part about Hexx is that you can walk right in off the strip and sit inside or outside, you never have to walk through a hotel/casino. So nice. The decor is modern and the space is clean. The ONLY drawback is that it is connected to Paris which is moderately atrocious, and you have to use the casino/hotel bathrooms.

XIXJZL4OATSAMpnoj4ms6Q.text: Very slow service and we always had to flag all different waiters down to order drinks, food, get bill, etc. The food was very average. I was very disappointed and will probably not be back. There are a lot more restaurants in vegas to choose from with better service and better food.

mBehcibQKvFnO9YTo11r-A.text: I am reviewing on the behalf of Ms. Tracee,  During my 3rd day, suffering in the sweltering Nevada sun. I thought I would never make it. The proper means of hydration via mimosa would never be fulfilled. Until, I personally met, THE Mimosa Ninja. With her assistance, Ms. Tracee utilized the optimal means to deliver such gifts. With her help, we have made our Las Vegas trip an unmemberable one. Just as it should be.  Thanks Tracee, you're the greatest who've ever lived. May the Mimosa Ninja live on!   #USAUSAUSA #MIMOSANINJA #TEAMTRACEE

SFlQpS17MuZ-Fs9c3czkcA.text: Great selection for breakfast. Very friendly and prompt staff. The hash browns were unique and delicious! Wife had chiliquiles and loved it...I tried to temper some of my Vegas indulging with an egg white omelette and it was more then I expected...best coffee we have had on our trip and their Bloody Mary list was huge.  Can't speak for lunch or dinner but breakfast spot on.....Also great people watching patio.

GqV5P2UDYhDyAdGLqVqDZQ.text: After a rough check-in late at night on 3/22/18, we drifted into HEXX and sat indoors at the bar.  Tom Tom greeted us and he was FANTASTIC.  So friendly, warm and welcoming.  His mixology was superb.  He gave us a ton of recommendations for the local area and we are on task to visit them.    The following Saturday, we headed in based on a recommendation from another bar to try their New York strip with Bearnaise Sauce on the side.  We were not disappointed.  We ordered the NY strip which my wife and I split, added their delicious roasted brussel sprouts in a balsalmic sauce, and asparagus wrapped in ham.  WOW!  No huge portions but just right.  HEXX wins for the best restaurant and bar experience during this trip!  Thanks Tom Tom and the restaurant wait staff!

l013rWn9jtBWLXA8bSTQNQ.text: I like this place. Open 24/7 , food usually spot on. Service almost always good as well. Prices high, but not insane. Great location as well. We love the burgers,  incredible steaks and prime rib, pastas decent, and excellent breakfast choices. I am not joking,everything is really pretty good. 5 star....not quite....but 4+ and definitely the best 24/7 restaurant on the strip. Try those bottomless mimosas! They are delicious!

p7nC9aqHk9Xh8sj2EJ3Piw.text: We heard there was a Hexx Chocolate shop and were disappointed to find out that they just sold the Chocolate bars at the restaurant and did not have an actual chocolate shop. Either way we were still eager to get our hands on a 70% chocolate bar. After finding a nice place to sit down and enjoy our chocolate bar we were a little disappointed again. The bar was a little bland and just didn't hit the spot. Overall Hexx was a nice facility with friendly staff I just wouldn't get their chocolate's again. I would try their food though.

EHPhuWXg-GErmOjfVpkz1Q.text: First time here in Vegas and I loved it! This restaurant has a nice patio and is attached to the Paris hotel. I made a reservation on Opentable and we were seated within a matter of 20 minutes from check-in. We came in for breakfast. They were super busy, but were getting people in and out. I had the Hexx Benedict. If you like egg Benedict then I would definitely recommend their unique twist to the dish. It was delicious. I had bottomless mimosas and the DJ was lit. The servers were dancing and had us doing the wave. The best brunch I've been to in Vegas thus far. Prices are also reasonable and the staff is super friendly and attentive. Definitely give this place a try if you're ever in the area! I give the food 2 thumbs up. You can't go wrong with anything on the menu (for brunch that is).

lVoDEWTa3r3GnapEIzWt_Q.text: Thanks to Tracy and Antonio they were awesome very excellent service fun to be around with and great to be served by them two I really recommend HEXX kitchen +bar management was also great.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. HEXX outside patio.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Outside patio had a blast great service Tracy and Antonio.

2LPB-smQyrcWir0cIGDAUA.text: Good food, a nice view outside, took my wife here on our anniversary, my only complaint was the chairs outside are very uncomfortable.

eDOa074fnNPdG2snVbRDKQ.text: You know when you go thru all the yelp pictures before going to a place and are salivating over what you want to eat ?? Well that was me ! Too bad they had nothing on the menu of which I wanted to taste ! No chocolate pancakes, no chilaquiles no cheesecake with popcorn. I resorted to getting ala Carte sticky bun and caramelizad bacon which were tasty. Service was sub par, borderline rude and not very attentive. To top it off they charge you for eating outside but don't mention it and charge it as a CNF fee of $5.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Ala carte items since they didn&#39;t have anything I wanted from the yelp pics !!

v6EfV2J7TKdFVGT8pkJ2IA.text: Great place! Food was great waiter and staff were great and View while sitting on the patio was awesome for people watching. Sean and Ivan service team were the best in Vegas they were all over it!!!  I highly recommend this place  Great job!!

0-FIMfwwsd8R8jrv7zxhnw.text: Had lunch here during a trip to Las Vegas. Overall a great experience and would definitely recommend going there for breakfast/lunch.   Location: ideally situated right across from some of the major resorts like The Cosmopolitan. Easy walkability.  Service: we were told that there would be a 20min wait and we got seated in 10min! Excellent service as well!  Food impressions: we tried 2 lunch items, both excellent and the portions were definitely on the larger side.   Breakfast Croissant: amazing croissant filled to the brim with Black Forest ham and aged cheddar. Croissant was crispy and melted in your mouth. Came with a side of grilled fingerling potatoes drizzled with sea salt and some ketchup. Easily one of the better breakfast croissant I've had in a long time!  Veggie Omelet: was very tasteful and filling. Came with peppers, onion, spinach and mushrooms. In addition to the English muffin included they added some baked fingerling potatoes. The croissant is still a better lunch item depending on your preference.   Service was efficient and courteous. No complaints!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

cmnIsbqtahlG5_i15SqG4g.text: Excellent food and Service - however the real surprise are the Bloody Marys. We came here on a whim a month ago and loved them so much we made it a point to come back on our visit this past weekend. They have a great brunch menu and what we tried on both trips was awesome (chicken & waffles, cinaroll waffle, eggs benedict).  I recommend getting a reservation, it's not hard and cuts out the waiting. But even without a reservation it takes only 30-40 minutes to get a table, giving you time to wander into Paris for a few before they text you to come back.  Highly recommended.

VP67Gvouvb7tnQFhxST38Q.text: This was an average eat. Ordered the chopped shrimp salad left unsatisfied. Wife got an veggie omelet and it was done well. The potatoes where the best thing on the plate. Also we asked for inside seating and got sat at on the patio. I won't be coming back here when in vegas.

Krgbf8fEU089ymuWgrT33A.text: I loved it! Came for brunch and had my heart on chicken and waffles but got the Hexx burger instead to cure my hang over and oh did that hit the spot! The burger was delicious, soft buns and juicy meat patty! My girlfriend got the turkey club and I had a bite and it was even more delicious then my burger. Service was great and we got seated in the patio which gave us a perfect view of the bellagio fountains! Can't wait to go again!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The Hexx burger along with the turkey club sandwich.  Delicious!
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The view from our table!

xKBSEp6SJ0T2hCi4kg0hgQ.text: Got into Vegas around 9:00 AM...went to Caesar's, nobody open until at least 11 AM. Wandered the strip looking for brunch menu. Happened upon HEXX. OMG. without a doubt, the best food and service I had in Vegas. Wonderful waiter, decent wait time, great seats across from dancing Bellagio fountains. And the FOOD...brunch: perfect omelet, crisp but not greasy potatoes, UNBELIEVABLE carrot cake pancakes. Those are a must-try!  Hexx Kitchen made us feel welcome. Our server, a kind and generous Nigerian man named Tulo (or something close!) could not have been more accomodating. Best dining experience in our entire trip!

uoPGjMhukZjsCfzLHLnXyA.text: Great location, service is decent. Pizza was wayyyy salty. Not too many options for dinner.

59R6z9ybJtAhlOIhCPCs2g.text: Quite a lovely lunch on the patio, the prosciutto Cesar salad is delicious! Waygu burger was amazing!

b-v0QZFGKzLzPtq5Tz9_pw.text: Had brunch here on our first full day in Vegas and no one was disappointed.  This place is located at the base of the Paris Hotel.  There are indoor and outdoor seating options and the overall atmosphere here is upscale.  Service on our visit was top notch and our waitress was very accommodating and willing to give suggestions to anyone in the group who had questions or alterations to the items they chose to get.  They have bottomless mimosa options as well during their breakfast/brunch service.  Food portions and quality were incredible and my eggs came served just the way I ordered them accompanied with some of the most incredible bacon I've ever had.  A must visit if you're looking for a decent breakfast place while on the strip.

h6W0Adud-gOQWkjARwpBuA.text: My friends and I loved spending time here! The staff was friendly and I enjoy that the shop is so close by. I think the lighting in the restaurant gets a little dim but the food makes up for it. I had the short rib the last time I visited and it was outstanding - savory and tender meat goodness! And the bartender knew how to pour a drink so if you like a boozy cocktail, this is the place to be!

vMPhqjsuqIICtKXhuYYpZQ.text: i was kinda sick of losing all my money so it was nice to dine outside and be away from slot machines. pro tip - make a ressie and order the bottomless mimosas. giant portions and not super expensive, which is quite a find on the strip. veggie burger is incredibly legit and the AC is kickin.

ccndM_7HUMs0BItUP_2lZw.text: Hexx was a highlight of our trip to Vegas! We ended up going twice because of how much we enjoyed the brunch. Everything was wonderful and the servers were kind and really worked hard to make our dining experience enjoyable! We recommend the crab cake and the Hexx Benedict!

_5SCaw4hqX1xO1TG5y7enw.text: I loved the ambience of the place. We were seated outside with a nice view of the strip. The food was very nice too. I ordered the Veggie Omelet which came with fried potatoes and English Muffin. The omelet was soft and fluffy and had onions, pepper, mushrooms and spinach. It was a good breakfast.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

L8Qx9XP-DGra4fiEAOnlug.text: What's better than sitting on the patio eating supper watching the fountains at The Bellagio across the boulevard? The spinach artichoke dip was amazing, as was the jambalaya. Tom, our server, was amazing, always keeping our drink filled and informing us of the local attractions we needed to see. Make sure you stop next door at their chocolate shop! Yum!

Cyz6sjJ9V-YXR-g2Z1twkA.text: Really disappointing. The menu descriptions made me want to try everything, but the food that was delivered made me wish I had eaten somewhere else. Too salty. Or if not too salty, then dull and tasteless. My first visit will be my last.

cTG9hz5MUtJc5a9AAJ9pug.text: Late night Easter dinner at Hexx was superb. The atmosphere couldn't have been better. All of the staff were friendly, polite, and quite helpful. The service was excellent. Our waitress Anna made several suggestions for cocktails and main courses, every one of which was great. Hats off to the chef for the lamb. Thank you Hexx for the wonderful Easter meal, we will surely see you soon!

4iBSHhBJt8Eoc4ZkSeqfIA.text: This place is the best. Came in at 3am after a show and they didn't miss a beat. The loaded fries were the best. Our server, Paul, was great. Awesome service and really helpful. I'll definitely be back here next time I'm in Vegas

mwfqUpl5vQ7Dn6nBY7ha0Q.text: Great little place for a casual meal with a view.  Our waiter was a delight as well.  The broccolini was sheer heaven.  Wow...I could have made a meal on that.  I had the grilled king salmon with arugula salad and clam chowder and ordered the broccolini to share.  The description of the salmon dish is misleading.  The chowder is not thick but merely a broth that the salmon is placed in with some arugula sprigs floating in it.  You will not be getting a salad or a chowder.  They need to rename this dish.  Thankfully, our waiter explained it to me at the time I ordered it.  The dish was very, very good.  I wanted more of it.  My husband opted for the crab cake and a salad and he was also very satisfied.  Upon receiving our bill, the waiter gave us each a piece of their dark chocolate.  I LOVE dark chocolate but this was inedible.  I had to spit it out.  Bitter beyond words.  I did try some chocolate at their candy shop and it was very good so don't let this discourage you.  If they want to encourage folks to buy their candy, they should rethink those samples.  This will be a stop the next time we visit Vegas.  I do agree with the poster that said the patio seating was uncomfortable.  The view is great but they do need to improve the seating.

0W_s5D_ELR-ZmvP8gK96fw.text: Hex, oh dear perhaps I'll start with the reason why I put 4 stars it's for the service which i would give a five star. If it were just the food it self sadly a 3.5 star would be accurate. We got the Cinabon Waffles the Chicken and waffles and hex Egg Benedict. 1out of two satisfied dishes hex Egg Benedict far surpassing the waffles. The Benedict was a delicious surprise where in place of a English muffin as a base there was layers of delicious potato. The chicken and waffles I expected a more moist tasty chicken, not something out of a public school cafeteria kitchen. Honestly it would have been better with mc Donalds chicken nuggets instead of the dried chicken strips that came with it. It was so dry with no taste and a rough texture. The waffle it self was nothing impressive just a normal waffle with cheddar coloring to it. The cinabon waffle was okay, if it weren't for the presentation and light cream cheese frosting, the waffle it self would fell epicly. It certainly did taste like a cinabon but it was rough to chew and swallow as well as had a chewy texture that taste like they microwaved the waffle before serving. The Wait staff and atmosphere are very delightful. I hope you are taking care of the staff because there the only reason why I wouldn't by pass the restaurant for a second chance.

bK_DSfmvP3_jSFKISD0h3Q.text: This space is so decidedly more tasteful and mature than the former sugar factory in that spot. I had the lobster roll and my dad had the French dip, I believe. The server was polite and expedient. I enjoyed the chocolate tasting next door and especially liked the Peet's coffee bar (as a former Bay Area resident). Their chai is delightful.

sqO6KUfjKdi3onuK-7V_ew.text: Hexx which is the rebranded Sugar Factory is a great find. Super delicious food and bottomless mimosas.

W6XZbq_mOT6w8h_MT5yUXA.text: Were craving pizza and staying at the Paris..Hexx is here so we stopped in before heading out. Omg! Fabulous!. Teddy our server was amazing. Great salad and hummus appetizer. Fennel sausage pizza was the bomb. Can't wait to come back.

BO8lLKPVxvFX4LdTbj0uHg.text: Had lunch here and it was disappointing. Overpriced for what you get. Pepperoni pizza was too greasy and the classic burger did not come with any toppings (pickles, lettuce). For ~$20, I'd expect a really good pizza/burger. The entire family was not impressed. Will not be coming back.

s_FqFcjXVf3r7UgutoPHGQ.text: Dinner was such a great experience last night we came back for brunch! Server Krista was amazing and the GM Michael Main is a sweetheart and reserved us an amazing table strip side for our brunch this morning. Will definitely be going back!

w2bTcAwBV9H7RHp8_Jjiqg.text: Had breakfast here on 9/1/2015. We were seated immediately. The food was excellent and the service perfect. The view on Las Vegas Boulevard was very nice. I could not have asked for a more tasty and enjoyable meal.

-tHQO-VXPsCVN-lzB8Rq9Q.text: Excellent food, great atmosphere, friendly and upbeat staff. Well managed. Ask for Teddy to help you.

AFYLrAGe8obmeUfF-G7q4A.text: This place has a great location, AMAZING service and even better food. Our server, Alexia, was not only a hospitible and personable server but a great representative of Las Vegas. I had the Hexx burger and it was delicious; very flavorful! I will be coming back before the end of my trip and highly reccommend this place to everyone else looking for excellent service and food!

N5u8n4TCvhbaS6DFt-ai7g.text: Great experience at Hexx! The staff was super personable and really made sure that we were well taken care of. We sat on the outside patio and watched the night life walk by. It is a great location on the strip and provides great food and drinks while you sit and people watch:) Although Alexia wasn't our server, she really completed the experience by giving us great recommendations for the weekend and gave us her True opinions about the different clubs. Kyle was another person on the staff who gave us great info about the Vegas experience and was so kind and attentive to our table. We really enjoyed our time at Hexx and would recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for good drinks and a fun time!

Jl3zSkcXeoZyOaqRkmb5Kg.text: I came all the way down the strip from the Luxor with my kids and sister because she came here before. She said the food and drinks were awesome. When we got there the restaurantp had changed since she last went there. I was expecting a candy type theme since it was right next door to a candy store. My sister had stated this also in the first place since this was the main reason we went. I have never been looked at so coldly from a hostess before we even exchanged words. She unwillingly greeted us and asked how many in our party. I had my two young kids with me, one in a stroller. They said they don't allow strollers in the restaurant. I could see if it was a big traveling bulky stroller that I had it would be a problem, but I didn't. It was a simple folding one. So I said it was fine and that I could hold my baby and fold up the stroller so that it would not be in the way. It could easily lie underneath the table. They said ok. Once we got seated to the table, I heard the hostess tell the server passing by that she had a table up but in a way that sounded like "ugh you got a table of 5, so sorry you have to serve these people with kids." Once we sat down, I thanked the hostess and she just looked at me with this half ass smile like "yeah your welcome, your lucky to be seated in here." Then just walked away. I was like ok that's it. I tried to look pass the rude glares from the hostesses and server. So I said let's leave. And we did. Will not recommend this place because of the condescending looks and attitude from the hostesses who think their sh** don't stink.

k5xA3gen2KKb0aBlYjM5jw.text: I had Vanessa as my server and she was so amazing. Vanessa was very attentive and fun. The food was great... I came in for dessert and ordered the Aztec chocolate cake which was delicious! Compliments to the chef

XpvM40QAaGEGJoZB2dlZHw.text: Food was Great and so was the Service and do not forget to try the brocolini !!!

iozhwxvigVDKjncWOZJ40g.text: I give Hexx a 5 Star on the amazing food and exceptional service of the fabulous woman with the blue hair! She invited me in and made me feel extremely welcome!

2vLjX_t0-W2D2s5d_9D6xA.text: 10/10 highly recommend! Went for brunch for my friends bachelorette party as soon as we landed in vegas and it was the best start to our trip. Food was great (spin dip, calamari, chicken BLT & braised short rib sandwich) and very affordable bottomless mimosas. Our server Tracee made our experience even better and always made sure to fill our glasses ALL THE WAY UP! Thank you Tracee!

S-Sq0pMADplsIg1AFnWWhA.text: I don't understand why people work in industries where they deal with people when they clearly don't want to be bothered! Our waiter was very unattentive and acted as if we were inconveniencing him. Even the hostess that sat us seemed disgruntled. We clearly interrupted her fascinating story she was telling the other hostess....No one that worked there seemed happy and it wasn't even busy! He checked on us maybe twice and every time he filled my friends water glass she would say thank you and he wouldn't even acknowledge that! I didn't want to give a tip but my friend convinced me it was the right thing to do BUT not to give him any more than 10% which I didn't! I'm sorry that you hate your job but here is a tip (haha get it?) get a new one preferably one where you don't come into contact with people!

Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

83nmLZIrkCvOCmNB20MEbg.text: Best dining view of the Bellagio and the fountain show - they have a great outside dining patio area to people watch with a great view of the strip.  The inside dining area is pretty spacious and can accommodate large parties. Very urban chic - the decor is really sleek and modern. Reservations were easy on opentable and service was friendly and prompt.  Our waiter was personable and made suggestions on appetizers/ main course. We ended up trying the yellow watermelon app - which was interesting - not bad not great - I'd recommend it if you're looking to try new things. It was a refreshing dish, slightly sweet from the watermelon, slightly tangy from the lime juice and the feta cheese. The chili string garnish gave it an interesting herbal kick. Again not my favorite dish of the night but not bad either if you're looking for something new to try.  The tomato soup was delicious - pricey for a small bowl but super good. Creamy consistency but not too heavy. The garlic and basil oil complimented the soup well. Slightly too much basil oil but I spooned some out and it was fine.  For main dishes I tried the tagliatelle bolognese - short rib pasta - portion was good. Flavor was on the lighter side but I guess less salt is healthier lol? The truffle ricotta was delicious and complemented the short rib nicely. The short rib however was under seasoned and could have been more flavorful. Ok dish in my opinion.  The bf got the roasted sea bass - delicious! Just the right amount of seasoning, light but flavorful and grilled perfectly. Slightly crispy on the outside and edges and light/flaky in the center. I didn't care for the couscous drizzled around the fish as the texture was odd but everything else on this dish was great.   Overall a great place for dinner and a view on the patio. They have a chocolate factory next door where you can see the sweets being made. Service was great, food was good. Prices are on par with what you would expect in vegas - high yes but where is it not?

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

mQmH6FWanVBBHl9avQwHpg.text: Sean and Brandon were so great. We came as a party of 8 for brunch and the restaurant was packed, but they were so attentive. Definitely recommend the restaurant as well the servers.

rJbcYBrSV6NuzCdy8guO1g.text: The Prime Rib Beef Dip was just okay.  Nice size and they don't short you on the meat all though it is shaved into crumbles.  It had an odd taste to it, a spice or herb was used that's not normal.  Cheese wasn't melted...  Fries were great.

jfN-fdMrLzcxWDGg4wAiKQ.text: Hexx wins major points for its location: catacorner from Planet Hollywood, on top of  Paris and with perfect view of the one enduring cultural artifact Vegas may have to offer - the dancing fountains at Bellagio. (I say "may" because fountains synchronized to opera say little about the ilk of tourists drunkenly shuffling up the strip).   Anyhow, set a plate of Southern food before me, deconstructed or faithfully artery-clogging, and I will savor it.  I ordered a "re-imagined" shrimp and grits entree, which sounds like a violation of a sacred art form but was in fact utter melt-in-your-mouth fabulosity; spicy prawns over a pillow of polenta with gruyere bechamel and sauteed spinach. The drinks, on the other hand, were an overpriced bummer. I should have stuck with my usual sauvignon blanc or pinot grigio, but a fruitier drink sounded better at the time.

Py9NE7wUMUA9fETniXfpAw.text: Total CRAP!!  Service was the worst... never got my food, and left. Guy next to me ordered a berger, and it was raw and old meet. We both spoke to management and they didn't care. Would not send my dog there. Be carefull of places like this.....

qlHXSK2WQhT54WAPKxlx8A.text: The food at this place is ABSOLUTELY the best ever! We ordered the filet mignon (w/ peppercorn sauce), halibut, and two sides (the cauliflower and mashed potatoes). Everything was PERFECT!! It was all SO fresh and light and I would have put away two more servings if I could have (happily stuffed with the more than sufficient portion sizes). I'm still even dreaming about that cauliflower and the SAUCE... mmMM! So of course, after reading my rant over the divine food, you might be wondering to yourself "then why four stars?" WELL! Unfortunately, the front of the restaurant needs to get their shit together. With a reservation for two, we waited 25 minutes for indoor seating after being told 5 minutes by the hostess. One small party of three had been waiting 45 minutes (YES. 4. 5.) for indoor seating after ALSO being told the wait time was 5 minutes. When we were finally seated, we looked around the restaurant and it was half empty. It didn't make sense that they could not seat the small groups that were waiting. It was kind of frustrating actually, and the four hostesses appeared apathetic and fresh out of fucks. Just pushing everyone to the side and saying "it will be 5 minutes" and collecting us all for like 20-40 instead. WHO KNOWS! But seriously, despite the shit customer service at the hostess stand, the overall experience was worth it because of the food and serving staff (shout-out to Teddy who was an absolute hero of the night and HILARIOUS). Serving staff and the food made it AT LEAST four star worthy. So if you can get over the four 18 year old girls at the front who forget how to count or whatever was the issue, you won't be disappointed!! Make this a must stop, but don't take any shit from those girls at the front. SAY SOMETHING IF YOU'VE BEEN WAITIN They will forget you.  To the manager response:  Hi!! We had a reservation for two at 9 on May 29, 2018. I appreciate your response!!

Jgx9Mul0BJ7NfeHD5B3vPg.text: HEXX kitchen is so awesome !!! Open air indoor tables, super good mimosas that are bottomless for $24, and our server Taylor is a SAVAGE !!!! Such an awesome experience, def gonna come back and ask for her our next go around in Vegas.

Qf1PL5cw51zD9Zt7tACmaA.text: Tracee and Patrick were the best! They were so kind and attentive! They made our experience here at Hexx!! Thanks so much!!!

zxmW7b0mu-asc6YAzUW-hw.text: Hexx has the best chocolate in the US.  It's also a sweet cafe in the most ideal of locations with a tremendous food & beverage program.  recommended highly for lunch.  my favorite was the Carbonara, but also very much enjoyed a bite of my friend's pizza as well as the surf & turf sliders.  been here before for salads, also well prepared, crisp and balanced.  i like taking in the strip with a glass of cold white wine when i'm here.

4RjPxjbQaBDmtUxhSy1y6w.text: Amazing food and bottomless mimosas!! Taylor is the best waitress and provided the greatest service!! Definitely a brunch must!

yNhxq1-XIA1g0A9pno6CvQ.text: Pricey, but completely worth it!  We had the crab cake, hummus, and cheesy bread.  At first we weren't sure we wanted to pay for the prices here, but the food exceeded our expectations.  Splurge here, and eat on the patio.  You'll be right across the street from the Bellagio fountains!

yF08-381HqdzNon4-dUHOA.text: Chocolate sampling? Yes please!  Hexx Kitchen + Bar has taken over the previous business Sugar Factory which I believe moved to the Towne Center location in Las Vegas. They offer a variety of sweet confections as well as savory dishes. However, all that I sampled was some of their vanilla gelato which satisfied my sweet tooth for the moment. We sat along the patio bar which offered a great view of the strip, people watching and the Bellagio fountains.  After finishing my scoop of gelato, we wandered inside to browse their novelty items and came across their Chocolate Bar which was the highlight of my visit here. The offerings were pure chopped chocolate from Peru, Tanzania, Venezuela, Ecuador and Madagascar that had hints of fruit, caramel, almond and marzipan.  It was interesting how the Madagascar's fruity acidity didn't hit the tongue until after it melted. My favorite was chocolate from Ecuador which had notes of sweet marzipan, almond and floral flavors. For those that are chocolate fans, be sure to stop by Hexx for a sample of chocolate from around the world.  4 stars!

YGh900Pb_LM19BFZcL_kyQ.text: Ordered the brioche French toast. We were seated and served quickly, but we did wait a little for the food. It took about half an hour after we ordered until the food came out. The french toast was delicious, though I think the serving size was a little small... it has that classic sweet taste you look for in a French toast, you can add fruits, but I didn't do that. Service was nice, food was alright.

9DUwVzoj6wD5Se3DjSpYAg.text: The brunch was delicious, our server was perfect. The food was some of the best food I've ever had! The misting on the deck outside was a little annoying but it was only with the wind. The bottomless mimosas was deadly but it did the trick. Would highly recommend!!

ebHpLrYeUlOH_QPS30XvIg.text: The carrotcake pancakes are a must have!! If you enjoy a little mix of breakfast and dessert then don't pass up on the chance to try these delicious, fluffy pancakes topped with a sweet icing. Also shared the veggie omlet which was good and filling.

HWxl6rNJ2D8Uf21vujEkPQ.text: Upscale trendy decor and atmosphere. Enjoy patio dining on a cool night with an excellent view of the street life and the Bellagio fountains. Come hungry, food is delicious and the white chocolate bun burger is a must! We will definitely visit again!

739H4rAiPygIRWRjk_I3ig.text: Tracee was the best server ever! We will definitely be back and will request her!!!! We were celebrating our daughters' 21st bdays and she made it super memorable and fun!!

d-lrwItg4uKJ_4YGJYVuAQ.text: Juliet was a great server, it was hard to have a empty glass for bottomless. Thank you! The food was good as well, just saying.

xUK-C6-lgI8zeu1azf2oKg.text: My BF and I lucked out by choosing this place for lunch without doing any research. We decided on sharing a sandwich that came with fries. We really wanted to try the smothered fries shared appetizer too but didn't want to get to carb crazy so we ordered the Prime rib sandwich and asked if the fries could be changed to "smothered fries". I was expecting some long winded explanation as to why they can't do that.. but the server said it could be done, no problem. She was friendly and on point from the start. We ordered a few drinks while we were waiting for our meal. The place is pretty big but it wasn't too busy.. the food did take a while to come out, but when we were finally served the wait was worth it.  To start, we didn't tell them we were sharing but they separated our meal anyways which was awesome (they even gave us 2 bowls of au jus).. Like I said, on point! The food was delicious. The sandwich was well made. The smothered fries were so so good. Definitely worth a try! And can't wait to go back and try the other items on the menu.   The decor and ambiance inside was enjoyable and classy. If you want to be constantly misted and see "people of the strip" walking by, the patio is the place to be.  5 stars for them on the basics & more - Great food, great staff, on top of their shiz (topping off drinks, etc), great atmosphere.   The entrance from the Paris hotel is a little funky but it's nothing to fuss about.. so, you have to walk 20 more feet to get to the front desk - so what? Do you want to  sit, eat and drink or.... not?

Zm5vxriPLO_lNU44wXNHjg.text: This was the best brunch of my life! My waiters were Apollo and Ty, they were amazing! Get the chicken and waffles!

7OZdZx62tlj5GCI6Brry-g.text: The first time I went I had a good experience although the food was still okay. The second time I went our waiter seemed like he was in a bad mood and impatient. I ordered the margarita pizza and asked for extra mozzarella on top. I ordered another two for my cousins who were from Germany since they wanted the same. Our pizza came and it was just a regular cheese pizza with EXTRA cheese like a pie. The cheese wasn't even fully baked, it tasted like I was eating a thin crust with pounds of cheese. When we told the waiter that this isn't what we wanted her got even more in a bad mood and repeated what we ordered. I'm guessing he didn't know the difference between a margarita pizza with FRESH mozzarella sliced and a regular cheese pizza with mozzarella all over it.  When one of my cousins sent back her pizza for a regular margarita pizza without the extra cheese they brought an actual margarita pizza the way it was supposed to look like. I don't understand what was so hard about understanding that extra mozzarella on a margarita pizza is just a few more slices of the same mozzarella they normally would use, not a greasy thick cheese pizza. I was very disappointed in the poor service we had received as well.

H4Wf1C5z6aFnJOLG7_Z_VQ.text: Tried this spot for brunch. Friendly, attentive staff, and easy to find a seat around noon. Good view of the Bellagio fountains. The chicken and waffles were pretty good, but not authentically southern. The chilaquiles were amazing.

1iGfxsRC1iN3rxMyeOLlDw.text: We had a groupon deal to use here (spend $30 get a $50 credit) we still went over by $20 plus a tip so this was an expensive breakfast. We had the steak and eggs ($2 extra for cheese which seems crazy) carrot cake pancakes (amazing) and veggie omelette. Everything was delicious just a little pricy.

0BecKlmLXMKjl04Rruwrgw.text: I was really looking forward to eating here. Made a reservation for 7 for a special brunch with some ladies for a bachelorette. The waitress was really nice and accommodating in the beginning. We got our cocktails and water but food didn't come until an hour and a half later after we kept following up. At that point we were full on bloody Mary's and dejected from the long wait. One of the hostesses even came up and told one of my friends she couldn't sleep on the table. My friend was exhausted and hungry and put her head down for a reason. An hour and a half to wait for food is unreasonable. The restaurant seemed poorly managed since there were several waiters standing around yet our waitresses seemed to be so busy we couldn't find her most of the time.  Food was sub par and certainly not worth the price. This restaurant needs to better manage its staff and take care to make sure customers are attended to.  Will not be coming back here.  If you do decide to go get the bloody Mary's! But for brunch food there are plenty of other much better options at the same price rate.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

eEG0E2m0Dq7SCfPcujW-oA.text: We visited due to having a Groupon. I wouldn't go back due to the service my husband and I received. The food was nothing special and our server never asked us if we were enjoying our meal and never asked if we wanted a refill of our iced tea, soda or water. I was surprised and annoyed because we were there on a Monday morning and it wasn't that busy. I would never pay full price to eat here. The only positive is that they have an exceptional view of the Bellagio fountains. There were other waiters that were much more attentive to the tables they were waiting on. The guys who brought out our food were more friendly and attentive.

h4mhMBWkag__ncSj5cRDqw.text: Omgosh! i fell I'm love with the dark chocolate and milk chocolate pecan paws.  I usually have a caramel iced coffee with turbo shot and the passion fruit green tea is good as well.

tv8Aqq4fC-DFVXp2AKBaRA.text: The worst restaurant service I've EVER experienced. Four of us ordered coffee and the waitress had only spoon for us to stir our cream and sugar. She said they were "out of spoons". We laughed at first but really??? No spoons at a restaurant!!! The table for 4 of us was tiny! 3 other guests had already knocked over their drinks because the tables are so small!!! Glass on the floor everywhere! Then 3 coffee refills later no food. 45 minutes later the waitress apologizes for losing our order and wants our order again . I spoke to Peter the manager about the spoon and ridiculous wait for our food and about how others had their food and we still didn't. He apologized brought out our food soon after and took care of our bill. It was the right thing to do and I thanked him. But with all the restaurant options on the strip, don't waste your time

snbJZ-WZDfiuSV4h8mB5ew.text: Our first server Sam was really kind and told us we should come back for the breakfast because it's really worth it. We stopped in for a quick bite while we were out on the strip for some fuel food, pretty late in the night (about 2am). Our server Brad, quickly got us waters and took our order. We got the $10 late-night breakfast special-eggs were cooked well and the potatoes were good, but different for me. I definitely enjoyed the bacon. It's hard to believe people can screw up bacon but, you'd be surprised.   I definitely want to come back for the main breakfast menu items.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Need some fuel!

45egR_HJNit-SFHU5csyZg.text: The staff was amazing, super attentive. Their French bubbly Rose was superb. It paired nicely with the meat and cheese board! I had a filet with the Parmesan Risotto and it was fantastically amazing. Cooked to perfection. Their tomato salad was just okay but their chop was fantastic. I loved the bright decor!!

oukgSepUaJG1fBbwRT9qNw.text: Came here on a busy Saturday morning for brunch.  My parents and I were seated quickly which was nice. However it took a while for the server to come over to bring water or greet us which was a little disappointing.   We were brought water and had our order taken. My dad an I split the meat omelette and my mom got the carrot cake pancakes. It took a while for the food to come out which was understandable since it was so busy. However the omelette when it was was kinda cold and also not as ordered. I had asked to have no chicken in it and it was loaded with chicken. The potatoes with it were super tasty though. Also when they brought the food out there were no condiments brought with it. I asked to get some jam and butter for the English muffin and hot sauce for the omelette. It took a long time for those to come out. By the time they did my dad an I had already finished most of the omelette.  The pancakes were extremely tasty though.  They were light and flavorful and definitely carrot cake.  We barely saw the server. She would disappear for a while and didn't really check back to see if everything was good. But the busboys were super on hand and helpful. It seemed like they worked harder than our server did.   I think it might be best to try this place on a less busy day to truly experience the quality of the food and service.  I am curious to maybe try it out again because I have heard good things but maybe the day we went was an off day.

LKIYhBdinOF58W3zlGXnXw.text: If I could give this place zero stars, I would! My best friend and I are here for our bachelorette party dinner and had the worst dining experience ever!!! Our orders were taken extremely late, we received our salads well before our appetizers were even delivered to the table, we waited over an hour for food, and over an hour for our checks. A pen cap also fell out of the water pitcher as the waiter was pouring water. Not once did we receive an apology from the waiter for the poor service. The manager did take care of my best friend and I's meals but we are utterly disappointed on our experience, as this was supposed to be a positive and memorable time with our loved ones but it ended up turning into a disaster. I would NEVER recommend this restaurant to anyone!!!!

xAhhU7PJpHvA0xCPpsaCFg.text: The entire vibe was great and casual! It was fun to watch the people walking on the strip and to see the fountains at the Bellagio!  This is a great place for big groups. We had a group of 13 and had no problem. A reservation is needed when you have a big group.  The bottomless mimosas were a great price and they kept refilling the glasses often. You can only stay for two hours when you get bottomless.  The eggs Benedict were great. It had an amazing flavor but the portion size seemed smaller.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Eggs Benedict

yG6eJRhEXWHG7wXFusLN7g.text: The ambiance is great,  the service is impeccable & the food is delectable!!! From the moment we walked in until the moment we left Mr. Teddy Thompson gave us stellar service!!! I am a foodie & world traveler and the service we received was 5 star top notch service!  Mr. Thompson recommended food for our table & every dish he recommended was phenomenal! There were 6 of us & the food was plentiful with enough to share. We tried: hexx chopped salad, crispy calamari, crabcakes, and cheesy garlic bread. The chopped salad had hearts of palm avocado,  tomato, sweet drop peppers, artichokes topped with green goddess dressing! The calamari was spicy with buffalo sauce, topped with carrots. The crabcakes were not filled with fillers but were made with authentic crab meat. The cheesy garlic bread... heaven.  Mr. Thompson shared interactive stories about service & the menu throughout our meal. Teddy Thompson is a gem and asset to this establishment.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

09nKKVpn9HL9y24m7na6DQ.text: First time coming here and had a great experience.  Our server Apolo was amazing he was very helpful with the menu items and great at helping me choose the dessert. The peanut butter cheesecake was delicious. Definitely will come back here next time for the bottomless mimosas.

Ng7DpfFke97tO4N_luGzqA.text: Extremely rude hostess.   Wouldnt even seat our party of 4 unless we told her EXACTLY what we were going to order.   Really?   How could anybody know what they are going to order before being seated?    Horrible snobby staff   stay away from here

pkBcDeqVvn6A7w9dkJPJMw.text: Came here for a bridal brunch with the girls. We had reservations and was running late but the host still honor our reservation and took us in! It's very pack during the weekends especially it's located on the stripe right next to Paris! Service was awesome and food was delicious as well! We order their special drink and I must say it was BOMB!! I'm glad we came here for brunch! The presentation of all the food was beautiful and all their drinks too!! I would definitely come back!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

GqpLeNiTkDGGBY9bzTTCZQ.text: Their food is pretty good, and the service is great. Mostly... you pay to sit and have brunch/lunch/dinner with a view of the beautiful Bellagio water works. As much as I love brunch... I feel like the menu looks better after 4pm I ate the Gnocchi... DELICIOUS :)

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vQMlBFNYqQdxIJc5F1CVbg.text: We couldn't find a place to eat that had good reviews in the Paris Hotel; luckily we found this one.  The ambiance is classy and clean.  I think this place is $$$ not $$.   ::Drink:: Hennessy and Pineapple, my own creation.  The alcohol portion was on point.    ::Food:: We ordered the Spinach Artichoke Dip.  It was served with crispy tortilla chips and slices of pita bread.  The dip also has garlic and cheese; it was creamy.  I thought the Tagliatelle Scampi was bland.  It was made with white wine, garlic, butter, chili, parsley and it came with a side of toast.  I liked the Spaghetti & Meatballs balls better.  For the price, the food was just average.  ::Dessert::: We loved the warm Carrot Cake!!  :: Customer Service:: Friendly but it took a while for someone to take our orders.   :: Highlight:: The restaurant is across the street from the Bellagio Hotel.  From where we sat, we could see the fountain show.   ::M's Notes:: -Inside and Outdoor Seating -Park at the Paris Hotel

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spinach Artichoke Dip
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spaghetti &amp; Meatballs
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Tagliatelle Scampi

8nb7uH7XvA74qaZxoFNtpw.text: Amazing experience, very attentive servers! Steven, specifically was legit! Give him a raise !   Much love from the Minnesota ladies!

VsgK7IR17bJhmB7--K108Q.text: This place is a little more formal than I'm used to especially for breakfast but the food it what matters. We were there early so the place was pretty much deserted. We had french toast, a side of eggs and fruit. I couldn't complain about any of it - all of it hit the spot and it turned out to be the perfect portion size.

gMQdjyikYFqLXUc_ZF5qlg.text: The food is so good here!!! You must try the carrot cake pancakes and the calamari!!!  the chilaquiles is also delicious!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Chilaquiles and carrot cake pancakes

h-3n9sprsfCihqoD72eSbw.text: The food was above average and the fact that we could get a reservation for this place booking "day-of" for a party of 14 was fabulous, but I personally had a bad experience as a vegetarian.  I ordered the risotto (which I double and triple checked with the waitress was vegetarian - she even went to the kitchen to check if the risotto was vegetarian). 20 minutes later, AFTER, all my non vegetarian friends received their food - I get my steaming hot risotto dish placed in front of me with a large trout dish SMACK DAB in the middle of my risotto. EXCUSE ME! Not to sound like a brat, but I specified - vegetarian NOT pescatarian. Also - this is legit the ONLY  VEG  OPTION  at the restaurant - why are you making it so hard for me to save the world?? Do you want me to die afterwards at the pregame after I've only had spinach and artichoke dip and champagne??  The server was a little moody about remaking the order but I finally got my risotto as everyone was finishing up their meal.  They were good about serving us champagne (we were celebrating 2 birthdays) and the best part was that they gave separate checks for each individual member of our party, which I've genuinely never seen - that was awesome and saved us the hassle of having one person put on their card.  But - would never ever come back here by myself / with family and next time I came to LV I made reservations for another place well in advance. Good for last minute / if you're not vegetarian

CWn_06-Xkb1Ry3BCS_mqKA.text: Wow what a fun and cool place to come for brunch. We came for my sisters birthday and ordered there disco ball drink. It didn't just look cool it tasted incredible very fruity and light and bubble almost makes you forget your drinking. The staff is incredibly nice and helpful. The food was delicious i orders there Benedicts which were different from how I'm normally use to them but still incredible honestly anything you order will taste great! And the price was very affordable as well for all that we got.

nKuJOZKvyqm6InJfQZJqzw.text: Stumbled upon this place looking for a nice brunch with the hubby at 1pm on a Sat..Perfect spot.. I had the bottomless cran mimosas.. my waiter made sure my glass was never empty. I also had the chicken and waffles with a huge chicken breast.. too much for me to eat alone...my husband had the french toast, chicken sausage, and potatoes. Food was great! Prices were decent. Nice ambiance.

-KE8il-9hHfm23aGFkeZjA.text: Came here with my girls on a Bach trip, amazing waitress, down to earth and personable (sorry don't know name!) I personally got the burger, it was heaven. We hung around chatting with bottomless mimosas and never felt rushed. Thank you for a wonderful experience!

_3fx8OKZGDEKes4fdRIrZA.text: PHENOMENAL! Hands down world class food, drinks, service and atmosphere. Great brunch and the bottomless mimosas never stop coming!

rAUtHfZtO9n0aVq6RB21iQ.text: Beautiful fountain views from in or outside candied bacon with mayonnaise Late night desserts     Alexia was a pleasure to have and suggested a great menu for us tonight- highly recommended

ABWTqTD8EQvGq-M-0Dt-6A.text: Great option for large groups as the dining area is huge! We asked for the patio so we could people watch (always a great idea in Vegas). We ended up sharing some plates and starters. Our server was attentive and gave us great suggestions. We shared the carbonara which was not a True carbonara, no fresh egg or cheese-looked and tasted more like a cheesy Alfredo, was good but not authentic. The Mac and cheese side was really good! So creamy and cheesy. The crispy brocolli and mushroom sides were my favourite, definitely get these to share. The tuna poke was awful.... overpriced, weird citrus flavour and didn't come with any sort of cracker to serve with. It's a more casual place and not fancy in any means- kind of reminded me of cheese cake factory. Their brunch menu looked really good and when I go back to Vegas I wouldn't mind checking that out!

I0UvshNussQuXXkSa9H7_g.text: If you are in town, this place is amazing!!!! Amazing food, amazing service, amazing views.. ask for Natalie for the best experience! She is awesome!! We had the best time thanks to you, thank you Natalie!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Amazing food...protein omelette!

Ms_uYeu7SRr9rp93B8i-NA.text: Very good BRUNCH!!! Loved the bottomless mimosas. Server was very nice. Has a nice outdoor area. Would recommend to anyone

ceTASlyewRyVAHgH-p9E3Q.text: Hexx is a must when in Vegas. I always order the chicken and waffles which is finger licking good. Their chilaquiles is also good. It's a bit pricy for breakfast but The portions are huge. I love love the bottomless mimosas. We always have a great time here. The staff members are always friendly. Great atmosphere and delicious food.

7UgblL3v91pgkk4S5UHlzQ.text: I came to eat breakfast with my wife and a couple friends. We had the best time. The DJ playing had everyone jumping and bobbing their heads. The food was fantastic. Service was great. Atmosphere on the outside patio close to the DJ is the ideal place to be. I had the chicken and waffles. This will be my go to place for chicken and waffles for my visits to Vegas.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

rwTmYyK6BgJBPUvYsW4oJA.text: Great atmosphere, great server, great entertainment. The food however was very basic for the price. I had the shrimp po' boy and it was very dry. I ate the shrimp out of it and tossed the bread. The aioli Mayo was used as decoration. I wish I loved the food because we sure did have a good time.

IhFEx9Yea9wNWlg_Gd5djA.text: My mom and I stopped at HEXX for brunch on Sunday around 11. There was a wait for the patio, as it overlooks the strip and the Bellagio fountains, but we were sat right away inside. The waiter was so friendly and helpful directing us to items that could be made gluten free. I ordered the basic egg breakfast, subbing fruit and tomato for the toast and potatoes. It was good, though it would be hard to screw up eggs and bacon. My mom ordered the Eggs Benedict and said it was good, but nothing outstanding. I think HEXX would have been more memorable if we were able to eat some of the other menu items, but due to the need for gluten free, our options were limited and therefore for the price, it was just average.

UyC7wQLkz41XogwxLEqnxA.text: Hexx offers semi-private, bar, indoor and outdoor seating with Bellagio fountain views @ your table. We ordered the following appetizers - hummus, crab-cake, calamari & a shrimp cocktail.  Everything was very fresh & tasty. Our servers were prompt and friendly.  *if you drink bottled water - San Pellegrino & Fiji are available for water service,  recommended.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Hummus
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Maryland Crab Cake
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Calamari

UNOatGOpJG64y5Lfoy-DbA.text: Very hip and the patio area is great. Brunch menu is very good. Our server Apolo was very good and menu knowledgeable, he provided great service. We would come back again. Would recommend the unlimited Mimosa's. Prices are very reasonable.

iqqvk7yGZsPIdHY2_kvjHQ.text: Everything at hexx was amazing from the time I walked through the door Jeffrey or Jeff at the front desk was an absolute peach so nice and accommodating we got sat right away. Then Brad was our server and he recommended the best food on the menu which we loved. I'd come back just for the great service and shrimp ceviche. 5 stars for sure!!!!

x7pj7ucKNi4JDBeVRo3KPg.text: If I could I would give ZERO stars! We came back to the hotel really hungry and tried this place since we were staying at Paris Las Vegas. We were sat and waited about 30 minutes to get a glass of water, 30 mins to get a menu and be told that our waitress will come soon. 20 mins another guy comes and "takes our order" and he grabbed the wrong menu and we were told about it like 20 mins later. They took our order from the menu they were working with. 30 mins passed and we only got a soda from what we ordered. 10 minutes later we got up and left the restaurant. 2 other tables were complaining and 1 table the people got up and left without paying. Terrible service!!!

BWIMY4wJ3HKJADH6fbGX_A.text: On our last morning in Vegas, we sat outside to enjoy the morning air, and were immediately served by 2 people (one in training, I suppose) Both were wonderfully attentive.  We first made sure that my friend's food allergy (peanuts) could be accommodated (it could) and then we were given coffee and water.  Sadly the coffee was very bitter, it couldn't even be mellowed by with creamer, so when asked if I wanted a refill, I said no. They had no problem replacing the drink with something else at no cost. I adore good service like that.   With our orders placed, we waited a bit, chatted with our neighbors and finally got to the food. I'd ordered a ham and cheese croissant which came with breakfast potatoes - which were amazing. The croissant was HUGE and stuffed with white cheddar and ham. It was TOO much and luckily they were able to wrap half in foil and I was able to take that for a snack/meal on the plane.   The Scotsman chose the chocolate banana pancakes and they were smothered in a banana caramel sauce which was to DIE for. Absolutely luscious! He left nothing behind and was a member of the clean plate club.   If/when I return to Vegas, i'll certainly Visit Hexx again.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Interior
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu

Nmzup3kpn8yeGTjop7G7eA.text: I really wanted to go to a buffet instead but my sister's overruled me and we went to Hexx, and I'm super glad they did. We had an awesome breakfast and Spencer, our server, was on point with the food AND the bottomless mimosas.  I hope management recognizes that fantastic staff, like Spencer, makes the whole Hexx experience. 10/10, would recommend.

ML1Uxa8NSTp08ASnONhW0w.text: probably will not be going back to this place not because of the service or because of the atmosphere both of those things were excellent but the food left me wanting.I had a club sandwich and the love of my life had the chicken and waffleI I don't normally feel very critical of food but this was not done well for the price that it was it was definitely overpriced and I get that it's on the Las Vegas strip so you are paying for your atmosphere but I do think that as being a local here I would want the food to WOW me and SADLY DID NOT.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Setting area of hexx

_35Jf_ccWc582ivcz1GBwA.text: Had the breakfast quesadillas. Good, but it's too much of the same flavor throughout the dish.   The chicken, sauce, eggs, chips everything was high quality. On a scale from 1 to 10 for spiciness probably 7.   The service was the 10 out of 10. They were personable, helpful, and attentive. We had five other people join us and expectedly, and they made accommodations for us to move to a larger table.  Couldn't ask for more.   My husband had something like eggs Benedict eggs with a **delicious sauce ** and sliced potatoes on the bottom. It was completely amazing ...10 out of 10.   We ordered a fruit plate. It came beautifully prepared. High-quality fruit except they could leave after papaya or guava. It was flavorless.  9/10.   We will be going back soon as we can.

T5MJj6mdQ07UK88M2nLAVQ.text: Went for brunch. Was super busy and the drink service was super slow. I had the cinnamon roll waffle and a seasonal Moscow mule. The waffle was really good but very sugary and I couldn't finish it!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

MFNqA2FIxRc1rJCNNl2FnA.text: Wish I had been feeling better when we came here! What I did get to eat of my pasta was delicious. Loved the view from the patio of the Bellagio
