PRd7CRi8-uRW1t330hBW1g.text: Tracee was the best - she gave us the best menu and Vegas recommendations. Plus she kept our bottomless mimosas full at all times. She was the best!

7QEHZe2fkmtmRKyIko37lw.text: The food is amazing it's worth the wait it's been our go to place now ever time we come to Vagas!! Natalie our waitress is on top if it !!

WEYZi9hQHIz1r7tuEnkGyA.text: A MUST SEE!!! For only $12, you too can see (& swallow) the worlds smallest taco's! The Hexx late night side (NOTE: normal hours Hexx is awesome!)...but early morning dining is a joke...the 1st (2) items I was craving from the minimal menu offering (pizza & bolognese) - they were out of. That left $15 sliders (2) & ahi tacos. The tacos are a complete embarrassment- must have used tweezers to put them together! Think of a 50 cent coin folded in half & that's is the size of the tacos they brought to our table. So ~ (6) sliders & (2) non-existent tacos ran us Over $60!! And. That's with a Groupon! The service needs a lot of work too. I think they just opened this side of Hexx. (Used to be a candy store)    If you want a good laugh & want to waste some of your money - by all means go there!    I want to make it clear again - regular Hexx & sitting outside on LV Blvd is fantastic. I eat there all the time!! Ari the day mgr is the best.

7ub84jQby6Ri_hT5fDzYRw.text: APOLLO was AMAZING! Great customer service, the place and view was so terrific! I recommend the delicious bottomless mimosas, perfect drink to start off the day. I'll most definitely will come again!

fNBciBBPCoV7iJ2T0C5m3w.text: excellent chicken and waffles dish. The drink was a little pricey but it was delicious. My fiance did not care for his chicken cesar salad.

x5MCbcUAgh79gNIShBOIcQ.text: This was the perfect choice for brunch on my last day in Vegas.  Me and my friend both love the atmosphere. We sat on the patio and enjoyed our brunch. We had 2 servers so we were never left wanting anything. I had the French toast and chicken sausage which was amazing. Absolutely loved the experience!

s5gzRJxPbaumqkpiH7zqkQ.text: Steven was the best server we could ask for!  He anticipated everyone of our needs even before we could even ask ! Would def recommend this restaurant to anyone with large groups

0ho212w0TLOHPHFDpjeZ5g.text: Fun Tracee - that's all you need to know! We had an exceptional time and ordered the pancakes and breakfast croissant. The food was great, but the service was amazing! She was attentive, sweet, & of course a ton of fun. My fiance and I will definitely be back!

ebgLKhbnLNCJjYqteAnlIg.text: Amazing food!  We had the carrot cake pancakes and ham croissant,  very tasty and wow ... they are not stingy with their portions!  The bloody Mary's are great too!  Clean, trendy and service was phenomenal!!!

5Vrj32nRV4ShuraSoFxeiw.text: It was wonderful,  loved the veggie burger which was delicious and ipenbottom mimosas got me buzzed!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

B4fNTDjFyF_AnMeSrNxvnw.text: Hexx was phenomenal. We were seated quickly after receiving a text from the hostess. Our server (Rafael) was in a great mood and gave us a quick run-down of the cocktail menu. We decided to go with the bottomless mimosas, and were not disappointed. They take that "bottomless" part very seriously, I think my glass was empty once the entire morning.  For our meal, we ordered the Hexx Benedict and the Steak and Eggs. I had the Steak and Eggs, and they were nothing short of spectacular. The steak was cooked to my liking (medium rare) and the potatoes and eggs were over the top. It also came with an english muffin. Every part of the dish was tasty and the portions were generous but not crazy.  What really nailed down this 5 star experience was Hexx's willingness to accommodate us when we decided we'd like to spend the rest of our morning at the bar. Our server transferred our bottomless mimosas and they let us keep drinking them as we just sat and watched football! Unbelievable. I'll absolutely be back.

aDMW1-19c0n7pKv36RusUw.text: Came here for brunch after my sisters bachelorette party. I had made a reservation for the 10 of us and we were sat promptly outside on the patio as it was a beautiful day. I ordered the lobster roll which was delicious and the unlimited mimosas which were probably the best mimosas I've ever had.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

vghpBUH6EWeT4Cn7wZjGlw.text: I ordered salmon with mushroom and quinoa.  I have to say that I am more impressed with the flavor of quinoa than the main character, salmon.

Rm1FdShX2RmyIB0x_CgwYg.text: Came here on a Tuesday night. The place is packed. We wanted a table by the railing to people watch. The views are awesome. You can watch the Bellagio fountains and the people. The food was great, had the wagu burger and busses sprouts. Service is great. Very nice time. Usually they are open until 12am but due to cleaning they closed early. That's the only reason I didn't give it 5 stars. Prices are normal inflated strip prices, but you can't beat the view and atmosphere.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

PAMXg_f-sd4T-0w-Y3m8Wg.text: One of the best brunch places in last Vegas!!! If you come here you must must try their carrot cake pan cakes, unique and delicious!!! And their home fries are also amazing.

RKGgJ4zHJVJOCfbcsFztmA.text: Horrible!! We went here for a Bachelorette Party. We had 10 girls in our party. We all arrived and were seated around 6pm. After we were seated the busser brought water and lemon for everyone. We were all excited to begin the bachelorette party and the restaurant seem to provide an amazing setting for that. After the busser brought the water we then waited and waited and waited. We asked the hostess if we could order drinks and still our waiter never came. A few of the girls tried to go to the bar to get a drink and they were turned away. The bartender said that they couldn't order a drink from the bar because we had a table. After waiting about 30 minutes we asked to speak with the manager. The manager never came. After waiting for 45 minutes without any service or at least a drink we all walked out and left. This was a horrible experience!!!

LawOoHMUM2_q8-T4QCeEmA.text: This might have been just our experience but this place was "ok". The food was ok, bottomless mimosas were not that strong and they don't come around enough to fill them up. Steak was over cooked. Overall this place gets 2 stars. We won't be back.

fvBRZBOkoU8nPUtLaw2PZA.text: This place was very good and lives up to the reviews! First off the service was great! I highly recommend you make a reservation because it can get packed quick. Wen on a Saturday for brunch and it was packed. They have a decently priced bottomless mimosa for being on the strip. Never once did our mimosa go empty! The food was really good as well. A group of 7 of us went for brunch. Every single person loved their food. I had the Hexx benedict, and it was so good! The scalloped potatoes were very good as was the sauce. Others got the french toast and carrot cake pancakes and said they were very flavorful but not overwhelming. We also got the breakfast croissant and chicken and waffles and they were both amazing. The chicken was super juicy and crunchy. Great location as well right in Paris. Sit outside if you get a chance and you can people watch. Overall this is a great place and would recommend.

rJtURXbNj3uUt_0usGrqoA.text: Amazing service! Apollo is amazing and guided us with such ease through the drink menu. It is my husbands 44th birthday and He wanted a good celebration drink Apollo suggested the Long Island but they refer to it as the "strong island" he brought the drink out with a killer presentation. Totally surprised us! I got the colossal Bloody Mary WOW huge! Everything was so smooth it snuck up on us. At the end they brought out a lovely ice cream cupcake with a candle. It was a perfect birthday brunch !!! HIGHLY SUGGEST HEXX!!!!

gM3TW_w4vRyXB7EC1SXBsw.text: Tracee- We love u! Hexx is always great~ bottomless mimosas, amazing food and great environment! But Tracee, you made the day fun and happy! Thank you! We will be back and will look for you!

Ens9LeHU_G_h7TRS9ES4DQ.text: Went for a late lunch. I was by myself and sat outside to people watch. My server was Andrea. Andrea you got a dollar tip because you ignored this senior citizen the whole time I sat there. My ice tea was gone for 25 minutes, you kept looking my way but never came over. You had three tables outside and were not very busy. Pizza, waited 30 minutes for the food, you never came over. The pizza had dripping grease and was horrible. This senior citizen would have left you a large tip if you had been attentive, but alas you were not.  Not impressed with the food or the server.

gRyUltdL6jAFkbj2j5HanQ.text: Food was good but way over-priced. And what's with the convenience tax that is added to the bill? We were not given a reasonable explanation for this added charge.

B5vWepkjINA6YtdqcaBvDw.text: This place is amazing! Came in for late night drinks and food for a girls night! Prices pretty reasonable for being on the strip :) absolutely loved the staff! Shout out to Jody for making the night even more fun and entertaining! Def will be back soon!

rAaMyrPWztFB5H1ZurdkKQ.text: I just want to say the view was amazing, Josh our server gave is exceptional service he made our experience even more wonderful! Thank you Josh!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

ASwdHxo2Lg1vAjZdqsLnAA.text: We had THEE best dinner!!! Chelsea, thank you for such a great experience!!!  Dinner was delicious... Everything tasted D-LICIOUS!!!!  We enjoyed our bottle of Syrah!!! And the best part, we were able to leave a "love note" on our bottle!!! We will definitely be back!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Thank you for such a great experience!!! Our Syrah was delicious and we were able to leave a &#34;love note&#34; on the bottle!!

oxkJR7hBckreuFBZzsKhxw.text: Candied Bacon, bread pudding, chocolate cake, and drinks were all delicious! Sat in the patio area and felt forgotten for a while, had to hunt a waiter for refills on the water and our check. But the dessert and drinks made up for it

9G8tT-c_vnyjwSzjGUZl0w.text: Great spot to eat on the strip. We ordered this salad that starts with the letter "P" lol I forgot the name but It was delicious worth the 17$ then we ordered the smothered fries and those were good too! But the mac and cheese-ugh! Better off saving your money. Kraft mac and cheese is was better than what they served us. But everything else was very good!

oMnzMeECHCs7vCgF-fcpVw.text: Tracee is the best server I've had on the strip - kept the mimosas coming, she's friendly and so accommodating. The food was great but our experience was exceptional thanks to Tracee! Thank you!

neyZXdsGy6tlM86X5S5Slw.text: My family's experience at Hexx was incredible. The staff was accommodating and friendly. We enjoyed a round of appetizers. The bacon was delicious and the broccoli was some of the best I had ever tasted. My entree was a New York steak prepared as I ordered. It was melt in my mouth incredible. Our two younger kids enjoyed the meal as much as the adults. After wonderful dessert choices we were treated to a factory tour and tasting. Delightful!

N4BBs8pl3BsF5SbUABkVxw.text: Although location was perfect while staying at the Paris and the restaurant itself was very sleek, food was subpar.  Oriental chicken salad was basically a bowl of cabbage with literally a few strands of shredded chicken, maybe five mandarin oranges a few nuts and a weak dressing all for $18.  Burger was served open face with a smear of thousand island and undercooked fries $18 as well.  No presentation here and definitely better $20 salads and burgers out there!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Nice patio on the strip

f_3bnLShtD44Os2uUdtrZw.text: Great atmosphere & service! Try the Steak & eggs

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Steak &amp; eggs after a night out always hits the spot. Open 24 hours

6WtqOnLfubiKj75a8yyNUQ.text: Came here for brunch for a bachelorette party weekend. Great food and atmosphere. Tracee our waitress was the best waitress we've had in Vegas, she is literally the best and deserves a raise!!! So down to earth and made us feel welcome! Ask for here, she's great!!!

GnPl4GBZuBSeh9LClk2l2w.text: Food and service were good, but was really offended that they charged a concession fee as though it was a tax without telling us about it until we queried. It's not my problem that type not affiliated with the Paris - bake the fee into your costs and don't be underhanded.

mICf3TAk0TkDALju1AYGZg.text: What a great restaurant for brunch!  The place was packed and so we ended up eating at the bar.  The bartender was fantastic and spent time recommending drinks and favorite food items.  She was spot on.  The food was great and they even accommodated my daughter in law's gluten allergy.  The only downside was the 2 young hostesses who treated everyone in line like a bother...we were leaving the restaurant to go somewhere else when we spotted the 3 spots at the bar.  Best decision of the day!  We will be back and I hope the hostesses will be more professional.

KQyptY5ewA3bRmiPwRGl6Q.text: On a quest to try something new rather than our favorite handful of restaurants, we came here. I was surprised by how big the space is actually. From the street you don't get that impression.  We sat outside which in and of itself is fantastic with a direct view of the Bellagio fountains.  I had the "special" salad. It was delicious!  It was a large bib/butter lettuce drizzled with oil and white balsamic which in and of itself was mmmm, but then sprinkled with blue cheese, chocolate nibs and onions.  Just a super interesting and great tasting item.  We also had the jambalaya, which was great.   I had the gin slush drink which was unique and also great.   The banana cream pie was just ok.  It gets high points for having a whipped cream with no sugar on it, but otherwise the quantity of the whipped cream completely covered any banana taste the dish might have had.    A nice spot to enjoy the view and every dish delivers.

b6gAo5BGonNxoOyG2ivPwA.text: We decided to try out Hexx for brunch during a trip to Vegas for my bachelorette. We went around noon on a Saturday and surprisingly we were able to be seated (outside) right away as a group of 5.   I ordered the Carnitas Hash which has braised pork, salsa, home fries, eggs, and pico de gallo. The dish tasted great - savory, pork cooked right, home fries flavorful - and the portion size was good - definitely big but not overwhelming.   Drink-wise I got the Yellow Ghost which was a Bloody Mary made with a yellow tomato gazpacho. It looked striking but wasn't very flavorful - they could have spiced it up more with some seasoning.   Overall, this restaurant has very good brunch food but my cocktail left something to be desired hence the 4 stars.  On a side note, they do offer bottomless mimosas at breakfast for $20 which is a good deal in Vegas for a nice restaurant.

gYbaxvhqDUUC405xWPqo9Q.text: Three stars for the location but the food is just eh... the patio was wonderful for breakfast but the food is over priced and just okay.

aXBXyri8jsKXh_gRH_7s-A.text: The only thing better than their chicken and waffles and bottomless mimosas were our servers Sean "Connery" and Bobby "Big B". Absolutely fantastic job, best servers I've ever had. You the man Sean!!

Arr_ALhAa1SBN9TglBq9Jw.text: I have mixed emotions about this place. Food was super good. Like super super good. Bartender was great too. Bottomless mimosas were great. What sucked was the wait. 55 minutes to get our food. 55!!!!!  Like I said, food was great. Service great. The wait blows though.

kHl6gx_KnV-hchh810ECxw.text: We got the candy at HEXX. The kids loved it. A lot do seelection to choose from. We would come again. Very clean too.

RJJvz15Bh-bryddcOwZtVw.text: We had an amazing meal! Excellent food, fabulous staff & awesome chocolate store. Thank you Teddy Thompson, best waiter ever!, for all the laughs and making our dinner so enjoyable.

ILoWtWtUo1FU68lmShfrtg.text: Excellent brunch!!! The brioche French toast was AMAZING and the chicken and waffles was even better!  In spite of my sister being pretty bitchy to our server, Andrea was very patient and kind. She was on top of every request and did it with a smile! I would definitely recommend this place and will certainly return on my next visit to Vegas!

riyMbOgCiL4AhHp6653RXw.text: Went to Hexx for appetizers and drinks.  We had the meat and cheese tray.  It was a ton of food.  Everything was great!  Would definitely go back!

-r4L22OXgl0XEwUVRnLzxw.text: Excellent!!  Came in for happy hour.  The waiter suggested the fried broccolini and it did not disappoint!!  We shared the charcuterie tray and there was way more food than we could finish.  Will definitely be back when we visit again!

pJ5B-QxssQsIg55bVjbanw.text: Food was great (cooked perfectly), $20 bottomless Mimosas were clutch, bloody Mary's were delicious. And CLARE (our server) was probably the sweetest person I've had as a waitress in a long time. She split the bill for our large obnoxious group, brought a piece of cake for our special occasion and even went as far to get a creeper boy to leave the table. Five stars Clare, Hexx is lucky to have you.

8j_hFmnULEEly_5iqWDwMg.text: As a Vegas local I was excited to try this place. Love the new decor and brand, absolutely amazing. The broccolini was on point and I had the chicken and waffles that were out of this world!  Chef Piekarski gave us a tour of the chocolate kitchen and what a great concept ... Bean to bar single origin chocolate. We had a chocolate tasting to end the night and needless to say, we found a new favorite strip spot!

0gE_SZNqCegmKvsoD4MzGg.text: We just had the best service and breakfast. Sean and Crystal make an excellent team as a wait staff. The food is out of this world!

dQFH2DV474SIMqZPe-DNhQ.text: Taylor was such an amazing server. Great energy and always refilling our drinks. She was such a pleasure I'll definitely Come back !!

G4JNdM9MqX90u4raIitprQ.text: Come to Vegas.  Eat here.  Ask for Tracee.  Thank me later.  In all seriousness, the food and service was so good we ended up eating here Friday and Saturday morning.  I had been to the Sugar Factory during a previous Vegas trip and had realized it had changed restaurants.  My husband and I came on Friday for breakfast, I had the protein omelet, which was delicious, but the home fries were SO good!  Think, whole roasted mini potatoes that are smashed and covered with Parmesan and salt & pepper.  My husband got the 2 egg meal, and raved about his, as well.  We did bottomless mimosas - a steal for $20, and a Bloody Mary.  We're from Wisconsin, so the Bloody Mary is practically the State Drink after Miller Lite, so a Bloody has to be good for me to be impressed.  This was a nice balance of spicy.    Our waitress was Tracee and she is hysterical.  She makes you feel welcome and just seems like the type of waitress who cares about you and wants to make sure you have a good time.  We didn't think we'd have time Saturday morning for a sit down breakfast, but when we did, we brought our entire group with us and asked for Tracee.  Everyone loved her (and their food) and would be back for sure.

fvJ0aFQihOrW_IkPKErWPw.text: We came here 2 days in a row.  Food was excellent and so was service. Kudos to JJ and Jordan. Great service. Awesome food. And the $38 Bloodymary was definitely worth it. Thank you!

SIwBUzZC50ONcveIKnruzA.text: Although the burgers looked amazing on neighboring tables, we opted for several small plates.  We ordered the meatballs, smashed Yukon potatoes, macaroni and cheese, onion dip and chips, and the bacon.  All of it was amazing. So much food!  They're open 24 hours, we will definitely be back to try more!  We were also offered a chocolate sample to tease our appetites and it worked! Try this place!

hZRu-ioTMg3GKeCiebdQJA.text: This was our first time visiting this restaurant. We sat on the patio and even though it was a hot summer day, the misters made it comfortable. Sean and his assistant Stephanie were a great team! They were very attentive and provided great service! Would definitely come back again.

Zq8ZtNezIPT562fTeJ8YLw.text: Katie at the bar was amazing & took such great care of us. She was quick, efficient, and anticipated what we needed through out our stay. She was friendly and knowledgeable about the menu and drink options as well. We had a great experience and would definitely come back.

LxlgIo04HD9vGXkTKmUZ1Q.text: Food was great for everyone in our party, portions aren't ridiculously big either so I could actually eat all mine (still left me full though). Our server was very friendly and accommodating and our water glasses were never allowed to get empty. A little pricy but I'd say worth it.

bTf0S-C4czqELlguK-Nh3g.text: Midnight munchies on Friday night! 6 of us shared and split a few menu items. Hot mess was pretty great and the gumbo was yummy as well! I got a bloody mary which was tasty! Used a myVegas cocktail reward very smoothly! We were seated on outside porch which got a little chilly but we had a great time and got to people watch all the late night overindulged patrons of Paris. Waitress was quick and nice, answered all our questions. A good experience and I would go back!

-zxU292KmBFz4KaZy3X_hQ.text: Tracee is the best server here. Kept those bottomless mamosas coming with a smile, humor and warm heart. I definitely would come back here!

8V64VZA3smYZpNcnpb3f7g.text: Went here with a friend for dinner. Patio has great people watching! Service was excellent. I'm obsessed with Jambalaya...theirs was legit! ;-) Cool place, i'd definitely go back.

22AwfnIwwUmXwX9sICXl7w.text: I went on a Saturday night in March during college  spring break week and it was empty, I expected it to be super packed because of the reviews and because it is right in front of the bellagio water show and it wasn't. I ordered the salmon and it was very tasty, just seemed like not a large enough portion, my friends ordered steaks and they LOVED it. The 3 of them got very large portions and they said it was cooked to perfection. It was pricey I agree but you get what you pay for. We loved it. We shared one of the Hexx Potions and it really was the cherry on top. Definitely coming back!

LDqMkqa_y3OO37HYkD35fA.text: Nice atmosphere amid the hustle and bustle of the strip! Clean, smells good, and the Chinese chicken salad was amazingly fresh and delish...not to mention HUGE! The wait staff is friendly and helpful as well...shout out to Tracy!

6JzHAHrOJcSIsu2xRqcVBA.text: A great view eating and people watching on the famous Las Vegas Strip across the water fountains of the Beautiful Bellagio Hotel Resort.   Had the vegetable pizza which hit the spot.   Just a wonderful place to drink and people watch. Very affordable also.

vWUBkn-ujh0R7PHFg00UDw.text: We were staying at Bally's, which is connected to Paris in Las Vegas. Due to time constraints, we needed to find a good place near the hotel to eat and selected HEXX because the menu looked the most promising even though the options were limited. Although there were no reservations available online for 5 people at the time we needed, we called and they were able to accommodate us. When we arrived there was a line out the door of people waiting to get in so we were glad we had a reservation. We were seated at a hightop inside where we had a perfect view of the Bellagio's night time fountain show. We were disappointed to learn they were out of both bottles of wine we wanted to order, and it took almost 60 minutes to get our order of 2 burgers, chicken and waffles, caesar salad, and spinach dip. If you're eating anywhere on the strip in Vegas, plan to be there 90 minutes. The chicken and waffles got great reviews, but I thought the bacon cheeseburger was just average. The spinach dip was good and cheesy. Overall, there was nothing special about HEXX other than the view of the Bellagio's fountain, which you'll pay a premium for.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Bacon cheeseburger.

QIQEjOS9GY7uckmyWd_HoQ.text: Really great food and atmosphere. The BEST spot for people watching! The martinis, scallops, and veal chop were to die for. The desserts are among the finest I've ever had. Service provided by Brandon and a beautiful young lady whose name escapes me at the moment, was fun, professional, sincere and welcoming. We went there twice and enjoyed each evening! A must do!!

rxfpb5SunDgTL2vuG8iE_w.text: Tracee and Ceecee are absolutely amazing servers! They were attentive and extremely friendly. The food was delicious and the bottomless mimosas were fabulous. I'm so happy my girls and I chose to have brunch here on our last day in Vegas. Please come here and request Tracee or Ceecee as your waitresses.

QnhhQwEhFca2Khxm8OYtVQ.text: Taylor is the BEST server ever!  Seriously.  Will be back soon.  She never let us go without our unlimited mimosas...and she did it all with one arm!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Taylor is the best server EVER! She kept our bottomless mimosas filled all morning! We love her!!!

lQoeGUz8RFN4hhOR7NYzyQ.text: Wonderful meal on the heated patio looking across at the Bellagio fountain show.  Excellent food and drink recommendations by our fabulous waiter Kevin aka "Chocolate Thunder"  will definitely eat here again next time we are in Vegas.

0CCmTtrxd3RmLORRVqemrQ.text: I had the lobster roll for lunch - - probably the worst lobster roll I've ever had...nothing in it seemed fresh.  My colleagues made several comments on how underwhelming my lobster roll looked.  The restaurant was very loud, making it difficult to have a conversation with colleagues.  My colleagues were overall pleased with the dishes they received (so I didn't give 1 star).  Staff were not very attentive.  My drink sat empty for more than 75% of the time while we were at our table.

WaddEpYaYuWISiEHxbOrIQ.text: The location is across the road from the Bellagio fountains but you can't see them completely or hear the music. Sitting outside is quieter than inside but it's relative. Outside has street and car and motorcycle noise. Inside the music is on too loud and the chatter echoes. The food I thought was fine. Burgers were good. Crab cake was good. Caesar salad was ok. Servers were nice. If it was quieter and at night, I'd go back.

rJ5kl8Y5v3fOqOvkDN8_jg.text: This was my first visit to Hexx since the change over from Sugar Factory and WHAT A DIFFERENCE!!!  The decor is open, clean, sleek and comfortable. I did spy some cozy, intimate, pillow lined small booths near the bar with great mood lighting that would be perfect for date night.  Our server was phenomenal!  She was on top of it from the very start!  She suggested the Ghost Pepper bloody mary. DELISH!   Tasted almost like a gazpacho with a kick. Very fresh and unique. You could literally taste every ingredient one by one until that little kick of heat hit the back of your tongue.   Cinnamon Roll waffle! I had to make myself stop eating the yummy cream cheese "frosting" by itself after I had finished the perfectly cooked, fluffy, flavorful waffle.  PLUS! They had a bottomless mimosa special for $20! You can't beat that in Vegas! My friend indulged in 4 of them during our leisurely  brunch and said they were STRONG!  I'm glad they took the cheesiness of Sugar Factory out of there and replaced it with Hexx!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Cinnamon Roll Waffle, Ghost Pepper Bloody Mary, Mimosa (bottomless!) and the biggest meat omelette ever!

JWVNPajlpt0kh8oo0hwFzQ.text: We went to Hexx twice for breakfast. Banana Bread French Toast was very good and very filling (ate it for breakfast and lunch) my husband got the best Bloody Mary he's ever had there (Farmers Market Bloody Mary) this could be a meal itself if you eat all the stuff that comes with it! Corned beef hash was just average. The second time I went I got the Protein omelet which was average tasting and price was about $16 (average price here for a breakfast for one entree). Chocolate store has good treats as well while you wait (short wait) for a table. Good atmosphere.

uecd-zuYpOEPt81vG2gRFg.text: Very nice and fancy resterunt Great position and you can see the bellagio show from your table and that is so fun. great dips and snacks before the real food that is also very good Big and tasty portions

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_XQnyKpBVtCxUR8dOVl73Q.text: Food was great! Prices are too high... The rib-eye was amazing! but not enough asparagus in my opinion...

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Rib eye

_-ANlRagJK6H3JpnU0swkA.text: Went here for a late night dinner since we where close by, and happen to be the only restaurant open so late. Got the spicy jambalaya it was fresh, great kick to it and one of the best jambalaya I've had. Their menu isn't the greatest for late night hours, but my choice was a winner !

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Spicy Jambalaya

sNknf70Uj-76lCfjJ23zSg.text: Really nice indoor-outdoor concept for Vegas.  Had a good breakfast there on the patio during the daytime.

sLFH3GQShoUl1rGnJ5b6Qw.text: Sean was our waiter and he was absolutely amazing. Our bottomless mimosas were never empty, and he always checked to make sure everything was okay. He is a super nice guy and told us some fun things to do in Vegas! The food was great too, but the customer service made it better! I highly recommend this restaurant and I would definitely ask for Sean! You will get the best service possible with him!

J2Vw1NhZxFvaXQxjJtxcEA.text: TRACY! TRACY! TRACY! Had Tracy has our waitress for our bachelorette brunch and it was a large party of 18 girls and she gave the best service making sure our bottomless mimosa was filled and all our food came out correct! And we all did separate bills and she was such a trooper!

Y2PLHwSWhKHqLHjob70_gg.text: This place is SO GOOD. The cheeseburger was amazing. I split it with my mom and we got the fries.  We were sat immediately outside with a fantastic view of the bellagio fountains and our server Sean was great. He was helpful and didn't forget a thing we asked for! Great food, great service, great views!

CU_DSmE7jbZicY_tx8yXOw.text: Beautiful place to sit and have brunch! Love the secure of this place. I noticed on the way to the restroom they have little private booths around the Corner from the bar area.  If you love to eat and people watch this was the place for it!   Food was good and portions were pretty large.  Service was a little slow that morning which she apologized for since we were on a time frame.

sDdyKzfMPSDg-2EJey6UfA.text: The mac n cheese was super creamy and the Caesar salad had a hint of lemon. The chicken Parmesan was outstanding...hella good when you lit like a torch

eu05Ac9SjAyNFPEGg9dkqg.text: AMAAAAAZING food!! & our server was awesome and patient! This place is a must!! All the sandwiches are amazing!

T5EG9DhHEIe7puxD-BJzNA.text: I really enjoyed the atmosphere here.  Wait staff was great and they had bottomless mimosas for $20.  I had the eggs benedict.  I was a tad disappointed they had potatoes instead of the usual English muffin but the potatoes were actually good in the dish.  I also had a choice of toast or english muffin on the side so it wasnt a huge deal either.  I also prefer my hollandaise to be less thick and a little more salty but it was still very good regardless.  I will definitely try this place again.  Maybe for lunch or dinner.  I would definitely recommend.  I preferred things differently but, I still loved my dish.

4gNjv-4N5PekQ2yHxdppiQ.text: Service, food, and drinks were on point.  Our handsome server, Sean, was so nice and went out of his way to make sure my friend and cousin and I were well taken care of....he even offered to walk me by the arm to the bathroom as my unwalkable heels were slowing me down (these heels weren't made for walking....) Located on the Vegas strip within the Paris hotel vicinity, I'll definitely make sure to stop by again when I'm in town.  Please don't ask for Sean as I want him all to myself and I'm territorial as fuuuuuuuuuuuuuucckkkk...........he's that great!

Cx1f1hmt8PqKeLW7XykH_w.text: Chinese chicken salad was cold and fresh and huge- chicken would be better if it was chunks and not shredded. Hummus was served with thin and crunchy pita crisps, candied double fried bacon sounds amazing, but it wasn't living up to the hype, vegas mule was decent. This place has a nice interior- clean and modern. The menu features a lot for every mood. Right off the strip.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States

_Q8AsvL4sqvofuf772ITNA.text: So happy we decided to try this place. Originally, we were supposed to go to Mon Ami Gabi but they had some kind of emergency going on and they weren't serving anyone, so the bf and I decided to go to Hexx instead. Started off with the shrimp cocktail and crab cakes. OMG... best shrimp cocktail I've ever had. 4 Huge, prawn-sized shrimp that required the use of a with a knife and fork. Accompanying cocktail sauce had a nice kick to it. Crab cakes were delish. I'm always hesitant to try crab cakes on the west coast because I'm partial to the ones I've had on the East Coast. These crab cakes did not disappoint. Slight crunch on the exterior and nice ratio of lump crab and filling on he inside. We decided to share the prime-rib sandwich that came with fries. Big portion, tender meat, perfect for sharing. Comes with an au jus to dip and the horseradish to slather on your sandwich. We left stuffed and happy. Best lunch I've had in Vegas by far. We sat outside so we were also able to people watch their outside patio. Next time, we'll come in the evening so we can watch the water show at the Bellagio while dining. Definitely a memorable spot and can't wait for our next trip back to Vegas to try other items on their menu. Thank you to our server, David for the top notch service that made our day so much better.

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Quite the Bloody Mary. Meal on it&#39;s own. Didn&#39;t try it but saving it for next trip.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lump crab cake.
Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp cocktail. Nothing short of amazing.

1LRdT409wznNDpDfinyNbQ.text: Amazing brunch, should be your first recovery stop in Vegas! The pizza, eggs, potatoes, salad, coffee: it was all good. If you go there, be sure to ask for Tracee. She is a top notch server, and we never even had to ask for a refill on our bottomless mimosas. Couldn't imagine a better welcome to Sin City, Tracee was perfect!

UWXXOB8AG-9PRg6riWiAkA.text: We went here this last Friday to kick off my bachelorette weekend! Tracee, the mimosa ninja, was our server. She was fabulous. So nice and friendly and kept us laughing!! The food was super good and such a great atmosphere. We will definitely be coming back next time!!

photos.caption: Photo of HEXX kitchen + bar - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Right on the strip! Awesome!!

Ll7Hlm9oHPyTJd2E-WQYYQ.text: We met a group of friends for brunch at HEXX and boy am I glad we did! The offerings aren't your typical brunch faves, although there are plenty of pancakes. I recommend you get out of your comfort zone and try something more adventurous.  The Carnitas Hash was amazing, served in a single dish with the braised pork, a tasty roasted salsa, potatoes, scrambled eggs and pico, it was delicious. The Brioche French Toast was another stand out, my daughter ate it all, and she does not typically clean her plate. Hubs had the Farm Fresh Eggs with bacon, potatoes and toast and not a word of complaint was heard from his side of the table. Our friends tried one of the breakfast pizzas and it looked delicious too.   Service was on point, expeditious without hovering.   All around us people were enjoying some really well decorated Bloody Marys but we weren't quite ready. Maybe next time...

g1reTyqrM9NtkYZX4J_0PA.text: Loved this place, from the excellent service to the great food. I had the chicken and waffles and boy it was instant hangover cure (the bottomless mimosas might have helped too). The chicken was well spiced, nice and crusty but not oily. At first trying to finish my plate seemed daunting but I knew leftovers just wouldn't be as good and couldn't let this goodness go to waste. But our waitress (Tracy?) was very friendly and lively so we stayed long enough that I was able to catch a second wind and finish enjoying. Outside patio is perfect for people watching, which is half the reason to go to Las Vegas anyway.

eg3r9ke1TztuWFBeSN2jQg.text: this place is amazing!!!!!! it is so cute and the food tastes AMAZING!! and the prices are not bad at all!!!! the service was quick and so friendly and so nice. apollo and juan were our servers and they were the best. so happy with the experience i had from the restaurant and will definitely be returning.

uFfubN1Wv8xLfPAJL33Wpg.text: We have gone to Hexx multiple times since it changed over from Sugar Factory.  It is fine for what it is but don't expect to be blown away.  The food is average and your paying a premium for the location.  They keep changing the name of the place but it is the same old stuff, sandwiches and burgers.

MvzvJB4VJZm5B-rps6_e0g.text: Go for the drinks and leave because of the food.  I'm not sure why this place has such a high rating but just order a pitcher of drinks and nothing more! Nice view and good people watching. Barf city on the food!

59pRWA_o6ApjKutjrRghJA.text: I really enjoyed my experience here . We had Rafael as our server who was hilarious and funny, the whole time making me and my girl laugh . Then Christian, who is the manager, was also just as cool. Made my birthday feel special ! ;) we had the brunch menu and it was all delicious ! Recommend this place !

6jSL5cXuGi_em92B4531Ow.text: Came to Hexx with a large party for brunch. Not only were we discriminated against for being a younger crowd, but the "bottomless" mimosas only afforded everyone 4 drinks. Really? After ordering food and drinks, is that the best service you can offer for the biggest group (most expensive check) at the time?  As Vegas locals, we thought we should check out a renowned Strip location but it was clearly a mistake. If you're looking for a fun brunch experience do not come to this restaurant. Someone rated this as, "Bottomless will keep your glasses full." It was more like our glasses were empty for 80% of our stay.  LUCKILY, the manager (Hillary) assured that our party is just as important as all the other customers and became more attentive to our table.

_b5NLDAtktfxj-bifbaiDw.text: Visited for lunch. The staff were very attentive and the food was great. I had the prime beef dip and it was excellent. It was a hot and humid day but the patio was open and you could still get fresh air. This is probably not environmentally friendly but the effect was nice. I was so tired of being cold every time we went into a building! The temperature was great here.

5jqrgj0-fijb4CdYlcE36A.text: Terrible chilaquiles and the chips for the spinach dip where hard and stale !!! The wagyu was over cooked!! Over priced food and just terrible !!! GREAT SERVICE but horrible food

4bbNhCiLgh8OHZneyOI9jA.text: Lobster salad for $19 and it is 3 spoonful of salad, this is a joke, also manager is a joke, he said lobster is expensive, I should have known, really??  Oh by the way, it is served without chips, which was on the menu.

cW9SchjHt6hbJYcT_sNplw.text: service was a little slow and we asked our server to bring us a thing of water because we all knew we'd be going through it but he didn't leave us water and didn't come back very often to check on us for it. the food was amazing and the location is perfect though!

KgQ5s3EP1o3QnDb1rZgD4g.text: Service, food and drink is a solid 4. Being open 24 hours is an additional star. Its nice to sit and chill after a long day/night in Vegas. We had a party of 5 and showed up close to 12am. We were seated quickly and our server came around soon after. We ordered a couple of pizzas, other shared snacks and drinks. Out of the pizza the  Margherita was the best. We also ordered the jungle juice which is served in the pitcher. A bit pricey but it was fun to have.

P1YKYgIxqr11_HdX9wSipA.text: Great place for brunch. Food was delicious! They have good music playing, lots of energy and awesome views of the water show directly across the street.

juDe4CrrIO6QYdxQnBxzIw.text: We visited Hexx for my sisters 21st birthday brunch and were lucky enough to score Sean and Marc! We never felt unattended and Sean kept us smiling the whole time. The food was incredible, the table split carrot cake pancakes and couldn't get enough. I had chicken and waffles and it was amazing. We enjoyed awesome bloody Mary's and a very generous bottomless mimosa deal. By far our favorite meal in Vegas so far, topped off with Sean having the whole restaurant sing to my sis for her bday! And small detail but nonetheless AWESOME music.

W8ohgyEaMKmJfpmq6at0KQ.text: My hubby and I ate here yesterday for breakfast and Jody was our server. She was so attentive and knowledgeable about the menu. Which was a big help, since my husband never knows what he wants to order. She did make some drink suggestions but it was too early for us to have a cocktail. Not once did we have to ask for a refill on our waters. We left very full and satisfied customers and will be back to see her again!

w_520VUtBse78IJ4Z0ELLg.text: this is the most amazing brunch in vegas. it is everything you want in a luxurious vegas brunch. food is excellent and service is fun, friendly, and helpful. the inside/outside seating makes the experience even cooler.

Zk_5CD5gAD0EwyJHGR1gAA.text: Good food at Hexx make sure you go check it out inside of Paris las vegas next to chateau nightclub !

pZ8iy-D0CGDLFiqRgP5THg.text: Awesome food and drinks. Great service. Would recommend to any of my friends visiting Vegas. Will definitely go back.

ZAKBFL2XVK-kBRc6WXcAqg.text: Excellent drinks and food for the cost.  Service is super friendly even though they were very busy.

9PEtFAJV7P1lOqLfPDni4Q.text: Came in today with my husband and had bottomless mimosas, and the smothered fries. Best service ever thanks for making it a greatexperience great Julio. We will be back and will definitely ask for you

j0blvFQYpqOZo6guTBobJQ.text: Good fresh food. Generous portions. Pity no light meal options (half portions for sandwiches). Great, attentive service. Got offered coffee to go as part of bottomless coffee offer - which impressed the living daylights out of me because most establishments try to squeeze every penny out of you. Winner!

bKQp4xqg4vQEvHATs7i5Gg.text: I will be dreaming about my meal for the next year! The location is amazing with a view and the food was impeccable , we had the lamb and the pizza and both exceeded expectations. Will definitely be back the next time I'm in vevas

T1oCGhGQN6VYlfqLh0ohuw.text: The food:  we ordered salmon and chicken on waffels. The salmon was to tried-out. The mussels in the soup from the salmon, na what should I say Not the best part. The chicken on the waffels, the most parts of the chicken was bones.  Trinks We orderd a red and white wine, both was good but nothing special.  Service: The service was friendly and we seated immediately.

lQQyD4Rdrno9AwZ5PlB88Q.text: Amazing service and wonderful food. If you go to Hexx you have to sit in Tracee's section and have the chicken and waffles. It was all amazing. And Tracee... I did gamble a little more at the airport this afternoon. Only down $5. See you next year.

NqT5XMIWtUAyBmaa3spCTA.text: My husband and I had dinner here last Saturday. Food and drinks were delicious. Service was wonderful. We could not have asked for a better server than Jessica A. Attentive, funny and had great suggestions! We had a great time!

lZE1WQAgnSiPh-T54qGWXA.text: Went here twice during the conference this week due to location.  The bar happy hour offers good choices. The food is good, but the service is horrible. Long wait, so be prepared to be patient.

v5QJjy9E8JMyntRZRx4cmQ.text: Had an amazing breakfast!! Tracee kept the unlimited mimosas coming and had a great personality to match! :) well worth the money! Worth coming back to, request Tracee, best server and personality in Vegas!!

5RcYBS-BD7AOk1IuIZbBpQ.text: We dined at Hexx and thoroughly enjoyed the restaurant.  It has an excellent location right on the Strip in front of the Paris resort.  Across the street is the Bellagio Fountains so you can actually see the show while dining.  We had a table that was part way in the restaurant and part way on the patio and it was just perfect.  Far enough away from the sidewalk that people don't stare in at you but close enough to take in the sights.  The restaurant is elevated from the sidewalk level so it is not really a problem if you are seated right on the edge of the patio.  We had a Groupon so our meal was super cheap.  I had a wonderful wood-fired pizza and my husband enjoyed the Classic Burger.  Both meals were tasty and served hot and very flavourful.  Our waitress Jessica A was both attentive and efficient.  We enjoyed our conversation with her sharing her recent baby's birth.  She was lovely and just added to our enjoyment of our evening at Hexx.  We also ordered Chocolate Brownie for dessert and it was perfect.  All in all, I would definitely not miss this restaurant when in Vegas.  It is a hidden gem and do check on Groupon if you want to get a deal on dinner.  Also it was super easy to book our reservation through Open Table.  Don't miss this place.  It is great!!!!

oZG4yS-lSUnDDHcOm_82jQ.text: Hexx was a tasteful delight at the wee hours of the night. The bake sale sundae was amazing; three scoops of ice cream adorned with cookies, brownies and rice Krispy treats yum! Daniel our server was by far my favorite part of our experience. His enthusiasm and hospitality set the bar high for all servers out there.

4D81DOAOVUmrY4wyaDEXxw.text: My husband and I stumbled upon this place on accident trying to grab a quick meal before our concert.  We were so impressed with the service here!  We encountered at least five people during the time we were there, and every single one of them showed exemplary customer service.  It was so refreshing after having so many recent experiences with the opposite here in LA.  The food was fantastic too.  The bun on the burger was amazing, and the meatballs were great.  Next time we're in Vegas we will for sure be coming back!

XWJRdfKIIniJkUC9OUubZw.text: I love everything about this restaurant. Food , ambiance , service , view are excellent . Chocolate pancakes with caramel is to die for .

8pMqp9Bvy6E5-8CApOon2g.text: My husband and I came to this restaurant after visiting the Eiffel Tower Experience at the Paris Hotel. The food was just ok. I ordered the filet mignon because I wanted a smaller steak. I told the waiter I wanted it well done. He seemed really confused as to why I wanted it well done so I had to explain to him that I'm pregnant and have to have all my meats cooked thoroughly. He then asked if they could butterfly it (when I'm at restaurants and they ask me this it gives me the inclination that they do not have an experienced chef in the kitchen so I usually skip it). But ok, butterfly it. He then tried to convince me to get it with some pink, no! The food took over 30 mins to come out and it was just ok. The roasted asparagus tasted like they picked it fresh out of the ground and slapped in on the plate. The steak was butterflied, but still CHARRED on the edges, yuck. I ate in the center of the steak where it was cooked thoroughly but not burnt. My husband had the chicken and waffles, which he said was good. This is the only reason they got two stars. My advice: use a groupon or go somewhere else.

qmmQlFuojXiI0JJvkUQtbA.text: Had quite the variety of food the other night, from the smothered fries and crab cakes to that candied bacon!!  The food, service, and the people watching on the patio made for the total package!!  We will be back!

N57ziqFUHIiosJ2jZeQUYQ.text: Tracee was amazing, sweet, and made our day! Affordable for Vegas!! Bottomless mimosas for 20 dollars. Great brunch day atmosphere on the strip.
